1a1(rgyud): @#/ /rgyud cha pa bzhugs so//
1b1(rgyud): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsan+d+ra gu h+ya ti la ka nA ma mahA tan+t+ra rA dza/
1b2(rgyud): bod skad du/ dpal zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/
1b3(rgyud): dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de
1b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar cher gyur te/ yang 'dus nas
2a1(rgyud): @##/ /phyag gar dang bcas pas thal mo khong stong du sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kun
2a2(rgyud): tu bzang po chen po la gtsug gi 'dud pas gsol ba btab pa/ dpa' bo kun gyi gsang ba yi/ /zla gsang
2a3(rgyud): thig le dga' byed pa/ /gnyis med ye shes yang dag 'byung / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du
2a4(rgyud): gsol/ /sems can kun gyi ma skyes pa/ /skye dang ma skyes rnams spangs pa'i/ /byung dang 'byung 'gyur
2a5(rgyud): rab 'byor ba'i/ /mchog tu rtog par sbyor ba'o/ /rin chen thams cad 'byung gnas dag /dri med
2b1(rgyud): nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i/ /rgyal mtshan chen po sgreng byas te/ /nyi ma chen pos dbang bskur ba'o/ /chos kyi longs spyod yang dag 'byung //
2b2(rgyud): pad+mo dmar po mchog gi mdog /'dod chags de nyid gsang ba che/ /thams cad bde byed bdud rtsi'i mchog /A dang lar ni yang dag
2b3(rgyud): ldan| |yang dag mdzes pa 'gying ba'i 'gros/ /sna tshogs ye shes sna tshogs che/ /zla gsang thig le'i mchog nyid do/ /de nas
2b4(rgyud): b com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i
2b5(rgyud): gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas/ 'gog pa chen po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas cang mi
2b6(rgyud): gsung bar bzhugs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ yang 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das
3a1(rgyud): @#/ /kun tu bzang po chen po la de kho na nyid dbyangs kyis bskul te bzhengs par mdzad do/ /oM hUM AHmi skye ye
3a2(rgyud): shes bde ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i ro la mnabs su gsol/ /a la la ho/ sems dpa' bde mchog de nyid 'gog pa rnams la
3a3(rgyud): bslang ba'i phyir/ /chags pa med pa'i bde mchog mnga' mdzad bzhengs shig mnabs/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i bde la rol cing
3a4(rgyud): dam bcas 'jig rten sgrol/ /byang chub skye gnas bde mchog dbyings las mi nyams dga' ba'i gar mdzod cig /a la la ho/
3a5(rgyud): sngon gyi zhen pa'i mtha' dang sngo bskams nyon mongs gzir ba la/ /rmongs med bde mchog rgyan dang ldan pas thabs kyis bskul
3a6(rgyud): te go bar mdzod/ /'gro kun mtshungs par spyod pa'i sgo mor byang chub lam ston cing / /bde mchog bdud rtsi khyad par med par
3b1(rgyud): 'dus pa'i tshogs la bka' stsol cig / a la la ho/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i bdag nyid chen pos de
3b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po chen po zla gsang thig le skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi thugs kyi gsang ba'i thig
3b3(rgyud): le las shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs phyung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i snying po zla ba'i thig le'i dbus su
3b4(rgyud): rgyas par byas te/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du'ang snang bar byas/ steng dang / 'og tu 'ang zhugs te/ ma lus lus pa med pa'i ri dang / sems can rnams la
3b5(rgyud): gsal bar byas nas shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde bas mnyes par byas te/ slar de nyid du log nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu mnyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i bdag po
3b6(rgyud): snying po gsang ba mchog gi zla ba'i thig le'i dbus na bde bar bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi phreng ba
3b7(rgyud): mchog tu bde ba chen por gyur ba'i snying po des bskul ba na/ gar mdzad cing rang rang gi ting nge 'dzin du dmigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po'i
4a1(rgyud): @#/ /thugs ka'i zla ba'i thig le'i dbus su mchog tu gsang ba'i shin tu dgyes pa'i bde bar gcig tu sdug bor gyur pa bsgrubs te/ rang rang gi
4a2(rgyud): sku bud med kyi tshul du bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas mngon par byung bar gyur to/ /de nas la la ni spyan pad+mo 'bar ba rgyas pa ltar bsgyur zhing
4a3(rgyud): bzlog ste smin ris g.yo bas/ sangs rgyas tshul gyis gar mdzad cing / /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor ma dkyil du/ /rdo rje rab dgyes gdon mi za/ /sems dpa' che
4a4(rgyud): la dgyes mdzad cing / /sangs rgyas bde ba'i bde ba yis/ /bcom ldan sangs rgyas bzhugs par 'gyur/ /smin ma bsgyur zhing zhabs bsgyur ba/ /spyan bsgyur
4a5(rgyud): shin tu gnon pa yin/ /sor mo'i mtha' ma rnam bsgyur ba/ /rdo rje'i tshul gyis gar mdzad de/ /rdo rje che la mnyes mdzad cing / /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dkyil du/ /
4a6(rgyud): skad cig skad cig bskul ba yis/ /bcom ldan rdo rje gnas par gyur/ /brjid pa'i zhabs dang rin chen dbu/ /dri med spyi bos gar mdzad cing / /zhal gyi dkyil
4a7(rgyud): 'khor rnam bsgyur bas/ /bde byed chen po myong bar mdzad/ /dur khrod yon tan tshogs dag gis/ /pad+mo'i spyan gyis gzigs mdzad cing / /bde ba bdag po chen po la/ /
4b1(rgyud): rin chen tshul gyis mdzes par mdzad/ /shin tu dgyes gsal bde dam pa/ /pad+mo dmar la phye mdzad de/ /'dod chags bul dgyes rnam bsgyur bar/ /pad+mo dra bas gar
4b2(rgyud): mdzad cing / /pad+mo rnal 'byor ma dkyil du/ /brjid pa'i spyan gyis kun gzigs te/ /bde ba che la mnyes mdzad cing / /bcom ldan pad+mor gnas par gur/ /phyag gi rtse
4b3(rgyud): mor sor mo'i mthar/ /rnam par bsgyur bas gar mdzad cing / /phyag sbyar khong stong pad+mo yis/ /glog bzhin dpal dang spyi gtsug tu/ /mchod pa'i sprin gyis long long pos//
4b4(rgyud): sna tshogs bde byed gtso nyid la/ /las kyi tshul gyis mnyes mdzad cing / /sna tshogs bcom ldan gnas par gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems
4b5(rgyud): d pa' kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas yang de bzhin gshegs
4b6(rgyud): pa dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che gsang ba dang / pad+mo dang / las kyi gsang ba chen po thams cad kyi bzhed pa/ bde ba chen po zhes bya ba/ 'od zer chen po sprin gyi tshogs nyid kyi
4b7(rgyud): sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje mchog las phyung ngo / /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sku 'di dag thams cad la snang bas snang bar byas te/ nyid kyi thugs kyi zla ba'i thig le
5a1(rgyud): @#/ /la stug po gcig tu gyur nas bzhugs te/ thugs kyis zla ba'i thig le'i dbus su 'od zer des dgyes par bskyed cing drangs nas bcug ste/ gcig
5a2(rgyud): tu byas nas nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dgyes pa chen po gdon mi za bar rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs
5a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje
5a4(rgyud): la gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni tshul gyis su/ /chog sbyor bas spro byas te/ /thig dang mthun par dkyil 'khor don/ /sbyor ba'i gar gyis gar bya zhing / /ji ltar
5a5(rgyud): yang dag brtag par byas/ /ji ltar dkyil 'khor de kho na/ /zla gsang thig le'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpa' bos kyang / /brtag par nus pa ma
5a6(rgyud): yin no/ /dkyil 'khor ye shes kyis brtags pa/ /snying po phyag rgya sngags rig gis/ /lha yi sbyor bas rgyas btab pas/ /cho ga shes pas bri bar bya/ /gru bzhi pa la
5a7(rgyud): sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /thig bzhi yongs su bris pa te/ /ka ba brgyad mchog yang dag gnas/ /kun tu yongs su zlum pa ste/ /zla ba de yi
5b1(rgyud): dbus bsam pa/ /bde ba chen po mi phyed pa/ /gtso bo de ste bri bar bya/ /de nas tsheg drag bcas pa ste/ /yi ge bcu gsum ldan pa yi/ /yi ge mchog tu bde ba ste/ /rlung gi dkyil
5b2(rgyud): 'khor yang dag 'byung / /shes rab can gyis de mdun du/ /mi phyed yid phyung bri bya ste/ /drag po'i tsheg dang 'dren par bcas/ /bzhi yis gtsug tu byas pa'o/ /de yi lho yi
5b3(rgyud): phyogs su ni/ /mi smra ba yi yi ge'i mchog /phyag rgya'i ye shes mchog thams cad/ /sgrub par byed pa'i yi ge bri/ /ha dang rang ldan tsheg drag bcas/ /bzhi pa yis ni dbur
5b4(rgyud): byas pa/ /sngags kyi gzugs kyi yi ge ni/ /nub kyi phyogs su bri bar bya'o/ /khro bo'i yi ge ye shes che/ /yi ge'i phyag rgya rmad byung ba/ /brjid du bcas pa dgod pa yi/ /byang gi
5b5(rgyud): phyogs su bri bar bya/ /sems can thams cad mchog dag dang / /dgyes pa chen po rab 'grub phyir/ /nga yi de nyid gsung gis ni/ /dkyil 'khor de nyid bstan pa yin/ /sangs
5b6(rgyud): rgyas byang chub bde chen po/ /gar gyi tshud pas rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sems can mchog gis ston byed na/ /de nyid sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
5b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la gar mdzad cing / rab tu spros
6a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa spyan gdangs nas/ /zhabs dang zhabs kyi gnon pa yis/ /sdud cing 'dor ba 'dzugs par mdzad/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis//
6a2(rgyud): rjed pa'i rtse mo mtha' nas dgrol/ /cung zad zur gyis gdangs pa'i spyan/ /mdzes pa'i spyan tshugs rnams bsgyur ba'i/ /spyan gyi phyag rgyas gar mdzad pas/ /'gro la
6a3(rgyud): rgyas btab 'dud par 'gyur/ /sems dpa' chen po dpa' bo la/ /dbyangs 'di yis ni bskul mdzad cing / /shin tu dgyes che dkyil 'khor du/ /rnal 'byor ma kun
6a4(rgyud): gnas par 'gyur/ /shin tu dgyes che rdo rje dag /sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen po/ /dkyil 'khor mchog tu dgyes pa yi/ /de nyid bcom ldan nyid kyis shod/ /rnam pa
6a5(rgyud): kun tu skye ba med pa'i bde bas rol cing chub mdzad pa'i/ /bdag cag gzugs kyi dam dang bcas te rnam spyod 'gyur ba med pa'i yid/ /bde mchog byang chub sems
6a6(rgyud): ni rnam pa kun tu sdug bsngal yongs bral te/ /che ba'i ye shes lhun grub mchog ldan bde spyod bde la rol par mdzod/ /a la la la ho/ 'di ni glu ru blangs pa yis//
6a7(rgyud): shin tu srid pas mya ngan 'das/ /dga' chen de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlob/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bde ba chen po
6b1(rgyud): zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas pas rgyas pa'i spyan ut+pa la kha phye ba bzhin smin ma dang / sku rnam par 'gyur ba/ glog dang / chu rlabs bzhin du 'gyur ba'i rnam par gnon pas nyid kyi sku
6b2(rgyud): dang | gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las de kho na nyid 'di gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba/ /rdo rje ye shes thugs la gnas/ /dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i mchog nyid ni//
6b3(rgyud): bdag nyid sbyor bas brtags pa yin/ /rdo rje dgyes pa chen po yi/ /dkyil 'khor zla ba gang ba 'dra/ /'od zer dkar po phreng bas mdzes/ /byang chub sems mchog 'dra ba yin/ /rdo
6b4(rgyud): rje dpa' bo'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /mdzes pa'i zla ba kham pa la/ /mthing ka'i 'bar ba kun rgyas pa/ /me dang rlung gis bus pa bzhin/ /shin tu dgyes pa'i mchog sgrub pa/ /rdo rje
6b5(rgyud): rin chen dkyil 'khor ni/ /dga' byed dkyil 'khor cha brgyad kyi/ /'bar dang bcas pa'i nyi ma bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor dgyes mchog 'byung byed pa/ /pad+mo'i dbang po
6b6(rgyud): pad+ma 'dra/ /'dab ma brgyad po gyes pa yi/ /ge sar zla bas mdzes byas pa'o/ /thams cad las ni grub byed pa/ /rdo rje'i las kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /dga' byed dkyil
6b7(rgyud): 'khor gru gsum ste/ /rab tu 'bar ba me dang 'dra/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas pas/ /dkyil 'khor rnams ni brtag par bya/ /skyong ba rdo rje sems dpa' yis/ /ji ltar
7a1(rgyud): @#/ /de nyid sprul pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang bzhengs nas brjid pa'i rdo rje'i gar dag gis gar mdzad
7a2(rgyud): cing glu dang / sil snyan gyis gling bu dang / pi wang dang / rdza rnga dang / dun+du b+hi dang / pa na wa dang / pa li ka dang / zhi ba'i thal mo la sogs pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kun
7a3(rgyud): tu brdung ba dang / sil snyan la sogs pa'i rnam par rol pas lha'i ro dang / ro'i zas dang / bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba dang / theg pa dang / stan dang /
7a4(rgyud): gos dang / bldag pa dang / bzhib pa dang / 'jams la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje 'dzin la bstabs nas gus
7a5(rgyud): pa dang bcas pas pad+mo'i sor mo khong stong du mdzad de/ g.yon du btud pa'i tshul gyis 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i spyan gdangs te/ yang de kho na nyid bskul bar mdzad
7a6(rgyud): pa'i dbyangs 'dis bstod pa mdzad do/ /shin tu bde ba'i byams pa kun tu gzigs pa'i thugs rje spyan mnga' bas/ /byang chub chen po snying por 'gro ba sgrol bas skyo
7a7(rgyud): yid mi mnga' ste/ /mthun pa'i lam ston nyon mongs drug las bsgral ba'i phyir/ /nam mkha'i tshul du gzungs kyi rang bzhin bde gshegs kun la stobs/ /e ma'o
7b1(rgyud): bde ba kun tu rgyas pas che ba'i ye shes 'dren cing mnabs/ /sa yi khyad par bde bas rdzogs pa'i sku nyid stong pas tshogs pa'i rgyal po bzhin/ /chos nyid ji bzhin de la
7b2(rgyud): reg pas sku nyid che ba kun ston cing / /snying po byang chub bgrod phyir 'gro ba thams cad sgom mo bsam gyis mi khyab bstan/ /dpal gyi snying po gzungs su bstan ta rigs lnga'i
7b3(rgyud): gtso rnams mnyes mdzad cing / /dgyes pas drongs la mnabs shing rab tu dgyes pas rol mo mdzod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde ba mnos te bying ba'i gnas nas bslang
7b4(rgyud): ba'i phyir/ /gnod sbyin cha lugs skye 'gog med pa'i tshul dang rnam par ldan/ /snying rje chen po rgyun dang bcas nas bde ba chen po ston pa'i chos nyid nam mkha' bzhin//
7b5(rgyud): dgyes pa mchog gi ngang la sprul pa'i lha mo skye mched dang / /rol pas 'dus pa'i tshogs la bde mchog stsol bar mdzod/ /ha ha ha hoHbde la gnas shing bde mnobs
7b6(rgyud): hUM| |dgyes pa mchog dang ldan pa'i mi skye bde mchog bde la char pa rab tu dbab tu stsol/ /rnam pa kun tu mtha' dang bral ba'i dbyings la bde gshegs slob ma gzung du
7b7(rgyud): gsol/ /dpal gyi rgyal po tshul bzhin de ltar bzhugs pa'i gnas su mnabs su gsol/ /ngo mtshar byang chub che ba 'di nyid 'gro ba rten bzhin bde thob pa/ /pha rol phyin
8a1(rgyud): @#/ /drug dngos nyid gang la yang ni mi brten par/ /mi skye mya ngan 'das pa'i gzungs dang rtag tu rnam par ldan/ /mtha' dang bral ba'i bde bas chos
8a2(rgyud): kyi dbyings la gnas pa yi/ /rmongs pa'i bde bas bying zhing gnas pa'i 'gro la snying rje'i chus khrus mdzod/ /hoHde nas shin tu dgyes mchog mi chags pa/ /'di ni
8a3(rgyud): glu ru blangs pa yis/ /yid dang 'thab pa'i bde chen po/ /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems
8a4(rgyud): d pa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la gsol ba'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa nye bar gnas nas yang chu skyes kyi 'dab ma dri ma med pa dang 'dra ba'i spyan gyis
8a5(rgyud): kun tu gzigs shing 'dzum pa dang bcas pas zhal rgyas par gyur nas/ yang tshad med pa mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
8a6(rgyud): khams mang po bskal pa rgyas pa'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho ma lus lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / nor bu rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs
8a7(rgyud): thams cad las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin dang / rin chen 'dzin dang / chos 'dzin dang / sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po thams cad dang /
8b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gi tshogs chen po dang / thugs las byung ba dang / mtshon dang / dga' ba dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug chen po'i g.yog gi
8b2(rgyud): tshogs tshad med par 'dren par byed pa dang / 'gugs par byed pa dang / 'jib par byed pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo'i tshogs
8b3(rgyud): dang | grangs med pa'i rdo rje 'phrogs par byed pa'i tshogs dang / gzhan yang / phyi rol gyi rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs las byung ba'i rnal 'byor dang /
8b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams la rnam par bde ba chen po gyur pa dang bcas pa'i kun tu gzigs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad pa
8b5(rgyud): dang | rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa'i rnam par gnon pas kun tu gnon pas rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pas 'degs shing tshems kyis 'debs pa dang / rnam par
8b6(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang bcas pa'i kun tu 'brel ba'i phyag gis gar mdzad pa dang / rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa'i sgeg pas 'gying ba dang / spyod pa dang / mi spyod par bcas pa'i
8b7(rgyud): rnam pa dang / kun tu 'dor ba'i rnam par gnon pas 'khor gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la byin gyis brlabs nas dgyes pa chen po rdo rje gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba
9a1(rgyud): @#/ /dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /bdag nyid de nyid mnyam gzhag dang / /de bzhin lha yi de
9a2(rgyud): nyid dang / /sngags dang phyag rgya de nyid dang / /de yis dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'gyur/ /yan lag thams cad sgom las 'das/ /rtog dang mi rtog rnam spangs pa/ /'dren
9a3(rgyud): dang chig las yang dag 'das/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog ces bya/ /chos dang chos min rnams spyod pa/ /chos rnams thams cad brtag par bya/ /rnam dag nam
9a4(rgyud): mkha' 'dra ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni bstan pa yin/ /'dod chags mi chags 'dod chags mnyam/ /chu yi pad+ma dmar ba 'dra/ /rang sems 'dod chags shin
9a5(rgyud): tu chags/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no/ /gzugs dang gzugs min dri med pa'i/ /gang khams kun la 'jug 'gyur ba/ /sems ni chu dang skul byed pa//
9a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po g.yog dang bcas pa dang / pho nya dang / pho nya mo dang / nam
9a7(rgyud): mkha' la 'gro ba chen po dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'dzin gtso
9b1(rgyud): bo chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye ma'o rab dgyes sems dpa' mchog /kye ma'o rab dgyes phyogs bsgyur ba/ /rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs mchog gi /dkyil
9b2(rgyud): 'khor gsang ba nyid kyis gsungs/ /sangs rgyas sbyor ba sbyor che ba/ /rdo rje sbyor ba bla na med/ /'jigs gsum bde mchog thob 'gyur ba'i/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid kyis
9b3(rgyud): gsungs/ /rin chen pad+mo sna tshogs che/ /sna tshogs sbyor ba'i gar mdzad pa/ /rnam grangs thig le'i 'jig rten du/ /rnam dag dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsungs/ /de nas bcom
9b4(rgyud): ldan 'das rnal 'byor ma thams cad gar dang bcas pa'i phyag pad+mo'i sor mo'i 'da' ma kun tu 'brel ba'i rdo rje'i thal mo dang / gar rnam par 'gyur ba'i brjid bag tu bcas
9b5(rgyud): pas mtha' 'grol zhing ma mchu tshems kyis mnan nas chu skyes sar pa'i 'dab ma bzhin gzigs pas bshad pa/ glu'i phyag rgyas dbyangs len pa dang / gcig la gcig
9b6(rgyud): bskul ba dang / bdag nyid kyi dpung pa la 'degs shing g.yas dang / g.yon pa'i rnam par gnon pa'i tshul gyis/ oM hUM a la la la ho/ kun tu snang zhing mi chags par/ /mi
9b7(rgyud): chags pa yi bde mchog gis/ /bde ba'i rnal 'byor gzugs kyi rnams/ /stobs shing bde ba sbyin mdzad pas/ /a la la la ho/ bsam gyis mi khyab nam mkha'i rang bzhin
10a1(rgyud): @#/ /te| |bzhengs shing gzhan la stobs la grub par mdzod/ /chags pas mi gos dngos po yi/ /bde ba kun la reg par mdzad cing dgongs su
10a2(rgyud): gsol/ /de nas kun tu bzang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje'i bdag bo de kho na nyid kyi dbyangs chen pos bskul bas thugs sad par gyur te/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po
10a3(rgyud): kun tu longs spyod pa rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje'i gdon mi za ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi dkyil
10a4(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i gar sna tshogs shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rnam par gnon par gar mdzad/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje'i dbyangs kyis glu len/ rdo rje rnam par rol pa
10a5(rgyud): chen pos rnam par rol/ /shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje bzhad pa chen pos bzhad cing nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i zla ba'i thig le'i dkyil nas/ oM mahA
10a6(rgyud): su kha hUM zhes brjod nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag mo ye shes dbyings phyug 'byung ngo / /steng du zla gam ldan pa yi/ /gnyis pa yi ge ma lta bu//
10a7(rgyud): mtshan du thig le ldan byas pa/ /ye shes gsang bar rnal 'byor ma'o/ /A li kA li 'dren bya ba/ /dbus su ri mo brtag byas te/ /de yi mgo dang mjug dag tu/ /khro bo
10b1(rgyud): gnyis po mchog bsam bya/ /'di ni btsun mo'i rab gsal ba/ /dkyil 'khor rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'o/ /'di ni dran pa tsam gyis kyang / /bsod nams kun gyis byin rlob 'gyur/ /
10b2(rgyud): A li gnyis dbus ri mor bri/ /ldan pa 'dren pa yang dag ldan/ /de steng zla gam thig le dag /mgo mjug gnyis su gzhan yang traM/ /'di ni don dam gsal ba ste/ /rin chen
10b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma dbang sbyin/ /dran pas bsod nams 'thob 'gyur te/ /sdig pa rnams kyang 'jig par byed/ /A li gnyis dang ldan byas te/ /tsheg drag yi ge gnyis su bshad//
10b4(rgyud): 'di ni rab dga' kun tu chags/ /chu srin ma zhes bstan pa yin/ /dang po bskal pa chen po yi/ /tsheg drag po dang bcas pa gzhan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi A li 'di/ /sangs
10b5(rgyud): rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed/ /bdag nyid la 'am yang na gzhan/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste/ /bsgrub bya'i dkyil 'khor grub byed na/ /dngos grub myur du thob par
10b6(rgyud): 'gyur/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor rnams kyi mchog /yi ge'i phyag rgya'i mngon gnas pa'i/ /'dzin pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba/ /bris pa yis kyang khyad par 'gyur/ /e ma'o bde
10b7(rgyud): ba ye shes che/ /de yi ye shes tshe 'di la/ /'dod byed bde ba bsten byed cing / /'di yi tshul gyis thob par 'gyur/ /khams gsum mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /'di
11a1(rgyud): @#/ /las rgya che mchog gzhan med/ /sgrub pa po yi sems can kun/ /tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'grub/ /zla gsang thig le gsang ba'i rgyal po chen po
11a2(rgyud): shin tu dgyes pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po rgyas pa mchog tu gsang ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyi gsang
11a3(rgyud): ba chen po rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor te dang po rdzogs so/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das de
11a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dgyes pa'i yid bde ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid dga' ba bskyed nas/ gar dang / shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje bzhad
11a5(rgyud): pa mdzad cing yang shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba 'du ba mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs par gyur to/ /bde
11a6(rgyud): byed chen po bshad pa shod/ /bde ba chen po bshad pa shod/ /gsang ba chen po bshad pa shod/ /dgyes pa chen po bshad pa shod/ /khyod las 'dod chags yang dag 'byung / /
11a7(rgyud): khyod las zhe sdang chen po ste/ /khyod las bde byed sdug bsngal dang / /khyod las khams gsum thams cad 'byung / /khyod las skyes pa ma ning dang / /khyod las 'dod
11b1(rgyud): dbang bud med dang / /khyod las 'dod las rnam grol dang / /khyod las byang chub bla med 'byung / /khyod las nam mkha' rlung dag dang / /khyod las gzi brdzin me yi khams/ /khyod
11b2(rgyud): las de bzhin chu dang sa/ /khyod las spyod dang mi spyod kun/ /khyod las sangs rgyas dpa' chen po/ /yang nas yang du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /khyod las chos dang dge 'dun dang / /khyod
11b3(rgyud): las pha rol phyin pa'i tshogs/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpa' chen dang / /ri dang skye bo thams cad 'byung / /khyod las rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /khyod las dri med pad+mo dang / /khyod
11b4(rgyud): las rin chen tshad med che/ /da bzhin rdo rje sna tshogs 'byung / /khyod las phyag rgya sngags kyi rnams/ /khyod las rig pa'i snying po 'byung / /de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan mi
11b5(rgyud): 'dzums pas smin ma brkyang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa chen po dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs
11b6(rgyud): dang | rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang / 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / gzhan yang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
11b7(rgyud): dang | dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / /nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa kun 'dus pa thams cad la skad cig skad cig tu kun
12a1(rgyud): @#/ /tu gzigs nas brjod pa dang bcas pa'i phyag 'jam pos nyid kyi snying ga'i rdo rje gsor zhing / nyid kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rdo rje rjes su chags pa rab tu rgyas
12a2(rgyud): pa chen po'i lta bas 'khor thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ nyid kyi thugs pad+ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yi ge'i thig le'i dkyil nas 'od zer phyung ste kun tu snang bar byin
12a3(rgyud): gyis brlabs nas/ shin tu dgyes pa gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /dang
12a4(rgyud): po'i yi ge bcu gsum pa/ /thig ler bcas pa bsam byas te/ /bde chen tshul bzhin bzhag byas la/ /gzhan gyis mi phyed thig ler bcas/ /yi ge drug pa 'dren pa
12a5(rgyud): ru| |tshul bzhin 'og tu yongs su brtag / 'di ni gsang ba chen po ste/ /rmad byung yi ge'i phyag bya'o/ /bde chen bde bar bskyed pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bsgrags
12a6(rgyud): pa yin/ /ye shes kyi ni phyag rgya 'dis/ /skad cig snying pos rgyas btab na/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi 'chad pa bo/ /ston pa rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur/ /bde ba chen po skul
12a7(rgyud): byed pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtogs par byed/ /yi ge ye shes grub pa yis/ /ye shes dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur/ /'phrul gyi mig dang shes rab che/ /mi shes
12b1(rgyud): sdig pa 'joms par byed/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'dra bar/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur/ /bde ba chen po reg pa che/ /sdug bsngal 'dod pa 'joms byed pa'o/ /shes
12b2(rgyud): rab ye shes dngos grub che/ /byang chub myur du 'thob 'gyur te/ /rig ma 'bum phrag brgyas bskor cing / /sems dpa' chen po de dang rtse/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas/ /thal
12b3(rgyud): mo brkyang ste rol ba yis/ /tshe dang lang tsho skal dang ldan/ /dran pa tsam gyis 'thob par 'gyur/ /'dod pa yis ni dgos pa'i rnams/ /myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/ /'og
12b4(rgyud): dang steng gi nam mkha' la/ /bdag 'dod bzhin du 'gro 'ong byed/ /sa yang rnam par phug nas su/ /stobs chen de 'dir 'ong bar byed/ /sangs rgyas kun la gnod byed
12b5(rgyud): de| |byang chub par ni gdon mi bya/ /bde ba chen po'i rnam mdzad pas/ /gzhom zhing de bzhin myang ba yi/ /rdo rje blo yis bdud kyi rnams/ /rnam par 'gyur bas thams cad
12b6(rgyud): bsgral/ /bde ba chen po gtong pa yis/ /skad cig nyid du gsol bar bya/ /grub pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa che/ /dpa' bo chen pos dgug bar bya/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams ci 'dod
12b7(rgyud): par| |rnam gnon tshul gyis gnon par bya/ /dbang po nye dbang dbang chen po/ /gnod byed stobs kyis dgon gnas par/ /rab tu rnams 'joms gnon pa yis/ /gzhom pa'i
13a1(rgyud): @#/ /tshul gyis bsgral bar bya/ /mtshon cha lnga yis rnam gnon pas/ /gzhan gyi bud med brtson par bya/ /kye ma'o bde ba bder gnas pa'i/ /sems
13a2(rgyud): can chen pos grol byas te/ /byang chub sems ni bde 'byung bas/ /sems dpa' bdag nyid mchod par bya/ /dam tshig rjes su ldan pa yis/ /rnal 'byor rtag pa'i ngo
13a3(rgyud): por 'gyur/ /skad cig mtho ris 'gro bar byed/ /rdo rje'i shugs kyis thams cad du/ /sems can skad cig 'di ru'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas su 'gyur/ /sems can
13a4(rgyud): rnams dang grags chen po/ /thams cad kyi ni rigs rnams dang / /pha rol phyin rnams skye gnas te/ /de bzhin rigs dang pha rol phyin/ /de dag 'di la rab tu gnas/ /dbang
13a5(rgyud): por gyur pa brtan chen po/ /yon tan tshogs ni nam mkha' bzhin/ /de nyid dngos po thams cad la/ /thams cad dus gsum mnyam gnas te/ /rdo rje sems dpa'
13a6(rgyud): mchog tu bde/ /sems dpa' thog ma tha med yin/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i shin tu bde ba chen po'i rdo rje chos kyi yi ge zhes bya ba yi ge chen po'i
13a7(rgyud): phyag rgya'i ye shes so/ /bcu gsum gyi ni yi ge che/ /ye shes thig le ldan pa ste/ /rdo rje yid 'byung lhags pa yi/ /ha lar btags dbu bskor bya/ /'di ni yid las
13b1(rgyud): skyes ba ste/ /shin tu dgyes che mdzes pa yis/ /yi ge'i phyag rgya phyag rgya che/ /gtso bo'i spyan sngar gnas pa yi/ /gsang ba'i snying gi pad+mo la/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas/ /
13b2(rgyud): de ni de ma thag nyid du/ /shin tu dgyes pa'i mnyes par 'gyur/ /gtso chen rdo rje sems dpa' la/ /de yi bde bas mnyes byas te/ /dbang po yi ni sbyor ba yis/ /de dang rol pas
13b3(rgyud): myur du 'grub/ /de gnyis phan tshun dgyes pa las/ /shin tu dgyes pa'i gzhir gyur te/ /rig 'dzin mchog gi gzugs ldan dang / /lha mi kun gyis mchod par 'gyur/ /de dang lhan
13b4(rgyud): cig rol pa na/ /lha chen tshangs pa gtogs 'dod rnams/ /phyag rgya sbyor ba'i tshul gnas pa'i/ /bdag nyid che la phyag byed pa'o/ /nyes gsum dri ma spangs pa yi/ /shin tu sbyor ba'i
13b5(rgyud): rgyas btab pa/ /sems can gar ni byed pa dang / /sems dpa' che la mnyes par byed/ /de ni sa dang nam mkha' la/ /bde bar gnas shing 'gro bar byed/ /sna tshogs lha mo bde
13b6(rgyud): che ba'i/ /sna tshogs bde bas nyer spyod do/ /phyag rgya'i gar gyis gar mdzad cing / /sems can myur du rtogs par byed/ /ral gri gyur pa gzi chen po/ /nam mkha' kun tu phan tshun
13b7(rgyud): 'gro| |lha mo 'phrul gyi 'gro ba dang / /lha min klu yi bu mo dang / /gzhan yang 'phrul ldan mi bu mo/ /de yis bud med kun bsgrub bya/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes rab gnas pas/ /de nyid kun tu
14a1(rgyud): @#/ /'gro byed de/ /ji tsam 'dod par dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje sems dpa' che gnas so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad myur du 'grub/ /thams cad chos ni bde chen
14a2(rgyud): bo| |dge 'dun chags med thams cad rnams/ /de dag thams cad de yin no/ /dbang po nye dbang dbang chen gyi/ /thogs med stobs kyis bkug nas su/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i thabs
14a3(rgyud): gnas pas/ /gzhan gyi bud med brtsen par bya/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa/ /phyag rgya ye shes bsgrub bya ste/ /skad cig skad cig bsten pa yi/ /bdag gi sbyor bas 'grub par
14a4(rgyud): 'gyur/ /gnyis med sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /de ni dngos grub kun 'gyur te/ /bdag med nga rgyal med 'gyur te/ /snang ba med cing yi ge med/ /shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i yid dang
14a5(rgyud): rjes su mthun par mdzad ma'i yi ge'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so/ / //lha mo rdo rje kI li ni/ /dang por oM gyis rnam brgyan pa/ /bgegs mthar byed dang ldan pa ni/ /
14a6(rgyud): dbang mchog sbyin par mdzad ma ste/ /de yis bud med snying ga ru/ /bdag nyid kyis ni byin brlabs te/ /dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis/ /mkhas pas tshul bzhin bsgom par bya/ /
14a7(rgyud): de nas rnal 'byor chen po de/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug byin brlabs pas/ /nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag tu/ /mdzes pa'i spyan dang rol cing 'gro /bdag gam 'on te
14b1(rgyud): gzhan dag la/ /phyag rgya de yis rgyas btab te/ /rdo rje pad+mo phye ba yis/ /sgrub pa pos ni myur du sgrub/ /pad+mo rnam par phye byas te/ /phyag rgya sbyor bas rol ba yi/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas
14b2(rgyud): btab na/ /'gro dang 'ong ba gdon mi za/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i tshul gyis su/ /lag pa'i phyag rgya bzung byas te/ /sbyor ba chen po bsgom byas na/ /de ma thag tu nam mkhar 'gro/ /
14b3(rgyud): bdag nyid gan rkyal gnas byas te/ /nyid kyi steng du phyag rgya bzhag/ nyid kyis byin brlabs phyag rgya la/ /sngags pas tshul bzhin bskyod par bya/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi glo dag
14b4(rgyud): tu| |dgyes dang mdza' ba gnyis bzhugs par/ /mi g.yeng phyag rgya bzhag byas te/ /bdag nyid shin tu dgyes par bsgom/ /'di yis dngos grub 'thob 'gyur te/ /'di dag lhan cig
14b5(rgyud): 'grogs pa yis/ /gzungs ma kun gyi dkyil 'khor du/ /sangs rgyas la sogs thams cad 'gyur/ /'di dang lhan cig sbyor ba yis/ /nam mkha' bdag pos sangs rgyas bzhin/ /
14b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pas/ /de ni sangs rgyas ngo bor 'gyur/ /dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas/ /nub gcig bdud rtsi dbyung byas te/ /gzungs ma'i phyag rgya la
14b7(rgyud): brten nas/ /rmad 'byung nyid ni 'thob ces bshad/ /mtshan gyi mtha' dang nyin gyi mtha'/ /dang por gnyi ga 'dus byas na/ /sngags kyi dbyings phyug gar 'gro ba/ /de dang lhan
15a1(rgyud): @#/ /cig dngos grub 'gro /phyed dam yang na nam phyed na/ /rig ma'i dbyings su reg bya zhing / /myur bas khros pa'i sgra sgrogs pas/ /gyad kyi 'gyed pas brtsam
15a2(rgyud): par bya/ /bgye ba'i mjug du de ma thag /'o ma mchog ni btung byas na/ /de nas de ni rdo rje 'grub/ /zla gsang dkyil 'khor du 'gro bar byed/ /bya ba de bzhin bzlog pa dang / /ci bde brtan pa
15a3(rgyud): byas pa las/ /byang chub sems ni 'char ma thag /'phrog ma yi ni dngos grub bo/ /'di yis rin chen gtsug nyid du/ /ma g.yeng mtshan mo byas 'gyur na/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub
15a4(rgyud): 'phrog byed de/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub nyid kyis 'thob/ /'di yis snying ga'i zla gsang la/ /thig le nyid du brtag byas na/ /de ni de ma thag tu yang / /zla gsang thig le'i mchog 'drar
15a5(rgyud): 'gyur/ /'di yis reg pa tsam gyis kyang / /dngos grub gang dga' thob byed de/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya gzi chen po/ /rgyal po 'di ni rnam par rgyu/ /'di ni sgrub pa'i dus su yang / /rnam
15a6(rgyud): par rtog pa yod mi bya/ /rtag tu mi rtog 'gyur ba yis/ /nan tan gyis ni bsgrub par bya/ /sdug bsngal ba yi sems can la/ /sbyin pa bzhi ni rtag tu sbyin/ /de la bde ba sbyin byas
15a7(rgyud): te| |mi snyan nam yang sbyin mi bya/ /shin tu dgyes pa'i sems ma chen mo dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje kI li kI li shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen po 'thob par byed
15b1(rgyud): pa'o| |thog ma oM ste 'ja' chen mo/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes dang 'brel/ /'di ni 'dod chags thams cad la/ /'dod chags bde byed snyoms par 'thob/ /rol pa'i sbyor bas
15b2(rgyud): bud med la/ /'di ni rtag tu mnyes par bya/ /'di yis 'gro ba gsum dag tu/ /dngos grub myur du 'thob par byed/ /pad+mo kha phye rgyas pa'i spyan/ /sngags mkhan de ni skad
15b3(rgyud): cig 'gyur/ /gtso bo yi ni bde mchog gis/ /A li kA li mnyam sbyor bya/ /spros pa'i phyag rgya rgyas btab ste/ /skad cig skad cig spyad par bya/ /dus dag tu ni reg pa dang / /
15b4(rgyud): gzhug pa yang ni rtag tu bya/ /bskyod dang mnyes pa de bzhin du/ /mnyam du 'grogs pa'i cho ga bya/ /bskyed pa dang ni sbyang ba dang / /skad cig skad cig bsnyen par bya/ /gar dang
15b5(rgyud): kun nas bskor ba dang / /'jib dang de bzhin btung ba dang / /the tshom med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /dam tshig dang ni bsgrub par bya/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa/ /mi g.yo
15b6(rgyud): tsher ni dngos grub ste/ /sangs rgyas byang chub dngos grub dang / /bskal par gnas pa smos ci dgos/ /'di ni dngos grub 'thob ma thag/ pad+ma 'dzin pa'i rjes 'gyur te/ /lag
15b7(rgyud): na pad+ma 'bar khyer bzhin/ /blo ldan mi g.yeng bskal par gnas/ /brjid pas dpal dgyes lhan cig tu/ /bde ldan zhing du 'gro 'gyur te/ /rnal 'byor chen po der phyin
16a1(rgyud): @#/ /nas| |bde ldan gyi mchog gtso bo yi/ /pad+mo'i gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /de ni bde bar gnas par 'gyur/ /bde ldan rtag tu 'grogs 'gyur
16a2(rgyud): ba| |dngos grub ye shes bde myong 'gyur/ /yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dis/ /pad+ma las skyes gzungs bzung ste/ /byin gyis brlabs nas bde myangs na/ /pad+ma bde ba'i bdag por
16a3(rgyud): 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi bud med bdag nyid kyis/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab te/ /bsten byas 'dod pa'i gzugs nyid du/ /sngags mkhan 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /sdug cing
16a4(rgyud): la sogs brgyan pa yi/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer sar byung bzhin/ /dri med yangs pa'i lta ba yis/ /pad+ma sems dpa'i tshe 'grub bo/ /ji ltar nam mkhar nye bar ni/ /dpa' bo chen
16a5(rgyud): po 'phur byed do/ /rig ma 'bum phrag brgya tshogs kyi/ /lha mo yis ni mchod pa byed/ /sangs rgyas sras dang bcas kun gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag nyid mchod/ /
16a6(rgyud): 'khor ba nyid na gnas pa'i tshe/ /'khor ba'i dri mas mi gos so/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na/ /rtag tu nyon mongs dag 'gyur te/ /sman gyi phye ma sbyor ba yis/ /sbrul
16a7(rgyud): ni gsod par gyur pa bzhin/ /zla gsang thig le'i dga' byed 'di/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'thob 'gyur te/ /'di yis mthu yi ngo bos yis/ /dgos pa thams cad dngos grub
16b1(rgyud): po| |gang 'dod dngos grub don yod pa/ /'khor ba 'di dang pha rol gyi/ /mthu chen phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis/ /dran pa tsam gyi de dngos grub/ /shin tu dgyes pa pad+mo phreng ba zhes bya ba'i
16b2(rgyud): yi ge'i phyag rgya ye shes so/ / //dang por oM dang yang dag ldan/ /tha mar bsgyings pa'i hUM nyid de/ /dbus su rab dgyes rdo rje bzhag /yi ge 'di ni rmad byung
16b3(rgyud): ba'o| |phyag rgya 'di yi rgyas btab pas/ /sdig pa skad cig med par 'gyur/ /khams gsum 'di ni dngos grub che/ /dpal gyi bsgyings pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /bdud dang bdud
16b4(rgyud): las rjes 'jug pa/ /mi thogs par ni rgyal byed de/ /sna tshogs rdo rje mnyam sbyor bas/ /de yis khams gsum 'phrog par byed/ /bdag gi mthu yis rnam rgyal te/ /de yi khams
16b5(rgyud): gsum longs spyod do/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste/ /pad+mo rdo rje rab ldan bya/ /phreng byed phreng ba'i tshul gyis su/ /phreng ba bskums te 'dzin pa bzhin/ /'di yis byin gyis
16b6(rgyud): brlabs byas te/ /bsten na myur du dngos grub bo/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi smin bsgyur bas/ /chu skyes can ni sbyar byas te/ /phyag rgyas btab ste rol byas na/ /bla ma'i dngos
16b7(rgyud): grub thob bar byed/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor nye ba yis/ /rdo rje bdag nyid mchod byed de/ /de dag kun gyis bskor byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bskur ro/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpa' bo yis/ /
17a1(rgyud): @#/ /'jigs shing skrag pas byin byed pa/ /rang nyid kyis ni phyag rgya'i gzungs/ /nyid kyi dngos grub stobs par byed/ /gzhan ni yang dag pha rol phyin/ /sangs rgyas rnams
17a2(rgyud): kyi yon tan rgyan/ /de yang de la 'jigs skrag nas/ /rang gi dgyes mchog stobs par byed/ /bdag nyid chen po dmigs gsum dang / /che ba'i pha ni ngo bzhi dang / /rdo rje 'dzin dang gtogs
17a3(rgyud): rnams dang / /rang gi sdug pa stobs par byed/ /gshin rje sha ka rgyal po dang / /rdo rje 'dzin rje dngos grub la/ /'ongs nas bdag gi sdug pa rnams/ /srog gi phyir yang stobs par
17a4(rgyud): byed| |gzhan gyi 'phrul gyi lus kyi rnams/ /khams gsum lam la gnas pa dag /myur du nye bar 'ongs nas kyang / /bdag nyid dngos grub sbyin par byed/ /sna tshogs gnyen ni
17a5(rgyud): rgyal po che/ /dbang phyug dam pa sna tshogs byed/ /de yang nyer 'ongs gtsug gtugs te/ /rnal 'byor sna tshogs ma sbyin byed/ /gnod sbyin srin pa'i gzugs la sogs/ /sha za yi
17a6(rgyud): dwags bu mo rnams/ /sbyor ldan phyag rgya blang byas te/ /brtag pa mchog gis brtag par bya/ /thams cad las byed dge ba yi/ /'di yis dngos grub myur du 'grub/ /lha dang klu yi bu
17a7(rgyud): mo dang / /lha min lha yi mngal skyes pa/ /phyag rgya 'di yis byin brlabs na/ /grub pa myur du dngos grub bo/ /gzugs bzang yang na ngan yang rung / /gang de bud med gzung byas pa/ /
17b1(rgyud): rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis su/ /phyag rgya'i sbyor ba brtag par bya/ /'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /de bzhin dpa' bo kun nyid du/ /skad cig skad cig rgyas btab pas/ /tshe 'di
17b2(rgyud): nyid la 'thob par gyur/ /shin tu dgyes pa chen po sna tshogs dpe med pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// //nga ro bcu gsum steng nyid du/ /de bzhin thig la'i rgyal
17b3(rgyud): po ste| |rab dgyes rdo rje lta che bde/ /mtha' ni yi ge hi sbyor ba'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /bde chen spyan ni dga' byed yin/ /phyag rgya'i yi ge 'di yis ni/ /mkhas
17b4(rgyud): pas byin gyis brlabs byas na/ /des ni de ma thag tu yang / /bla med 'phrul gyis spyan du 'gyur/ /stong nyid ye shes gnas pa yi/ /sangs rgyas shin tu phra ba mthong / /smin ma rnam
17b5(rgyud): bsgyur rgyas pa yis/ /lta ba'i phyag rgyas gar byed cing / /'gugs byed sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /dpa' bo rdo rje kun 'dzin dang / /pha rol phyin pa thams cad dang / /de bzhin
17b6(rgyud): gzungs ma'i tshogs rnams dang / /rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro dang / /phyi dang nang gi tshogs rnams dang / /lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo/ /lha min dngos grub lus kyi mchog /grul
17b7(rgyud): bum mi 'am yi dwags sam/ /sha za 'phrul gyi mi bu mo/ /'di ni snying gar bzhag pa yis/ /rdo rje 'dzin du bdag nyid 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas yang na nyi ma dang / /pad+mo dra ba sna tshogs
18a1(rgyud): @#/ /blo| |lha dang lha min mi dag dang / /gzhan yang gnod sbyin srin po dang / /bdud dang bdud kyi tshogs rnams kyi/ /gzhan gyis 'phrog par yongs mi nus/ /
18a2(rgyud): lha dang lha min gyis mchod cing / /dngos grub khams gsum 'gro bar byed/ /lha dang lha min rten byed cing / /skad cig nyid du 'gro bar byed/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi mkhyen
18a3(rgyud): pa'i yul/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing kun tu/ /rig pa'i rigs ni brgya dag dang / /de ni rtsen cing 'gro bar byed/ /'jigs med yan lag kun spangs pa/ /thog ma tha ma med
18a4(rgyud): 'gyur te/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen sbyor bas/ /dgyes pa'i rmad mchog gcig tu 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i nang na rdo rjer 'gyur/ /rin chen nang na rin chen 'gyur/ /pad+mo'i
18a5(rgyud): nang na pad+mor 'gyur/ /sna tshogs nang na sna tshogs mchog /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /mnyam dang mi mnyam chos kyi dbyings/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes byin brlabs
18a6(rgyud): pas| |dam pa sna tshogs nyid du 'gyur/ /gzugs mi sdug pa gzugs mchog 'gyur/ /mig med pa yang mig ldan 'gyur/ /rna 'on pa yang sgra thos te/ /glen pa yang na
18a7(rgyud): yid rnor 'gyur/ /de la sogs pa dpag med pa/ /mig gi phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur/ /de yi lus la yon tan ni/ /yon tan dam pa mdangs cher 'gyur/ /ji tsam de
18b1(rgyud): ni nam mkha'i mthongs/ /'phur zhing 'og tu 'bab par byed/ /de ni ri yang phug nas 'gro/ /sa dang sa yi 'og tu ni/ /sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul rnams byed pas/ /de ni skad cig 'gro
18b2(rgyud): bar byed/ /sna tshogs mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du/ /sngags mkhan 'gying bar gar byed pa/ /bde ba chen po bskyed pa yis/ /sems can de ni 'jug par byed/ /mi g.yeng lta ba'i
18b3(rgyud): bsgyur ba yis/ /las rnams thams cad de yis byed/ /'degs pa dang ni lta ba yis/ /gar dang rnam pas bskor ba dang / /'gro ba thams cad 'bab byed de/ /ri dang sems can
18b4(rgyud): thams cad la/ /smra ba dang ni sgra 'byin dang / /ci dga' bar ni mngag par byed/ /sdug pa'i lta bas srog chags rnams/ /brdeg pa dang ni bsgral bar byed/ /gtum dang gdug
18b5(rgyud): 'jigs che ba dang / /khro bo'i lta bas bsgral bar byed/ /shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje spyan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad 'grub par byed pa'i yi ge'i phyag
18b6(rgyud): rgya ye shes kyi mthu chen po'o/ / //dang po oM gyis rnam par brgyan/ /tha mar 'brug gi sgra 'byin pa/ /rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa'i sku/ /bde ba skyed byed bshad pa yin/ /phyag
18b7(rgyud): rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje dpa' bo yi/ /gang gis 'di ni bsgoms ma thag /rdo rje gsum gyis byin rlob 'gyur/ /bdag gam yang na gzhan yang rung / /'di yis nyid
19a1(rgyud): @#/ /kyi snying ga ru/ /bsgoms te gnyis med sbyor byas na/ /sangs rgyas sku ni rab tu 'grub/ /bsgrub na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /bud med kun dang rtsen byed de/ /
19a2(rgyud): A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas/ /sems can dman pa'i dngos grub bo/ /shin tu skal ldan thams cad dang / /sangs rgyas skal ldan 'thob 'gyur te/ /skal dang ldan pa thams
19a3(rgyud): cad kyi/ /chu skyes zhabs la bsnyen par byed/ /lha dang lha min bu mo de'i/ /rig mas mthong na dga' byed de/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes brgyan pa yi/ /sna tshogs 'dod pa'i gzugs
19a4(rgyud): su 'gyur/ /spyod dang mi spyod mi dag dang / /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /mi 'am ci dang skyes bu yi/ /dngos grub pas ni 'phrog mi nus/ /de la sogs pas stod byed de/ /
19a5(rgyud): 'jigs par 'gyur ba'i sems kyis ni/ /bla ma bzhin du mchod byed cing / /kun gyis bstod mchod bsti stang byed/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /nam mkha' mtha'
19a6(rgyud): klas lha rnams dang / /nyi ma bcu yi 'od zer bzhin/ /rnal 'byor chen po 'grub pa 'gro /sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing kun tu/ /'od kyis thams cad mnyes byed cing / /sangs
19a7(rgyud): rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /zil gyis mnan te gnas par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid la/ /sras rnams 'dud cing phyag byed de/ /lha dang lha min grul
19b1(rgyud): bum dang / /tshangs pa gtogs 'dod lha chen po/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes byin rlabs der/ /'jigs shing skrag pas 'ong bar byed/ /bcom ldan dngos grub bka' stsal stsol/ /ji ltar
19b2(rgyud): thugs la dgongs pa bzhin/ /spyi bos bka' blang gdul dka' rnams/ /de dag thams cad bsgrub par bgyi/ /mdor bsdus rnam pa bzhi po yi/ /dam pa rnams kyang bskyang bar bgyi/ /zla
19b3(rgyud): gsang thig le'i mchog nyid kyi/ /dbang bskur ba yang blang bgyi ste/ /rigs lnga rnams kyi sdom pa nyid/ /rnam pa bzhi po thams cad blang / /chu skyes dngos grub khyod zhabs drung / /'tsho ba'i
19b4(rgyud): bar du bdag cag 'bangs/ /khyod kyi spyan sngar zham 'bring du/ /ci bgyi zhes ni bka' nod do/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na/ /spyod bcas mi spyod dga' byed de/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas
19b5(rgyud): rnams kyi mchog / shin tu bde dang mdza' ba myong / /rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa'i sku chen mo bde ba bde med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin to// //dang
19b6(rgyud): por oM steng thig le ste/ /gzhan gyis mi phyed khros bcas pas/ /gnyis kyi dbus su bzhag pa ni/ /gsung gi rdo rje shin tu dgyes/ /bde gsang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /mchog tu
19b7(rgyud): ro ni myong byed pa/ /dam chos sgra yis gang byas pa'i/ /gsung gsal rna ba dga' bar byed/ /yi ge'i phyag rgya chen po 'di/ /byang chub chen por grub byed de/ /yon tan yon tan sdug mtho
20a1(rgyud): @#/ /ba'i| |tshad med yon tan 'dzin pa'o/ /dpal ldan phyag rgya 'dis btab na/ /dpal kun bdag po de ma thag /bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin spangs pa/ /sangs
20a2(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'thob/ /phyag rgya 'di yis bdag gam gzhan/ /rgyas btab 'dod pa spyad byas nas/ /dngos grub rmad du byung ba yi/ /de yis myur du 'thob par 'gyur/ /sangs
20a3(rgyud): rgyas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /sgrub pa po yi bka' nyan te/ /ci ste rmongs pas 'da' byed na/ /de yi srog ni tha ma yin/ /de yis bsrung ba byas na dpal/ /tshe dang lang tsho bde ba'i mchog
20a4(rgyud): rdo rje gsung gis bstan pa bzhin/ /gdon mi za bar 'thob par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya ye shes rjes bsdus pas/ /sgrub pa mi byed cung zad med/ /bdag nyid thams cad sprul pa
20a5(rgyud): ni| |mchog gi ye shes dngos grub 'gyur/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes byin brlabs la/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mi ldog dang / /chos dbyings mi mnyam rab klas pa/ /dngos grub
20a6(rgyud): bdag nyid gshegs nas kyang / /shin tu 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /sems dpa' chen po de khrid do/ /rang gi ting 'dzin ldang ba'i tshe/ /dam tshig mchog tu bsrung bya ba/ /
20a7(rgyud): ji snyed nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du/ /'dod pa thams cad de spyod do/ /rnal 'byor chen po mi 'da' zhing / /ngan song gsum yang mi 'gro byed/ /de ni cung zad 'og sdug
20b1(rgyud): bsngal/ /'gro ba thams cad myong mi 'gyur/ /rdo rje gsum de rmad byung bas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags byed de/ /bag chags mtshams sbyor rnam grol bas/ /nam mkha'i rim
20b2(rgyud): pas 'gro 'ong byed/ /lha yis rtag tu mchod byed de/ /mchod par byas pas shin tu mchod/ /sems dpa' chen po 'gro 'dug kyang / /bde byed kun gyis bdag nyid dge /gnas dang
20b3(rgyud): zas dang btung la sogs/ /nam mkha' las ni skad cig rnyed/ /bud med rin chen mchog mkha' las/ /bsam pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /las kyi dbyings ma ma lus pa
20b4(rgyud): de yis khams gsum thob par byed/ /rnal 'byor sbyor ba dngos grub kyi/ /rnal 'byor grub chen 'phrog par 'gyur/ /'di las brtul zhugs drag pa med/ /dka' thub 'di dang 'dra
20b5(rgyud): med do/ /bud med mchog tu bde ba las/ /'dod pa'i legs spyod spyad pas 'grub/ /dge ba'i pad+mo'i rigs kun tu/ /sems dpa' chen po ngag dbang 'gyur/ /gzugs ma kun
20b6(rgyud): gyi bde chen po/ /rgyal po chen por de 'gyur ro/ /gsung thams cad kyi rdo rje dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen po 'thob par byed pa khams
20b7(rgyud): gsum kun tu snang bar grags pa pad+mo'i rigs kyi tshogs zhal gyi gsung gis dgongs pa thams cad 'grub par byed pa'o/ / //oM bcas mi phyed tha mar te/ /
21a1(rgyud): @#/ /rab tu sems ni bde ba ste/ /rdo rje rab dgyes bde byed che/ /dbus su ming ni sbyar bar bya/ /phyag rgya 'di yis dngos grub che/ /byang chub sems ni rang
21a2(rgyud): bsgrubs pa/ /'di yis byin gyis brlabs ma thag /bdud rtsi'i mchog ni chud par 'gyur/ /thams cad 'dod pa ldan byas na/ /de ste thams cad sems kyang rung / /bde ba
21a3(rgyud): chen pos sems thams cad/ /sngags mkhan reg pa'i rgyas btab na/ /'di yis rdo rje 'dzin nyid dang / /rdo rje dpa' bo nyid du yang / /lha mo'i phyag rgyas byin brlabs pa/ /skad
21a4(rgyud): cig tu ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /lha mo rnams dang gar byed cing / /de ni rab dgyes bdag po khrid/ /pho brang dga' byed rab dgyes che/ /rab tu chen po bde 'thob tu/ /seng ge'i
21a5(rgyud): gdan rab 'jog byed do/ /bzhi dang bzhi yi mchog nyid kyi/ /rdo rje pad+mo sbyor ba yis/ /de ni khrod nas dbang bskur ro/ /de nas rdzogs sangs tshe dpag med/ /byang chub sems
21a6(rgyud): dpa' brtson 'grus che/ /yod dang med pa'i 'dod spangs pa/ /de la phyag ni byed par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems mchog 'jog byed de/ /rang gi spyad pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /pha rol phyin
21a7(rgyud): pa thams cad dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyis mdun du bskor/ /sa gsum thams cad kun tu ni/ /sems dpa' chen pos ston byed pa/ /res 'ga' shin tu dga' spyod pa/ /res
21b1(rgyud): 'ga' khab nas 'byung ba dang / /res 'ga' byang chub res 'ga' lhums/ /res 'ga' skye dang res 'ga' 'pho/ /res 'ga' spyod chen rol pa dang / /res 'ga' bdud las rgyal bar mdzad/ /
21b2(rgyud): res 'ga' byang chub mngon byang chub/ /res 'ga' 'khor lo bskor mdzad de/ /res 'ga' sna tshogs 'jug par mdzad/ /res 'ga' dus su shin tu mdzes/ /res 'ga' bud med skyes pa
21b3(rgyud): dang | |res 'ga' lha dang skye dgu'i bdag / res 'ga' 'dod dbang rgyal po ste/ /res 'ga' 'dod la rgyal kyis phyogs/ /res 'ga' zhi la res 'ga' drag /res 'ga' gdon chen bgegs
21b4(rgyud): mdzad de/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pa/ /ci dgar dngos grub 'dod pa la/ /bdag gis ngo bor ston par byed/ /mi phyed cho ga sbyor ba yis/ /'dren
21b5(rgyud): pa mi phyed nye byas te/ /phan tshun reg pa chen po yis/ /rdo rje can gyis de 'bigs te/ /gzungs ma mang po tshogs kyi rnams/ /bde byed chen po gzhan ci smos/ /spyod bcas mi spyod
21b6(rgyud): bde dam pa/ /'bad pa mi dgos 'thob par 'gyur/ /brjid pas byang chub snying po ru/ /rtag pa ru ni gnas 'gyur te/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa/ /sbyor ba rjes sdud ldan pas so/ /
21b7(rgyud): thams cad cha ni rnam bral ba/ /byang chub sems ni mchog bzhin du/ /yi ge 'dis ni sbyor ba yis/ /bdag nyid chen por de 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen mo tshim pa'i yid
22a1(rgyud): @#/ /la skyes/ /dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ste/ las thams cad grub par byed pa'o// //dang por oM ni sbyor ba ste/ /tha
22a2(rgyud): mar gnyis po rdza rnga'i sgra/ /rab dgyes rdo rje byin rlabs pa'i/ /lha mo dngar byed dbus su bzhag /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rab dgyes thob pa rmongs byed ma/ /rdo
22a3(rgyud): rje ye shes thugs gnas pa/ /dngos grub thams cad sgrub par byed/ /sngags mkhan yi ge phyag rgya 'dis/ /bdag gam gzhan la rgyas btab ste/ /rdo rje 'dam skyes bcug
22a4(rgyud): byas na/ /de nas de myur dngos grub bo/ /thams cad las byed dpal dang ldan/ /tshe dang lang tsho skal ldan pa'i/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra 'thob ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub/ /
22a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams dang dpa' bo yi/ /sangs rgyas kun dang rtsen byed cing / /sde dbang rnams dang lha rnams kyi/ /'phrul gyis bud med 'phrog byed do/ /rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa chen
22a6(rgyud): po dngar byed kun tu myang ba me tog gi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ste/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba las thams cad byed pa chen mo gdon mi za
22a7(rgyud): ba'i gzhan gyis mi phyed ma'o/ / //tshangs pa'i gsung gi nga ror bcas/ /tha mar dril bu'i nga ro gnyis/ /dbus su ming gi phreng ba ste/ /yi ge 'di ni chu 'dzin mchog /
22b1(rgyud): 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /yid kyi dngos grub 'thob byed do/ /'dod pa yi ni thams cad rnams/ /yi ge skad cig 'grub par byed/ /'di yis rgyas btab bud med rnams/ /
22b2(rgyud): bdag dang rang gi slob ma'ang rung / /de nyid sbyor bas bsten byas na/ /rdo rje 'dzin dpal 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams bdag por ni/ /myur du mkha' la 'gro byed de/ /tshangs
22b3(rgyud): pa gtogs 'dod dbang chen dang / /lha rnams kyis ni mchod par 'gyur/ /lha mo'i tshogs dang rtsen byed cing / /lha mo kun gyi bdag por 'gyur/ /'phrog byed la sogs bdag po che//
22b4(rgyud): 'jigs par byed dang rku byed pa/ /sems can kun gyi mchog dam pa/ /sems dpa' chen por de 'gyur ro/ /stug po'i tshogs kyi dbus su ni/ /brjid la sogs pas spyod pas 'gro /
22b5(rgyud): brjid byed pad+mo chen mo la/ /thams cad kun tu brjod pa yis/ /bde byed chen po myong byed de/ /rab tu dgyes pas sgeg pa bzhin/ /rab tu skal ldan mgrin 'khyud pas/ /rnal 'byor
22b6(rgyud): chen por de gnas te/ /'di ni snying la bris pa yis/ /ci 'dod par ni 'dod pa 'thob/ /phyag rgya chu skyes btab byas te/ /de ltar byas na phyag rgya dgyes/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen
22b7(rgyud): mo'i dri ma med pa'i mdog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ste/ /thams cad las byed pa dge ba'o// //dang po nyid du oM bya ste/ /thig le'i rgyal pos nye bar
23a1(rgyud): @#/ /brgyan/ /tsheg drag bcas pa 'dren pa gnyis/ /ldan pa tha mar bzhag byas te/ /rdo rje rab dgyes brgyan byas pa/ /rdo rje ston ka dbus su bsam/ /'di ni sangs rgyas
23a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi/ /ye shes snang ba rab bsgrub pa/ /yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dis/ /nyid kyi snying gar rgyas btab na/ /sangs rgyas ye shes mchog byed pa/ /de yis ston ka ma dngos grub/ /
23a3(rgyud): sde dbang lhar bcas lha rnams dang / /gnod sbyin srin por bcas pa dang / /sbrul dang mi 'am ci gnas pa/ /thams cad 'di yi g.yog tu 'gyur/ /'di ni 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba
23a4(rgyud): yis| |sangs rgyas mchog gi thugs ldan de 'gro ste/ /sna tshogs rab 'byung dpal gyis yang dag khyab/ /chos mchog dam pa byed pa gtong byed cing / /spyod bcas mi spyod 'jig rten
23a5(rgyud): snang byed de/ /sprin dang bral ba'i zla ba'i 'od mchog byed/ /mkha' dbyings rnam par bsgyings pas rab tu dga'/ /A li kA li pad+mo bde mchog la/ /myong zhing mchog byas bskal
23a6(rgyud): par gnas par 'gyur/ /'di yis sdig pa 'phrog byed de/ /'di yis myur du dga' bar 'gyur/ /'dis ni bde ba'i ngo bo de/ /'di yis dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur/ /skye ba'i
23a7(rgyud): sdug bsngal rgyab phyogs pa/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'thong bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa ye shes kyi snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag
23b1(rgyud): rgya chen mo ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes 'grub par byed pa'o// //dang po oM dang yang dag ldan/ /tha mar dgyes pa'i yi ge gnyis/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che/ /dbus su
23b2(rgyud): gsal ba'i yi ge bsam/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sna tshogs chen mo'i mdun du 'gro /sna tshogs chen mo 'di yis ni/ /sna tshogs ye shes dngos grub bo/ /sngags mkhan
23b3(rgyud): nyid kyis byin brlabs pa/ /sna tshogs sna tshogs bdag chen 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i yan lag kun spangs te/ /bsod nams kun gyi yan lag dge /kun tu 'gro ba'i dngos grub ni/ /'di nyid
23b4(rgyud): kyis ni rab tu 'grub/ /sna tshogs sgyu ma'i bde chen gyis/ /sna tshogs chen po'i bskal par gnas/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid brgyan pa yi/ /bud med kun dang rtsen par 'gyur/ /de nas de yi
23b5(rgyud): chos dbyings gnas/ /dbang phyug mchog gi dngos grub bo/ /pad+mo'i mdun du thog ma'i lha/ /byas te rdo rje bsgrub par bya/ /mthe bong srin lag de phyung ste/ /kha yi nang du gzhag par
23b6(rgyud): bya| |chang bzhin myang bar byas na ni/ /mod la 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur/ /A li kA li rab sbyor bas/ /bud med rnams dang rtsen par byed/ /blo ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /'di
23b7(rgyud): ni shin tu dgyes zhes bya/ /bsil ba dga' byed chen mo ste/ /sna tshogs 'di ni 'gro la gnas/ /dang po oM ni gnas pa ste/ /tra ta dang ldan tha mar bya/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes che ho/ /sgeg mo
24a1(rgyud): @#/ /dbus su bskul ba'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sgeg par bya ba sprul pa yin/ /'di dag mnyam par sbyor ba yis/ /sgeg mos ye shes bskyed par
24a2(rgyud): bya| |rdo rje blo ldan brtag po yis/ /bde bar 'dod pa'i pad+mor gzugs/ /'dod pas 'dod pa spyad par bya/ /myur du 'dod pas dngos grub bo/ /de nas rdo rje 'dod dpal te/ /bde byed
24a3(rgyud): thams cad nye bar sgrub/ /sems can kun gyi 'dod skyed pa/ /bde ba chen por de 'gyur ro/ /mthu yis pha rol phyin pa'i mchog /pad+mo'i tshul du sgeg pa yis/ /rdo rje sbyor thabs
24a4(rgyud): la gnas pas/ /rdo rje chen po de dngos grub/ /ci dgar 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis/ /rtag pa'i lam dang yang dag ldan/ /rtag pa'i chos kyis rjes mthun spyod/ /bsgrubs na rtag pa
24a5(rgyud): rtogs par 'gyur/ /'di yis kun tu bzang zhes bya/ /de ni dngos po kun yin te/ /'dod pa med cing nyon mongs med/ /nga rgyal med cing 'dzin med pa/ /sangs rgyas mchog tu rtag pa yi/ /
24a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas chen po de yi dngos/ /dpal ldan thog ma tha ma med/ /chos rnams kun gyi rjes mthun pas/ /'dis ni dngos po thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas bdag por bdag nyid
24a7(rgyud): 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dang / /'di la khyad par cung zad med/ /shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje bdag po'i dpal shin tu dgyes pa sgeg mo dpe med pa dang ldan
24b1(rgyud): pa'i yi ge'i mchog gi sku'o/ / //dang po oM bcas lha mo yi/ /tha mar tsheg drag mi phyed gnyis/ /de gnyis dbus kyi phyogs nyid du/ /he zhes bya ba rnam brgyan te/ /shin tu
24b2(rgyud): dgyes pa'i rdo rje che/ /bzhad pa nyid ni rab tu sbyar/ /yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dis/ /nyid kyi snying la rgyas btab na/ /phreng ba'i rgyan gyis rnam brgyan pa/ /dpal ldan de ma thag tu 'gyur/ /yid
24b3(rgyud): kyis ji ltar bsams pa bzhin/ /de ni sangs rgyas yul du 'gro/ de ni de phyir sangs rgyas mthong / /chu skyes de dang rtsen par byed/ /de nas 'dus pa dgyes 'gyur te/ /sangs rgyas yang dag zhing
24b4(rgyud): nyid nas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bde ba che/ /dngos grub rnal 'byor de la sbyin/ /byed pa dang ni zlog pa dang / /bde ba chen po 'phrog pa yis/ /rnal 'byor gsang ba'i dbang phyug la/ /gsang ba chen
24b5(rgyud): pos mgu bar byed/ /thabs bcas shes rab chen po la/ /rgyal ba nyid kyis stobs byed de/ /A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas/ /bde ba chen po mgu bar byed/ /bde ba thabs kyi dngos grub rnams//
24b6(rgyud): sgyu ma'i tshul gyis bsgrub par bya/ /yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'di/ /shin tu dngos grub mchog tu brtag /rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba'i phreng ba rgyas pa dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i
24b7(rgyud): phyag rgya ste las thams cad kyi don gyi dngos grub sbyin pa'o/ / //oM ni dang por gtsug tor bya/ /te de skad snyan tha mar te/ /dbus su he dga' zhes bya ba/ /bde chen dga'
25a1(rgyud): @#/ /ba rdo rje dbyangs/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes che yi/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rab dgyes 'brel/ /bris pa dang ni 'dzin pa dang / /dran pa yis kyang dngos grub ster/ /sdig pa kun
25a2(rgyud): las grol byed cing / /bsod nams thams cad nye bar 'gro /mi dge thams cad ma lus spong byed cing / /sems ni phyag rgya'i yi ge brgyan te 'gro /'jig rten thams cad kun
25a3(rgyud): tu bkur sti byed/ /rig ma stong gis mngon par mchod byed cing / /rig 'dzin mu sman bud med rnams kyis ni/ /g.yag rnga dkar po'i tshogs kyis g.yob byed pa'i/ /'jig rten
25a4(rgyud): dbang po bde mchog 'brel ba 'thob/ /blo ldan nam mkha' ngos ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyi dgyes pa'i rnal 'byor ma/ /yid du 'ong ba'i spyan ni rgyas pa dang / /rnal 'byor
25a5(rgyud): spyod pa'i bde bas 'bigs pa yis/ /mgul nas 'khyud pa'i rtsen pas rol par byed/ /pi wang gling bu ya mtshan sgra snyan gyis/ /glu blangs dngos grub rgya che thob par byed/ /ji
25a6(rgyud): snyed yid du 'ong ba'i glu dag ni/ /'jig rten grags pa'i bde ba'i bde ba bdag /bde ba'i sgra yis bskyed par rnam bsgyur ba'i/ /de dang mthun pa'i dbyangs 'dis sgrub par
25a7(rgyud): byed| |Sha Ta pa da gar dza'i dbyangs/ /glu ru blangs pas pad+ma gnas/ /dngos grub myur du 'thob par byed/ /'di yis byin rlabs dag pa dang / /'di yis byin rlabs bde ba'i rnams//
25b1(rgyud): sbyor ba 'di yis sbyar ba yis/ /'dod byed thams cad 'thob par 'gyur/ /shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog tu dgyes pa chen mo'i dbyangs dpe med pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag
25b2(rgyud): rgya'o|| / /de bzhin oM ni dang por te/ /dbus su he dgyes bde ba che/ /rdo rje gar byed bde ba gnyis/ /'di ni thams cad bde byed de/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rab dgyes nyid/ /rnal
25b3(rgyud): 'byor yi ni rgyas btab na/ /bde dang ldan par byed cing 'gro /'og min gyi ni gnas chen du/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang thabs gcig 'grogs/ /bde byed chen po'i dbang chen dang / /chos kyi rgyal
25b4(rgyud): po bde chen 'thob/ /ji snyed gar gyi gtsug lag las/ /sgyur bar byed pa bshad pa dang / /ji snyed de snyed phyag rgya'i rnams/ /gnyis min 'dus pas 'dis dngos grub/ /kye ma'o dgyes pa
25b5(rgyud): bde byed che/ /kye ma'o bde ba bde chen po/ /kye ma'o 'dod pa 'dod chags che/ /kye ma'o sna tshogs bdag nyid che/ /de la sogs pa tshad med pa/ /'jig rten gyi ni yo
25b6(rgyud): byad rnams/ /pad+mo gsal ba gar gyis ni/ /rnal 'byor gar byas dngos grub bo/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya 'di/ /sna tshogs gar ni ston byed pas/ /myur du gar ni mang
25b7(rgyud): byas pas/ /gar gyi gtsug lag dngos grub bo/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i dpal bde ba chen po dga' byed gar zhes bya ba'i yi ge phyag rgya phan tshun bcu pa rgyal mtshan dang
26a1(rgyud): @#/ /ba dan gsum pa'o/ /bcu gsum yi ge dang po nyid/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che/ /rdo rje'i sku ni sna tshogs che/ /tha mar 'bar dang 'dra ba'i dza/ /nam
26a2(rgyud): mkhar zla skar 'dra ba yi/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes rmad 'byung ba'i/ /'di yi thabs kyis mnyam gzhag ste/ /gzung ba gsal bar gzung ba yi/ /tsha ba'i gser gyi gzi brjid
26a3(rgyud): 'dzin/ /ye shes snying gar bsam par bya/ /nam mkha' nyi ma bum 'dra bar/ /de ni de ma thag tu 'gyur/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /shin tu rmad byung thob par 'gyur
26a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor kun gyi bde 'brel ba/ /rdo rje blo mchog dngos grub bo/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin dge yi/ /sna tshogs chen po thob 'gyur nas/ /'dod pa'i chos kyis mi gos blo/ /'dod
26a5(rgyud): pa chen po sten par byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shin tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i rdo rje'i sku dpe med
26a6(rgyud): pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ / //de bzhin oM ni gzhag bya ste/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che/ /rdo rje'i sgra ni bde 'bral ba/ /tha mar khro bcas
26a7(rgyud): sbyar bar bya/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bde mchog ste/ /bar bcas pa yang thos par 'gyur/ /khams gsum ngo bo thams cad ni/ /sgra yi thos pa dngos grub bo/ /'di yis sangs rgyas
26b1(rgyud): thams cad nyid/ /tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub ste/ /bud med pad+mo ut+pal dang / /ma lus rgyal ba rnams dang rtsen/ /rdo rje pad+mor sbyar bas na/ /dga' byed myur du dngos grub bo/ /rab tu dgyes
26b2(rgyud): pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i tshad med pa'i yon tan gyi sgra dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba don gyi dpal thams cad grub par byed pa'o/ / //oM ni sbyi gtsug thig ler
26b3(rgyud): babs/ /rab dgyes chen mo rdo rje can/ /rdo rje dri bder 'brel ba yi/ /tha mar gnas shes rab sbyar bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sna tshogs chen mo'i mdun du 'gro /sna tshogs
26b4(rgyud): chen mo 'di yis ni/ /sna tshogs ye shes grub par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid rdo rje brgyan pa yi/ /de ni mtshan ldan kun dang rtsen/ /de nas chos dbyings gnas pa des/ /A li kA li mnyam sbyor
26b5(rgyud): bas/ /dga' byed lhan cig rtsen byas na/ /dbang phyug dam pa dngos grub 'gyur/ /'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /blo ldan rab tu dgyes zhes bya/ /rdo rje'i dri dpe med pa dang ldan ma
26b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya'o/ / //oM mchog gtsug tor rnams byas te/ /shin tu dgyes che dbus nyid du/ /rdo rje ro ni sbyor ba che//
26b7(rgyud): tha mar he ste thig le gnyis/ /'di yi rab tu dgyes par 'gyur/ /dpal ldan dpe med bde ba dang / /bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ /sna tshogs sbyor ba sna tshogs bdag /
27a1(rgyud): @#/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rol pa yis/ /mchod pa mi bzad byed par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas thams cad/ /nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid thob bo/ /
27a2(rgyud): rab tu dgyes pa'i dbang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i ro mchog gi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
27a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag po zla gsang thig le bshad pa'i rgyal po las/ chos kyi 'khor lo ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan
27a4(rgyud): 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las shin tu dgyes pa chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal
27a5(rgyud): po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
27a6(rgyud): de dag thams cad gsang ba'i gzungs dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po dang bcas pa rnams kyis mdun du
27a7(rgyud): byas pa ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa/ phyi nang gi pho nya dang / pho nya mo rab tu rgyas pa rnams shin tu ngo
27b1(rgyud): mtshar rmad du gyur te/ dgyes shing spyan ni rgyas pa yis/ /bzhengs nas dgyes pa chen po yi/ /brjid pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing / /thal mo sbyar nas gtsug nyid du/ /bzhag pa
27b2(rgyud): yis ni 'dud par byed/ /bskul ba yi ni dbyangs 'di yis/ /de dag gtso la mnyes par byed/ /kye ma'o chos ni ngo mtshar che/ /kye ma'o spyod dang ngo mtshar che/ /kye ma'o spas pa ngo
27b3(rgyud): mtshar che/ /kye ma'o bde ba yang dag 'byung / /kye ma'o kun tu bzang po'i don/ /kye ma'o rab dgyes yang dag 'grog /kye ma'o bde ba dag pa che/ /kye ma'o bde ba bde mchog
27b4(rgyud): ste| |kye ma'o sngags kyi yang dag sbyor/ /kye ma'o snying po yang dag bsdus/ /kye ma'o phyag rgya mnyam par bzhugs/ /kye ma'o sgrub pa rmad 'byung ba'o/ /kye ma'o pha rol phyin ma
27b5(rgyud): yin/ /kye ma'o ji ltar mthur rig ma/ /kye ma'o sna tshogs dgos pa che/ /kye ma'o dag pa gsum sbyar ba/ /kye ma'o rdo rje mnyam sbyar ba'i/ /kye ma'o pad+ma rnam phye bas/ /kye ma'o
27b6(rgyud): dbang po gnyis sbyor ba'o/ /kye ma'o mchog dang mnyam pa'o/ /kye ma'o gar ni dag pa che/ /kye ma'o glu ra ba dri ma med/ /kye ma'o sil snyan rnam par brel/ /kye ma'o brdab dang mun
27b7(rgyud): ba sel/ /kye ma'o dag byed me tog phreng / /kye ma'o pog snod dge ba ste/ /kye ma'o mar me mun pa sel/ /kye ma'o dri ni shin tu bsil/ /kye ma'o rnal 'byor mnyam par sbyor/ /
28a1(rgyud): @#/ /kye ma'o sgyur ba nam mkha' 'dra/ /kye ma'o sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog /kye ma'o rin chen bde mchog bskyed/ /kye ma'o sna tshogs pad mchog ldan/ /kye ma'o
28a2(rgyud): sna tshogs sgyu ma mdzad/ /kye ma'o ngo mtshar sangs rgyas dang / /kye ma'o ngo mtshar dpa' bo rnams/ /kye ma'o ngo mtshar sems dpa' rnams/ /kye ma'o ngo mtshar lha yi rnams//
28a3(rgyud): shin tu dgyes che rdo rje la/ /rgyan pa kun gyis bstod byas te/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i 'gying ba yis/ /dga' dang bde byed skyes par 'gyur/ /de nas pha rol phyin thams
28a4(rgyud): cad/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dgyes 'gyur te/ /sems dpa' che la phyag byas nas/ /mchog gi dbyangs kyis bstod par byed/ /chu skyes zhal ni 'dzum bcas pa/ /
28a5(rgyud): yangs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad de/ /phyag dang zhabs ni bsgyur ba yis/ /rab tu dgyes ldan smin ma bsgyur/ /yid tsam 'dzum pa'i spyan zur gzigs/ /sha rgyas
28a6(rgyud): brla ni nu mar mdud/ /rked pa'i dbyibs ni rnam par yangs/ /snam gyi ngos kyang che la mdzes/ /chags pa cung zad tshems kyis gnon/ /tshems kyi phreng ba kund zla/ /mig
28a7(rgyud): drag zlos pa'i dbugs 'byin cing / /a la la la ho/ dam tshig rjes su chags pa'i bdag nyid sdug bsngal zhi mdzad cing / /rab tu dgyes che dgyes par bstod/ /bde bas
28b1(rgyud): bde la longs spyod mchog tu bde ba'i rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab bstan/ /dgongs pa'i dbang dang ldan pas 'gro ba ya mtshan chen po'i sgo nas 'dul mdzad cing / /gsang
28b2(rgyud): ba'i thig le 'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni dngos grub gtsor bstan te/ /'jig rten gsum po sbyang bar bya ba'i chos de bder gshegs don du mdzad/ /ngo mtshar yon
28b3(rgyud): tan ldan pa dam tshig bde las 'byung / /bde mdzod bde spyod dga' la rol pa tshul bzhin mdzod/ /thams cad dga' ba'i ngang nyid thig le'i dkyil du bskyed mdzad de/ /
28b4(rgyud): byang chub snying po 'gro ba'i lam 'di bde bar bskul la bsnyen par mdzod/ /ngo mtshar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig rig pa che la dgyes shing bzhugs/ /bdag cag 'du
28b5(rgyud): shes rnams dang bral ba nyid kyang bzhugs spyod 'dzem bcas pas/ /tshangs pa'i rgyal po dbang dang ldan pas kyang ni de la rag lus so/ /a la la ho/ yangs pa'i spyan can
28b6(rgyud): drangs shing bcug ste rol pa tshul bzhin mdzod/ /rnam dag ye shes chu des 'gro ba rnams kyi sdig pa khrus/ /byams ma'i gzungs ma bdag nyid che dang rab tu rtsen mdzod
28b7(rgyud): la| |thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin dag pa'i chu des bdag cag dbang skur cig/ //mi g.yo mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ye shes thob 'dod phyir/ /dam tshig chen
29a1(rgyud): @#/ /po gsum po gsum po 'di la gnas nas ni/ /zla gsang thig le'i dbyings su bdag cag dogs med 'gro bar bgyi/ /dbyangs kyi rgyal po
29a2(rgyud): 'di yis ni/ /shin tu srid pas skyo ba yi/ /sangs rgyas kun kyang 'dod pa bzhin/ /glu blangs myur du bskul bar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la dbyangs kyi
29a3(rgyud): rgyal po 'dis bstod pas shin tu dgyes te de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpar bcas pa dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+mo dang / las kyi rigs
29a4(rgyud): kyi btsun mo de dag thams cad la rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen pos mnyes par mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
29a5(rgyud): chen po'i tshogs rnams dang / byang chub sems dpar bcas pa dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs su bcas pa rnams dang / phyi nang gi
29a6(rgyud): rdo rje rigs las skyes pa rnams la shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i gar dang / dbyangs dang / rdung ba dang / zhi ba'i thal mo la sogs pa rnam par mdzad pa chen pos rab
29a7(rgyud): tu mdzad nas/ dam tshig chen po rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa 'dod pa'i dbang mo dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bde bar cang mi gsung bar gyur to//
29b1(rgyud): de nas de dag kun dgyes nas/ /shin tu dgyes pa nyid byas te/ /thal mo sbyar nas sa steng du/ /pus mo'i lha nga btsugs mdzad de/ /chos kyi phyir na gsol ba 'debs/
29b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dam tshig bdag nyid la/ /bcom ldan dgyes pas bshad du gsol/ /gang gi sems can bde nyid kyi/ /bde bas dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bgyid/ /de nas
29b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dam tshig 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dkyil 'khor mdzod do/ /phyag gnyis
29b4(rgyud): gar dang bcas pa yis/ /mdun du thal mo bkan par bya/ /sor mo kun gyi rtse mo la/ /pha rol phyin pa'i tshogs rnams bsam/ /de dag ming gi brda yis ni/ /sor mo
29b5(rgyud): thams cad brtag par bya/ /sbom po phan tshun bsnol byas te/ /shes rab mchod rten du ni brtag /rdo rje mchod rten sbyar byas te/ /lhag ma 'od bzhin spro bar bya/ /
29b6(rgyud): 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab pha rol phyin ma dge /gang gis bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / /sangs rgyas byang chub byin rlob bo/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas
29b7(rgyud): btab pas/ /rtag pa'i pho brang 'gro 'ong byed/ /sangs rgyas snang mdzad dpal dang ldan/ /btso ma'i gser gyi kha dog 'dzin/ /shes rab ldan pas sbyor byas na/ /'di yis
30a1(rgyud): @#/ /myur du dngos grub bo/ /skal ldan 'phrul gyi bu mo la/ /'di yis byin rlabs gar byas te/ /rdo rje pad+mo bzhag byas nas/ /sems ni bzhugs
30a2(rgyud): pas bsgrub byas la/ /de nas sems de blangs byas te/ /blo ldan de yis btung byas te/ /grub pa gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /yang dag dngos grub 'gro bar byed/ /shes
30a3(rgyud): rab dang ni 'phrul gyi 'am/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'phral rtag 'thob/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje blo ldan gyis/ /kun tu 'phrog par yong mi nus/ /shin tu dgyes pa kun tu longs
30a4(rgyud): spyod pa'i bde ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / //thal mo de nyid khro skyes pa/ /sbom po skyil krung bzhag byas te/ /sna tshogs phreng ba 'bar byed pa//
30a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyis ni lhag ma spro/ /'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi/ /shes rab pha rol phyin ma gsal/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas/ /rdo rje ye shes bla na med/ /'di yis myur
30a6(rgyud): du 'thob par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas/ /'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / /ring du sdig pa 'jig par byed/ /tshe dang dpal dang ye shes skal/ /rdo rje 'dzin
30a7(rgyud): gyis thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni dbang bskur tsam gyis kyang / /rdo rje 'dzin rjer de 'gyur te/ /rdo rje dkyil gyi mtshan btab pas/ /sa chen 'ong zhing 'gro bar byed/ /'di ni
30b1(rgyud): dga' byed rdo rje rigs/ /rdo rje bud med 'grogs pa dang / /rdo rje gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje sems nyid 'thob par 'gyur/ /ji ltar dngos grub 'dug ba dang / /
30b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas rdo rje dpa' bo rnams/ /skad cig gcig gis 'dren par byed/ /bsgral dang mnyes par bya ba dang / /rgyas btab de bzhin rmongs pa dang / /gso bar byed dang
30b3(rgyud): za ba dang / /phan tshun du ni skyed par byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba rdo rje phreng ba zhes bya ba shin tu dgyes pa bde ba thob par
30b4(rgyud): byed pa dpe med pa'i rdo rjer byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / //rdo rje'i thal mo de nyid las/ /khro mo rgyab ni bskum byas te/ /sor mo lhag ma snga ma bzhin/ /phyag
30b5(rgyud): rgya 'di ni dbang bskur ba'o/ /rims dang gdon dang dug la sogs/ /de ma thag tu 'phrog par byed/ /'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / /sangs rgyas kyi ni dgyes pa 'thob//
30b6(rgyud): 'di nyid kyis ni dbang bskur dang / /'di nyid kyis ni bde dam pa/ /'di nyid kyis ni rgyal po che/ /'di nyid kyis ni dpal dam pa/ /'di yis rtsen pa byas pa yis/ /rab
30b7(rgyud): dga' 'gug pa dngos grub bo/ /mi la 'di yis byin rlabs te/ /nyi ma phyed na spyad byas na/ /'di ni de ma thag tu yang / /dpal ldan rdo rje gzi brjid 'dzin/ /nyi ma bcu
31a1(rgyud): @#/ /gnyis 'od 'drar 'gyur/ /zhag bdun gyis 'gyur gzhan gyis min/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dul ba dang / /dge ba thams cad dbang du byed//
31a2(rgyud): grol 'dod rnams kyi mun pa sel/ /blo ldan phyag rgya mchog tu 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po gzi brjid dpe med pa dang ldan pa'i
31a3(rgyud): phreng ba zhes bya ba/ ba dan gsum pa'i 'jig rten gsum du bde ba chen po 'thob par byed pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen po'o// //pha rol phyin pa'i
31a4(rgyud): phyag rgya nyid/ /dge ba'i khro mo dang bral ba/ /pha rol phyin pa'i chos yin te/ /tshig dang tshig tu rnams bral ba'o/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis/ /chos kyi dbyings
31a5(rgyud): nas rje ru 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur bas/ /dbang phyug dam par de 'gyur te/ /thams cad dag pa mos pa yis/ /pad+mo dmar po mchog 'dzin
31a6(rgyud): 'gyur/ /pad+mo sgyu ma rnams mdzad pas/ /sna tshogs chen por de 'gyur re/ /sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog par byed/ /sems can kun la thams cad sbyin/ /'dod
31a7(rgyud): chags chen po nyes spangs te/ /de ni bdud rtsi 'dra bar 'gyur/ /'di na myur du gar byas pa/ /sgrub par mi byed cung zad med/ /'di ni pad+mo sbyor ba yis/ /bde mchog rtag pa
31b1(rgyud): thob par 'gyur/ /shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i myos par byed pa'i dpal pad+mo phreng ba zhes bya ba thams cad kyi don dpal shin tu dgyes par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// //
31b2(rgyud): 'di nyid gnyis pa'i spyi gtsug tu/ /bsgyur nas bzhag par byas pa ni/ /ma lus dri ma 'phrog byed pa/ /sna tshogs chen por de 'gyur ro/ /'di yis dbang ni bskur ma
31b3(rgyud): thag / khams gsum sna tshogs byed par 'gyur/ /sna tshogs dbang po rgyal po che/ /sna tshogs gzugs dang sna tshogs bdag /sgrub pa thams cad bde dam pa/ /'dod
31b4(rgyud): pa kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa/ /thams cad 'di yis dngos sgrub bo/ /bud med 'di yis byin brlabs nas/ /sngo bsangs mkhur tshos dkar mo dang //
31b5(rgyud): de dang lhan cig gar byas pas/ /sna tshogs bdag po chen por 'gyur/ /sngo bsangs zhing ma phreng ma dag /byin gyis brlabs nas dus gsum du/ /mtshan gyi mthar ni
31b6(rgyud): bsnyen byas nas/ /las kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /rigs ngan can dang sme ma dang / /gar mkhan de bzhin gar byed dag /phyag rgya ye shes byin brlabs te/ /bsnyen dang
31b7(rgyud): dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /shin tu dgyes pa sna tshogs bde ba sbyin par byed pa zhes bya ba 'dod par byed pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub par byed
32a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa'i phyag rgya'o// //phyag rgya de dag bstan pa'i rnams/ /gar gyi tshul gyis rang gi gnas/ /dam tshig mchog gi dam
32a2(rgyud): tshig gis/ /dngos grub chen po'i mthur 'gyur ro/ /thal mo de nyid sbyar byas te/ /rdo rje bcings pas bcing bar byed/ /de nas dga' byed dbang bskyed de/ /mda' yi
32a3(rgyud): tshul gyis gzung bar bya/ /'di ni rab dgyes gtso bo yi/ /pha rol phyin mchog sdug pa yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi myos byed pa/ /dpa' bo rnams kyang rmongs par byed//
32a4(rgyud): 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / /mi shes byed pa 'jigs pa byed/ /las kyi don ni dka' bzhin du/ /dga' nas bran bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /'di yis byin gyis
32a5(rgyud): brlabs pa yis/ /bde chen rgyal po 'dra bar 'gyur/ /dga' dang lhan cig gar byed cing / /'di dbang sar ni 'gro bar byed/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa
32a6(rgyud): kun tu bzang mo'i dgyes pa chen mo'i bde ba gnyis su med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba sbyor ba'i phyag rgya chen po'o/ / //snying gar gzung ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /
32a7(rgyud): 'di yis las kun byed 'gyur te/ /bdud rnams thams cad 'bigs par byed/ /rgyal ba 'dod chags bral spyod pa/ /bde gshegs mya ngan 'das kun dang / /thams
32b1(rgyud): cad 'di yis slong bar byed/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byas nas/ /myur du las la sbyor bar byed/ /dbang po nye dbang dbang chen gyi/ /gdug pa thams cad 'joms byed
32b2(rgyud): de| |'jigs byed drag po chen po yis/ /gdug pa thams cad gdung bar byed/ /rdo rje pad+mor bcug pa yis/ /mche bas ma mchu bzung byas te/ /sor mo phan tshun bsnol
32b3(rgyud): ba yis/ /dpung pa brkyang ste gar du bya/ /sna tshogs chen po rab rgyas pas/ /bde chen po yi bde 'thob bo/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /'dod dang thar par grub byed de/ /
32b4(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na/ /'dod pa bzhin du 'phur bar byed/ /rab dgyes 'brel pas gar byas shing / /nam mkha' gzungs ma'i thabs nyid kyis/ /phan tshun gcu ba'i gnon
32b5(rgyud): pa yis/ /bcings na 'di yis dngos grub bo/ /de ni de ma thag tu yang / /lha dang lha min mchod byed de/ /dbang po nye dbang dbang chen dang / /nyi zla gshin rje chu dbang rnams/ /spyi bo yis
32b6(rgyud): ni phyag byas nas/ /rang gi dpal mchog stobs byed de/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyang / /nyid kyis dpal can stobs pa yis/ /brtan pa de la mgu byed cing / /sangs rgyas
32b7(rgyud): dgos pa rab sgrub byed/ /'di yis las kyi tshul gyi rnams/ /las dang rjes su mthun 'gyur te/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnam mdzad pas/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor te//
33a1(rgyud): @#/ /gzungs dang gnyis med sbyor ba yis/ /yid la 'dod pa'i las kun byed/ /'dzum dang gnas dang sbas pa dang / /spyod pas gar gyis byas pas
33a2(rgyud): so| |gzhan dag kyang de dngos grub che/ /pad+mo'i 'dab ma rnams phye bas/ /byang chub sems ni rab sgrub pa/ /sgrub pa pos ni pad+mo sgrub/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
33a3(rgyud): kyi| |bde ba gnyis su med pa'i dpal/ /shin tu dgyes pa'i pad+mo 'dab ma zhes bya ba shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba 'thob par byed pa'o// //thal mo
33a4(rgyud): de nyid bcings pa yis/ /bcings pa gyen du bzung byas te/ /mthe'u chung gnyis ni sgreng byas te/ /de bzhin sbom po gnyis kyang bya/ /phyag rgya 'di ni chu srin zhes/ /rgyal mtshan
33a5(rgyud): ldan par bshad pa yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sprul pa ste/ /'dod bral chags par sgrub pa yin/ /phyag rgya 'di yis bde ldan gyi/ /pho brang chen por 'gro bar byed/ /der
33a6(rgyud): phyin chos kyi 'khor lo dag / bla med par ni skor bar byed/ /sangs rgyas pha rol phyin mas bskor/ /sdig spangs rnams ni bkug nas kyang / /spyod pa drag po'i tshul gyis
33a7(rgyud): ni| |bskal pa bye bar bsnyen par byed/ /yang dag byang chub gnas pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'di yis mnyes par byed/ /de nas dgyes te sna tshogs che/ /sna tshogs ye
33b1(rgyud): shes skye ba yi/ /rang gi dam tshig gsungs pa yi/ /sems dpa' chen po sgrub par byed/ /bla med dngos grub thams cad kyang / 'di yis thams cad grub par byed/ /sbyor dang
33b2(rgyud): ldan pas byin rlabs te/ /snying gar nye bar bsam byas na/ /las kyi ngo bo tshul 'di yis/ /thams cad las ni byed du gzhug /gar dang dbyangs kyi ro dga' dang / /sil snyan
33b3(rgyud): brdung ba rnams byed dang / /pi wang gling bu rdza rnga yi/ /phyag rgya 'di yis bsgrub par bya/ /dpal rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i thugs kyi dgyes pa dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya
33b4(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / //thal mo de nyid mnyam bzung nas/ /'gying zhing 'gying bas gar byas te/ /bcing ba chen pos bcings byas nas/ /sbyor ba chen po gnyis su bya/ /khu
33b5(rgyud): tshur gnyis po dku nyid du/ /g.yon du 'gying bas brtan par bya/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rgyal la sogs/ /bde ba dam pas mchod byas te/ /'gying ba'i sbyor bas gar byas na/ /dngos grub
33b6(rgyud): thams cad grub par byed/ /'gying ba tsam gyis sbyor ba yis/ /'gying ba thams cad 'phrog par byed/ /lha dang lha min rig ma yis/ /'bum phrag brgya yis mchod par byed/ /rab
