33b7(rgyud): tu dgyes pa bde mchog che/ /kun tu gar byas gnas par 'gyur/ /klu mo lha dang lha min dang / /de bzhin mi 'am bdag por 'gyur/ /nam mkhar 'gro ma'i khyor 'gyur te/ /rnal
34a1(rgyud): @#/ /'byor ma kun bde ba che/ /gzungs ma rnams kyi dag pa bdag /gsang ba pha rol phyin pa'i rje/ /las kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /thams cad las ni
34a2(rgyud): byed par bshad/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che/ /gsang chen sbyor bas dngos grub bo/ /dpal shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen mo sems can thams cad sgrol bar
34a3(rgyud): spas pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya thams cad 'grub pa'o/ / //phyag rgya de nyid mnyam bzung ste/ /lag pa'i 'dab ma gar dang bcas/ /myur bar steng du dor ba
34a4(rgyud): yis/ /mgyogs su 'gro ba dngos grub bo/ /'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rmad byung dam pa mchod byas pa/ /sbyor ba gar gyis mchod byas na/ /thams cad las byed
34a5(rgyud): dngos grub bo/ /gang dag dngos grub med pa dang / /gang dag bde ba med pa'i rnams/ /de dag phyag rgya 'dis btab na/ /nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de yis
34a6(rgyud): thams cad las rnams ni/ /rmad byung dam pa 'grub par byed/ /btsun mo chen po de bzhin gshegs/ /'di yis de ni 'grub par byed/ /gzhan yang mchog tu rgya che ba//
34a7(rgyud): mnyam dang mi mnyam chos kyi dbyings/ /btsun mo dam pa de bzhin gshegs/ /phyag rgya'i sbyor bas dngos grub bo/ /dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa'i me tog
34b1(rgyud): gi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / //de nyid 'og gi ngos su dor/ /steng du cung zad bsgrub par bya/ /'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /bde mchog yid ni tshim
34b2(rgyud): byed pa/ /'dis ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / /bdud rnams shin tu ring bar 'gyur/ /phyag rgya bcings te bsdigs pa yis/ /skrag nas dngos grub sbyin par byed/ /sangs rgyas
34b3(rgyud): dam tshig gsum gnas pa'i/ /'di yis mchod pa byas par 'gyur/ /de nas gtso bo 'dis mnyes nas/ /mchog gi thabs ni stobs par byed/ /phyag rgya bcings pa sbyor ba
34b4(rgyud): yis/ /'di ni thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /rgyun du byas na rnal 'byor pa/ /dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /sdig pa thams cad 'phrog byed de/ /bde ba dam pa 'thob
34b5(rgyud): byed cing / /tshe 'di dang ni pha rol du/ /phyag rgya'i gnas su de 'gro'o/ /dpal shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ dri ma thams cad
34b6(rgyud): spong ba dpal shin tu dgyes ma'o/ / //thal mo de nyid sbom po sgreng / /lhag ma gsal ba'i nyi ma bzhin/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /ye shes mchog tu snang
34b7(rgyud): byed pa'o/ /thog ma med nas bskor ba yi/ /'di yis gti mug 'phrog byed de/ /mnyam par gzhag nas bcings ma thag /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis rlob/ /mnyam nyid ye shes
35a1(rgyud): @#/ /dri med dang / /pad+mo dra ba dga' ba che/ /sna tshogs dra ba dpal chen po/ /bde byed chen po 'thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje dgyes pa chen mo'i dpe med
35a2(rgyud): pa'i dpal dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / //g.yas dang g.yon pa'i lag pa yis/ /brjid pa'i gar gyi gar bya zhing / /thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar
35a3(rgyud): te| |g.yon gyi khu tshur spyi bor bzhag / rgyal ba rnams kyi phyag rgya 'di/ /mchod pa thams cad grub byed do/ /thams cad don rnams grub pa dge /bkra shis rgyal ba 'thob par
35a4(rgyud): byed/ /gang zhig bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / /mchod pa'i sprin nyid rgyas pa che/ /mtha' yas dri med gzi brjid dang / /sangs rgyas zhing ni dngos grub bo/ /phyag rgya sbyor bas
35a5(rgyud): sbyar byas te/ /skad cig gcig gis sbyar byas nas/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang sras mchog kyang / /'di yis thams cad 'bab par 'gyur/ /sna tshogs kyi ni sbyor ba yis/ /sna tshogs
35a6(rgyud): gar gyis gar byas na/ /dpa' bo thams cad kun tu 'gro/ /phun sum tshogs pa 'dis 'grub bo/ /dpal shin tu dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i sems 'phel bar byed ma zhes pa'i
35a7(rgyud): phyag rgya'o/ / //de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi bdag po dpal kun tu bzang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i bdag
35b1(rgyud): nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen po bshad pa mthas klas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le mchog tu pha rol tu phyin pa/ gsang ba chen po
35b2(rgyud): dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu dgyes pa/ rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bskal pa'i mtha' klas pa zhas bya ba gsum pa rdzogs so// //
35b3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'i gsang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad nas slar yang bde bar cang mi gsung bar
35b4(rgyud): gnas par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / pha rol tu phyin ma rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs thams cad dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
35b5(rgyud): nam mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas phyi nang gi rdo rje'i rigs su gtogs pa 'phrog par byed pa'i tshogs thams cad la slar dbugs phyung ste/ de las
35b6(rgyud): bzhengs nas gar mdzad cing rab tu dgyes pa'i spyan rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das la yang dang / yang du lta zhing dbyangs kyi mchog bde ba 'dis glu blangs te dgyes par byed do/ /
35b7(rgyud): rnam mang bde ba'i rol pas bdag nyid chen po yis/ /skye dang mi skye'i chos nyid ya mtshan rmad dag dpal bstan pa/ /shin tu bde ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten 'dir
36a1(rgyud): @#/ /phyung ste/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i gzungs ma'i dkyil nas bskyed par mdzod/ /ngo mtshar rmad du byung bas chos nyid bde bas rol mdzad cing / /
36a2(rgyud): bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin 'dus pa rnams la dbugs 'byin cing / /gsang ba'i thig le dngos nyid nam mkha' 'dra ba rnams spyad de/ /bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'i
36a3(rgyud): longs spyod rgyu las dbang mdzad pas/ /byang chub mchog gi lam 'di nyon mongs mtha' dang rnam bral zhing / /bde ba'i 'byung gnas skye shi med pa'i sgo mor pad+mo rnams
36a4(rgyud): dag pa/ /nyon mongs mi gos sgyu mar gnas pa chu zla'i dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /e ma'o kun tu bzang po rig pa rgya chen bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /dngos nyid med pa'i
36a5(rgyud): chos la dga' ba'i rol pas gzungs su 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bde mchog bdud rtsir sa yan/ /ji ltar bde la rten cing kun tu snang bar mdzad/ /kye ma bde mchog
36a6(rgyud): bde bas rol pa tshul bzhin mdzod/ /sdug bsngal 'gro ba'i las can bde bas tshim par mdzod/ /byams pa'i spyan can thugs rje nyi mas 'gro ba kun la shar mdzad
36a7(rgyud): nas| |gti mug thibs po'i mun nag byang chub sems kyis gsal bar ston/ /de ni 'dus pa'i tshogs la bde sbyin rol ba'i rgyal pos gsungs/ /byang chub mchog
36b1(rgyud): gi sems des snying po mchog tu dbang skur cig / dbyangs kyi phyag rgya 'di yis ni/ /skad cig skad cig bskul byas na/ /rab tu dgyes pa'i bdag nyid kyi/ /mdun du gnas te dngos
36b2(rgyud): grub sbyin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po rdo rje zla gsang thig le chen po la rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba
36b3(rgyud): gsang ba chen po tshad med pa dang / mchog tu pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang / /rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs chen mo de rnams kyis bstod cing bskul ba byas pa dang / gsang
36b4(rgyud): b a thams cad kyi bde ba chen po shin tu dgyes pa longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di la snyoms par zhugs nas shin tu dgyes pa chen po gdon
36b5(rgyud): mi za ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di rang gi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // //gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta
36b6(rgyud): babs rnam pa bzhi yis brgyan/ /dar dang dril bu'i chun po dang / /nyi ma zla bas rnam par brgyan/ /rin chen mu tig 'bras bus spras/ /do shal gdu bu rnams kyis brgyan
36b7(rgyud): sna tshogs gdugs ni rnam bres pa/ /sna tshogs phreng ba gos kyis brgyan/ /srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste/ /ka ba brgyad mchog yang dag gnas/ /dbus kyi dga' byed stan la
37a1(rgyud): @#/ /ni| |dngul la sogs pas rnam par brgyan/ /sna tshogs pad+mo dar gyis g.yogs/ /thams cad stan te dag ces bya/ /dbus su rdo rje shin tu dgyes//
37a2(rgyud): stan de la ni gzhag par bya/ /tshad med pad+mo dmar 'dra ba'i/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /yid bzhin nor bu dbu rgyan ldan/ /rin chen gtsug gis rnam par
37a3(rgyud): mdzes/ /tshad med dar ni dpyangs pa yis/ /dbu la chun pos mdzes par bya/ /sna tshogs sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag /sna tshogs ye shes rab tu gnas/ /chu skyes spyan
37a4(rgyud): ni yid tsam gyis/ /dga' byed yid tsam g.yon du 'dud/ /g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje che/ /snying gar gsor la shin tu brtson/ /de la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan/ /thog
37a5(rgyud): ma nyid du rnam par gzhag / slob ma'am yang na gzhan yang rung / /mtshan kun gyis ni rnam brgyan pa/ /tshul bzhin byin gyis brlab bya ste/ /dbus kyi dkyil du gzhag
37a6(rgyud): par bya/ /bdag nyid kyang ni mnyam gzhag ste/ /de la sogs pa yon tan gtso/ /dbus kyi stan la 'dug pa na/ /bdag ni rab dgyes zhes su smra/ /des ni slob ma byin
37a7(rgyud): brlabs te/ /thams cad las byed phun sum tshogs/ /rdo rje pad+mo las 'byung ba'i/ /gsang ba yis kyang dbang bskur ro/ /rab dgyes la sogs yon tan ldan/ /yid
37b1(rgyud): 'ong bu mo btsal byas te/ /mgrin pa dpral ba snying spyi bor/ /lha la sogs pa'i 'bru bsgoms te/ /mtshan ma phyag rgyar rab 'bar ba/ /rdo rje pad+mor mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rang la
37b2(rgyud): 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /tshul bzhin thams cad gzhag par bya/ /mdun du lha mo smyos byed ma/ /ma mchu 'dzin pa'i ro la dgyes/ /dkar dmar kha dog 'dres pa yi/ /
37b3(rgyud): thams cad rgyan dang yang dag ldan/ /lo ni bcu drug lon pa'i mchog/ shes rab can gyis mdun du gzhag /g.yas su lha mo gsod byed ma/ /mtshon cha'i mda' ni 'dren
37b4(rgyud): par brtson/ /do shal rkang gdub dag gis brgyan/ /lo grangs nyi shu lon pa ste/ /gser gyi ri bo zhu ba 'dra/ /chu skyes spyan ni yid tsam sngo/ /sems dpa' che la dgyes mdzad
37b5(rgyud): cing / /'di ni tshul bzhin gzhag par bya/ /rgyab tu lha mo rmongs byed ma/ /pad+mo dmar po mdog gi 'od/ /chu srin rgyal mtshan mdzes ma'o/ /sku tshe'i tshad ni nyi shu gcig /dga'
37b6(rgyud): byed 'dod pa'i ro la dgyes/ /sna tshogs na bza' yang dag gsol/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /sna tshogs pad+mo sbyor la sogs/ /gar gyi bya ba rab bslab
37b7(rgyud): bzhag / g.yon du sna tshogs chen mo ste/ /sna tshogs dgos pa'i rjes bslabs pa/ /sku tshe'i tshad ni bcu gnyis ldan/ /rnal 'byor la ni shin tu brtson/ /lha dang lha min mi yi
38a1(rgyud): @#/ /rnams/ /'gro ba thams cad myos 'gyur ma/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /sna tshogs dar gyi na bza' gsol/ /grwa rnams kyi ni thams
38a2(rgyud): cad du/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg gi rnams/ /bdug pa me tog bsung ldan pa/ /gzi brjid chen po 'od dang ldan/ /ci rigs par ni gzhag par bya/ /sgo yi phyogs rnams
38a3(rgyud): thams cad du/ /rang gi las kyi phyag rgyar ldan/ /skal ldan dga' la rnam mos pa/ /sgo srung bzhi ni gzhag par bya/ /gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs rnams/ /pi wang
38a4(rgyud): gling bu brdab pa dang / /rdza rnga rnga chen mu ku dang / /mu ra dza dang da ra dang / /gar dang dbyangs dang bzhad pa che/ /rol mo'i yo byad sna tshogs rnams/ /dga' byed dkyil 'khor
38a5(rgyud): bzhag par bya/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor thams cad do/ /dkyil 'khor 'di yi phyi rol du/ /rdo rje nam mkha' 'gro ma gzhag /yi dwags rgyal po yang dag zhon/ /dpa'
38a6(rgyud): bo 'jigs byed gzugs 'dzin te/ /skal ldan rang gi lag char ldan/ /gdug pa'i sems kyis sdigs byed cing / /sha khrag dang ni rgyu ma dang / /rkang dang tshil bu za spyod
38a7(rgyud): pa| |dkyil 'khor byas te 'dug pa ni/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhag par bya/ /dga' bar byed dang 'dren par byed/ /gsod par byed dang spro bar byed/ /rdo rje mkha'
38b1(rgyud): 'gro tshogs kyi rnams/ /shar gyi phyogs su gzhag par bya/ /gzi brjid che dang 'bar byed ma/ /'jigs byed bong bu'i lho ru ste/ /gtsug lag mthong ba'i rgyu yis ni/ /mkhas pas
38b2(rgyud): tshul bzhin gzhag par bya/ /chags chen mo dang chags bral dang / /'khor lo mo dang rgyas 'debs mo/ /rab tu sbyor bas sbyor byas te/ /ci rigs nub tu gzhag par bya/ /
38b3(rgyud): sna tshogs lus dang srung ba dang / /gnod sbyin ma dang yang dag 'phrog /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs te/ /sngags mkhan ci rigs byang du gzhag /shar gyi grwa ru
38b4(rgyud): gzhag pa ni/ /bya rog gdong ste mig 'dra zhing / /'jigs pa'i mig dang 'jigs pa'i gdong / /ji ltar rjes su mthun byas te/ /yi dwags stan la yang dag 'dug /sna
38b5(rgyud): tshogs mchog gi mdog 'dzin te/ /lag pa dri dang 'khar gzhong thogs/ /mchog tu sha dang khrag za ba'o/ /nub dang lho yi mtshams gzhag pa/ /bzhad dang 'ug pa'i gdong
38b6(rgyud): ring ma/ /khros pa'i khyi dang phag gi gdong / /gsus po che la lto 'phyangs ma/ /nub byang gi ni mtshams dag tu/ /rnga mo bong bu'i gdong 'dzin dang / /khros pa'i ra dang byi la'i
38b7(rgyud): gdong / /sgyu ma'i mgo nas za byed rnams/ /shar dang byang gi mtshams dag tu/ /keng rus dkar po 'dzin pa ste/ /khros pa rus pa'i phreng bas klubs/ /lto 'phyangs mo la bum
39a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa 'dzin/ /phan tshun 'thab par brtson pa ye/ /ce spyang gi ni 'khor gyi rnams/ /'jigs byed gdong ni mche ba 'byin/ /rnam par 'gyur ba'i
39a2(rgyud): gzugs 'dzin pa'o/ /sgo srung gi ni phyogs kun tu/ /sgo bzhi rnams su gzhag bya ba/ /byang gi phyogs su 'bod 'grogs te/ /bum pa'i rna ni shar nyid du/ /nub tu
39a3(rgyud): rnam par 'jig pa'o/ /lhor ni gshin rje rgyal po gzhag /de dang gzhan yang rgyal po mchog /nam mkhar 'gro bas kun tu bskor/ /bum pa rnam pa sna tshogs
39a4(rgyud): te| |gser dang dngul las byas pa la/ /sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag dkris/ /me tog 'bras bu rnams kyis brgyan/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis gang byas pa/ /sman lnga
39a5(rgyud): dang ni yang dag ldan/ /rin chen lnga dang ldan byas pa/ /'bru rnams lnga yis brgyan byas pa'i/ /bum pa bcu drug bzhag byas te/ /bcu gnyis brgyad dam yang na phyed/ /
39a6(rgyud): tha na chung du gcig tsam yang / /ji ltar rim bzhin bzhag byas te/ /dbus su bum pa ro yi mchog /dam tshig chus ni gang byas pa/ /gser ram dngul lam zangs kyang
39a7(rgyud): rung / /lcags sam sa las byas pa la/ /zla ba nyi ma dri chu dang / /btung bsnum por ldan pa yi/ /dbang po kun las 'byung ba rnams/ /sha srang gcig gis rab bsres
39b1(rgyud): pa| |kun las 'phags pa ro yi mchog / tshogs kyi dbus su bsgrub byas te/ /btung ba bzhin du myangs pa yis/ /rdo rje blo ldan bskal par gnas/ /rnam pa sna tshogs nye ba'i
39b2(rgyud): zas/ /bza' ba dang ni bca' bas mchod/ /mchod pa nye ba'i zas lnga dang / /tshad med 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas/ /tshad med rnal 'byor ma tshogs la/ /skad cig skad cig mchod
39b3(rgyud): par bya/ /sngags mkhan tshul bzhin mnyam gzhag ste/ /'byung po rnams la gtor ma byin/ /lha rnams kyi ni thams cad la/ /he ru ka yi phyag rgya yis/ /nyid kyi gtor ma
39b4(rgyud): byin brlabs te/ /spyan drangs gtsang sbra byas pa dbul/ /gzungs kyi tshogs ni de rnams la/ /mnyes pa byas nas slar gshegs so/ /rnal 'byor ma chen dkyil 'khor du/ /
39b5(rgyud): slob ma'i mchog ni gzhugs par bya/ /mtshungs par spyod pa rab mdzes ma/ /sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag dkris/ /lag pa g.yon gyis bzung byas te/ /rab dgyes longs spyod
39b6(rgyud): phyag rgya yis/ /bcug nas sgo yis grwa nyid du/ /blo ldan dam tshig bsgrag par bya/ /'di las mi bya cung zad med/ /thabs dang shes rab sems nyid kyis/ /rtag tu dogs pa
39b7(rgyud): med byas te/ /'dod pa lnga yi yon tan spyod/ /gzhan yang dam tshig nyams pa dang / /skye bo gang dag dam la gnon/ /brtul zhugs khyod kyis de drangs te/ /khrag chen po ni btung
40a1(rgyud): @#/ /par bya/ /gang dag slob dpon smod byed dang / /gang dag bka' rnams mi byed pa/ /de dag khros nas khrag chen po/ /blo ldan snying las btung bar bya/ /
40a2(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang / /slob dpon la yang gnod byed pa/ /rdo rje khro bo'i bsdus pa yi/ /dam tshig bsgoms te bsgral bar bya/ /de nas dam tshig blud byas
40a3(rgyud): te| |rdo rje bdud rtsi ro yi mchog / dung chen por ni bzhag par bya/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu blud do/ /kye| dmyal ba yi ni chu 'di skye/ /khyod kyi snying la kun tu gnas/ /dam tshig bsrungs
40a4(rgyud): pas dngos grub ster/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'di 'thung / /oM badzra u da ka hUM Tha/ /dam tshig 'di ni brgyar bzlas pa'i/ /byin gyis brlabs te 'thung du gzhug /gzhan du dam
40a5(rgyud): tshig mi 'gyur te/ /dngos grub nyid du'ang 'di 'gyur ro/ /bdag ni dam tshig skal dga' zhes/ /slob ma sngags ni brjod du gzhug /sgo grwar gnas nas bri bya ba/ /kye khyod dga'
40a6(rgyud): ba ci la dang / /'jug pa yis kyang smra bya ba/ /bdag ni skal ldan bde mchog la/ /rab dgyes 'phrul la bdag dga' ste/ /mchog tu dga' la bdag dga'o/ /de nas rnal 'byor
40a7(rgyud): ma mchog gis/ /dkyil du me tog bor byas te/ /me tog gang la lhung pa yi/ /lha nyid du ni dngos grub bo/ /dbang bskur ba yi phyag rgya yis/ /de nas spyi bor dbang bskur bya/ /bum
40b1(rgyud): pa rnam pa bzhi yis kyang / /mnyam par gzhag ste lnga po yis/ /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor zhugs byas te/ /de nas yang ni dbang bskur bya/ /ci rigs par ni gzungs ma'i rnams//
40b2(rgyud): bdag nyid skal ldan zhes su smra/ /gang dag 'gro bar gyur pa yi/ /lha de nyid ni bstan par bya/ /dga' bar byed pa'i gzungs ma de'i/ /khyod kyis rtag tu sgrub par gyis/ /de
40b3(rgyud): nas rgyal dbang slob ma de/ /nang gi was ba bsdus pa yi/ /gsang ba mnyam par 'jug pa yis/ /sbyor dang ldan pas dbang bskur bya/ /rdo rje pad+mo las drangs pa/ /sbom po dang
40b4(rgyud): ni dbang gis blangs/ /rdo rje dkan du bzhag byas nas/ /rtag pa dge ba bde ba che/ /kye ma'o dam tshig bde brjod cing / /kye ma bde ba blang bar bya/ /'di ni gsang ba zhes bya ste/ /dbang
40b5(rgyud): bskur ba yi thabs mchog go / rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid che'i/ /rang gi khar ni rdo rje bzhag /sems dpa' chen po drangs byas na/ /sems kyis byang chub bde ba 'thob/ /'di ni
40b6(rgyud): mchog tu gsang ba ste/ /dbang bskur ba yi bde ba'o/ /slob ma mi shes pa rnams la/ /'di dag thams cad bsgrag mi bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis bya ba/ /yang nas yang du brtag
40b7(rgyud): par bya/ /'di yis dbang ni bskur ma thag /slob ma tshogs kyi bdag por 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ /slob dpon nyid du bde bar 'gyur/ /gzungs ma rnams kyi dga'
41a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa'i bdag /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjer bshad do/ /mkha' la 'gro ba'i khyor 'gyur te/ /ri dang 'gro ba kun gyi bdag /de nas shes rab ye
41a2(rgyud): shes dbang / /slob ma mchog la sbyin par bya/ /gzungs ma de ni bdag nyid la/ /bla ma nyid kyis byin brlabs te/ /dngos grub 'bras bu myur 'thob phyir/ /slob ma la ni
41a3(rgyud): sbyin par bya/ /dbang bskur shin tu sbas pa yis/ /rdo rje slob dpon tshul ji bzhin/ /blo ldan the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /rnam pa bzhi po 'di sbyin no/ /de tshun chad ni slob ma la//
41a4(rgyud): rgyud kun las ni gang cung zad/ /yi ge'i tshul gyis sbas pa rnams/ /gsang ba mchog ni bstan par bya/ /de nas de nyid langs byas te/ /slob dpon rkang par gtugs
41a5(rgyud): byas nas/ /rgyal po dbang phyug bde dam pa/ /thams cad yon ni dbul bar bya/ /gzungs de dag ni thams cad la/ /ci dga' bar ni yon yang 'bul/ /slob dpon cung
41a6(rgyud): zad gang 'dod pa/ /yid la bsams pa'i yon yang rung / /dam tshig 'das pas 'jigs pa yis/ /de dag thams cad dbul bar bya/ /slob dpon la ni yon gyi mchog/
41a7(rgyud): rigs kyi khyab par dbul byas te/ /seng ge'i gdan la nyid kyis ma/ /sangs rgyas byin ni yon mchog yin/ /glang po rin chen gser dag dang / /sring mo bla ma'i yon mchog
41b1(rgyud): yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs yin te/ /yon de mchog gi yon yin no/ /rin chen pad+mo'i chung ma dang / /shing rta rta ni shin tu brgyan/ /sna tshogs rin chen rnam dag pa/ /mu tig phreng
41b2(rgyud): bas shin tu mdzes/ /bu mo rin chen dra ba yis/ /brgyan te sna tshogs rdo rje la'o/ /rgyal po yi ni dbang phyug dang / /chung ma bla ma dbul bar bya/ /'phrul gyi bzhon pa sna tshogs pa/ /glang
41b3(rgyud): po rta ni shin tu brgyan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rje/ /nan tan bla ma dbul bar bya/ /bla ma'i yon gyi phyag rgya 'di/ /rdo rje blo ldan slob ma yis/ /ci ste bde byed kun 'dod
41b4(rgyud): na| |dga' dang mos pa'i sems kyis bya/ /de la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rab dgyes gdon mi za ba'i bde/ /gang gis myur du 'thob 'gyur te/ /slob dpon gtso mchog
41b5(rgyud): nyid du 'gyur/ /chos rnams kun gyis dbang phyug rgyal/ /rdo rje blo ldan mchog tu gyur/ /rin chen kun gyi rigs kyi rgyal/ /de bzhin sna tshogs rigs kun tu/ /pad+mo'i rigs
41b6(rgyud): kun dpal dang ldan/ /rdo rje rigs kun bdag por de/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni rigs kun dang / /rgyal ba'i gtso bo mchog tu 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'khor lo'i gar/ /nyid dang
41b7(rgyud): slob ma'i tshogs gyur pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /sems dpa' bdag nyid mchod par bya/ /phan tshun la sogs tshul gyis ni/ /shes rab mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis//
42a1(rgyud): @#/ /rdo rje che yi thabs gnas te/ /mkha' 'gro kun la mchod par bya/ /phyi yi sbas pa gsang la sogs/ /nang gi mchod pa mchog gi rnams/ /phyag rgya'i
42a2(rgyud): sbyor ba tshul gnas te/ /tshul bzhin rgyas pa dbul bar bya/ /lus dang ngag sems bde byed kyis/ /mchod pa'i bdag nyid mchod par bya/ /'dod pa'i rol pa myong ba yi//
42a3(rgyud): myangs na mchod pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /mchod pa kun gyi cho ga yis/ /rang rig khyad par shes byas te/ /sgrub pa thams cad bsgrubs byas nas/ /dngos grub thams cad myur
42a4(rgyud): du 'thob/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'di mthong bas/ /dga' mgu rangs pa'i yid kyis ni/ /rdo rje sems la phyag byed cing / /rang gi dkyil 'khor gsol ba 'debs/ /bde byed
42a5(rgyud): chen po'i dkyil mo brgya/ /rigs kyi khyad par gyis ni lnga/ /lha rnams kyang ni re re yang / /sems kyi khyad par mchog mtha' yas/ /'das pa'i dus na ma byung ba/ /mtha'
42a6(rgyud): yas chos ni yangs pa bstan/ /'dod chags rnams kyis dkris pa yi/ /sdug bsngal gzir ba'i mtha' nas 'gro/ /'dod pa'i mchog gi longs spyod rnams/ /mos
42a7(rgyud): pa'i rjes su zhugs shing spyod/ /kun tu chags par mi 'gyur zhing / /bde bas langs pa'i yid dang ldan/ /byang chub snying por bgrod pa ni/ /dam bcas rnams dang sems kyis
42b1(rgyud): so| |de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po/ rab tu bzhad cing spyan zur gyis gzigs pa'i thugs kyis shin tu dgyes pa
42b2(rgyud): kun tu longs spyod pa'i skyil mo krung gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ skyil mo krung chen po'i dpal zhes bya ba rang gi phyag rgya'i ye shes
42b3(rgyud): kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // //g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis ni/ /rkang pa gnyis ka bteg byas te/ /bdag nyid brla ni mi snang
42b4(rgyud): bzhin/ /rtsa ba skyil mo bcing bar bya/ /sbyor ba gar mkhan tshul gyis ni/ /gar gyi sbyor bas gar bya'o/ /rdo rje gdan gyi bde ba chen/ /'di yis bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur//
42b5(rgyud): gdug pa dang ni dgra thams cad/ /skad cig gis kyang smos ci dgos/ /rab tu dgyes pa'i stan 'di yis/ /yang dag byang chub myur du thob/ /mi phyed pa ni thig ler
42b6(rgyud): bcas/ /'og gi phyogs su yi ge drug /shes rab can gyis bskyod cing bzlas/ /byung ba'i tshe na phaT ces bshad/ /pad+mo mi phyed 'dren pa dang / /thig ler bcas pa
42b7(rgyud): sbyor bar bya/ /mi phyed oM dang yang dag ldan/ /tsheg drag bcas pa bde 'byung na'o/ /bud med la ni zhag bdun du/ /'di yis rtsen par byas pa na/ /nam mkha' thams
43a1(rgyud): @#/ /cad gang ba yi/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor chen po mthong / /rab dgyes longs spyod gnas pa yi/ /sems dpa' che la slong mdzad de/ /gzungs kyi
43a2(rgyud): pad+mo las byung ba/ /bde byed mchog gi dbang bskur ro/ /de nas rab dga' bde thob pa/ /sems dpa' de ni dngos grub bo/ /thog ma dang ni mtha' med par/ /'dod pa thams
43a3(rgyud): cad de longs spyod/ /tshe dang dpal dang phun sum ldan/ /gdon dang dug dang tsha ba'i nad/ /mkha' 'gros nye bar gtses pa dang / /sdig can 'khor ba las grol te/ /sa
43a4(rgyud): rnams kun la rnam par rgyu/ /gzi brjid nyi ma shar dang 'dra/ /sna tshogs 'dra ba 'bar byed pas/ /sna tshogs thams cad snang byed cing / /de yi sems can thams cad
43a5(rgyud): kyi| |nad dang mya ngan 'jigs chen 'phrog / phyag rgya 'di yis sbyor ba yis/ /ye shes lnga ni bsten par bya/ /rtse ba'i skyil mo krung zhes bya ba phyag rgya chen po'i las kyi don
43a6(rgyud): thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o/ / //bdag gi rkang pa dbus su bsdu/ /de yi rkang pas bcings byas te/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo bzhin du 'brel/ /'di ni
43a7(rgyud): bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / /khams gsum sgrub par bzhed pa yin/ /yi ge rnams ni snga ma bzhin/ /rang gi lhar ni sbyor brtson pas/ /bsgoms sam yang na bskyod
43b1(rgyud): kyang rung / /sngags pa 'di yis dngos grub ste/ /sngags kyi sems 'dzin gtsang ma yi/ /zhag bdun sgom pa bsgoms byas nas/ /yang dag dngos grub nyid du 'gyur/ /phyag rgya
43b2(rgyud): 'di yis rgyas btab ste/ /sbyor ba shin tu bsten byas nas/ /gdon mi za bar rgyal po 'thob/ /yid bzhin dgos pa thams cad byed/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung ngo / /gzungs
43b3(rgyud): ma bzung ste bcing ba ni/ /rin po che ltar sbyar byas te/ /rang gi rkang pa mi snang bya/ /rin chen kun gyi skyil mo krung / /'di ni rin chen thams cad kyi/ /dbul zhing phongs pa 'joms
43b4(rgyud): byed de/ /sdig pa thams cad 'phrog byed ma/ /gnod pa'i dug kun 'phrog par byed/ /gdug pa thams cad rmongs byed de/ /dgra rnams thams cad 'joms par byed/ /khro bo
43b5(rgyud): thams cad 'dzum byed de/ /gdug pa rnams kyi rgyas 'debs na/ /mi g.yeng zla ba gcig gis ni/ /'di yis rgyal po dngos grub bo/ /yid bzhin las rnams thams cad byed//
43b6(rgyud): ci ste bdag nyid rgyal po ru/ /mchog tu rmad 'byung sgrub 'dod na/ /rin chen sems kyi rin chen mtshan/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya tshul gnon pa/ /rgyal po khams gsum rgyal
43b7(rgyud): byed pa/ /zla phyed tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /rin po che yi skyil mo'o/ /de bzhin rkang pa gnyis bzhag pa/ /pad+mo 'dra bar sbyar byas te/ /bdag gam de bzhin gzhan yang
44a1(rgyud): @#/ /rung / /blo ldan pad+mo bde bsgrub bya/ /'di yis sems can thams cad dang / /mdor na sangs rgyas rnams dag dang / /rdo rje nyi ma ma lus kyang / /dbang
44a2(rgyud): du 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /bde ldan pho brang chen po yis/ /bde byed 'di yis 'thob par byed/ /sems can khams rnams thams cad du/ /sems dpa' chen po 'gro
44a3(rgyud): 'ong byed/ /pad+mo'i skyil mo'o/ /de bzhin skyil mo rgyas byas te/ /sna tshogs tshul gyis sbyor ba bya/ /sngags mkhan chen po'i sbyor ba yin/ /sngags mkhan yi ge shin
44a4(rgyud): tu brtson/ /zlos pa byed cing rnam bsgoms na/ /dngos grub rtag pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /mi g.yeng sngon gyi gdug pa yi/ /las rnams thams cad 'phrog par byed//
44a5(rgyud): sna tshogs skyil du gnas pa yis/ /bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /sna tshogs kyi ni skyil mo'o/ /de nas mkha' 'gro ma'i skyil mo rgyas/ /thams cad khrag ni 'phrog
44a6(rgyud): byas te/ /gzungs ma yi ni rkang pa gnyis/ /yid kyi gnya' bar rkang pa bteg /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sbyor ba yis/ /bsnyen pas khrag rnams 'phrog par byed/ /mnyam
44a7(rgyud): par bzhag nas gzungs ma yi/ /rkang pa gcig ni mgul nyid du/ /sbyor dang ldan pas bteg byas na/ /zas rnams thams cad 'phrog byed de/ /btung dang bza' ba bca'
44b1(rgyud): ba dang / /gos kyi rgyan gyis klubs pa yis/ /de bzhin zhag bdun nyid kyis kyang / /thams cad las byed gdon mi za/ /tshangs pa gtogs 'dod dbang po yi/ /dpal chen
44b2(rgyud): mchog ni 'phrog par byed/ /lag pa sgreng ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /khams gsum rim pa rgal bar byed/ /mig ni btsums par byed 'gyur ba/ /'gro ba gsum po rnam par
44b3(rgyud): 'jig / rus sbal bzhin du mnyam gzhag ste/ /mi g.yeng skad cig bcing byas na/ /gdug pa'i srog chags thams cad dang / /dgra dang spyod bcas mi spyod phrog /sbal
44b4(rgyud): pa bzhin du mnyam gzhag ste/ /dkyil 'khor tshul gyis bskor bar bya'o/ /ma lus rnams kyang rmongs byed de/ /khams gsum rnams kyang rgal bar byed/ /gtogs 'dod
44b5(rgyud): kyi ni mnyam gzhag ste/ /sa gsum rnams kyi rgyas gdab bya/ /gar dbang gi ni mnyam gzhag ste/ /sa gsum rnams ni gar byed gzhug /dril bu yi ni mnyam gzhag
44b6(rgyud): ste| |sa gsum rnams ni gdab par bya/ /gzhon nu'i skyil mo bcings pa yis/ /sangs rgyas bde chen 'thob par byed/ /skyil mo phyed na mnyam gzhag nas/ /gnyis pa
44b7(rgyud): yis ni mnan byas na/ /khams gsum thams cad gnon 'gyur zhing / /'dod byed thams cad dngos grub bo/ /dga' byed ma yi mnyam gzhag pas/ /skyil mo rab tu
45a1(rgyud): @#/ /dga' thob ste/ /dga' byed ma yi yid 'ong ma/ /khams gsum thams cad dngos grub bo/ /rig 'dzin rnam par gzhag byas te/ /khams gsum
45a2(rgyud): skad cig mnan par bya/ / //khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba yi/ /mdor 'dus gzungs ma'i bcings pa yis/ /'jig rten gsum ni rnam rgyal te/ /skad cig khams
45a3(rgyud): gsum bdag por 'gyur/ /rtag par phan tshun 'brel ba yis/ /dpung pa gnyis ni bskum byas te/ /thams cad sgo ni 'gegs pa yis/ /mche ba sbom po rab tu sbyar//
45a4(rgyud): g.yas kyi brkyang bskum tshul gyis ni/ /gnon pa'i mnan pas bsdigs byas te/ /mi phyed sbyor bas bskul bya ba/ /khros pa'i sems kyis myang bar bya/ /g.yon pa'i
45a5(rgyud): brkyang bskum sbyar bar bya/ /myur du mnan pas bteg bya zhing / /mthe'u chung bde ba'i lcags kyu yis/ /mdzub mo lce la reg byas te/ /sa bon tsheg drag hrI ldan pa'i//
45a6(rgyud): thig le'i spyi bor brgyan byas pas/ /bdud rtsi'am rig ma drang bar bya/ /lce yi thog mar spro byas te/ /'dren pa'i tshul gyis drang bar bya/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin mnyam gzhag
45a7(rgyud): ste| |kha yi phyogs su mche ba yis/ /sbom po lce dang 'dra byas te/ /khros pa mche ba sbyor ba yis/ /sor mo thod pa bzhin byas nas/ /khrag mang po ni btung bar bya/ /yi ge dang
45b1(rgyud): po oM dang ldan/ /spyi bor thig le ldan byas te/ /'og gi phyogs su ra yis gdags/ /u 'dren pa ros brgyan par bya/ /'di ni kho bo'i snying po ste/ /mchog tu thams cad las byed
45b2(rgyud): pa'o| |gsod pa dang ni 'dren pa kun/ /dbang dang dbang rnams byed la sogs/ /de la sogs pa'i las gzhan yang / /tshul bzhin sbyar bas byed par 'gyur/ /shi ba bzhin du
45b3(rgyud): mig btsums nas/ /rang gi lus ni bskum byas te/ /bum pa lnga mtha'i sbyor ba yi/ /dgra rnams thams cad gsad par bya/ /nga ro dang po yang dag ldan/ /bdag nyid ngo bo thams
45b4(rgyud): cad bya/ /sangs rgyas chen po bsgoms byas te/ /zhi ba'i 'od zer sprin phung spro/ /de yi lus ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /de yi sems can thams cad kyi/ /tsha ba gdon dang dug la sogs//
45b5(rgyud): sdug bsngal mkha' 'gro'i mche ba dang / /'jigs pa thams cad bral bar byed/ /shes rab pha rol phyin mnyam gzhag /bdag nyid kyis ni tshul bzhin du/ /'di yis
45b6(rgyud): thams cad nang gi rnams/ /sdug bsngal dogs par 'phrog par byed/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa/ /nam mkha' sa steng las kyi rnams/ /snying gar rdo rje sems dpa'
45b7(rgyud): bzhag / yid bzhin thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /myur du rdo rje slob dpon la/ /sngags kyi dngos grub don 'dod pas/ /gus la zhes sar bcas pa yi/ /shin tu lhag pa
46a1(rgyud): @#/ /phyogs par bya/ /nam yang rdo rje slob dpon gyi/ /sems ni dkrug par mi bya ste/ /ci ste shes rab 'chal phas byed/ /myur du na raka lhung bar 'gyur/ /
46a2(rgyud): nad dang 'tshe ba dgra dag dang / /gdon dang tsha ba dug nyid kyis/ /slob dpon zhabs la smod byed pa/ /gti mug chen por de 'chi'o/ /bla ma las ni dngos grub 'thob/ /bla ma
46a3(rgyud): mtho ris bla ma bde/ /de bas nan tan thams cad kyi/ /bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag
46a4(rgyud): p o kun tu bzang po chen po dpal shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje dam tshig
46a5(rgyud): dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje mchog gsang ba sbas pa chen po zla gsang
46a6(rgyud): thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor te bzhi pa'o/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das
46a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rnal 'byor pha dang / rnal 'byor ma dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs dang
46b1(rgyud): rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs kyi g.yog rnams mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes te/ ca co 'byin cing dbyangs chen po brjod par gyur
46b2(rgyud): to| |kye ma'o rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che/ /sna tshogs thabs ni bde byed che/ /sna tshogs ye shes bde ba che/ /kye ma kun tu bzang po yi/ /dge ba'i ye
46b3(rgyud): shes bde ba che/ /gang bde phyir ni rig ma yi/ /pad+mo las ni gnas pa mdzad/ /kye ma'o rig pa shin tu zab/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa bde/ /sems can kun la shes rab
46b4(rgyud): kyi| |mun pa'i thibs po sel bar mdzad/ /kye ma'o thams cad ngo mtshar che/ /mkha' 'gro'i dra bas gar mdzad cing / /snom par mdzad dang myang ba dang / /mnye ba dang ni
46b5(rgyud): 'phrog pa'i mchog / e ma'o shin tu rab tu dgyes/ /skal ldan skal la sprod pa dang / /sna tshogs skal bas bde byed che/ /sna tshogs rdo rje shin tu mdzes/ /de nas
46b6(rgyud): b com ldan 'das kun tu bzang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po kun tu longs spyod pa'i 'dod pa'i lha shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen po la gnas pa la rnal 'byor ma
46b7(rgyud): thams cad dang / mchog gi pha rol phyin ma la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo thams cad rang gi gdan las bzhengs te/ shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen
47a1(rgyud): @#/ /po'i 'gying ba'i 'dud pas phyag byas te/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba 'thob par byed pa'i dbyangs kyi phyag rgya chen po 'dis mnyes
47a2(rgyud): bar byed do/ /sgyu ma'i bde bas nam mkha' kun tu gang ba yi/ /sprul pa'i rang bzhin skye ba mchog gi bde bsten te/ /rjes su chags pa'i pad+ma dga' bas kun khyab
47a3(rgyud): cing / /chos kyi bde ba nyid kyang kun tu btang snyoms mdzad/ /e ma'o/ /'di lta'i gzugs ma bde mchog dpal dang rnam ldan ma/ /byams ma'i phyogs su mi gtong ye shes
47a4(rgyud): nyid kyis 'jug / 'dod pa'i yon tan 'di rnams chos nyid rnam par dag /dug gsum dbang du mdzad cing mos pa rnams mi bskyod/ /ngo mtshar phyogs dang ma bral byang
47a5(rgyud): chub snying por bgrod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i spyan rgyas pas 'khor de dag thams cad la yud tsam kun tu gzigs te/ rdo rje
47a6(rgyud): pad+mo dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i dpal chen mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te cang mi gsung bar mnyam par zhugs te/ dbugs mi rdub/
47a7(rgyud): dbugs mi byin/ dbugs rab tu gtong bar mi mdzad/ /kun tu mi gzigs/ kun tu rnam par mi gzigs/ bzhengs par mi mdzad/ bzhugs par mi mdzad/ gshegs
47b1(rgyud): par mi mdzad/ gsung bar yang mi mdzad/ rnam par rtog pa'ang mi mdzad/ de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shin tu bde ba chen pos nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad shin tu
47b2(rgyud): khyab par shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba las btsal te rgyas par mdzad pa na/ der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad drangs bcug bcings dbang du byas te/ 'dod pa lnga'i
47b3(rgyud): yon tan gyis mnyes par byas te bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'du ba mdzad nas/ yang nas yang bcom ldan 'das
47b4(rgyud): la gzigs te/ bde ba chen po shin tu dgyes pa dang / gnyis su med par longs spyod pa dpal chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bskul nas bcom
47b5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems chen po la'ang thim par gyur pa na/ khams gsum 'dir dam pa'i chos ston pa dang / 'jug par byed/ bstan pa la
47b6(rgyud): gnas par byed pa 'ga' yang med/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun 'jug par byed pa'ang med/ khros pa dang / gtum po chen po dang / rngam pa dang / rab tu gdug pa
47b7(rgyud): chen por sems pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mun pas bsgribs pa dang / gtum 'khrug chen po dang / gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa dang / gzhan gyi sems
48a1(rgyud): @#/ /'phrog pa dang / gzhan gyi bud med kyis 'chums pa dang / chig rtsub mo la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pas gzhan la gtses
48a2(rgyud): pa dang / gcig gi sha gcig gis za ba dang / thabs med pa'i lam la gnas pa rnams kyis/ kye ma'o/ /'jig rten gsum po 'di brlag go /zhes sngon gyi smon lam las kyi
48a3(rgyud): stobs la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gzigs so/ /thabs dang / shes rab kyi thugs rje'i smon lam chen po nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu yang dag par
48a4(rgyud): gnas pa 'di lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu brlag par gzigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i
48a5(rgyud): bde ba yang dag par zhugs pa kun tu bzang po chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'dis bskul ba mdzad do/ /hoHrang bzhin dag pa dag pa
48a6(rgyud): pad+ma bde ba'i mchog mnga' ba/ /thugs kyi yid bzhin rin chen gzhan la dgongs nas bzhengs mdzad de/ /bskal pa mtha' nas bsgrubs pa'i byams pas gzugs
48a7(rgyud): kyis brjid pa dang / /byang chub snying po'i chu des 'gro ba rnams kyi rang bzhin khrus/ /a la la la ho/ pad+mo'i 'byung gnas bde gshegs kun gyi skal ba mchog dang ldan/ /sdug
48b1(rgyud): bsngal nad kun sel ba'i thugs rjes 'jig rten gsum la gzigs/ /dga' ba'i rol pas gar dang bcas te bzhengs shing dbang du mdzod/ /a la la la ho/ sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams
48b2(rgyud): kyis ma bsgrags gsang ba yi/ /'gro ba kun gyi yid dang 'thad pa'i gsang chen 'di phyung ste/ /rnam dag spyod yul gzhan gyi mi 'phrogs nam mkha' la/ /dngos med rol mo'i
48b3(rgyud): gzhan las 'phang pa bzhengs shing mdzad du gsol/ /a la la la ho/ skad cig ma yi spyod yul 'dis/ /mun pa thams cad sel ba'i phyir/ /gzhan la thugs rjes
48b4(rgyud): dgongs nas su/ /lha rnams byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /dgyes mchog dam pa bskul byas na/ /pad+mo dra ba rdo rje dang / /bde bar sbyor bar
48b5(rgyud): bzhengs su gsol/ /bde ba chen po bde gnas pa/ /gtso la 'di yis bskul ba yis/ /sems can kun don bzhengs 'gyur te/ /rgyal ba thams cad gdon par mdzad/ /de nas
48b6(rgyud): b com ldan 'das bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po dpal rdo rje 'dzin yang dag pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba chen pos brgyan pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
48b7(rgyud): par zhugs te/ bzhengs nas phyogs bcu mtha' yas rab 'byams mthas klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun gzigs nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ kye ma'o khams gsum
49a1(rgyud): @#/ /'di stongs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po rnams dang bral bas gdug pa thams cad kyis 'di dag nye bar gtses/ /gnod
49a2(rgyud): sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dang / nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / gdon chen po dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par zos zhes dgongs pa na/
49a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gtong ba'i rdo rje ye shes kyi bde ba chen po dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi
49a4(rgyud): sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes bde ba chen po'i rang gi rdo rje dang / pad+mo las byang chub kyi sems nye bar bsdu bar bya ste/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las
49a5(rgyud): phyung ngo / / //thog mar oM ni thig ler bsam byas pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bcas pa 'brug gi sgra 'byin pa/ /mi phyed 'dren pa yang dag gnyis dang ldan pa
49a6(rgyud): ste| |'di ni ston pa'i mchog ste rdo rje'i rigs nyid do/ /phyung nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du gang ba'i spro bas snang bar byas te/ slar yang 'dus nas rdo rje lta bur gnas
49a7(rgyud): so| |yang spro ba dang / bsdu ba byas nas slar 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje sems dpa' lta bur gyur nas/ shar gyi
49b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs par gyur pa na/ hUM hUM hUM zhes bzhad pa chen por bzhad cing a zhes brjod nas bzhugs te/ rang gi sems dpa'i skyil mos g.yon du yid tsam
49b2(rgyud): 'gying bas 'dud pa/ g.yas kyi rdo rje gsor zhing 'dzum dang bcas shing spyan rgyas pa/ che ba'i chen po dbu lnga pa/ /phyag ni bcu drug rnams dang ldan/ /sna tshogs sku ni mchog 'dzin
49b3(rgyud): pa| |dpa' bo thams cad las byed pa/ /kha dog rnam lnga gzi brjid che/ /mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzin/ /rdo rje sgyur mar rab tu gnas/ /mkhas pa gang gis snying ga nyid/ /
49b4(rgyud): mnyam par bzhag ste 'dzin byas na/ /rdo rje pad+mo bde che yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde myur 'thob/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkhar 'gro ma kun longs spyod pa'i dpal
49b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las mchog tu gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zla gsang thig
49b6(rgyud): le las/ nam mkha' shin tu dgyes pa 'thob par byed pa'i bde ba chen po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di phyung ngo // //oM yig gtsug
49b7(rgyud): tu thig le ste/ /mi phyed thig ler bcas pa yi/ /'og tu gzi brjid yang dag bcas/ /mthar ni dral te chog drag bcas/ /'dir ni rin chen thams cad kyi/ /snying po mchog tu rmad byung
50a1(rgyud): @#/ /ba'o/ /phyung ba yis ni nam mkha' dang / /sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun tu/ /'od zer sprin phung rgyas byas te/ /slar yang de nyid bzhugs par 'gyur/ /de yi thugs
50a2(rgyud): kar zhugs nas kyang / /brda yi tshul gyis bzhugs par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bskur nas/ /sems dpa'i tshul gyis sprul pa ni/ /kha dog rnam lnga yangs pa'i
50a3(rgyud): spyan/ /chu skyes bzhad pa 'dzum dang bcas/ /nyi ma'i gzi brjid mdzes pa che/ /phyag rgya la sogs sna tshogs brgyan/ /skyil mo 'gying ba g.yon du 'dud/ /g.yas kyi snying
50a4(rgyud): gar rin chen 'dzin/ /brgyad gnyis phyag rgya ngo bo yis/ /dri ma gsum spangs brgyan pa ste/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor gang byas nas/ /sna tshogs lho ru gnas par 'gyur//
50a5(rgyud): rnam pa kun mkhyen mngon rig pa'i/ /nad kyis glongs pa 'jigs par 'gyur/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gzi brjid chen mo mdangs che ba/ /dbul dang
50a6(rgyud): nad dang gdon chen po/ /sems can kun gyi 'phrog par byed/ /nyi ma 'char ba'i dus nyid dang / /nyi ma phyed pa'i dus nyid du/ /nyid kyi snying gar 'di byas te/ /nor bu rin
50a7(rgyud): chen bsgoms byas na/ /zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang / /dngos grub nor mang sbyin mdzad de/ /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /kye ma'o bde bas dbang bskur bya//
50b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po mchog tu bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa'i 'dod ba'i dbang gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
50b2(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs te/ pad+mo chen po kun tu gzigs pa'i longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i snying po chen po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi ye shes mchog tu gsang
50b3(rgyud): bzla gsang thig le las 'di phyung ngo / / //dang por oM dang ldan byas te/ /mi phyed rab btags 'dren pa bcas/ /tsheg drag pa ni sngags yin te/ /bsam pa thams
50b4(rgyud): cad yongs su bskor/ /sngags mkhan gang gis mnyam gzhag ste/ /snying gar 'di ni sbyar byas nas/ /bdag ni 'dod chags zhen sems shing / /pad+mo sbyar bas bsgom par bya//
50b5(rgyud): mtshams kyi mtha' ma dus dag tu/ /dam tshig 'di ni spyad byas na/ /zla ba phyed kyi nang logs su/ /dbang phyug mo ni dngos grub 'thob/ /pad+mo che las byung nas kyang / /thams cad du ni
50b6(rgyud): rgyas 'gyur te/ /'di nyid du ni slar zhugs nas/ /pad+mo'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur/ /kun tu snang bas khyab byas nas/ /sems dpa'i tshul gyis sprul pa ni/ /de nas 'dod chags
50b7(rgyud): babs nas kyang / /pad+mo'i dbus su zhugs par gyur/ /dkyil 'khor du ni gang ba yis/ /rgyab nas rjes su mnyes mdzad cing / /'dzum bcas pad+mo phye ba yis/ /thugs kyi dbus
51a1(rgyud): @#/ /su yid tsam 'dud/ /dpal dang ldan pa zhal lnga 'dzin/ /phyag ni nyi shur bzhis ma gtams/ /mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs ldan/ /sna tshogs rgyan
51a2(rgyud): gyis klubs pa yis/ /zla ba bzhin du rnam grol ba/ /brjid pas gar ni mdzad cing bzhugs/ /'di yis pad+mo'i gnas nyid du/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur/ /dpal
51a3(rgyud): ldan gar dbang thob 'gyur te/ /'dod chags kun gyi thabs gnas pas/ /'jam pa'i phyag ni stong rnams kyis/ /gar du mdzad cing 'gro ba 'dul/ /de nas bcom ldan
51a4(rgyud): ' das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen po kun tu bzang pos yang sna tshogs chen po kun tu longs spyod pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
51a5(rgyud): par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i ye shes mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le chen po las phyung ngo // //sna tshogs chen po
51a6(rgyud): o chen po/ /steng du thig ler yang dag ldan/ /'di ni dbus te lta 'og khro/ /sngags kyi mchog ni gzhag par bya/ /sna tshogs 'di ni thugs kar grags/ /sna tshogs
51a7(rgyud): phyung nas kun snang bas/ /sangs rgyas tshul bzhin kun mnyes byas/ /de nyid slar 'khor rab bzhugs te/ /sna tshogs rdo rje gzugs mchog gnas/ /skad cig sems
51b1(rgyud): dpa' sku gnas pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bzhad pas brgyan/ /'gying bcas thugs kar sna tshogs 'dzin/ /sna tshogs gzi brjid 'bar ba gtong / /phyag ni brgyad gnyis gnyis
51b2(rgyud): kyis phyogs/ /kha byed sna tshogs mtshon cha gtong / /zhal lnga sna tshogs yangs che ba/ /bgegs spong thams cad dngos grub mdzad/ /dkyil 'khor gang bar bzhag nas byang
51b3(rgyud): du gnas/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bdag mor rdo rje yang dag gis/ /thugs kar mdzad nas bde bar yang dag gnas/ /sngags mkhan zhag bdun nyid du bsgom byas na/ /sna tshogs gyur
51b4(rgyud): te sna tshogs de la bab/ /sna tshogs las ni sna tshogs byed par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dbyangs chen
51b5(rgyud): po len cing dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus kyi bcom ldan 'das la mnyes pa mdzad do/ /gtso bo byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/ /ye shes lnga yi ngo bo dag /rgyal ba nyid kyis
51b6(rgyud): bshad par mdzod/ /sangs rgyas sku la bstod phyag 'tshal/ /sngags rigs phyag rgya yan lag bcas/ /lha yi de nyid pha rol phyin/ /bdag ni de nyid sna tshogs che/ /sna tshogs
51b7(rgyud): ye shes bstod phyag 'tshal/ /gzungs kyi pad+mo yang dag ldan/ /'dod byed thugs kyi mchog yin te/ /shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba/ /sbyor ba'i ye shes bstod phyag 'tshal/ /
52a1(rgyud): @#/ /chos kyi don ni gnyis med tshul/ /stong pa nyid kyi lam rig pa/ /yangs pa'i spyan ni so sor gzigs/ /me long ye shes yang dag 'byung / /bya ba nan
52a2(rgyud): tan sems can don/ /rang gi yon tan mi mnyam shod/ /de nyid rig pas sems can kun/ /rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlabs pa/ /gang gis byin gyis brlabs ma thag /sangs
52a3(rgyud): rgyas gsum ni dbang du 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po gnyis su med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rje ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
52a4(rgyud): par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'bru 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo / /oM b+h+ruM/ stong pa
52a5(rgyud): chen po'i snying po'o/ /oM badzra tsit+ta hUM/ oM badzra kA ya oM/ oM badzra wA ka AHoM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/ oM badzra sa ma ya hoHde nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
52a6(rgyud): pa thams cad shin tu mgu/ rab tu dgyes pa'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang rang
52a7(rgyud): rang gi snying po bcom ldan 'das la 'bul lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dge'o zhes bde ba chen po'i
52b1(rgyud): tshul gyis rab tu spro bar mdzad do/ /dge'o dge'o rgyal ba kun/ /dge'o dge'o rgyal ba mchog /dge'o dge'o legs pa'i las/ /dge'o dge'o sngon 'gro ba/ /dge'o dge'o sna
52b2(rgyud): tshogs che/ /nyid kyi snying gar drangs byas te/ /rang gi gsang ba bshad par mdzod/ /gang gis ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams/ /bde ba'i yid ni chud par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom
52b3(rgyud): ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje chen po de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na
52b4(rgyud): badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma kou0f85haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das me long gi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sar+b+ba
52b5(rgyud): ta thA ga ta a de ra Sha dz+nyA na badzra sa b+hA wa At+ma kou0f85haM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa so sor kun tu gzigs pa'i ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku
52b6(rgyud): dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta mahA pra t+ya pra pa k+Sha dz+nyA na badzra swA b+hA wa At+ma kou0f85haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje de
52b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA sa man+tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma kou0f85haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
53a1(rgyud): @#/ /bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sarba ta thA ga kr-i t+ya
53a2(rgyud): a nu Sh+Tha na dz+nyA na badzra swA b+hA wa At+ma kou0f85haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos yang dge ba'i tshul sbyin par mdzad de/ oM| dge'o dge'o stong pa che/ /
53a3(rgyud): oM| dge'o dge'o thugs chen po/ /oM| dge'o dge'o sku chen po/ /oM| dge'o dge'o gsung chen po/ /oM| dge'o dge'o rin po che'o/ /dge'o dge'o sna tshogs che/ /de nas
53a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'du ba mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das la rang gi dkyil 'khor bshad par gsol ba 'debs te/ dkyil 'khor
53a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas rdo rje yi/ /dga' byed bcom ldan nyid kyis shod/ /gang gis sems can bde nyid kyis/ /dkyil 'khor rab tu thob par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhes
53a6(rgyud): bgyi ba/ /rgyal ba'i bdag pos gsang ba gsungs/ /gang gis dkyil 'khor myur bris nas/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni rgyan du 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor bde ba'i gzhi nyid ni/ /gsang
53a7(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor brgyan pa'i bdag nyid de/ /gsang ba bcom ldan nyid kyis gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor mnyam pa'i ye shes ni/ /dkyil 'khor snying
53b1(rgyud): po zhes bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni ci rigs par/ /gtso bo chen po nyid kyis shod/ /dkyil 'khor mi mnyam ye shes ni/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba pad+mo ste/ /dkyil 'khor rab
53b2(rgyud): dgyes 'thob byed pa'i/ /tshad med dkyil 'khor bshad par mdzod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po rab tu dga' ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i 'byung gnas
53b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung
53b4(rgyud): ngo / /gzugs dang lang tshos brgyan pa yi/ /bu mo mig yangs bzung bya ste/ /shes rab can gyis byin rlabs 'brus/ /mnyam par gzhag ste byin brlabs nas/ /shes rab
53b5(rgyud): pha rol phyin pa'i bdag / de bzhin gshegs kyi btsun mo bzhag /gnyis po mdun du bzhag byas pa/ /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa'i gnas/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i
53b6(rgyud): btsun mo ste/ /thugs ni dgyes par byed pa yin/ /gsum pa lho ru bsam bya ba/ /dge ba sbyin pa'i bdag nyid bzhag /rin chen 'byung ldan btsun mo che/ /dbang
53b7(rgyud): bskur yon tan 'thob byed pa'o/ /bzhi pa tshul khrims chen mo ste/ /de nyid chos don yang dag gnas/ /rdo rje chos kyi btsun mo ste/ /de sbyin dga' byed ma yin no/ /
54a1(rgyud): @#/ /bzod pa chen mo byang du ste/ /bsod pa'i bdag nyid zad pa sbyin/ /btsun mo rdo rje gdon mi za/ /dam tshig gnas ni skyong byed ma'i/ /grwa dag
54a2(rgyud): tu ni thams cad du/ /snga ma bzhin du mchod la sogs/ /sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /sgo srung rnams ni rnam par bzhi/ /ci 'dod par ni mchod bya ste/ /slob ma mchog ni
54a3(rgyud): gzhug par bya/ /phyag rgyas lag pa brgyan byas te/ /'dzum dang bcas pa'i 'dod chags mig /rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par klubs/ /spro ba che bas gar bya zhing / /lha yi 'gying
54a4(rgyud): ba'i 'dun pa yis/ /dga' byed dkyil 'khor gzhug par bya/ /mig ni dar gyi gos nyid kyis/ /g.yogs te lag pas bzung nas kyang / /sgo yi grwa ra yang gzhag
54a5(rgyud): bya ste/ /smon lam mchog ni smra ru gzhug /rdo rje chen po bdag ces bgyi/ /rang gi lha rnams phyag bgyi ste/ /rang dgyes gnas las byung ba yi/ /bde byed
54a6(rgyud): chen mos mnyes par bgyi/ /ji ltar bzhin du mnyam nyid 'thob/ /me tog phreng ba dor byas te/ /lha mo chen mo bzhes su gsol/ /khyod kyi dkyil 'khor bdag
54a7(rgyud): 'tshal lo/ /lha mo gang la lhung ba yi/ /de yi lag nas bskor ba bya/ /lha mo 'di ni khyod dang mthun/ /sems che khyod kyis 'dod par gyis/ /de nas slob ma de yis ni/ /bdag
54b1(rgyud): rab dgyes smra bya zhing / /de la 'dod pa spyad par mdzod/ /khro bo rnams kyi mi phyed phaDa/ /mtha' ni hoHzhes sbyar bar bya/ /'byung ba'i dus su bya ba ni/ /a ho su kha bde zhes smra/ /
54b2(rgyud): nas rdo rje phyung ba yi/ /mkhas pas de ni blang byas te/ /bde ba chen po dngos grub rdzas/ /bla ma la ni dang por dbul/ /de nas de nyid kun la yang / /ci bde bar ni dbul bar bya/ /spyi
54b3(rgyud): lam zhabs la btugs byas te/ /bla ma la ni dbang blang bya/ /shin tu sbas pa'i 'phags pa'i dbang / /bcom ldan bdag la stsal bar mdzod/ /de nas sbyor ba chen po yi/ /snyoms par
54b4(rgyud): zhugs te bde ba/ /slob dpon rdo rje phyung byas te/ /spyi bor rab tu gzhag par bya/ /lag pa yis ni ma reg par/ /kha la rab tu sbyin par bya/ /khyad par du ni drang byas te/ /ci bde bar ni btung
54b5(rgyud): bar bya/ /gzungs ma de dag thams cad la/ /rdo rje yis ni sbyin par bya/ /de nas slob ma mchog nyid kyi/ /bla ma la ni yon dbul bya/ /ma dang sring mo bu mo dang / /chung ma dang ni rang
54b6(rgyud): gi bu/ /bdag nyid dang ni rgyal srid dang / /de bzhin longs spyod dbang phyug dang / /rdzas dang nor dang gter rnams dang / /glang po rta dang shing rta dag /bla ma la ni yon
54b7(rgyud): mchog ste/ /dga' ba'i yid 'gyur dbul bar bya/ /phyi yi sbas la gsang ba dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / /rdo rje dang ni gzungs ma'i rnams/ /'dod
55a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa'i dngos grub dri bar bya/ /snying po yang dag shes gyur nas/ /dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/
55a2(rgyud): gsang ba yi ni dkyil 'khor 'di/ /ci ste rmongs pas smra byas na/ /slob dpon gyi ni dam tshig nyams/ /myur du zla phyed tshun chad du/ /bstan pas rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/
55a3(rgyud): dang por dam tshig gzhag byas te/ /phyi nas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya/ /gzhan du byas na dpa' bo'i rnams/ /dmyal bar bskal bar grangs med smin/ /de bas blo ldan rdo rje
55a4(rgyud): yis| |nan tan dam tshig bsgrag mi bya/ /sngags kyi dngos grub don 'dod pas/ /dam tshig srung la brtson par bya/ /gzhan du byas na sngags mkhan gyi/ /sngags la sogs
55a5(rgyud): pa'i don mi 'grub/ /lha rnams kyang ni dam tshig gi /gsol yang bzhes su mi gnang ste/ /'jig rten 'di ru sdug bsngal che/ /'jig rten pha rol dmyal ba'i rnams/ /
55a6(rgyud): dam tshig spyod pa 'das pas so/ /rmongs pa'i bdag nyid des 'thob bo/ /slob ma de yang de bzhin du/ /blo zhan sdug bsngal 'thob 'gyur te/ /des na sngags kyi don mi
55a7(rgyud): smin| |lha rnams kyi ni mchog tu bde/ /dam tshig med pa'i slob ma la/ /nam yang sbyin par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bas dam tshig gtso yin te/ /thog mar dam tshig sbyin
55b1(rgyud): par bya/ /sngags rnams dang ni phyag rgya yang / /de bzhin thabs dang shes rab rnams/ /dam tshig de rnams thams cad kyang / /sngags pas gsang ba sbyor ba yis/ /dmyal ba ngan
55b2(rgyud): song bzlog pa'i phyir/ /bu dang slob ma sbyin par bya/ /sngags kyi dngos grub bsod nams byed/ /gtsang sbra dogs pa med par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dal/ /dkyil
55b3(rgyud): 'khor tshul bzhin bri byas te/ /gzhon nu'i tshad ni bcu drug lon/ /dam tshig slob ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /bzhag nas cho ga 'dis gzhug bya/ /dam tshig rnams ni 'di yin te/ /
55b4(rgyud): sbrang rtsi sha dang dri chen po/ /nyi ma zla ba'i blo chen dang / /rdo rje las byung chu bsgrubs rnams/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs tshul bzhin gzhag /dam tshig yi ge bzhag pa yis/ /
55b5(rgyud): myur du dam tshig 'grub byas na/ /dga' byed dam tshig dngos grub ste/ /dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur/ /dam tshig 'di ni sna tshogs te/ /'dzin pa yis ni mthu ru
55b6(rgyud): 'gyur| |ma 'ongs sangs rgyas chen po dang / /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po che/ /blo ldan dbang bskur blangs pa yis/ /dbang bskur phun sum tshogs pa kun/ /sangs rgyas kun
55b7(rgyud): gyis 'thob 'gyur te/ /dbang bskur ba yi yid du 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje ye shes chen po zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i dkyil
56a1(rgyud): @#/ /'khor te lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu dgyes pa chen po yid bde bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das
56a2(rgyud): la gsol ba 'debs so/ /gdug pa thams cad rnam 'dul ba/ /'jigs par byed pa chen po 'di/ /rdo rje khro bo chen po yi/ /dkyil 'khor chen po rnam bshad phyir/ /'jigs
56a3(rgyud): byed chen po rnam 'dul ba/ /dkyil 'khor rdo rje thams cad kyi/ /khro bo'i dam tshig ded dpon gyi/ /gsang ba chen po nyid kyis shod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen
56a4(rgyud): po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dren pa'i khro bo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
56a5(rgyud): thugs rdo rje ye shes las 'di phyung ngo / /oM badzra mahA tsaN+DA sar+b+ba duSh+TaM ta ga ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaDa/ 'di phyung ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
56a6(rgyud): 'di thams cad khro bo chen po'i mthus rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ /kun tu g.yos/ lha dang / klu dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'i lding dang / mi'am ci
56a7(rgyud): dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad 'khrugs pa chen por gyur to/ /de nas 'jigs pa chen pos nyen pas de dag brgya byin gyi thad du
56b1(rgyud): lhags nas brgya byin bdag nyid kyang skyabs med par mthong nas changs pa'i thad du phyin/ /tshangs pa yang gtogs 'dod kyi gan du phyin/ /gtogs 'ded kyang dbang phyug chen
56b2(rgyud): po'i thad du phyin te/ de nas dbang phyug chen po bdag nyid kyi mthu 'jigs byed chen po'i gzugs su byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad rang gi rdzu 'phrul
56b3(rgyud): gyi mthus kun tu snang bar byas te/ lha rnams ma 'jigs shig /klu rnams ma 'jigs shig /gnod sbyin rnams ma 'jigs shig /lha ma yin rnams ma 'jigs shig /
56b4(rgyud): dri za rnams ma 'jigs shig /lha dang / 'jig rten du bcas pa rnams ma 'jigs shig /nga'i rdzu 'phrul gyis khyad par 'di lta bu gzhan 'gas kyang rab tu brdzi nus sam/
56b5(rgyud): khyed rnams ci dgar spyod pas mnos shig ces dbugs phyung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzi brjid dpal zhes bya
56b6(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i khro gnyer chen po zhes bya ba/ khro bo chen po'i snying po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
56b7(rgyud): thugs rdo rje ye shes las phyung ngo / /oM badzra b+h+r-i ku Ti/ mahA kro d+ha ha na ha na/ gr-ih+na gr-ih+na/ mA ra mA ra/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM/ b+h+r-i b+h+r-i/ brah+ma ya brah+ma ya/ b+hi ku
57a1(rgyud): @#/ /n+yan sar+b+ba mA rA na sar+b+ba du Sh+TAM/ ma Ta ma Ta/ mo Ta mo Ta/ hUM g+h+r-IM/ hUM trAM/ tra Ta tra Ta/ b+h+r-i hUM hr-i hUM traM traDa/ 'di brjod ma thag tu de dag snga ma bzhin du
57a2(rgyud): skrag nas dbang phyug chen po'i thad du nye bar lhags so/ /de nas dbang phyug snga ma bzhin du bdag gi che ba nye bar ston cing gtogs 'dod la smras pa/ khyod kyang mthu che
57a3(rgyud): ba'i lha chen po ste/ gdug pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi bdag po yin na/ rang gi mthu rgya chen po'i rdzu 'phrul nye bar ston pas gdug pa de rnams dbugs dbyung bar
57a4(rgyud): mdzod cig / de nas gtogs 'dod de ma thag tu rang gi mthu 'jigs byed kyi gzugs 'khor lo'i nag po chen por bsgyur nas rdo rje'i skad drag po chen po'i bgang ba'i
57a5(rgyud): gdangs 'byin pas 'jig rten thams cad la nye bar ston cing gnas par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po'ang khro bo chen po'i pad+mo 'byung ba
57a6(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu pad+mo'i dra ba 'char ba'i khro bo thams cad slar ldog ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs
57a7(rgyud): kar bzhugs so/ /zhugs nas khro bo chen po'i snying por bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i thugs ka nas
57b1(rgyud): phyung ngo / /oM pad+ma mahA dz+wa la mahA kro d+ha ba ta ba mu kha kha kha/ sar+b+ba duSh+TaM/ khA hi khA hi sarba du Sh+TAM pra du Sh+TaM naM/ da ma da ma/ badzra daMSh+To da ka Ta mahA ma Ta ma Ta/ k+Sho TA k+Sho TA/ badzra kha ra/
57b2(rgyud): tsa pa la du rga be ba/ tra sa tra sa/ mahA badzra ba Da ba mu kha pra ma tha pra ma tha hUM phaDa/ hrI ha ha hi hiM/ tsa turmu kha/ be sha prA Na sha na/ hUM hrIM hUM hUM d+hIHha/ de nas 'di gsungs ma
57b3(rgyud): thag tu tshangs ris chen po 'dar ye yed zhing kha bub tu 'gyel te/ brdab 'chos so/ /de nas tshangs pa chen po ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dbang phyug chen po la dris pa/ lha|

64a1(rgyud): @#/ /bar gyur pa yi/ /gtso bo bdag cag dbang bskur ba/ /bde ba chen pos stsal du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa
64a2(rgyud): chen pos de dag gis gsol ba'i tshig nye bar gsan nas mnyam pa nyid kyi bde ba'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhugs ma thag
64a3(rgyud): tu bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba dang / yid bde ba sgrub pa'i thabs mang po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ste/ bde ba chen po'i spro ba'i 'phrul chen
64a4(rgyud): po'i lha'i 'khor thams cad dbang bskur te/ de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha chen po de dag bde ba chen po'i spro ba'i cho 'phrul gyis dbang bskur
64a5(rgyud): bas yid bde bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang dang / yang du gtugs nas bskor ba byas te/ ji lta ba bzhin du kun du yongs su bskor nas gnas
64a6(rgyud): so| |de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pas yang rdo rje gzungs ma shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen mo'i dam tshig dang / sbyor
64a7(rgyud): ba'i thabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ cang mi gsung bar bzhugs nas/ de ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro mo
64b1(rgyud): dbang mo chen mo zhes bya ba nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta mahA badzra kro d+he shwa ri sar+b+ba duSh+TA ni/ mu dra Ni/ mahA pa la yA na la sh+ma shA na b+hI Sha Ne /
64b2(rgyud): badzra mahA kro d+ha daMSh+TA ka rA la kri ta pa da ne/ sar+b+ba shatruM/ pra sha ma ni/ hUM hUM mahA kro d+he shwa ri hUM phaT phaT/ 'dis ji lta ba bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas/ dbus kyi dkyil
64b3(rgyud): 'khor du bzhag ste/ dpung pa bcu drug la phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa/ zhal gsum pa/ mdog in+d+ra nI la'i 'od 'bar ba 'dra ba/ rdo rje dang / thod
64b4(rgyud): pa'i 'khor ba dang / thod pa dang / mdung dang / sta gri dang / zhags pa dang / rtse gsum pa dang / pe con dang / mu su ra dang / 'khor lo dang / ka na ya dang / to ma ya dang
64b5(rgyud): gzhu dang / mda' dang / shak+ti dang / gri rnams phyag na 'dzin pa/ thod pa'i phreng bas dbu rgyan byas pa/ nyi ma brgya dang / me'i 'od 'dra ba'o/ /de'i mdun du rdo rje khrag 'thung
64b6(rgyud): chen mo de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang / cha lugs 'dzin pa rig pa 'dis gzhag par bya'o/ /oM mahA badzra d+ha ra mahA kro d+he shwa ri mahA sh+ma sha na b+hI Sha Ne ni lA dz+wA las ha sra pra dz+wa la ti
64b7(rgyud): mU rti d+he re ka pA la mA lA/ b+hU Shi ta ma gu te/ nar du ti ra ra tra/ pa ri bu ri/ ta ka pA la/ aste kha T+wAM ga /badzra tri shu la gan+d+ha mahA kro d+he na/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ he he run+ta mun+ta/
65a1(rgyud): @#/ /pri ye hUM phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo chen po'i gzi brjid chen po'i mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
65a2(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje nyi ma khro mo'i dbang mo chen mo nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM hUM traM mahA sUr+ya badzra kro d+ha shwa ri bi d+ha ma/ ma tha ma tha
65a3(rgyud): grwa sa grwa sa/ sar+b+ba duSh+TAM/ pra duSh+TAM hUM phaT/ oM hUM traM traM/ tra tra tra/ khro mo chen mo 'di lho phyogs kyi rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor du gzhag par bya ste/ gzi brjid
65a4(rgyud): chen por rab gtong zhing / /shin tu 'jigs pa me bzhin 'bar/ /dpung pa bcu drug rno ba ste/ /dbu rgyan thod pas brtseg par bya/ /spyan ni rab dmar sngo bsangs
65a5(rgyud): mdog / mtshon cha'i tshogs na bsnams par brtson/ /gdug pa thams cad 'cha' byed cing / /yi dwags chen po'i stan la zhon/ /rang gi g.yog gis mdun du bskor//
65a6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+mo 'byung gnas bkod pa'i 'od kyi phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ pad+ma'i dra ba khro mo'i dbang mo nyid
65a7(rgyud): kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM hrIHbadzra pad+ma mahA ban+d+ha mu khe/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ mahA ma ho/ d+ha ra bi ko pe hUM he hUM hUM ha ha/ hUM hUM hrIH/ hi sha
65b1(rgyud): hi sha| mahA badzra ba da ba mu la mi ho t+yo t+ye/ hUM hUM/ hi hi hUM hrIHhUM/ dkyil 'khor nang gi dbus nyid du/ /'di ni rgyab tu gzhag par bya/ /rno ba chen po zhal gsum pa/ /rta
65b2(rgyud): gdong gyen du sten pa ste/ /khro mo chen mo dpung bcu drug /rnam par bsgyur ba'i mi sdug gdong / /mi ro'i rta la yang dag zhon/ /khrag mang po la 'thung byed pa/ /mtshon cha sna
65b3(rgyud): tshogs 'dzin pa ste/ /khros pa'i dbu rgyan thod pas brtsegs/ /'od zer rnon po gtong byed cing / /g.yog bcas dkyil 'khor brgyan te gnas/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
65b4(rgyud): yang gdon mi za ba'i ye shes khro mo gnyis su med par 'du ba'i thabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gdon mi za ba'i drag po dang ldan ma chen mo zhes bya
65b5(rgyud): ba khros pa'i dbang mo chen mo 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sar+b+ba a mo g+ha mahA bi shwa shwa ri hUM hUM hUM/ haM haM haM/ mahA kro d+he gu mu khe/ mahA bi shwe
65b6(rgyud): ba da ri Ni/ sar+b+ba duSh+TA pra sha ma ni hUM hUM phaT/ 'di nyid kyis ni ci rigs par/ /rdo rje gdon mi za ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor g.yog bcas rnam pa bzhi/ /sna tshogs dam tshig
65b7(rgyud): gzhag byas te/ /sna tshogs gzugs dang khyad par ldan/ /kun tu yongs su bskor nas gnas/ /bsnyer ba dang ni btsums pa'i gdong / /rab tu drag la ro myang zhing /
66a1(rgyud): @#/ /gdong gnyer thod pa'i rtse mor byas/ /dpung pa bcu drug gis brgyan pa'i/ /khro mo chen mo gdong gsum pa/ /za byed me bzhin lta pa yi/ /de yi ngo bo
66a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi/ /g.yog ni rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis/ /bskor bar shes rab can gyis gzhag /rang gi phyag rgya mtshan mar ldan/ /dpung pa brgyad dang ldan pa yi/ /de ni
66a3(rgyud): cho ga ji bzhin du/ /'byung mo'i phyag rgya yang dag zhon/ /dur khrod bzhin du 'jigs byed pa/ /phyi yi rnal 'byor ma tshogs rnams/ /de dag kun tu yongs su bskor
66a4(rgyud): gzhag gam bri bar bya yang rung / /de ni da lta'i stan la gnas/ /bzhin mi sdug pa dpung bzhi mo/ /gdug pa'i khro mo rnam bsgyur bcas/ /de la sogs pa'i rim par
66a5(rgyud): ldan| |mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /de nas rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo de dag bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te/ yang dang / yang rang rang gis mngon
66a6(rgyud): par gang bar byas pas mchod nas gsol ba 'debs so/ /rnal 'byor ma yi sngags tshogs dang / /phyag rgya ma ni ci rigs par/ /gsad pa'i gar ni bde chen mo//
66a7(rgyud): bcom ldan de nyid nyid kyis gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor ma thams cad rnam par spro ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
66b1(rgyud): te| rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / sbas pa dang / de kho na nyid dang / gsang ba rnams nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sar+b+ba badzra
66b2(rgyud): d+ha ra satwa a nu rA gi ni mahA kro d+he hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra A kaR+Sha Ni mahA kro d+he shwa ri hUM hUM/ dzA dzA hUM hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra ku la a nu rA ga ni mahA kro d+he shwa ri hUM he he hUM phaT/ oM
66b3(rgyud): sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ro gra mahA kro d+he shwa ri hUM swa swa hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA te dza a b+hi She ke hUM taM hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA sur+ya b+h+ri kU Te ka ro ke tra ta Ta ta hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA ke tu
66b4(rgyud): ke tu kro d+he shwa ri mahA bi dza yot+ta ye hUM hUM traM traM phaT phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA badzra kro d+ha AT+Ta A si hUM hUM triM triM To Ta ya tro Ta ya hri da ya hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA kro d+ha b+hak+Shi Ni hUM hUM b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha hUM hrIH/
66b5(rgyud): oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA tIk+Sh+Na kro d+he shwa ri ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM hUM badzra tik+Sh+Na haste ts+tshe da ya hUM hUM ma Ta ma Ta/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra tsa kra d+ha ri Ni ma ho gra du pi ni hUM hUM/ pa ta ya pa ta ya mahA badzra tsa kre Na/ tsUr+Na ya tsUr+Na ya/ hUM hUM
66b6(rgyud): phaT| oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA shwa ga pra b+ha Ni hUM hUM ma ta ma ta phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA bI shwa mu khi hUM hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA badzra pA Ni hUM hUM haM haM phaT phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA badzra yak+Shi
66b7(rgyud): Ni hUM hUM/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ A bi b+ha A bi b+ha hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA badzra b+ha ni d+ha ni mahA ke d+he/ b+han+d+ha ya b+han+d+ha ya/ oM sarba badzra d+ha ra mahA kro d+ha mahA badzra ba sh+ya pra we sha ni hUM hUM/ bi
67a1(rgyud): @#/ /ta ya bi ta ya hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra ha la da ni mahA kro d+he shwa ri hUM hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA kro d+ha mA li ni hUM hUM g+huM g+huM/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA kro
67a2(rgyud): d+he gan+d+ha ba hi hUM ga gri/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha rI mahA kro d+he shwa ri mahA lo ka d+hA ri Ni/ dI pa yaM dI pa yaM hUM hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA kro d+he shwa ri mahA lA s+ya hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA kro d+he
67a3(rgyud): mA le d+hA ri Ni hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA gI ti ni hUM he he/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA kro d+ha narti ke hUM hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya dz+dza dz+dza hUM hUM dz+dza/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA
67a4(rgyud): kro d+ha b+haM d+ha b+haM d+ha baM/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA kro d+he mahA badzra ba shi ni hUM hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha rA mahA kro d+he sh+ya sh+ye hUM ho/ oM hUM trAM hrIHAHde nas rnal 'byor ma de dag mgu rangs
67a5(rgyud): dga' bar gyur te/ yang dbyangs 'dis gsol ba 'debs so/ /bde ba mchog gi rgya chen dgongs su gsol/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bde mchog dbyings dang ldan/ /mi
67a6(rgyud): g.yo gsung dang bral ba'i dbyangs snyan pas/ /gzungs la rol ba'i bde ba bzhes su gsol/ /ngo mtshar chen po cho 'phrul snang mdzad cing / /snying po byang chub bgrod pa
67a7(rgyud): rnams kyi lam ston te/ /rgyud rnams yang dag gang la'ang mi rten pa/ /bde ba mchog gi gzungs kyis grol bar mdzod/ /ra mu mahA su hU dzo hi ni dz+wA la su hUM pU mU/ mahA
67b1(rgyud): su hU dzo i ni dz+wA la su hUM pa b+h+rUM dzU mahA su hU/ i ni dzrA la su hU u dzi/ u mahA su hU dzo/ dza i ni dz+wA su hU/ a la la la ho/ mahA su hU ra ma ra mahA su hU/ a l-i l-i l-i l-i/ mahA
67b2(rgyud): su tre Na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma chen mo dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma thams cad
67b3(rgyud): kyi snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta mahA badzra d+ha ra hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha gi ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA he ma ba ti hUM phaT/
67b4(rgyud): oM badzra DA ki nI ku mA ra bri ye hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki ni dri sh+ye mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki ni mahA badzra mu Sh+Ti ta na/ b+hI ta ya b+hI ta ya/ sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA kI nI
67b5(rgyud): mahA badzra kro d+ha ya d+ha ra la li hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA kro d+ha tsa kre ni ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA mri to ta pa ta ki hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA kI nI mahA sau mA kro d+he hUM phaT/ oM
67b6(rgyud): badzra DA ki nI ma hA badzra tan+ti hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA mA ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA a mr-i te ka pa la hA se hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA sau mya kro d+he shwa ri hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA
67b7(rgyud): ki ni ma hA a mr-i te pu dan d+ha ri hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI badzra ping ga li hUM phaT/ badzra DA ki nI pi ba pi ka ru d+hi raM mahA badzra ba li hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA badzra sha ni b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha
68a1(rgyud): @#/ /hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA badzra sha ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA badzra pA she hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI A na ya A na ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI
68a2(rgyud): ma hA badzra be b+hi ni gu gu mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA badzra dz+wa la ya b+hasmi ku ru hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA badzra bi ga ta hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA badzra daMSh+Te
68a3(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA badzra ki li pra bi sha pra bi sha hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA puSh+Ta mAM sA sha ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA ka ra ba badzra d+hA ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM
68a4(rgyud): badzra DA ki nI A kaR+Sha Ni mahA ping+ga rA li mu ku hUM dz+dzaHdz+dzaH/ hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki n+ya A bi sha ne hUM hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA ban+d+ha hUM hUM baM baM hUM/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA to Sha Ni
68a5(rgyud): sa ma ye hUM hUM A A/ oM badzra mahA rAk+Sha sa mA sa ru d+hi ra me da pri ya/ mahA kuM b+ha karna hUM hUM hUM hUM k+ShaH/ oM badzra mahA rAk+Sha sa A kaD+D+ya pra be sha ya/ sar+b+ba badzra kA la shi ni ban+d+he
