68a7(rgyud): nas rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo de dag thams cad rab tu mgu nas/ yid dga' ba'i 'gyur te/ dbyangs chen mo 'di 'byin par gyur
68b1(rgyud): to| |kye ma rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /rdo rje sbyor ba rab bstan pas/ /mkha' la 'gro ba sangs rgyas nyid/ /ci bde bas ni sgrub par byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang
68b2(rgyud): pos yang rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma de dag kun mgu dga' bar bsgrub par bya ba'i snying po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo / /oM DA ki nI A kaR+Sha ya pra
68b3(rgyud): be sha ya/ ban d+ha ya to Sha ya A/ sar+b+bAn badzra DA ki nI hri da yaM hUM dz+dzaHdzaHhUM baM hoHTak+ki hUM dz+dzaH/ oM he ru ka mahA badzra/ A ka D+D+h+ya A ka D+D+h+ya/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/
68b4(rgyud): to Sha ya to Sha ya/ hUM hUM phaT/ oM badzra pad+ma mahA pa Da ba mu kha/ A ka D+D+h+ya/ pra be sha ya/ ban+d+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ to Sha ya/ ha ha hi/ khro bo'i sngags kyi tshogs 'dis rdo rje rnal
68b5(rgyud): 'byor ma dang / mkha' la 'gro ma dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / rdo rje 'phrog par byed ma de dag la sogs pa de dag dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbang du bya ba la
68b6(rgyud): sogs pa'i las bya ste/ gtor ma'i mchod pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig he ru ka'i phyag rgya dang / Tak+ki rgyal po'i phyag rgya dang / rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya sbyin te/ las thams cad la
68b7(rgyud): sbyor ro/ /rdo rje'i thal mo ji lta ba bzhin bcings te/ khro bo gnyis lcags kyu ltar bya/ sbom po gnyis phan tshun rtse sbyar zhing / zhi ba gnyis kyang rab tu sgreng / lhag ma gnyis brgyad
69a1(rgyud): @#/ /ste 'od zer ltar btang ba 'di ni phyag rgya'i mchog yin no/ /phyag rgya 'di ni gzi brjid che/ /lha dang lha min phyag byas pa/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje
69a2(rgyud): 'dzin la sogs/ /bsngags shing mchod pa byas pa yin/ /bcings pa de nyid 'bebs pa dang / thams cad tshogs ni 'dzud par byed/ /gdug pa thams cad gsod
69a3(rgyud): byed ma/ /srin mo thams cad za bar byed/ /rnal 'byor dam pa gnas pa yis/ /'di yis las rnams thams cad byed/ /las rnams thams cad sgrub pa po/ /mi ldan
69a4(rgyud): dngos grub mi 'gyur te/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /bsnyen pas dngos grub myur du 'thob/ /rdo rje bcings pa gnyis su byas te/ /rgyab gnyis rgyab
69a5(rgyud): sbyar te/ mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ste/ phan tshun bsnol/ khros pa gnyis gyen du bsgreng ste snying gar bstan nas/ brkyang bskum gyi tshul du gnas pa 'di las thams
69a6(rgyud): cad byed pa'o/ /'di yis thams cad las kyi rnams/ /ji tsam yid 'dod byed par 'gyur/ /tshe 'dir sdig pa gang byas pa/ /'di yis thams cad 'phrog par byed/ /
69a7(rgyud): de dag thams cad myur 'gyur te/ /dngos grub yid bzhin rin chen no/ /ji snyed nam mkha'i lam dag tu/ /rnal 'byor 'di yis 'phur bar byed/ /rig 'dzin mchog ni
69b1(rgyud): mtshon par yang / /cho ga grub pa slar yang 'ong / /thal mo mnyam par sbyar te sbom po gnyis dbus su sbyar/ /lhag ma 'dab ma kha bye ba ltar byas pa ni pad+ma'i gdan no/ /spom
69b2(rgyud): po gnyis rtse mo thur du bstan pa ni rtag gdong gi'o/ /gang gis sbyor byas skad cig tu/ /de yis dngos grub chen por 'gyur/ /bcings ma thag tu 'phur 'gyur ba/ /'dod pa
69b3(rgyud): bzhin du nye bar 'gro/ /sa 'og dngos grub 'dod pa bzhin/ /myur du slar yang ldog par 'gyur/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa/ /phyag rgya 'di ni sbyor ba dge /nga ni bstan te
69b4(rgyud): rgyal ba'i rnams/ /rnal 'byor pa yis drang bar bya/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams thams cad kyang / /phyag rgya'i yan lag mchog des sbyar/ /de nas nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo de
69b5(rgyud): dag sogs 'dod pas gzir ba rnams rangs te/ rang gi gzugs ni bsgyur ba yis/ /bzhengs te gar ni rab mdzad cing / /dur khrod kyi ni sa chen du/ /mgu ba chen pos
69b6(rgyud): brtags par byed/ /phyag na thod pa gri dag dang / /rdo rje kha T+wAM rnam par 'dzin/ /skal ldan rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan/ /dbu smug rnam par bsnyer ba'i zhal/ /bde ba'i cha lugs
69b7(rgyud): sbyar ba yis/ /bde ba dam pa longs spyod myong / /rab tu rmongs pas bsnyen byed cing / /rab dgyes khro la gsol ba 'debs/ /zla ba dri med stong rab rdzogs pa'i spyan mnga' bas/
70a1(rgyud): @#/ /thugs rje'i dbyings rum nyid du bdag cag bskyed/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal tsha bas gdungs pa yi/ /byang chub des ni kun du tshim par
70a2(rgyud): mdzod/ /a la la la he/ mchog gi rol pas yang dag sgo 'byed cing / /byang chub mchog lam snying po nyid 'di ston/ /gsang ba'i bdag nyid bde bas zil mnan
70a3(rgyud): te| |rmongs shing bying ba rnams la thugs rjes sgrol/ /a la la la ho/ che ba'i ye shes lhun gyis mngar ldan pa/ /phyogs kyi thugs rjes ma zin snyoms par
70a4(rgyud): dgongs/ /bde ba mchog gi gsang ba'i gnas nyid du/ /mya ngan 'da' ba'ang longs spyod bsten las 'grub/ /'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni dngos bstan kyang / /
70a5(rgyud): rmugs pa'i 'gro bas bdud rtsi'i dngos ma mthong / /kye ma ho/ ma skyes chos te snying po las byung ba/ /bsam gyis mi khyab nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/ /rab tu
70a6(rgyud): dgyes pa'i bde mchog 'bar ba'i gtso/ /rin chen sna tshogs kun 'dus 'di la gzigs/ /sngon med rol mo 'di la rol mdzad cing / /dur khrod chen po'i dngos
70a7(rgyud): grub stsal bar mdzod/ /'dul pa'i dbang gi grub pa'i cha lugs mi zad ma/ /rnal 'byor mkha' 'gros gzi brjid 'bar ba 'dis/ /sdug bsngal gsum pos 'thoms
70b1(rgyud): shing rmongs pa la/ /bde ba'i spyod pas gnas nas spyod mdzad de/ /thugs rjes pad+ma'i dbyings las bskyed par mdzod/ /a la la la ho/ ji ltar pad+ma 'di la chags med
70b2(rgyud): bzhin/ /sdug pa'i bcings pas ma zin rnams grol te/ /rol pas chub pa'i sa la gnas shing rnam mdzad pa/ /'jig rten gsum po 'di la gzigs nas rol mo mdzod/ /
70b3(rgyud): bdag cag dam tshig 'di la 'dus shing snang ba rnams/ /mnyes mdzod shin tu bde ba bzhengs su gsol/ /'gal ba'i yid dang ma chags rdo rje la/ /nam mkha' ji
70b4(rgyud): bzhin mi 'gyur tshul bzhin gnas/ /khams kyi rang bzhin mnabs shing rnam khro yang / /byams pa'i thugs rjes kun tu gnas khyab mdzad/ /e ma ho bde bas bde
70b5(rgyud): sbyin phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang bzhin grub pa'i bde ba dngos grub gsol/ /chags med chags dang ldan pa'i longs spyod kyis/ /dam tshig skyon med bdag dag rol pa mdzad//
70b6(rgyud): thugs rje gsal ba'i byang chub sems chen des/ /'gro ba kun gyi bag chags rnam par sbyongs/ /rgyu dang rkyen lam brten rang bzhin grub/ /ma chags dri med yongs su
70b7(rgyud): gsal zla bzhin/ /'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni mnga' mdzad de/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun tu bde bas brtson/ /'di yis gtso la bskul byas na/ /dkyil 'khor
71a1(rgyud): @#/ /nyid du dngos grub bo/ /yid gdung gnyen pa'i nga ro yis/ /dpyid kyi rgyal mo glu blangs te/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba dri med pa'i/ /dgongs pa thams
71a2(rgyud): cad bstan byas te/ /rdo rje pad+mo yid 'ong ba'i/ /dngos grub thams cad sbyar bar bya/ /bde byed chen po 'di yis ni/ /bskul bas dgyes pa sbyin par byed/ /rdo rje can gyi
71a3(rgyud): yi ger ldan/ /dus gsum rab tu sbyar bar bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma thams cad kyi shin tu dgyes pa'i longs spyod dpal gyi
71a4(rgyud): bde ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de dag thams cad la rjes su mgu bar mdzad do/ /g.yon gyi lag pas gzung byas te/ /gsang skyes pad+mo
71a5(rgyud): phye ba las/ /rdo rje chen po g.yas nyid kyis/ /bcug na mchod pa 'thob 'gyur te/ /mkha' la 'gro ba dra ba 'dis/ /mnyes pas 'di nas dngos grub 'thob/ /oM dang
71a6(rgyud): oM dang mi phyed rdo rje bde/ /mtha' ru phaT kyis stobs rab sbyor ba yis/ /kye ma'o bde ba mkha' 'gro dra ba che/ /rab dgyes dbang mo bde byed bde stabs mdzod/ /rnal
71a7(rgyud): 'byor ma tshogs gsal rnams la/ /'di yis rtsen pa rnam byas na/ /bde chen bde ba dgyes pa yi/ /rab dgyes dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ma'i
71b1(rgyud): cher rjes su mnyes bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ye shes so/ /mgo la thal mo phyed sbyin te/ /chu skyes la ni yongs su rdzogs/ /rdo rje bcings pa yang dag ldan/ /pad+mo'i
71b2(rgyud): dkyil mo bcings par bya/ /'di yis rtsen par byas na ni/ /bud med mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /bde ba chen pos gar byed cing / /rab dgyes bde byed gnod byed
71b3(rgyud): dang | |kun tu 'khyud dang sprod byed dang / /sna tshogs gar gyis gar byas te/ /thams cad zas dang ros dngos grub/ /mchog gi bde bas dngos grub 'gyur/ /rtsa ba'i phyag
71b4(rgyud): rgya bcings byas te/ /sangs rgyas sbyor ba bde chen po/ /myur ba'i thal mos bsgrub par bya/ /gsum gyis mtshams su rab bya zhing / /mkhur tshos so yi sa btab byas te/ /
71b5(rgyud): ma mchu yang nas yang du bzung / /'o ma 'dzin pa phyir zhing mnye/ /g.ya' byed pad+mo rnam bzhi bya/ /pad+mo phyi phyir rab mnye zhing / /ze ba mtshan pas rab tu sbyar/ /sen mos
71b6(rgyud): mchan khung sum mdo dang / /rna ba gnyis su rab tu gzugs/ /dal nas rdo rje gzhug bya zhing / /khro bo'i rgyal pos bskyed par bya/ /g.yas kyis shin tu bskyod byas
71b7(rgyud): nas| |g.yon pa yis ni gtang bar bya/ /sbyor ba 'di yis rtsen pa yis/ /mkha' 'gro'i 'khor lo mchod par bya/ /kye ma'o bde zhes rab brjod do/ /bde ba chen
72a1(rgyud): @#/ /po dbyangs kyis bskul/ /yang dang yang du 'dzin pa na/ /blo ldan sgrub pas bsgrub par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i spro
72a2(rgyud): ba ye shes so/ /de dag thams cad mgu nas ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin la gsol ba 'debs/ /nye ba'i zas ni thams cad dang / /de bzhin nye ba'i yo byad rnams/ /bde ba bsgrubs
72a3(rgyud): pas sgrub pa po/ /sna tshogs chen po bsgom par gsol/ /sgrub pa thams cad sgrub byed pas/ /gdon mi za dka' rtag bgying pas/ /gang gis myur du mnyam sbyor bas//
72a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rab tu rnam bsgyur bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye ba'i yo byad kha zas thams cad kyi phyag rgya gsungs pa/ yo byad phyi yi thams cad dang / /gos dang
72a5(rgyud): rgyan la sogs pa'o/ /nye ba'i kha zas rnams la ni/ /sha dang khrag las yang dag sgrub/ /'bras bu rtsa ba tshad med do/ /mchog tu bde ba yid tshim pa/ /'di yis mchod
72a6(rgyud): pa byas pa na/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni dngos grub 'gyur/ /bus pa'i sha las rab sgrub pa'i/ /'o ma dam pas thod pa dgang / /mkha' 'gro ma kun dbul byas na/ /dkyil
72a7(rgyud): 'khor 'dir ni dngos grub 'gyur/ /gtor ma'i mchod pa'i yo byad kyi ye shes so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'dzin thams cad bzhengs
72b1(rgyud): te phyag bcal nas yang gcig tu stug por 'du ba mdzad de bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs so/ /rnal 'byor kun gyi ye shes mtshan/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams
72b2(rgyud): kyi| |thams cad brda rnams dran 'gyur ba/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i ro myong ba dang 'brel ba'i
72b3(rgyud): dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / mkha' la 'gro ma thams cad kyi brda'i phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /ka ni 'dod
72b4(rgyud): pa byed 'dod phyir/ /bdag ni 'dod can smras yin te/ /gti mug ldongs pas me byin na/ /myur du dam tshig de nyams so/ /dam tshig dam tshig can mthong na/ /lag pa
72b5(rgyud): g.yas pa brkyang byas te/ /des kyang g.yon pa brkyang ba yis/ /rang gi nu ma rab bsdams na/ /mgo bos g.yon du 'dud byas nas/ /phyag byed bde ba dris pa yin/ /lag
72b6(rgyud): pa g.yon pa dkur brten na/ /de yis phyag ni byas par 'gyur/ /g.yon pa mgo ru bzhag pa yi/ /g.yon du 'dud pas phyag lan no/ /g.yon gyi smin ma bskyod pa yis/ /
72b7(rgyud): myur du phyag ni byas par 'gyur/ /sbyor ba shin tu brtson pa yis/ /g.yas kyi smin mas phyag lan bya/ /g.yas kyi lag pas snying ga ru/ /sbyor dang ldan pas mnye byas na/ /'di
73a1(rgyud): @#/ /ni rdo rje slob dpon mchog /de yi mtshan mar shes bar bya/ /g.yon gyi khro mo sgreng ba yi/ /nam zhig de ltar bstan byas na/ /lus che de ni khros
73a2(rgyud): 'gyur zhes/ /rnal 'byor pa yi rtags zhes bya/ /g.yon du 'gying ba bsgyings pa yis/ /lag par snying gar brkyang bya ste/ /dbang mo gyen du rnam bstan na/ /de tshe mdza'
73a3(rgyud): bar rab tu brtag / chung du rtse mor byas pa yi/ /nam zhig bskyod pa mthong ba na/ /de tshe rig ma rnal 'byor dbang / /rdo rje pad+mo rtsen par 'dod/ /sbom po nam zhig mthong
73a4(rgyud): 'gyur na/ /de la ston mo sbyin par bya/ /gang tshe shin tu mthor ston na/ /mngon pa'i nga rgyal rab tu brtag /khro mo lcags kyu 'dra byas te/ /gang tshe sngags mkhan gyis bstan
73a5(rgyud): na| |de tshe nges par 'o byas te/ /gzhan du na ni dmyal bar ltung / /de nyid rnam par bzlog pa ltar/ /sngags mkhan gyis ni ma bstan na/ /de tshe myur du 'gro byas te/ /gzhan
73a6(rgyud): du byas na dam tshig nyams/ /gzhan rnams kyi ni phyag rgya yis/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rnam bskul na/ /las kyi sbyor ba shes pa yis/ /las de dag ni brtsam par bya/ /brda
73a7(rgyud): yi phyag rgya'i ye shes so/ /'dren pa med pa'i ye shes kun/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rab tu brtag /rtag tu tsheg drag rnam bral ba/ /'dren tshul rnal 'byor ma yi'o/ /oM ni
73b1(rgyud): thig ler bcas pa'i brda/ /sbyor bsngags 'dzin rnal 'byor brtag /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /sbyor ba'i dkyil du brtag par bya/ /rdo rje pad+mo mnyam bar sbyor
73b2(rgyud): bas rjes su mnyes par byed pa dpal dam tshig ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang
73b3(rgyud): po chen po yang kun tu rgyas 'debs pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje pha rol tu phyin ma'i gsang ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo thams cad
73b4(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /rdo rje thal mo mnyam gzhag ste/ /sbom po skyil mo bcing bar bya/ /khro mo gnyis ni sbyar bya ste//
73b5(rgyud): lhag ma 'od bzhin btang bar bya/ /snying gar phyag rgya 'di bzhag nas/ /thams cad las ni rab sbyar te/ /sna tshogs mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du/ /gdon mi za ba'i
73b6(rgyud): dngos grub byed/ /thal mo de gnyis mnyam sbyar te/ /mchog dang rdo rje mnyam du sbyar/ /chung ngu gnyis kyang gdong sprad de/ /snying gar de bzhin sbom po sbyar/ /'di yis rdo rje
73b7(rgyud): thams cad rnams/ /dam tshig 'jigs byed rab mdzad cing / /sems can thams cad phan mdzad ma/ /de ni dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nyid las ni rdo rje dang / /
74a1(rgyud): @#/ /mchog nyid sgreng ba'i tshul byas te/ /rdo rje thal mo gnas pa yis/ /drang ba'i tshul gyis drangs byas na/ /mi g.yeng de nas dngos grub bo/ /gnod
74a2(rgyud): byed yang dag ldan pa 'dis/ /rgyal ba mchog kyang 'dren 'gyur na/ /lha dang mi yi bu mo dag /lha min la sogs smos ci dgos/ /ji ltar yid la 'dod pa bzhin/ /
74a3(rgyud): 'di nyid kyis ni dngos grub ste/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa mnyam sbyor bas/ /mchog tu myur du 'dren par 'gyur/ /thal mo de nyid las byung khro/ /rtse mo yid tsam bkug
74a4(rgyud): byas te/ /lhag ma 'od zer rtse mo bzhin/ /des ni myos byed thob pa yin/ /'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang / /bde bar gshegs kyang dbang bsgyur na/ /yid las skyes pa
74a5(rgyud): 'dod chags can/ /gti mug chos gnas smos ci dgos/ /ci dgar 'dod chags sbyor ba yis/ /de yis las rnams byed 'gyur te/ /yang dag sbyor ba thams cad
74a6(rgyud): 'grub/ /sbyor dang mi ldan dngos grub med/ /snying gar 'di nyid kyis byas te/ /mgu ba'i sbyor ba bde chen pos/ /rgyal ba mchog ni mnyes par 'gyur/ /mchog gi
74a7(rgyud): bcing ba 'di kun dang / /'di yis las rnams thams cad dang / /yid la bsam pa thams cad 'thob/ /phan tshun du ni mgu byed cing / /mgu bas dngos grub
74b1(rgyud): myur du thob/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te/ /rdo rje bkug nas sbom por sbyar/ /lhag ma 'od kyi tshul du gtong / /dga' byed mchog ni phyag rgya 'di/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu dngos
74b2(rgyud): grub 'thob/ /rgyal srid nor dang 'bru yi rnams/ /de bzhin nor bu 'di dngos grub/ /de ni de ma thag tu yang / /lha dang lha min mchod par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid kyis ni 'di bcings
74b3(rgyud): te| |mkhas pa yis ni dus mtshams phyir/ /gnas lngar rab tu sbyor ba yis/ /spyi bor dbang ni bskur byas na/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi dbang / /de nas de ni nges par 'gyur/ /
74b4(rgyud): lo gcig tsam du mnyam sbyar bas/ /phan tshun du ni dbang bskur bas/ /khams gsum rab dgyes bdag po ru/ /blo ldan rdo rje mi g.yeng 'gyur/ /de nyid 'khor lo bskor
74b5(rgyud): byas te/ /snying gar 'khor lo bzhin du bskor/ /zla ba gcig tsam mnyam sbyor bas/ /'khor lo bskor ba rab tu bsgrub/ /de nyid g.yon par rab sbyar te/ /rgyal mtshan
74b6(rgyud): tshul du yang dag spro/ /zhag bdun du na mnyam gzhag pas/ /'jig rten du ni rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de nyid kha nas bgad par sbyar/ /mnyam gzhag zla ba gcig tsam gyis//
74b7(rgyud): las rnams thams cad rab grub pa/ /bgad pa tsam gyis byed par 'gyur/ /thal mo de nyid mnyam bzhag ste/ /rtse mo kha phyed rnams bsgyur bas/ /sbom po ze bar rnam byas
75a1(rgyud): @#/ /te| |lo ma lhag ma rgyas par bya/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni bcings pa yis/ /sdig pa kun las rab tu grol/ /bsod nams chen pos byin rlab
75a2(rgyud): ste| |bde byed thams cad grub par 'gyur/ /thal mo de nyid snying gar sbyar/ /mchog dang khro mi gnyis sbyar te/ /de gnyis tshig gsum rab tu dgug /sbom po skyil
75a3(rgyud): mo tsam du bya/ /rnal 'byor dag tu sbyor ba yis/ /'di yi zla ba gcig byas na/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal rjer/ /dpa' bo chen por de 'gyur ro/ /thal mo de
75a4(rgyud): nyid mnyam sbyar te/ /rang gi snying gar bskor bar bya/ /de nas sngags mkhan chos ston par/ /mi g.yeng sems kyis de 'gyur ro/ /sdom po lce yi tshul bzhag pas//
75a5(rgyud): de nyid khar ni rnam bzhag na/ /'jig rten kun gyi thams cad dag /mdor na zhag bdun tsam gyis kyang / /dbyig dang gser dang gos la sogs/ /bdud rtsi btung ba
75a6(rgyud): mchog gi rnams/ /'di yis thams cad 'phrog byed de/ /'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te/ /mchog rab gnyis ni 'og tu gzhug /
75a7(rgyud): chung ngu gnyis dang sbom po gnyis/ /sbyar te snying gar rab tu gzhug /yid la dga' ba'i las rnams thams cad byed/ /sgyu ma'i mthu dang srid pa mthar byed pa/ /rtag
75b1(rgyud): tu blo ldan lo ni phyed gnyis kyis/ /khams gsum rgyal srid mthu chen thob par 'gyur/ /thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te/ /rang gi ma mchu dbus nyid nas/ /sbom po ro 'thob
75b2(rgyud): tshul gyis ni/ /khro mo 'khor lo yang dag sbro/ /zhag bdun du ni bsgrims pa yis/ /'di yis khrag 'dren dngos grub ste/ /sha zas bza' ba las kun byed/ /thal mo
75b3(rgyud): nyid ni bcings byas nas/ /rdo rje gnyis ni pad+mor sbyor/ /sbom por zur ni sbrel nas kyang / /chung ngu gnyis kyang de bzhin te/ /mgrin pa nas ni rtse mo brkyang / /thams cad las
75b4(rgyud): ni sbyar byas te/ /'di yis gdug pa thams cad dag /rab tu sbyar bas 'jigs par 'gyur/ /thal mo de nyid mnyam gzhag nas/ /bcing ba dam pos bcing bar bya//
75b5(rgyud): sbom po gnyis ni nang du gzhug /khro mo gnyis kyang bskul bar bya/ /'di yis gdug pa thams cad dag /'dzums par rab tu byas par 'gyur/ /skad cig tu ni gnon
75b6(rgyud): byed de/ /de bzhin bsdus dang btsir bar 'gyur/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas/ /de ni dngos grub thams cad kyi/ /dngos grub chen po bdag po dang / /thams cad
75b7(rgyud): las don 'grub par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas/ /rim par myur du 'gro 'ong byed/ /lo gcig gi ni sbyor ba yis/ /las rnams thams cad sgrub par
76a1(rgyud): @#/ /byed| |rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kun gyi las thams cad byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas rnal 'byor ma de dag thams cad rab tu mgu nas
76a2(rgyud): ngo mtshar du gyur te/ rnam par 'gyur bas gar mdzad cing / /hi hi zhes pas glu ru len/ /ha ha zhes pas rab tu mgu/ /ho ho zhes pas mnyes par byed/ /he he zhes
76a3(rgyud): pas 'bod par byed/ /hUM hUM zhes pas gang bar byed/ /hA hA zhes pas skyong bar byed/ /phaT phaT zhes pas gsod par byed/ /hUM hUM zhes pas zur bus 'debs/ /dzA
76a4(rgyud): dzA zhes pas 'dren par byed/ /sa sa zhes pas dam par byed/ /dge ba dbang phyug nga ro mchog /hUM hrUM zhes pas gsod par byed/ /hUM b+h+rUM hUM b+h+rUM/ hUM hUM zhes pas 'bar bar
76a5(rgyud): byed| |truM truM zhes pas gzi brjid byed/ /triM triM zhes pas 'dren par byed/ /traM traM zhes pas mchod par byed/ /dngos grub thams cad 'bras bu smin/ /hraM hraM zhes pas rmongs
76a6(rgyud): par byed/ /d+h+riM d+h+riM zhes pas 'dzums bar byed/ /hriM hriM zhes pas 'dren par byed/ /hUM hUM zhes pas 'phyan par byed/ /hroM hroM zhes pas rmongs par byed/ /hra hra zhes pas gnon
76a7(rgyud): par byed/ /ho ho zhes pas mnyes par byed/ /haM haM zhes pas srung bar byed/ /hUM hUM zhes pas gsod par byed/ /hu hu zhes pas mgu bar byed/ /traM traM zhes pas gdug par
76b1(rgyud): byed| |g+huM g+huM zhes pas phreng bar byed/ /gaM gaM zhes pas dri ru byed/ /raM raM zhes pas rgyal bar byed/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i
76b2(rgyud): tshogs rnams ngo mtshar cher gyur/ rmad du byung ba chen por gyur te/ rang gi sems mgu bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas yang bcom ldan 'das
76b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po la phyag btsal te gsol ba 'debs so/ /gnyis med mchog tu rmad byung
76b4(rgyud): ba| |bcom ldan de nyid bshad du gsol/ /gang gis sems can grub pa 'di/ /gsang ba sbas pa grub par 'gyur/ /gar dang glu dang bzhad pa che/ /sgeg mo rol pa
76b5(rgyud): bde ba mchog / sil snyan gling bu rnams sna tshogs/ /brdab dang rgyud rnams rab 'byor pa/ /gsang rgyud cho ga'i rim pa rnams/ /rdzu 'phrul blo yi che ba che/ /dngos grub
76b6(rgyud): thams cad grub pa yis/ /sngags rgyal khyod kyis bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan sangs rgyas rnams/ /thams cad bdag po rgyal po che/ /thog ma med nas spyod rmad
76b7(rgyud): byung | |sna tshogs chen po rnams mi rtog / sna tshogs ye shes yon tan che/ /bla med chos kun dbang po ste/ /rig dang sngags kyi bdag po che/ /de nyid chen po snying po mchog
77a1(rgyud): @#/ /blo rmongs phyag rgya rgyas 'debs te/ /rgyas 'debs rmongs byed za ba po/ /gtong dang byed pa khyab pa che/ /bskyod pa sdig pa 'phrog par byed//
77a2(rgyud): sdig pa'i chos rnams sel bar byed/ /dus ngan 'dod byed khros pa po/ /gti mug chos rjes 'debs par byed/ /sa dang bar snang de bzhin bde/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor pa la
77a3(rgyud): sbyin| |tshangs dang gtogs 'dod dbang chen pos/ /de la phyag dang mchod par byed/ /de nyid skyong byed skyob pa po/ /gsang ba'i gsang ba bde ba che/ /zla gsang thig le
77a4(rgyud): las byung ba'i/ /sbas pa chen po gsang ba ston/ /nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje/ /bde ba chen po 'byin mdzad de/ /skal ldan nye bar longs spyod kun/ /bud med thams
77a5(rgyud): cad dbang du byed/ /rang 'byung mtshan du thig le ste/ /bcu gsum dra ba dbu ru ldan/ /'di yis bud med bskyed byas te/ /sa bon gyis ni rgyal po 'du/ /'od zer gzi brjid
77a6(rgyud): 'bar ba can/ /rang las myu gur 'dra ba yi/ /'og gi phyogs su bzhag pa ni/ /traM byas myur du drang bar bya/ /dang po drang ba gnyis drang bas/ /tsheg drag des ni lcags
77a7(rgyud): kyu byas/ /lha dang lha min mchog gi bdag /khams gsum thams cad drang bar byed/ /'di yi tshul gyis sbyor ba yi/ /phan tshun du ni bsgrubs byas nas/ /rmad byung rnam pa
77b1(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis/ /dngos grub byed pa sbyin par byed/ /bdag nyid rang bzhin mthong bar bya/ /sbyor ldan zla ba'i gzugs nyid du/ /de ste sa bon gzhag par bya/ /de nyid de nyid
77b2(rgyud): thabs kyis gnas/ /sngags kyi sbyor bar ba sbyor bas/ /de nas sngags mkhan der 'grub bo/ /de nyid sngags dang snying po dang / /phyag rgya rig dang mi ldan pas/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje
77b3(rgyud): sems dpa' yang / /'grub pa nyid du yong mi 'gyur/ /de nyid nang du sbyar byas na/ /snying po snying gar sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya phyag rgyas sbyar bar byas/ /sngags dang sngags kyi
77b4(rgyud): 'bru bsgoms te/ /rig ma rig ma nyid du sbyar/ /'di yis myur du dngos grub ste/ /mgyogs par 'gro ba rab tu 'grub/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis chen por/ /'byung dang 'byung
77b5(rgyud): las 'gyur ba nye/ /rnal 'byor 'byor don sgrub pa po/ /dpa' bo chen po 'gro 'ong byed/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu mgu rangs par gyur te/ rdo rje'i
77b6(rgyud): dbyangs 'di bsgrags so/ /kye ma'o kun tu bzang po yi/ /rdo rje'i theg pa bla na med/ /bshad pa gsang ba zhes bgyi ba/ /de nyid don du sgrub pa ste/ /snying po phyag rgya dam tshig
77b7(rgyud): ni| |sngags rig rang gi lha nyid de/ /bdag gi de nyid ji bzhin pa/ /gsang ba rgyal ba mchog gis gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor dang ni dam tshig dang / /gsang ba sbas pa
78a1(rgyud): @#/ /de nyid de/ /'jig rten gsum gyis 'dud pa'i rim/ /dpa' bo chen pos rab tu bsgrags/ /rdo rje pad+mo rnam mdzad pas/ /rig ma dang ni lhan
78a2(rgyud): cig rtse na/ /gdug pa thams cad mnye bya dang / /dam la zhe sdang bza' ba dang / /slob dpon smod la bsgral ba dang / /gzungs ma'i bdag por sgrub pa dang / /sangs rgyas
78a3(rgyud): thams cad bskyed bya dang / /rab dgyes bdag nyid bskul ba dang / /sdig pa thams cad sbyang ba dang / /bud med thams cad 'dod bya dang / /bdud rnams thams cad
78a4(rgyud): drang bya dang / /rdo rje kun tu gzhug bya dang / /pad+mo'i gnas ni dgang bya dang / /sgrub dang nye bar sgrub pa dang / /shin tu sbyor dang sbyor che ba/ /sbyor ba rab sbyor sbyor skye ba/ /
78a5(rgyud): de rnams de nyid mkhyen pa'o/ /bde ba chen po nyid kyis gsungs/ /sgrub pa yi ni sbyor che ba/ /sbyor dang sbyor mar yang dag sbyor/ /de nyid gsal bar sems dpa' che/ /
78a6(rgyud): phan par dgongs pa nyid kyis gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba'i mdo rjes su dris pa rang gi thugs la gzhag
78a7(rgyud): ste| nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ba/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni/ /kun tu sbyor ba mnyam par ldan/ /de nyid phyag rgya chen po ste/ /ye shes lnga yis
78b1(rgyud): rjes su bskyed/ /dkyil 'khor phyag rgya bzhi pa ste/ /phyag rgya chen pos rjes su bsgrubs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed mdzad de/ /kye ma'o bde ba rnam par 'byung / /snying po ye shes
78b2(rgyud): zhes bya ste/ /ye shes bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /phyag rgya ye shes phyag rgya che/ /dam tshig mchog ni rig ma'o/ /sngags kyi yi ge tshul 'dra ba/ /yi ge'i phyag rgya don chen sbyin//
78b3(rgyud): 'di yis sgrub pa byas pa'i gzungs/ /bdag gi de nyid lha de nyid/ /de dag de nyid ci bzhin par/ /nga yis gsang ba rab tu bsgrags/ /dam tshig ma yin mi shes la/ /sngags
78b4(rgyud): rig pas ni bstan mi bya/ /phyag rgya thams cad gsang bya ste/ /dam tshig rgyas 'debs gsang ba yin/ /de nyid lha yi sbyor ba ni/ /gsang ba gsang ba rab tu bsgrub/ /rdo rje pad+mo
78b5(rgyud): rnam mdzad pas/ /rol pa phyi nang sbyor ba yis/ /rig dang lhan cig rtsen bya ba/ /spyod pa dang ni 'khyud pa dang / /de bzhin mchu ni so yis bzung / /rdo rje brtan pa gzhug
78b6(rgyud): par bya/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis ni/ /bskyod cing rnam par gar bya 'o/ /gdug pa thams cad mnye bya ste/ /nu ma mchan khung mkhur tshos gnyis/ /'gram pa dang ni
78b7(rgyud): brla gnyis rgyab/ /rkang pa lag pa 'jam po gnyis/ /mnyes pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /mdza' ba chen po de 'grub bo/ /'dod pa'i don gyi bar gcod dang / /dam la zhe
79a1(rgyud): @#/ /sdang bza' ba dang / /zhe sdang can gyis zos 'gyur ba/ /khyad par gzhan dang gzhan yang bza'/ /rtag par mi phyogs smra ba dang / /bla ma smod
79a2(rgyud): rnams bsgral bya ba/ /sha dang khrag dang klad pa rnams/ /drangs te tshogs kyi mchod par bya/ /'di ni gsang ba drag po ste/ /rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang / /bla ma smod byed
79a3(rgyud): brtson pa la/ /dam tshig phyir ni bsgrub par bya/ /gti mug de ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal ba yang 'thob 'gyur te/ /thams cad nad dang khros chen dang / /'jigs
79a4(rgyud): byed nye bar 'tshe ba yis/ /bskal pa grangs med bye ba ru/ /sdug bsngal chen po sten byed cing / /'o dod 'bod par sprul gyi bdag /bstir med chen po brlag par
79a5(rgyud): 'gro| lus ngag sems ni bde dam pa/ /rig ma kun la bskyod byas te/ /byang chub chen po bde ba yi/ /tshul bzhin du ni bsngags par bya/ /bskul ba'i snying po 'di
79a6(rgyud): smras te/ /dzaHzhes skad cig skad cig tu/ /rang gi gnas nas gnas pa yis/ /de nyid las ni bskyod bar bya/ /bcu drug cha dang yang dag ldan/ /zla ba gsang ba'i
79a7(rgyud): thig le la/ /me tog dang ni 'dra ba nyid/ /rlung gis phul ba bskyod par bya/ /de ni bskyod pas 'grub pa ste/ /de bzhin du yang bskul bar bya/ /rgyun gyi phreng ni 'od gsal
79b1(rgyud): bzhin/ /blo ldan rtag tu bsgrub par bya/ /bdud rnams thams cad 'dren pa ni/ /lha ma rnams ni snying por bshad/ /zhags pa'i tshul gyis gzhug pa dang / /de bzhin dgang ba
79b2(rgyud): bcing pa'o/ /sgrub pa lha yi sbyor ba ste/ /rjes su sgrub pa lha mo'i don/ /sgrub pa chen po gnyi ga'i rgya/ /mnyam par sbyor ba rdo rje'i mchog /nye bar sgrub pa gnyi ga gnas/ /shin
79b3(rgyud): tu sgrub pa bde dam pa/ /so yi rtse mos mchu bzung ste/ /ma mchu mchog ni bsdam par bya/ /sbyor ba rab sbyor skal ldan pa'i/ /rab dgyes ro myang bde dam pa/ /lha dang lha nyid
79b4(rgyud): yang dag sbyor/ /'di ni gnyis su med ces bya/ /snying po phyag rgya sngags rig gis/ /nyid kyi gzugs ni bsgrub bya ste/ /bdag ni sems dpa'o zhes bsams na/ /'di ni
79b5(rgyud): gnyis med myur du 'gyur/ /gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i lha'i/ /dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /sbyor dang rab sbyor sbyor che ba/ /rgyal ba kun gyi mchog gi
79b6(rgyud): gsungs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje sbyor ba ste/ /rab tu sbyor ba mkha' la 'gro/ /phyag rgya de dag rab sbyor ba/ /sbyor ba chen po bsgrags pa yin/ /'di yis dpa' bo thams
79b7(rgyud): cad dang / /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /sbyor ba'i dbang po bde ba che/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na/ /rdo rje'i bdag po
80a1(rgyud): @#/ /chen por 'gyur/ /mnyam par sbyor ba sbyar ba yis/ /'jig rten gsum po myur du rgyal/ /yang dag sbyor ba sbyar tshul gyis/ /drangs te rab tu
80a2(rgyud): bcug nas kyang / /rdo rje brtan pos bskul byas te/ /shin tu 'dod pas 'dod pa bskyed/ /mkha' 'gro thams cad thabs mkhas ldan/ /rgyas dang de bzhin zag
80a3(rgyud): par bya/ /'di ni yang dag sbyor bas sbas/ /sbas pa rnal 'byor ma dkyil lo/ /'di yis yang dag dngos grub blang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'bras bu thob/ /sangs rgyas
80a4(rgyud): byang chub bde che dang / /byang chub mchog rab yang dag 'thob/ /gsang ba chen po rmad byung ba/ /de dag de nyid sbas pa che/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis dris pa'i rgya/ /
80a5(rgyud): nga yis yang dag rab tu bstan/ /gang gis yang dag ldan mthong dang / /bdag po chen po mchod byed na/ /dre yis ston pa kun mthong ste/ /rgyal ba mchog la mchod
80a6(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /srid pa gcod pa por 'gyur te/ /'gro ba'i ston pa mchog tu 'gyur/ /de la lha kun mchod byed cing / /skad cig skad cig phyag kyang byed/ /ji ltar
80a7(rgyud): ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /phan byed 'jig rten skyes gyur pa/ /sna tshogs ye shes rjes bsdus pas/ /rnal 'byor chen por de bzhin 'gyur/ /rang gis dam tshig
80b1(rgyud): bsrungs pa yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde skye ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ldan pas/ /dngos grub chen po des 'thob po/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mtshan btab la/ /cung zad
80b2(rgyud): mi 'grub yong med de/ /phyag rgya kun gyi bde ba che/ /bdag nyid so sor rjes su 'grub/ /rab dgyes mtshan dang mdza' chen mo/ /ro dang reg pa'i che ba'i che/ /rdo rje sems
80b3(rgyud): dpa' sbyor ba yis/ /dpyad mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas de dag mgu 'gyur te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde che ba/ /sbyor ba 'dod pa'i gzir pa yis/ /sbyor ba
80b4(rgyud): chen pos mnyes par mdzad/ /ra ma ra ma sa ma ho mahA satwa/ /rab dgyes gdon mi za la bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /zla gsang thig ler yang dag
80b5(rgyud): ldan| |bdag cag kun kyang dam tshig ste/ /skal ldan dri med rab dgyes kyi/ /rnal 'byor ma snying mchog nyid du/ /sbyor chen nyid kyis rol pa mdzod/ /theg pa chen po bde
80b6(rgyud): che yi| |pad+mo rdo rje'i rin chen gyis/ /rnal 'byor ma kun dkyil 'khor du/ /rab dgyes longs spyod gnyis bsten mdzod/ /bdag cag thams cad nyes bral te/ /gnod
80b7(rgyud): med de ni gser dang 'dra/ /de nyid thams cad grub chen po/ /rab dgyes bdag nyid nyid bsten mdzod/ /spros pa 'khyud ba sbas pa dang / /gzhug pa dang ni gtong ba'i
81a1(rgyud): @#/ /mchog /'di ni sgyu ma'i brtan pa yis/ /ded dpon rab tu brtag par mdzod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po kun tu bzang pos
81a2(rgyud): ' dod pa thams cad nye bar longs spyod pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sbas pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
81a3(rgyud): te/ rnal 'byor ma thams cad shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i kun tu 'khyud pa dang / sprod pa dang / gzhug pa dang / 'dren pa dang / rab tu bskul ba dang / mnye ba dang / /
81a4(rgyud): thigs pa dang / tshor bar bya ba dang / bskyod pa dang / kun tu bskyod pa dang / bcing ba'i rdo rje dang / pad+ma chen mo mnyam du sbyor ba la yang dag par zhugs te/ shin
81a5(rgyud): tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen pos bde bas kun tu rgyas par mdzad cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / gzungs ma'i tshogs thams cad la bskyod pa dang /
81a6(rgyud): rab tu rgyas pa dang / rab tu rnam par 'byin cing shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i mnyam nyid kyi tshogs kyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kun tu rgyas par byas
81a7(rgyud): te gnas so/ /de nas rnal 'byor ma chen mo shin tu dgyes pa'i bdag nyid chen po de dag nyid mgu zhing bde bar gyur te/ kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che/ /rdzogs sangs
81b1(rgyud): rgyas ni mgu ba che/ /bde ba chen po rangs par 'gyur/ /kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che/ /bde ba nyid kyis phyag byed de/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po/ /mgu ba chen po'i
81b2(rgyud): bde dang ldan/ /kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che/ /'jigs shing skrag pas sdud par byed/ /khros pa chen po mkha' 'gro ma/ /rab tu mi bzad dug dang 'dra/ /bde byed chen po'i rol
81b3(rgyud): pa yis/ /bde byed che la mchod par byed/ /skal ba chen po srin mo dang / /bde byed bde bas rab mongs pa/ /mchod pa'i sprin phung bde ldan pa'i/ /rgya chen mchog gis mchod
81b4(rgyud): par byed/ /drag mo chen mo ma lta bu/ /rab tu gtum pa me 'dra ba/ /'ongs nas bde byed chen mo yis/ /gtso bo mchog la mchod par byed/ /lha dang lha mo thams cad kyang / /
81b5(rgyud): klu mo dang ni rta gdong yang / /'ongs nas bde ba sbyor ba yis/ /yid du 'ong bas mchod par byed/ /de nas dbang po lha chen po/ /bdag nyid chen po lha yi lha/ /kye ma'o bde
81b6(rgyud): ba sna tshogs nyid/ /sna tshogs sbyor ba bde ba che/ /mgu zhing rab tu rangs pa yis/ /lha yi lha ni sngon du 'gro/ /dpa' bo bde la phyag byas te/ /kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che/ /rang
81b7(rgyud): gi bde bas mngon mchod cing / /'jigs shing skrag pas mnyes par byed/ /tshad med rangs pa bzhad pa che/ /glu gar mchog tu ldan pa dang / /bza' dang bca' ba sha
82a1(rgyud): @#/ /chen dang / /sil snyan phreng ba ro chen dang / /gling bu rgyud mang rdza rnga dang / /pi wang pa la kig hal le/ /stag dang dpa' bo 'jigs pa dang / /
82a2(rgyud): zhi dang rmad 'byung 'jigs byed dang / /bdag dang khros dang spyan rgyas pas/ /skad cig skad cig mchod byed cing / /byed pa dang ni bzlog pa dang / /'phrog pa dang ni
82a3(rgyud): gzhug pa dang / /sId ces pa dang hUM hUM dang / /ha ha zhes pas mnyes byed cing / /rab dgyes bdag nyid bde ba yi/ /rang gi chung mas mnyes par byed/ /de nas bcom
82a4(rgyud): ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po rab tu dgyes pa bde ba chen pos nam mkha' dang nam mkha'i skabs thams cad la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang
82a5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' dang / rang rgyal dang / nyan thos dang / rang bzhin gyis 'gag pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes la gnas pa rnams shin tu
82a6(rgyud): dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i thabs dang / shes rab kyi bde bas bkug ste dbang bskur nas/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par
82a7(rgyud): 'jog pa dang / shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i chos nyid kyi rgyal po rjes su skyong zhing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi
82b1(rgyud): khams chen po ma lus pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams su rab tu gzigs pas gzigs nas/ 'jig rten dang lhar bcas pa rnams la bde ba chen pos khyab par mdzad
82b2(rgyud): de| sems can dang / rigs thams cad dang / gnas thams cad dang / spyod pa dang / mi spyod par bcas pa dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa dang / sa'i 'og dang
82b3(rgyud): phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / bsags pa'i dbang po lnga dang / rnam par shes pa dang / shes bya dang / bdag dang / bdag gi dang / sna tshogs dang / sna
82b4(rgyud): tshogs ma yin pa dang / bus pa dang / rgan po dang / gzhon nu dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / skyes pa ma yin pa dang / srog dang / rab tu zad pa dang / 'jigs pa dang /
82b5(rgyud): mi 'jigs pa dang / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / shes pa dang / mi shes pa dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / khyab pa dang /
82b6(rgyud): khyab byed dang / zla ba dang / dbang chen dang / nyi ma dang / me dang / gshin rje dang / chu bdag dang / lus srul po dang / tshangs pa dang / gtogs 'dod dang / dbang phyug
82b7(rgyud): chen po dang / lha mo dang / skal pa dang ldan pa dang / skal ba dang mi ldan pa dang / dngos po dang / dngos po med pa dang / mtshan dang / rdo rje dang / pad+mo dang / rin po che
83a1(rgyud): @#/ /dang | ral gri dang / tho ba dang / dbyig pa dang / rtse gsum pa dang / 'khor lo dang / sbyor ba dang / rab tu sbyor ba dang / stong pa dang / stong
83a2(rgyud): chen po dang / mchog tu stong pa dang / shin tu stong pa dang / stong pa rab tu stong pa dang / byang chub dang / byang chub kyi sems dang / yi ge dang / yi ge med pa dang
83a3(rgyud): dra ba dang / lcug ma dang / cha dang / cha med pa dang / thig le dang / ro dang / ro chen po dang / yid la byed pa med pa dang / rtag pa dang / zhi ba dang / mi zad pa dang /
83a4(rgyud): thar pa dang / thar byed dang / grol ba dang / rigs pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / nam mkha' dang / skabs dang / skabs med pa rnams la gcig tu stug
83a5(rgyud): por gyur te/ rnam par phye nas mi snang ba'i tshul du gnas so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / thabs
83a6(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin ma rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
83a7(rgyud): po shin tu dgyes pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba chen po gsang ba chen po'i dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa chen po la phyag mdzad de/ mngon sum du yang dag par bskul
83b1(rgyud): nas dris pa/ su ra ta staM ma si ho/ /gang phyir 'dod pa bde ba che/ /gang gis 'dod las byang chub 'gyur/ /'dod chags bral ba ji ltar bde/ /gang gis zhe sdang rdo rje che/ /gang
83b2(rgyud): gis gti mug rgyal ba che/ /gang gis 'dod chags pad+mor 'gyur/ /gang gis nga rgyal nam mkha'i bdag /gang gis phrag dog gdon mi za/ /byang chub sems ni ji ltar bde/ /
83b3(rgyud): gang gis bde byed mchod par 'gyur/ /mchod pa yis ni ji ltar 'grub/ /ji ltar gzungs dang mnyam sbyor bas// yi ge mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i
83b4(rgyud): yon tan lnga/ /bsnyen pa yis ni myur du 'grub/ /ji ltar gsang ba mnyam sbyor bas/ /rmad du byung ba'i dbang bskur 'gyur/ /ji ltar pad+mo mnyam sbyor bas/ /dkyil 'khor
83b5(rgyud): rab tu zhugs par 'gyur/ /ji ltar dri chu byang chub dang / /khrag dang snang mdzad chen po yis/ /dam tshig nyid du ji ltar 'gyur/ /ji ltar btung ba rab tu brtag /de nas bcom
83b6(rgyud): l dan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen pos rdo rje pha rol tu phyin ma'i gsang ba chen mo de dag thams cad la rang gi bde bas mnyes par byas
83b7(rgyud): te| mi mnyam pa dang / /mnyam pa'i sbas pa chen po shin tu sbas pa mchog tu gsang ba'i dris lan chen po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /ngan song
84a1(rgyud): @#/ /gsum gyi 'jigs byed du/ /sems can nyon mongs sdang byed pas/ /de phyir de ni rdo rje che/ /zhe sdang zhes ni bsgrags pa yin/ /ngan song
84a2(rgyud): 'jigs pa chen po ru/ /sems can thams cad rmongs byed pas/ /de phyir 'di ni gti mug ste/ /rtag pa thub pa mchog yin no/ /thabs dang shes rab tshul nyid
84a3(rgyud): kyis| |'gro ba thams cad dga' byed cing / /pad+mo'i tshul tu rab rtogs phyir/ /de phyir 'dod chags zhes bya'o/ /bde chen sbyin pa'i sprin gyis ni/ /sems can thams
84a4(rgyud): cad nga rgyal bskyed/ /nam mkha'i bde ba bsdus pa'i phyir/ /de phyir mkha' chen nga rgyal yin/ /ro la sogs pa'i mnyam sbyor bas/ /phrag dog rdo rje gdon mi za/ /
84a5(rgyud): sna tshogs pad+mo rab 'jug phyir/ /de yi phyir ni sna tshogs che/ /'dod chags bral ba dga' med phyir/ /bdag ni dgyes sbas pa che/ /'dod pa ma gtogs bde
84a6(rgyud): byed med/ /bde che 'dod pa nga yin no/ /'dod chags med par byang chub med/ /byang chub med na'ang 'dod chags med/ /sdig pa'i nang na chags bral te/ /sangs rgyas
84a7(rgyud): bde mchog mnyes byed pas/ /'dod chags 'dod las bde byed kyi/ /bde ba mchog tu rmad byung 'gyur/ /byang chub sems med bde byed gzhan/ /'jig rten
84b1(rgyud): gsum po 'dir med do/ /thams cad byang chub sems ngo bo/ /bde ba kun gyis tshim par 'gyur/ /bo zhes pa ni rdo rjer bshad/ /d+hi zhes pa ni gzungs ma'i mchog/ ci zhes
84b2(rgyud): pa ni zag par bshad/ /ta zhes pa ni bde ba che/ /mchod pa med pas bde byed med/ /bde ba med pas mgu ba med/ /mgu bas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /grub na bde byed
84b3(rgyud): rtag pa yi/ /phyag na rdo rje bde ba che/ /'dod pa'i bde bas mchod byed cing / /tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/ /bde ba kun gyis gzhir gyur pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings ni rnam par
84b4(rgyud): 'dzin/ /rdo rje 'dzin phyir gzungs ma yin/ /hrI zhes pa ni pad+mo 'dzin/ /'di dang mnyam par sbyor ba yi/ /yi ge myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /'dod pa lnga yi yon tan kun/ /
84b5(rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa ste/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje 'dzin/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i longs spyod de/ /de phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga/ /de yis bsnyen na grub par 'gyur//
84b6(rgyud): sngags kyi sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan/ /dbang phyug mchog gis sngags rgyal lo/ /rdo rje sems kyi thugs las skyes/ /mtshan can mchog tu sbas par bshad/ /de dang mnyam du
84b7(rgyud): sbyor ba yis/ /mchog gi dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur/ /pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub par byed/ /blo ldan de ru zhags gyur na'o/ /dam tshig
85a1(rgyud): @#/ /spas pa chogs kyi rnams/ /dri chu byang chub dmar po'i mchog /sha chen sbrang rtsi mar nyid kyis/ /lus la kun tu khyab gnas te/ /de yi phyir ni
85a2(rgyud): dam tshig che/ /dam tshig 'di yis dngos grub ste/ /dam tshig yi ger ldan pa yis/ /sbyor ces sbyang dang bskyed byas na/ /bza' ba dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur/ /de nas
85a3(rgyud): pha rol phyin ma kun/ /pad+mo'i gzigs pa rgyas pa yi/ /'dzum bcas g.yon nas gar mdzad cing / /rtag pa la ni yang gsol pa/ /rigs ni rnam pa du ru bstan/ /ji ltar
85a4(rgyud): sbas pa gsum zhes bgyi/ /sna tshogs chen po de dag kun/ /bde la gnas pas bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
85a5(rgyud): gnyis su med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las de bzhin gshegs
85a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba pha rol tu phyin ma'i de kho na nyid rab tu phyung ngo / /nga nyid sbyor ba bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' don chen sbyin/ /rigs kyi
85a7(rgyud): khyad par lnga rnams kyis/ /sbyong bcas mi spyod rnams la rol/ /rtag pa mi bskyod rin chen mchog /'jig dbang gdon mi za grub rnams/ /rigs ni rnam pa brgyad
85b1(rgyud): bstan te/ /mdo ru bsdus na rnam pa lnga/ /lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis/ /khyad par theg pa rnam pa gsum/ /de nyid gsum po rdo rje mnga'/ /bde ba'i gnas la rol pa
85b2(rgyud): mdzad/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ rang gi sdom pa gsol ba 'debs so/ /sdom pa dngos grub kun sbyin
85b3(rgyud): pa| |brtul zhugs dka' thub sngags mkhan gyi/ /dam tshig mchog tu srung ba rnams/ /bcom ldan gsang ba nyid kyis gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang
85b4(rgyud): po mchog tu shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba la mngon par chags pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen te/ zhal rab tu bzhad pas rgyas
85b5(rgyud): nas nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / /thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / /sku dang gsung dang thugs sbas pas/ /nan tan du ni bsrung bar bya/ /bsrungs pa yis ni bsod nams
85b6(rgyud): che| |dngos grub shin tu skye bar 'gyur/ /de ni 'di yis rgya che ba'i/ /yid kyis kha dog dbyibs chen gyi/ /phyag rgya bcings la sogs pas btab/ /sbas pa'i sku ni
85b7(rgyud): rab bsgrub bya/ /rdo rje gsung du rab sbyor bas/ /chos kyi ngo bo phyag rgyas brjod/ /ngag sbas gsang bar brjod pa ni/ /nga ro spangs pa rdo rje'i gsung / /rang sems rab tu
86a1(rgyud): @#/ /'bigs pa yis/ /zla ba rdo rje rnam par sgom/ /rang bzhin gsum po gcig tu sgom/ /'di ni yid sbas chen po yin/ /'di ni de nyid rgya chen
86a2(rgyud): mchog / rgyun du sgom pa rnams byas te/ /gsum bsgoms pas ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /gzhan min rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs/ /sbas gsum la sogs cho ga yis/ /
86a3(rgyud): phyag rgya thams cad rgyas btab ste/ /de bas nan tan thams cad kyi/ /sbas gsum rnam par sba bar bya/ /rdo rje mchog 'dzin chen po dang / /gtso bo chen pos byin gyis
86a4(rgyud): rlob| / blon po gang gis 'das byas na/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa skad cig 'jig /sems dpa' che dang bral 'gyur na/ /ngan song gsum du yang dang yang / /ji tsam nam
86a5(rgyud): mkha'i dkyil 'khor ba/ /shin tu mi bzad smin par 'gyur/ /de nas dam tshig de dag kun/ /rdo rje 'dzin la mgu gyur te/ /'jam po'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing //
86a6(rgyud): g.yon gyis phyag byas slar gsol pa/ /gar dbang rnam gnon gnon par gar mdzad cing / /mtha' yas phyag ni bcu pa'i bsgyings pa yis/ /pad+ma'i lo ma 'jam po
86a7(rgyud): brgyad phye nas/ /gnyis min bde bar rdo rje 'jog mdzad de/ /sbas pa de nyid mi mnyams sad par 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dam skyes zla ba yang dag 'du/ /thabs dang shes
86b1(rgyud): rab dgyes pa bde byed sogs/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi sbas pa nyid kyis shod/ /sbyor dang sbyor min yang dag sbyor/ /zhi ba'i thal mo mchog tu bde/ /'dod pa lnga yi yon
86b2(rgyud): tan 'grub/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan dam tshig rgyal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /de nyid sbas pa bskul ba yis/ /sbas pa ma lus 'chad
86b3(rgyud): par 'chad/ /rdo rje pad+mo mnyam sbyor bas/ /cho gar ldan pas gang dbang bskur/ /bde bar 'dod pa'i slob dpon gyis/ /de nyid 'di ni de la bstan/ /'di la khrus med nges pa
86b4(rgyud): med| |dka' thub med de dka' ba'ang med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /nga nyid sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'
86b5(rgyud): nyid du 'gyur/ /rdo rje dbab pa skyes 'gyur na/ /ji tsam 'dod par nam mkhar 'phur/ /snying gar rdo rje khu tshur bcings/ /rdo rje lta bas rnam bltas te/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis
86b6(rgyud): bsnyen byas na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' skad cig 'gyur/ /rnam sgeg dgyes pa'i rnam gnon pas/ /rab dgyes sar ni 'gro byed de/ /sangs rgyas bde ba chen po dang / /grub pa yis
86b7(rgyud): byang mchod byed cing / /rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya che mchog /'gying ba'i langs pas gar byed pas/ /bde byed zla ba'i 'od 'dra zhing / /las kyi khyad par la sogs gnon/ /
87a1(rgyud): @#/ /sbas pa'i gar gyis gar byas pas/ /sbas pa sbyor ba'i bdag nyid 'grub/ /sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gar byed cing / /lag pa mang po rnam bsgyur
87a2(rgyud): dang | |phyir brkyang dbyings su ldan pa dang / /khro bar dri med lta ba yis/ /gdul dka' gnon pa 'jigs byed pa'i/ /'jig rten gsum po rnam rgyal 'gyur/ /me 'bar
87a3(rgyud): nyi ma'i dbus nyid du/ /khro bo hUM mdzad bsgom byas na/ /myur du 'jig rten don sgrub phyir/ /'jig rten gsum po rnam rgyal 'gyur/ /lha mo bzhi dang mnyam sbyor pas/ /
87a4(rgyud): su ra ta s+t+waM zhes smra zhing / /ha ra thig le tshul sbyar na/ /rab dgyes de ma thag tu 'gyur/ /rab dgyes mchog tu brtag pa yi/ /sa chen rnal 'byor 'gro 'gyur te/ /lha mo
87a5(rgyud): bzhi dang 'grogs pa yi/ /sems can rnams kyi don kun byed/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad bde ba chen po la phyag bzhes nas gsol ba/ thal
87a6(rgyud): mo yang dag sbyor byas te/ /phyag rgya de nyid kyis shod/ /rdo rje mchog la gsol ba 'debs/ /bde ba'i bdag nyid mchod par shod/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri che dang / /
87a7(rgyud): ro dang reg pa yid 'ong ba'i/ thugs rje chen pos bsgrubs pa yis/ /dpa' bo chen po nyid kyis shod/ /de nas bcom ldan bde byed che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po
87b1(rgyud): che| |phyag rgya bcings pa bde ba che/ /de nyid mchog ni bshad par mdzad/ /dang po chos kyi phyag rgya ste/ /gnyis pa dam tshig phyag rgya yin/ /gsum pa phyag rgya chen po ste/ /bzhi
87b2(rgyud): pa las kyi phyag rgyar bshad/ /de nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje/ /ji ltar 'gying bzhin bsgom bya ba/ /sna tshogs ye shes rjes su dag /sna tshogs chen pos 'chad par mdzad//
87b3(rgyud): rtag pa'i sku ni ser po ste/ /mi bskyod rdo rje dkar po yin/ /nam mkha'i snying po mthing ga che/ /tshe dpag med pa pad+mo dmar/ /sna tshogs kha dog rgya tsho mchog /'od zer phreng ba
87b4(rgyud): rmad byung ba'i/ /gdon mi za ba rdo rje che/ /don chen byed pa bsam par bya/ /rang rang rigs kyi gnas nyid du/ /myur du nam mkhar 'gro byed cing / /rigs kyi lha mo bzhi rnams
87b5(rgyud): kyis| |rol pa dang ni mchod par byed/ /sna tshogs sbyor ba bde che ba'i/ /lha mo bzhi dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /rdo rje sbyor bdag bsgoms byas na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid
87b6(rgyud): 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog /rdo rje la sogs gdan bzhugs par/ /rang gi 'khor lo mchog gi rgyan/ /rang gi phyag rgyar gnas par bsam/
87b7(rgyud): pad+mo'i gdan gyi tshul gyis ni/ /brtse dang ldan pas bsgoms byas te/ /snying po sbas don gar byas pas/ /sbas pa che la bde byed na/ /'gying ba'i bde bar ldan pa yi/ /
88a1(rgyud): @#/ /rdo rje chen po de 'grub ste/ /sna tshogs dkyil 'khor rab nye ba/ /sna tshogs chen po 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bde ba chen po thams cad 'grub pa'i
88a2(rgyud): sbyor pa chen po'i bde ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya rab tu rgyas pa'o/ /de nas phyag rgya bcings bshad de/ /rtag la sogs pa'i de kho na/ /gang gis myur du bcings pa
88a3(rgyud): yi| |sangs rgyas dngos grub bde cher 'gro/ /thabs ni g.yas kyi logs su bya/ /de bzhin shes rab g.yon par te/ /zhi ba'i thal mo gsum nyid kyi/ /sbyor
88a4(rgyud): ba'i tshul gyis bsdu bar bya/ /sor mo thams cad bar bar du/ /mnyam du sbyor bas khyad par sbyin/ /rdo rje yi ni thal mo 'dis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad nyid du
88a5(rgyud): bsgrub/ /'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / /nam mkha'i snying po'i gnas su 'gro/ /'di nyid shin tu bcings pa yi/ /gsum du sbyor bas mchod pa bya/ /de nyid
88a6(rgyud): las ni sor mo kun/ /kun tu bskums te bcing bar bya/ /rdo rje'i bcing ba bsdus pas ni/ /bcing bar ldan par rnam bsgyur te/ /de nyid sbom po rab bcug nas/ /khro
88a7(rgyud): mo'i rtse mo rab tu dgug / 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi bcing / /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'grub byed/ /de bzhin bcing ba rnam bzhag ste/ /sbom po khro mo'i rtse mo sbyar/ /'di
88b1(rgyud): ni bcing ba bcing ba che/ /nam mkha' 'gro ba nye bar sgrub/ /de nyid bcing bas bcing byas te/ /khro mo gnyis po mtshan bzhin du/ /rtse mo sprad de dgug bya ba/ /bcing ba 'di
88b2(rgyud): yis pad+mo sgrub/ /bcing ba de nyid rab tu sbom/ /bde ba bcug nas bsdam byas te/ /las kyi bcing ba sbyor ba yis/ /don yod mchog gi rigs su 'gro/ /bcing ba de nyid
88b3(rgyud): bcing byas te/ /sbom dang khro bo'i rtse mo sbyar/ /g.yas pa'i sbom po rdo rje yis/ /de yi dbus su bcug bya ba/ /de 'di bcing ba chen po ste/ /rab dgyes ro ni sgrub byed pa/ /gang
88b4(rgyud): gis bcings pa tsam gyis ni/ /rab tu dgyes pa nyid 'thob bo/ /dngos grub thams cad bde ba che/ /de yis 'di tshe 'thob 'gyur te/ /phyag rgya bcing ba'i cho ga yis/ /sangs
88b5(rgyud): rgyas thams cad rab tu gnas/ /phyag rgya bcing ba'i ye shes rnam par rgyas pa'o// //bcing ba lnga yi cho ga yis/ /gcig gis rnal 'byor bsgrub mi bya/ /drug ni
88b6(rgyud): sbyor bas sbyor byas na/ /de ma thag tu rab dgyes 'gyur/ /bcing ba lnga yi phyag rgya'o/ /de bzhin bcing ba gnyis byas te/ /g.yon gyi snying gar bcing bar bya/ /g.yas kyi rtse mo
88b7(rgyud): sgrang byas te/ /rdo rje'i tshul gyis gzung bar bya/ /phyag rgya 'di ni byang chub bde/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu sgrub/ /gdon mi za bar tshe 'di la/ /rtag pa 'dra ba thob
89a1(rgyud): @#/ /par byed/ /g.yon pa de nyid snying gar bzhag /g.yas pa sa la reg byas pas/ /sa la bde bar rol pa yis/ /'di yis mi zad 'thob par
89a2(rgyud): 'gyur/ /de bzhin snying gar g.yon pa bzhag /lag pa g.yas pa rab sbyin bya/ /'di yis rin chen skal ldan sogs/ /nam mkha' nye bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /de
89a3(rgyud): bzhin g.yon pa snying gar bzhag / g.yas kyang bzhag ste ting 'dzin gnas/ /'di yis tshe dpag med pa nyid/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin g.yon
89a4(rgyud): pa snying gar sbyar/ /lag pa g.yas pa mi 'jigs sbyin/ /'jigs pa ma lus rab sgrol ba/ /sdig pa gdug pa 'jigs pa che/ /'di yis thams cad 'phrog par
89a5(rgyud): byed| / gdon mi za ba'i nges pa yis/ /de ni chen po'i chen por 'gyur/ /de nyid bcing ba gnyis byas te/ /g.yon pa g.yon du sbyar bar bya/ /g.yas ni snying gar gzung
89a6(rgyud): byas te/ /brjid pas rab tu bzhad cing gnas/ /bde ba chen po thabs gnas pas/ /'di yis rab dgyes nyid 'gyur te/ /bde mchog nyid du sgrub pa po/ /tshe 'di nyid
89a7(rgyud): la the tshom med/ /de bzhin bcing ba bcing byas te/ /sbyor dang ldan pas bstan par bya/ /sbom po'i rtse mo pad+mo'i gnas/ /g.yon gyi khro mo'i rtse mor sbyar/ /g.yas
89b1(rgyud): pa yi ni sbom po yi/ /mngon sum rdo rjer byas pa yis/ /bcug nas bde ba spyod bya zhing / /skad cig skad cig bsdam par bya/ /de 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /dgyes
89b2(rgyud): pa dgyes mchog sgrub pa po/ /'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / /yang dag rdo rje dgyes pa 'thob/ /rab dgyes bde mchog longs spyod kyi/ /btsun mo dngos grub nyid du
89b3(rgyud): 'gyur/ /g.yas ni mtshan mas bgrang byas te/ /lcags kyu'i tshul du gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje 'dod ma lcags kyu ste/ /rdo rje 'dod byed btsun mo yi/ /dang por 'dren pa de nyid
89b4(rgyud): bzhag / tha mar ha ra thig ler bya/ /rdo rje dgyes pa bde 'thob byed/ /ming ni dbus su bri bar bya/ /'di yis snying gar byas pa yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bde mchog
89b5(rgyud): 'gro/ /phyag rgya bzhi dang 'grogs pa yis/ /lus 'dis tshe 'di 'grub par 'gyur/ /rab dgyes sbyor bar yang dag ldan/ /phyag rgya bzhi dang mnyam 'grogs shing / /rdo
89b6(rgyud): rje 'gying la sogs sprod pas/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni bcings pa yis/ /rab dgyes la sogs ma lus pa/ /rab dgyes ro la bsgyings ma yis/ /skad cig nyid du 'dren
89b7(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /de bzhin sbom mo'i rtse mor sbyar/ /snying rje chen po der bzhag pa/ /sbal pa chen po rdo rje spyan/ /de nyid don kun ston byed ma/ /'di ni yang dag bcings pa
90a1(rgyud): @#/ /yis| |rdo rje rtag pa'i spyan du 'gyur/ /yod dang med pa rnam spangs pa/ /dngos po thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i thal mo bstan bya ste//
90a2(rgyud): khro mo rtse mo zlum po yis/ /mthon por mtshan dang 'dra byas te/ /sbom por rdo rje bstan pa'i tshe/ /de 'di bcom ldan 'das ma mchog /rdo rje pad+mo'i bde 'thob byed/ /rnal 'byor
90a3(rgyud): 'di ni bcings pa yis/ /sbas pa chen po'i dgyes pa 'thob/ /de nas lha mo chen mo dag /spros pa che bas gar mdzad cing / /rdo rje bde byed bdag nyid la/ /bdud dang
90a4(rgyud): bcas pas phyag byas te/ /chos kyi yi ge thabs gnas nas/ /de nyid chos kyi gsol ba 'debs/ /chos kyi phyag rgya bde ba che/ /rdo rje bcom ldan bshad du gsol/ /
90a5(rgyud): sgrub pa pos ni rab bsgrims na/ /gang gis lha ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang gis myur du byin brlabs pas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub ste/ /bde byed gnyis
90a6(rgyud): kyis spro che ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas 'jug 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/ nyid kyi sku dang /
90a7(rgyud): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje sbas pa las chos kyi phyag rgya chen po'i tshig 'di phyung ngo / /bcu gsum bdag nyid 'dren pa ste/ /thig le lhar ni yang dag ldan/ /tha mar
90b1(rgyud): ha ra thig ler gnas/ /rab tu dgyes pa rdo rje dgyes/ /snying gar phyag rgya 'di byas nas/ /dga' byed lhan cig rtsen byed cing / /spyod dang mi spyod 'grub 'gyur te/ /rnal 'byor
90b2(rgyud): bde ba chen por 'gro/ /de bzhin 'dren pa thog mar bya/ /rdo rje 'dod pa kyo ba mchog /har thig le yang dag ldan/ /cha gnyis gsum pa sbyar byas pa/ /'di ni snying gar bzhag
90b3(rgyud): byas na/ /bde bar nam mkhar 'gro 'gyur te/ /bde ba shin tu rtag pa yi/ /'di yis mchog tu dngos grub bo/ /'dren pa de nyid thog mar bzhag /ltos ltos zhes pa hUM
90b4(rgyud): dang ldan/ /skal pa chen po rdo rje spyan/ /dbus su bskul bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /'phrul gyi spyan lnga nor che ba/ /'di yis rnal 'byor 'grub 'gyur te/ /rdo rje byang
90b5(rgyud): chub dgyes pa che/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ /dang por 'dren pa de nyid bzhag /tha mar ha ra thig ler bya/ /rdo rje dgyes pa bde 'thob byed/ /ming
90b6(rgyud): ni dbus su bri bar bya/ /'di yis snying gar byas pa yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bde mchog 'gro /phyag rgya bzhi dang 'grogs pa yis/ /lus 'dis 'di che
90b7(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur/ /rab dgyes sbyor bar yang dag zhon/ /phyag rgya bzhi dang mnyam 'grogs shing / /rdo rje 'gying la sogs sprod pas/ /bcom ldan 'dod ma
91a1(rgyud): @#/ /'grub par 'gyur/ /chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi don gyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o// //de nas bcom ldan sbyor ba che/ /thog ma tha ma
91a2(rgyud): med pa mchog / gdug pa thams cad gdul ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje khro bor de 'gyur ro/ /mdun du thog ma'i lha nyid du/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad nyi ma 'bar/ /nyi ma bcu gnyis
91a3(rgyud): gzi brjid che/ /me 'bar rab tu 'bar bar ldan/ /'khor gyi 'khor lo de dag kun/ /dur khrod kyi ni rgyan mchog gis/ /brgyan te gdug pa'i tshogs rnams la//
91a4(rgyud): de ni yang dag rol pa mdzad/ /khro chen mchog 'dul phyag rgya 'di/ /sngags ni rang gi snying gar bsgom/ /khro mo'i bu mos mdun du bskor/ /khro mo chen mo de
91a5(rgyud): 'grub bo/ /'di yis gdug pa thams cad rnams/ /hUM byas myur du brgyab par 'gyur/ /de dag gdug pa gdug pa che/ /'jigs shing 'khrugs te rab tu 'jig /
91a6(rgyud): skyobs shig skyobs shig ces smra zhing / /rdo rje gtsol dran par byed/ /phyag rgya 'di ni mnyam par gzhag /'gro ba thams cad dbab bya ste/ /las mchog thams
91a7(rgyud): cad sgrub pa pos/ /dgra yi rnams ni gzhig par bya/ /sbyor dang ldan pas 'bum bzlas te/ /las rnams thams cad byed ba na/ /gdon mi za bar kun 'gyur te/ /rdo
91b1(rgyud): sems dpa' bsgrub par nus/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /khro bo'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so/ /de nas sangs rgyas che de dag /sangs rgyas
91b2(rgyud): nyid skyes thams cad mchog / gzugs ma rnal 'byor ma thams cad/ /rang gi 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshogs/ /phan tshun bde ba ldan pa yi/ /dga' bas 'khor rnams
91b3(rgyud): 'phags 'gyur te/ /rang gi bde byed skyes par 'brel/ /skal pa chen me rtsen par byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen pos rang gi 'khor
91b4(rgyud): gyi 'khor lo'i tshogs rnams la yang dang / yang du gzigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dren pa'i rig ma'i snying po 'dis sdud pa mdzad do/ /oM badzra
91b5(rgyud): ang+ku sha / du ru du ru/ e h+ye hi kaD+D+h+ya bi kaD+D+h+ya sar+b+bAn+paR+Sha ta tsakra sany+tsa ya/ badzra ang+ku sha hUM phaT/ 'di yi phyag rgya rdo rje yi/ /bcings pa gnyis ni dam byas te/ /rdo rje khro mo dgrol
91b6(rgyud): bar bya/ /rdo rje'i khro ba rab sbyar ba/ /rdo rje'i kyo ba zhes bya'o/ /'gro dang ri bo sems can rnams/ /phyag rgya 'di yis kun bkug ste/ /'dod pas 'gying ba'i yid rtag rnams//
91b7(rgyud): mi yi bu mo smos ci dgos/ /rdo rje bcings pa mnyam gzhag ste/ /g.yon gyi steng du de bzhin bzhag /dbus su sbom mo gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje 'dren pa gzi brjid che//
92a1(rgyud): @#/ /rdo rje bcing pa bsdam byas te/ /rdo rje sbom mo rtse mo sprad/ /bdag ni rdo rje zhes bsgom zhing / /bcing ba de ni dgrol bar bya/ /de nyid bcing ba dam
92a2(rgyud): byas te/ /dbang dang chung ngu'i rtsa ba'i mtshams/ /rdo rje sbom mo nus byas te/ /rab dgyes bdag nyid bskyod par bya/ /de las rdo rje mchog gnyis bskyed/ /mdud pa'i
92a3(rgyud): tshul du sbyar bar bya/ /gzhug pa dang ni 'dren pa'i mchog /'di yis thams cad dngos grub pas/ /rnal 'byor phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis/ /drangs te bcug nas bcing
92a4(rgyud): byas te/ /dbang du byas nas bsgrub par bya/ /de nas de dag thams cad drangs bcug bcings dga' ba bskyed nas/ rang gi rab tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen pos/ /rang
92a5(rgyud): gi rgyal srid rjes su skyong zhing rdo rje chos la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi tshul chen po/ /dga' byed zla gsang thig le yi/ /rab dgyes bdag nyid gsang
92a6(rgyud): ba 'di/ /sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis zungs/ /de nas gdan las myur bzhengs te/ /thal mo sbyar te phyag bzhes nas/ /chos kyi ngo bor chig smras pa/ /bde ba chen po
92a7(rgyud): bdag gis blangs/ /rang bde longs spyod gar byas te/ /rdo rje tshe yis 'di skad smras/ /rdo rje chos ni sna tshogs che/ /sna tshogs pad+mo gar rab byed/ /de nas pha rol
92b1(rgyud): phyin de kun/ /rab dgyes longs spyod gar byed cing / /bde byed chen po'i bdag nyid rje/ /legs pa zhes pa sbyin byed de/ /legs so legs so bde ba che/ /legs so legs so
92b2(rgyud): ye shes che/ /legs so legs so sna tshogs che/ /legs so legs so dgyes pa che/ /bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa'i thugs kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ pha rol tu phyin
92b3(rgyud): ma'i 'khor chen mo de dag mngon par dga' bar gyur to/ /zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po mchog tu gsang ba yongs su rdzogs so// //lo ts+tsha ba rin
92b4(rgyud): chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o/ /gsung rab don rtogs slob dpon gyis/ /lhag par bkrol te bstan pa la/ /ci rigs bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyis/ /sems can sems
92b5(rgyud): bde thob par smon/ / //rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga tat+t+wa saM gra ha nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus
92b6(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
92b7(rgyud): na| bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad thugs rje chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje byin gyis brlabs dang / dam tshig gi ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs kyi
93a1(rgyud): @#/ /khyad par dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyis khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal po'i dbang bskur
93a2(rgyud): ba mnga' brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnal 'byor chen po'i dbang phyug /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag
93a3(rgyud): r gya thams cad mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud cing thams cad kyi dgos pa mdzad pa nyid kyis sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad kyi re ba thams
93a4(rgyud): cad yongs su skong ba'i 'phrin las mdzad pa/ thugs rje che ba rnam par snang mdzad dus gsum du rtag par bzhugs shing sku dang / gsung dang / thugs thams cad rdo rje lta
93a5(rgyud): bur gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs shing bsngags bstod pa/ nor bu dang / rin po che chen pos spras pa/ kha dog sna
93a6(rgyud): tshogs shing dril bu btags pa/ dar dang / 'phan dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga ma dang / dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pa dang / zla ba rlung gis bskyod pa rnams
93a7(rgyud): kyis mdzes par byas pa'i 'og min gyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na bzhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
93b1(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje dang / kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / 'jam dpal dang / sems bskyed
93b2(rgyud): ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang / bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
93b3(rgyud): po bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'ang 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na de
93b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa tshad med grangs med pa de dag gi skus kyang til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang bar snang ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad
93b5(rgyud): med grangs med pa rnams snang ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na'ang chos kyi tshul 'di dag 'chad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po nam mkha'i dbyings
93b6(rgyud): thams cad bzhin du rtag par bzhugs shing sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje lta bur gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pas rdo rje'i
93b7(rgyud): dbyings thams cad thugs su chud pa'i ye shes sems dpa'/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs las byung ba'i ye shes
94a1(rgyud): @#/ /kyi snying po/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas ba nyid kyi rdo rje chen po'i ye shes rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i rin po che chen po/ nam mkha'i
94a2(rgyud): d byings thams cad du spros pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par gyur cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ngo bo nyid dag
94a3(rgyud): pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dag par thugs su chud pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i gzugs thams cad du yang dag par ston
94a4(rgyud): pa mkhyen pas sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i khams rnams 'dul bar spyod pa'i mchog tu gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
94a5(rgyud): kyi bka' nod cing don yod par mdzad pa nyid kyi thams cad dang mnyam pa med cing bla na med pa'i 'phrin las sna tshogs mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa

94b1(rgyud): kyi rin po che'i dbang chen po bskur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam
94b2(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams

94b6(rgyud): sbyin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings pa'i ye shes rnams so/ /kun bzang rab tu gdon mi za/ /bdud
94b7(rgyud): dang rab dgyes gtso bo dang / /mkha' skyes shin tu gzi chen dang / rin chen dpal dang 'dzum pa che/ /kun tu gzigs pa'i dbang chen dang / /'jam dpal dkyil
95a1(rgyud): @#/ /'khor thams cad dang / /mi gsung ba dang thams cad las/ /brtson 'grus ma rungs dam du bzung / /rdo rje lcags kyu mda' gzhu dang / /rin
95a2(rgyud): chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan 'dzum/ /pad+ma ral gri 'khor lo gsung / /las dang go cha 'jigs byed bcas/ /thog ma tha ma med cing zhi/ /ma rungs khro bo bzod pa che/
95a3(rgyud): gnod sbyin srin po dam pa brtan/ /gzi byin dpa' bo khyab bdag che/ /u mA'i bdag po skye dgu'i mgon/ /gtogs 'dod rgyal 'dod thub pa che/ /'jig rten skyong dang

95a5(rgyud): 'da' dang rtag / yang dag 'tsho dang mchod pa dang / sangs rgyas dag pa theg pa che/ /srid gsum rtag pa'ang de bzhin no/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal bde spyod dang //
95a6(rgyud): bde spyod mgon po rab 'dul mdzad/ /rdo rje gco dang sa rab mchog/ ye shes pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam thar dang / /de bzhin gshegs

95b1(rgyud): pa dang / /sems dpa' che dang phyag rgya che/ /ting 'dzin sangs rgyas 'phrin las mdzad/ /yang dag sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid/ /sems can rtag don rtogs mdzad pa/ /sdong
95b2(rgyud): po chen po bde ba che/ /thabs chen dang ni mchog chen mchog /kun gyi mchog dang gnas dbang po/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems po'i thugs/ /byang chub sems dpa'

95b5(rgyud): cad grub pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa gang na ba der gshegs te/ byang chub sems dpa' de la ched du rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i sku bstan

96b1(rgyud): tshon gyis bsgyur ba bzhin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sems shes pa rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta

97b5(rgyud): d e bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyis skad cig ma da nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par sangs

98a2(rgyud): gyur to/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid
98a3(rgyud): kyi ye shes bskyed/ nam mkha' las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro/ /kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i chos kyi ye shes bskyed/
98a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad la bzhag nas ri rab kyi rtse mo gang na ba dang / khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje nor bu dang / rin po che las byas ba gang
