98a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi seng ge'i gdan la zhal kun tu bstan te bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ldan dang / de
98a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du so so nas bdag
98b1(rgyud): nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir/ phyogs thams cad mnyam
98b2(rgyud): pa nyid du dmigs nas phyogs bzhir bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po
98b3(rgyud): ma lon pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nam mkha' las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che chen
98b4(rgyud): po'i dbang gis dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyis dbang po'i chos kyi ye shes dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa/ de
98b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad gdon mi za bar ston pa/ thogs pa med pa/ dgongs pa rdzogs pa/ yid kyi bsam ba'o cog yongs su rdzogs pas de
98b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i dam
98b7(rgyud): tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon
99a1(rgyud): @#/ /par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra satwa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
99a2(rgyud): cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po de nyid/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur nas byung ste/ sems can thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems
99a3(rgyud): chen po yang dag par sbyangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyogs phyogs su 'khod do/ /de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams
99a4(rgyud): cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs su zhugs par gyur to/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu
99a5(rgyud): brtan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis gcig tu 'bres par gyur nas nam mkha'i khams thams cad du 'od zer rtse lnga pa'i phreng bas khyab
99a6(rgyud): par zhugs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje lta bu'i dbyings su gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ste phyag
99a7(rgyud): gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje de las rdo rje de lta bu'i 'od zer gzugs dang / kha dog sna tshogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bas khyab par byed pa rnams byung
99b1(rgyud): bo| |rdo rje lta bu'i 'od zer de dag gi rtse mo las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/ chos kyi dbyings
99b2(rgyud): kun tu khyab pa thams cad dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad du de bzhin
99b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par byang chub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa dang / kun tu bzang
99b4(rgyud): po'i spyod pa sna tshogs grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs mnyes bar mdzad pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po chen por gshegs pa dang / bdud thams cad
99b5(rgyud): 'dul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi byang chub chen por mngon par byang chub pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nas/ ji srid sems
99b6(rgyud): can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su skyob cing thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes
99b7(rgyud): dang | mngon par shes pa dam pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams kyi bar du bstan nas/ rdo rje sems
100a1(rgyud): @#/ /dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni kun tu bzang po yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i
100a2(rgyud): skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas/ 'di skad du ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma ho bdag ni rang byung ba'i/ /kun tu bzang po
100a3(rgyud): sems dpa' brtan/ /de ni brtan phyir lus min yang / /sems dpa'i lus su gyur pa yin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i sku bcom ldan 'das
100a4(rgyud): kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan
100a5(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / /ye shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
100a6(rgyud): cad kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / sems can
100a7(rgyud): gyi don bya ba dang / thabs chen po dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / ye shes chen po'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab
100b1(rgyud): ba dang / thams cad kyi dbang por bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ ji srid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang
100b2(rgyud): mngon par shes pa bla na med pa dang / theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs par grub pa'i mchog thob pa'i par du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
100b3(rgyud): kun tu bzang po de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur pa nyid du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang / cod pan gyi dbang gis dbang
100b4(rgyud): bskur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa'i rdo rje de de'i lag par byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ lag na rdo rje/ lag na rdo rje
100b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje phyag g.yon pa rdo rje bsgyings par bzhugs te/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje
100b6(rgyud): thugs kar gsor zhing 'phen pa'i tshul du 'dzin cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi grub pa yi/ /rdo rje bla na med pa 'di/ /bdag ste bdag gi lag tu byin//
100b7(rgyud): rdo rje la ni rdo rje gnas/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i sems dpa'i byin gyis
101a1(rgyud): @#/ /brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan drang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de
101a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra rA dza/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ma thag pa 'di
101a3(rgyud): ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lcags kyu chen por gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs
101a4(rgyud): su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje lcags kyu chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje lcags kyu'i
101a5(rgyud): dbyibs chen po de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
101a6(rgyud): cad spyan drang ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu gdon ni za ba'i rgyal po
101a7(rgyud): yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po shin tu gdon mi za ba'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das
101b1(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o rdo rje las byung ba'i/ /lcags kyu nges pa'i rgyal po bdag /gang phyir kun tu sangs rgyas
101b2(rgyud): khyab| |grub phyir kun nas spyan 'dren to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung
101b3(rgyud): ste| de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
101b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i dam
101b5(rgyud): tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad dgug pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs
101b6(rgyud): p a thams cad 'du ba'i byin gyis brlabs dam pa'i bar du bsgrub pa'i phyir rdo rje'i lcags kyu de byang chub sems dpa' gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po de'i lag par de bzhin du byin
101b7(rgyud): no| |de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje dgug pa rdo rje dgug pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
102a1(rgyud): @#/ /dpa' chen po rdo rje dgug pa/ rdo rje lcags kyu des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /sangs rgyas
102a2(rgyud): kun gyi rdo rje yi/ /ye shes bla na med pa 'di/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi don grub phyir/ /kun nas spyan drangs dam pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen
102a3(rgyud): po bdud ces bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
102a4(rgyud): cad mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra rA ga /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
102a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi me tog gi dmar gyur nas byung ste/
102a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje'i mda' chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te/ phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas
102a7(rgyud): rdo rje ma da'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa
102b1(rgyud): thams cad mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bdud byed ba dang /
102b2(rgyud): rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas
102b3(rgyud): nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o bdag ni rang bzhin dag /rang byung ba dag dgyes byed pa/ /'dod chags bral rnams dag bya'i phyir/ /'dod chags kyis ni
102b4(rgyud): 'dul bar byed/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud de'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs
102b5(rgyud): kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i byin
102b6(rgyud): gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud rdo rje'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma
102b7(rgyud): lus shing lus pa med pa rnams mgu bar bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud kyi mchog grub
103a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa thong ba'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje'i mda' de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin
103a2(rgyud): no| |de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i gzhu/ rdo rje'i gzhu zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
103a3(rgyud): chen po rdo rje'i gzhu zhes bya bas rdo rje'i mda' des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bdud byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dod chags kyi//
103a4(rgyud): ye shes 'di ni dri ma med/ /'dod chags kyis ni chags bral bcom/ /bde ba thams cad sbyin bar byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
103a5(rgyud): dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de
103a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dga' ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra sA d+hu/ de
103a7(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de legs so zhes bya bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das
103b1(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres bar gyur nas rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje dgyes ba'i dbyibs de
103b2(rgyud): l as 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis legs so zhes
103b3(rgyud): bya ba la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu dga' bar byed pa nyid dang / rab tu brtan
103b4(rgyud): ba'i phyir gcig tu gyur par 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i lus su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
103b5(rgyud): pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o thams cad mkhyen kun gyi/ /legs sbyin nang na bdag mchog pas/ /rnam
103b6(rgyud): rtog bral ba de dag gi/ /nges par dgyes pa bskyed pa yin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka
103b7(rgyud): nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
104a1(rgyud): @#/ /gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab
104a2(rgyud): tu dgyes pa bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can thams cad mgu bar bya ba dang / thams cad bde ba
104a3(rgyud): dang | yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgyes pa'i ro bla na med pa grub pa dam pa thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje dgyes pa
104a4(rgyud): de byang chub sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje dgyes pa/ rdo rje dgyes pa
104a5(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dgyes pas rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyibs des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
104a6(rgyud): la legs so zhes bya bas rab tu dgyes par byed cing / /ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi legs sbyin pa/ /'di ni rab tu 'jug byed pas/ /rdo rje thams
104a7(rgyud): cad dgyes par byed/ /lha rdzas dgyes pa spel ba'o/ /byang chub kyi sems chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig dang / de bzhin gshegs
104b1(rgyud): ba thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes dang / dgyes pa chen po dang / 'di bzhin ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i sems dpa'o/ /de nas yang bcom
104b2(rgyud): l dan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig las byung ba rin po che'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
104b3(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas
104b4(rgyud): phyung ngo / /badzra rat+na/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid
104b5(rgyud): kyi ye shes shin tu gtogs pa yin pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin ba de nyid de nam mkha' thams cad kyi 'od zer su gyur nas byung ngo / /nam mkha' thams cad kyi
104b6(rgyud): 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas pas thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings lta bur gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis
104b7(rgyud): brlabs kyis nam mkha'i dbyings de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms par
105a1(rgyud): @#/ /gyur pa'i phyir/ yang nam mkha'i khams thams cad las byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje
105a2(rgyud): rin po che chen po'i dbyibs su gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje rin po che'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul
105a3(rgyud): shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa dang / de bzhin
105a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad
105a5(rgyud): kyi snying po las shin tu byung ba dang / rab tu bstan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan
105a6(rgyud): 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o chags med rgyal pa yang / /khams gsum dbang por dgos pas
105a7(rgyud): na/ /rdo rje rin chen dam pa yi/ /dbang gi mchog ni bdag yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i lus de bcom ldan 'das
105b1(rgyud): thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang dag pa'i bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom
105b2(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu rin po che'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs
105b3(rgyud): pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus ba med pa'i don thams cad yongs su grub par bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde
105b4(rgyud): ba dang / yid bde ba myong ba bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don dam pa phun sum tshogs pa grub pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
105b5(rgyud): dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor bar rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas lag tu rdo rje nor bu de byin no/ /de nas de bzhin
105b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje snying po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rdo
105b7(rgyud): rje'i nor bu de rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su 'jog cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sems dpa'i dbyibs/ /dbang bskur de ni bdag yin te//
106a1(rgyud): @#/ /bdag gi lag tu byin bas na/ rin chen la ni rin chen bzhag de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
106a2(rgyud): chen po gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rin po che'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ /de bzhin
106a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra te dza/ de nas de bzhin
106a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen por gyur nas bcom ldan 'das
106a5(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje nyi ma'i dbyibs su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas
106a6(rgyud): rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs
106a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi 'od zer 'gyed pa la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
106b1(rgyud): ni shin tu gzi brjid che pa nyid dang / rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po'i skur gyur nas/
106b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sems can khams kun tu/ /snang byed gzi brjid dpe med
106b3(rgyud): bdag / gang phyir sangs rgyas dag pa yi/ /'dren pa rnams dang sbyor bar byed/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid de'i lus bcom
106b4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te/ bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de
106b5(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de
106b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi gzi brjid mtshungs pa med pa dang thams
106b7(rgyud): cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od 'thob cing dngos grub dam pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje nyi ma
107a1(rgyud): @#/ /de byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i 'od/ rdo rje'i
107a2(rgyud): 'od ces bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje nyi ma des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snang bar
107a3(rgyud): byed cing / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi snang ba 'di/ /mi shes mun nag 'joms byed pa/ /shin tu phra rdul ji snyed pa'i/ /nyi ma'i 'od bas
107a4(rgyud): shin tu lhag / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che dpal gyi dam tshig las byung ba rin po che'i byin gyis brlabs
107a5(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin shegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba de
107a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra ke tu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di
107a7(rgyud): ni| bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de rgyal mtshan kha dog dang / gzugs dang / rgyan dang / dbyibs sna tshogs par gyur ta byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par
107b1(rgyud): snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi dbyibs su gyur nas/ phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi dbyibs
107b2(rgyud): de las/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po
107b3(rgyud): che'i rgyal mtshan sgreng ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rin po che'i dpal dang / shin tu
107b4(rgyud): brtan pa yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i dpal gyi skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la
107b5(rgyud): gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o don kun grub pa dang / /dgongs pa thams cad rdzogs pa yi/ /don rnams thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i/ /'dra
107b6(rgyud): med dpal ni bdag yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i dpal gyi sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs
107b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs
108a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
108a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi nor bu yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i rgyal mtshan sgreng ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi re ba thams cad
108a3(rgyud): yongs su bkang bar bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bdab dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don chen po'i dngos grub dam
108a4(rgyud): pa thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje rgyal mtshan de byang chub sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i dpal de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs
108a5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan/ /rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
108a6(rgyud): rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan des/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor du bcug nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du
108a7(rgyud): brjod do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa kun/ /yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yi/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan ni/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ /de nas
108b1(rgyud): y ang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po'i dam tshig las byung ba rin po che'i byin
108b2(rgyud): gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams
108b3(rgyud): cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra hA sa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de
108b4(rgyud): nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dzum par gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/
108b5(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzum pa'i dbyibs su gur te/ phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzum pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i
108b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul
108b7(rgyud): rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang
109a1(rgyud): @#/ /chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
109a2(rgyud): mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /rtag tu mnyam par gzhag rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas don la rab sbyor phyir/ /e ma'o bdag ni kun
109a3(rgyud): mchog gi / bzhad chen rmad du byung ba yin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po'i lus bcom ldan
109a4(rgyud): 'das kyi thugs las byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas
109a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de
109a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba bskyed pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad kyi dbang po bla na med
109a7(rgyud): pa bya ba dang / thams cad bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su sbyong ba'i ya shes mngon par thob pa'i
109b1(rgyud): bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po de'i lag tu rdo rje 'dzum pa de de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas
109b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dga' ba/ rdo rje dga' ba zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
109b3(rgyud): po rdo rje'i dga' bas rdo rje 'dzum pa des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes par byed cing / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//
109b4(rgyud): rmad byung skyed pa ston pa po/ /dgyes chen byed pa'i ye shes te/ /gtsug lag gzhan gyis shes mi nus/ /dbang bskur ba chen po dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang
109b5(rgyud): ba dang / sems dpa' chen po'i don dang / dgyes pa chen po dang / 'di bzhin ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang chen po'i sems dpa'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan
109b6(rgyud): ' das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i chos kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
109b7(rgyud): de 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka
110a1(rgyud): @#/ /nas phyung ngo / /badzra d+harma/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de
110a2(rgyud): nyid de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos kyi 'od zer du gyur te byung
110a3(rgyud): ngo| |dam pa'i chos kyi 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun tu snang bar byas nas chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du gyur to/ /chos kyi dbyings
110a4(rgyud): de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang mnyam par
110a5(rgyud): 'jug pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje pad+ma chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje pad+ma'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul
110a6(rgyud): shin tu phra mo dang mnyam ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa la
110a7(rgyud): sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni
110b1(rgyud): kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po yin ba dang / shin tu brtan pa yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs
110b2(rgyud): kyi dbang po'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o rang
110b3(rgyud): byung gdod nas dag / dam pa'i don ni bdag yin te/ /gang phyir gzings 'dra'i chos rnams las/ /rnam par dag pa dmigs par gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
110b4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi lus de bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngan
110b5(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ye
110b6(rgyud): shes dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi
110b7(rgyud): khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi bdag dang / gzhan rnam par dag par bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs
111a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa drug thob par byed pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
111a2(rgyud): chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas/ de'i lag tu rdo rje pad+ma de byin no/
111a3(rgyud): /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i spyan/ rdo rje'i spyan zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /
111a4(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rdo rje'i pad+ma de'i 'dab ma kha phye bas/ 'dod chags rnam par dag cing ma chags pa'i ngo bo nyid du
111a5(rgyud): gzigs pas gzigs shing / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dod chags kyi/ /de kho na nyid rtogs pa 'di/ /bdag ste bdag gi lag tu
111a6(rgyud): byin| |chos la chos ni gnas par 'gyur/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi dam tshig las byung ba'i chos kyi byin
111a7(rgyud): gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang / ye shes chen po'i dam tshig ces bya ba de
111b1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra tI k+Sh+Na/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom
111b2(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ shes rab dang / ye shes kyi ral gri rgyur te/ de byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres
111b3(rgyud): par gyur nas/ rdo rje ral gri'i dbyibs su gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje ral gri'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams
111b4(rgyud): cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang / ye shes la sogs pa dang /
111b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu 'jam pa'i dpal yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir
111b6(rgyud): gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la
111b7(rgyud): gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /'jam dbyangs bdag ni yin par dgongs/ /gang phyir shes rab gzugs
112a1(rgyud): @#/ /med kyang / /dbyangs nyid du ni dmigs pa yin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi sku de bcom ldan 'das
112a2(rgyud): kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas
112a3(rgyud): b com ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang ye shes kyi dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
112a4(rgyud): nas| de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad bcad pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi sdug
112a5(rgyud): bsngal thams cad bcad pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba rnams myong bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi rjes su 'brang
112a6(rgyud): ba'i shes rab dam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i bar du/ 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje'i ral gri de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal de'i
112a7(rgyud): lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i blo/ rdo rje'i blo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub
112b1(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje'i ral gri des 'debs shing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /'di na
112b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ /dgra rnams thams cad tshar gcod cing / /sdig pa thams cad 'jom pa'i mchog /de nas yang bcom ldan
112b3(rgyud): ' das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i chos kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i
112b4(rgyud): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
112b5(rgyud): snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra he tu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa
112b6(rgyud): de nyid de/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
112b7(rgyud): mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje 'khor lo'i dbyibs su gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas par gyur to/ /de nas rdo
113a1(rgyud): @#/ /rje 'khor lo'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
113a2(rgyud): sku rnams byung nas/ sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams
113a3(rgyud): thams cad du byas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par
113a4(rgyud): gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba'i skur gyur te bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
113a5(rgyud): mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /rdo rje dam pa chos can gyi/ /e ma'o rdo rje 'khor lo bdag /gang phyir sems bskyed tsam gyis kyang / /chos
113a6(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sku de bcom ldan 'das
113a7(rgyud): kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de
113b1(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
113b2(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med par 'jug pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang /
113b3(rgyud): yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dam pa grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje 'khor
113b4(rgyud): lo de ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
113b5(rgyud): kyis rdo rje snying po/ rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'khor lo des de bzhin
113b6(rgyud): gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'jog cing / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /chos rnams thams cad rnam par sbyong / /phyir
113b7(rgyud): mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo yang / /byang chub snying po yin par dgongs/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po mi gsung ba'i dam tshig las
114a1(rgyud): @#/ /byung ba'i chos kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brjod
114a2(rgyud): pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra b+hA Sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs
114a3(rgyud): las byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi yi ger gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das
114a4(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje brjod pa'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje brjod pa'i dbyibs
114a5(rgyud): d e las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
114a6(rgyud): nyid la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul la sogs pa byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu tshig ma yin pa dang / shin tu
114a7(rgyud): brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa'i skur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas
114b1(rgyud): nas| ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o rang byung rnams kyi gsang / /ldem po dag tu bdag dgongs te/ /gang phyir dam pa'i chos 'chad pa/ /tshig tu spros las
114b2(rgyud): rnam par bral/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab na zla
114b3(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi gsung ba'i gsung gi rdo
114b4(rgyud): rje'i dam tshig las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi ye shes kyi dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams
114b5(rgyud): ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi tshig grub pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi
114b6(rgyud): gsang ba thob pa'i dngos grub dam pa'i bar gyi phyir rdo rje brjod pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de
114b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i tshig / rdo rje'i tshig ces bya ba'i rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i tshig gis de
115a1(rgyud): @#/ /bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje'i brjod pas yang dag par smra zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams
115a2(rgyud): cad kyi/ /rdo rje'i bzlas par brjod pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /sngags ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje chos nyid kyi ye shes/ /de bzhin gshegs
115a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes dang / chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba'i ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi spros pa rnam par ldog pa'i ye
115a4(rgyud): shes dang 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sems dpa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems
115a5(rgyud): dpa' chen po'i 'phrin las thams cad pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba/ las kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de
115a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra karma/ de nas
115a7(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin las thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes shin tu rtogs pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa
115b1(rgyud): 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi 'od zer gyur te byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
115b2(rgyud): 'phrin las kyi 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi dbyibs lta bur gyur to/ /de
115b3(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi dbyibs de yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du
115b4(rgyud): mnyam par 'jug pa'i tshad tsam du gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi dbyibs de las/ las thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbyibs su gyur nas phyag gnyis su gnas
115b5(rgyud): so| |de nas rdo rje'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rnams byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi
115b6(rgyud): khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems
115b7(rgyud): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las mtha' yas pa yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems
116a1(rgyud): @#/ /dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad ces bya ba'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
116a2(rgyud): thugs la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas rnams kyi nges/ /'phrin las mang po kun bdag yin/ /sangs rgyas don ni lhun grub
116a3(rgyud): phyir| |rdo rje las ni 'jug par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad ces bya ba'i lus bcom ldan
116a4(rgyud): 'das kyi thugs las byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas
116a5(rgyud): b com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
116a6(rgyud): par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par bya ba la sogs pa gdon mi za ba'i tshad med pa dang / las kyi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang /
116a7(rgyud): sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyis las thams cad grub pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs
116b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i 'phrin las nyid dang / ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa dam pa rnams 'grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de
116b2(rgyud): b zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas de'i lag tu
116b3(rgyud): las kyi rdo rje de de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje thams cad/ rdo rje thams cad ces bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro//
116b4(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje thams cad ces bya bas rdo rje de rang gi snying gar bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las la sbyor zhing ched du brjod pa
116b5(rgyud): 'di ched du brjod do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa'i mchog /bdag ste bdag gi lag tu byin/ /sna tshogs la ni sna tshogs gzhag /de nas
116b6(rgyud): b com ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub dka'i dam tshig las byung ba las thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
116b7(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi srung ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung
117a1(rgyud): @#/ /ngo| |badzra rak+Sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las phyung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ go cha
117a2(rgyud): brtan par gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje go cha chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag
117a3(rgyud): gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje go cha'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku
117a4(rgyud): byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la srung ba'i go cha rgyas pa'i las la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/
117a5(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni brtson 'grus dam pa thub dka' ba dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson
117a6(rgyud): 'grus thub dka' ba'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o brtson 'grus
117a7(rgyud): go cha ni/ /brtan pa'i bdag nyid rab brtan bdag /de ni brtan phyir lus med kyang / /rdo rje'i lus su byed pa mchog /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson
117b1(rgyud): 'grus chen po thub dka' ba de'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par gyur
117b2(rgyud): nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje brtan bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
117b3(rgyud): nas| de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyang
117b4(rgyud): pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sku 'thob pa'i mchog 'grub par bya ba'i bar du/ de dag gi phyir rdo rje go
117b5(rgyud): cha de byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub dka' ba'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i grogs po/ rdo rje'i grogs
117b6(rgyud): po zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje grogs pos rdo rje go cha des de bzhin gshegs pa thams
117b7(rgyud): cad la go cha bskon zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /byams pa'i go cha dam pa ste/ /brtson 'grus brtan pas bsrung ba che/ /grogs
118a1(rgyud): @#/ /po chen por brjod pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i dam tshig
118a2(rgyud): las byung ba/ las kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi dam tshig ces
118a3(rgyud): bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra yak+Sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las phyung ma thag
118a4(rgyud): pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha chen por gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs
118a5(rgyud): te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje mche ba'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje mche ba'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams
118a6(rgyud): cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bos gdul ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams
118a7(rgyud): cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu
118b1(rgyud): 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas
118b2(rgyud): nas| ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o bdag ni sangs rgyas rnams/ /thugs rje can gyi thabs chen te/ /zhi yang sems can don du ni/ /ma rungs par ni ston par
118b3(rgyud): 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
118b4(rgyud): cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu khro ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
118b5(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma rungs pa gdul ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa
118b6(rgyud): rnams 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po dang / ye shes dang / mngon
118b7(rgyud): par shes pa rnams thob cing dam pa 'grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha de byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa
119a1(rgyud): @#/ /de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje khro bo/ rdo rje khro bo zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur
119a2(rgyud): ro| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khro bos rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha de rang gi thugs kar bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsngags shing
119a3(rgyud): ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /ma rungs thams cad 'dul ba'i mchog /rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon rnon te/ /thabs dang snying rje'i
119a4(rgyud): bdag nyid do/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba las
119a5(rgyud): kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rjes bcing ba'i
119a6(rgyud): dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra san+d+hi/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las
119a7(rgyud): phyung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcings par gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das
119b1(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje bcings pa'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje bcing ba'i dbyings
119b2(rgyud): de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs
119b3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang / ye shes la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin
119b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur shin tu bcings pa dang / rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa
119b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o rab tu brtan
119b6(rgyud): bcings pa'i/ /dam tshig bdag ste brtan pa'i bdag /bsam pa thams cad rab grub phyir/ /grol ba rnams kyang 'ching bar byed/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po
119b7(rgyud): d e bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas
120a1(rgyud): @#/ /yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
120a2(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams
120a3(rgyud): la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / lha rnams kyi dgongs pa brtag pa dang / grub pa thams cad dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa
120a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / phyag rgya'i dbang dam pa 'grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje bcing ba de byang chub sems dpa' chen po de
120a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje khu tshur/ rdo rje khu tshur zhes rdo
120a6(rgyud): rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya ba des rdo rje bcings pa des de bzhin gshegs pa thams
120a7(rgyud): cad la 'ching zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /phyag rgya bcing ba che zhing brtan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi myur du phyir/ /dam tshig
120b1(rgyud): bzhin du 'da' bar dka'/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i las dang / brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha brtan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
120b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po dang phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa'i ye shes dang 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las chen po'i sems dpa'o/ / //
120b3(rgyud): bam po gnyis pa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams
120b4(rgyud): cad kyi ye shes bsgrubs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo
120b5(rgyud): rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs
120b6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /satwa badzri/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las phyung ma thag tu/ rdo rje'i 'od zer du gyur
120b7(rgyud): nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs
121a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs nas yang
121a2(rgyud): gcig tu 'dres te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje'i dbyibs chen por gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan snga na zla
121a3(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sems dpa'i rdo rje brtan pa'i bdag /gang phyir brtan pas
121a4(rgyud): lus med kyang / /rdo rje'i lus su gyur pa yin/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
121a5(rgyud): m dzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs par bya ba'i phyir rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo
121a6(rgyud): rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung
121a7(rgyud): ngo| |rat+na badzrI/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu rin po che'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
121b1(rgyud): pa de nyid do/ /rin po che'i 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur te/ de bzhin
121b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs nas yang gcig tu 'dres nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi
121b3(rgyud): rdo rje rin po che chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas shing / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod
121b4(rgyud): do| |e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje rin chen bdag nyid grags/ /gang phyir phyag rgya thams cad kyi/ /dbang gi tshul ni dam pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de
121b5(rgyud): b zhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam pa thams
121b6(rgyud): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba/ rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
121b7(rgyud): zhugs nas/ chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /d+har+m+ma badzrI/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma
122a1(rgyud): @#/ /thag tu pad+ma'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /pad+ma'i 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams
122a2(rgyud): cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs
122a3(rgyud): nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje pad+ma chen po'i dbyibs su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
122a4(rgyud): mdzad kyi rgyab kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /chos kyi rdo rje gtsang ma dag /gang phyir rang
122a5(rgyud): bzhin rnam dag pas/ /'dod chags yin yang dri ma med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
122a6(rgyud): d e bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa
122a7(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung
122b1(rgyud): ngo| |kar+m+ma badzrI/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu las thams cad kyi 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa
122b2(rgyud): de nyid do/ /las thams cad kyi 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur
122b3(rgyud): nas| de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs te yang gcig tu 'dres nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i
122b4(rgyud): tshad tsam gyi thams cad du rtse mo bltas pa'i las kyi rdo rje chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
122b5(rgyud): gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /las kyi rdo rje mang po bdag /gang phyir gcig kyang sems can khams/ /ma lus par
122b6(rgyud): ni las bzang byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba chen po dang rdo rje'i chos nyid dang / mchod pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
122b7(rgyud): cad kyi rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po rnams so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i mchod pa'i
123a1(rgyud): @#/ /dam tshig las byung ba/ rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo
123a2(rgyud): 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra lA s+ye/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu rdo rje'i phyag rgyar gyur nas byung ste/ bcom
123a3(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i rtse mo de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
123a4(rgyud): rnams kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ lha mo chen mo rdo rje 'dzin ma'i lus thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid dang 'dra zhing kha dog dang / gzugs dang /
123a5(rgyud): mtshan dang / spyod lam sna tshogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad sdud par gyur pa rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mor gyur nas bcom
123a6(rgyud): ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o rang byung rnams kyi ni/ /
123a7(rgyud): mchod pa bdag 'dra gzhan med de/ /gang phyir 'dod pa dga' mchod pas/ /mchod pa thams cad byas par 'gyur/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
123b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i phreng ba'i dbang gi dam tshig las byung ba/ rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
123b2(rgyud): cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra mA le/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu rin po che chen po'i phyag
123b3(rgyud): rgyar gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /rin po che chen po'i phyag rgya de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam
123b4(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ /lha mo chen mo rdo rje phreng bar de bzhin du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che 'byung ba'i
123b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o rin chen mchod pa bzhes/ /bdag dang 'dra bar
123b6(rgyud): grags pa med/ /gang phyir khams gsum rgyal mchog kyang / /rab tu mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi glu'i
123b7(rgyud): mchog gi dam tshig las byung ba/ rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di rang gi thugs
124a1(rgyud): @#/ /ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra gI ti/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
124a2(rgyud): kyi phyag rgyar gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgya de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams
124a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ lha mo chen mo rdo rje glur gyur nas/ bcom ldan
124a4(rgyud): 'das 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o bdag ni kun
124a5(rgyud): gzigs pa'i/ /glu mchog tshul gyis mchod pa yin/ /gang phyir sgra snyan 'dra ba yi/ /mchod pa rnams kyis mnyes par byed/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de
124a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar gyi mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
124a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra nr-i ti/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag
124b1(rgyud): tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar gyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas par gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
124b2(rgyud): c ad kyi gar gyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa de dag thams cad las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
124b3(rgyud): kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ rdo rje lha mo chen mo rdo rje gar gyi skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa'i
124b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o mchod kun don mdzad pa'i/ /mchod pa rgya
124b5(rgyud): chen bdag yin te/ /gang phyir rdo rje gar cho gas/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa rab tu byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba bla na med pa'i dam
124b6(rgyud): tshig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi glu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i las bla na med
124b7(rgyud): pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa
125a1(rgyud): @#/ /rnam par snang mdzad kyis mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu tshim pa'i dam tshig las byung ba/
125a2(rgyud): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yog mo'i gtso mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra d+hu pe/ de nas
125a3(rgyud): d e bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las phyung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de bdug pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi bkod pa rnam pa du
125a4(rgyud): mas rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad du khyab par gyur nas phyung ngo / /bdug pa'i mchod pa'i sprin rgya mtsho de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu
125a5(rgyud): phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas byung ste yang gcig tu 'dres nas/ rdo rje bdug pa'i lha mo'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan
125a6(rgyud): 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su khang bu brtsegs pa'i rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i grwar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched
125a7(rgyud): du brjod do/ /e ma'o bdag ni mchod pa che/ /rab tu sim ldan dge ba yi/ /gang phyir sems can dbab ldan pas/ /myur du byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /de nas
125b1(rgyud): b com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir rin po che'i rgyan gyi
125b2(rgyud): mchod pa dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsol ka ma 'di rang gi thugs ka nas
125b3(rgyud): phyung ngo / /badzra puSh+pe/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las phyung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ me tog thams cad kyi
125b4(rgyud): mchod pa bkod pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par byed par gyur nas byung ngo / /me tog thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi bkod pa de las 'jig rten gyi khams
125b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres te rdo rje'i me tog gi lha mo'i skur gyur nas/ bcom
125b6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i grwa na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du
125b7(rgyud): brjod do/ /e ma'o me tog mchod pa bdag /thams cad kyi ni rgyan byed de/ /gang phyir mchod nas de bzhin gshegs/ /rin chen nyid du myur du 'grub/ /de nas bcom
126a1(rgyud): @#/ /ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i
126a2(rgyud): phyir| de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snang ba'i mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs
126a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi pho nya mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra A lo ke /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu thams cad du snang
126a4(rgyud): ba'i mchod pa thams cad kyi bkod pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad khyab par byed par gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /thams cad du
126a5(rgyud): snang ba'i mchod pa'i bkod pa de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ yang gcig
126a6(rgyud): tu 'dres te/ lha mo rdo rje snang ba zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas
126a7(rgyud): pa'i grwa na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o mchod pa'i mar me ni/ /rgya chen dge ba bdag yin te/ /gang phyir snang bcas
126b1(rgyud): myur du yang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan yang thob/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
126b2(rgyud): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dris mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes
126b3(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bran mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra gan+d+he/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
126b4(rgyud): p a thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu dri thams cad kyi mchod pa bkod pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byed par gyur nas byung ste bcom ldan
126b5(rgyud): 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /dri thams cad kyi mchod pa'i bkod pa de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs
126b6(rgyud): pa'i sku rnams byung nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ lha mo rdo rje dri zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang /
126b7(rgyud): nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i grwa na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o dri yi rang bzhin gyi/ /mchod pa'i lha rdzas
127a1(rgyud): @#/ /yid 'ong bdag /gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri/ /lus rnams kun la 'byin par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
127a2(rgyud): ye shes dbab pa dang / byang chub chen po'i yan lag bsags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kun tu snang ba dang / tshul khrims dang / ting
127a3(rgyud): nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ston pa'i dri rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka'
127a4(rgyud): bzhin byed pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags kyu'i dam tshig las byung ba
127a5(rgyud): sems dpa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po 'di rang gi thugs
127a6(rgyud): ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra aM ku sha /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs
127a7(rgyud): mang po thams cad du gyur nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag las 'jig rten gyi
127b1(rgyud): khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje lcags
127b2(rgyud): kyu zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje sgo gang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas
127b3(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis spyan 'dren cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /yang dag spyan 'dren
127b4(rgyud): brtan pa bdag / gang phyir bdag gis spyan drangs pas/ /dkyil 'khor kun la brtan par 'gyur/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
127b5(rgyud): dam tshig la 'jug pa/ sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag
127b6(rgyud): rgya 'jug pa'i gsol ka pa 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra pA sha /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa
127b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs su gyur nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'dren
128a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa'i phyag rgya mang po de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas
128a2(rgyud): yang gcig tu 'dres te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje zhags pa zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che
128a3(rgyud): las byas pa'i rdo rje rin po che'i sgo khang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dren cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e
128a4(rgyud): ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje zhags pa dam po dag /rdul phran bzhugs pa thams cad kyang / /bdag gis slar yang drang bar bya/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
128a5(rgyud): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags sgrog sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba/ sems dpa' rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
128a6(rgyud): par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje pho nya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra s+pho
128a7(rgyud): Ta| de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsngams pa'i phyag rgya mang por gyur nas
128b1(rgyud): byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa'i phyag rgya mang po de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams thams
128b2(rgyud): cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje lcags sgrog ces bya ba'i skur
128b3(rgyud): gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje chos kyi sgo khang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas de
128b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'ching zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog dam po bdag /bcing ba kun las grol ba
128b5(rgyud): rnams/ /sems can don du 'ching bar 'dod/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbab pa zhes bya ba sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung
128b6(rgyud): ba| sems dpa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi bran 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra
128b7(rgyud): A be sha / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad du gyur nas byung ste/

129a3(rgyud): skur gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje las kyi sgo khang gi nang na za ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas

129a5(rgyud): kyang | |bran du yang ni gyur pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa
129a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir/ rdo rje se gol gyi

129b1(rgyud): de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad se gol gyi mtshan mas bskul ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams
129b2(rgyud): t hams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po dang bcas te 'dus nas khang bu brtsegs
129b3(rgyud): pa'i rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa gang na ba dang / /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba der gshegs nas ched du

129b6(rgyud): gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yi/ /dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes/ /de nas de skad ces smras pa dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas 'dus
129b7(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang bcas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi
130a1(rgyud): @#/ /byin gyis brlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las
130a2(rgyud): rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las
130a3(rgyud): byas pa'i phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor du gyur nas snyoms par zhugs te/ zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad

130b1(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab bo/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /rdo rje dang po kun tu bzang //

132a1(rgyud): @#/ /'khor gyi ni thig gdab cing / /gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang / /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes bgyis la/ /thig bzhi dang ni ldan gyur pa/ /dar
132a2(rgyud): dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad dang / /sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen spras par ni/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gdab bo/ /

133a7(rgyud): rnams yongs su skyabs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi phan pa dang / bde ba thams cad dngos grub mchog gi rgyu dang / 'bras bu nyid kyi slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/
