134a5(rgyud): gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / sa rnams kyis 'bad cing nyon mongs par gyur pa dag kyang mchis te/ de dag kyang rdo rje dbyings kyis dkyil 'khor chen po der zhugs
134a6(rgyud): ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du 'grub par yang rnyed par dka' ba ma lags na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de la dang po kho nar re
134a7(rgyud): zhig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bzhi bgyi'o/ /de ni 'di ltar lus thams cad kyis rdo rje thal mo brkyang ste phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du/ oM
134b1(rgyud): sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta phU dzo pas+tha nA ya At+ma naM ni r+yA ta yA mi/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM zhes brjod do/ /de nas de bzhin du 'dug ste/ rdo rje thal mo snying gar bzhag ste/

134b5(rgyud): thA ga ta pU dza karma Ne At+ma naM ni r+yA ta yA mi/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra karma ku ru mAM zhes brjod do/ /de nas stod g.yogs gos dmar po gyon gdong ras dmar pos dkris nas/
134b6(rgyud): sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la snying po 'di brjod do/ /sa ma yas+t+waM/ de nas gung mo gnyis kyis me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug la drang zhing snying po 'di brjod do/
134b7(rgyud): sa ma ya hUM/ de nas bcug ma thag tu 'di skad du bsgos shig /deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis/ ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de
135a1(rgyud): @#/ /bzhin gshegs pa thams cad grub pa yang thob na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de lta bu'i rdo rje'i ye shes bskyed par bya yi/ /
135a2(rgyud): khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la ma smra shig /dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems dpa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya kha nang
135a3(rgyud): du bstan pa dang / phyir bstan pa bcings la rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag ste/ 'di skad du brjod par bya'o/ /'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin gyi/ /gal te 'ga'
135a4(rgyud): zhig la smras na/ klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang / mna'i chu'i snying pos sngags la slob ma de 'thung du gzhug go/ /de la
135a5(rgyud): mna'i snying po 'di yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa' nyid ni deng / /khyod kyi snying la yang dag zhugs/ /gal te tshul de smra na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /oM badzro da

135a7(rgyud): kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig / mi bde ba ma spangs pas khyod dus byas na dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes smras la/ 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa
135b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi byin gyis rlobs la/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bab par gyur cig ces smros shig par bsgo'o/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur du sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i
135b2(rgyud): phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad du brjod du gzhug go / 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags/ /rdo rje ye shes bla med ni/ /de ring nyid du 'bab par shog /
135b3(rgyud): oM badzra A pe sha aH/ de nas khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings la/ sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya mdud cing drangs la/ theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i rdo rje'i tshig ci dga'
135b4(rgyud): bar brjod du gzhug go/ /de nas babs te babs ma thag tu lha'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur te/ ye shes des pha rol gyi sems shes par 'gyur ro/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa
135b5(rgyud): dang | da ltar byung ba rnams kyi dgos pa thams cad shes par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa thams cad la 'di'i sems brtan par 'gyur ro/ /de'i sdug bsngal
135b6(rgyud): thams cad zad par 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa thams cad dang bral nas gnod pa med par 'gyur ro/ /sems dpa' thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
135b7(rgyud): kyang byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub thams cad ni 'di'i mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /rgyu med par sngon ma byung ba'i dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs par byed
136a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa'i bde ba thams cad 'di la skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bde ba de dag kha cig gis ni ting nge 'dzin 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /kha cig gis ni gzungs/
136a2(rgyud): kha cig gis ni re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa nas/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'grub ba'i bar du 'ang 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyag rgya de bcings
136a3(rgyud): la rang gi snying khar dgrol zhing snying po 'di'ang brjod du gzhug go/ /tiSh+Tha badzra dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ shA shwa to me b+ha ba hr-i da ya me/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha hUM/ ha ha ha ha
136a4(rgyud): ho/ de nas ma tog gi phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por dor zhing snying po 'di ched du brjod du gzhug go /pra tIts+tsha badzra hoH/ de nas gang la bab pa de 'dis 'grub bo/ /de
136a5(rgyud): nas phreng ba 'di blangs te/ snying po 'dis de nyid kyi mgo bor bcings la 'di brjod du gzhug go /A+oM pra ti grih+Na swa mi mAM satwa ma hA ba la/ de bcings pas sems dpa'
136a6(rgyud): chen po des bdag gir byas par gyur pas 'di myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de ltar babs bzhin du gdong g.yogs bkrol te snying po 'di 'ang brjod du gzhug
136a7(rgyud): go| oM badzra sa twa sa yan+te t+ya tsak+Shu ra ga ta na tad pa ra u Ta g+ha Ta/ ya ti sar+b+bA k+Sho badzra tsak+Shu a nut+ta raM he badzra pA sh+ya/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po rim bzhin du bstan to/ /
136b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ma thag tu 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang 'di'i snying ga na gnas so/ /de bzhin
136b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir 'od zer sna tshogs pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba la sogs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams kyang
136b3(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te na bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid dam de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhig ston par 'gyur ro/ /de phyin chad don thams cad dang yid
136b4(rgyud): kyi 'dod pa'i dgos pa thams cad dang / dngos grub thams cad nas rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po
136b5(rgyud): mthong ba'i 'og tu rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i nang gi dri'i chu dang / snying po 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mI/ de nas phyag rgya dang / phreng ba gang
136b6(rgyud): yang rung ba zhig bcings lo/ /rang gi mtshan ma lag par bzhag la 'di skad du brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis rdo rje'i dbang / /de ring khyod la bskur bar bya/ /sangs
136b7(rgyud): rgyas kun gyis rab grub phyir/ /rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis longs/ /oM badzra a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mI/ tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ /de nas snying po 'di rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang
137a1(rgyud): @#/ /bskur bar bya'o/ /oM badzra satwa twaM a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ kyai| rdo rje zhes gang gi ming gang brjod pa der kye zhes brjod par bya'o//
137a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /de nas ci khyod don 'byung ba'i dngos grub kyi ye shes dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i ye shes dang
137a3(rgyud): rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i ye shes nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog 'grub pa'i ye shes kyi bar du gang 'dod ces smras la/ de nas gang gis gang 'dod pa de de la brjod par bya'o/
137a4(rgyud): /de nas don thams cad kyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ rdo rje'i dbyings ni gter
137a5(rgyud): gnas pa/ /snying gar yongs su bsgom par bya/ /bsgoms nas sa la gnas pa yi/ /gter ni de yis mthong bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i dbyibs shig bris nas kyang / /nam mkha'i
137a6(rgyud): ngos su bsgom par bya/ /gang du ltung ba mthong ba der/ /gter yod par ni rnam par bshad/ /blo ldan mi yis rdo rje'i dbyibs/ /lce yi steng du bsgoms nas ni/ /'di ni yod
137a7(rgyud): ces bdag nyid kyis/ /bden pa nyid kyis smra bar 'gyur/ /bdag gi lus ni thams cad la/ /rdo rje'i dbyibs su bsgoms nas ni/ /babs par gyur nas gar gnas
137b1(rgyud): pa| |gter ni de na yod par bshad/ /de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /oM badzra ni d+hI/ oM rat+na ni d+hI/ oM d+har+m+ma ni d+hI/ oM kar+m+ma ni d+hI/ de nas rdo rje rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub
137b2(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni/ /chu la rdo rje'i dbyibs 'dra bar/ /bsgoms nas chu yi steng na phar/ /'gro ba'i dngos grub myur du thob/ /de
137b3(rgyud): ltar dbab pa byas nas kyang / /gang gi gzugs su bdag gi lus/ /bsgoms par gyur na bdag nyid ni/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni skur yang 'gyur/ /de ltar bdag la phab nas kyang //
137b4(rgyud): bdag nyid kyis ni nam mkhar ni/ /bsgoms par 'gyur na ji srid du/ /'dod pa de srid mi snang 'gyur/ /rdo rje dbab bar bdag 'gyur nas/ /rdo rje yin par bdag bsgoms na//
137b5(rgyud): gnas nas ji srid lding 'dod pa/ /de srid mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /badzra dz+wa la/ badzra rU pa/ badzra A kA sha /badzra ma hAM/ de nas rdo rje
137b6(rgyud): rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub par phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ zla ba'i dbyibs gcig bris nas ni/ /steng gi mkha' la 'phags byas te/ /lag par rdo rje bsgoms
137b7(rgyud): nas ni/ /rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /zla ba'i dbyibs steng 'dug gnas ni/ /rdo rje rin chen rab bsgoms na/ /bdag nyid dag pa ji srid 'dod/ /de srid skad cig lding
138a1(rgyud): @#/ /bar 'gyur/ /zla ba'i dbyibs kyi steng 'dug nas/ /rdo rje pad+mo lag gnas par/ /bsgoms nas rdo rje'i spyan gyis ni/ /rig 'dzin go 'phang
138a2(rgyud): sbyin par byed/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas nas/ /las kyi rdo rje bsgom nas ni/ /rdo rje sna tshogs 'dzin pa las/ /rig 'dzin kun tu myur bar 'gyur/ /de dag
138a3(rgyud): gi snying po 'di dag yin no/ /badzra d+ha ra/ rat+na d+ha ra/ d+har+m+ma d+ha ra/ kar+m+ma d+ha ra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes
138a4(rgyud): bslab par bya ste/ rdo rje kun gyi ting nge 'dzin/ /nam mkha'i dbyibs su bsams nas ni/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid ji srid 'dod/ /de srid bar du lding bar 'gyur/ /kun
138a5(rgyud): la dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /bsgoms na bla med de bzhin du/ /ye shes bsgrubs pas myur du ni/ /mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar ni//
138a6(rgyud): nam mkha' thams cad dran byas na/ /bdag nyid dran pa brtan ldan zhing / /rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i dbyings ni thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas gzugs
138a7(rgyud): su bsams nas ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ting 'dzin las/ /sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/ /de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /badzra badzra/ shud+d+ha shud+d+ha/
138b1(rgyud): satwa satwa/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes 'grub pa rnams so/ /de nas gsang ba thub pa yin pas de la dang por mna'i snying po brjod par bya ste/ oM badzra satwa
138b2(rgyud): sA yan+t+ye/ hraM da ye sa ma bsti ta ni bI d+yA ta tak+Sha NAM/ yA yA da ya ti bru yad i daM na yaM/ de nas/ 'di skad du/ khyod kyis mna'i snying po 'di las 'da' bar ma byed cig /khyod kyis
138b3(rgyud): gnod pa ma spangs pas dus ma yin par 'chi bar gyur ta re/ lus 'di nyid kyis dmyal bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo bar bya'o/ /de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab
138b4(rgyud): par bya'o/ /rdo rje dbab par bskyed nas ni/ /mnyam par gzhag pas rdo rje yi/ /thal mo'i ngos kyis dal brdabs na/ /ri bo yang ni dbang du 'gyur/ /rdo rje thal mo'i phyag
138b5(rgyud): rgya'o/ /rdo rje dbab pa'i cho ga yis/ /rdo rje bsdams pa'i ngos gnyis ni/ /dal gyi brdab par sbyor ba yis/ /ri bo yang ni kun nas 'gugs/ /de bzhin dbab pa'i cho ga yis/ /
138b6(rgyud): rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang nas ni/ /sor mo'i rtse mo mnyam brdabs na/ /rigs brgya yud kyis brlag par 'gyur/ /phra mo dbab pa'i cho ga byas/ /sor mo thams cad mnyam
138b7(rgyud): gzhag cing / /rdo rje bsdams pa bkrol ba ni/ /gnod pa kun las bsal ba'i mchog /des na de dag gi gsang ba sgrub pa yin te/ bud med dam ni skyes pa yi/ /bu ga'i
139a1(rgyud): @#/ /nang du 'jug par bya/ /yid kyis de ltar zhugs nas kyang / /de yi lus kun khyab par bsam/ /de la rdo rje thal mo'i snying po ni 'di dag yin
139a2(rgyud): no| |badzra bA sha / badzra A be sha /badzra ha na/ badzra ha ra/ de nas snying po byin la rang gi rigs kyi lha'i phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/ /cho ga 'di skad du bsgo bar
139a3(rgyud): bya ste| khyod kyis phyag rgya la mi mkhas pa gzhan su'ang rung ba la phyag rgya gang yang rung ba bstan par ma byed cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dkyil 'khor chen
139a4(rgyud): po ma mthong bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis phyag rgya bcing ba byas na de'i tshe de dag de ltar 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas de dag the tshom du gyur te/ gnod pa
139a5(rgyud): ma spangs pas myur ba nyid du dus byas nas dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa zhes bya bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /khyod nyid kyang ngan song du lhung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de bzhin
139a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' sgrub pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes gang yin pa de bshad do/ /sems rtogs pa nas brtsams nas ni/ /rdo rje dbyings zhes brjod
139a7(rgyud): byed cing / /sangs rgyas gzugs su bdag bsgyur la/ /rdo rje nyi ma bsgoms par bya'o/ /grub ma thag tu 'di yis ni/ /ye shes tshe stobs na tshod dang / /kun tu 'gro ba nyid
139b1(rgyud): rnams 'thob/ /sangs rgyas 'grub pa'ang dka' ba min/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' chen po
139b2(rgyud): sgrub pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba yin te/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ /rdo rje bsgyings par sems bskyed do/ /bsgyings bcas rdo rje gsor byed na/ /rdo rje sems dpar bdag
139b3(rgyud): nyid 'gyur/ /'dis ni kun tu 'gro ba dang / /'dod pa kun bdag bde chen dang / /rdzu 'phrul tshe stobs gzugs mchog rnams/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur/ /sku gsung
139b4(rgyud): thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ /ji ltar ri mo'i rjes mthun zhing / /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rnam ldan par/ /sems dpa' chen por bsgrub par bya/ /de nas 'dir ni rtog kun gyi/ /sgrub pa
139b5(rgyud): dang ni dngos grub dang / /grub pa rnams kyi las chen rnams/ /go rims bzhin du bshad par bya/ /dang po nyin re dus bzhin du/ /rang la byin gyis brlab la sogs/ /byas nas
139b6(rgyud): thams cad bsgrub bya ste/ /de yi 'og tu ci dgar bya/ /de la phyag rgya chen por sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ /rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni/ /phyag rgya chen po cho ga bzhin/ /
139b7(rgyud): bcings nas de yi mdun phyogs su/ /sems dpa' chen po de bsgom mo/ /ye shes sems dpa' de mthong nas/ /rang gi lus su bsgom par bya/ /bkug cing bcug la bcing
140a1(rgyud): @#/ /ba dang | |dbang du byas te bsgrub par bya'o/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /badzra satwa aH/ rdo rje dbab pa'i snying po'o/ /badzra satwa dr-i
140a2(rgyud): sh+ya ho| |sems dpa' chen po rjes su dran par bya ba'i snying po'o/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHsems dpa' chen po spyan drang ba dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba
140a3(rgyud): rnams kyi snying po'o/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod pas/ /rgyab tu zla ba grub nas ni/ /der bdag sems dpa'i lus su bsgom/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM brjod/ /sems dpa' gang gi
140a4(rgyud): phyag rgya gang / /de ni bdag tu bsgoms nas ni/ /rdo rje'i bzlas pas bsgrub par bya/ /phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'o/ /gzhan yang sgrub pa chen po ni/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes
140a5(rgyud): brjod la/ legs pa'i cho gas yid kyis ni/ /lus la sangs rgyas kun gzhug go /de nas bla med rdo rje'i las/ /de dag gi ni las bshad do/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran
140a6(rgyud): grub na| |sangs rgyas nyid du myur du 'gyur/ /sems dpa'i rdo rje ma grub na/ /phyag rgya kun gyi bdag por 'gyur/ /rin chen rdo rje ma phyag rgyas/ /de ni rin chen kun dbang
140a7(rgyud): 'gyur/ /chos kyi rdo rje grub na ni/ /sangs rgyas chos ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ /las kyi rdo rje ma phyag rgyas/ /rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur/ /sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcings pa yis/ /

140b2(rgyud): rje legs pa'i cho ga yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par byed/ /rin chen phyag rgya'i cho ga yis/ /sangs rgyas dbang bskur sbyin par byed/ /rdo rje gzi brjid cho ga yis/ /
140b3(rgyud): rdo rje gzi brjid myur du 'grub/ /rdo rje dpal 'dzin bsten pa yis/ /re ba rnams ni yongs su skong / /rdo rje bzhad pa'i cho ga yi/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam du bzhad/ /rdo rje
140b4(rgyud): chos kyi cho ga yis/ /rdo rje chos ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rdo rje rnon pe'i cho ga yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi shes rab mchog /rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin bsten pas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo
140b5(rgyud): bskor bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje gsung ba'i cho ga yis/ /sangs rgyas gsung gi grub pa thob/ /rdo rje las mchog bsgrubs pas na/ /rdo rje'i las su myur du 'grub/ /rdo rje'i go cha
140b6(rgyud): bskor nas ni/ /rdo rje'i sku ni thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin bsgrubs na ni/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin mnyam par 'gyur/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcings pas na/ /phyag rgya thams cad
140b7(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin ma grub pas ni/ /rdo rje chen po dga' ba thob/ /rdo rje phreng ba bcings pas na/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur 'gyur/ /rdo rje glu yi cho ga
141a1(rgyud): @#/ /yis| |rdo rje glu ni len par 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i gar gyi sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kun la de mchod do/ /rdo rje bdug pa'i cho ga yis/ /'gro ba thams
141a2(rgyud): cad tshim par byed/ /rdo rje'i me tog sbyor byed pas/ /des ni 'gro ba dbang du byed/ /rdo rje snang ba'i phyag rgya ches/ /rab mchog mig ni sbyin par byed/ /rdo rje dri yi cho gas ni//
141a3(rgyud): sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed/ /rdo rje lcags kyus drangs pas na/ /'dren pa kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /rdo rje zhags pa'i cho ga ni/ /thams cad rab tu 'jug par
141a4(rgyud): 'gyur| |rdo rje lcags sgrog sbyor bas ni/ /thams cad ba cing bar nus par 'gyur/ /rdo rje dbab pa'i cho ga yis/ /thams cad dbab par rab tu 'grub/ /de nas de bzhin
141a5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bshad de/ thal mo dam du sbyar ba las/ /sor mo thams cad bsnol ba ni/ /rdo rje thal mor bka'
141a6(rgyud): stsal te/ /rab tu bsdams phyir rdo rje bsdams/ /dam tshig phyag rgya thams cad ni/ /rdo rje bsdams las byung bas na/ /de dag bsdams pa rdo rje yis/ /bsdams pa bla
141a7(rgyud): med bshad par bya/ /rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la/ /gung mo myu gu ltar mnyam sgreng / /gung mo nang du gshibs pa ni/ /sangs rgyas gnyis pa'i yin par bshad/ /
141b1(rgyud): gung mo rin chen 'dra ba dang / /gung mo pad+mo 'dra ba dgug /sangs rgyas lnga pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /de bzhin mdzub mo dgug pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /rigs kyi
141b2(rgyud): dam tshig 'dzin pa yi/ /phyag rgya bcings dang dngos grub dang / /las rnams yang dag bshad par bya/ /zla ba lta bu'i lag gnyis kyis/ /gung mo btang bar gyur pa yi/ /mthe
141b3(rgyud): bong mthe'u chung so sor sgreng / /sems dpa'i rdo rje sgreng rdo rje/ /mdzub mo lcags kyu mdzub mo sbyar/ /legs so sbyin pa 'dra ba ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi po yi/ /phyag rgya
141b4(rgyud): mang po'i dngos grub de'o/ /mthe bong gshibs la mdzub gnyis bcag /rtse sprad rdo rje rin chen yin/ /de nyid gung mo srin lag dang / /mthe'u chung rnams ni bsnol
141b5(rgyud): brkyang ba'o/ /de las srin lag mthe'u chung gnyis/ /mnyam par gshibs pa rgyal mtshan no/ /de nyid las ni bskor nas kyang / /kha yi phyogs su bzhag pa'o/ /mthe
141b6(rgyud): bong gnyis ka mnyam par gshibs/ /mdzub mo gnyis ka bkug pa dang / /gung mo sgreng ba'i rtse mo bkug /de nyid rdo rje ral gri'o/ /de las srin lag mthe'u chung
141b7(rgyud): gshibs/ /'khor lo yin par bshad pa yin/ /bsdams pas mthe bong gnyis bkrol ba/ /bkan te kha phyogs bzhag pa'o/ /mthe bong mthe'u chung rtse sprad bkyed/ /
142a1(rgyud): @#/ /las kyi rdo rje yin par bshad/ /de las mdzub mo gnyis gshibs pas/ /snying gar brkyang ste bzhag pa'o/ /mdzub mo rtse mo gnyis bkug la/ /mthe'u chung gshibs par
142a2(rgyud): mche ba'o/ /mthe'u chung gnyis par mthe bong gnyis/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyis btsir ba'o/ /snying gar mthe bong mnyam nas bzhag/ rab tu brkyang ba phreng ba'o/ /thal mo sbyar te kha nas
142a3(rgyud): dbyung / /gar las thal sbyar spyi bor bzhag /rdo rje bcings pa thur du blugs/ /rang gi thal sbyar gyen du gtor/ /mthe bong mnyam te rab tu bsdams/ /rab tu brkyang
142a4(rgyud): nas byug pa'o/ /mdzub mo gcig pu bkug pa dang / /mthe bong gnyis ni mdud pa dor/ /mthe bong mdzub mo gdu bur bcing / /rdo rje bcing ba mdzub mo bsdams/ /de nas
142a5(rgyud): 'di rnams sgrub bshad de/ /rdo rje sgrub pa dam pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /rang gi phyag rgya snying gar bzhag /de nas 'di rnams las bshad pa/ /rdo rje'i

148b6(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po bshad do/ /oM badzrA satwa gu d+ya sa ma ye s+t+waM/ oM gu h+ya
148b7(rgyud): rat+na aM ku she hUM/ oM gu h+ya rA gi rA gA ya hUM/ oM badzra gu h+ya badzra sA d+h+wi shwa ri hUM/ kun tu bzang mo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i lcags kyu ma dang / dga' ba la chags ma
149a1(rgyud): @#/ /dang | legs ldan ma ste/ rdo rje gzungs chen mo rnams so/ /oM badzra gu h+ya rat+na sa ma la hUM/ oM badzra gu h+ya pra b+he hUM/ oM badzra d+h+wa dza a gra gu h+ya hUM/ oM badzra

149b1(rgyud): cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams te/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma dkyil 'khor chen por 'bar ba dang bcas pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug par gzhag

149b5(rgyud): nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo
149b6(rgyud): rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ /rdo rje gsang ba zhes bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbus su ni/ /

154a3(rgyud): snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje ye shes phra mo'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs
154a4(rgyud): m a thag tu de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje ye shes phra mo'i 'od zer de rnams byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas

154a6(rgyud): nas ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i skur dmigs te gcig tu 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs

154b1(rgyud): phra mo'i dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje 'di smras pa/ sUk+Sh+ma badzra/ de nas de smras ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid byung
154b2(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phra mo'i rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shangs kyi rtse mo'i phyogs su

154b6(rgyud): tshul gyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du rab tu phra ba'i rdo rje ye shes kyi mtshan ma rnams kyi khyab par byas so/ /nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad khyab par byas nas de
154b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te 'dug go / de nas de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
155a1(rgyud): @#/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i dbus su rdo rje'i chos nyid du dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ye
155a2(rgyud): shes phra mo'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bzhugs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje de las
155a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying po 'di phyung ngo / /badzra nA bI ta thA ga ta hUM/ de nas de phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes
155a4(rgyud): ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur zhugs nas thugs kar rdo rje'i dbyibs su gyur te gnas so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs
155a5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje de las ye shes chen po 'di bzhi byung ngo / /badzra At+ma ka dr-i D+ha badzra aM ku sha tiSh+Tha ga badzra par pe sha hr-i da yaM/ a ho badzra duSh+Ti/ rdo rje sems
155a6(rgyud): dpa' ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes
155a7(rgyud): par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / dga' ba chen po ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin chen po rnams so/ /de nas de bzhin
155b1(rgyud): g shegs pa thams cad kyi snying po phyag na rdo rje ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i chul gyis rang gi thugs su zhugs te snying ga'i rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te bzhugs
155b2(rgyud): so| |de nas rdo rje'i dbyibs su de las snying po 'di bzhi phyung ngo / /badzra rat+na At+ma ka hr-i da ya/ badzra sUR+ya tiSh+Tha/ badzra d+h+wa dzA gra baM hr-i da ya/ badzra hU sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
155b3(rgyud): kyi rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i rgyan ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi re ba rdzogs par
155b4(rgyud): byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen po'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i ting nge 'dzin
155b5(rgyud): to| |de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rang gi snying ga rdo rje'i snying por zhugs nas rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag byin gyis brlabs nas bzhugs so/ /
155b6(rgyud): de nas rdo rje'i dbyibs de las snying po 'di bzhi phyung ngo / /badzra pad+ma at+ma ka hr-i da ya badzra ko Sha/ tiSh+Tha badzra tsakra hr-i da yaM pra be sha /badzra dzi hwA gra hr-i da ya/ chos thams cad mnyam pa
155b7(rgyud): nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shes rab kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / 'khor lo chen por 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin
156a1(rgyud): @#/ /gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshig gi spros pa med pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ting nge 'dzin
156a2(rgyud): t o| |de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po thugs ka'i rdo rje las byung nas ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje'i thugs der zhugs nas yang rdo rje shin tu phra
156a3(rgyud): mo'i dbyibs su bdag byin gyis brlabs te bzhugs so/ /de nas rdo rje phra mo'i dbyibs de las snying po 'di bzhi phyung ngo / /sar+b+ba badzra At+ma ka hr-i da badzra ka ba tsa/ tiSh+Tha badzra
156a4(rgyud): rak+Sha hr-i da ya/ badzra muSh+Ti hr-i da ya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las sna tshogs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / thub par dka' ba'i brtson 'grus kyi ye shes kyi
156a5(rgyud): phyag rgya dang / bdud thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor 'joms pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'ching ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de
156a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rab tu phra ba'i ye shes kyi mtshan mas khyab pa'i tshul gyis de
156a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje'i skur gyur nas/ de nas yang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa
156b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi skur gyur te/ rang rang gi mtshan ma nyid kyi thugs kar bzhag nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i tshul gyis zla ba'i
156b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la gnas nas rang rang gi snying bo'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag ste bzhugs so/ /de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge
156b3(rgyud): 'dzin dang / ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa'i phyir rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do/ /de nas rab bshad bya ba/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa
156b4(rgyud): ste| |rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ /rdo rje phra mo zhes bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang gzhag /rdo rje dbus su sangs rgyas bri/ /
156b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rnams su yang / /sems dpa' chen po rnams bri zhing / /de bzhin thugs kar nyid phyag rgya/ /ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs pa dang / /phyag gnyis rdo rje bcing bar
156b6(rgyud): bcings/ /de nas rdo rje phra mo'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yin te/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bzhugs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas
156b7(rgyud): par byas nas ye shes kyi mtshan ma lag tu byin nas rang gi sems las su rung bar bya ba'i phyir phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab bo/ /lce ni rkan la sbyar bya zhing / /sna yi rtse mor
157a1(rgyud): @#/ /bsam bya ba/ /rdo rje phra mo'i bde reg pas/ /sems ni mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur/ /rdo rje phra mo'i bde reg pa'i/ /mtshan ma gal te byung ba na/ /mchan ma de ni
157a2(rgyud): khyab bya ba/ /sems de kun tu khyab par bya/ /ji tsam 'dod par sems khyab nas/ /khams gsum du yang khyab par 'gyur/ /de nas de yang bsdu ba ni/ /sna yi rtse mo'i bar du yang /
157a3(rgyud): de dag shin tu mnyam par gzhag /gang yang rung ste bsgom bya ba/ /de dag thams cad brtan par 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin ye shes brtag pa'o/ /de nas de rnams kyi snying po 'di yi
157a4(rgyud): no| |sUk+Sh+ma badzra s+pha ra Na/ saM ha ra Na badzra/ badzra hr-i da tiSh+Tha/ /sems dpa' gang gi byams pa ni/ /mnyam 'gyur brtan pa chen po yis/ /sems kyis khyab par tshul gyis ni/ /sems
157a5(rgyud): can kun la des khyab bya/ /byams pas khyab pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /snying rje can ni gang yin pa/ /sems can kun don ldan pa yin/ /sgrub pa yis ni khyab par bya/ /kun kyang rang bzhin
157a6(rgyud): 'od gsal ba/ /gdod nas dag pa nam mkha' bzhin/ /chos sam yang na chos ma yin/ /bsam pas khyab cing dga' bar 'gyur/ /gdul dka' ba dang mtshungs 'dra ba/ /sangs
157a7(rgyud): rgyas byang chub snod ma yin/ /de dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /btang snyoms chen po goms par bya/ /de'i snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /mahA mai tri s+pha ra Na/ mahA ka ru Na s+pha
157b1(rgyud): ra Na/ sar+b+ba bud+d+ho phra mo da s+pha ra Na/ sar+b+ba sa twaM saM bo d+ha ya/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dran pa'i ye shes bslab bo/ /nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/ /
157b2(rgyud): rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/ /'greng dam yang na 'dug kyang rung / /rdo rje'i dbyibs ni goms par bya/ /de bzhin du yang gnas kun tu/ /rdo rje phra mo'i sbyor ba yis/ /mnyam bar gzhag
157b3(rgyud): pas snying gar ni/ /rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' bsgom/ /ji lta ba yi rim bzhin du/ /rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/ /phyag na rdo rje dbyibs chen po/ /gnas rnams kun tu bsgoms par
157b4(rgyud): bya| |rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i/ /sangs rgyas sku ni dus kun tu/ /ji lta ba yi go rims bzhin/ /mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom par bya/ /de la snying po ni 'di rnams
157b5(rgyud): yin no/ /badzra mu khi b+ha ba/ mahA bo d+hi satwa A be sha /badzra pA Ni d+hA ra sha ya su ru baM/ bud+d+ha a nu smra ti a be sha /rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/ /goms par bya ba bdag nyid kyis/ /zla
157b6(rgyud): ba'i dbyibs su bdag nyid ni/ /byang chub sems kyis bsgom pa'o/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /bdag nyid rdo rje'i dbyibs gyur par/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom bya
157b7(rgyud): pa| |sems dpa'i rdo rje bsgom pa'o/ /rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la/ /bdag nyid snying gar rdo rje sems/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom bya ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom pa'o/ /rnam
158a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su bdag nyid ni/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom bya ba/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bsgom pa'o/ /de la
158a2(rgyud): snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /sa man+ta b+ha dra A be sha /badzra satwa badzra A be sha /badzra satwa sa mA d+hi dz+nyA na A be sha /ta thA ga to hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
158a3(rgyud): nyid gsal ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /bdag ni de bzhin gshegs dang mnyam/ /rdo rje'i tshig tu lan gcig brjod/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas/ /
158a4(rgyud): sems can thams cad chags par byed/ /bdag ni rdo rje chen por mnyam/ /rdo rje'i tshig tu lan gcig brjod/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas/ /gdon mi za bar
158a5(rgyud): 'jig rten 'gugs/ /bdag ni rdo rje chos dang mnyam/ /rdo rje'i tshig tu lan gcig brjod/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas/ /de yis 'jig rten thams cad 'jig /

158a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/ /

158b2(rgyud): ye shes la bslab bo/ /rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la/ /snying gar rdo rje la sogs 'khod/ /bsgoms nas rdo rje la sogs pas/ /rang gi dngos grub sbyin par byed/ /de nas de

158b5(rgyud): gar gnas pa bzhi pa ste/ /rdo rje sems sogs dkyil 'khor ro/ /dpral bar gzhag dang ltag pa dang / /phrag pa dang ni dgod par sbyar/ /khar bzhag snying gar ral gri

159a1(rgyud): @#/ /can rnams bslab/ /ye shes khu tshur dam tshig las/ /gnyis su byas nas sbyar bar bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po
159a2(rgyud): mngon par rtogs pa chen po'i rgyal po rdo rje ye shes kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so/ / //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin
159a3(rgyud): g shegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi bla na med pa'i mchod pa chen po'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi ye shes byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting
159a4(rgyud): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ /rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra d+hA tu a nut+ta ra pU dza karma s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin
159a5(rgyud): g shegs pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin

159a7(rgyud): sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje rin po che'i mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab
159b1(rgyud): pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra
159b2(rgyud): rat+na a nut+ta ra pU dza kar+m+ma s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje chos kyi mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga
159b3(rgyud): rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ /rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ /oM sar+b+ba
159b4(rgyud): ta thA ga ta badzra d+har+m+ma a nut+ta ra pU dzA kar+m+ma s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi
159b5(rgyud): m chod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa'i
159b6(rgyud): mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra kar+m+ma a nut+ta ra pU dzA kar+m+ma s+pha ra Na ma ye hUM/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
159b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms
160a1(rgyud): @#/ /par zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa
160a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu rgyas pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyi bkod
160a3(rgyud): pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rab 'byams sprin gyi rgya mtsho'i lha mo rnams su gyur te byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams sprin gyi rgya mtsho rnams su de bzhin gshegs
160a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
160a5(rgyud): cad kyi rigs mnyes par bya ba dang / kun tu bzang po'i sbyod pa bsgrub pa dang / byang chub chen po'i snying por nye bar 'gro ba dang / bdud thams cad 'dul ba dang / de bzhin
160a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bskyed pa dang /
160a7(rgyud): khams gsum thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med
160b1(rgyud): pa rnams kyi don bya ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul thams cad bstan nas bzhugs so/ /mchod pa'i sprin rgya mtsho'i lha mo de dag kyang rang rang gi
160b2(rgyud): phyag rgya lag pa gnyis kyis 'dzin cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la cho ga bzhin du yang dag par mchod de/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla
160b3(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas mchod pa bdag /mchod pa kun ni byed pa yi/ /gang phyir sangs rgyas byin
160b4(rgyud): can du/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis grub par mdzad/ /de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa la sogs pa'i las kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdo rje'i
160b5(rgyud): bya ba zhes bya ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sar+b+ba At+mA ni r+yA ta na pU s+pha ra Na kar+m+ma badzri N-i hUM yA/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sar+b+ba At+mA ni r+yA ta na pU dzA
160b6(rgyud): s+pha ra Na kar+m+ma gri dza|/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sar+b+ba At+ma ni r+yA ta na a nu rA ga pU dzA s+pha ra Na kar+m+ma bA Ne hUM ho/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sar+b+ba At+mA ni r+yA ta na sa d+hu gA ra pU dzA s+pha ra Na kar+m+ma
160b7(rgyud): tuSh+Ti aHde bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dga' zhing bde ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
161a1(rgyud): @#/ /thams cad mnyes par byed pa mo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes par byed pa mo rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
161a2(rgyud): kyi mchod pa chen po rnams so/ /oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta kA ya a b+hi She ka rat+ne b+h+yo badzra ma Ni oM/ oM na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sU R+ye b+ho badzra te dzo ni dz+wA la hrIHoM na maHsar+b+ba
161a3(rgyud): ta thA ga ta sha pa pa ri pU ra Ni/ tsin+ta ma Ni d+h+wa dza a gre b+h+yo badzra d+h+wa dza a gri trAM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta mahA prI ti pra mo d+ya ka re b+h+yo badzra hA s+ye ta/ dbang mo chen mo dang / snang
161a4(rgyud): ba chen mo dang / rin po che chen po'i char 'bebs ma dang / rab tu dga' zhing mgu ba ma rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i mchod pa'o/ /
161a5(rgyud): oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra d+harma tA sa mA d+hi b+hi stu no mi mahA d+harmA gri hrIHoM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA nir ha raiHstu no mi mahA gA+o ShA nu ge d+haM/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta tsakra
161a6(rgyud): ak+Sha raM pa ri bar+t+tA di sarba su trAn+ta na yai stu no mi sarba maN+Dal hUM/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta san+d+hi b+hA Sha bud+d+ha saM gI ti b+hirga yaM/ stu no mi badzra bA tse baM/ ye shes chen mo'i glu ma dan/
161a7(rgyud): dbyangs chen mo'i rjes su 'brang ma dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug ma dang / sngags kyi spyod pa mo rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mchod
161b1(rgyud): pa'o| |oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hu pa me g+ha snga ra Na pU dzA karme ka ra ka ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pra sa ra s+pha ra Na pU dzA karme ki ri ki ri/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta A lo ke dz+wa la s+pha ra
161b2(rgyud): Na pU dzA karme b+ha ra b+ha ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na pU dzA karme ku ru ku ru/ sems can ma dang / byang chub chen mo'i yan lag ldan ma dang / mig ldan
161b3(rgyud): ma dang / dri ldan ma rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi mchod pa'o/ /de nas 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ma lus shing lus pa med pa
161b4(rgyud): thams cad la mchod pa byed pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje zhes bya ba bshad do/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang
161b5(rgyud): 'dra bas na/ /rdo rje bya ba zhes kyang grags/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /sangs rgyas sku rnams gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje sems sogs tshul du ni/ /lha mo phyag
161b6(rgyud): rgya bcas pa bri/ /de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje bya ba 'dir gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di bshad do/ /de la dbang por rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du
161b7(rgyud): 'jug pa'i tshul gyis gzhug par bya ste/ bcug nas kyang 'di skad du/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dam tshig yin gyi/ mchod pa bcu
162a1(rgyud): @#/ /drug po 'di rnams khyod kyis nyin re zhing ci nus su gyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/ /de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol te las kyi dkyil 'khor

169a5(rgyud): ba che/ /rdo rje gsang ba rab gsang 'chang / /rdo rje phra ba bsam gtan che/ /rdo rje dgos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mchog sangs rdo rje mchog /sangs rgyas
169a6(rgyud): byang chub mkhas pa che/ /sangs rgyas ye shes sangs rgyas che/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa mchod pa che/ /sems dpa'
169a7(rgyud): mchod pa rab mchod pa/ /thabs chen dang ni dngos grub che/ /rdo rje grub khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
169b1(rgyud): dbyangs te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems chen po/ /rdo rje rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas gtso bo rgyal bka' nyan/ /sangs rgyas bshes gnyen rgyal mchog skyes//
169b2(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad che dang khyab/ /ston zhing khro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid che/ /yang dag mtha' ste che ba'i tshul/ /pha rol phyin pa kun mkhyen
169b3(rgyud): ba/ /don dam khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun tu bzang dang spyod pa mchog /bdud dang bdud ni rab 'dul ba/ /kun gyi mchog dang mnyam nyid mkhyen/ /kun tu 'gro
169b4(rgyud): khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas hUM zhes hUM zhes pa/ /rdo rje hUM zhes 'dul ba po/ /rdo rje thams cad rdo rje mchog /phyag na rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ /phyag byas mchod
169b5(rgyud): cing brjod pa dang / /rim gror de bzhin gshegs pas byas/ /gang phyir rdo rje sems brtan pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes khyod bya/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub khyod rag
169b6(rgyud): lus| |kun gzigs yab ni khyod yin te/ /byung ba dang ni 'byung 'gyur ba'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis bsgrubs/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /rab tu
169b7(rgyud): mos pas bstod byed cing / /glu blangs gang zhig mchod byed pa/ /de ni rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun la mnga' mdzad pa'i/ /mgon po khyod la gsol
170a1(rgyud): @#/ /ba ni| |sems can kun don mdzad pa'i phyir/ /rang gi rigs ni skyed par mdzod/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtso
170a2(rgyud): bo phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba'i tshig thos nas/ rdo rje de dag nyid kyi snying gar bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
170a3(rgyud): thams cad bos nas 'di skad gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ma 'tshal to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
170a4(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ ci'i phyir/ rdo rje 'dzin pas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa ma rungs pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis
170a5(rgyud): te| de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang zhi bas gdul bar mi sbyod pa de dag la bdag gis ji ltar sgrub par bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par
170a6(rgyud): s nang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
170a7(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo
170b1(rgyud): dang mnyam par spros pa nyid kyi/ ri rab ri'i rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs par yang gcig tu 'dus te/ de bzhin gshegs
170b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka'i dpal gyi be'ur zhugs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de
170b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs su bdag byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje mnyam pa
170b4(rgyud): nyid kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su bskyab pa dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i dam pa thams cad 'grub pa dang / ma rungs pa thams
170b5(rgyud): cad gdul ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes la dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying
170b6(rgyud): rje chen po'i thabs khro po chen po'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams
170b7(rgyud): cad kyi thugs ka nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di phyung ngo / /hUM| de nas de
171a1(rgyud): @#/ /phyung ma thag tu phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka'i rdo rje las bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ kun tu 'bar ba'i snying po khro gnyer can/
171a2(rgyud): smin ma bcu ma zhing dpral bar gnyer ba/ /mche ba lhag ger byung zhing so gtsigs pa/ /rdo rje dang / lcags kyu dang / ral gri dang / zhags pa la sogs ba rdo rje
171a3(rgyud): me lce 'bar ba'i mtshon cha lag na thogs pa/ rnam pa du ma'i kha dog dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyi cha lugs can phyag na rdo rje'i sku byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams
171a4(rgyud): t hams cad du shin tu ma rungs pa thams cad gdul bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyogs kun tu rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen
171a5(rgyud): po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o thabs kyis 'dul ba yi/ /thabs chen ldan pa bdag yin te/
171a6(rgyud): gang phyir sems can 'dul thabs phyir/ /dri ma med pa'i khro gnyen rab/ /de nas de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs
171a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi spros pa med pa'i chos nyid la dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa
171b1(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rig pa'i
171b2(rgyud): mchog 'di smras pa/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha ni hUM/ gr-ih+na gr-ih+na hUM/ gr-ih+na pa ya gr-ih+na pa ya hUM/ A na ya hoH/ b+ha ga wAn badzra hUM phaT/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
171b3(rgyud): kyi thugs ka nas byung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjer gyur te byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad na/ de bzhin gshegs
171b4(rgyud): pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs te/ spyan drangs nas rdo rje dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen por bcug
171b5(rgyud): ste ngam tshig gis bcings nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres te rdo rje khro bo chen po'i lus su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar 'dug ste ched
171b6(rgyud): du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o byang chub sems 'di ni/ /kun tu bzang zhing sdig med de/ /gang phyir sems can 'dul don du/ /khro bo yang ni yid 'ong
171b7(rgyud): 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje khro bo chen po'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas babs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
172a1(rgyud): @#/ /gnas te yang bka' nod cing bzhugs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis dgug pa'i rdo
172a2(rgyud): rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags kyu zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying

172a4(rgyud): dbang po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'jig rten thams cad na gnas pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i lcags kyus bkug nas ri rab ri'i gang na ba dang /

172a6(rgyud): khang bu brtsegs pa gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa thams cad du bskor
172a7(rgyud): nas 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje rang gi thugs ka nas rdo rje de blangs te/ gsor zhing thams cad dang ldan pa'i khams gsum ji snyed pa thams cad
172b1(rgyud): kyi 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo la bltas te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /grogs po rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa la zhugs la nga'i bka'

172b3(rgyud): chos dang dge 'dun la/ /skyabs su 'gro bar bsgrub par byos/ /kun mkhyen ye shes thob bya'i phyir/ /grogs po rnams kyis bsgrub par byos/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams
172b4(rgyud): ' di na 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po lha chen po 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pa dregs te cher khros par ston cing 'di skad ces
172b5(rgyud): smras so/ /kye| gnod sbyin/ nga ni 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi gtso bo/ dbang phyug chen po/ byed pa po/ 'jig pa po/ 'byung po thams cad kyi dbang po/
172b6(rgyud): lha'i yang lha chen po yin na/ gnod sbyin khyod kyi ngag ci'i phyir nyan/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje gsor zhing bka' stsal pa/ kye| sems can ma rungs pa/
172b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du myur du zhugs la nga'i dam tshig la yang dag par gnas par gyis shig /de nas lha'i yang lha chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
173a1(rgyud): @#/ /gsol to| /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta bu'i sems can dbang phyug chen po la de skad ces bka' stsol pa 'di su zhig /de nas bcom
173a2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi tshogs thams cad dang ldan pa la bos te 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /grogs po rnams/
173a3(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / dam tshig dang / sdom pa la bsgrub par gyis shig /phyag na rdo rje 'di gnod sbyin khro bo ma rungs pa gtum pa'i

173a5(rgyud): po mtha' dag gi dbang por gyur pa dang / rang gi shes pa'i dbang gis 'khor mang po dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la 'jigs par bstan pa'i
173a6(rgyud): phyir khro zhing gtum pa chen por rab tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs 'bar ba chen po gtong zhing / ma rungs pa chen pos rta skad du dgod pa rnams bstan nas 'di skad ces
173a7(rgyud): smras so/ /kye| nga ni 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag po bas na khyod kyis nga la ci'i phyir bka' stsal/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje de bsnyems pa dang bcas
173b1(rgyud): pas gsor zhing 'dzum ste 'di skad ces smras so/ /kyai| lus srul po/ mi'i sha za ba/ zas su ro bsregs pa'i thal ba za zhing kha zas dang / mal dang / gos kyang de las
173b2(rgyud): byed pa nga'i bka' bzhin du byos shig / de nas lha chen po dbang phyug chen pos 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag dang / nam mkha'i khams rnams khro ba khro ba chen pos
173b3(rgyud): non par byin gyis brlabs te 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod kyang nga'i bka' nyon la dam tshig kyang longs shig /de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo chen po'i rgyal pos bcom
173b4(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lha chen po zhes bya ba'i lha 'di ni rang gis 'tshal ba'i stobs kyis dregs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po'i
173b5(rgyud): dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa la 'dud par mi btub na/ de la ji ltar bgyi ba'i rigs/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs
173b6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas phyung ba'i rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig dran par byas so/ /oM ni suM b+ha badzra hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes
173b7(rgyud): rdo rje'i snying po 'di brjod do/ /hUM| de nas de brjod ma thag tu khams gsum pa thams cad nas 'dus pa'i lha chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum po'i dbang po
174a1(rgyud): @#/ /thams cad kha bub tu 'gyel te/ nyam thag pa'i tshig 'byin cing bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la skyabs su dong ngo / /lha chen po zhes bya
174a2(rgyud): ba'i lha de ni sa la 'gyel te dran pa med par gyur nas shi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la de skad ces bka'
174a3(rgyud): stsal to/ /phyag na rdo rje/ 'jig rten gsum po'i 'khor lo 'di thams cad la skyabs sbyin pa byos te ma bsad cig /de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo chen po'i rgyal pos bcom
174a4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa thos nas lha thams cad bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /gal te khyod rang gi srog 'dod nas sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun

174a6(rgyud): pa la skyabs su mchi'o/ /khyod kyi bstan pa'i bka' ni bdag cag gis ma 'tshal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pas de dag
174a7(rgyud): la bos nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye| lha rnams/ 'di ni nged dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab/
174b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin du byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi thu bo/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
174b2(rgyud): chen po kun tu bzang po ste/ sems can thams cad gdul ba'i don bya ba'i phyir khro bo'i rgyal po chen por dbang bskur ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod kyi nang na'ang lha chen
174b3(rgyud): po la sogs pa ma rungs pa'i sems can yod do/ /de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang zhi bar mdzad pas sdig pa las bzlog par mi spyod pa'i sdig pa'i
174b4(rgyud): sems can de dag rnams tshar gcod pa'i phyir byin gyis brlabs so/ /de bas na khyed rnams 'di'i dam tshig la gnas par byos shig par bka' stsal to/ /de dag gis
