174b6(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye/ grogs po rnams/ 'di nyid la skyabs su dong dang / de nyid kyis kun tu skyob kyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no/ /de nas khams gsum kun nas
174b7(rgyud): ' dus pa srid pa gsum gyi bdag po de rnams bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de ga la ba de logs su bltas nas nyam thag pa chen po'i sgra mgrin gcig tu phyung nas 'di skad
175a1(rgyud): @#/ /ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'di las kun tu bskyab par gsol/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ kun tu bskyab par gsol/
175a2(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje lha la sogs pa de rnams la pos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye/ ma rungs pa rnams/ nga'i bstan pa
175a3(rgyud): la zhugs shig / rdo rje 'bar ba 'dis gcig tu 'bar bar byas nas khyed thams cad kyang thal bar byas ta re/ de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /khyed ni bcom ldan
175a4(rgyud): 'das kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa/ zhi ba/ dul ba/ sems can thams cad la phan par bzhed pa/ sems can thams cad
175a5(rgyud): la mi 'jigs pa stsol ba lags na/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag bsregs par 'gyur/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos de dag la 'di skad
175a6(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to/ /kye| grogs po dag /gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin du byed pa de'i phyir nga ni kun tu bzang po ste/ khyed lta bu'i sems can
175a7(rgyud): ma rungs pa'i dang tshul can sdig pa'i sems rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir gal te nga'i dam tshig la mi gnas na chud gzan par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ de bzhin du bgyi'o//
175b1(rgyud): de nas byag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos dbang phyug chen po ma gtogs pa'i lha de dag gzhan dbugs dbyung zhing bslang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying
175b2(rgyud): po rdo rje bslang ba zhes bya ba 'di smras so/ /oM badzrod tiSh+Tha/ de nas de skad smras ma thag tu dbang phyug chen po ma gtogs par khams gsum pa 'dus pa srid pa gsum gyi bdag po
175b3(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kun brgyal ba las sems dbugs phyung ste/ lha'i bde ba myong zhing 'jigs shing bag tsha ba dang / ba spu langs pa med par gyur nas
175b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la lta zhing langs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po/ lha'i
175b5(rgyud): dbang po lha chen po 'di ma bslang na/ 'di srog de chud gzan par gyur te ci rung / gsos na ni 'di 'ang skyes bu dam par 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin du bya'o
175b6(rgyud): snyam nas shi ba gso ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /badzra A yuH/ de nas 'di smras ma thag tu lha chen po lha'i bdag po shi ba las sos te ldang 'dod na yang ldang ni ma nus so/ /de nas
175b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci bdag cag 'di lta bus 'dul lam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod skyes bu chen po 'di'i bka'
176a1(rgyud): @#/ /nyan par mi 'jug na/ khyod la 'dul ba 'di nyid yin gyi nga ma yin no/ /dbang phyug chen pos gsol pa/ ci bcom ldan 'das/ khyod kyis ma rungs
176a2(rgyud): pa'i sems can de las skyabs mdzad par mi spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas 'di las skyabs mi nus so/ /gsol pa/ ci'i slad du/ bka' stsal
176a3(rgyud): pa| de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis ma 'tshal
176a4(rgyud): to| |ci'i slad du zhe na/ khams gsum gyi bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las gzhan pa'i bdag po mchis par ma 'tshal na 'di su lags/ de nas bcom
176a5(rgyud): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes yang lha chen po la bos te 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /kye| ma rungs pa'i sems can/ nga'i bka' mi
176a6(rgyud): nyan tam/ de nas lha chen pos rdo rje sems dpa'i tshig thos nas 'khrugs shing khros par gyur te/ de ltar bsgyel bzhin du yang 'jigs pa chen po'i gzugs bstan te/
176a7(rgyud): 'di skad ces smras so/ /nga shi bar bzod kyi khyod kyi ngag mi nyan to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje rab tu khros par ston cing rang gi rkang pa'i mthil nas
176b1(rgyud): rdo rje'i rjes su spyod pa 'di phyung ngo / /oM pa ta ka ri Sha na badzra hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil nas kun tu 'bar ba'i rdo rje'i snying po/ khro gnyer byas pa/ mche ba lhag
176b2(rgyud): ger phyung ba/ gdong chen po rdo rje'i rjes su spyod pa byung nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar bka' nyan cing 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes dbang phyug chen po
176b3(rgyud): sbyang ba'i phyir 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /oM pa ta ka ri Sha Na badzra hUM/ oM pa ta ka ri sha /sarba badzra b+ha ra a nu tsa ra ka ta badzra hUM dzaH/ de nas de skad ces gsungs pa dang / lha chen
176b4(rgyud): po dang / lha mo u mar bcas te rkang pa gyen kar bstan nas gcer bur phyung ste/ skye bo thams cad kyis gad mos btab cing rkang pas 'gugs pa rdo rje'i rjes su spyod pas de
176b5(rgyud): bkug ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar zhabs kyi drung du gzhag go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la
176b6(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can ma rungs pa mchis brang dang bcas pa 'di ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM badzra kra ma ho//
176b7(rgyud): de nas de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes lha chen po zhabs g.yon pas mnan/ zhabs g.yas pas lha mo u
177a1(rgyud): @#/ /ma'i nu ma'i steng du mnan pas rang gi snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badzra A be sha ha na pa ti tra Ta/ de nas de smras ma thag tu lha chen po la babs nas
177a2(rgyud): rang gi lag pa stong gis rang gi gdong stong la 'tshog go / de nas rdo rje'i nor bu rin po che'i rtse mo'i rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsigs
177a3(rgyud): pa'i phyi rol na srid pa gsum po thams cad kyis nged kyi dbang po de bdag nyid chen po des btul lo zhes sgra chen po phyung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha chen po
177a4(rgyud): la thugs rje chen po bskyed de/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byams pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM bud+d+ha mai tri badzra rak+Sha haM/ de nas de skad ces gsungs ma thag tu lha
177a5(rgyud): chen po la babs pa'i sdug bsngal de kun zhi bar gyur to/ /de nas yang phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi mthil gyis reg pas bde ba bla na med pa 'grub pa'i dbang dang / ting
177a6(rgyud): nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa dang / gzungs dang / ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa rnams thob pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'grub pa'i bar du gyur to/ /
177a7(rgyud): de nas lha chen po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs mthil gyis reg pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / rnam par thar
177b1(rgyud): pa'i bde ba myong ste/ lha chen po'i lus phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs la phul nas/ 'og gi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
177b2(rgyud): g yi rdul phra rab snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na thal bas khebs pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der thal ba'i dbang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs
177b3(rgyud): par skyes so/ /de nas lha chen po'i lus de las ched du brjod pa 'di phyung ngo / /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med/ /yi ge'i tshogs kyis
177b4(rgyud): mnan nas su/ /mya ngan las ni 'das par gzhag /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de las gzhan pa mthu chen po la sogs pa 'jig
177b5(rgyud): rten gsum gyi bdag po thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /grogs po rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po
177b6(rgyud): 'dir zhugs shig / zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig srungs shig /de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag cag ji skad bka' stsal pa
177b7(rgyud): de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes srid pa gsum 'dus pa de rnams bos te 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /grogs po rnams/ yang gsum
178a1(rgyud): @#/ /la skyabs su 'dong ba dang / bslab pa dang / dam tshig dang / sdom pa gzung la nga'i dam tshig la yang gnas par gyis shig /de dag gis gsol
178a2(rgyud): pa| de bzhin du 'tshal na/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' dang dam tshig glo bar ma chud do/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi dam tshig 'di byin no/ /byang chub sems
178a3(rgyud): ni rims bzhin du/ /bskyed nas de yi 'og tu ni/ /byang chub chen por ci nus par/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag 'bad par bya/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
178a4(rgyud): c hen po phyag na rdo rjes lha la sogs pa de rnams 'jug ba'i dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya bcing ba la sogs pa byas nas dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya'i snying po 'dis 'ching du
178a5(rgyud): gzhug go / oM badzra sa ma ya gr-ih+na s+t+waM ban+d+ha sa ma ya/ badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu sma ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dr-i D+ho ma b+ha ba/ s+thi ro me b+ha ba/ A hA R+yo me b+ha ba/ a pra ti hA
178a6(rgyud): R+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba karma su tsa me tsit+taM shri yaHku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha hoHde nas 'di smras ma thag tu khams gsum gyi srid pa gsum gyi skye bo 'das pa thams cad rdo rje khro bo ti
178a7(rgyud): rin ti ri'i phyag rgyal ga tu babs nas dam du bcing bar gyur to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes tshul bzhin du btsud nas dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad go rims bzhin du
178b1(rgyud): bstan te rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas rdo rje'i mtshan ma'ang lag tu byin te/ rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
178b2(rgyud): kyi sems can gyi don la bkod do/ /de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po thams cad kyi ming rnams yin te/ 'di lta ste/ dbang phyug chen po ni khro bo'i rdo rje'o/ /mthu bo che ni sgyu ma'i
178b3(rgyud): rdo rje'o/ /kar+Ni ka sgra gzhon nu ni rdo rje dril bu'o/ /tshangs pa ni thub pa'i rdo rje'o/ /dbang po ni rdo rje'i mtshon cha ste/ de la sogs pa ni rig pa'i rgyal po rnams su zhes bya bar dbang bskur
178b4(rgyud): to| |de nas bar snang la spyod pa'i bdag po rnams la rjes su byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ nyi ma ni rdo rje 'khyil ba'o/ /zla ba ni rdo rje'i 'od do/ /dbyig pa chen po'i gtso bo ni rdo rje
178b5(rgyud): dbyig pa'o| |ser smug ni rdo rje ser smug ste/ de la sogs pa ni rdo rje khro bo zhes bya bar dbang bskur to/ /de nas nam mkha' la spyod pa'i lha'i dbang po thams cad la byin pa
178b6(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ sbrang rtsis myos pa ni rdo rje'i glang po'i sna'o/ /sbrang rtsir byed pa ni rdo rje'i phreng ba'o/ /rgyal ba ni rdo rje'i dbang ngo / /rgyal bar byed po ni rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje ste/
178b7(rgyud): de la sogs pa ni tshogs kyi gtso bo zhes bya bar dbang bskur to/ /de nas sa bla'i dbang po thams cad la byin pa/ 'di lta ste/ mdzod skyong ni rdo rje tho ba'o/ /me ni rdo rje'i
179a1(rgyud): @#/ /me'o/ /rlung ni rdo rje'i rlung ngo / /ku be ra ni rdo rje 'jigs pa'o/ /de la sogs pa ni rdo rje pho nya zhes bya bar dbang bskur to/ /de nas sa 'og gi dbang
179a2(rgyud): po lha thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/ phag ni rdo rje lcags kyu'o/ /gshin rje ni rdo rje dus so/ /gtsug phud sa ni rdo rje bgegs kyi gtso ba 'o/ /ba ru Na ni klu'i rdo rje
179a3(rgyud): ste| |de la sogs pa ni rdo rje bran zhes bya bar dbang bskur to/ /de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po'i lha mo thams cad rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang
179a4(rgyud): bskur te/ rang gi mtshan ma rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur cing / de bzhin ga sheg pa thams cad kyi sems can gyi
179a5(rgyud): don la rab tu bkod pa la 'di lta ste/ u ma ni khro bo rdo rje ma'o/ /rug mi n+ya ni rdo rje gser ro/ /Sha Sh+Ta ni rdo rje gzhon nu ma'o/ /tshangs ma ni rdo rje zhi ma'o/ /dbang mo
179a6(rgyud): ni rdo rje khu tshur te/ de la sogs pa ni rdo rje'i rgyal mor dbang bskur to/ /de nas nam mkha' la spyod pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ mi 'chi ba ni
179a7(rgyud): rdo rje mi 'chi ma 'o/ /ro hi na ni rdo rje mdangs ma'o/ /dbyig pa 'dzin ma ni rdo rje dbyig mchog ma'o/ /skye ba 'phrog ma ni rdo rje sked 'chings ma ste/ de la sogs pa ni khro
179b1(rgyud): mo zhes bya bar dbang bskur to/ /de nas bar snang la spyod pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ gsod ma ni rdo rje 'ju ma'o/ /za ba ma ni rdo rje za ba ma'o/ /bgo ba ni
179b2(rgyud): rdo rje bgo ba ma'o/ /dga' ba ni rdo rje dga' ba ma'o/ /de la sogs pa ni tshogs kyi gtso mor dbang bskur to/ /de nas sa la spyod pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/
179b3(rgyud): zhi ba ma ni rdo rje pho nya ma'o/ /rlung ni mgyogs ma'i rdo rje ma'o/ /me ni rdo rje 'bar ma'o/ /ku be ra ma ni rdo rje'i 'khor ma ste/ /de la sogs pa ni rdo rje pho nya mor dbang bskur to/ /de nas
179b4(rgyud): sa 'og na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ phag mo ni rdo rje kha'o/ /tsa muN+Ti ni rdo rje dus ma'o/ /snang chen ma ni rdo rje rul pa ma'o/ /ba ru na ma ni rdo rje chu srin
179b5(rgyud): ma ste/ de la sogs pa ni rdo rje bran mor dbang bskur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes zhugs pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnams
179b6(rgyud): bskyed nas phyag rgya bcing ba thams cad la bslabs te/ rdo rje'i dam tshig mna'i snying po 'di byin no/ /rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /dam
179b7(rgyud): tshig 'di las 'das na ni/ /rigs rnams myur du thal bar byed/ /oM ha na sa ma ya hUM phaT/ de nas snying po gzung bar bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di byin to/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis
180a1(rgyud): @#/ /bcings te/ /mdzub mo lcags kyur bcings nas ni/ /gcu zhing phyir yang gcu bar bya/ /dgos pa'i don sems gang yin pa/ /de yi mdun
180a2(rgyud): du khyed rnams ni/ /dgos par grub phyir 'dug par byos/ /khyod kyi srog ni ma rungs par/ /dam tshig 'dis ni gyur ta re/ /rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te/ /mdzub mo
180a3(rgyud): bkug nas rab tu mnan/ /mthe bod gnyis ka mtshams sbyar bas/ /gung mo gnyis ka rab tu mnan/ /rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa yi/ /dam tshig phyag rgya bcings pa
180a4(rgyud): las| |gal te 'ga' yis 'das gyur na/ /dam tshig 'dis ni khyod gsod do/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyi ga yi/ /mthe'u chung sor mo bcings nas ni/ /mdzub mo sor
180a5(rgyud): mo'i rgyab nas mdud/ /bzlog ste mgo bor gzhag par bya/ /bdag nyid che ba'i dam tshig ste/ /rdo rje rig 'dzin bcings nas ni/ /khros te gang la bltas na ni/ /de
180a6(rgyud): yi mdun du de bzhin 'dug / rdo rje bsdams pa'i rdo rje yis/ /bsrung ba dam bcings mnan pa ni/ /de ni srung ba'i dam tshig ste/ /sems can thams cad srung ba'o/ /
180a7(rgyud): gang zhig gang la bskyab pa'i phyir/ /khro bor ldan pas bcings nas ni/ /sems can gang la bsrung ba yi/ /de yi rgyab tu 'dug par byos/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis
180b1(rgyud): bcings te/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la/ /mthe'u chung gis ni bsdam byas te/ /gcu zhing slar gcu dra bkrol nas/ /sbyi bor mnyam zhugs gang yin pa'i/ /dam
180b2(rgyud): tshig 'di yang sbyar byas na/ /khyed kyis de yi mdun du ni/ /dngos grub kun gyi mchog phyir 'khod/ /rdo rje bcing ba sprel pa ni/ /mdzub mo gnyis ka dam por sbyar/ /mthe
180b3(rgyud): bo gung mo'i rtse mo gnyis/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyar bcings nas kyang / /bzlog ste dpral bar gzhag par bya/ /gal te gsod par 'dod na ni/ /dgug par bya ba gang yin
180b4(rgyud): pa/ /de yi mdun du rtag tu 'dug /de nas 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi snying po 'dzin pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dam tshig 'dzin pa'i snying po 'di yin te/ oM
180b5(rgyud): ba li tod ba li ta badzra A gaR+Sha ya hUM dza dza/ rdo rje gcu ba'i phyag rgya lha dgug pa'i snying po'o/ /oM badzra a gra di pa ya sa ma ye hUM/ bar snang na sbyod pa rnams kyi'o/ /oM
180b6(rgyud): badzra mA la a gra baM/ phreng ba can rnams gyi'o/ /oM badzra ban+d+ha haM/ sa la sbyod pa rnams kyi'o/ /oM badzra pA tA la b+hany+dza b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ sa'i 'og na gnas pa rnams kyi'o/ /oM
180b7(rgyud): he ru ka badzra sa ma ya sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu drA b+hany+dza ka hUM phaT/ bud med thams cad kyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
181a1(rgyud): @#/ /gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ma rungs pa 'dul ba por dbang bskur na/ bcings pa'i
181a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ma rungs pa de dag thams cad ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi ba legs par bka' stsal bar gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsan nas 'di
181a3(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal to/ /oM badzra suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes sems can thams cad la bskyab pa'i
181a4(rgyud): phyir dkyil 'khor thams cad dgug pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra sa ma ya A kaR+Sha ya sarba maN+Da la ma badzra d+ha ra sat+ya mA ti kra ma hUM phaT/ rdo rje lcags kyu
181a5(rgyud): gnyis bcings te/ /snying gar yongs su bskor bar bya/ /mdzub gnyis lcags kyus phyi rol gyi/ /dkyil 'khor dgug pa mchog yin no/ /de nas 'di bshad ma
181a6(rgyud): thag tu dkyil 'khor thams cad ri rab ri'i rtse mo'i phyi rol kun tu bskor te 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes dkyil 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams
181a7(rgyud): cad la bos te 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /kye| grogs po dag /srog gcod pa dag spangs shing dam tshig gzung ba la bsgrub par gyis shig /de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil
181b1(rgyud): 'khor gyi dam tshig gi sems can de dag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag sha 'tshal ba ma rungs pa'i sems
181b2(rgyud): can lags pas mdangs 'phrog pa la srog ltos na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ji ltar 'tsho bar bgyi ba de bka' stsol cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
181b3(rgyud): po phyag na rdo rjes ma rungs pa'i rdo rje khro bo 'di gsungs so/ /oM duSh+Ta badzra kro d+ha ha na da ha pa tsa bi d+h+wa na sa ya bi ka ri/ sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu drA maN+Dal/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ mar+d+ha mar+d+ha/ khA da khA das/
181b4(rgyud): pa ra man+ta badzra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ rdo rje khro mdzub legs bar naM/ /sen mo sprad de dkris nas kyang / /rtse mo gnyis ni dam sbyar ba/ /phyag rgya 'di ni ma rungs 'joms/ /de nas
181b5(rgyud): 'di smras ma thag tu ma rungs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gcig tu 'dus pa rnam pa du mas gtse zhing dral ba dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings pa'ang dral to/ /
181b6(rgyud): ma rungs pa'i dam tshig gi sems can de rnams yang bsreg cing shin tu gtsos pas 'o dod cher 'bod cing phongs pa'i sgra cher phyung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
181b7(rgyud): pa chen po ga la ba der thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag srog dang mi 'bral bar skyabs mdzad du gsol/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes
182a1(rgyud): @#/ /yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces to/ /bcom ldan 'das ma rungs pa'i dkyil 'khor de rnams ji ltar bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du
182a2(rgyud): gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM ni suM b+ha ha na da ha ba tsa gr-ih+Na ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rdo rjes khro bo mi bzad
182a3(rgyud): pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM mahA badzra khu ra kro d+ha pa ta ya sarba duSh+Ta laM man+ta/ bi nA sha ya sarba duSh+Ta sa ma yaM b+hi ga ki ra bi d+h+wa na sa ya s+pho Ta ya b+hany+dza ya sarba duSh+ta sa ma ya mu drA ban+d+ha
182a4(rgyud): gr-ih+Na ha na da ha pa tsa sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya sa twaM badzra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ de nas gsungs ma thag tu ma rungs pa'i dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad
182a5(rgyud): kyang gcig tu gyur nas rgya mtsho chen por ltung ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
182a6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bdag la ma rungs pa thams cad thul cig ces bka' stsal na/ phra men ma dang / gdon la sogs pa gnod pa de dag thams cad la bdag gis ji
182a7(rgyud): ltar bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /oM ha na ha na badzra hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes
182b1(rgyud): yang phra men ma la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad 'gugs pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra A kaR+Sha ya shrI g+h+raM sarba duSh+Ta gra haM/ badzra d+ha ra sa twan hUM dza/ de nas de smras
182b2(rgyud): ma thag tu phra men ma la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad ri rab kyi rtse mo'i phyi rol bskor te 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes phra men ma
182b3(rgyud): la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /kye bzod ldan rnams/ srog gcod pa spang ba'i bslab pa dang / dam tshig dang / sdom
182b4(rgyud): pa gzung bar byos shig / rdo rje 'od 'phro ba dang / rab tu 'bar ba dang / gcig pu 'bar bas gyur pas khyod kyi rigs rnams ma lus par bsregs ta re/ de nas phra men ma la
182b5(rgyud): sogs pa'i gdon ma rungs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
182b6(rgyud): cag sha 'tshal ba na ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /phyag na rdo rje/ sems can
182b7(rgyud): 'di dag rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed la thabs sbyin bsgrub par gyis shig/ de nas phyag na rdo rje'i thugs rje chen pos sems can thams cad 'chi ba'i mtshan ma
183a1(rgyud): @#/ /shes pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra pra ti gr-ih+Na hr-i da ya mA kaR+Sha ya/ yad t+ya yaM ma to mA mang+hA ra d+he na mi ya te/ tad+ya s+ya
183a2(rgyud): hr-i da ya ni skra mi du sa ma ya hUM dzaH/ de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /snying gar rdo rje lag ngar gnyis/ /shin tu dam par bcings nas ni/ /rdo rje mdzub mo'i rtse mo
183a3(rgyud): yis / rang gi mchan khung brud par bya/ /khyed rnams kyis phyag rgya 'dis sems can thams cad kyi snying rus la zo zhig /de nas phra men ma la sogs pa ma rangs pa'i
183a4(rgyud): gdon thams cad dga' ba'i sgra phyung nas mchongs rgal byas te rang gi gnas su dong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad
183a5(rgyud): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ma rungs pa 'dul ba lags par bdag la bka' stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das rims la
183a6(rgyud): sogs pa'i nad de rnams la ji ltar bgyi/ bdag la bka' stsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen
183a7(rgyud): po phyag na rdo rjes rims la sogs pa'i nad dgug pa'i phyag rgya dang / snying po 'di gsungs pa/ oM badzra sa ma ya A na ya sarba du Sh+Ta dz+wa ra d+ha ni nA sha ya hUM phaT/ de nas 'di
183b1(rgyud): gsungs ma thag tu rims la sogs pa'i nad thams cad ri rab kyi ri'i rtse mo'i phyi rol tu bskor te 'khod do/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes rims la sogs pa'i nad 'di rnams la bos te/
183b2(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /kye bzod ldan rnams/ /sems can gsod pa las ldog pa'i bslab pa gzung ba'i sdom pa longs shig/ de dag gis gsol ba/ bcom ldan
183b3(rgyud): 'das/ /bdag cag ni sems can gyi mdangs phrogs te 'tsho bar bgyid na/ de bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ji ltar bgyi/ legs par bka' stsol cig/ de nas byang chub
183b4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi las rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra kar+m+ma bi sho d+ha ya sarba A ba rA Na ni bud+d+ha sa
183b5(rgyud): t+ye na sa ma ya hUM/ de nas phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /rdo rje thal mo dam sbyar te/ /mdzub mo gnyis ka bkug nas kyang / /mthe bor mnyam te sbyar nas ni/ /mnan pa 'di ni
183b6(rgyud): sdig 'phrog pa/ /phyag rgya 'di rims la sogs pa'i nad thams cad kyi gang la btab pa la/ las byas la bstan na de khyed rnams kyis thongs shig/ khyed cag srog dang bral
183b7(rgyud): la re/ /de nas de rnams de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol te slar dong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad
184a1(rgyud): @#/ /ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag sgrib pa thams cad bsal ba dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba'i slad du
184a2(rgyud): nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung na de la/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song de rnams thams cad ji ltar bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol /
184a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM k+Sha pa ya badzra swAhA/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes du 'bod la sogs pa ngan song gi 'gro ba'i 'khor
184a4(rgyud): lo thams cad dgug pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba a pa ya A kaR+Sha Na bi sho d+ha na badzra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu du 'bod chen po la sogs
184a5(rgyud): pa ngan song na gnas pa rnams ri rab kyi ri'i rtse mo'i phyi rol tu bskor te 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems chen po phyag na rdo rjes ngan song gi sar ltung ba'i sems can
184a6(rgyud): de dag thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /kye bzod ldan rnams/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / dam tshig dang / sdom pa dang / ngan
184a7(rgyud): song thams cad las thar ba'i phyag rgya dang / /snying po zungs shig/ de nas de dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /bdag cag sdug
184b1(rgyud): bsngal gyis gzir ba 'di las bskyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rnams sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / khyod la skyabs su mchi'o/ /de nas phyag
184b2(rgyud): na rdo rjes ngan song thams cad 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra pA Ni bi s+pho Ta ya sarba a pa ya ban+d+ha na ni pra mo k+Sha ya/ sarbA bA ya ga te b+h+yaHsarba satwaM sarba ta thA
184b3(rgyud): ga ta badzra sa ma ya trAT/ de nas de'i phyag rgya bcings pa bshad do/ /rdo rje bcing ba dam bcas te/ gung mo gnyis ka sbyar nas su/ /tha ma bzhi ni rtse mo sbyar/ /sdig pa 'joms
184b4(rgyud): par grags pa yin/ /de nas ngan song gsum gyi 'khor lo na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'di mthong nas ngan song thams cad nas shi 'phos nas/
184b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhabs drung du skyes so/ /ngan song de rnams kyang rgya mtsho chen por bor ro/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na
184b6(rgyud): rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i skyabs dang / phan pa dang / bde ba
184b7(rgyud): t hams cad myong bar bgyi ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi grub pa dam pa'i 'bras bu'i thob par bya ba'i bar du 'tshol cig par bdag la
185a1(rgyud): @#/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa'i rdo rje stsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal na/ mi 'di rnams
185a2(rgyud): ji ltar bgyi ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsol cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang gcig tu 'dus nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /oM
185a3(rgyud): badzra pA Ni mahA maN+Da laM pra be sha ya sarba duSh+Ta ro tran+ni ba ra ya pra be bya pra ma sha ya tru ra dr-i Sh+Ta paR+ya baM maM/ bi sho d+ha ya nA sha ya bi nA sha ya/ ha ha ha ha hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
185a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa'i tshig de thos nas sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med par bskyab pa dang / phan pa dang / bde ba thams cad dang / dngos grub
185a5(rgyud): dam pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i
185a6(rgyud): dam tshig las byung ba 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po
185a7(rgyud): dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba yi/ /dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ 'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya/ /rdo rje dam tshig las byung ba/ /sangs rgyas
185b1(rgyud): byang chub 'byin byed pa'i/ /ma rungs thams cad rnam par 'jig/ de la sngags 'dis srad bu bre bar bya'o/ /oM badzra sa ma ya sU traM/ mA tri kra ma ho/ /gru bzhir bya zhing sgo bzhir dod//
185b2(rgyud): rta babs bzhis kyang rab tu brgyan/ /srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste/ /dar dang phreng bas shin tu brgyan/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi grwa rnams su/ /sgo khyud gyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje
185b3(rgyud): rin chen brgyan par ni/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim srad bu bre/ /shes rab can gyis de nang du/ /rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan te/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /ka ba brgyad dang rta babs bcas/
185b4(rgyud): rdo rje ka ba'i gnas mchog tu/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan byas te/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor srad bu bre/ /srad bu bres par tshon rtsis dgang pa/ /de la tshon la bzlas pa ni 'di'o//
185b5(rgyud): oM badzra ci twa sa ma ya hUM/ de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni/ /rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag pas/ /rdo rje sgo ni rnam bzhi po/ /yid kyis bu ni dbye bar bya/ /de la sgo rnams dbye ba'i
185b6(rgyud): sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM badzrod g+ha Ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha ya hUM/ gser ram dngul las byas pa'am/ /sa yang rung ste legs bris pa'i/ /pha gu gru bzhir byas pa la/ /sangs rgyas
185b7(rgyud): gzugs ni gzhag par bya/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i snying po ni 'di yin no/ /oM badzra dz+wa la ag+ni bra dIp+ta A kaR+Sha ya sarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ mahA badzra
186a1(rgyud): @#/ /sa ma ya hUM dzaH/ sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdo rje ni/ /'bar bas bskor bas gzhag par bya/ /de bzhin rin chen 'od bskor ba/ /pad+ma rdo rje kun de bzhin//
186a2(rgyud): de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams dgod pa'i snying po 'di yin no/ /oM sa twa badzri dz+wA la mA lA hUM phaT/ oM rat+na badzra dz+wA la mA lA hUM trAM/ oM d+harma badzri dz+wA la mA lA hUM hrIHoM karma
186a3(rgyud): badzri dz+wA la mA lA hUM aH/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /sangs rgyas spyan sngar de bzhin du/ /shes pas cho ga bzhin bri ba/ /rdo rje hUM zhes dkyil 'khor ro/ /de la rdo rje
186a4(rgyud): shugs kyi snying po ni 'di yin no/ /oM badzra be gA kra ma hUM/ 'di bzhin du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la yang srad bu la brgal
186a5(rgyud): te thams cad du 'gro bar bya'o/ /de nas de'i phyag rgya 'di bshad do/ /yid kyis ri mo bteg nas ni/ /rdo rje srad bu'am gzhan yang rung / /phyir phyung nang du zhugs kyang ni/ /
186a6(rgyud): dam tshig 'gal bar de mi 'gyur/ /de yi dbus su sems dpa' che/ /phyag na rdo rje bri ba ni/ /ut+pal che sngo 'tsher ba'i mdog /rdo rje hUM zhes bya bar 'dus/ /mche ba
186a7(rgyud): cung zad phyung ba'i zhal/ /khro dang bcas par 'dzum pa'i zhal/ /g.yon brkyang tshul du bzhugs pa ste/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas dkrigs pa'i 'od/ /g.yon pa'i zhabs
186b1(rgyud): kyi mthil gyis ni/ /dbang phyug chen po mnan par bya/ /g.yas pa'i zhabs kyis u ma yi/ /nu ma'i steng du mnan par bri/ /de yi snying po ni 'di yi yin no/ /hUM/ de yi phyogs ni thams
186b2(rgyud): cad du/ /rdo rje khro bo bzhag pa ni/ /khros bas mche ba phyung ba ni/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas dkrigs pa'i 'od/ /de nas de dag gi snying po rnams ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM badzra satwa kro
186b3(rgyud): d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha A be sha ya hUM phaT/ oM karma kro d+ha rA ga ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra duSh+Ti kro d+ha sA d+hU sA b+hu hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam pa gnyis par ni/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas
186b4(rgyud): kyang / /der ni rdo rjer dbang bskur ba/ rdo rje khro bos bskor bar bri/ /de nas de rnams kyi snying po 'di bshad do/ /traM oM badzri b+h+ri ku TI kro d+ha ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/ oM badzra sUR+ya mahA dz+wA la mA
186b5(rgyud): lA kro d+ha dz+wa la ya sar+b+baM hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ke tu de hi hUM phaT/ oM badzra hA sa kro d+ha ha ha ha ha hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum par ni/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang /
186b6(rgyud): rdo rje sde ni bri bar bya/ /khro bo bdag nyid chen por bskor/ /de nas de rnams kyi snying po 'di bshad do/ /hrIHoM badzra d+harma kro d+ha bi nA sha ya bi sho d+ha ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na kro d+ha ts+tshin+da
186b7(rgyud): ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ oM badzra he tu kro d+ha pra pe sha ya maN+Ta le sarba hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha b+hA She ba ta ba ta hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhi par ni/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang / /rdo
187a1(rgyud): @#/ /rje dbab pa bri bya ba/ /rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs kyis bskor/ /de nas de rnams kyi snying po 'di bshad do/ /AHhUM badzra karma hUM phaT/ oM badzra ka ba tsa kro d+ha rak+Sha
187a2(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM badzra yak+Sha kro d+ha khA da khA da hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha muSh+Ti sA d+ha ya sa ma ya hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni grwa rnams su/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul bzhin du/ /ji ltar go rims

187b1(rgyud): sa ma yaM hUM hUM/ oM badzra s+pho Ta mahA kro d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha sarba sa ma yaM hUM baM/ oM badzra A be sha mahA kro d+ha a be sha ya sarba sa ma yaM hUM aH/ de nas yang 'dir 'jig rten gsum las rnam par

188a7(rgyud): nus par 'gyur ro/ /hUM zhes byas pas lha chen po la sogs pa lha thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / mnan par nus
188b1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing rang gi dngos
188b2(rgyud): grub sbyin par mdzad do/ /de nas de la rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur to/ /rang gi mtshan ma rdo rje rnon po ji lta ba bzhin du sngags 'dis lag pa gnyis su sbyin no/ /oM badzra pA
188b3(rgyud): Ni badzra karma ka rod+b+ha ba/ de nas sngags 'dis rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur to/ /oM badzra kro d+ha twaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta he badzra nA ma/ de nas gang la ming btags pa
188b4(rgyud): de la kye zhes bya ba'i sgra dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas ye shes rnams bskyed de/ /rdo rje khro bo mnyam gzhag nas/ /'bar ba mang po'i 'od can gyi/ /rdo rje'i dbyibs ni snying gar bsam/ /
