188b6(rgyud): rdo rje khro bor mnyam gzhag nas/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba mang po'i 'od/ /rdo rje pad+ma mgul du bsam/ /sems can thams cad brlag par byed/ /rdo rje khro bo mnyam gzhag nas//
188b7(rgyud): 'bar ba'i phreng ba mang po'i 'od/ /rdo rje thams cad spyi bor bzhag /skye bo 'di dag thams cad srung / /de nas ye shes kyi phyag rgya 'di rnams kyi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /hUM sarba
189a1(rgyud): @#/ /badzra kro d+ha a be sha aH/ ho rat+na badzra kro d+ha b+ha Sha ma nA ya traM hUM/ badzra d+harmA kro d+ha nA sha ya hUM phaT/ hUM karma badzra kro d+ha rak+Sha/ /de nas lha thams cad dgug
189a2(rgyud): pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya bslab bo/ /hUM zhes bya ba bcings nas ni/ /lag pa rdo rje lcags kyur bsam/ /khros nas mdzub mo bskul nas ni/ lha rnams 'gug pa'i mchog
189a3(rgyud): tu 'gyur/ /rang gi rkang mthil dbus su ni/ /rdo rje lcags kyu bris nas su/ /de nyid kyis ni rtag mnan na/ /lha rnams nges pa nyid du 'gug/ /rdo rje'i lcags kyu nyid phyag rgya//
189a4(rgyud): legs par phyi ste bzhag nas su/ /bskul na u ma la sogs pa/ /bud med thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur/ /rdo rje lcags kyu bzhag pa ni/ /mdzub mo nyid du de bzhin te//
189a5(rgyud): des mnan lha yi gang yin pa/ /de ni 'gugs pa'i dam pa'o/ /de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin no/ /oM badzra kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra karma aM ku sha kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya hUM
189a6(rgyud): phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha daN+Ta a gra A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha saM gats+tsha A kaR+Sha ya mi te badzra sa ma ya ma nusma ra hUM phaT/ de nas phyag rgya rnam bzhi'i ye shes bslab bo/ /brkyang
189a7(rgyud): zhing bskum pas gnas nas su/ /rdo rje dbab pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /hUM tsam gyis kyang skad cig gis/ /skye bo thams cad 'bebs par byed/ /rdo rje dag ni legs par smras//
189b1(rgyud): hUM zhes bya ba bzhi ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po yis/ /thams cad kyang ni nges par 'gug/ rdo rje khro bor mnyam gzhag nas/ rdo rje khro bo'i lha mchog gis/ /skye bo kun gyi gsos
189b2(rgyud): byed de/ /rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'byor to/ /yid kyis lus la go bgo ba/ /bdag gam pha rol rnams la ste/ /go cha chen po'i sbyor bas ni/ /skye bo 'di dag thams cad srung / /de nas de
189b3(rgyud): rnams kyi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /oM badzra kro d+ha kA yA be shA ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra bid+yot+ta ma mahA kro d+ha A na ya ho b+ha ga bAM badzra hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha tiSh+Tha ha na da ha pa tsa bi nA shA ya
189b4(rgyud): hUM| ka re Na pA ta ya badzra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ oM ma no dr-i T+ha badzra ka ba tsa kro d+ha rak+Sha hUM phaT/ de nas sems can thams cad rgyas gdab pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ /rdo rje khro bor mnyam
189b5(rgyud): gzhag nas/ /badzra hUM zhes bzlas pa'i phyag /gang dang gang la kun zhugs pa/ /phyag rgyas btab par de 'gyur ro/ /sgra chen du ni brjod bya ba/ /Tik+ka hUM phaT khros nas su/ /lan gcig
189b6(rgyud): gang la smras pa ni/ /rdo rje 'bar bas de mngon bkug /rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin cing / /rdo rje lta bas bltas pa yi/ /sems can gang dang gang yin pa/ /de nas de ni dran nyams
189b7(rgyud): 'gyur/ /yid la bsad ces bsams nas su/ /snying gar rdo rje sgom par byed/ /hUM zhes bya ba nyid kyis kun/ /rang gi rgyas ni btab par dgongs/ /sems can gang dang gang dag
190a1(rgyud): @#/ /la| |yid kyi rgyas ni 'debs pa gang / /phyag rgya 'dis ni shin tu yang / /las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /de nas de dag gi snying po 'di dag go
190a2(rgyud): Tak+ki hUM phaT/ Tak+ki a| Tak+ki dza/ Tak+ki haM/ phyag rgya re res kyang las bzhi rnams la phyag rgya'i snying po bzhis sbyar ro/ /de nas gsang ba khro bo'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i bslab bo//
190a3(rgyud): yan lag kun gyis 'khyud nas ni/ /hUM zhes gang la sbyar bya ba/ /dbang po gnyis ni sprad byas na/ /de yi srog ni ma rungs 'gyur/ /hUM zhes bya bar ldan pa yis/ /mchu sprad
190a4(rgyud): sos ni mchu bzung nas/ /dbang po gnyis ni rab sprad pa/ /gang yin de ni mngon sum 'gyur/ /hUM zhes sbyor ba gang yin pa/ /de ni bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ /dbang po gnyis ni
190a5(rgyud): sprad gyur na/ /gang yin de ni sdug bsngal 'thob/ /hUM zhes bya ba rab sbyor zhing / /dbang po gnyis ni sprad nas kyang / /yan lag kun gyis btsir gyur na/ /de yi lus ni srungs
190a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ /de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag go/ /hUM a/ hUM dza/ hUM ho/ hUM haM/ hUM te/ de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig gi de kho
190a7(rgyud): na nyid phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ /gang gis sems can la phan phyir/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran byas na/ /de ni sangs rgyas thob par
190b1(rgyud): 'gyur/ /dbang phyug dang ni u ma yang / /sa la bris te de ltar mnan/ /ji ltar bris pa'i go rims bzhin/ /ut+pal ltar sngo 'tsher ba'i mdog/ sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /
190b2(rgyud): 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / /de ni 'jig rten gsum rgyal ba/ /rdo rje hUM dang 'dra ba yi/ /dngos grub rdzu 'phrul myur du 'grub/ /ji ltar ri mo bri bzhin/ /'bar bas bskor ba'i
190b3(rgyud): dbus bzhugs pa/ /sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yis/ /sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /de nas de rnams las bshad de/ /rdo rje las ni bla na med/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran
190b4(rgyud): sgrub pas/ /myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob bo/ /'jig rten dag las rgyal bcings na/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal 'gyur/ /rdo rje che dang kun tu 'gro/ /rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba
190b5(rgyud): 'dra| |rdo rje dbang gi rgyal por 'gyur/ /chos bzang ldan pas 'jig rten dbang / /las kyi rdo rje khro bo che/ /rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur/ /sems dpa' khro bo rab tu brtan/ /khro
190b6(rgyud): bo'i lcags kyu yang dag 'gugs/ /khro bo chags pas chags par byed/ /khro bo legs pas dga' ba ste/ /khro gnyer gyis kun ma rungs byed/ /khro bo nyi mas gzi brjid mchog /dpal
190b7(rgyud): gyi khro bo don rnams sdud/ /ha ha rgod pas bdud du byed/ /chos kyi khro bos chos rnams sdud/ /rdo rje ral gris gcod par byed/ /rgyu yi khro bo sdug bsngal 'phrog /khro bo smra ba'i
191a1(rgyud): @#/ /tshig 'phrog go/ las kyi khro bo las rab ste/ /srung ba yis ni srung bar byed/ /khro bo gnod sbyin dgra yang za/ /khro bo'i khu tshur dngos grub ster/ /de nas
191a2(rgyud): rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /rdo rje gnyis su gyur pa ste/ /dam tshig mchog tu grags pa yin/ /de dag bcing ba bshad par bya/ /khro bo bcing ba bla na med/ /
191a3(rgyud): lag par rdo rjer byas nas su/ /mthe'u chung lcags kyur bcing bar bya/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyis bsdigs pa ni/ /'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya/ /de bzhin mdzub mo
191a4(rgyud): ngos sbyar te/ /nor bu 'dra bar rab tu dgug /gung mo mnyam bsgreng pad+mar bya/ /gung mo mdzub mo gnyis kas bsdigs/ /mdzub mo gnyis ka rdo rjer bya/ /g.yas pa lcags
191a5(rgyud): kyus dgug par bya/ /de nyid hUM zhes bya bas mdud/ /legs pa sbyin par de yin te/ /mdzub gnyis dpral ba'i gnyer mar bzhag/ snying gar mdzub mos nyi mar bskor/ /
191a6(rgyud): lag pa brkyang ste spyi bor bzhag/ mdzub mo kha nas dgod ltar bya/ /mdzub mo sen mo sbyar ba ste/ /g.yas pas ral gri bcings pa'o/ /gung mdzub mnyam sgreng 'khor lo
191a7(rgyud): yi| |kha yi nang nas dbyung ba dang / /mdzub mo gung mo rdo rjer sbyar/ /mdzub mo yis ni mgul bar bskor/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni mche ba che/ /mdzub mo bkug pas rdo rjer
191b1(rgyud): bcings/ /rdo rje lA s+ye la sogs pa/ /sems ma'i phyag rgya de nyid hUM/ /zhes bya chos kyi phyag rgya ste/ /hUM zhes bya bar lhan cig go/ de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad/
191b2(rgyud): do| |hUM ni sangs rgyas rdo rje yi/ /traM ni rdo rje snying po yi/ /hrI ni rdo rje sde yi'o/ /a ni rdo rje thams cad kyi/ hUM he/ traM/ taM hi hi de ha/ d+hi ka d+hi hUM/ grwa/ kraM baM/ tri a/ rdo rje khro bo mang po yi/ /chos
191b3(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya rab 'grub pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do/ /rdo rje rigs ni chen po yi/ /las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus na/ /rdo rje 'gying la sogs tshul
191b4(rgyud): gyis/ /khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis su bshad/ /gang dang gang gi phyag rgya rnams/ /las kyi phyogs ni gang du bya/ /de dang der ni bsgyur nas kyang / /phyag rgya de ni sbyar bar bya/ /phyag rgya thams
191b5(rgyud): cad kyi cho ga'o/ /de nas 'dir 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po thun mong ba'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal phyag rgya ni/ /rdo rje
191b6(rgyud): mdzub mo dam tshig gi/ rdo rje hUM zhes sngags kyi ste/ /dngos grub thams cad yud kyis 'thob/ /mthe'u chung gnyis ga lcags kyur bcing / /rdo rje gnyis ga steng 'og tu/ /rdo rje lcags
191b7(rgyud): kyu'i phyag rgya ni/ /skad cig gis ni thams cad 'gugs/ /rig pa dam pa thams cad kyi/ /'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bshad/ /thams cad kyang ni gnod pa ste/ /de bzhin
192a1(rgyud): @#/ /las rnams thams cad byed/ /rdo rje mdzub sor gnyis legs par/ /rab mnyam gzhag pas mnyam nas ni/ /shi ba thams cad slong ba ste/ /rdo rje slong
192a2(rgyud): ba zhes bya'o/ /rdo rje mdzub gnyis legs par ni/ /rdo rje bcing pas bcings nas su/ /bsgyur te gtsug tu bzhag pa ni/ /tshe dang nad med 'phel ba'o/ /rdo rje bcing ba dam byas
192a3(rgyud): te| |mthe bo mnyam nas nang du gzhug/ mdzub mo dam por bkug nas su/ /gcus pas zhabs su 'dug pa'o/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal bcings nas su/ /gang gi gzugs
192a4(rgyud): la rkang g.yon pas/ /legs par mnan pa'i sems can de/ /zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/ /gcig la gcig gis brdabs pas ni/ /
192a5(rgyud): sems can gang gi lus la ni/ /babs nas de yang rdob par byed/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/ /bdag gam pha rol go char bya/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyis bcings byas
192a6(rgyud): na| |nges pa nyid du srung bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje mthil du bcings nas su/ /yid kyis khros nas dgab bya ba/ /mthe bo rdo rje dam pa ste/ /rdo rje rin chen 'grub par 'gyur/ /
192a7(rgyud): sems dpa' rdo rje dam byas te/ /mthe bong gnyis kas gung mo mnan/ /mthe'u chung rdo rje rtse mo ni/ /rnon por dam tshig 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/ /mdzub
192b1(rgyud): mo gnyis bkug bcings nas su/ /gcu zhing phyir gcu byas pa ni/ /lha 'gugs pa yi dam pa yin/ /rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te/ /mdzub mo gnyis bkug rab tu mnan/ /mthe bong gnyis
192b2(rgyud): ka sbyar ba yis/ /dbus su bcing ba bar snang gi'o/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis ka las/ /mthe'u chung gnyis ka bcings nas kyang / /rgyab sbyor mdzub mo gnyis sprel to/ /bsgyur ba mkha'
192b3(rgyud): la spyod pa'o/ /rdo rje bcings pa bsdams nas su/ /rdo rje srung bas bcing bar bya/ /'di ni sa yi dam tshig ste/ /thams cad byed pas 'da' bar dka'/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings
192b4(rgyud): te| |g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la/ /mthe'u chung mdud cing drag tu gtogs/ /'di ni sa 'og 'gug pa'o/ /rdo rje bcings pas sbrel ba ni/ /mdzub mo gnyis ka dam por ste/ /gung
192b5(rgyud): mo mthe bo rdo rjer ni/ /gdug pa'i phyag rgya 'joms pa'o/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/ /mnyam gzhag ste ni snying gar bzhag/ khro bo khu tshur gtsir ba ni/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor
192b6(rgyud): 'jig pa'o/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la/ /g.yas pa'i mdzub mo bkug pas bzung / /rab tu khros nas drag gtogs na/ /ri rab kyang ni lhung bar byed/ /g.yon pa'i mdzub
192b7(rgyud): mo rdo rje la/ /g.yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus gzung / /rab tu khro zhing bkug pa yis/ /gdon rnams kun la dbang du byed/ /rdo rje bcing ba byas nas su/ /lag ngar snying
193a1(rgyud): @#/ /gar shin tu bsdams/ /rdo rje mdzub mo nyid mchan khung / /brud pa yis ni snying 'byin to/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo yis/ /mthe bong gnyis ka'i drung du
193a2(rgyud): ni| |yid kyis khros nas btsir bya ba/ /rims la sogs 'gugs dam pa'o/ /rdo rje thal mo dam sbyar te/ /mdzub mo gnyis ka bkug nas su/ /mthe bo rab tu mnyam sbyar bas/ /
193a3(rgyud): mnan pa de ni sdig 'phrog pa'o/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis nang du/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni sbas nas kyang / /legs par gyen du 'phangs pa ni/ /lhung ba slong ba'i dam pa'o/ /rdo rje bcing
193a4(rgyud): pa dam byas te/ /gung mo gnyis ka ngos sbyar nas/ /mtha' ma bzhi yi ngos sprad pa/ /skad cig tu ni sdig 'dral to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor
193a5(rgyud): chen po sgrub pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bzung nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor dang po srad bus bre/ /srad bus bres la phyi nas ni/ /srad bu ji bzhin bre bar bshad/
193a6(rgyud): rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis ka yi/ /mdzub mo'i rtse mo rab sbyar ba/ /byas nas mtshon rnams thams cad la/ /'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya/ /rdo rje mdzub mo legs par
193a7(rgyud): ni| |sbyar la bkan te bsdams nas su/ /rab tu khros nas dbye ba ni/ /sgo dbye ba yi mchog yin no/ /de nas rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa bshad do/ /
193b1(rgyud): brkyang bskum gyis ni tshul byas te/ /khro bo yi ni skad 'byin cing / /khro zhing khro bo'i lta bas ni/ /las rnams thams cad bsgrub bar byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje
193b2(rgyud): dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ 'jig rten na gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //bam po lnga pa/ de nas
193b3(rgyud): y ang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi
193b4(rgyud): rigs pa'i dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba badzra Ni/ badzra mA te A na ya sarba badzra sa t+ye na hUM dzaHde nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs
193b5(rgyud): ka nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid phyag na rdo rje dra ba bdag gis lus kun nas 'bar bas bskor nas/ rdo rje khro bo gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams su gyur nas byung ste/
193b6(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don bsgrubs nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' btsun mo gsang ba'i phyir sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
193b7(rgyud): r do rje'i phyag rgya'i gzugs su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis zla ba'i dkyil
194a1(rgyud): @#/ /'khor la 'dug nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ gsang ba'i ye shes bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs
194a2(rgyud): pa bde ba'i phyir/ /btsun mo nyid du gyur pa yin/ /hrIHde nas yang phyag na rdo rje rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba 'di gsungs
194a3(rgyud): so| |de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ /khro bo'i gsang ba zhes bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/
194a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yi gnas rnams su/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya bshad par bya/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas sku gzugs
194a5(rgyud): bzhag par bya/ /sangs rgyas khro bo'i dam tshig kyang / /ji bzhin par ni mkhas pas bri/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang / /phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor der/ /dbus su
194a6(rgyud): mdung rtse zhing bris la/ /rdo rje rab tu gnas bya zhing / /'od 'bar dbus su bri ba ni/ /de yi go rims ji bzhin te/ /rdo rje rdo rje'i lcags kyu dang / /mda' dang dga' ba de bzhin
194a7(rgyud): no| |rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa gnyis pa yang / /'khor lo'i dbus na gnas pa yi/ /rdo rje rin chen bri bar bya/ /khro gnyer dbus su rdo rje bri/ /
194b1(rgyud): de bzhin rdo rje nyi rgyal mtshan/ /de bzhin so yi phreng ba de'i/ /ngos su rdo rje bri bar bya/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum pa yang / /pad+ma'i dbus su gnas pa
194b2(rgyud): yi| |rdo rje pad+ma lha rdzas kyi/ /'bar ba'i dbus su pad+ma bri/ /ral gri 'khor lo de bzhin no/ /rdo rje lce yang tshul bzhin du/ /rtag tu de yi phyogs su gzhag/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas
194b3(rgyud): ni| |dkyil 'khor bzhi pa dam par yang / /rdo rje bsnyal la rdo rje bri/ /rdo rje 'od ni chen pos bskor/ /de yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /'bar ba kun gyis dkrigs pa'i 'od/ /rdo rje thams
194b4(rgyud): cad go cha'i mchog/ rdo rje mche ba khu tshur mchog/ grwa dang phyi yi gnas rnams su/ /tshul bzhin du ni bri bar bya/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya'i rig pa mdor bsdus na/
194b5(rgyud): dz+hiH/ oM badzra kro d+he sa ma ye dz+hiH/ oM badzra kro d+he ro Sha aM ku sha A na ya sar+b+ba na dz+hiH/ oM badzra ro She kA ma badzri Ni ba shaM m+me A na ya hi dz+hiH/ oM badzra duSh+Ta kro d+he to Sha ya sarba na dz+hiH/ rdo rje dz+hiH/ zhes
194b6(rgyud): bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /dziH/ oM badzra b+h+ri ku TI kro d+he ha ra sarba ar+tha na dziH/ oM badzra dz+wA la mA lA pra be sha ma ha kro d+ha ag+ni dz+wA la ya sarba na ra bi ro She dziH/ oM badzra d+hA dza a gre ke yU ra
194b7(rgyud): mahA kro d+he de hi me sarba ar+tha na dziH/ oM badzra aT+Ta hA sa ni hA sa hA sa aT+Ta T+Te hA se nA mA ra ya dziH/ rdo rje dziHzhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /diH/ oM badzra shud+ha kro d+he ha na ha na mA ra ya duSh+Ta
195a1(rgyud): @#/ /na diH/ oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na kro d+he ts+tshin+da/ ko d+he She na/ sarba ni diH/ oM badzra he tu mahA kro d+he pra be sha tsa kra/ pra be sha ya sarba na diH/ oM badzra dzi hA mahA kro d+he ba she ba tsa muny+tsa
195a2(rgyud): diH/ rdo rje diHzhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /hIH/ oM badzra sarba na mu khA+e karma badzra Ni mahA kro d+he ku ru ku ru sar+b+ba na hIH/ oM badzra ka ba tsa kro d+he rak+Sha ma ma hIH/ oM badzra tsaN+Da kro d+he mahA
195a3(rgyud): yak+Shi ni badzra daMSh+Ta a kA ra la b+hi Sha ne ba ya hIH/ oM badzra kro d+he muSh+Ti ban+d+ha hIH/ rdo rje hIH/ zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi grwa rnams su rdo rje gar la sogs pa'i
195a4(rgyud): gsang ba'i mchod pa'i rig pa'i snying po rnams gsungs pa/ oM badzra hUM khe/ badzra hUM g+huM/ badzra hUM te/ badzra hUM twAM/ phyi rol gyi grwa rnams su dkyil 'khor mchod pa'i snying po rnams
195a5(rgyud): brjod par bya'o/ /oM badzra tri te/ badzra Da Da/ badzra d+hA tu/ badzra Dau mu d+ha/ de nas sgo bzhi'i mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po rnams gsungs pa/ badzra dzaHdzaH/ badzra hUM hUM/
195a6(rgyud): badzra baM baM/ badzra aHaH/ de nas 'dir rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di bshad do/ /de nas de la thog ma nyid du re zhig 'jig
195a7(rgyud): rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa'i cho ga bzhin du bcug ste/ rdo rje gsang ba'i rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang 'dra ba'i
195b1(rgyud): phyag rgya dang / lan gyi phyag rgya dang / nye ba'i phyag rgya dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang ba mchod pa'i phyir gar gyis mchod par bya'o/ /de la gar dang / lan gyi
195b2(rgyud): gar dang / nye ba'i gar dang / ye shes kyi gar rnams kyis mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi gar rnams ni 'di yin no/ /de la dang po nyid du rdo rje dbyings su bsdus pa'i snying pos
195b3(rgyud): rdo rje glu len cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pas mchod pa byas nas/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems ma rdo rje'i phyag rgya drug tu gtogs par bya'o/ /de nas ji snyed
195b4(rgyud): zhugs pa rnams phyag rgya rnams kyis yang dag par dbab par bya'o/ /rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mo gnyis/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgyar ni/ /snying gar shin tu
195b5(rgyud): bcing par bya/ /de nas gar gyi cho ga yi/ /rdo rje khro bo lcags kyu yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang ngo / /rdo rje mda' ni 'phang bar bya/ /rdo rje mda' ni 'phangs nas kyang / /rdo rje
195b6(rgyud): dga' bas bsgrub par bya/ /phyag rgya cho ga bzhin bkrol te/ /thal mo brdab cing bcing bar bya/ /mchod pa'i cho ga 'di yis ni/ /phyag na rdo rje mnyes par bya/ /mnyes nas dgos
195b7(rgyud): pa thams cad ni/ /'dod bzhin skad cig nyid kyis 'grub/ /de la gar gyi phyag rgya'i snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /sid+h+ya badzra/ A nA ya badzra/ rA gA ya badzra/ sa d+hU badzra/ de'i 'og
196a1(rgyud): @#/ /tu 'dra ba'i gar gyis mchod pa bya ste/ de bzhin gar gyi g.yon pa ni/ /khu tshur g.yas pas bzung nas ni/ /bsgyur zhing mdzub mo'i ngos kyis ni/ /dpral
196a2(rgyud): ba nyid la bzhag par bya/ /de bzhin gar byed nyi ma yang / /bskor nas yang dag dgug par bya/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan bslang nas ni/ /rdo rje ha ha zhes dgod cing / /mchod pa 'di
196a3(rgyud): yi cho ga yis/ /rgyal po la sogs mi kun kyang / /dbang dang rab kyi gzi brjid dang / /sbyin dang dgod pas mnyes par byed/ /de la 'di rnams ni 'dra ba'i phyag rgya'i snying po
196a4(rgyud): ni 'di rnams yin no/ /a hi badzra/ dz+wA la ya badzra/ de hi badzra/ hA sa hA sa badzra/ de bzhin gar kyang bkrol nas ni/ /pad+ma kha 'bus sbyar ba yi/ /mdzub mo'i rtse mo snying gar
196a5(rgyud): bzhag / bsam pa g.yos pas 'dud par bya/ /de bzhin gar byed rdo rje yi/ /ral gris bgegs ni gcod ltar bya/ /mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba yis/ /'khor lo'i
196a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor tshul du bskor/ /rdo rje'i tshig tu glu len ltar/ /phyag na rdo rje mchod par bya/ /mchod pa 'di yi cho ga yis/ /thams cad mnyes pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de la
196a7(rgyud): 'di rnams ni nye ba'i/ /phyag rgya'i snying po rnams yin no/ /kA ma ya badzra/ ts+tshin+da ya badzra/ brah+mI ya badzra/ bru hi badzra/ rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub yang dag/ bkan nas rtse mo sbyar nas
196b1(rgyud): kyang / /bsgyur te de nas gtsug tor tu/ /mdzub mo'i rtse mo gzhug par bya/ /rdo rje las kyi tshul gyis ni/ /lus kun mchog gi dkyil 'khor du/ /gar gyi cho gas brtan par bya/ /snying
196b2(rgyud): gar rab tu gzhag par bya/ /de bzhin gar gyi cho ga bzhin/ /rdo rje srung ba bcing bar bya/ /rdo rje mche ba bcings nas ni/ /rdo rje bcing bas mnan par bya/ /mchod pa 'di yi cho ga
196b3(rgyud): yis/ /las rnams kun kyang nus par 'gyur/ /mchod pa rnam bzhi byas nas ni/ /cho ga bzhin du phyag rgya dkrol/ /de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /nri t+ya badzra/ rak+Sha badzra/ khA
196b4(rgyud): da badzra/ ban+d+ha badzra/ de nas khro bo gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i lag gnyis kyis/ /khros pa'i yid kyis drag gtogs bya/ /skye bo gang gi ming
196b5(rgyud): smos pa/ /de yi snying ni 'gas par 'gyur/ /ma mchu so yis bzung nas su/ /gang gi ming smos gzer pa ni/ /de yi mgo yang myur 'gas te/ /gang gi bka' las 'das pa'i 'o/ /
196b6(rgyud): khro bo chen po 'di lta ba'i/ /mig kyang 'dzums par byed pa ni/ /gang gi ming ni smos bltas pa/ /de yi mig ni rdol bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje khro bor mnyam gzhag la/ /bdag rang gi
196b7(rgyud): ni snying gar yang / /rdo rje bcing ba bcing na ni/ /de yi sems ni 'jig par byed/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /hUM badzra/ s+pho Ta thaH/ hUM badzrA mu ka badzra thaH/ hUM badzra
197a1(rgyud): @#/ /ni trA thaH/ hUM badzra ma na thaH/ de nas rdo rje chen po'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /de la dang por re zhig phyag rgya chen po 'di
197a2(rgyud): bcing bar bshad do/ /mthe'u chung lcags kyu bcings nas ni/ /rdo rje khro bor gzhag par bya/ /g.yon par rtse gsum rgyab tu ni/ /'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bshad/ /
197a3(rgyud): g.yon ba mdzub mo thad kar brkyang / /de bzhin bkan pa pad+ma ni/ /de bzhin du yang bsgyur nas sra/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rjer gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje mthil du bcings byas te/ /khros
197a4(rgyud): pa yid kyis dgab pa ni/ /mthe bo rdo rje dam pas so/ /khro bo ti rin ti rir bshad/ /mdzub mo lcags kyus dgug pa nyid/ /mdzub mo ngos ni sbyar ba'o/ /de bzhin mdzub
197a5(rgyud): gnyis legs sbyar ba/ /mdzub mo sprad de dpral bar bzhag /snying gar nyi ma rab tu brtan/ /mdzub mo bsnyams nas spyi bor gzhag /bsgyur nas dgod par gzhag
197a6(rgyud): par bya/ /mdzub bsnyams pad+ma kha 'bus bzhin/ /gnyis ka ral gri chad par 'dzin/ /mdzub mo 'khor lor bcings pa'o/ /mdzub mo bsnyams te kha nas dbyung / /mdzub
197a7(rgyud): mo legs par brkyang ba dang / /mdzub mos mgul du bcing bar bya/ /de gnyis kha 'gram mche bar gzhag/ khu tshur dam du bcings pa ni/ /phyag rgya chen po yin
197b1(rgyud): par bshad/ /de nas rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /gsang ba'i khu tshur las byung ba/ /dam tshig mchog tu rab tu grags/ /de rnams bcing ba
197b2(rgyud): bshad par bya/ /rdo rje bcing ba bla na med/ /snying gar bzhag nas rtsib logs gcu/ /mda' drang ba ni g.yon pa nas/ /snying ga nas ni dbyung bar bya/ /khro gnyer du ni bsgyur nas ni/ /nyi
197b3(rgyud): ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa dang / /spyi bor lag pa brkyang ba dang / /bsgyur nas dgod par bzhag par bya/ /kha yi dbus su rab bzhag pa/ /mdzub mo ral gris 'debs par bya/ /
197b4(rgyud): 'khor lo bskor bar ston pa dang / /kha nas rab tu 'byin pa ste/ /spyi bo lus mchog dkyil 'khor ro/ /dpung pa snying ga rtsi ba logs rnams/ /rdo rje bsrung ba de bzhin bya/ /mche
197b5(rgyud): ba'i gnas su gzhag pa dang / /khu tshur dam du bsngams pa 'o/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor phyag rgya ni/ /mtshan ma'i go rims bzhin du bcing / /dam tshig rdo rje bcings pa las/ /de
197b6(rgyud): bzhin rdo rje khu tshur gzhag / de nas rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do/ /phaTaHshaTaHmaTaHsaTaHraTaHhaTaHd+hiTaHtaTaHpaD+TaHtaD+TaHkaT+TaHd+haD+TaH
197b7(rgyud): kuTiHriTaHkhaTaHbaTaH/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i las kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /mdor na las kyi phyag rgya ni/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis byas te/ /gnas
198a1(rgyud): @#/ /gang yin par gzhag par bya/ /khro bo'i lta bu khro dang ldan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ khro
198a2(rgyud): bo gsang pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so/ / //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje
198a3(rgyud): rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta
198a4(rgyud): sUk+Sh+ma badzra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra kro d+ha
198a5(rgyud): kra ma hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM
198a6(rgyud): sUk+Sh+ma badzra rat+na kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa
198a7(rgyud): 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra sUk+Sh+ma badzra pad+ma kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal
198b1(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra karma kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs bskyed
198b2(rgyud): pa'i phyir rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du 'khod de/ de rnams kyi rang gi snying po gsungs so/ /oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra satwa su dz+nyA na kro d+hA kra ma hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra aM ku sha A
198b3(rgyud): kaR+Sha ya mahA kro d+hA ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra sU k+Sh+ma rA ga kro d+hA a nu rA ga ya ti bi kra ma hUM phaT/ oM badzra sUk+Sh+ma badzra puSh+TiM kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM sU k+Sh+ma badzra b+h+ra ku TI kro d+ha ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/ oM sU k+Sh+ma badzra
198b4(rgyud): dz+wA la maN+Da la kro d+ha sUR+ya dz+wA la hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra tsakra kro d+hA sarba ar+tha mA me pra yats+tsha shrI kra ma hUM phaT/ oM badzra sUk+Sh+ma hA sa kro d+hA mahA T+Ta T+Ta hA sa ha ha ha ha hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra d+harma badzra kro
198b5(rgyud): d+hA ya hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra ts+tshe da kro d+hA ts+tshin+da b+hin+da hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra kro d+hA mahA tsakra ts+tshin+da pa tA ya shrI pra be sha ya hri da yaM b+hin+da hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra hUM kA ra ha na tA ya bAka ma tren+na hUM phaT
198b6(rgyud): oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra karma kro d+hA sarba karma kA ro d+b+ha ba sarba kA ra ya sA d+ha ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra sUk+Sh+ma ka pa tsa kro d+hA rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra yak+Sha kro d+ha ha na b+ha ya sarba duSh+Ti ny+tsi t+ta mA tre badzra daSh+Ta
198b7(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra muSh+Ti kro d+hA ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje r-igs kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gsungs pa/ de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /
199a1(rgyud): @#/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ /khro bo'i ye shes zhes kyang bshad/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor
199a2(rgyud): thams cad srad bus bre/ /de yi dbus su sangs rgyas bri/ /ye shes rdo rje'i dbus na'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun tu/ /phyag rgya de nyid kun bris shig/ rdo rje shugs kyis
199a3(rgyud): brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi po rnams su yang / /'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal sogs/ /rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya/ /de rnams kyi ni phyogs kun tu/ /rdo rje khro
199a4(rgyud): bo'i cho ga bzhin/ /de nas 'dir rdo rje rigs kyi ye shes phra mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rim pa rgyas par bshad do/ /de la dang po nyid du re zhig bcug nas bsgo ba ni/ /de ring
199a5(rgyud): khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro bo bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes dbang bskur gyis de la legs par nan tan gyis shig/ sems can gyi
199a6(rgyud): khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir nyid du bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phan pa dang / bde ba dang / grub pa dam pa thob pa'i
199a7(rgyud): 'bras bu'i bar gyi phyir rdo rje khro bos sems can thams cad kyang yang dag par sbyang ba'i phyir bdud byed na ma rungs pa thams cad lta zhig smos kyang ci dgos/ de skad bsgo
199b1(rgyud): nas gdong g.yogs bkrol te de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad bstan nas rdo rje ji lta ba bzhin du lag pa gnyis byin no/ /de nas rdo rje khro bo'i ye shes phra mo rnams slobs
199b2(rgyud): shig / rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'byor gyis/ /rdo rje phra mo'i bstan byas la/ /hUM zhes bya ba gang sbyar ba/ /de yi srog ni 'jig par 'gyur/ /rdo rje phra mo bstan byas te/ /cho ga bzhin du mched pa ni/ /
199b3(rgyud): ji srid bar du mched pa des/ /de srid kyi ni dgra 'di 'jig /rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'byor gyis/ /rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar byas/ /khro bor ldan pa ji srid mched/ /de snyed sems can ma rungs
199b4(rgyud): byed/ /de ltar de bzhin gsol ba yang / /rnal 'byor can gyis 'dod na ni/ /ma lus pa ni thams cad kyang / /de dag phyir zhing 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag
199b5(rgyud): yin no/ /hUM hUM nA sha ya badzra hUM bi nA sha ya sarba sUk+Sh+ma badzra pra t+ya nA sha ya shI g+h+raM hUM/ sems can gang gis dgra la ni/ /lhan cig gyur pa cher bstan pas/ /byams pa mched pa'i
199b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyis/ /rdo rje 'phro bas 'jig par 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'phro ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /snying rje can gyi su gang la/ /snying rje rnal 'byor de yis ni/ /gdug pa thams cad nges
199b7(rgyud): 'jig go / chos sam yang na chos min pa/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba/ /de ltar bsgoms na sems can la/ /hUM zhes bya bas 'jig par byed/ /gdul bar dka' ba'i
200a1(rgyud): @#/ /sems can gang / /sangs rgyas byang chub snod min pa/ /de rnams yang dag sbyang ba'i phyir/ /hUM zhes bya bas 'jig par byed/ /de la de rnams kyi snying po ni
200a2(rgyud): 'di dag yin no/ /b+hai ra badzre kro d+hA hUM phaT/ ga ru Na badzra kro d+hA hUM phaT/ hUM bi shud+d+ha badzra kro d+hA hUM phaT/ oM bi sho d+ha na badzra kro d+hA hUM phaT/ rdo rje'i dbyibs ni bris nas kyang / /yid kyis
200a3(rgyud): kyang ni gang su yi/ /khyim gyi dbus su lhung bsams nas/ /de yi rigs de 'jig par 'gyur/ /de bzhin rdo rje phra tshul gyis/ /snying gar rdo rje bsgoms nas kyang / /byang chub
200a4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po'i gzugs/ /lhung na rigs ni 'jig par 'gyur/ /phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs chen po/ /bsgoms nas gang du lhung ba de'i/ /snang srid nyes pa sna tshogs
200a5(rgyud): kyis/ /btsun mor bcas pa 'jig par 'gyur/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgoms nas ni/ /snang ba gang la lhung ba ni/ /de yi snang srid nges
200a6(rgyud): par 'jig / de la de dag gi snying po rnams ni 'di dag yin no/ /hUM badzra pra ba ta/ hUM bo d+hi satwa pra ba ta/ hUM badzra d+ha ra pra ba ta/ hUM bu d+d+ha pra ba ta/ rdo rje rtse mor rab sbyor bas/ /zla ba'i
200a7(rgyud): gzugs la bdag rang nyid/ /bsgoms nas su ni bdag rang kyang / /gang du lhung ba der ltung 'gyur/ /zla ba rdo rje bdag rang gis/ /bsgoms nas su ni bdag rang yang / /rab tu
200b1(rgyud): tu khros nas gar lhung ba/ /de yi rigs ni mod la ltung / /bdag rang phyag na rdo rjer ni/ /bsgoms nas su ni bdag rang yang / /gang du ltung ba de yi yul/ /ring por mi thogs 'jig par
200b2(rgyud): 'gyur/ /bdag rang sangs rgyas gzugs nyid du/ /bsgoms nas su ni bdag nyid kyang / /gang du ltung ba de yi ni/ /snang srid ring po ma thogs 'jig /de la de dag gi snying po rnams ni
200b3(rgyud): 'di dag yin no/ /po d+hA gri pra ba ta ya hUM/ satwa badzra pra ba ta ya hUM/ badzra satwa pra ba ta ya hUM/ bud+d+ha pra ba ta ya hUM/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /
200b4(rgyud): rdo rje khro bor snyoms zhugs la/ /rang gi lus kyis yongs bskor ba/ /rdo rje hUM byas 'khyud nas ni/ /gang gi ming smos te 'chi'o/ /rdo rje phra mor snyoms par zhugs/ sna nas phra mo thang cig
200b5(rgyud): tu/ /dbugs btang hUM zhes bya tshul gyis/ /'jig rten gsum yang lhung bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la/ /khros nas rdo rje lta ba yi/ /bltas pa yis ni ldongs par 'gyur/ /
200b6(rgyud): yang na 'chi ba ru ni 'gyur/ /bu ga nas ni zhugs nas su/ /yid kyis gang yang rud ba yi/ /snying nas drangs pa de yis ni/ /rang ngam 'di yi dbang du 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po
200b7(rgyud): rnams gsungs pa/ hUM badzra ba li ta kro d+hA mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra shwa sa bi shra ba tA ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra dr-i Sh+Ti bi sha bi sha bi nA sha ya hUM phaT/ hUM hri da yak+Sha na krod+hA pra bi shaka yaM hr-i
201a1(rgyud): @#/ /da ya ts+tshin+da b+hin+da ka ta ka ta hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab po/ /de la re zhig phyag rgya chen po bcing nga bshad do/ /
201a2(rgyud): rdo rje ye shes sbyor ba yis/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /rdo rje khro bor bdag rang nyid/ /bsgoms na de ma thag tu 'grub/ /de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi
201a3(rgyud): phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab po/ /ting 'dzin ye shes dam tshig las/ /hUM zhes bya dang ldan gyur pa/ /ci rigs gnas su bzhag na ni/ /grub pa thams cad ster ba'i mchog /
201a4(rgyud): de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /phaT/ shaT/ maT/ saT/ raT/ taT/ haT/ braT/ traT/ daT/ b+haT/ kr-iT/
201a5(rgyud): riT/ khaT/ baT/ zhes bya ba ni chos kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus bshad pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /chos kyi khu
201a6(rgyud): tshur gnyis byas te/ /ji ltar rigs pa'i gnas su sbyar/ /las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus na/ /cho ga bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
201a7(rgyud): rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa rdzogs so/ / //
201b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi
201b2(rgyud): rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta tha ga ta karme shwa ra hUM/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /
201b3(rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma d+hA tu s+pha ra Na mahA pU dzA karma bi d+hi bis+t+wa ra sa ma ye trai lokya bi dza ya ki ra sarba duSh+TaM sa ma ya badzri Ni hUM/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
201b4(rgyud): rdo rje snying pos rang gi rigs pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya sha du sa ma ya s+pha ra Na mahA pU dzA karma bi d+hi bsti ra sa ma ye hUM/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
201b5(rgyud): dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma d+hA tu s+pha ra Na mahA pU dzA karma bi d+hi bistA ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas yang byang chub sems
201b6(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta tha ga ta sarba a ba lo ka d+hA tu ma bi mahA pU dzA karma bi d+hi bista ra sa ma ye hUM phaT/
201b7(rgyud): de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa'i lha mo rnams rang gi snying gnas bskyed de 'jig rten gyi khams thams
202a1(rgyud): @#/ /cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / mnyes par bya ba dang / las thams cad grub pa'i dgos pa byed pa nyid
202a2(rgyud): du yang dag pa'i sbyor ba la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul bar byas te/ slar yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rdo rje
202a3(rgyud): dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ rdo rje las kyi dam tshig gi cho ga
202a4(rgyud): rgyas pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ /las kyi rdo rje zhes bshad
202a5(rgyud): do| |dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre/ /dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gnas su ni/ /sangs rgyas sku gzugs gzhag par bya/ /sangs rgyas
202a6(rgyud): kun gyi phyogs kun tu/ /dam tshig mchog rnams gzhag par bya'o/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi po rnams su yang / /rdo rje gtso sogs bzhi po
202a7(rgyud): rnams/ /ji ltar rim bzhin bzhag par bya/ /de rnams kyi ni phyogs kun tu/ /mchod pa chen po rnams bzhag go/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /rdo rje las kyi phyag
202b1(rgyud): rgya bshad/ /oM badzra satwa sid d+hi dz+nyA na karma sa ma ye hUM dza/ oM badzra A ka R+ShaN karma dz+nyA na' sa ma ye hUM dza/ oM badzra ra ti rA ga karma dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM dza/ oM badzra sa d+hu karma dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM dza/
202b2(rgyud): oM badzra b+h+r-i ku TI ba shiM ku ru hUM/ oM badzra sU R+ya maN+Da le ba shiM ku ru hUM/ oM badzra d+h+wa dzA gra kai yU re re ba shiM ku ru hUM/ oM badzra da ta hA sa ba shiM ku ru hUM/ oM badzra pad+ma rA ga rA ga ya hUM/ oM badzra
202b3(rgyud): tIk+Sh+Na rA ge rA ga ya hUM/ oM badzra maN+Da le rA ge rA ga ya hUM/ oM badzra bA gA rA ge rA ga ya hUM/ oM badzra karma sa ma ya tsa ya hUM/ oM badzra ka pa tsa baM d+ha rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM/ oM badzra yak+Shi Ni mA ra ya badzra
202b4(rgyud): daMSh+Ta ya b+hin+da bin+da ya mu ga s+ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra karma muSh+Ti sid+d+hi hUM phaT/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te/ rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi ye
202b5(rgyud): shes rnams bskyed do/ /de la dang po nyid du zhi ba la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /yam shing mngar po rnams kyi me/ /rab sbar rdo rje khro bo yi/ mnyam par
202b6(rgyud): gzhag pas snyoms zhugs la/ /til bsregs pas ni sdig bsregs shing / /yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /byin za rab tu sbar nas kyang / /rtag tu 'bras ni sbyin bsregs
202b7(rgyud): na| |gdon mi za bar khyim rgyas 'gyur/ /yam shing mngar bo rnams kyis kyang / /mkhas pas rab tu me sbar te/ /dUr ba'i yal ga mar bcas pa/ /bsreg pa byas na tshe 'phel
203a1(rgyud): @#/ /lo| |ya ma shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /byin za rab tu spar byas la/ /ku sha'i yal ga 'bru mar gyis/ /bsreg par byas na nges par bsrung / /de la de dag
203a2(rgyud): gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM sarba pA baM da ha na badzra ya swAhA/ /oM badzra puSh+Ta ye swAhA/ /oM badzra A yu She swAhA/ /oM badzra A bra ti ha ta badzra ya swAhA/ /yam shing tsha bas
203a3(rgyud): dang por ni/ /rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis/ me spar nas kyang se ba yi/ /tsher ma can gyis 'gugs par 'gyur/ /yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /khro dang ldan pas me sbar na//
203a4(rgyud): me tog dmar ram 'bras bu'ang rung / /sbyin sreg byas na skye bo rengs/ /rnal 'byor can gyis khros nas kyang / /yam shing des ni me sbar te/ /lcags kyi phye ma bsregs na ni//
203a5(rgyud): rdo rje bcings pa nyid du 'gyur/ /yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /mnyam par gzhag ste ma bus la/ /'bras bu kha ba khros bzhin bsreg /skad cig tu ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /
203a6(rgyud): re te ba ru pa miM d+hi d+hu l+ya ga ni sa ma hri sa/ dzu he ta ri ga ta ya laM ku to me ti pU ta pa ta ye ta/ de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /hUM badzra A kaR+Sha ya swAhA/ /hUM badzra
203a7(rgyud): rA gA ya swAhA/ /hUM badzra ban+d+ha ya swAhA/ /hUM badzra mA ra Na ya swAhA/ /mkhas pas yam shing skyur mo yis/ /khros nas byin za sbar nas ni/ /'bras bu lo ma skyur bsregs
203b1(rgyud): na| |dbang du bya ba dam pa 'o/ /yam shing de dag nyid kyis kyang / /mnyam par gzhag ste me sbar la/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu khros bsregs na/ /'dod pa bzhin gyi gzugs rnyed do/ /de
203b2(rgyud): 'dra ba yi yam shing gis/ /byin za rab tu sbar nas kyang / /mi snang me tog sdong bu yis/ /bsregs na 'dod bzhin mi snang 'gyur/ /yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /mnyam par
203b3(rgyud): gzhag pa me spar la/ /nam mkha'i lcug ma'i me tog gis/ /sbyin sreg byas na mkha' la 'gro/ de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /oM badzra ba shaM kA ra ya swAhA/ /oM badzra
203b4(rgyud): karma rU pa badzrA ya swAhA/ /oM ad+ya sh+ya badzra ya swAhA/ /oM badzra kha ba tsa ri Ni swAhA/ /khro bor mnyam gzhag yam shing ni/ /shin tu kha bas me sbar la/ /badzri me tog bsregs byas na//
203b5(rgyud): rdo rje bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /khro dang ldan la me sbar la/ /lha yi phreng ba gang bsregs pa/ /de yang bka' bzhin nyan par 'gyur/ /khro bo
203b6(rgyud): nyid du mnyam bzhag pa/ /yam shing nges ni me sbar te/ /phyag na rdo rje'i phreng ba bsreg/ de yang bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /rab tu khros te me
203b7(rgyud): sbar la/ /chos gos bsregs pas sangs rgyas kyang / /skad cig tu ni bka' bzhin mdzad/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /hUM badzra ba shaM ka rA ya swAhA/ /hUM so ri ba
204a1(rgyud): @#/ /shaM ka rA badzra ya swAhA/ hUM badzra pA Ni ba shaM ka rA ya swAhA/ /hUM bud+d+ha ba shaM ka rA ya swAhA/ /de nas gsang ba'i las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /yid
204a2(rgyud): 'od bud med dang lhan cig / gnas shing bu gar any+dza na/ /bcug nas bskul ba byas nas kyang / /de yis mig bskus dbang du 'gyur/ /ldong ros bu gar bcug nas ni/ /rdo rje
204a3(rgyud): bsdams pas de g.yogs te/ /mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi yis ni/ /dngos grub rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro/ /go ro tsa na bu gar bcug /rdo rje khu tshur gyis btsir na/ /gzhag pa de ni
204a4(rgyud): 'bar 'gyur na/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /gur gum bu gar bcug nas ni/ /bu gar sems dpa' rdo rje yis/ /bkab nas 'bar bar gyur nas ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra
204a5(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /oM gu h+ya ra ti badzra ba shaM ka raM sid+d+h+ya hUM/ oM badzra gu h+ya sid+d+h+ya hUM/ oM gu h+ya badzra sid+d+h+ya hUM/ oM badzra d+ha ra gu h+ya sid+d+h+ya hUM/ de nas
204a6(rgyud): rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /rdo rje dgongs pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdu na/ /rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje khro bor mnyam
204a7(rgyud): par bzhag / hUM zhes mdzub mo'i tshul gyis ni/ /dam tshig mchog ni 'dir de bzhin/ /oM zhes dang po yi gas as/ /chos kyi phyag rgya 'dir de bzhin/ /las yi phyag rgya mdor
204b1(rgyud): bsdu na/ /las kyi phyag rgya gnyis byas nas/ /thams cad grub byed dag pa ste/ /rdo rje las kyi tshul gyis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen
204b2(rgyud): po las/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam
204b3(rgyud): tshig gi phyag rgya'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang
204b4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /hUM badzra ma tha/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rin po
204b5(rgyud): che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /hUM b+h+r-i ku TI badzra ra ta/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /hUM
204b6(rgyud): mahA pad+ma badzra dr-i D+ha/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra karma a gra kri te/ de nas yang byang
204b7(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba//
205a1(rgyud): @#/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ /rdo rje khro bo zhes bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams
205a2(rgyud): cad srad bus bre/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun tu/ /'jig rten gsum las rgyal la sogs bri/ 'jig rten gsum las rgyal la sogs/ /sangs rgyas phyogs kun tu bri'o/ /de
205a3(rgyud): n as dkyil 'khor 'dir dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas te bcug nas phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i
205a4(rgyud): ye shes la bslab po/ /rang gis phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor/ /bris nas chos nyid dag brjod la/ /bud med lhan cig gnas nas ni/ /grub pa yang ni thob par 'gyur//
205a5(rgyud): rang gis phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor/ /bris nas chos nyid dag brjod la/ /chags pas bud med la bltas na/ /grub pa yang ni thob par 'gyur/ /rang gis phyag rgya
205a6(rgyud): bzhi'i dkyil 'khor/ /bris nas chos nyid dag brjod la/ /bud med mdzes la spras pas 'grub/ /rang gis phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor/ /bris nas chos nyid dag brjod
205a7(rgyud): la| |lhan cig 'khyud na grub kun 'thob/ /de la chos nyid dag pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di dag yin no/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta bi shud+d+ha d+harma te ho/ /oM badzra bi shud+d+ha dr-iSh+Ti dza/ oM sarba
205b1(rgyud): bi shud+d+ha mu tri hUM/ oM sarba bi shud+d+ha kA ya baM ma na karma badzri hUM/ de nas phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba spas pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab po/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni zhugs
205b2(rgyud): nas kyang / /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis ni/ /bud med mchog ni mgu byas nas/ /shin tu grub pa thob par 'gyur/ /de nas de'i snying po brjod do/ /ho badzra kA ma/ /de nas ji lta ba bzhin
205b3(rgyud): du rdo rje mnan pa'i rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya la sogs pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po rnams cho ga dang bcas par rgyas par bslab par bya ste/ phyag rgya bzhi pa'i tshul 'dis rdo rje sil
205b4(rgyud): snyan dang / /rnga dang / brdung ba dang / /brdabs nas rdo rje sems dpa' yang bsdus pa'i snying po'i glu blangs te/ de phul nas phyag rgya dang / 'dra ba'i phyag rgya dang / nye ba'i phyag rgya dang /
205b5(rgyud): ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / gar gyi mchod pas mchod par bya'o/ /de la gar gyi mchod pas mchod pa ni 'di yin no/ /rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mo gnyis//
205b6(rgyud): rdo rje hUM gi phyag rgya ni/ /snying ga nyid du bcing bar bya/ /de bzhin gar byas g.yon pa ni/ /g.yas pa'i chang bas gzung bar bya/ /bsgyur nas dpral pa nyid du ni/ /mdzub mo'i ngos
205b7(rgyud): kyis gzhag par bya/ /de bzhin gar yang bkrol nas ni/ /mnyam par pad+ma kha 'das sbyar/ /mdzub mo snying gar bzhag nas ni/ /bsam pa g.yos pas 'dud par bya'o/ /rdo rje
206a1(rgyud): @#/ /khro bos mdzub bsnyams te/ /bkan nas rtse mo sprad bya zhing / /de las bsgyur cing gtsug tor du/ /mdzub mo'i rtse mo sbyar ba'o/ /de nas yang byang chub
206a2(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi khro bo'i dam tshig 'di gsungs pa/ hUM/ de nas de'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa/ de nas rab tu bshad
206a3(rgyud): bya ba/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ /rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba ste/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya//
206a4(rgyud): de yi dbus su legs bri ba/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje hUM gi phyag rgya che/ /lag na 'dzin pa rdo rjer bcas/ /brkyang bskum tshul du gnas pa dang / /kha dog gzugs
206a5(rgyud): ni ji bzhin bya/ /de nas 'dir gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad byas te/ /rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba gsung ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /
206a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'dir ni zhugs nas kyang / /'jig rten gsum rgyal mdzub mo yis/ /bu gar bcu ga nas bsgrubs na ni/ /las kun rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas bsgrub
206a7(rgyud): pa'i snying po 'di bshad do/ /hUM badzra sa ma ya kr-ita/ de nas rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /dkyil 'khor zhugs nas legs par ni/ /
206b1(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po mchog gnas pa/ /gnas nas rdo rje hUM zhes bya/ /las rnams kun ni byed par 'gyur/ /de la 'di bsgrub pa'i snying po gsungs pa/ /hUM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ de nas phyag rgya
206b2(rgyud): bzhi bcing ba ji lta ba bzhin du bslabs te/ de bzhin du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor du ji lta ba bzhin du ras la sogs pa la bri ba dang / lugs ma la sogs pa'i gzugs
206b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi dngos grub ni thun mong ngo / /phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
206b4(rgyud): ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag gi rigs 'di la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ ci nas kyang sems can thams cad ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du bgyis
206b5(rgyud): kyang dngos grub thams cad thob bar 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/ 'jig rten gsum
206b6(rgyud): las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po la byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod kyang legs/ /rdo
206b7(rgyud): rje chos kyang khyod legs so/ /rdo rje las khyod rab tu legs/ /mdo sde 'di ni legs bshad pa/ /rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs kun gsang ba ste/ /theg pa chen po mngon
207a1(rgyud): @#/ /'dus pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ rdo rje chen po'i rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs
207a2(rgyud): s o|| ||de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te mkhyen bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
207a3(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' nyon la dbang phyug chen po'i lus 'di khyod kyi rkang pa'i 'og nas
207a4(rgyud): btang bar byos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ma rungs pa thams
207a5(rgyud): cad 'dul ba'i khro bor dbang bskur nas de bdag gis bskum lags na/ ji ltar de bdag gis btang bar bgyi/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'jig
207a6(rgyud): rten gsum po mtha' dag gis bdag po dbang phyug chen po'i lus kyi srog gso ba'i phyir shi ba'i rnam par shes pa dgug pa'i snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs las phyung ngo / /
207a7(rgyud): oM badzra satwa hUM dza/ de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /gsang ba'i lcags kyu bsdam bya ste/ /tha ma mnyam du brkyang nas kyang / /shi ba'i mgo bor bzhag na ni/ /
207b1(rgyud): srog ni phyir yang thob par 'gyur/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thal ba'i dbang po'i dbyangs te/ thal bas khebs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
207b2(rgyud): de nas slar phyin te dbang phyug gi lus der zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med/ /gang phyir shi
207b3(rgyud): ba'i lus 'di yang / /'tsho ba'i khams su gyur ba yin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rkang pa 'degs pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs
207b4(rgyud): so| |oM badzra muH/ de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /rdo rje khro bo mdzub legs par/ /zur sprad bsdams te bzhag pa ni/ /rdo rje de dag bsgyur byas shing / /'og nas de dag
207b5(rgyud): 'byin par byed/ /de nas de dag gsungs ma thag tu rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po zhabs kyi 'og nas lha chen po thar pa rang gis shes par gyur to/ /de nas dbang phyug chen po'i lus de/ de
207b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa des sos par byin gyis brlabs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can thams cad kyi don dang / ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir nyid kyi rgyal
207b7(rgyud): tshab tu bcug go/ de nas phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi mthil de nas zla ba'i zhabs zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgya byung ngo / /oM
208a1(rgyud): @#/ /tsan+d+ro trA re sa man+ta b+ha dra ki ra Ni mahA badzri Ni hUM/ de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te/ /mthe bo mthe'u chung mnyam par ni//
208a2(rgyud): mnyam nas legs par brkyang na ni/ /rdo rje'i ri mo zhes kyang grags/ /de nas de byung ma thag tu zhabs kyi mthil de las zla ba'i bla ma de bzhin gshegs pa de byung nas dbang
208a3(rgyud): phyug chen po de'i mgo bo la phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyis mnan pa'i rjes su zla ba phyed pa gnas par gyur te g.yon logs na 'dug go / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
208a4(rgyud): kyis phyag na rdo rje'i grogs su lag tu rdo rje'i mdud rtse byin nas rdo rje'i rig pa dam pa/ rdo rje'i rig pa dam pa zhes rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro/ /de nas rdo
208a5(rgyud): r je'i rig pa dam pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje mdung rtse des mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar bskor zhing gar gyi mchod pas mchod pa byas nas ched du
208a6(rgyud): brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /zhabs mchog gis ni gar reg pa/ /sangs rgyas nyid du grub pa thob/ /
208a7(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
208b1(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag gi sug par rdo rje stsal te/ phyag na rdo rje nyid du dbang bskur bas lha la sogs te phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs de rnams 'jig rten gsum
208b2(rgyud): las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di la gnas pa'i rim pa bgyis nas/ gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las sems can de rnams phyir mi
208b3(rgyud): ldog par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
208b4(rgyud): kyi gtsug tor 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra satwa uSh+NI Sha hUM phaT/ de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnams las bcom ldan 'das phyag
208b5(rgyud): n a rdo rje'i kha dog du ma'i 'od zer du gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bar byas nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i gtsug gi mtshams su de bzhin gshegs
208b6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi tshul du 'phungs nas 'khod do/ /de nas gzi brjid kyi phung po de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor 'di phyung ngo / /oM sarba ta
208b7(rgyud): thA ga toSh+NI Sha a na a ba lo ki te mUr+d+ha ni te dzo rA shi/ oM hUM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ da ra da ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ de nas byang chub sems
209a1(rgyud): @#/ /dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM ni suM b+ha badzra hUM phaT/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de nyid kyi thugs
209a2(rgyud): las snying po 'di phyung ngo / /oM Tak+ki dzaH/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra rat+na ut+ta ma
209a3(rgyud): dz+wA la ya hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHbadzra pad+ma sho d+ha ya sarbaM bi d+yo ta ta ma hUM phaT/ de

215a7(rgyud): badzra bi ShA Ni hUM/ rdo rje khro bo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so/ /de nas rdo rje glang snas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya smras pa/ /oM badzra me de hUM/ rdo rje phreng bas smras pa/ oM
215b1(rgyud): badzra mA le hUM/ rdo rje dbang gis smras pa/ oM badzra a b+hi She hUM/ rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rjes smras pa/ oM badzra a pa rA dzi ta hUM/ rdo rje tshogs kyis bdag po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams
215b2(rgyud): so| |de nas rdo rje gtun rings kyis rang gi dam tshig phyag rgya rnams smras pa/ oM badzra mu sa la gra he hUM/ de nas rdo rje rlung gi smras pa/ oM badzra bA te hUM/ rdo rje mes smras pa/ oM badzra dz+wa
215b3(rgyud): le hUM/ rdo rje 'jigs pas smras pa/ oM badzra gra he hUM/ rdo rje pho nya'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so/ /de nas rdo rje lcags kyus smras pa/ oM badzra daMSh+Te hUM/ rdo rje dus kyis smras pa/ oM
215b4(rgyud): badzra ba she hUM/ rdo rje dan khrid kyis smras pa/ oM badzra big+h+na na hUM/ rdo rje klus smras pa/ oM badzra ha ri Ni hUM/ rdo rje bran gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so/ /de nas yang phyag ni rdo rjes rdo
215b5(rgyud): rje'i rigs thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /grwa bzhi pa la byang phyogs sgo/ /phyi rol dkyil

215b7(rgyud): rgyal la sogs pa/ /bzhi po de yi phyogs kun bzhag /dkyil 'khor de bzhin gtso bo yang / /rdo rje'i phyag rgya bri bar bya/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rigs kyi phyag
216a1(rgyud): @#/ /rgya bri bar bya/ /rdo rje glang sna la sogs pa/ /bzhi po rnams ni sgo srung ngo / /'jigs ma dpal dang sgra dbang dang / /dur ga g.yon pa'i grwa rnams nas/ phyi
216a2(rgyud): yi grwa rnams phyag rgya ni/ /de rnams nyid ni bri bar bya/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor rnams su ni/ /lha mo rnams ni bri bar bya/ /de nas cho ga rgyas pa'i rnams/ /ji bzhin par ni bshad par
216a3(rgyud): b ya| |de nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'dir ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byas te rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dam tshig gi las byas nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya'i cho ga bzhin

221a7(rgyud): be sha ya pra be sha ya nr-i te ba ya sar+b+ba kar+m+ma sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha hUM/ AHhUM a la la la badzri/ de nas yang bdag la babs nas bdag nyid kyis 'jug ste/ phyag rgya dang 'dra
221b1(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyi gar gyi mchod pas mchod par bya'o/ /de phyin chang lus dang / ngag dang / lta ba dang / yid dang / rdo rje'i phyag rgya rnams kyi las thams cad 'dod pa bzhin byed
221b2(rgyud): pa'o| |de nas gdong g.yogs pa bkrol te/ gar gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes slobs shig/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs kyi/ /dam tshig mchog ni gnyis byas te/ /rdo rje
221b3(rgyud): rig pa dam pa la/ /rdo rje la s+ye la sogs mchod/ /rig pa 'di rnams thams cad kyang / ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin du/ /gar gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor
221b4(rgyud): mchod par bya/ /rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis ni/ /phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdus so/ /dam tshig mchog ni gnyis byas nas/ /las kyi phyag rgya dgrol bar bya/ /gar gyi mchod pa 'di yis
221b5(rgyud): ni| |gtso bo thams cad mchod na ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa che sogs kyi/ /las grub par yang nges par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po
221b6(rgyud): las/ rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs de dag thams
221b7(rgyud): cad sems can thams cad kyi don du bskos nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu bzhag ste/ mkhyen bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das

222a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'di gsungs so/ /sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin ni/ /ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba/ /de lta de ltar sems can don/ /'dod chags la sogs
222a4(rgyud): gtsang bas bya/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rdo rje gsang ba 'di gsungs so/ /sems can thams cad phan phyir dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa'i phyir/ /sems can
222a5(rgyud): thams cad bsad kyang ni/ /sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos rang gi nor bu gsang ba'i 'di gsungs so/ /sems can thams cad phan
222a6(rgyud): phyir dang / /sangs rgyas don du sbyor ba yis/ /pha rol nor rnams phrogs kyang ni/ /sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi pad+ma'i
222a7(rgyud): gsang ba 'di gsungs so/ /'dod chags 'dra ba'i bde ba med/ /rgyal ba la ni de phul la/ /gzhan gyi chung ma sems can phyir/ /bsten pas bsod nams thob par 'gyur/ /

222b2(rgyud): thams cad byas pa yis/ /bsod nams shin tu mang po rnyed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rdo rje
222b3(rgyud): 'chang ba la legs so zhes bstod pa/ legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste/ /rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/ /mdo 'di

222b7(rgyud): gsol ba btab pa/ /pad+mo'i sems dpa' pad+mo che/ /'jig rten dbang phyug dbang phyug che/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang bstan pa'i mchog/ rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

223b6(rgyud): nyid kun gyi yon tan 'di/ /khyod ni mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad rnams/ /bstod nas goms par byed pa na/ /'jig rten dbang po thob par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo khyod la gsol gdab
223b7(rgyud): pa/ /rang gi rigs rnams bskyed nas kyang / /chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa ni/ /thub pa chen pos bshad par gsol/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan

224a2(rgyud): gshegs pa gal ba der mngon du phyogs te/ 'dug nas rdo rje pad+mo de rang gi thugs kar bzhag ste/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o rab tu dag pa ni/ /bdag gi
224a3(rgyud): rdo rje pad+mo 'di/ /pha yin 'di ni bdag gi bu/ /rigs 'di byin gyis brlab par mdzod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos

224b1(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra pad+mo t+ta ma hrIH/ de nas byang chub sems

224b5(rgyud): dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gzugs thams cad ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i dam tshig

225a3(rgyud): sems can gyi khams gdul bar byas te/ yang slar log nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i

226b6(rgyud): khA da d+hik+d+hi k+d+hi k+d+hi ke/ oM pad+ma muSh+Ti sa ma ya s+t+waM ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /grwa rnams kun tu bri ba ni/ /rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs tshul/ /pad+ma sgeg mo la sogs
226b7(rgyud): lha| |de dag gi ni phyag rgya 'di rnams so/ /oM pad+ma lA s+ye rA ga ya mahA de bi rA ga mahA pU dzA sa ma ya hUM/ oM pad+ma mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ a b+hi She ka pU dzA sa ma ye hUM/ oM pad+ma gI
227a1(rgyud): @#/ /te gI te pU dzA sa ma ya hUM/ oM pad+ma nai wa d+ye sarba pU dza pra brta na sa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor gra rnams su/ /pad+ma'i mchod

227a3(rgyud): ga Ni pad+ma ra ti hUM/ oM pad+ma pUSh+pe pU dzA sa ma ye pad+ma bA si ni mahA shri ye pad+ma ku la pra ti ha ra sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ya hUM/ oM pad+ma dI pa pU dzA sa ma ye pad+ma ku la sun+da ri mahA du t+ya A lo ka
