227b6(rgyud): snying ga na/ /pad+ma sems dpa' nyid bzhugs te/ /ji ste tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /de nas yang 'di skad du bsgo bar bya ste/ gsang ba'i
227b7(rgyud): cho ga rgyas pa 'di su la yang ma smra zhig / khyod kyis mi bde ba ma spangs pas dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re/ de nas snying po 'dis dam tshig
228a1(rgyud): @#/ /gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o/ /oM badzra pad+ma sa ma ya staM/ de nas gos dkar po bgos la dar dkar pos gdong g.yogs nas gzhug par bya
228a2(rgyud): ste| snying po ni 'di yin no/ /oM pad+ma sa ma ya hUM/ de nas las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas pad+ma'i dbyibs lag tu sbyin no/ /oM pad+ma hasta badzra d+harma ha na pa la ya he
228a3(rgyud): ne| des kyang 'di skad du pad+ma'i chos nyid ji lta bu lags zhes dri bar bya'o/ /de la yang 'di skad du brjod par bya'o/ /ji ltar pad+ma dkar po 'di/ /'dod pa'i nyes pas
228a4(rgyud): mi chags bzhin/ /thams cad dag par bsgoms na ni/ /de bzhin sdig pas chags mi 'gyur/ /de la chos nyid ni 'di yin no/ /de nas pad+ma'i rigs kyis phyag rgya'i
228a5(rgyud): ye shes la bslab par bya ste/ snying la pad+ma bris nas kyang / /pad+ma bsgoms na snying ga yi/ /pad+ma dpal yang dbang 'gyur na/ /bud med phal la smos ci dgos/ /dpral
228a6(rgyud): par sangs rgyas dbyibs bris te/ /rtag tu bsgom pa byas na ni/ /bsgom pa des ni myur du yang / /dbang bskur ba yang thob par 'gyur/ /kha yi nang du lce steng du/ /sangs
228a7(rgyud): rgyas dbyibs ni rab bsgoms na/ /sgra dbang lha mo bdag nyid kyi/ /rtag tu kha na gnas par 'gyur/ /gtsug tor dbus su pad+ma ni/ /snyoms par zhugs te bzhag
228b1(rgyud): nas kyang / /gtsug tor pad+ma bsgoms nas ni/ /mkha' la 'gro ba'ang de dbang 'gyur/ /de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM pad+ma shre yaM b+ha Sha ya ho/ /oM pad+ma a b+hi She
228b2(rgyud): ka pra yats+tsha baM/ oM pad+ma sa ra s+thi bi sho d+ha ya hUM/ oM pad+ma u d+ha graM ba shi ku ru dzaH/ rtsig pa'am yang na mkha' la'ang rung / /pad+ma dam pa bsgoms na ni/ /'di ni sems can
228b3(rgyud): thams cad kyang / /dbang du byed pa dam pa'o/ /mkha' 'am yang na phyogs gzhan du/ /pad+ma dam pa bsgoms nas kyang / /gang tshe mthong ba de tshe blangs/ /ci dga' bar ni mi
228b4(rgyud): snang 'gyur/ /rtsig pa'am yang na nam mkha' la/ pad+ma rgya gram bris nas ni/ /gang tshe mthong nas blangs pa yi/ /de tshe sna tshogs gzugs de 'gyur/ /mkha' 'am yang na phyogs
228b5(rgyud): gzhan du/ /rdo rje pad+ma bsgoms nas kyang / /de blangs skad cig nyid kyis ni/ /pad+ma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM badzra dza gad ba shi
228b6(rgyud): dz+nyA na pad+ma a be sha ya/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma tiSh+Tha a sha na ba ku ru baM/ oM sa mA d+hi bi shwa pad+ma tiSh+Tha rU paM ne d+ha ra sha ya b+ha ga bAM baM/ oM sa mA d+hi badzra pad+ma Sh+Tha a d+hi tiSh+Tha shI g+h+raM hri/ dkyil
228b7(rgyud): 'khor la sogs thams cad du/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang bris nas ni/ /de yi mdun du rta mgrin gyi/ /phyag rgya mchog gis 'dren par bya/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs
229a1(rgyud): @#/ /thams cad du/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang bri bar bya/ /nges pa'i zhags pa phyag rgya yis/ /'gro ba thams cad des dbang byed/ /dkyil 'khor la
229a2(rgyud): sogs thams cad du/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang bri bar bya/ /de yi mdun du pad+ma yi/ /lcags sgrog mchog gi phyag rgya bcings/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad
229a3(rgyud): du| |spyan ras gzigs dbang bri de yi/ /mdun du pad+ma dril bu yis/ /thams cad 'bebs pa'i dam pa'o/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM pad+ma
229a4(rgyud): A kaR+Sha ya sarba mahA satwaM hUM dzaH/ oM a mo g+ha pA sha kro d+ha hUM ho hi/ oM pad+ma s+pho Ta baM/ oM pad+ma g+haN+Da a be sha ya sarba AHbdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid nyid/ /pad+ma zhal bzhi
229a5(rgyud): sems dpar yang / /bsgoms te de nas grub nas ni/ /skad cig gis ni gzugs ma 'gyur/ /de ltar bdag nyid bdag nyid kyis/ /rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gnas/ /pad+ma
229a6(rgyud): pad+ma bsgoms na ni/ /zad mi shes pa'i go 'phang 'tho ba/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang gtsug tor dbus/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas gzugs su ni/ /bdag nyid kyis ni
229a7(rgyud): bsgoms gyur na/ /tshe dpag med pa'ang mnyam par 'gyur/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyis ting 'dzin gnas/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyi ting 'dzin du/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms
229b1(rgyud): na ni/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang mnyam par 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po rnams ni 'di yin no/ /pad+mo bi shwa/ d+harma kA ya pad+ma/ bud+d+ha a b+hi She ka a ba lo ke shwa ra/ de nas dkyil
229b2(rgyud): 'khor chen po thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /de la re zhig dang por ni phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes yin te/ ji ltar ri mo'i tshul du ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus
229b3(rgyud): gnas shing / /pad+ma la gnas sems dpar ni/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid bsgom/ /de nas de dag gi las ni 'di dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas phyag rgya che bcings na/ /tshe dpag med dang
229b4(rgyud): mnyam par 'gyur/ /rdo rje pad+ma bcings na ni/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang mnyam par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas dbang gis bcings na ni/ /bde bar gshegs pas de dbang bskur/ /pad+ma pad+ma'i ting
229b5(rgyud): 'dzin 'thob/ /sna tshogs kyis ni sna tshogs mchog /sna tshogs gzugs kyis 'dul ba dang / /sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur 'gyur/ /pad+ma sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /pad+ma khro bo
229b6(rgyud): dbang phyug dpal/ /rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gis/ /pad+ma 'dod pa'i dngos grub mchog /sangs rgyas dbang gis sangs rgyas nyid/ /rdo rje pad+ma grub mchog sbyin/ /'dod pa'i pad+ma rab 'dod
229b7(rgyud): ldan/ /dga' ba yis ni legs pa sbyin/ /khro gnyer gyis ni khro zhir 'gyur/ /pad+ma'i nyi ma gzi brjid mchog/ pad+ma zla bas mdzes pa che/ /bzhad pas rab bzhad grub pa 'thob/ /
230a1(rgyud): @#/ /grol bas dngos grub mchog 'thob bo/ /pad+ma ral gris longs spyod 'thob/ /mgrin sngon gyis ni 'gugs pa che/ /gos dkar gyis ni dngos grub 'thog/ /
230a2(rgyud): pad+ma gar dbang gis 'grub ste/ /mi 'jigs rtag tu 'jigs pa med/ /rab gtum gyis ni ma rungs 'dul/ /pad+ma'i khu tshur rab tu sgrub/ /sgeg mo dga' zhing phreng ba'i nor/ /glur
230a3(rgyud): blangs gar bde bdug pas tshim/ /me tog mdzes shing mar me lta/ /dris ni mchog gis drir yang 'gyur/ /rta mgrin gyis ni yang dag 'gugs/ /gdon mi za bar dbang du byed/
230a4(rgyud): pad+ma lcags sgrog bcing ba che/ /dril bus kun nas 'bebs byed do/ /de nas pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes 'di yin te/ /rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni/ /
230a5(rgyud): mthe bo mthe'u chung mnyam par bsgreng / /phyag rgya 'di ni chos dam tshig/ sangs rgyas chos ni rab thob byed/ /rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni/ /mdzub mo gung mo srin lag
230a6(rgyud): mnyam/ /sangs rgyas rigs mchog phyag rgya de/ /sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par byed/ /rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni/ /gung mo rdo rje rab mnyam pa/ /'di ni rdo rje rigs dam
230a7(rgyud): pa'i/ /phyag rgya yin te rdo rje 'grub/ /de las gung mo rin chen 'dra/ /rdo rje rin chen rab 'grub byed/ /gung mo pad+ma'i tshul du byas/ /pad+ma'i dngos grub thob par byed/ /rdo
230b1(rgyud): rje thal mo bsdams nas ni/ /rdo rje'i las ni byed par 'gyur/ /chos kyi rdo rje bcings na ni/ /skad cig gis ni dam tshig 'grub/ /rdo rje bsdams las mdzub mnyam pas/ /sangs rgyas
230b2(rgyud): dngos grub thob par byed/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /sems dpa'i phyag rgya khyad par du/ /rdo rje thal mo bsdams nas kyang / /gung mo mnyam par bsdams nas ni/ /mthe bo mthe'u chung
230b3(rgyud): phye ba ni/ sna tshogs pad+mar bshad pa yin/ /de las mthe bo gnyis bsnol te/ /mdzub gnyis rtse mo sbrad la dgug /dbus kyi rdo rje spyi gtsug phud/ /gtsug phud sangs rgyas yin
230b4(rgyud): par bshad/ /rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la/ /mthe bo mnyam nas btud nas ni/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni rtse sprad dgug/ bkan nas ting nge 'dzin du bcug/ thal mo pad+mo mnyam sbyar
230b5(rgyud): la| |mdzub mo rdo rjer mnyam nas ni/ /mthe bo ngos la sbyar ba 'di/ /nges pa'i dbang phyug phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdam pa bsngams nas ni/ /legs par bkan te bcings nas kyang //
230b6(rgyud): mthe bong gnyis ni pad+mar bsgreng / /sangs rgyas pad+ma yin par bshad/ /mthe bo gnyis ni rdo rjer mnyam/ /mdzub mo lcags kyu ral grir bya/ /mthe'u chung gnyis ni so sor dbye//
230b7(rgyud): gung mo srin yag pad+mar bya/ /pad+ma mnyam par rab sbyar la/ /mthe bos mthe'u chung gzung dgug pas/ /g.yon pa'i mdzub mo gzung ba ni/ /pad+ma'i mdas ni 'gugs par byed//
231a1(rgyud): @#/ /thal mo mnyam par sbyar nas ni/ /bkan legs phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /legs so zhes bya sbyin par byed/ /pad+mo'i legs pa yin par grags//
231a2(rgyud): thal mo mnyam par rab sbyar la/ /mdzub mo rtse mo mnyam ste dgug /mthe'u chud phye nas mdzod spur bzhag /pad+ma khro gnyer zhes bya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la/ /sor mo
231a3(rgyud): thams cad dkyil 'khor du/ /snying gar rab tu brkyang ba ni/ /pad+mo'i nyi ma yin par bshad/ /thal mo rab tu dam sbyar la/ /mdzub gnyis rin chen 'dra bar bya/ /dpung pa'i spyi bor
231a4(rgyud): rab brgyan pa/ /pad+ma rin chen rgyal mtshan rtse'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa spyi bor bzhag /kha dang bcas par rab brkyang nas/ /nyid kyi kha nas rgod pa dang / /kha ni bcu gcig nyid du 'gyur//
231a5(rgyud): ting 'dzin pad+mar bcings nas ni/ /mthe bo gnyis ni so sor 'byed/ /pad+ma sgrol ba'i phyag rgya las/ /mdzub gnyis pad+ma'i tshul du dgug /pad+ma sgrol ba'i phyag rgya de/ /dngos grub thams
231a6(rgyud): cad grub par byed/ /ral gri'i tshul du byas pa ni/ /pad+ma'i ral gri'i phyag rgya yin/ /mthe'u chung pad+ma chen por bya/ /mthe bo gnyis ni dbyug ltar bsgreng / /mdzub mo rtse mo dud chen bya/ /
231a7(rgyud): gung mo srin lag 'khor lor bya/ /rdo rje thal mor dam byas la/ /g.yas pa oM du nang du gzhug /g.yon pa'i mdzub mtheb bzlas par bya/ /sor kun chu skyes kha phye 'dra/ /rdo rje thal mo
231b1(rgyud): mnyam sbyar la/ /g.yon dang g.yas nas de bzhin du/ /'gying bcas gar byed bskor nas ni/ /spyi bor bzhag pa pad+ma can/ /rdo rje thal mo dam byas la/ /rtse mo thams cad kha phye ba/ /bskor
231b2(rgyud): te pad+ma'i snying gar ni/ /bzhag nas brtan par byed pa po/ /rdo rje thal mo dam byas la/ /gsang ba'i gnod sbyin tshul du ni/ /thal mo brkyang ste bskums nas ni/ /kha bzhag pad+ma'i gnod
231b3(rgyud): sbyin mi| |rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas kyang / /gung mo gnyis ni phyir bkug ste/ /rang gi mthe bo'i rgyab mnan pa/ /pad+ma'i khu tshur zhes kyang bshad/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje thal
231b4(rgyud): mo las byung ba/ /mchod pa'i lha mo thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig mchog rnams bcing ba'o/ /rdo rje bsdam pa dam byas la/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni mnyam sbyar nas/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni phyir
231b5(rgyud): bkug la/ /rta mgrin gyi ni yin par bshad/ /pad+ma'i thal mo mnyam sbyar la/ /mdzub gnyis mdud par 'dud pa ni/ /nges par zhags pa'i phyag rgya yin/ /mtheb mdzub lcags
231b6(rgyud): sgro 'dra bar bya/ /rdo rje dbab pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /pad+ma'i thal mo mnyam sbyar la/ /srin lag mthe'u chung gnyis bar du/ /mthe bo gnyis bcug dam du bcing / /de nas pad+ma rigs kyi chos
231b7(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ hrIHgr-i kri hi/ shri sh-i d+hi hi/ gr-i ti kr-i bi khi mi Sh+Ti a/ pad+ma'i khu tshur gnyis byas la/ /las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
232a1(rgyud): @#/ /thams cad chos kyi dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
232a2(rgyud): nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs
232a3(rgyud): so| |oM badzra sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM ma Ni rat+na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems
232a4(rgyud): dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM pad+ma sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs
232a5(rgyud): so| |oM karma sa ma ye hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil
232a6(rgyud): 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la/ /pad+ma'i gsang ba zhes bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i
232b1(rgyud): tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre/ /de dbus pad+ma'i steng du ni/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mo bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /dam tshig mchog rnams lhag ma
232b2(rgyud): bzhin| |rang gi rig pa rnams ldan par/ /chos kyi rdo rje la sogs bri/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harme shwa ri hUM/ oM d+harma sa ma ye badzra pad+ma ni hUM/
232b3(rgyud): oM bud+d+ha a b+hi She ka ra rat+na sa ma ye hUM/ oM tA rA sa ma ye hUM/ oM bi shwa mu khe hUM/ sna tshogs gzugs mchog dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /de yi dbus su pad+ma
232b4(rgyud): yis| |bskor ba'i pad+ma'i bri bar bya/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya gnyis gnas pa/ /pad+ma'i mtshan ma bri bar bya/ /bde gshegs nyid kyi nyid phyag rgya/ /de la de dag
232b5(rgyud): gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin no/ /hrIHoM pad+ma ta thA ga to/ oM pad+ma sa man+ta b+ha dre/ pad+ma badzra aM ku sha ko Sha d+hA ri NI hUM/ oM pad+ma ra ti/ oM pad+ma du Sh+Ti/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor gnyis par yang / /
232b6(rgyud): rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /gtsug phud chu skyes cha gnas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas dbang bskur bri bar bya/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ltag 'og rim pa ji bzhin du/ /pad+ma'i mtshan
232b7(rgyud): mar ldan pa yi/ /dam tshig mchog rnams bzhag par bya/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /shrIHoM b+h+ri ku TI be tA Di pad+me hUM/ oM pad+me dz+wA le/ oM sau me ni pad+me ni hUM/ oM pad+ma mahA si
233a1(rgyud): @#/ /ni e ka da sha bAka tri di ri di ri i aT+Te/ baT+Te tsa le pra tsa le ku su ma d+ha re i le pra be sha sid+d+hi me pra yats+tsha hUM/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor gsum par yang / /rdo
233a2(rgyud): rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang / /de yi dbus su pad+ma mdzes/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya bzhag par bya/ /de bzhin phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin par/ /pad+ma'i mtshan
233a3(rgyud): mar ldan pa yi/ /pad+ma la ni gnas par bri/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /d+hIHdz+hi/ oM tA re tut+tA re hUM/ oM d+hIHhUM/ oM pad+ma tsakra shaM kha d+hA ra Ni/ nI la kaN+Tha sid d+h+ya sid
233a4(rgyud): d+h+ya hUM| oM pAN+Da ra bA se na pad+ma saM b+ha be ba d+ha ba d+ha hUM/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor bzhin par ni/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang / /pad+ma'i dbus su pad+ma ni/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas
233a5(rgyud): bskor 'od bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin par/ /pad+ma'i dbus na gnas pa yi/ /pad+ma'i mtshan ma ldan par bri/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni
233a6(rgyud): 'di rnams yin no/ /sti/ oM pad+ma nr-i t+ye shwa ri pU dza ya sarba ta thA ga tA nAM na ta na ta hUM/ oM A be sha ya pad+ma ka ba tsa ban d+ha ra kra ma na hUM/ haM/ oM mahA pra tsaN+Di pad+ma ya k+Sha Ni bi shwa rU pa
233a7(rgyud): d+hA ra Ni bi shwa pa ya sarba duSh+Ta khA da khA da hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma muSh+Ti a mu/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa rnams bri ba/ /pad+ma lcags kyu la sogs rgyu/ /mdor na
233b1(rgyud): pad+ma'i mtshan ma can/ /de nas de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so/ /oM pad+ma ra ti pU dze ho/ /oM pad+ma a b+hi She ke pU dze ra ti/ oM pad+ma gI te pU dze gi/ oM pad+ma nai wi d+ye pU dze ho/ /oM d+hU pe pad+ma ni hUM/
233b2(rgyud): oM pad+ma puSh+pa hUM/ oM pad+ma ku la sun d+ha ri/ d+harma A lo ke pU dzA ya hUM/ oM pad+ma gan d+he hUM/ mchod pa rnams so/ /oM pad+ma aM ku sha A kaR+Sha ya mahA pad+ma ku la na/ ha ya grI ba sa ma ye hUM
233b3(rgyud): dzaH/ oM a mo g+ha pA sha kro d+ha sa ma ye pra be sha ya sarba sa twa sa ma yaM hUM/ oM pad+ma shAM ka le baM/ oM pad+ma gan+d+ha d+hA ri shrI g+haM A be sha ya/ sa ma yaM sha na mu ki a/ de nas phyag rgya 'di'i dkyil
233b4(rgyud): 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgya par byas nas/ pad+ma'i slob ma rnams ji lta ba bzhin bcud do/ /'di skad du/ khyod kyis gsang ba 'di su la'ang ma smra zhig /khyod sems
233b5(rgyud): can dmyal bar lhung ba re/ tshe gcig tu sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re/ de nas phab nas 'di skad du khyod kyi mig lam du ci zhig snang zhes dris nas/ /des ji skad du smras pa de bzhin
233b6(rgyud): du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /des gal te nam mkha'i dkar bar mthong na ni de'i tshe de'i dngos grub dam pa'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/ /yang na ser po mthong na ni de nor 'grub
233b7(rgyud): pa'i ye shes bslab po/ /ci ste dmar po mthong na ni rjes su dga' bar 'gyur pa'i ye shes bslab bo/ /ci ste nag po mthong na ni mngon spyod kyi ye shes bslab bo/ /ji ste sna tshogs
234a1(rgyud): @#/ /mthong na ni dngos grub thams cad kyi ye shes bslab par go bar shes nas ji lta ba bzhin du gdong g.yogs pa bkrol nas snod ji lta ba bzhin du ye
234a2(rgyud): shes bskyed do/ phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/ /de ltar rdo rje dbyangs la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du yang snod ji lta ba bzhin du phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab pa ni 'di
234a3(rgyud): bzhin du brtag par bya'o/ /de nas dngos grub dam pa sgrub pa'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang sems dpa' che/ /sna tshogs gzugs su bdag nyid kyis/ /bsgoms
234a4(rgyud): na phyag rgya chen po yi/ /mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas dbang gis dam tshig ni/ /mnyam par gzhag pas brtan byas te/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni/ /mchog
234a5(rgyud): gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /pad+ma pad+ma sems dpa' che/ /bdag nyid mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms/ /bdag nyid kyis ni dam pa yi/ /dngos grub thob pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rang
234a6(rgyud): byung gdon mi za ba yi/ /dbang phyug las kyi phyag rgya ni/ /cho ga bzhin bsgrubs myur bar yang / /mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin
234a7(rgyud): no| |oM pad+ma satwa haM sid d+h+ya ho/ /oM bud+d+ha a b+hi She ka kro d+ho haM sid d+h+ya ho/ /oM d+harma sa mA d+hi ra haM sid d+h+ya ho/ /oM a mo g+he shwa ro haM sid d+h+ya mi/ /de nas nor sgrub pa'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/
234b1(rgyud): kha yi nang du dbyig bcu ga ste/ /sna tshogs dbang phyug phyag rgya che/ /bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms na ni/ /gcig tu gyur las stong du 'gyur/ /gser srang brgyar cha blangs nas ni/ /dam tshig
234b2(rgyud): mchog ni rab brtan par/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni/ /gcig tu gyur las stong du 'gyur/ /mu tig 'brum bu khar bcug la/ /bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug tu/ /bdag nyid kyis
234b3(rgyud): ni bsgoms na ni/ /gcig tu gyur las stong du 'gyur/ /las kyi phyag rgya lag gnyis kyis/ /rin chen thams cad blangs na ni/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na yang / /gcig tu gyur las stong du 'gyur
234b4(rgyud): de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM pad+ma ma hA rat+na pra d+ha hUM dza/ oM pad+ma su bar+N+Na pra d+ha hUM dza/ oM pad+ma mu ku Ta pra d+ha hUM dza/ oM pad+ma sarba rat+na pra d+ha hUM dza/ de nas rjes su dga' ba'i ye shes
234b5(rgyud): ni 'di yin te/ sna tshogs dbang phyug phyag rgya che/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni/ /pad+ma blangs te mdun gnas pa/ /gang yin des ni de mgur byed/ /dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya yis/ /
234b6(rgyud): pad+mo dmar por dam bzung ste/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni/ /bud med thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ /bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms nas kyang / /pad+ma blangs te ji lta ba/ /rdo rje
234b7(rgyud): lta bas de ltar bltas/ /'jig rten thams cad des mgur 'gyur/ /las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni/ /cho ga bzhin du pad+ma gzung / /lag pa gnyis kyis bskor na ni/ /bud med thams
235a1(rgyud): @#/ /cad der mgur 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM bi shwe shwa ra mahA pad+ma ho/ /oM pad+ma sa ma ya pad+ma ho/ /oM yo ga pad+ma ho/ /oM pad+ma karma ho//
235a2(rgyud): sna tshogs ye shes dbang phyug che/ /bdag nyid mdun du pad+ma gtsang / /phyag rgya pad+ma de nyid kyis/ /de yi 'chi ba skad cig go/ pad+ma bzung nas brtan bya ba/ /cho ga legs pa ji bzhin du//
235a3(rgyud): dam tshig dam pa de nyid kyis/ /nan tan kho nar gzhig par byed/ /gang gis ming smos 'jig pa ni/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgya sbyar nas su/ /ji ltar de ltar pad+ma thogs/ /las de nges par
235a4(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang gis gzhig par khros na ni/ /las kyi phyag rgya sbyar nas su/ /bskor zhing brdab par byas na ni/ /de yi 'tsho ba rdol bar 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di
235a5(rgyud): yin no/ /oM mahA pad+ma ts+tshe da mA ra ya ho phaT/ oM sa ma ya pad+ma s+pho Ta nA sha ya ra ta phaT/ oM d+harmA pad+ma ts+tshe da bi nA sha ya pra ti ya phaT/ oM karma pad+ma s+pho Ta ya dzI bi ta ma s+ya kr-i ta phaT/ de
235a6(rgyud): nas chos kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no/ /bud med du ni pad+ma bsam/ /da steng bdag nyid rdo rjer bsgyur/ /pad+ma pad mchog rtse byed cing / /mnyam par
235a7(rgyud): gzhag na dngos grub thob/ /bud med du ni pad+ma bsam/ /de steng bdag nyid sangs rgyas bsgyur/ /rtse zhing dbu rgyan sangs rgyas ni/ /bsgoms na des ni de 'grub bo/ /bud med
235b1(rgyud): du ni pad+ma bsam/ /de steng pad+mar bdag bsgyur te/ /rtse zhing pad+ma pad+ma mchog /dag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /bud med du ni pad+ma bsam/ /de steng sna tshogs bdag/ bsgyur te/ /
235b2(rgyud): rtsa zhing sna tshogs pad+ma mchog /sna tshogs dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM badzra pad+ma saM yo ga sA d+ha ya hriH/ oM bud+d+ha ma ku Ta saM yo ga sA d+ha ya shrIH/
235b3(rgyud): oM pad+ma pad+ma saM yo ga sA d+ha ya d+h-i/ oM bi shwa pad+ma saM yo ga sA d+ha ya sti/ de nas pad+mo rigs kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes ji lta ba bzhin du bslab bo/ /sor mo rtse sprad pad+mar bya/ /
235b4(rgyud): rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub gnyis sprad/ /rtse gnyis nor bu'i pad+ma ltar/ /rdo rje bsdams pa'ang de bzhin te/ /rdo rje bcing ba bsdams nas kyang / /gung mo gnyis ni myu gur bsgreng / /mdzub mo srin
235b5(rgyud): lag gnyis bkug pa'i/ /phyag rgya shAkya thub pa'i brtan/ /chos kyi rdo rje snying gar bzhag/ bsgyur te dpral bar bzhag pa dang / /ting nge 'dzin tshul pang du bzhag /bsgyur nas spyi bor bzhag
235b6(rgyud): par bya/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang bcings la/ /mchod rten pad+ma'i tshul du ni/ /gung mo gnyis ni bcings gyur na/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma yin par bshad/ /da las mthe bo rdo rje dang / /mdzub gnyis
235b7(rgyud): ral gri lcags kyur bya/ /pad+ma rdo rje 'dzin pa de/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya yin par bshad/ /de las mthe bo bsnol nas kyang / /mdzub mos mdzub mo rab bzung la/ /drangs na rab dga' yin
236a1(rgyud): @#/ /par bshad/ /legs so zhes pa'ang de bzhin te/ /rdo rje bsdam pa dam byas las/ /mthe bo gnyis mnyam bcug nas kyang / /mdzub gnyis rtse bkug rtse mo ni/ /
236a2(rgyud): dpral bzhag gung mo pad+mar bya/ /de nyid las ni snying gar yang / /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa dang / /de nyid las ni rgyal mtshan bcing / /ltag par rab tu brkyang par bya/ /rdo rje bsdams
236a3(rgyud): pa dam byas la/ /mdzub gnyis rtse mo pad+mar dgug /de bzhin pad+ma ral gri ste/ /mdzub mo pad+mar byas pas sbyar/ /rdo rje bsdam pa dam byas la/ /mthe bo g.yon pa nang du gzhug/
236a4(rgyud): dung ste mthe bo mtho bar bsgreng / /sor mo bskum brkyang pad mthe'u chung / /de las thams cad bcum nas kyang / /mthe'u chung pad+ma lta bur bya/ /mthe bo g.yas la sbyar ba yi/ /
236a5(rgyud): mdzub mor nor bu bgrang bar bya/ /rdo rje bsdam pa dam byas la/ /mthe'u chung pad+ma lta bur bya/ /mdzub mo bsgreng ste gar byed pa/ /pad+ma spyan gyi yin par bshad/ /rdo rje bsdam
236a6(rgyud): pa dam byas la/ /mthe'u chung pad+ma lta bur bya/ /dam du mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste/ /mthe bo gnyis ni go char bya/ /de las mthe ba gnyis mche bar bya/ /mthe ba gnyis nang du gzhug
236a7(rgyud): par bya/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dam tshig mchog ni bla med de/ /rdo rje nang du bsdams nas kyang / /mdzub gnyis pad+ma 'dra byas la/ /mthe bo phan tshun bsnol ba ni/ /
236b1(rgyud): gsang ba'i sna tshogs dang nga du bshad/ /de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/ /mthe'u chud gung mo mnyam bsgreng la/ /mthe ba mos rdo rje sbyar ba ni/ /gtsug phud dbus na de bzhin gshegs//
236b2(rgyud): de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/ /mthe bo pad+ma 'drar byas la/ /kha nas dbyung ltar byas nas kyang / /pang du ting nge 'dzin ltar gzhag /de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/ /sor mo kun gyi
236b3(rgyud): ngos rnams ni/ /mnyam par dam du bsdams nas kyang / /mdzub gnyis rdo rjer mnyam pa'o/ /de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/ /mdzub gnyis pad+ma 'drar byas la/ /mthe bo gnyis kyang bsnol

236b5(rgyud): du ni bsgyur nas kyang / /mdzub mo g.yon pa bsgreng ba la/ /mdzub mo mthe bo rtse sbyar ba/ /dam du bzung ste dgug ltar bya/ /de la mdzub mo gnyis bkug la/ /mthe bo gnyis kyis
236b6(rgyud): mnan pa ni/ /pad+ma dgyes pa bdag nyid che/ /legs so zhes bya sbyin byed kyi/ /de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/ /sor mo kun gyi ngos sbyar la/ /mthe bo gnyis kyis mnan nas ni/ /
236b7(rgyud): mdzub mo mnyam par sbyar ba'o/ /de nyid snying gar nyi mar bya/ /spyi bor pad+ma rgyal mtshan bya/ /phab sta kha yi 'gram bzhag pa/ /pad+ma cher dgod dgod pa yin/ /rdo rje nang du bsdams
237a1(rgyud): @#/ /byas la/ /chos kyi rdo rje tshul gyis ni/ /mthe'u chung mthe bo rab bsnyams pa/ /'di ni sgrol ma'i dam tshig yin/ /de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/ /
237a2(rgyud): mdzub gung pad+ma ral grir bya/ /de bzhin nang du 'khor lor bya/ /zlos pa sbyin pa de bzhin no/ /de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/ /mthe ba mdzub sprad de gnyis su bya/ /de nas snying

237a4(rgyud): gnyis phyir bskyed mche ba can/ /de las khu tshur tshul gyis ni/ /mtheb gnyis ngos kyis btsir ba yi/ /pad+ma gsang ba'i khu tshur che/ /dam tshig mchog tu rab brtag pa'o/ /

237b1(rgyud): ' das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa

237b3(rgyud): d+harma hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rjed snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM rat+na d+harma hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis

237b7(rgyud): shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /sems dpa' chen rnams cho ga bzhin/ /sna tshogs dbang phyug la sogs pa/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs bri/ /de la de dag
238a1(rgyud): @#/ /gi snying po 'di rnams so/ /oM dz+nyA na bud+d+ha hUM/ oM dz+nyA na bi shwe shwa re hUM/ oM dz+nyA na bu d+d+ha mu ku Ta hUM/ oM dz+nyA na d+harme shwa re hUM/ oM dz+nyA na a mo g+he shwa re hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma bu d+d+ha

238b2(rgyud): nam mkha' la ni de 'gro'o/ /'jig rten dbang gi ting 'dzin gyis/ /gtsug tu pad+ma bsgoms nas kyang / /grub par gyur na myur du ni/ /skad cig gis ni steng du lding / /de dag gi snying po

238b7(rgyud): snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM pad+ma a ka R+Sha/ oM pad+mar tha/ oM pad+ma dz+nyA na gra hA na/ oM pad+ma ra sa ya na hUM phaT/ phyag rgya che bcings pad+ma ni/ /kha dog dbyibs rnams sna tshogs pa'i/ /

239b5(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta karma kr-i hUM/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs
239b6(rgyud): kyi las 'byung ba rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM hUM d+hi/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM rat+na karmas ma ye hUM/ de nas
239b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje can gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM pad+ma karme hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /
240a1(rgyud): @#/ /oM bi shwa karme hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos nyid kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do/ /de nas

240a4(rgyud): shwa ra a bi She ka karma bi d+ya hUM/ oM d+harma karme shwa ra dz+nyA na pU dzA sa ma ye hUM/ oM a mo g+ha karme shwa ri hUM/ oM pad+ma karma bu d+d+he hUM/ oM pad+ma karma badzri Ni hUM/ oM pad+ma karmi Ni mA ra Na pU dza

240a7(rgyud): tA ya hUM/ oM ra ti pU dze hUM dzaH/ oM a b+hi Sha ka pU dze hUM dza/ oM gI te pU dze hUM d+ha/ oM nai wi d+ye pU dza hUM baM/ oM d+hu pe pU dze hUM aH/ oM puSh+pa pU dze hUM traM/ oM A lo ke pU dze hUM d+hiH/ oM
240b1(rgyud): gan+d+he pU dza hUM baM/ oM ha ya grI ba a na ya hUM dza/ oM a mo g+ha pA sha kro d+ha pI DA ya hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma shA ka la ban d+he hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma gan+d+he A be sha ye hUM phaT/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor
240b2(rgyud): 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste/ 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu /khyod kyis tshul 'di su la yang ma smra zhig /sems can dmyal bar ltung bar
240b3(rgyud): gyur ta re zhes bsgos shig / de nas ye shes bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas sdig pa bshags pa'i ye shes la bslab par bya ste/ 'jig rten dbang phyug phyag rgya cher/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag
240b4(rgyud): bsgoms nas kyang / /sdig rnams bshags pas myur bar ni/ /sdig pa kun las de 'dag 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang gis ting 'dzin gyis/ /dam tshig gi ni mchog bcings te/ /sdig pa
240b5(rgyud): thams cad bshad na ni/ /mtshams med lnga las 'byang bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang phyug cing 'dzin du/ /shin tu mnyam par gzhan bsgoms la/ /sdig pa thams cad bshags
240b6(rgyud): na ni| |sdig pa kun yang rab tu 'joms/ /mdor na gang yang rung ba yi/ /las kyi phyag rgya legs bcings la/ /las rnams thams cad bshags na ni/ /las rnams kun las rnam par
240b7(rgyud): 'dag/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM sarba rba pA paM saM sho d+ha na mahA pad+ma/ oM sarba A nan t+ya shwa d+ha na sa ma ya pad+ma/ oM sarba pA paM pra Na sha Na d+harma pad+ma/ oM sarba pad+ma a
241a1(rgyud): @#/ /ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ka karma pad+ma/ de nas sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur ba'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /'jig rten dbang gi phyag rgya cher/ /shin tu
241a2(rgyud): mnyam gzhag bsgoms byas la/ /shud d+h+ya shud d+h+ya zhes brjod na/ /las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang gi ting 'dzin gyis/ /las kyi dam tshig bcings na ni/ /bud
241a3(rgyud): d+h+ya bud d+h+ya zhes brjod na/ /las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la/ /chos kyi phyag rgyar bsgoms nas ni/ /d+hi d+hi d+hi d+hi zhes brjod na/ /las rnams
241a4(rgyud): kun las dag par 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang / /hI hI hI hI zhes brjod na/ /las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur/ /de
241a5(rgyud): la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM pA paM k+Sha ya pad+ma/ oM A ba ra Na k+Sha ya pad+ma/ oM karma k+Sha ya pad+ma/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i ye shes la
241a6(rgyud): bslab bo/ /'jig rten dbang gi phyag rgya cher/ /rab tu mnyam par gzhag bcings la/ /oM oM oM oM zhes brjod na/ /mchod pa thams cad rab tu byed/ /'jig rten dbang
241a7(rgyud): po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang / /b+hu b+hu b+hu b+hu zhes brjod na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad de mchod 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang pos snyoms zhugs la/ /

241b2(rgyud): zhes brjod na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad des mchod 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM kA ra pad+ma/ oM b+hU kA ra pad+ma/ oM he ka ra pad+ma/ oM d+he kA ra pad+ma/ oM ni wa ra Na
241b3(rgyud): k+Sha ya pad+ma/ de nas dngos grub kyi ye shes la bslab bo/ /'jig rten dbang po phyag rgya cher/ /mnyam par gzhag pas bcings nas kyang / /hrI hrI hrI hrI zhes brjod na/ /'jig rten dbang por
241b4(rgyud): grub par 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /dam tshig ces bya bcings nas kyang / /shrI shrI shrI shrI zhes brjod na/ /dngos grub dam pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang
241b5(rgyud): po'i mnyam gzhag par/ /mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang / /d+hig d+hig d+hig d+hig zhes brjod na/ /pad+ma khro bor 'grub par 'gyur/ /pad+ma chen po dge ba yi/ /las kyi
241b6(rgyud): phyag rgya bcings nas kyang / /s+si s+si s+si s+si zhes brjod na/ /dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM hrIHsid d+h+ya/ oM shrI sid d+h+ya/ oM d+h-Ika sid
241b7(rgyud): d+h+ya| oM si sid d+h+ya/ de nas las gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ 'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la/ /bud med kun dang rtse byed cing / /a ho su kha zhes brjod na//
242a1(rgyud): @#/ /sangs rgyas thams cad des mchod 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la/ /bud med kun dang rtse byed cing / /pri ya pri ya zhes brjod na/ /sangs
242a2(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das dgyes so/ /'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la/ /bud med kun dang rtse byed cing / /a ho ra ti zhes brjod na/ /de ni rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang
242a3(rgyud): por snyoms zhugs la/ /bud med kun dang rtse byed cing / /su kha su kha zhes brjod na/ /de yi bde ba nyams mi 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM sarba bud+d+ha pU dza pra
242a4(rgyud): brta na pad+ma/ oM prI ti kA ra pad+ma/ oM ra ti pra brtan pad+ma/ oM mahA su kha pad+ma dr-i D+ha hUM/ de nas las kyi phyag rgya chen po ji lta ba bzhin du bslab par bya ste/ de nas pad+ma thal sbyar te//
242a5(rgyud): dam tshig phyag rgya rdo rje dgongs/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /gnas rnams kun tu bzhag par bya/ /de nas pad+ma rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya ni dra zhes bya ba brjod par bya//
242a6(rgyud): las kyi phyag rgya des bsgrub bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //
242a7(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas phyag rgya'i snying po 'di gsungs so//
242b1(rgyud): oM badzri d+harma pad+ma hUM/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra dz+hi/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying bos rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra rat+na mu ku Ti hUM/
242b2(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM d+harma pad+ma d+hi/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba mu
242b3(rgyud): khe hUM| de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya

242b5(rgyud): phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rdo rje pad+ma la sogs bri/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i chog rgyas par byas nas/ ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste/ 'di skad du/ 'di khyod kyis su la
242b6(rgyud): yang ma brjod cig / khyod rtag tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur pa dang / mi bde ba ma sbangs bas dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar lhung nga re zhes bsgo zhig /de nas de yi ye shes bskyed par bya
242b7(rgyud): ste| lag pas pad+ma bzung nas kyang / /bsgrims te legs par bsdams par bya/ /dri de sangs rgyas rnams mchod na/ /myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /mnyam par gzhag pas gtsug phud
243a1(rgyud): @#/ /dbus/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab gzhag la/ /'gro zhing rdo rje 'gying bstan na/ /'jig rten thams cad dbang du byed/ /pad+ma pad+ma chen po'i gzugs//
243a2(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin 'dug ji lta bzhin/ /yid kyis su ni de bsad do/ /gang du phog par de rgyas pa'i/ /sa sogs pa yi las byed do/ /pad+ma pad+ma chen po'i gzugs/ /pad+ma rgya gram nyid du ni/ /byas

243a5(rgyud): d+hi dz+nyA na d+h+r-i ka / oM bi shwa pad+ma sarba karma kA ro b+hA ba la li lu la la li hUM phaT/ de nas phyag rgya gsang ba'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /chags nas dgos pa thams cad ni/ /
243a6(rgyud): bsgrub par bya ste dam tshig 'di/ /bsgrub par dka' ba'i phyag rgya yang / /rnal 'byor gyis ni myur du 'grub/ /de la 'di'i dam tshig gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM sA d+ha
243a7(rgyud): ya pad+ma rA gas ma ya a/ de nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya chen po thams cad bslab par bya'o/ /phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //
243b1(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarbA dza ga
243b2(rgyud): tI nA ya mahA satwa a/ A gats+tsha shI g+h+raM bi shwa rU paM san d+hA rA ya ma me tsa sarba sid d+hA ya pra yats+tsha hrIH/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos 'gro ba thams
243b3(rgyud): cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri
243b4(rgyud): bar bya/ /de yi nang du pad+ma yang / /de bzhin du ni bri bar bya/ /der ni 'dab ma kun khyab pa'i/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni bri bar bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bcud
243b5(rgyud): nas| de bzhin du bsgo te 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor legs par bris nas kyang / /phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni/ /

243b7(rgyud): nas kyang / /dbang po gnyis ni sbyar bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor de ni de grub bo/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa/ phyag rgya bcing ba rnams bslab par bya'o/ /dngos grub rnams kyang
244a1(rgyud): @#/ /de bzhin no/ /de bzhin du ras la sogs ba la'ang bya'o/ /phyag rgya gzhan rnams dkyil 'khor gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du phyag rgya la sogs
244a2(rgyud): pa'ang de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig du 'dus nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la legs
244a3(rgyud): so zhes bya ba byin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /theg pa chen po mngon 'dus ba/ /rdo rje theg pa bla med kyi/ /mdo sde 'di ni legs bshad ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod
244a4(rgyud): legs so/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

244a6(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i rin po che rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po la ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa
244a7(rgyud): 'dis gsol ba btab bo/ /nam mkha'i snying po sems can don/ /sems dpa' chen po gzi chen po/ /rin chen che ba'i rin chen mchog /rdo rje rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal/ /dbang
244b1(rgyud): bskur rin chen chen po ni/ /dag pa che zhing dge ba che/ /sangs rgyas rin chen rnam dag sku/ /rin chen rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal/ /nam mkha' nam mkha' las byung ba/ /nam mkha'
244b2(rgyud): kun gyi 'od che ba/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi phyogs kun gyi/ /re kun mchog ni khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rin chen mdzod spu rin chen 'byung / /sangs rgyas mdzod spu de bzhin gshegs/ /
244b3(rgyud): rin chen thams cad rab kun mchog /rin chen dgos pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rin chen rin mchog gtso rin drag /de bzhin gshegs ba kun rin chen/ /rin chen dam pa nam mkha' che/ /
244b4(rgyud): mkha' mnyam khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyan yin pas ni mdzes pa che/ /mdzes par snang zhing rab mdzes mdzad/ /don kun dag cing dag pa'i don/ /sbyin spyod khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos

245a2(rgyud): nyid khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rin chen phul te rab kyi mchog /rin chen rgyan te rin chen mdzod/ /rin chen snang bas snang ba che/ /rin chen grags pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rin chen phung

245a4(rgyud): bsam pa thams cad legs par mnyes/ /rin chen phung po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /srid rtse khyab par bdag nyid kun/ /mchog rab sbyin zhing mchog che ba/ /phun sum thams cad
245a5(rgyud): 'byor pa'o/ /rdo rje snying po bdag phyag 'tshal/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad zhi ba 'di/ /su yang rung ba 'chang byed na/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur ba/ /skad cig tu ni sdig med 'thob/ /
245a6(rgyud): rin chen khyod la gsol ba ni/ /nor 'dus pa ni bshad par mdzod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang gi mchog /des pa'i rigs ni bskyed par mdzod/ /da nas byang chub sems dpa' nam
245a7(rgyud): mkha'i snying pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' 'di thos nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM
245b1(rgyud): badzra rat+na hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta A
245b2(rgyud): sha pa ri pU ra Na mahA rat+na hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra hUM tra/ de nas byang chub sems
245b3(rgyud): dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM ma Ni hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /
245b4(rgyud): oM pad+ma hrIH/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM bi shwa rat+na hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam
245b5(rgyud): mkha'i snying pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa
245b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje nor bu rin po che lta bu 'od zer rnams byung nas de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs
245b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dbang gis dbang bskur nas yang gcig tu gyur te bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i thugs kar zhugs so/ /de nas nam mkha'i
246a1(rgyud): @#/ /snying po'i thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid kun nas 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying po rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi dbang
246a2(rgyud): bskur la sogs pa'i bkod pa dang / rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sku rdo rje'i nor bu'i rin po che'i phyag rgya'i mtshan ma phyag na bsnams pa'i byang chub sems dba' chen po'i sku rnams su
246a3(rgyud): gyur te byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rin po che chen po'i char 'bab pa la sogs pa nor bskyed pa rnams kyis sems can rnams mgu bar byas nas yang slar byon nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyogs thams cad du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/

246a5(rgyud): e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rin chen thams cad bsdus pa ni/ /rdo rje rin chen rigs nyid du/ /'gro ba'i don du 'di gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i
246a6(rgyud): s nying pos rang gi rigs bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di phul te don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil
246a7(rgyud): 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la/ /thams cad grub pa zhes bshad pa/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /
246b1(rgyud): rta babs bzhis ni brgyan ba ste/ /srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa la/ /dar dang phreng ba lnga ldis brgyan/ /dkyil 'khor chen po grwa rnams dang / /sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen spras par ni/ /
246b2(rgyud): phyi yi dkyil 'khor srad bus bre/ /de yi nang du rdo rje yi/ /rin chen las byung gnas bya zhing / /ka ba brgyad kyi tshul du ni/ /rin chen sna tshogs 'od 'bar ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor lngar ni brgyan
246b3(rgyud): gyur bar/ /der ni srad bu bre bar bya/ /rang gi phyag rgyas bskor ba yi/ /der ni sangs rgyas bzhag par bya/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM bud+d+ha rat+na hUM/ oM badzra ma Ni hUM/ oM badzra
246b4(rgyud): rat+na aM ku ru hUM/ oM badzra rat+na pad+ma hUM/ oM badzra rat+na paR+Sha hUM/ re ba kun grub dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang / /rdo rje snying po der gnas shing / /rin chen mchog ni sbyin
246b5(rgyud): par bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin du/ /rin chen phyag rgyar ldan pa yi/ /sems dpa' chen po rnams bri 'o/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams
246b6(rgyud): so| |oM sarba ar+tha sid+d+hi pra da hUM/ oM badzra ma Ni tsin+d+h+ya ha na A kA sha gar+b+ha b+ha ga bAn sid d+h+ya sid d+h+ya hUM/ oM rat+na aM ku sha a kaR+Sha ya sarba ar+thA na sa ma ya shrI g+h+raM sarba ta thA ga ta satwa ma
246b7(rgyud): nu sma ra hUM/ oM ti rA ga pa shaM ku ru sarba nak+Sha sha gar+b+ha hUM/ oM rat+na duSh+Ti hUM/ rin chen phreng ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /rin chen phreng ba 'dzin pa'i
247a1(rgyud): @#/ /mchog /nges pa'i dbus su legs par bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin par/ /nor bu'i mtshan rnams lag thogs
247a2(rgyud): pa'i| |sems dpa' chen po rnams bri'o/ /de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM rat+na tiSh+Tha tra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka rat+na mA le hUM/ oM rat+na ma Ni sU R+ye hUM/ oM tsan+d+ra ma Ni
247a3(rgyud): d+h+wa dza sarbA sha pa ri pU ra A kA sha gar+b+ha hUM/ oM rat+nAT+Ta hA sa hA sa hUM/ rin chen pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /rin chen pad+ma 'dzin khyab pa/ /de dbus
247a4(rgyud): gnas par bri bar bya/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin par/ /nor bu mtshan ma 'chang ba yi/ /sems dpa' chen po rnams bri 'o/ /de la de dag
247a5(rgyud): gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM rat+na pad+ma hUM/ oM he ga sa mA d+hi dz+nya na gar+b+ha hUM/ oM rat+na ko Sha gra hUM/ oM ma Ni tsakra pra bar+t+t+ya ya hUM/ oM rat+na ba shi hUM/ rin chen char 'bebs dkyil
247a6(rgyud): 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /rin chen char ni rab 'bebs pa'i/ /sems dpa' chen po der yang bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /mdor na lag na phyag
247a7(rgyud): rgya yang / /rin chen mtshan mar ldan pa yi/ /sems dpa' chen rnams cho ga bzhin/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM rat+na pr-iSh+Ti baR+Sha ya sarba brta saM b+ha d+ha b+ha bAn ma Ni
247b1(rgyud): ha sta hUM/ oM ma Ni pU dzA sa ma ya hUM/ oM ma Ni ban d+ha ka ba tsa hUM/ oM ma Ni daMSh+Ta ka rA la mahA yak+Sha ha ra ha ra sarbA r+thA na ti sha ya hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na ban+d+ha sa ma ya hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal
247b2(rgyud): nas ni/ /grwa yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin par/ /rin chen lA s+yai la sogs bri/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM rat+na ra ti hUM/ oM
247b3(rgyud): rat+na mA le hUM/ oM rat+na gI t+ye hUM/ oM rat+na nr-i t+ye hUM/ phyi yi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su/ /bdug pa'i mchod pa la sogs
247b4(rgyud): bri| |de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM rat+na d+hU pe rat+ne/ oM puSh+pe ma Ni/ oM rat+na A lo ke/ oM ma Ni gan+d+he/ sgo rnams bzhi yi dbus su ni/ /sgo ba rnams ni gzhag par bya/ /
247b5(rgyud): de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM sarba rat+na A kaR+Sha a ru Na mahA satwa b+ha ga bAn twaM A kA sha gar+b+haM tso dA ya A kaR+Sha ya shI g+h+raM ho dza/ oM sarba rat+na pra be sha ya sa ma ya
247b6(rgyud): pra be sha ya sa ma ya ma hA ma Ni rA dzA ku laM rat+na pA sha hUM/ oM ma Ni ban d+ha hUM baM/ oM ma Ni rat+na A be sha a/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir nor bu rin po che'i slob dpon
247b7(rgyud): nyid ji lta ba bzhin zhugs te cho ga rgyas pa bdag nyid kyis byas la/ de nas rin po ches byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa gang ba'i chus nor bu'i slob ma dbang bskur ste/ rdo rje nor bu'i
248a1(rgyud): @#/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la snying po 'di brjod do/ /oM badzra ma Ni rat+na sa ma ya baM/ de nas kha dog ji lta bu rnyed pa'i bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te
248a2(rgyud): de dang 'dra bas mig g.yogs la snying po 'di brjod du bcug ste gzhug par bya'o/ /oM hUM ma Ni rA dza ku laM/ de nas de ltar bcug nas 'di skad du khyod kyis 'di su la'ang ma brjod cig/
248a3(rgyud): khyod che rabs thams cad du dbul por gyur ta re/ sdug bsngal las mi thar bar gyur ta re/ sems can dmyal bar yun ring bor gnas par gyur ta re zhes bsgo la dam tshig
248a4(rgyud): gnyis su bya'o/ /theg pa chen po mngon par 'dus pa'ang brjod par bya'o/ /de nas bsam pa dang / gter chen po gang na yod/ ji ltar thob par 'gyur zhes rdo rje'i tshig gis dri
248a5(rgyud): bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos thams cad smrar stsol cig ces smras ma thag tu gdong g.yogs
248a6(rgyud): pa dkrol te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi dam tshig kyang bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la thug gi bar du dkyil 'khor chen po bstan
248a7(rgyud): par bya'o/ /de nas ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas nas dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas ye shes gyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya che/ /shin tu
248b1(rgyud): mnyam par bzhag pas bcings/ /gter brkos nas ni gang dag na/ /gter yod pa ni de mthong 'gyur/ /dam tshig gis ni mchog bcings la/ /gang na gter rnams yod gyur pa/ /
248b2(rgyud): der ni phyag rgya btsir na ni/ /de tshe bdag nyid 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin du/ /shin tu mnyam bzhag bsgoms na ni/ /gang na gter rnams yod ba yang / /yid
248b3(rgyud): kyis shes pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /gang du phyag rgya babs gyur na/ /de na gter yod shes par bya/ /de la de dag
248b4(rgyud): gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM mahA ma Ni rat+na A bi sha hUM/ oM ma Ni piN+Da pa ri sha ya hUM/ oM rat+na sa mA d+hi brU hi/ oM rat+na A bi sha dar sha ya hUM/ phyag rgya chen por bsgoms na ni/ /
248b5(rgyud): gang du lus ni khor gyur pa/ /de ni rin chen gter yod par/ /dam tshig nyid kyis shes par bya/ /dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang / /gang du babs nas gnyis gyur pa/ /de na
248b6(rgyud): rin chen chen po yi/ /gter yod par ni shes par bya/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /gang la babs pa bdag nyid kyis/ /rin chen chen po bdag nyid kyis/ /gter ni gang na yod
248b7(rgyud): par smra/ /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang / /gang tshe lag gnyis phan tshun du/ /babs nas dam tshig bcings gyur pa/ /de nas gter ni yod par bshad/ /de la de dag gi snying po
249a1(rgyud): @#/ /ni 'di rnams so/ /oM mahA rat+na kA ya dar sha ya rat+na/ oM A kA sha gar+b+ha ma Ni rat+na/ oM s+phoT s+phoT ya tra ni d+h+ri/ oM ma Ni rat+na dz+nyA na swa yaM brU hi/ oM pu
249a2(rgyud): na sa ma ya ban d+ha dar sha ya swAhA/ /phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nas ni/ /de bzhin gang du dwogs gyur pa/ /de nas rin chen 'byung ba yi/ /gtor mod ye shes shes par bya/ /gang du
249a3(rgyud): dwogs yod der yang ni/ /dam tshig mchog ni mchog bcings la/ /gang tshe nyid ni grol gyur pa/ /de na gter ni yod par bshad/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /gang du nges
249a4(rgyud): par dwogs gyur pa/ /de na nges par gter yod par/ /ye shes bskyed de shes par bya/ /gang na yang dang yang dwogs par/ /las kyi phyag rgya cho ga bzhin/ /der bcings de ni gnyis
249a5(rgyud): gyur pa/ /gter yod par ni shes par bya/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM ni d+hi dz+nyA na A bi sha /oM rat+na na sa ma ya muny+tsa ni d+hi ban d+haM/ oM d+harma rat+na bru hi ni d+ha naM/
249a6(rgyud): oM sarba karma Ni s+pho Ta ya dar sha ya ni d+hI ban d+ho dAk+Shi pa/ phyag rgya chen por bsgoms nas ni/ /gter rnams kun tu btsal nas kyang / /gang na gnas pa der babs na/ /de na
249a7(rgyud): yod par rnam par bshad/ /dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang / /gter rnams kun tu btsal nas ni/ /gang na gnas pa brtag gyur pa/ /de na gter ni yod par bshad//
249b1(rgyud): ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /gter rnams kun tu btsal nas kyang / /gang na yod par rtag tu shes/ /de na gter ni yod par bshad/ /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /gter
249b2(rgyud): rnams kun tu btsal nas kyang / /gang na yod par las phyag rgya/ /bskor ba de na yod par bshad/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM rat+na ba rak+Shi A be sha /oM rat+na sa
249b3(rgyud): ma ya hr-i da dar sha ya/ oM rat+na pa rak+Shi dz+nyA na A bi sha /oM ma Ni karma brah+ma ya/ de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab par bya'o/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor la/ /gter rnams
249b4(rgyud): kun tu tshol byed cing / /phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni/ /babs par gyur na gter rnyed do/ /dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang / /bud med dang ni rtse byed cing / /gang du phyag rgya dam
249b5(rgyud): gyur pa/ /de na gter ni yod par bshad/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar na/ /gter rnams kun tu tshol byed cing / /ye shes phyag rgya bsgoms nas ni/ /gter gyi ye shes 'jug
249b6(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /dbang po gnyis kyi ting 'dzin gyis/ /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /gang du phyag rgya gnyis gyur pa/ /de na gter ni yod par bshad/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni
249b7(rgyud): 'di rnams so/ /oM mahA ma Ni saM yo gA bi sha/ oM sa ma ya saM yo ga dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ oM di ni dz+nyA na A bi sha saM yo ga /oM sarba karma saM s+phoT si yo ga /de nas nor bu'i rigs chen po'i
250a1(rgyud): @#/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes thams cad la bslab bo/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po 'di yin te/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /ji lta ba yi go rims
250a2(rgyud): bzhin/ /phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni/ /don gyi mchog kun 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po rnams kyi las ni 'di rnams yin no/ /sangs rgyas phyag rgya sangs rgyas
250a3(rgyud): nyid| |rdo rje snying pos gnyis rab 'grub/ /rin chen lcags kyus kun spyan 'dren/ /nor bu dga' bas rjes dgar byed/ /nor bu mgu bas dgyes par byed/ /nor bu lta bas nor thob
250a4(rgyud): bo| |nor bu phreng bas dbang bskur zhing / /nor bu nyi mas gzi brjid mchog /yid bzhin nor bus ji dgar sbyin/ /rin chen bzhad pas nor thob 'gyur/ /rin chen chos kyis chos kyang
250a5(rgyud): theb| |gtong ba'i dpal gyis dam pa rnyed/ /rin chen ral gris mtshon chen po/ /rin chen 'khor los dbang por 'gyur/ /smra bas btsal ba'i dngos grub 'thob/ /rin chen char gyis
250a6(rgyud): nor chen po/ /nor bu'i mchod pas rab mchod nyid/ /rin chen chos kyis brtan par byed/ /rin chen mche bas nor thob bo/ /khu tshur nor bus dngos grub 'thob/ /de nas dkyil
250a7(rgyud): 'khor chen po 'di'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no/ /rdo rje rin chen phyag rgyas ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur 'thob/ /rdo rje nor bu che bcings nas/ /rdo rje rin
250b1(rgyud): chen grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje gnyis las nor bur byas/ /rdo rje 'dzin las nor 'thob bo/ /de nyid mthe bo rdo rje yis/ /nor bu sbyar te snying gar gzhag /mdzub gnyis pad+ma'i nor bu ra bcings//
250b2(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang gis nor byin 'gyur/ /rdo rje las nor sna tshogs kyi/ /nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtshan sbyin/ /rdo rje dbyings mdzub nor bu yis/ /sangs rgyas rin chen nyid 'thob bo/ /mdzub mo
250b3(rgyud): bsnyams te phyir bkug la/ /mthe bo rdo rjer bcings pa yi/ /rdo rje snying po'i phyag las byung / /'di ni rdo rje'i nor bur gsungs/ /'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang / /rdo rje'i nor bu chen po 'thob/ /
250b4(rgyud): mdzub gnyis rin chen 'drar bcings la/ /gung mo myu gur bsgreng ba ste/ /'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang / /rang gi dbang bskur thob par 'gyur/ /de nas gung mo srin lag dang / /mthe'u chung
250b5(rgyud): rnams ni pad+mar bya/ /'dis ni kun tu spyan ras gzigs/ /mtshan 'dzin pas ni nor sbyin 'gyur/ /mdzub mo mthe bo mthe'u chung rnams/ /rdo rje rin chen tshul du bya/ /gung mo gnyis kyi se na
250b6(rgyud): mo sbyar/ /srin lag myu gu 'dra bar bsgreng / /rdo rje bsdam pa dam byas la/ /mdzub gnyis nor bur byas nas kyang / /mtheb gnyis brkyang ba'i ngos snying gi /don kun grub pa sbyin par byed/ /
250b7(rgyud): rdo rje bsdam pa bsdams nas kyang / /gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya/ /nor bu mtshan gyi phyag rgya 'di/ /nor bu chen po rab sbyin no/ /de nyid las ni mdzub mo gnyis/ /lcags kyu'i tshul du byas pa ni/
251a1(rgyud): @#/ /don kun dgug pa'i phyag rgya ste/ /nor bu rin chen lcags kyur bshad/ /de nyid las ni bsgyur nas kyang / /mdzub mos mdzub mo bzung nas ni/ /mda' 'phangs
251a2(rgyud): pa yi tshul byas la/ /drangs nas 'gro ba dga' bar byed/ /de nyid las ni mdzub mtheb gnyis/ /sbyar ba legs so zhes bya ba'o/ /de nas mtheb gnyis sbyar ba yis/ /mdzub gnyis
251a3(rgyud): rtse mo sbyar ba dang / /mthe bo gnyis ni dbus sbyar la/ /mdzub gnyis ngos dang sbyar ba ni/ /nor bu lta bar bshad pa ste/ /lta ba'i don rnams 'phrog byed pa 'o/ /don kun grub pa'i
251a4(rgyud): phreng ba ni/ /rang gi dbang ni rab sbyin 'gyur/ /de nyid snying gar mthe bo gnyis/ /bsgreng ste ngos kyi sbyar ba ni/ /nor bu nyi ma'i snying gar gzhag /gzi brjid chen por rab sbyin 'gyur/ /
251a5(rgyud): srin lag bsnyams te bsgreng nas ni/ /phye ste spyi bor gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje nor bu chen po gtso/ /re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o/ /de nyid las ni 'gying byed cing / /kha 'gram rgod par
251a6(rgyud): bskor ba ste/ /rin chen cher rgod zhes bya ba/ /bzhad pas don rnams thams cad 'grub/ /ting nge 'dzin du sor mo bsgom/ /nor bu pad+ma nor 'chang ba'i/ /de nas mtha' nas grol
251a7(rgyud): ba ni| |sbyin pa chen po rab sbyin byed/ /mthe bo gnyis ni nang du dgug /mdzub gnyis nor bur byas pa ni/ /nor bu ral gri yin te mthus/ /'gro ba rnams kyi nor 'phrog pa'o/ /rdo rje
251b1(rgyud): bsdams las 'khor lor bya/ /mtheb gnyis nang du bcug nas kyang / /mdzub gnyis nor bu 'drar byas pa/ /'khor los bsgyur ba thob par byed/ /de nyid thal mo'i tshul du byas/ /kha nas
251b2(rgyud): 'dren par byas pa ni/ /de bcings nas ni ngag gis kyang / /rang gi bkas ni nor 'phrog 'gyur/ /rdo rje nor bu che bcings la/ /rin chen char ni rab 'bebs te/ /sor mo thams cad bsgreng ba ni/ /
251b3(rgyud): phyogs bzhi nas ni nor char 'bebs/ /rdo rje nor bu che bcings la/ /gar byas gtsug phud dbus bzhag nas/ /kun la cho ga bzhin mchod na/ /rin chen kun gyis de mchod 'gyur/ /don
251b4(rgyud): kun grub pa'i phyag rgyas ni/ /mgrin pa'i phyogs su 'khyud par bya/ /nor bu bcings pa zhes bya ste/ /bsrung ba yi ni cho gar grags/ /don kun grub pa de nyid las/ /gnod sbyin tshul du
251b5(rgyud): khar bzhag pa/ /nor bu mche ba zhes bya ste/ /'jigs byed don kun 'phrog pa yi/ /rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la/ /mdzub bkug mthe bo gnyis kyis ni/ /legs par mnan te btsir ba ni//
251b6(rgyud): nor bu'i khu tshur dngos grub 'thob/ /dam tshig rnams kyi mchod mchog rnams/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul du ni/ /ji bzhin nor bu ldan pa la/ /'di ni dam tshig mchog tu brtags/ /gung mo nor
251b7(rgyud): bu'i tshul du bya/ /de dag nyid la rnam par brtags/ /lcags kyu gcig sogs tshul gyis ni/ /las rnams thams cad rab 'grub byed/ /de nas nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi chos kyi
252a1(rgyud): @#/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no/ /hraHgraHtriHhrIHshrIHiHriHd+h+riHdiHd+hIHgriHbiHriHDaHyaHaHrin chen phyag rgya gnyis byas la/ /
252a2(rgyud): las kyi phyag rgya bri bar bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po las/ don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa
252a3(rgyud): rdzogs so/ / //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i rin po che'i byin gyis
252a4(rgyud): brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra rat+na d+hU pe hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi
252a5(rgyud): rigs 'byung ba'i phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra a b+hi She ka mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi phyag rgya 'di
252a6(rgyud): gsungs so/ /oM rat+na a b+hi She ka hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra d+harma a b+hi She ka hUM/ de nas byang
252a7(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka pU dzA sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
252b1(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /
252b2(rgyud): rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la/ /rin chen gsang ba zhes bshad de/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre/ /de yi dbus su tshul bzhin du/ /sangs
252b3(rgyud): rgyas phyag rgya bri bya ste/ /khri la gnas pa'i nor bu'i gtso/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi mdun du ni/ /nor bu'i phreng ba pad+ma'i nor/ /nor bus bskor ba'i nor bu'i rnams/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni
252b4(rgyud): 'di rnams so/ /oM traM/ oM ma Ni sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na a b+hi She ka mA le hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na pad+ma hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na pr-i ti sa ma ye hUM/ thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje
252b5(rgyud): shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /rdo rje rin chen dbus su ni/ /rdo rje nor bu chen po bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin par/ /rang gi phyag rgya nor bur ldan/ /rin
252b6(rgyud): chen slob dpon nyid kyis bri/ /de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so/ /oM sarba ar+tha sid+d+hi pra be sha mahA badzri rat+na sa ma ye ma Ni sarba ar+thA na me sA d+ha ya d+ha ra NI hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na A ka R+Sha
252b7(rgyud): ye swA hA/ oM ma Ni rat+na sa ma ye aM ku sha ma Ni ku la dza/ oM ma Ni rA ga sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma Ni sA d+hu hUM/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor gnyis par yang / /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /
253a1(rgyud): @#/ /spyan gnyis dang ni ldan pa yin/ /nor bu de yi dbus su bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin par/ /nor bu'i mtshan
253a2(rgyud): mar ldan pa yi/ /rang gi phyag rgya rnams bri 'o/ /de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di dag go/ /oM badzra ma Ni rat+na ne tra A na ya ba shaM ku ru sarba ar+tha saM b+ha dA na shI g+h+raM tiSh+Tha aM ku shi hUM/ oM ma
253a3(rgyud): Ni rat+na rat+na mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na sU R+ya dz+wA la ya sarba mahA rA dzi ni hUM/ oM ma Ni tsan+d+ra d+h+wa dzA gri hUM/ oM ma Ni hA se hA sa hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /nor bu pad+ma bri bar
253a4(rgyud): bya| |de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin bya/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM ma Ni sa mA d+hi pad+ma ni hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na d+ya gra sa ma ya hUM/
253a5(rgyud): oM ma Ni sa ma ya ko She hUM/ oM ma Ni sa ma ya tsa kra hUM/ oM ma Ni b+hA ShA gri hUM/ dkyil 'khor bzhi ba dam par ni/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang / /rdo rje rin chen ldan pa yi/ /
253a6(rgyud): rin chen char 'bebs der gnas shing / /las kyi phyag rgya ji bzhin pas/ /yongs su bskor bar bri bar bya/ /nor bu'i mtshan mar ldan pa rnams/ /ltag 'og go rims ji
253a7(rgyud): bzhin bya/ /de nas de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so/ /oM rat+na br-i Sh+Ti sA d+ha ya mahA ma Ni hUM/ oM mahA pU dzA sa ma ye ne tra A/ oM mahA pU dzA sa ma na sa me
253b1(rgyud): ye rak+Sha / oM badzra ma Ni rat+na daMSh+TA kA rA le ha ra ha ra hUM/ oM ma Ni sa ma ya mu Sh+Ti hUM/ de nas nor bu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas
253b2(rgyud): rang gi slob ma rnams btsud de 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o/ /khyod kyis tshul 'di su la yang ma smra zhig /khyod rab tu dbul ba dang / dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar lhung ta re zhes bsgo
253b3(rgyud): la rang gi nor bu'i dam tshig gi ye shes bskyed par bya'o/ /rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/ /mkha' la rdo rje rin chen bri/ /bdag nyid kyi ni dpral bar yang / /gzhag na rgyal por nges par
253b4(rgyud): 'gyur/ /rin chen rdo rje bcings nas ni/ /rdo rje rin chen mkha' la bri/ /dbang gi gnas su bzhag na ni/ /nges par rgyal po nyid du 'gyur/ /rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdo rje rin chen mkha'
253b5(rgyud): la bri/ /ye shes rdo rje de bzhag na/ /nyid kyis grub pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /mkha' la rdo rje rin chen bri/ /rang gi gnas su de bzhag na/ /nyid kyi grub pa'i
253b6(rgyud): rgyal por 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /mahA badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ sa ma ya rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ d+harma rat+na a b+hi Shi ny+tsa mAM/ karma rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ phyag rgya
253b7(rgyud): chen po'i snying gar ni/ /rdo rje rin chen bsgom par bya/ /bsgoms nas mngon par dbang du bskur/ /mchog tu rmad du byung ba 'thob/ mnyam par gzhag pas rdo rje yi/ /rin chen dpral
254a1(rgyud): @#/ /bar bsgoms nas ni/ /rin chen rdo rje bcings gyur na/ /thams cad kyi ni rgyal por 'gyur/ /rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/ /lce la rdo rje rin chen bsgom/ /
254a2(rgyud): chos kyi rgyal po nyid du ni/ /dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas rdo rje yi/ /rin chen gtsug tor bsgoms nas kyang / /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /las legs
254a3(rgyud): byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM badzra rat+na hr-i da ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa ho/ /oM badzra rat+na a b+hi She ka dra/ oM badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa baM/ oM badzra rat+na uSh+NI Sha
254a4(rgyud): a d+hiSh+ThA na swa mA na/ phyag rgya chen po bdag nyid kyis/ /bsgoms na rdo rje rin chen yang / /ras la sogs par bris nas ni/ /rgyal po chen por de 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje rin chen bla na med/ /
254a5(rgyud): ras la sogs par bri nas kyang / /sems dpa' rdo rje bsgoms na ni/ /dam tshig rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur/ /rin chen rdo rje bdag nyid kyis/ /ras la sogs la bris nas kyang / /bsam
254a6(rgyud): gtan phyag rgya bsgoms na ni/ /nges par chos kyi bdag por 'gyur/ /ras la sogs par rdo rje yi/ /rin chen bris nas las rnams kyi/ /phyag rgya bsgoms par gyur na ni/ /bdag nyid las
254a7(rgyud): kyi bdag por 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /badzra rat+na biM b+ha a d+hi tiSh+Thi/ oM badzra rat+na bim b+ha pra ti tiSh+Tha/ oM badzra rat+na baM b+ha a b+hi She ka/ badzra rat+na bim b+ha ku ru/ /gser ram
254b1(rgyud): yang na dngul yang rung / /rdo rje rin chen bcings gyur ta ma/ /yang na rin chen gzhan yang rung / /snying gar bsgoms nas dbang bskur 'gyur/ /rdo rje rin chen bla na med/ /gser ram rin chen
254b2(rgyud): gzhan las byas/ /rtag tu dpral bar bzhag na ni/ /nor che ba yi rgyal por 'gyur/ /gser ram rin chen gzhan dag gi /rdo rje rin chen bsgoms nas kyang / /rang gi khar yang bcug na ni/ /
254b3(rgyud): tshig la dbang bar de 'gyur ro/ /gser ram rin chen gzhan dag gi/ rdo rje rin chen bsgoms na ni/ /gtsug tor du ni yang bsgoms na/ /las rnams kun gyi bdag por 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi
254b4(rgyud): snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM badzra rat+na hr-i da ya A ba ra Na hUM/ oM badzra rat+na a b+hi She ka mahA ar+tha pA da/ oM badzra rat+na pA tsa prA de/ oM badzra rat+na mahA karma pA de/ de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi dam
254b5(rgyud): tshig gi phyag rgya gsang ba'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /phyag rgya chen por bsgoms nas ni/ /rdo rje nor bu che bcings la/ /nor bu bud med bu gar bcug /de ltar dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /
254b6(rgyud): dam tshig mchog gi nor bu ni/ /bud med bu gar bcug nas kyang / /dam tshig mchog bcings thams cad kyi/ /dbang bskur ba yi dngos grub 'gyur/ /rdo rje nor bu che bcings la/ /chos
254b7(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya bsgoms nor bu/ /de ni bud med bu gar bcug /bla med pa yi dngos grub 'gyur/ /las kyi phyag rgya nor bu bcings/ /bud med bu gar las phyag rgya/ /bcings par 'gyur na
255a1(rgyud): @#/ /las kun gyis/ /dngos grub bla na med par 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM mahA ma Ni sid+d+hi/ oM sa ma ya a b+hi She ka sid+d+hi/ oM d+harma sid+d+hi/
255a2(rgyud): oM karma sid+d+hi/ de nas dkyil 'khor 'di'i phyag rgya chen po bcings ba bshad de/ /rin chen rdo rje myu gur bcings/ /gung mo srin lag mthe'u chung rnams/ /sor mo brkyang ba byas nas ni//
255a3(rgyud): spyi bor bzhag pa grub mchog 'thob/ /rdo rje bsdam pa byas nas kyang / /mdzub mo gnyis mdud mtheb gnyis dang / /srin lag rdo rje bsgyur nas ni/ /mdzod spur bzhag pa dbang thob bo/ /
255a4(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen tshul byas la/ /mdzub gnyis ngos dang mtheb ngos sprad/ /de nyid bsgyur nas de dbang 'thob/ /de nyid mtheb gnyis mdzub gnyis ni/ /chos kyi rdo rje tshul du ni/ /bcings
255a5(rgyud): nas dpral bar bzhag pa ni/ /chos chen gyi ni dbang bskur 'gyur/ /las kyi rdo rje bcings nas kyang / /dbang rnams kun gyi phreng ba ste/ /bsgyur nas dpral ba nyid du yang / /bzhag
255a6(rgyud): na dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya ni/ /rdo rje dbyings skyes dam tshig kyang / /bcings nas rin chen dpral bar ni/ /bzhag na dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur/ /
255a7(rgyud): mtheb gnyis phan tshun bsnol nas ni/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo yang / /nor bu 'dra bar bkug pa ni/ /rdo rje nor bu chen po 'thob/ /rdo rje bsam/ pa byas nas kyang / /rdo rje khu tshur
255b1(rgyud): gung mo gnyis/ /nor bu 'dra bar byas nas ni/ /nor bu phreng ba'i dbang bskur 'gyur/ /rdo rje bsdam pa byas nas ni/ /gung mo nor bu 'dra na la/ /mdzub mo srin lag gnyis pad+ma/ /
255b2(rgyud): kha bye 'dra bar byas pas 'grub/ /gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bcings/ /sor mo thams cad bsgreng ba rnams/ /nor bu nyid du bsgoms na ni/ /'khor rnams mchog dang ldan par 'gyur//
255b3(rgyud): gung mo mthe bo rdo rje yi/ /rin chen tshul du byas nas kyang / /srin lag mthe'u chung bsnyams pa yi/ /khar bzhag lce steng nor bu sbyin/ /de la mdzub gnyis rdo rjer bya/ /de ltar de gnyis lcags
255b4(rgyud): kyur bya/ /mdzub mos mdzub mo drang ba dang / /de nyid dga' bar rab sbyin pa'o/ /gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bcing / /mdzub gnyis ngos la dgug pa ste/ /srin lag ngos gnyis mdud pa la/ /
255b5(rgyud): mtheb bo gnyis kyis bkab pa ste/ /de nyid rdo rje nyi mar bskor/ /dpung ba'i spyi bor brkyang bar bya/ /nor bu'i rgyal mtshan spyi bo'i rgyan/ /bzhad pa'i tshul du byas pa'o/ /rdo rje bsdam pa
255b6(rgyud): byas na ni/ /mdzub mo srin lag gyen du bsgreng / /de dag pad+ma 'dra bar bya/ /gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya/ /de las mtha' mar rab sbyin bya/ /rdo rje ral gri sbyar ba dang / /rdo rje 'khor lo tshul du
255b7(rgyud): bya| |de nyid kha nas dbyung bar bya/ /mdzub gnyis rin chen myu gur bya/ /sor mo thams cad brkyang ba dang / /de dag spyi bor bzhag pa ni/ /rin chen char gyis char 'bebs so/ /de nyid go cha'i
256a1(rgyud): @#/ /tshul du ni/ /snying gar rin chen gnyis byas pa/ /mdzub gnyis nor bu 'dzin mche ba/ /dbus su bsnyams pa khu tshur ro/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i
256a2(rgyud): ye shes la bslab po/ /phyag rgya chen po de dag nyid/ /snyim pa sbyar ba bcings na ni/ /mdor na gsang ba gsang ba yi/ /dngos grub bzhi 'gyur sbyin par byed/ /ji ltar rdo rje'i gsang
256a3(rgyud): ba'i sbyin/ /dus rnams kun tu bcings mi bya/ /de nas chos kyi phyag rgya'i mdo bshad par bya'o/ /traiH| graiH| traiH| saiH|kraH| khaH| d+haiH| haiH| praiH| d+haiH| kraiH| baiH| kraH| raiH|yaH| maiH|
256a4(rgyud): gsang ba gsang ba'i khu tshur mchog / gnyis su byas na las kun byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ /rin po che phyag
256a5(rgyud): rgya'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so/ / //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba mkhyen
256a6(rgyud): pa'i dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka
256a7(rgyud): dz+nyA not+ta ma hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig ba dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra dz+nyA na a b+hi She ka sa ma ya hUM/ de nas byang
256b1(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM ma Ni rat+na a b+hi She ka dz+nyA na hUM/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
256b2(rgyud): chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM d+harma a b+hi She ka dz+nyA na hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam
256b3(rgyud): pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba a b+hi She ka dz+nyA na hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs
256b4(rgyud): so| |de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la/ /rin chen ye shes zhes bshad de/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil
256b5(rgyud): 'khor thams cad srad bus pre/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni/ /snying ga'i mtshan ma bri bar bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'di'i ye shes kyi snying po ni 'di rnams gsungs so/ /oM dz+nyA na
256b6(rgyud): sarba sid+d+hi dz+nyA na hUM/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na hUM/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na aM ku sha dza/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na rA ga /oM ma Ni dz+nyA na duSh+Te/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na duSh+Ti ma Ni hUM/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na a b+hi She ka /oM ma Ni dz+nyA na sUR+ya/ oM ma
256b7(rgyud): Ni dz+nyA na d+h+wa dza/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na aT+TAT+Ta hA sa/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na pad+ma hUM/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na t+ye ga/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na ko Sha/ oM dz+nyA na ma Ni tsa kra/ oM dz+nyA na ma Ni b+ha Sha/ oM dz+nyA na ma Ni rat+na baR+Sha hUM/ oM ma
257a1(rgyud): @#/ /Ni dz+nyA na nr-i d+ye bU dzA sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na rak+Sha/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na yak+Sha/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na muSh+Ti/ de nas yang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du
257a2(rgyud): byas nas slob ma la 'di skad bsgo bar bya'o/ /khyod kyis chos ma mthong bsu la'ang ma brjod cig /khyod dngos grub ma thob par myur bar shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo la nor bu'i rigs
257a3(rgyud): kyi chos kyi ye shes bskyed par bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis ras sogs la/ /rdo rje snying po bris nas ni/ /bsgoms nas rin chen don 'byin ces/ /smra zhing gsol ba gdab par bya/ /

257a5(rgyud): mnyam par bzhag nas kyang / /rnam par bsgoms te ye shes la/ /dam chos sbyin zhes gsol ba gdab/ /rdo rje snying po ras sogs la/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bris nas
257a6(rgyud): kyang | |bsgoms nas dam pa'i las byin zhes/ /las la gsol ba gdab par bya/ /de nas de dag gi sgrub pa'i snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM de hi sarba ar+tha b+ha ga bAn badzra
257a7(rgyud): gar+b+ha/ oM de hi sarba rat+na b+ha ga bAn badzra gar+b+ha/ oM de hi sA d+ha d+harmA mi b+ha ga bAn badzra gar+b+ha satwa/ oM de hi sA d+ha karma b+ha ga bAn badzra gar+b+ha/ nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan
257b1(rgyud): du| |nam mkha'i snying po legs sems pa/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas su/ /phun sum tshogs don gsol bar bya/ /nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du/ /nam
257b2(rgyud): mkha'i snying po legs sems pa/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang / /nor bsags pa ni gsol bar bya/ /nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du/ /nam mkha'i
257b3(rgyud): snying po legs sems pa'i/ /mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang / /phun sum tshogs ni gsol ba gdab/ /nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du/ /nam mkha'i snying po legs

257b5(rgyud): hi sarba rat+na/ oM dz+nyA na gar+b+ha de hi sarba d+harmaM/ oM dz+nyA na gar+b+ha de hi sarba karma mAM/ rdo rje snying po bris nas kyang / /snying gar yongs su bsgom byas la/ /gang gi tshe na snying 'phar ba/ /de tshe grub pas nor
257b6(rgyud): ster ro/ /rdo rje snying po dpral bar ni/ /bris te rnam par bsgoms nas kyang / /gang tshe mgo bo 'dar gyur pa/ /des ni mngon par dbang thob bo/ /rdo rje snying po khar bcug la/ /de nyid du ni
257b7(rgyud): bsgoms nas kyang / /gang tshe de ni byed gyur pa/ /de tshe des ni ngag 'grub po/ /rdo rje snying po bdag spyi bor/ /rab tu bzhag ste bsgoms nas kyang / /gang tshe de ni 'bar gyur pa/ /de tshe
258a1(rgyud): @#/ /'phang du lding bar 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM hr-i da ya gar+b+he de hi d+ha naM/ oM rat+na a b+hi She ka gar+b+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ oM b+ha ga gar+b+ha
258a2(rgyud): sid+d+h+ya/ oM rat+na gar+b+ho Sh+NI Sha A kA shA gats+tsha/ rdo rje snying po phyag rgya che/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni/ /bdag la grub stsol zhes gsol la/ /i li rat+na zhes brjod 'grub/
258a3(rgyud): nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig ni/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang / /dbang bskur ba ni gsol btab la/ /mi li rat+na zhes brjod 'thob/ /rdo rje snying po ting 'dzin du/ /
258a4(rgyud): rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas ni/ /chos bdag stsol zhes gsol btab la/ /tsi li rat+na zhes brjod 'thob/ /nam mkha'i snying po las kyi mchog /rab mnyam bzhag pas
258a5(rgyud): bcings nas ni/ /rin chen thams cad gsol btab la/ /ki li rat+na zhes brjod 'thob/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM i li/ oM mi li/ oM tsi li/ oM ki li/
258a6(rgyud): de nas nor bu ye shes gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du/ /rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam
258a7(rgyud): sprad na/ /dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /gzhi la ri mo bris pa bzhin/ /rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la/ /dbang bskur ba yang thob
258b1(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la/ /sdug pa de dang gar rtses pa/ /'jig rten kun gyis de dgar byed/ /nam mkha' kun gyi rdul
258b2(rgyud): dbyibs kyis/ /rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor la/ /thams cad 'grub par nges par 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /A kA sha gu h+ya
258b3(rgyud): dz+nyA na sa ma ya hUM/ bi tsi tra gu h+ya dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ pri yA nu smri ti dz+nyA gu h+ya sarba lo ke rA ga ya hUM/ sarba gu h+ya dz+nyA na sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha hUM/ de nas phyag rgya chen po 'di ji lta ba bzhin
258b4(rgyud): bcing bar bya 'o/ /dngos grub kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /de nas chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /rdo rje nor bu ni rdo rje ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bzhag par
258b5(rgyud): bya'o| |de nas chos kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin no/ /sA bA rA sA ra te ka ha daM ti he bA ka na ka ra ya ma/ de nas mdor na las kyi phyag rgya ni gnas ci bzhin par gzhag par bya'o/ /de
258b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de nas yang
258b7(rgyud): b com ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i las kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
259a1(rgyud): @#/ /zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /sarba ta thA ga ta karma a b+hi She ka hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
259a2(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes rang gi las 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra hUM kA ra a b+hi Sha ka /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang
259a3(rgyud): gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta a b+hi She ka hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di
259a4(rgyud): gsungs so/ /oM sarba d+harma a b+hi She ka rat+na/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM bi shwa a b+hi
259a5(rgyud): She ka hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha' snying pos rang gi rig kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /las kyi
259a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la/ /rin chen dgos pa zhes bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre/ /de yi dbus
259a7(rgyud): su tshul bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas sku gzugs gzhag par bya/ /sems dpa' chen po tshul gyis ni/ /rin chen mchod pa rnams bri'o/ /de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so/ /
259b1(rgyud): oM ma Ni rat+na pU dzA gra/ oM sarba ar+tha sid+d+hi badzra rat+na a b+hi She ka hUM/ oM badzra ma Ni d+harma sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na A kaR+Sha karma sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na rA ga ra ti karma pU dze pra bar+t+ta/ oM ma Ni
259b2(rgyud): rat+ne sA d+hu ka ra pU dzA sa ma ye hUM/ oM mahA ma Ni rat+na dr-iSh+Ta A kaR+Sha/ oM ma Ni rat+na mA la pU dze/ oM ma Ni rat+na sUR+ya lo ka pU dze/ oM ma Ni rat+na d+h+wa dzi pA ta ke pU dze/ oM ma Ni rat+na at+tAt+ta
259b3(rgyud): hA sa pU dze/ oM pad+ma ma Ni sa mA d+hi sa mA ye hUM/ oM sarba t+ya gA nu smr-i ti sa mA d+hi kar+m+ma ka ri hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na tik+Sh+Na sa mA ye tshin+da hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na tsakra sa mA ye hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na b+hA She b+ha da
259b4(rgyud): b+ha da hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na baR+sha ni hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na karmi Ni hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na ka ba rtse rak+Sha mAM/ oM ma Ni rat+na daMSh+Ta khA da khA da hUM/ oM ma Ni kar+m+ma muSh+Ti hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na la s+ye pU dzA ya ho/ /
259b5(rgyud): oM ma Ni rat+na mA le a b+hi She ka pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na gI te pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na nr-i t+ye pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na d+hU pe pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na puSh+pe pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na A lo
259b6(rgyud): ke pU dza ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na gan+d+he pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na aM ku sha A kaR+Sha ya dzaH/ oM ma Ni rat+na pA she hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na s+pho Ta/ oM ma Ni rat+na A be sha aH/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor
259b7(rgyud): 'dir cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par byas bcug ste 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o/ /'di khyod kyis su la yang ma smra zhig /khyod las kyi sgrib pas non nas shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo
260a1(rgyud): @#/ /la/ las kyi ye shes la bslab par bya'o/ /rdo rje snying po phyag rgya che/ /rab mnyam bzhag las bsgoms nas kyang / /mchod pa kun gyis mchod na ni/ /sangs
