260a2(rgyud): rgyas thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi dam tshig mchog /phyag rgya gang yang rung bcings la/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod na ni/ /dbang bskur ba ni des 'thob bo//
260a3(rgyud): rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin tu/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod na/ /'gro ba'i dam pa 'dul bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje snying po'i
260a4(rgyud): ting 'dzin gyis/ /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod gyur na/ /skad cig tu ni don kun 'thob/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /
260a5(rgyud): oM rat+na pU dzA ba shiM ku ru/ oM rat+na pU dzA sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ oM rat+na pU dza ya d+harma nA sha ya bA di/ oM rat+na pU dzI karma sarba ar+thA na me sA d+ha/ de nas gsang ba'i phyag
260a6(rgyud): rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar nas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod na ni/ /'jig rten thams cad des mgur
260a7(rgyud): 'gyur/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes kyis dngos grub dam pa 'grub bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab par bya'o/ /rdo rje rin chen bcings
260b1(rgyud): nas ni/ /gnas rnams kun tu gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje dgos pa'i tshul du ni/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin bya/ /de nas chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ twa dza ga d+ha/ t+na dza
260b2(rgyud): tu sa/ r+m+ma k+Sh+Na tu Sha/ r+m+ma k+Sha k+Sha d+hi/ rdo rje rin chen gnyis byas la/ /las kyi phyag rgya de bsgrub bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rin po che'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i
260b3(rgyud): las| las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so/ / //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rin po che'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i
260b4(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra rat+na trAM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi phyag
260b5(rgyud): rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra mA le/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM ma Ni rten/ de nas byang chub sems
260b6(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra d+harma rat+na/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi phyag
260b7(rgyud): rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM bi shwa dr-iSh+Ti/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di
261a1(rgyud): @#/ /gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /phyag rgya bzhi ba'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor yongs su brtag par
261a2(rgyud): bya| |de nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcug nas bslab par bya ste/ khyod kyis 'di su la yang ma smra zhig ces bsgo bar bya'o/ /de nas ye shes bskyed bya ste/ /rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis//
261a3(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen bcings nas ni/ dpral bar rab tu gzhag na ni/ /dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur/ /de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin no/ /oM badzra rat+na sarba a b+hi She
261a4(rgyud): ka sarba sid+d+hi me pra yats+tsha ra la ra la hUM tra/ de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya bslab par bya ste/ khyo 'am yang na sdug pa 'am/ /bud med dang ni skyes pa'ang rung / /dpral ba gnyis ni sprad
261a5(rgyud): nas kyang / /gtugs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de la de sgrub pa'i snying po ni 'di yin te/ oM badzra rat+na sa khi bid+yA d+hA ra baM/ pra yats+tsha shI g+h+raM a b+hi Shiny+tsa ya hi ha ha ha twa/ de nas phyag
261a6(rgyud): rgya bzhi ji lta ba bzhin du bcing ba dang / rnam pa bzhi de bzhin du bslab bo/ /dngos grub thams cad kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i
261a7(rgyud): snying pos don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra ma Ni d+hA ra sarba ar+tha sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha ho/ /b+ha ga bAn badzra rat+na hUM/ de nas dkyil 'khor 'di
261b1(rgyud): yin te/ de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /dngos grub kyi ni dkyil 'khor ni/ /ji bzhin par ni bri bar bya/ /de nas 'dir ye shes gsang ba'i phyag
261b2(rgyud): rgya'i ye shes la bslab par bya 'o/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i 'dod pa rnams/ /chags par gyur pa'i bde ba ni/ /sangs rgyas la yang phul gyur na/ /las kyi dngos grub thob par
261b3(rgyud): 'gyur/ /de nas phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes la bslab par bya'o/ /ras la sogs pa la yang sems dpa' 'am phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bris te bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas yang de
261b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la legs so zhes bya ba byin pa 'dis bstod do/ /legs
261b5(rgyud): so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste/ /rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/ /rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun
261b6(rgyud): gyi gsang / /theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa/ /mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa
261b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po dum bu bzhi pa rdzogs so/ / //bam po brgyad pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
262a1(rgyud): @#/ /chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi de kho na nyid kyi cho ga rgyas ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la re zhig dang por
262a2(rgyud): ni phyag rgya chen po dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rgya che/ /bcings nas mkha' dbyings thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas sku
262a3(rgyud): gzugs byin brlabs la/ /rang gi snying du bcug nas ni/ /ci ste 'dod na tshe 'di la/ /zhi ba dam pa mchog gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas nyid 'thob des 'di bsgrub/ /ci ste mi
262a4(rgyud): 'dod dngos grub bzhin/ /phyag rgya chen po bcings nas kyang / /de nyid chen po tshig re rer/ /brjod nas kun dang ldan par yang / /thams cad bdag ni yin bsgoms na/ /
262a5(rgyud): ci ste 'dod na bdag nyid des/ /de bya gzi can dge ba yi/ /go 'phang tshe 'di nyid la 'thob/ /mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin/ /de nas dam tshig phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos
262a6(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin 'grub pa/ /de ltar bdag ces bsgoms na ni/ /sangs rgyas dang ni gzi chen 'thob/ /mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin/ /de
262a7(rgyud): nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ /chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis/ /dag ces brjod na nges par yang / /sangs rgyas dang ni gzi can
262b1(rgyud): 'gyur/ /mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ thams cad kyi ni kun dag par/ /las rnams
262b2(rgyud): thams cad sbyangs na ni/ /sangs rgyas gzi can thob ci ste/ /mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dam pa'i dngos grub rnams so/ /
262b3(rgyud): de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa'i dngos grub kun gyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /dngos grub kun sbyor sangs rgyas kyi/ /bkas ni sems can kun don
262b4(rgyud): tu| |phyag rgya chen por bsgrub na ni/ /tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'grub/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ phyag rgya chen
262b5(rgyud): po'i tshul du ni/ /ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin grub pa/ /de bzhin bdag ces bsgoms na ni/ /skad cig gis ni gzi chen thob/ /de nas chos kyi phyag rgya
262b6(rgyud): dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ /yi ge med pa'i chos rnams la/ /rab tu spros pa yod min te/ /chos mchog 'di ni brjod byed cing / /
262b7(rgyud): bsgoms na gzi can nyid du 'gyur/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ dge ba'am yang na mi dge ba'i/ /gang gi las
263a1(rgyud): @#/ /rnams byas pa ni/ /rgyal ba rnams la phul byas na/ /skad cig gis ni gzi can 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
263a2(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes pad+ma'i rigs dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la dang por ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/
263a3(rgyud): 'dod chags ngo bo nyid kyis dag /mu stegs can gyis mi gyur la/ /de la chags pa'i chos 'di ni/ /theg pa che la 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas dam
263a4(rgyud): tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub ni 'di yin te/ /ting 'dzin brtan pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /byams pa chen po bsgoms nas kyang / /cho ga bzhin ldan khyab
263a5(rgyud): byas na/ /skad cig gcig gis gzi can 'thob/ /de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ 'dod chags ngo bo nyid dag ces/ /
263a6(rgyud): smra bar gyur ba'i tshul 'di ni/ /'dod chags pha rol phyin rnyed de/ /skad cig gis ni gzi can 'thob/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos
263a7(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ bdag gi lta dang reg pa dang / /mnyan pa dang ni dran pa'ang rung / /sems can rnams ni thams cad kyi/ /sdug bsngal kun
263b1(rgyud): gyi mthar phyin 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes nor bu'i rigs kyi dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs
263b2(rgyud): so| |de la phyag rgya chen po dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di yin te/ rdo rje snying po ji bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas kun dbang bdag gyur ces/ /bsgom par bya ba
263b3(rgyud): rnams bsgoms nas/ /skad cig gis ni gzi can 'thob/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ nam mkha'i snying po 'dra bar
263b4(rgyud): ni| |sems can kun gyi re ba kun/ /yongs su rdzogs par byed gyur cig /skad cig gis ni gzi can 'thob/ /de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos
263b5(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ bdag nyid las ni phyung nas kyang / /nor byin rab tu dga' byed cing / /chos byung phyag rgya smra na ni/ /gzi can tshe 'di nyid
263b6(rgyud): la 'thob/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ dbul po rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /nor bsgrub pa la brtson ldan
263b7(rgyud): na| |gzi can 'gyur ro ci ste yang / /mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin/ /rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi sangs rgyas dang / byang
264a1(rgyud): @#/ /chub sems dpa' dam pa rnams kyi dngos grub thob ba'i cho ga rgyas ba'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na
264a2(rgyud): rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub
264a3(rgyud): kyi rgyud 'di yin te/ gang gis 'dod la snyoms zhugs pa/ /de la 'dod pas spyod par byed/ /sangs rgyas phyag rgya chen po yi/ /ye shes dam tshig yin
264a4(rgyud): par bshad/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ 'dod pa rnams la chags bral min/ /dam tshig
264a5(rgyud): mdzes pa chen po 'di/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag pa/ /rgyal bas kyang ni 'da' mi mdzad/ /de nas rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni
264a6(rgyud): 'di yin te/ sems can don du khro min yang / /khro bo chen por rab tu ston/ /rdo rje'i rigs ni chen po yi/ /dam tshig 'di ni 'da' dka' 'o/ /de la
264a7(rgyud): pad+mo'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ rang bzhin dag par shes nas kyang / /de yi dgos pa de byed de/ /pad+ma'i rigs ni chen po yi/ /
264b1(rgyud): dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba 'o/ /de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ nyung ngam yang na mang yang rung / /ci tsam nus pa nyid du
264b2(rgyud): ni| |sbyin pas nyi ma stong par ni/ /bya min dam tshig 'di yin no/ /rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems
264b3(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la de bzhin
264b4(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ sangs rgyas chos zhes grags so zhes/ /brjod na chos nyid yi ge ni/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi
264b5(rgyud): phyag rgya che/ /ye shes mchog gi tshul yin no/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ /'dod chags las ni
264b6(rgyud): dag pa'i chos/ /bde ba thams cad rab sbyin byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ni/ /dngos grub byed pa'i mchog 'di 'o/ /de la rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos/
264b7(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ /sangs rgyas bka' ni sbyang ba dang / /sems can drang bar bya ba'i phyir/ /de la khro bar ma gyur yang / /ma rungs
265a1(rgyud): @#/ /bdud byas dngos grub 'thob/ /de la pad+ma'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ /pad+ma chu yis ma chags pa/ /de bzhin 'dod pas mi
265a2(rgyud): chags zhes/ /smra zhing dgos min byed kyang ni/ /sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /de la nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ /sbyin dang mnyam
265a3(rgyud): pa'i chos med de/ /sgrub par byed cing smra ba ni/ /nor bu'i rigs ni chen po'i chos/ /mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin/ /rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga
265a4(rgyud): rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /
265a5(rgyud): de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ /sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' nyid rnams su/ /ji bzhin du
265a6(rgyud): ni btul nas su/ /las kyi phyag rgya'i mchog 'grub sbyin/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ /dus bzhi yi ni tshul dag tu/ /mchod
265a7(rgyud): pa rnam pa bzhi yis ni/ /rtag tu ldan pa rnam bzhir yang / /byas nas las rnams bsgrub par bya/ /de la rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ /ma rungs
265b1(rgyud): sems can gnod bya'i phyir/ /dgos pa gang dang gang byed de/ /las kyi rdo rje rigs kyis 'di/ /dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin byed/ /de la pad+ma'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud
265b2(rgyud): ni 'di yin no/ /'jigs pas gzir la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /ji bzhin par ni 'dul de bzhin/ /'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi las/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub sbyin pa 'o/ /de la nor bu'i
265b3(rgyud): rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ /sangs rgyas dbang bskur de bzhin du/ /lus can rnams la sbyin pa dang / /re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i/ /las kyi don du
265b4(rgyud): bsgrub pa'o/ /rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams
265b5(rgyud): cad kyi chos nyid kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no//
265b6(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid dgongs/ /'di ni sangs rgyas sangs rgyas nyid/ /gzhan las sangs rgyas 'gyur ba med/ /de la 'di ni
265b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub gyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ /phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nas ni/ /dngos grub thams cad bsgrub bar bya/ /'di
266a1(rgyud): @#/ /ni de bzhin gshegs rigs kyi/ /chos nyid dngos grub dam pa 'thob/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi
266a2(rgyud): rgyud de/ phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ /dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang / /las rnams thams cad bsgrubs na ni/ /rdo rje'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de la
266a3(rgyud): 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ chos kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyi ni/ /chos kyi phyag rgya rjod byed cing / /rdo rje chos ni chos rnams
266a4(rgyud): kyi| |chos nyid du ni 'dis bsgrubs pa'o/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni/ /las kyi
266a5(rgyud): rdo rje snying gar gzhag / chos nyid 'di dag bsgoms na ni/ /las kyi chos nyid 'thob par 'gyur/ /rigs thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud
266a6(rgyud): d o| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud
266a7(rgyud): 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /zla ba'i rdo rje tshul
266b1(rgyud): gyis ni/ /ji ltar de gnyis kha dog shes/ /de ltar 'jig rten kun shes te/ /dag la dag dang dkar 'od gsal/ /chags pa dmar dang dmar ser khro/ /shes nas kha dog ji
266b2(rgyud): bzhin pa'i/ /de yi bdag nyid nyid du 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od bcas pa'i/ /phyag rgya chen
266b3(rgyud): po bcings nas ni/ /rang gi lus la ji ltar shes/ /de ltar 'gro ba'i yid shes so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ nam mkha' ma ni phyogs
266b4(rgyud): gzhan du/ /khros par gyur nas dkyil 'khor ni/ /ji lta bur yang mthong 'gyur ba/ /de lta bur ni yid shes so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/
266b5(rgyud): nam mkha' ma sa phyogs phra mo 'am/ yi ge phreng ba mthong na/ /mdor na kha dog ci 'dra bar/ /shes pa de 'drar der sems shes/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi
266b6(rgyud): ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /'jig rten kun la bltas nas kyang / /ji lta bur ni snang gyur cing / /mthong bar gyur na de 'dra bar/ /'gro ba'i sems ni shes par bya/ /de
266b7(rgyud): gnyis snyoms par zhugs nas ni/ /'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba dang / /bod pa dang ni 'chag pa'ang rung / /ji ltar mthong ba de ltar rtogs/ /snyoms par zhugs nas bsams na
267a1(rgyud): @#/ /ni| |sems can gang dang gang yin pa'i/ /de dang de ni de bzhin du/ /sems can thams cad rtogs par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs
267a2(rgyud): so| |rigs thams cad kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub
267a3(rgyud): kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud de/ sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs tshul gyis/ /
267a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas gzugs su bdag bsgoms na/ /ye shes kyi ni tshul de yis/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub
267a5(rgyud): kyi rgyud de/ nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni ser skya mthong / /sems dpa' nyid ni phyag rgya nyid/ /mngon sum du ni mthong 'gyur na'o/ /de la
267a6(rgyud): 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud do/ de lta bu yi dbyibs gyur pa'i/ /dbus na sngo bsangs snang na ni/ /rdo rje rigs mchog dngos grub 'thob/ /de la 'di
267a7(rgyud): ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud de/ de nyid la ni mkha' 'dra ba'i/ /pad+ma sngon po lta bur mthong / /pad+ma chen po'i rigs grub pa'i/ /dngos grub de ni legs
267b1(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/ /de nyid mkha' bzhin dri med las/ /'od zer dkyil 'khor
267b2(rgyud): 'phro bar ni/ /mthong na dngos grub myur du 'thob/ /rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa'i rnams/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od bcas par/ /dngos grub dus su rang bzhin du/ /bdag
267b3(rgyud): nyid kyi mdun mthong na 'o/ /rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin
267b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mngon par
267b5(rgyud): shes pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /lus kun de bzhin gshegs rnams dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsgoms
267b6(rgyud): la/ /de bzhin lus las byung mthong na'o/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa rnams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che/ /
267b7(rgyud): rab mnyam gzhag pas bcings na ni/ /sgrub pas cho ga 'di yis ni/ /mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni 'phrul gyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub yin no/ /phyag rgya
268a1(rgyud): @#/ /chen por zhugs nas ni/ /mig gi rnam shes bskyed nas kyang / /gang yang rung ba des bsams na/ /shin tu ring ba'ang mthong 'gyur zhes/ /bcom
268a2(rgyud): ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs/ /phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni/ /rna ba'i rnam shes bskyed nas kyang / /des ni dgos pa gang bsams kyang / /shin tu ring na gnas thos
268a3(rgyud): zhes/ /bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs/ /phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni/ /yid kyi rnam shes bskyed nas kyang / /sems can gang la des brtags na/ /de yi sems
268a4(rgyud): ni nges shes 'gyur/ /phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni/ /bdag gam sems can gang yang rung / /yid kyis bltas nas gar skyes pa/ /gzugs ni de yis shes par 'gyur//
268a5(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de nas rdzu 'phrul gyi cho ga shes pa'i dngos grub ni 'di yin no/ /phyag rgya chen po bcings nas kyang / /rdzu 'phrul gang dang
268a6(rgyud): gang 'dod pa/ /de nas gang yang rung bar ni/ /ting 'dzin gyis ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems chen pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i
268a7(rgyud): rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ khams gsum rnam rgyal mchog tu ni/ /rab mnyam gzhag pas bcings nas kyang / /cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa phos/ /
268b1(rgyud): mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob bo/ /khros nas dgos pa thams cad ni/ /ltag 'og rim pa ji bzhin bya/ /rdzu 'phrul mig la sogs tshul gyis/ /mngon shes kun bdag nyid du 'gyur//
268b2(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud/ /'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya'i mchog /rab mnyam
268b3(rgyud): gzhag pas bcings na ni/ /cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa pos/ /mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob bo/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin du/ /cho ga bzhin du 'dod pas chags/ /'phrul gyi mig la
268b4(rgyud): sogs tshul gyis/ /mngon shes thams cad thob 'gyur zhes/ /bcom ldan 'jig rten dbang pos gsungs/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi
268b5(rgyud): rgyud de/ don kun grub pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings na ni/ /cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa pos/ /mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob bo/ /ltag 'og rim pa ji bzhin du/ /
268b6(rgyud): 'phrul gyi mig la sogs tshul gyis/ /sangs rgyas rnams la mchod byas la/ /mngon shes lnga ni des 'thob bo/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs
268b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs
269a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di
269a2(rgyud): yin no/ /bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa yi/ /tshig gis mna' ni 'dor byed cing / /bden pa chen po bsrung na ni/ /myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob bo/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan
269a3(rgyud): 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 'byung ba'i/ /dam tshig la ni
269a4(rgyud): mna' bor la/ /rdo rje'i bden pa bsrungs na ni/ /dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi bden pa'i
269a5(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ ci ste dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /shin tu 'di las 'da' bar dka'/ /rdo rje 'dzin la mna' 'dor cing / /bden pa 'di la bsrung bar bya/ /zhes sangs rgyas
269a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ ci ste dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /pad+ma chen po'i rigs
269a7(rgyud): mchog gi / pad+ma'i chos la mna' 'dor zhing / /bden pa'i dam tshig bsrung bar bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi bden
269b1(rgyud): ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'di las shin tu 'da' dka' bar/ /sangs rgyas chos la mna' 'dor zhing / /bden pa mchog 'di bsrungs na ni/ /dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom
269b2(rgyud): ldan 'das sangs rgyas mchod pas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi mna'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag
269b3(rgyud): na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid
269b4(rgyud): kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod nas/ /de yi 'og tu ma bsgrubs pas/ /rigs kun gyi ni phyag rgya rnams/ /nyid kyis bcings nas dam par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom
269b5(rgyud): ldan 'das dam tshig chen po de kho na nyid kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ su ra tas+t+waM zhes brjod na/ /de nyid bskul
269b6(rgyud): pa'i bdag nyid che/ /ma bsgrubs par yang phyag rgya kun/ /nyid kyis bcings na 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs
269b7(rgyud): kyi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ hUM zhes bya ba gcig tsam gyis/ /mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni/ /bdag gam yang na gzhan yang rung / /nyid bcings 'ching du bcug kyang rung / /de la 'di
270a1(rgyud): @#/ /ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sarba shud+d+ha zhes brjod na/ bdag ga ma yang na gzhan dag gis/ /bud med chags
270a2(rgyud): la sogs ldan na/ /thams cad du ni grol mi 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ oM zhes bya bas mdor bsdu na/ /phyag rgya thams
270a3(rgyud): cad 'grub 'gyur te/ /'jig rten kun gyi mchog nyid kyi/ /rang 'byung nyid la mchod par 'gyur/ /rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud
270a4(rgyud): do| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin
270a5(rgyud): gshegs pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dran byed cing / /sangs rgyas phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub brtan par yang / /bsgrubs na myur du 'grub par
270a6(rgyud): 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che/ /bcings nas de yi mdun du yang / /rdo rje sems dpa'
270a7(rgyud): bsgoms na ni/ /shin tu myur bar dngos grub 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /dam tshig gi ni mchog bcings na/ /rdo rje sems
270b1(rgyud): dpa' bsgoms na ni/ /nyi rim du ni dngos grub 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /chos kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang //
270b2(rgyud): 'jig rten mgon po bsgoms na ni/ /nyi rim du ni dngos grub thob/ /de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas
270b3(rgyud): ni| |rdo rje snying po bsgoms na ni/ /nyi rim du ni dngos grub 'thob/ /rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
270b4(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i dngos
270b5(rgyud): grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas ni/ /bdag nyid dang ni mdun du yang / /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom/ /de nas de ma thag tu 'grub/ /ces
270b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ rdo rje bzlas pa'i tshul gyis
270b7(rgyud): ni| |'dod pa bdag ces bsgoms nas kyang / /phyag rgya thams cad bsgrubs na ni/ /grub pa'i mchog ni kun bsgrubs ba'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs
271a1(rgyud): @#/ /so| |de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ bdag nyid nyid kyis rdo rje dbyibs/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas sgom byed
271a2(rgyud): cing / /phyag rgya thams cad bcings na ni/ /de ma thag tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i
271a3(rgyud): rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ ye shes kun 'byung dngos grub kyi/ /pad+ma chen po'i rigs la gnas/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid nyid/ /pad+ma'i dbyibs su
271a4(rgyud): bsgom par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i rgyud
271a5(rgyud): de| nor bu rin chen 'od zer 'bar/ /bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms na ni/ /nor bu chen po'i rigs mchod na/ /kun las 'byung ba'i dngos grub 'thob/ /ces bcom ldan 'das nam
271a6(rgyud): mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyis dngos grub dam pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs
271a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje dbyings dbang
271b1(rgyud): phyag rgya ni/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang / /snying ga mdzod spu mgrin spyi bor/ /bzhag na sangs rgyas byin rlob bo/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni
271b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi rgyud yin no/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /sems dpa'i rdo rje dam byas la/ /snying ga mdzod spu mgrin pa dang / /spyi bor bzhag na
271b3(rgyud): byin gyis rlob/ /ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje hUM gi phyag rgya ni/ /rab mnyam
271b4(rgyud): bzhag pas bcings nas kyang / /snying ga mdzod spu mgrin spyi bor/ /bzhag na nyid du byin gyis rlob/ /ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtso bos gsungs/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi byin gyis
271b5(rgyud): brlabs pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdo rje pad+ma dam byas la/ /snying ga mdzod spu mgrin spyi bor/ /byin gyis brlabs phyir gzhag par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan
271b6(rgyud): 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi rgyud do/ rdo rje snying po ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdo rje nor bu che bcings la/ /snying ga mdzod
271b7(rgyud): spu mgrin spyi bor/ /byin gyis brlab phyir gzhag par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying bos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de
272a1(rgyud): @#/ /nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de
272a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rin chen rdo rje bcings nas ni/ /dpral bar rab tu gzhag byas na/ /rgyal ba rdo rje rin chen gyis/ /dbang bskur bar ni de 'gyur
272a3(rgyud): re/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje dbyings dbang la sogs
272a4(rgyud): pa| |sangs rgyas phyag rgya mdun nas ni/ /brtsam pa byas nas ngos bzhir yang / /phreng ba nyid kyis dbang bskur 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi
272a5(rgyud): rgyud de/ rdo rje dbang gi phreng ba ni/ /bcings nas dpral bar bzhag na yang / /phreng ba'i dbang ni de yin te/ /rdo rje rnams ni de dbang 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i
272a6(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ chos kyi rdo rje bcings nas kyang / /mgo bor bzhag ste de dbang bskur/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni 'jig rten gyi/ /dbang phyug gis ni dbang bskur ro/ /zhes bcom
272a7(rgyud): ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i rgyud de/ rdo rje rin chen myu gu bcings/ /dpral bar bzhag ste des dbang
272b1(rgyud): bskur/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni mchod pa yi/ /dbang phyug tu ni dbang bskur 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub
272b2(rgyud): gyi rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
272b3(rgyud): rigs thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rgyal ba kun gyi rnam par ni/ /phyag rgya mnyam par bzhag par bcings/ /zlos shing sngags kyi rig pa ni/ /myur du dngos grub thob par
272b4(rgyud): 'gyur/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyu de/ sems dpa'i byin rlabs tshul gyis ni/ /ting
272b5(rgyud): 'dzin rdo rje chos kyis kyang / /snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs rnams/ /zlos pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di
272b6(rgyud): ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'dod chags las ni khyod phyung ste/ /bdag ni khro bo yin bsgoms nas/ /snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs rnams/ /myur du dngos
272b7(rgyud): grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten dbang po'i rig zlos pas/ /byams
273a1(rgyud): @#/ /pas 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /snying po la sogs bsgrubs na yang / /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs
273a2(rgyud): dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ nam mkha' kun gyi ting 'dzin ni/ /rab mnyam bzhag par bsgoms na yang / /
273a3(rgyud): snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams/ /bsgrubs na kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos
273a4(rgyud): grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di
273a5(rgyud): gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rab mnyam bzhag pas dang por ni/ /bdug pa la sogs mchod byas la/ /de nas dngos
273a6(rgyud): grub 'dod pa yis/ /bsgrubs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub
273a7(rgyud): kyi rgyud de/ gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam bzhi yis/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa rjod byed cing / /bdag dbul ba la sogs pa yi/ /mchod pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan
273b1(rgyud): 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ khro bo rdo rje mchod chen po/ /khro bo gsang ba rjod byed cing / /khro bo'i khu tshur rab sbyar na/ /
273b2(rgyud): myur du bdag gis rigs 'grub bo/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mdo sde zab cing rgya che ba'i/ /
273b3(rgyud): tshul rnams legs par brjod nas kyang / /yid dang ngag gis phul na ni/ /dngos grub myur du 'thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs
273b4(rgyud): so| |de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ gdugs dang 'phan dang rgyal mtshan gyis/ /rgyal po'i mchod pas mchod byed cing / /sbyin pa thams cad byin na
273b5(rgyud): ni| |nor bu'i rigs ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so/ /nyid la byin gyis brlabs sogs ldan/ /rdo rje sems dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /cho 'phrul rnam
273b6(rgyud): pa bzhi yis ni/ /rdo rje sna tshogs ting 'dzin gyi/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi byin gyis
273b7(rgyud): brlabs pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / mchod pa rnams kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs
274a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos
274a2(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud yin no/ /lus la sangs rgyas ting 'dzin ni/ /'di ni bde gshegs nyid mngon shes/ /de ni rab tu rtogs nas ni/ /sangs rgyas pa yi dngos grub 'thob/ /ces sangs rgyas
274a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'phrul gyi mig sogs mngon shes ni/ /rab
274a4(rgyud): mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang / /mngon shes lnga ni bdag gyur na/ /dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di
274a5(rgyud): ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ khro bo mngon shes bskyed nas ni/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na yang / /mngon shes lnga ni bdag
274a6(rgyud): gyur nas/ /dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub
274a7(rgyud): kyi rgyud de/ 'dod chags mngon shes bskyed nas kyang / /rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni/ /mngon shes lnga ni bdag gyur nas/ /dag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom
274b1(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje spyan gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ /mchod pa'i mngon shes bskyed nas kyang / /rab mnyam
274b2(rgyud): bzhag pas bsgoms na ni/ /mngon shes lnga yang bdag gyur nas/ /dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi mngon
274b3(rgyud): phar shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi byang chub kyi ye shes kyi
274b4(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byang chub kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /bdag gis sangs
274b5(rgyud): rgyas dran byed cing / /sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di/ /bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
274b6(rgyud): pa'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /phyag rgya chen por sgom byed cing / /byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di/ /bsgoms
274b7(rgyud): na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi
275a1(rgyud): @#/ /rgyud de/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /lag pas dam tshig mchog bcings la/ /byang chub chen bo'i ye shes 'di/ /bsgoms na dngos grub thob
275a2(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten dbang phyug
275a3(rgyud): ting 'dzin gnas/ /de bzhin chos kyi phyag rgya bzlas/ /byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di/ /bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs
275a4(rgyud): kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ /rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /las kyi phyag rgya las legs
275a5(rgyud): byed/ /byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di/ /bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi byang chub chen
275a6(rgyud): po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par
275a7(rgyud): bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ nyid kyi sangs rgyas byang chub phyir/ /
275b1(rgyud): sems can don rnams rab byed cing / /sangs rgyas rjes su dran gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed/ /ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chags pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de
275b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mnyes par bya ba gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ ji ltar yul dang ldan gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed ces/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sgom
275b3(rgyud): byed cing / /de nyid bskur na myur bar ni/ /mnyes par 'gyur ba des 'grub bo/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mnyes par
275b4(rgyud): byed pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /sangs rgyas bka' ni bsrung ba dang / /sems can don ni spyad pa'i phyir/ /rngam pas mngon spyod byas na ni/ /rdo rje rnams ni mnyes par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom
275b5(rgyud): ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ chags pas kun tu blta ba dang / /byams
275b6(rgyud): dang snying rjes chos smra dang / /mi 'jigs kun sbyin byed pa rnams/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mnyes par byed/ /ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje spyan gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs
275b7(rgyud): mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ dbang bskur ba ni rab sbyin dang / /nor bsags rab tu sbyin byed cing / /de yang sangs rgyas don du sbyor/ /'di ni sangs rgyas mnyes par byed/ /
276a1(rgyud): @#/ /ces bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/
276a2(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
276a3(rgyud): pa'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ de ltar rnam dag bde sbyin pa/ /'dod chags la ni brnyas mi bya/ /sems can kun gyi don du brtson/ /'di ni sangs rgyas dbang du
276a4(rgyud): byed/ /ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'dod sten bde ba'i bdag nyid
276a5(rgyud): kyis/ /su ra ta s+t+waM zhes smra zhing / /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrubs na ni/ /de nyid bskul na dbang du 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i
276a6(rgyud): rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas bka' ni sems can rnams/ /dag bya lus can skyabs sbyin dang / /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir/ /bsad
276a7(rgyud): na yang ni dbang du 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ pad+ma 'dab ma kha
276b1(rgyud): 'byed cing / /'dod chags dag la kun rtog la/ /gdul ba'i phyir ni chags byed cing / /'dod par byed pa dbang du 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi
276b2(rgyud): dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur phyir/ /rdo rje rin chen nyin re rer/ /spyi bor bzhag ste dbang
276b3(rgyud): bskur na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i
276b4(rgyud): rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
276b5(rgyud): bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sems can kun don ma mthong zhing / /sangs rgyas de nyid ma sbyangs la/ /yid dang ngag dang lus kyis ni/ /bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom
276b6(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ dngos grub thams cad ma thob la/ /rigs
276b7(rgyud): rnams kyang ni mi brtson zhing / /rdo rje kun tu brtags nas ni/ /bsad na dngos grub myur du thob/ /ces bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi bsad pa'i
277a1(rgyud): @#/ /dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ ma rungs mi brtul khro med cing / /de bzhin sems can mi 'dul la/ /bdag nyid sdug bsngal 'thob byed na/ /hUM zhes bya bas bsad par bya//
277a2(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ snying rje med cing byams med la/ /sems can ma rungs mi skyong zhing / /
277a3(rgyud): bdag nyid kyi ni bslus na yang / /bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi
277a4(rgyud): bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mi gtong bdag la nor med cing / /nor stor ba dang gnod byed la/ /dbul por gyur la sems can rnams/ /bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom
277a5(rgyud): ldan 'das re ba thams cad yongs su skong bas gsungs so/ /kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi/ /rnal 'byor ma thob gsod bcug na/ /de dag drang bar bya ba'i phyir/ /bdag gi dngos grub
277a6(rgyud): sbyin par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu bzang pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems
277a7(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi srung ba'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i srung ba'i dngos grub kyi
277b1(rgyud): rgyud de/ sems can thams cad mi gtong zhing / /rtag tu sangs rgyas chos bdag nyid/ /rtag par sangs rgyas yid la byed/ /'di ni srung ba rmad kyi mchog /ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
277b2(rgyud): kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi srung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan tsam zhig /lan gcig tsam yang brjod gyur na/ /'di ni srung ba
277b3(rgyud): brtag chen po/ /skad cig dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi srung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rigs dang rgyud kyis chog
277b4(rgyud): mi shes/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal bdag nyid kyis/ /rdo rje hUM la mos byed pa/ /'di ni bdag dang gzhan las srung / /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi srung ba'i
277b5(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /'dod chags dag cing byams pa che/ /thams cad la ni mi 'jigs sbyin/ /'jig rten dbang gis mtshan zlos pa/ /srung ba 'di ni rmad du che/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs
277b6(rgyud): so| |de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi srung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /sangs rgyas sems can gtong byed par/ /ci nus par ni sbyor byed cing / /nyi ma stongs par mi bya bar/ /srung ba 'di ni rmad kyi mchog /
277b7(rgyud): ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje srung bas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi srung ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das
278a1(rgyud): @#/ /la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rgyud 'di ba zhes par gsol/ gang gis sems can thams cad
278a2(rgyud): brtag pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu gyur nas rtogs par bgyi ste/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i slad du'o/ /de nas bcom
278a3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ phyag na rdo rje la legs par bshad pas nged kyis blangs shing byin gyis brlabs
278a4(rgyud): kyis legs so legs so/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rdo
278a5(rgyud): rje theg pa bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i/ /mdo sde 'di ni legs bshad pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so/ /rdo
278a6(rgyud): rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so/ /rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las/ brtag pa thams
278a7(rgyud): cad kyi thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs so/ / //de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos
278b1(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la dang po 'dir ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dam pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ sangs rgyas byang chub ting nge 'dzin/ /rab mnyam
278b2(rgyud): bzhag pas bsgoms na ni/ /byang chub bde bas thob par 'gyur/ /bsams nas de ni rtogs par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so/ /de la
278b3(rgyud): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dam pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ sems dpa' rdo rje snying gar bcings/ /nga yi chung ma khyod sdug pa/ /brtan par gyur cig ces
278b4(rgyud): smras nas/ /phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub bya ste/ /chog 'di yi tshul gyis ni/ /rang gis las rnams ma grub kyang / /gsang ba'i chung ma zhes smras na/ /shin tu dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan
278b5(rgyud): 'das sems dpa' rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs dam pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ ji lta ba bzhin bsgrubs na yang / /dngos grub thob par ma gyur na/ /hUM gis phyag
278b6(rgyud): rgyas bsad na ni/ /skrag ste dngos grub sbyin par byed/ /ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so/ /de bzhin 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi
278b7(rgyud): dngos grub dam pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud de/ ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas kyang / /rdo rje blta bas bltas nas kyang / /bdag gis chung ma'am gzhan chung ma/ /sdug pa'i
279a1(rgyud): @#/ /dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo 'dod pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs dam pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ /
279a2(rgyud): dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la/ /bde ba'i mchog ces smra byed cing / /sangs rgyas kun la nyid dbang po/ /phul na myur du dngos grub 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das nor bu
279a3(rgyud): bzhed pas gsungs so/ /rigs dam pa thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs
279a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ sa ma
279a5(rgyud): ya s+t+waM zhes brjod cing / /bud med kun la chags byas la/ /sems can don gyis mi skyo na/ /nges par sangs rgyas des mnyes so/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
279a6(rgyud): kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ 'dod chags la ni brnyas mi bya/ /bud med kun dang rtse byed
279a7(rgyud): pa| |rdo rje rnams kyi gsang dam tshig / 'di ni bsrung na 'grub par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam
279b1(rgyud): tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ gsod pa 'jig rten thams cad gsod/ /lus dang ngag la dam dgyes pa/ /'jig rten rnam par sbyangs nas ni/ /dam pa'i dngos grub sbyin
279b2(rgyud): pa'o| |zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ dag pa'i bdag
279b3(rgyud): nyid 'dod chags dag / mu stegs rnal 'byor ma dag la/ /dag pa'i bdag nyid dam tshig ni/ /bsrung na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs
279b4(rgyud): kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ /rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdo rje nor bu sngar bcings la/ /ma rungs
279b5(rgyud): rnams kyi nor phrogs na/ /dam tshig dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po ches gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i
279b6(rgyud): rgyud do/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la
279b7(rgyud): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ chos rnams rang bzhin dag par ni/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang / /dgos pa thams cad
280a1(rgyud): @#/ /byas nas kyang / /sangs rgyas pa yi dngos grub 'thob/ /ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos
280a2(rgyud): kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ sems can kun la chags byed cing / /yul la skyo bar ma gyur la/ /bud med dga' ba'i dag pa ni/ /gsang chos dngos grub rab sbyin no/ /zhes bcom
280a3(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje gsang bas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rna ba'i rnal 'byor hUM zhes pa/ /phra ba'i rdo rje ting 'dzin gnas/ /mi 'grungs
280a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor 'di bsad ces/ /rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rjes bsgyel/ /dam pa'i dngos grub sbyin pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshig dam pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+mo
280a5(rgyud): rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gyis/ /bud med kun dang rtse byed cing / /chos kyi dngos grub thob par
280a6(rgyud): 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ dbang po gnyis
280a7(rgyud): ni mnyam sbyar la/ /re ba thams cad yongs bkang nas/ /bud med dam ni sdug pa yi/ /dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po ches
280b1(rgyud): gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dngos
280b2(rgyud): grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran
280b3(rgyud): bsgoms la/ /bud med lus kyi bu gar blugs/ /bud med rnams ni dbang du 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
280b4(rgyud): pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /bu ga nas ni de bzhin zhugs/ /bud med lus su legs khyab byas/ /sems med pa
280b5(rgyud): yang mgu bar 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dgyes pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rdo rje hUM gi phyag rgya ni/ /rab mnyam
280b6(rgyud): bzhag pas bcings nas kyang / /khros nas bu gar zhugs na ni/ /yid kyis de ni dbab par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs
280b7(rgyud): kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ chos kyi las kyi phyag rgya ni/ /bcings nas pad+ma'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /bu gar bcug na bud med rnams/ /thams cad kyang ni bsrung bar
281a1(rgyud): @#/ /'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje pad+ma sa gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ /rdo rje
281a2(rgyud): rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/ /las kyi rdo rje nor bur bcings/ /bu gar bcug na bud med rnams/ /nyid du phab nas gar byed 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo
281a3(rgyud): rje rin po ches gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag rdo rjes de bzhin
281a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dag pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo dag pa'i dngos grub
281a5(rgyud): gsang ba'i rgyud do/ /chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bar ni/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bya zhing / /phyag rgya bud med rnams kyis bskor/ /des ni sangs rgyas gzhag
281a6(rgyud): par bya/ /gsang ba der ni zhugs nas kyang / /sangs rgyas la ni nyid du smra/ /baR+ya he ta paSh+Ta sa ba bi bo da ta swa mAM sarba/ /rigs rnams kun gyi phyag rgya ni/ /tshul
281a7(rgyud): rnams la yang de skad brjod/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyam med pa'i/ /gsang ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
281b1(rgyud): so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bar ni/ /dkyil 'khor
281b2(rgyud): legs par bri bar bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams ni/ /thams cad kyi ni mchog 'tshal te/ /dkyil 'khor du ni zhugs nas kyang / /dngos grub
281b3(rgyud): 'dod pas myur bar ni/ /su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM ho/ badzra s+t+wa Ad+ya sid+d+h+ya mAM/ zhes brjod snying po 'di bzlas te/ /bsgrubs na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/
281b4(rgyud): de nyid bskul ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /mgu nas myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil
281b5(rgyud): 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal 'dra bar ni/ /rdo rje rigs kun rnams kyi ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jug par
281b6(rgyud): yang / /mkhas pas legs par bri bar bya/ /der zhugs nas ni myur ba yang / /dngos grub gsol ba 'debs byed cing / /rA ga twa si saM b+hA ta/ smra na kun
281b7(rgyud): tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM gis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ /pad+ma'i
282a1(rgyud): @#/ /rigs ni thams cad kyis/ /'gro la 'dul ba'i tshul du ni/ /mkhas bas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /der zhugs nas ni brjod bya ba/ /rA
282a2(rgyud): ga d+harma mahA pad+ma pra sid d+ha la ga me bi bo/ /de skad smras nas dkyil 'khor ni/ /kun gyi des ni dngos grub 'thob/ /ces bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang
282a3(rgyud): pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ /nor bu chen po'i rigs rnams ni/ /don kun 'grub
282a4(rgyud): pa'i tshul du yang / /dkyil 'khor legs par bris nas ni/ /zhugs nas 'di skad smra bar bya/ /sarba pri ya sid+d+hi mAM/ rA ga shi sid+d+hi mAM/ sid+d+hi sid+d+hi
282a5(rgyud): mahA s+t+wa/ bcom ldan thams cad grub pa po/ /de skad smras nas dkyil 'khor kun/ /zhugs nas mchod gsang bla med pa'i/ /dngos grub chen po
282a6(rgyud): thob par 'gyur/ /phyin chad dngos grub bdag nyid kyis/ /bsgrub na dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang tshe myur du mi 'grub na/ /de nyid bskul
282a7(rgyud): na 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud
282b1(rgyud): do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di
282b2(rgyud): gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /ta thA ga ta mahA de bi bya/ pri ya sarba su khaM pra ta/ bden
282b3(rgyud): las byung ba'i tshig bden pas/ /bsgrubs kyang de ni ma grub na'o/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
282b4(rgyud): pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin du/ /phyag rgya chen po bcings nas ni/ /'di ni de nyid gsang ba yi/ /
282b5(rgyud): rdo rje tshul gyis 'di smros shig /badzra s+t+wa sa ma ya haM/ twa me baR+ya ti tiSh+Tha/ sarba kA ya mA ma ri shwa ra dza/ badzra gar+b+hes mu ta k+Shi pa/ rdo rje 'gying ba'i lha mo che/ /de
282b6(rgyud): nyid bskul bas chags 'gyur bas/ /lus kun la ni brtan 'gyur nas/ /ji bzhin myur du dngos grub bo/ /ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'gying ba'i bdag pos
282b7(rgyud): gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /sid+d+hi sid+d+hi sa ma ye/ sa ma yo haM taM pri ya mAM/ zhes bskul myur du
283a1(rgyud): @#/ /chags gyur na/ /rab tu yang ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni
283a2(rgyud): pad+ma'i rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /bud d+h+ya bud d+h+ya mahA satwa/ baR+ya ta me a ti pri ya/ ces ni bskul na myur ba yang / /rjes
283a3(rgyud): su chags nas 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud
283a4(rgyud): do/ /sarba karme ma da baR+ya wa ta/ ma me sid d+h+ya d+ha badzri Ni/ rdo rje can gyis bskul myur bar/ /rjes su chags nas 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom
283a5(rgyud): ldan 'das nam mkha' snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub
283a6(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin
283a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /mu stegs can rnams phan gdags phyir/ /ri mo'i phyag rgya'i tshul
283b1(rgyud): du ni/ /sangs rgyas btsun mo rab spa bar/ /shes na rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
283b2(rgyud): kyi dam tshig gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /sems can
283b3(rgyud): kun gyi yid la khyab/ /sems can kun la bde spyin zhing / /sems can kun gyi yab nyid ni/ /dam tshig mchog gi 'dod pa'i mchog/
283b4(rgyud): ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba'i mchog ste rmad che
283b5(rgyud): bar/ /dang ldan shes nas dad byas nas/ /bsgrub dka' ba yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /
283b6(rgyud): de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /chags pas dag pa'i chags bral gyi/ /sems can don gyi yid phyung nas/ /mu
283b7(rgyud): stegs lta bar byas pa ste/ /lta ba ngan pa'i gcong rong ltung / /theg pa che la 'god pa'i phyir/ /gsod pa'i tha tshig mchog yin te/ /de ltar shes na 'grub par
284a1(rgyud): @#/ /'gyur /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mu stegs can
284a2(rgyud): rnams gzhom pa'i phyir/ /'byung ba che las thams cad 'byung / /mi gtsang zhes ni ci phyir brjod/ /nges par dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
284a3(rgyud): can gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ /bud med chags phyir rin chen rnams/ /rtag tu legs par bsag
284a4(rgyud): par bya/ /bud med bla med rin chen zhes/ /bsams nas de ni 'grub par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du mdzad pas gsungs so/ /rigs thams
284a5(rgyud): cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams
284a6(rgyud): cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ bud med
284a7(rgyud): chags rnams yongs bskor la/ /kun nas rtses pa'i bde ba ni/ /sangs rgyas mchod phyir phul na yang / /mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ zhes sangs rgyas
284b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ yang dgas ngal te skyo ba na/ /rab gza' las byung
284b2(rgyud): bde ba de/ /phyag bzhis pos ni mchod pa'i phyir/ /phul na myur du grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzi pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mchod
284b3(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ hUM gi dam tshig bcings nas ni/ /skye bo bud med 'khyud nas ni/ /'khyud par gyur ba'i bde ba de/ /phul na de ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes
284b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM gis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ 'jig rten dbang por bdag bsgoms la/ /sdug pa'i
284b5(rgyud): gdong du bltas nas ni/ /bltas par gyur pa'i bde ba de/ /phul na de yi 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i spyan gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs
284b6(rgyud): kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ las kyi phyag rgya bcings gyur la/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan nas kyang / /bud med 'khyud pa'i longs spyod ni/ /mchod phyir
284b7(rgyud): phul na 'grub par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen gyis gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas
285a1(rgyud): @#/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la
285a2(rgyud): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdzogs sangs rgyas su bdag bsgoms la/ /ci nas sus kyang mi tshor bar/ /gzhan
285a3(rgyud): gyi bud med rtse byed na/ /mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang
285a4(rgyud): ba'i mchod pa'i rgyud de/ rdo rje 'jom byas nas kyang / /rdo rje phreng ba 'ching byed cing / /de nas rdo rje glu blangs la/ /rdo rje gar gyis mchod byas la/ /'dod pa'i dga' bas
285a5(rgyud): dbang bskur mchog / glu dang gar gyi bde ba las/ /bde ba gzhan gyis myong min te/ /de phyir gsang mchog 'di bla med/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i
285a6(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal bsgom/ /cho ga ji bzhin tshul du yang / /gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod na ni/ /mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par
285a7(rgyud): 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsang bas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgyar
285b1(rgyud): gnas/ /gsang pa'i tshul ni ci bzhin par/ /las kyi phyag rgyas rab mchod na/ /mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras
285b2(rgyud): gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ don kun grub pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /gsang ba'i tshul ni
285b3(rgyud): ji bzhin par/ /las kyi phyag rgyas rab mchod na/ /mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi gsang
285b4(rgyud): ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed pa'i gsang
285b5(rgyud): ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de kho na nyid bskyed pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ mdor na ting 'dzin ye shes las//
285b6(rgyud): sems can rnams la chags tshul gyis/ /sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub 'gyur na/ /myur du bla med thob par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs
285b7(rgyud): so| |de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi de kho na nyid chen po bskyed pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ sems can thog ma tha ma med/ /nam mkha' 'byung
286a1(rgyud): @#/ /ba'i mtshan nyid de/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /'dod pa'i 'gro ba kun bdag po/ /sems can kun gyi sems gang ni/ /brtan phyir sems
286a2(rgyud): dpa' zhes bya'o/ /rdo rje mnyam par mnyam gzhag na/ /nges par rdo rje nyid gyur pa/ /sems dpa'i byin rlabs tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur/ /bcom
286a3(rgyud): ldan sems dpa' de nyid de/ /rdo rje bzhad pa de bzhin gshegs/ /nyid sems rab tu rtogs la sogs/ /sangs rgyas byang chub cho ga bzhin/ /de nyid bcom ldan de
286a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs/ /thams cad kyi ni rigs su 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang / tha ma med pa'i sems dpas gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
286a5(rgyud): nyid de/ /de nyid rdo rje'i rigs chen po/ /de nyid pad+ma'i rigs dag pa/ /de nyid nor bu'i rigs kyi mchog/ ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
286a6(rgyud): 'khor los gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad bskyed pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag
286a7(rgyud): na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
286b1(rgyud): rigs kyi mtshan ma mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ bcom ldan sems dpa' de nyid ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' thugs la gnas/ /mnyam par bzhag las ting
286b2(rgyud): 'dzin te/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu bsgrub/ ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'i mngon par brjod
286b3(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ rab tu rtogs phyir rdo rje ste/ /gzung ba'i tshul gyis lcags kyu yin/ /phra mo rtogs phyir mda' yin la/ /mgu bar gyur phyir legs zhes bya/ /
286b4(rgyud): spras pa'i phyir yang rin chen gsungs/ /gzi brjid tshul gyis nyi ma ste/ /rgyal mtshan legs par sgreng bar gsungs/ /'dzum phyir bzhad par grags pa la/ /'dod chags dag phyir
286b5(rgyud): pad+ma yin/ /ral gris nyon mongs dgra gcod yin/ /dkyil 'khor tshul du 'khor lo ste/ /tshig gis brjod pas smra zhes bya/ /rgya gram tshul du kun rdo rje/ /mi tshugs tshul gyis go
286b6(rgyud): cha yin/ /'jigs byed tshul gyis mche ba ste/ /phyag rgya'i tshul gyis bsdams pa'o/ /ji ltar bcom ldan sems rtag pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' kun 'gro ba/ /de bzhin rdo rje mtshan
286b7(rgyud): la sogs/ /bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan mas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi mtshan ma
287a1(rgyud): @#/ /mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi
287a2(rgyud): phyag rgya bcing ba skye ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang
287a3(rgyud): ba'i rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung bcings la/ /lag gnyis rdo rjer bsdams pa las/ /myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'grub 'gyur//
287a4(rgyud): zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud
287a5(rgyud): de| ji ltar rgyal po nyid phyag rgya/ /rgyal po khrims la 'debs pa ltar/ /bdag nyid chen po skye bo rnams/ /sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi/ /gzugs brnyan gyi ni tshul du
287a6(rgyud): yang | |nyid kyi phyag rgya btab pa ni/ /bdag nyid che ba'i phyag rgya cher/ /shes nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya chen pos gsungs so/ /
287a7(rgyud): de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ ji ltar dam tshig dam pa ni/ /skye bo 'gas ni bcings gyur na/ /shin
287b1(rgyud): tu 'da' bar mi bya ba/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/ /dam tshig phyag rgya bcings pa yis/ /rdo rje bcing ba'i mchog bcings na/ /ma shi bar du mi 'da' bar/ /shes nas
287b2(rgyud): dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni chos kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing bskye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i
287b3(rgyud): rgyud de/ mdor na rgyal bas rdo rje'i ngag/ 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te/ /'di ni bcings par shes nas kyang / /des ni chos kyi dngos grub 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo
287b4(rgyud): rje chos kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje las kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rdo rje bka' dang las mang rnams/ /'da' bar
287b5(rgyud): bya ba ma yin zhing / /bka' nyan pa yi las de ni/ /shes na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi phyag
287b6(rgyud): rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas ba gsang ba'i rgyud do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces
287b7(rgyud): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di yang bdag gis yongs su gzung zhing byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas/
288a1(rgyud): @#/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /de bzhin
288a2(rgyud): gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i/ /mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs
288a3(rgyud): so| |rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so/ /rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las/ rigs thams cad kyi rtog pa gsang
288a4(rgyud): ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs so/ / //de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
288a5(rgyud): dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran tshul
288a6(rgyud): gyis| |sangs rgyas chos kyi ting 'dzin ni/ /mnyam bar bzhag pas bsgoms na yang / /bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
288a7(rgyud): pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ chags pas rjes su dran tshul gyis/ /sems dpa' thams
288b1(rgyud): cad ting 'dzin gnas/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni/ /dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin
288b2(rgyud): gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ khams gsum rnam rgyal cha lugs su/ /bsgoms nas mdun dang de bzhin te/ /phyag na rdo rje'i
288b3(rgyud): mthur gyur nas/ /khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi
288b4(rgyud): rgyud de/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i chos su ni/ /bsgoms nas mdun du de bzhin te/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan par/ /'dul bar de ni rab byed ces/ /bcom ldan rdo rje chos kyis
288b5(rgyud): gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ don kun grub pa'i skur yang ni/ /bsgoms nas mdun du de bzhin te/ /rnam pa'i mchog
288b6(rgyud): kun ldan pa yi/ /phun tshogs don ni des 'thob bo/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nor bus gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i
288b7(rgyud): rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so//
289a1(rgyud): @#/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran gyur la/ /rdo rje phra mo tshul gyis ni/ /badzra
289a2(rgyud): badzra zhes brjod na/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
289a3(rgyud): kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin du/ /rdo rje phra mo sgom byed cing / /badzra satwa zhes brjod na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'grub po
289a4(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ khams gsum rnam rgyal cha lugs su/ /
289a5(rgyud): dran byed mdun du de bzhin te/ /hUM hUM hUM hUM zhes brjod na/ /dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM gis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i
289a6(rgyud): rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzugs kyis ni/ /rdo rje phra mo sgom byed cing / /sid d+h+ya sid d+h+ya zhes brjod na/ /dngos grub
289a7(rgyud): dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ don kun
289b1(rgyud): grub pa'i gzugs kyis ni/ /rdo rje phra mo bsgoms nas kyang / /sid+d+h+ya sid+d+h+ya zhes brjod na/ /don gyi dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das nor bu'i chos kyis gsungs so//
289b2(rgyud): rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam
289b3(rgyud): pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ dam pa'i chos
289b4(rgyud): ni yi ge med/ /ting 'dzin ye shes 'byung ba ste/ /a zhes bya bas chos rnams ni/ /skye ba med par dgongs pa ste/ /phyag rgya 'di yi tshul gyis ni/ /shes pas bsgoms te de nas
289b5(rgyud): kyang / |yi ge kun gyi ye shes ni/ /bde gshegs skad cig gis 'gyur zhes/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
289b6(rgyud): gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ de bzhin gshegs kun de nyid kyi/ /mdo sde 'di ni dad pa
289b7(rgyud): yis| |dad nas bcangs sam bklags gyur na/ /dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs
290a1(rgyud): @#/ /kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sdig pa'i sems can phan don du/ sdig can sdig spyod bzlog pa dang / /sangs rgyas
290a2(rgyud): bka' ni srung ba'i phyir/ /bsad pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye
290a3(rgyud): shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'dod chags rang bzhin dag par shes/ /dam pa'i don du dgongs nas kyang / /thog ma tha mar 'di bsgoms na/ /chos kyi dngos grub
290a4(rgyud): thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos mkhyen pa'i dngos grub kyi
290a5(rgyud): rgyud de/ sems can don phyir sbyin byed cing / /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed cing / /chos bsgoms 'di ni nor bu yi/ /rigs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur
290a6(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das chos rin chen gyis gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
290a7(rgyud): chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
290b1(rgyud): gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas kyi ni ting 'dzin las/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrubs pa/ /'di ni bsgom par byas nas kyang / /dngos grub dam
290b2(rgyud): pa thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje
290b3(rgyud): sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /bla med dang ni las mang rnams/ /sems dpa' kun 'gyur thams cad dang / /shes na yang ni grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das
290b4(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sdig pa dag pa rgyu ba'i phyir/ /mtshams med byed las mi
290b5(rgyud): zlogs na/ /gsod pa'i las la dad pa na/ /des ni 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi ting nge
290b6(rgyud): 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sdig kun rnam par dag pa'i bdag /kun dag pas na dgos pa kun/ /des byed las 'di yin no bar/ /shes na yang ni 'grub
290b7(rgyud): par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ srid ldan dbul po thams cad
291a1(rgyud): @#/ /kyi| |rtag tu bsam pa kun bkang la/ /don kun grub pas kun bdag ni/ /grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /ces bcom ldan 'das rin po che rgyal mtshan
291a2(rgyud): gyis gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs
291a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud
291a4(rgyud): de| rtag tu rdo rje phra mo'i tshul/ /'bad pa kun gyi sbyor na ni/ /rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa yi/ /mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
291a5(rgyud): kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ slob dpon ma yin gzhan dang ni/ /slob ma ma yin bu min
