291a6(rgyud): pa'i| |mdun du phyag rgya mi brjod de/ /de dag gsang bas phyag rgya 'grub/ ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi phra mo'i dngos
291a7(rgyud): grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/ /sna nas hUM byung ldan gyur la/ /rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed/ /ces bcom
291b1(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ pad+ma chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje lta bas bltas
291b2(rgyud): na ni| |'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+ma bzhad pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo
291b3(rgyud): rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/ /shin tu phra ba'i lta 'bar bas/ /don ni thams cad 'dren par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nor bus gsungs
291b4(rgyud): so| |nor bu'i rigs thams cad kyi phra mo'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mig
291b5(rgyud): gi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ gang tshe phyag rgya'am ting nge 'dzin/ /sgrub phyir
291b6(rgyud): stsol bar gyur pa na/ /gang tshe mkha' la skar ma 'dra/ /dkar po rgyug par des mthong na/ /de tshe blo ldan sangs rgyas kyi/ /spyan ni bdag gis thob 'gyur zhes/ /phyin chad sangs
291b7(rgyud): rgyas rnams kyis ni/ /rtogs pa kun las bsgrub par bya/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes
292a1(rgyud): @#/ /kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ gnas dang 'gro ba de bzhin te/ /ji snyed dngos po yod 'gyur pa/ /de snyed kyi ni gzugs brnyan rnams/ /mkha' rgyug 'gro ba'am
292a2(rgyud): 'ong yang rung / /mthong na rdo rje spyan dag par/ /shes pas mchod na dngos grub ni/ /bla na med pa thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /
292a3(rgyud): de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ g.yas pa 'am ni g.yon phyogs kyi/ /mkha' la nam mkha'i dbyings nyid ni/ /sprin 'drar myur du 'khor bar
292a4(rgyud): yang | |mig gis mthong bar gyur pas kyang / /rdo rje las byung phyag rgya de/ /mthong nas 'jigs par ma gyur la/ /phyag rgya de ni bzung na ni/ /rdo rje spyan ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /
292a5(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ gang tshe skya 'am dmar ba dang / /dkar ba'am ser ba'am
292a6(rgyud): sna tshogs kyi/ /dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur pa'i tshe/ /dgongs 'gyur 'khor lo'i sbyan 'grub 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje pad+mas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i
292a7(rgyud): rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mkha' la rin chen 'dra ba dang / /gser la sogs ba 'dra bar ni/ /gang tshe mkha' mthong mkha' yi mig /de ni 'grub
292b1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro zhes/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
292b2(rgyud): chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las
292b3(rgyud): dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni/ /'dod chags bde ba rnam smin phyir/ /gtso bo thams cad mchod byas pa/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub
292b4(rgyud): thob par 'gyur/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'dod chags
292b5(rgyud): bdag ces sgo ma byed cing / /gsang ba'i mchod pa rab byas na/ /rdo rje 'dod pa'i gzi can mnyam/ /dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
292b6(rgyud): bzhad pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ khro ba bdag ces sgom byed cing / /gsang ba'i mchod pa rab byas pa/ /khams
292b7(rgyud): gsum rnam rgyal 'dra ba yi/ /dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni chos kyi rigs kyi las
293a1(rgyud): @#/ /dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ nang du song ba'i yid kyi ni/ 'dod pa dam par sgom byed cing / /dbyangs dang ldan pa'i yi ge yis/ /sangs rgyas
293a2(rgyud): mngon par mchod na ni/ /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni
293a3(rgyud): nor bu'i rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje snying por mnyam bzhag la/ /bsam pa g.yos pas btud nas ni/ /phyag la rtag tu brtson byas na/ /dbang
293a4(rgyud): bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbang rin po ches gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas ba'i rgyud de/
293a5(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la
293a6(rgyud): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'dod la sogs pa'i bde ba kun/ /rtag tu bdag gi snying la gnas/ /e ma'o
293a7(rgyud): sems can don rnams la/ /skyob par gyur pa grang bshad rmad/ /'di ni las kyi dam tshig gyi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin du/ /bsgoms nas sangs
293b1(rgyud): rgyas mchod na ni/ /dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi
293b2(rgyud): dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /sems can kun la bde sbyin pa'i/ /kun bzang 'dod pa bdag yin te/ /mchod na
293b3(rgyud): dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'dod pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sems can kun la phan
293b4(rgyud): byed pa'i/ /kun bzang khro bo bdag yin te/ /rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'byor gyis/ /mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni
293b5(rgyud): pad+ma'i rigs kyi las kyi dam tshig gi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ bde ba thams cad rab sbyin pa'i/ /kun bzang 'dod pa bdag yin te/ /bdag nyid 'gro 'dul skur
293b6(rgyud): gnas la/ /mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+ma chags pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos
293b7(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud de/ sems can kun la don chen sbyin/ /kun bzang rgyal po bdag yin te/ /don kun grub pa'i gzugs kyis ni/ /mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes
294a1(rgyud): @#/ /bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/
294a2(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs thams cad kyi las kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /
294a3(rgyud): so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi grub kyi rgyud de/ rang gi ting nger 'dzin pa yis/ /g.yas pa'i mdzub mos mdud nas ni/ /go char bcings te
294a4(rgyud): spyi bor bzhag / shin tu yang ni bsrungs par 'gyur/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi rigs
294a5(rgyud): kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ rtsig pa la ni ldan 'dra ba/ /ri mor bris nas mtshan bsring ste/ /mnyes na bud med gang bsams pa/ /de ni 'di yi dbang du
294a6(rgyud): 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ sa la gnod sbyin
294a7(rgyud): gdong bris la/ /de yi mig gi phyogs su ni/ /mdzub mo'i sen mo btsugs na yang / /bud med mchog ni 'dren par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas
294b1(rgyud): gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ lag pa gnyis su pad+ma blangs/ /'dod chags dag pa lta byed cing / /rdo rje lta bas bud
294b2(rgyud): med de/ /bltas na yang ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+ma 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi
294b3(rgyud): rgyud de/ rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gnas/ /lag pa gnyis kyi nor bu bzung / /hUM zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /bud med kun la 'dud byed do/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
294b4(rgyud): hUM gis gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams
294b5(rgyud): cad kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mchod pa'i
294b6(rgyud): las kyi cho gar sbyar/ /gang dang gang gi dgos bsams pa/ /de dang de ni gsol btab ste/ /mkhas pas phyag rgya bsgrub par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings
294b7(rgyud): kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs ba'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa
295a1(rgyud): @#/ /cho gar sbyar/ /dgos pa gang zhig smras ba de/ /myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni
295a2(rgyud): rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ khro bo'i ting 'dzin zhugs nas kyang / /rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod chen byas/ /mkhas pas cung zad gang bsams
295a3(rgyud): pa| |de ni myur du dngos grub 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khro bos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten
295a4(rgyud): dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /yid kyi mchod pa byas nas kyang / /mkhas pas dgos pa gang bsams pa/ /de yi dngos grub thams cad thob/ /ces bcom ldan 'das pad+ma
295a5(rgyud): 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /bdug pa la sogs mchod byas la/ /
295a6(rgyud): mkhas pas dgos pa gang bsam pa/ /de kun skad cig nyid 'grub 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dgos pa'i
295a7(rgyud): dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgom pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs
295b1(rgyud): so| |de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas rnal 'byor ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/ /sangs
295b2(rgyud): rgyas phyag rgya rab bsgrubs pas/ /dngos grub rnam pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
295b3(rgyud): pa'i rigs kyi sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ kun gyi bdag nyid sems dpa' ni/ /bdag gi lus la gnas pa ste/ /sems dpa'
295b4(rgyud): bdag ces byin brlabs la/ /bdag ces bya ba'i nga rgyal gyis/ /bsgoms na 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po
295b5(rgyud): mngon par 'dus pa'i rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi rdo rje'i byin gyi brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de/ sems dpa' ji bzhin phyag rgya bzhin/ /
295b6(rgyud): phyag rgya ji bzhin bdag de bzhin/ /cho ga 'di yi tshul gyis ni/ /phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i
295b7(rgyud): rigs kyi chos kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de/ chos kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje phra mo bsgoms byas la/ /ngag gi phyag rgyas de dag kun/ /sems
296a1(rgyud): @#/ /dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin/ /ces bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs
296a2(rgyud): kyi las kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas kun la dbang bskur dang / /mchod dang dam tshig dngos grub rnams/ /bcom ldan 'das zhes bsgoms
296a3(rgyud): nas kyang / /rdo rje las rnams bsgrub par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje las kyis gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgom pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /de nas yang
296a4(rgyud): b com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
296a5(rgyud): kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya bi byin no/ /rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i/ /
296a6(rgyud): mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so/ /rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/ /
296a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las brtag pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de bzhin
296b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa/ / //bam po dgu pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes tshigs su bcad pa
296b2(rgyud): 'di gsungs so/ /lta ba ngan cing chags bral la/ /gsang ba 'di ni mi rigs te/ /sems can kun la phan don du/ /de bzhin cho ga bshad par bya/ /de nas yang byang chub
296b3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa
296b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi rigs kyi yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de la 'di ni snying po'i yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud yin te/ dkyil 'khor chen po mthong nas/ bdug pa
296b5(rgyud): dang | mar me dang / me tog dang / dri'i phyag rgya rnams kyis mchod pa byas te/ de nas rdo rje tshig gis bzlas pa brtsam par bya'o/ /de la 'di ni bzlas pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i
296b6(rgyud): rgyud de/ zla ba bzhir gnas ji bzhin par 'dug ste/ dus bzhir bdug pa la sogs pas cho ga bzhin du mchod nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po
296b7(rgyud): mngon par rtogs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod de/ /phyag rgya bzhis phyag bya ba'i tshul gyis phyag byas la sngags 'di bzhis
297a1(rgyud): @#/ /bdag gi lus dbul zhing mchod pa bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzo ba s+tha nA ya/ At+mA naM nir+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ oM sarba
297a2(rgyud): ta thA ga ta pU dzA a b+hi She kA ya At+mA naM ni r+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA pra brta nA ya At+ma naM ni r+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra
297a3(rgyud): d+harma pra brta ya mAM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA karma ni At+mA naM ni r+yA ta ya mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karma ku ru mAM/ de nas 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang ma
297a4(rgyud): b ral la kha zas kun dang 'dod pa kun la nye bar spyod cing bdag nyid snying po'i don du sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan mdun du tshig tsam gyis kyang bsgoms la ci dga'
297a5(rgyud): bar byed cing rdo rje tshig gis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na myur bar dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /ci ste bla na med pa'i
297a6(rgyud): dngos grub 'dod na ni de nas ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni dbus na bzhugs/ de'i sems dpa' chen po bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du kha
297a7(rgyud): dog dang | rgyan rnams ci dga' bar bya ste bri zhing / sems dpa' chen po rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs la rigs kyi lha mo rnams grwa rnams su gri'o/ /de
297b1(rgyud): nas ri mo'i sku gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher byas la 'dzab bya ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du zla ba bzhi'i bar du bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas mthar mchod pa rgya cher byas la mtshan thog thag
297b2(rgyud): bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas nam langs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
297b3(rgyud): 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /yang na phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na ni des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi phyag
297b4(rgyud): rgya'i spyan sngar ci dga' ba bzhin du ji lta ba bzhin bcings shing dkrol te/ rdo rje'i tshig 'bum bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas mthar mtshan thog thag ngal mi gso bar cung zad tsam
297b5(rgyud): zhig phyag rgya bkrol te/ ji lta ba bzhin bcings nas bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya 'bar zhing 'bab la 'phar zhing nyung bar smra bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyag rgya bcings bzhin du
297b6(rgyud): nam mkha' la lding bar 'gyur ro/ /gzugs ci dga' ba dang / mi snang ba dang / las thams cad kyang byed par 'gyur ro/ /bcings ma thag tu phyag rgya thams cad kyis kyang las
297b7(rgyud): thams cad ji lta ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /yang na ting nge 'dzin bsgrub par 'dod na ni des rdo rje phra mo nas brtsams
298a1(rgyud): @#/ /te| ting nge 'dzin de gang la dga' ba'i snying po'i rnal 'byor gyi tshul du zla ba bzhi'i bar du bsgoms la/ de nas mthar mtshan thog thag skyil mi krung /
298a2(rgyud): mi zhig par snyoms par zhugs te 'dug par bya'o/ /de nas nam langs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro//
298a3(rgyud): de nas ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /ci ste las sgrub par 'dod na'ang de bzhin du bzlas shing zla ba
298a4(rgyud): gcig gi bar du bsgrubs la/ de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas las thams cad kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das
298a5(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /ci ste las shig bya bar 'dod na yang lan gcig brjod pa tsam gyis bdag dang / gzhan dang / grong dang / grong khyer rnams go cha bcing ba
298a6(rgyud): la sogs pas bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ /dbab pa'ang bya ste tsan+dan dri zhim pos gdon gyis zin pa dang / gdon gyi ma zin pa rnams rdo rje dang / lcags kyu dang / lag
298a7(rgyud): pa dang / mda' thogs pa dang / rin po che dang / nyi ma dang / rgyal mtshan dang / so'i phreng ba dang / pad+ma dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / lce dang / rdo rje rgya gram dang /

298b2(rgyud): du rdo rje bcug ste bcings la/ de nas rma bya'i mjug sgro de sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgyas mnan la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya babs kyi
298b3(rgyud): bar du bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas rma bya'i mjug sgro las gzugs sna tshogs pa la sogs par snang bar 'gyur te/ de phyin chad rma bya'i mjug sgros rang gi lus la cho ga bzhin du
298b4(rgyud): gzugs thams cad kyang ston te/ mjug sgro de nyid la lan gcig bzlas te bskor bas kyang / bdag nyid las gzugs thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mjug sgro de nyid
298b5(rgyud): kyis 'jig rten pa'i sgyu ma'i las rnams kyang ston/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzugs brnyan yang ston/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
298b6(rgyud): c ad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis bdud sde dang bcas pa rnams 'dul ba la sogs pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rol pa

299a3(rgyud): dgos/ ci ste 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos bsgrub par 'dod na'ang des dang po kho nar de bzhin du zlo sa shing zla ba gcig tu brgyad stong bzlas la
299a4(rgyud): de nas mthar phyag rgya bcings te/ de bzhin du mtshan thog thag phyag rgya 'bar gyi bar bzlas par bya'o/ /de phyin chad phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi dngos

299a7(rgyud): pa bzhin du yi ge 'bru 'bum bzlas par bya'o/ /de'i mthar mtshan thog thag tu bzlas ba byas la de phyin chad sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang / chad pas
299b1(rgyud): bcad par nus par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /don te sgrub par 'dod na'ang / des ji lta ba bzhin du ri mo'i sku gzugs bris la/ des de
299b2(rgyud): b zhin du mchod pa byas nas zla ba gcig tu 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing ci dga' ba bzhin du byas nas brgya stong du bzlas bar rdus bzhir rdo rje'i tshig gis zlo sa shing zla ba'i

299b5(rgyud): 'dzin gyis 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o/ /gang gi tshe ngas khyod tshur shog 'di byos shig/ ces bsgo ba de'i tshe na khyod 'dir 'ongs la nga'i bka' bzhin byos shig/ de phyin chad
299b6(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag por 'gyur te/ yud tsam gyis kyang sa gsum pa thams cad la ci dgar bka' stsol cing bskor te slar 'ongs nas kyang phan gdags
299b7(rgyud): pa dang / chad pas bcad pa rnams byed cing lha rdzas kyi 'jig rten gsum longs spyod la nye bar spyad nas ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du byed cing lha thams cad kyi dbang po'i bud
300a1(rgyud): @#/ /med la sogs pa bud med thams cad mgu bar byas nas/ nye bar spyod kyang de la su gang gis byas kyang gnod par byed nus pa med de/ hUM zhes bya bas lha
300a2(rgyud): la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad gnon cing de nas bskal pa chung du'i stong gi bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /ci ste phyag
300a3(rgyud): rgya bsgrub par 'dod na yang ji lta ba bzhin du bzlas pa byas la bzlas pa'i mthar rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/ mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o//
300a4(rgyud): de nas nam langs pa dang phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas hUM zhes bya ba dang ldan par ji lta ba'i cho ga bzhin du phyag rgya bcings na nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / gzugs
300a5(rgyud): rnams ston pa dang / mi snang par 'gyur ba dang / sgyu ma rnams ston pa dang / thams cad la dbab pa dang / dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / thams cad kyi dga' ba
300a6(rgyud): bskyed par bya ba dang / rin po che thams cad bsdu ba dang / 'od zer 'bar ba chen po bstan pa dang / rin po che'i char 'bebs par bstan pa dang / gad mo cher bgad
300a7(rgyud): pa dang / sems can thams cad spyad pa dang / bcad pa dang / dbye ba dang / dus kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / ji lta ba bzhin pa'i de kho na nyid brjod pa dang / las
300b1(rgyud): thams cad la 'jug pa dang / bsrung ba dang / rmongs pa dang / gnon pa dang / dgag pa dang / bsngags pa dang / bsang ba dang / sems can thams cad phyag rgya gdab pa dang / 'dod
300b2(rgyud): pa'i dga' ba la 'jug pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / dngos po thams cad glu len du gzhug pa dang / gang byed du gzhug ba dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang /

300b4(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin du bsgom zhing de bzhin du bzlas pa'i tshul gyis zla ba gcig tu bsgrub par bya ste/ de nas mthar ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyis mtshan gcig thog thag bzlas
300b5(rgyud): par bya'o/ /de nas nam langs pa dang mngon par shes pa lngar gyur nas sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang / tshar gcad pa nus par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan
300b6(rgyud): 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /ci ste las bsgrub par 'dod na de bzhin du zlo ba gcig tu bsgrub la de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/ /de
300b7(rgyud): nas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de nas las rnams byed par 'dod na yang lan gcig brjod de yid kyi
301a1(rgyud): @#/ /bsam pas bsrung ba la sogs pa las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i rigs kyi yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de nas pad+ma'i
301a2(rgyud): rigs kyi yo byad dang / chog rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang por 'bum bzlas pa byas na bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bsgrub par bya ste ras la bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams
301a3(rgyud): cad 'dul ba la sogs pa bris pa de'i phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor bzhi'i tshul du sems dpa' chen po bzhi bris la grwa rnams su lha mo rnams bri'o/ /de nas bzlas pa'i cho ga de
301a4(rgyud): bzhin du rgyas par byas la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bar byon te/ dus ji bzhin par dam pa'i skabs
301a5(rgyud): 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /ci ste phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na'ang des de bzhin du pad+ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la stong phrag brgyad
301a6(rgyud): tshang bar brjod pa'i bar du dus bzhir bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu phyag rgya bcings te/ bzlas pa byas la nam langs pa dang dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /
301a7(rgyud): de nas phyag rgya bcings pas ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bar byed do/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /ci ste ting nge 'dzin
301b1(rgyud): gyi tshul du bsgrub bar 'dod na yang de bzhin du zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu ji ltar dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas nam langs pa dang ting nge 'dzin
301b2(rgyud): thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so/ /ci ste las bsgrub par 'dod na'ang de bzhin du bzlas la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig
301b3(rgyud): thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /pad+ma'i rigs kyi yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa
301b4(rgyud): rdzogs so/ / //de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag rnam bzhi
301b5(rgyud): byas la 'bum bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin du ras la bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i tshul du bris la/ de nas de bzhin du mchod pa
301b6(rgyud): byas te/ de bzhin du bsgrub la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas nam langs pa dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang
301b7(rgyud): bskur ba'i rin po che byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po byon nas dbang bskur ba sbyin pa mdzad do/ /dbang bskur ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
302a1(rgyud): @#/ /der rig 'dzin gyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /ci ste phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin
302a2(rgyud): du chos kyi rdo rje ma'i tshul rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu'i phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrub na bsam pa thams cad kyi las byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas
302a3(rgyud): gsungs so/ /ci ste nor bu ye shes bsgrub par 'dod na 'ang de bzhin du rin po che 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin rim pa bzhin tu bsgom par byas te/ dngos po med pa'i nam mkha'
302a4(rgyud): l as rin po che ji ltar 'byung ba rin po che las byang chub sems dpa'i sku ji ltar 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dus bzhir bsgoms la ji ltar gong du smos pa bzhin
302a5(rgyud): du bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas zla ba'i mthar ting 'dzin de nyid kyis mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas nam langs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
302a6(rgyud): byon nas ci dga' ba bzhin du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ /de nas las sgrub pa bshad de/ de bzhin du bzlas
302a7(rgyud): la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas nam langs pa dang bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//
302b1(rgyud): de nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /nor bu'i rigs kyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bsgrub pa'i yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang por snying po thams cad kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa bshad do/ /snying po bsgrub
302b2(rgyud): par 'dod na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub par gyur cig ces brjod la snying po ci dga' bar bzlas shing bsgrub pa'i cho ga bya'o/ /de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i yo byad dang / cho
302b3(rgyud): ga ste/ phyag rgya thams cad bdag la dga' bar gyur cig ces smras la dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te/ ci dga' bar ci nus kyis bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas ci lta ba bzhin du
302b4(rgyud): dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa ste/ spros pa med pa'i tshig grub par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
302b5(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin bdag la skye bar gyur cig ces smras la sngags ci dga' bar bzlas pa byas te 'di ni dngos grub bo/ /de la 'di ni rig pa'i yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa ste/ kye ma sems
302b6(rgyud): can 'di dag thams cad ni mi rag pas ldongs par gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rig pa rtogs shing sdom par gyur to/ /zhes smras la rig pa ci dga' bar
303a1(rgyud): @#/ /bzlas shing bsgrub par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de nas snying po dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya dang
303a2(rgyud): rig pa thams cad ji ltar bsgom pa nyid du rdo rje bzlas pa'i chog rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ sems dpa' gang gi snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig pa
303a3(rgyud): rnams bzlas pa'i don du bsgrub par bya ba de ni bdag gam sems dpa' bsgoms na bsgrub par bya ba 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas
303a4(rgyud): gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bzlas pa'i chog rgyas pa rdzogs so/ /de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di lta ste/ de la dang
303a5(rgyud): po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs kyi dngos grub ni 'di lta ste/ nor 'grub pa'i dngos grub dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub dang / rig 'dzin nyid du 'grub pa
303a6(rgyud): dang | dngos grub chen po rnams so/ /de la nor 'grub pa ni 'di yin te/ gang na gter yod par dwogs pa der phyag rgya bcings la rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyis gter gyi gnas
303a7(rgyud): der rdo rje blta bas lta ba na/ ci ste rdo rje lta bu yang bar mthong na don gter yod par shes par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje lcags sgrog gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te sa brkos
303b1(rgyud): la ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du blangs na rtsod pa med par thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub
303b2(rgyud): ba yin te/ phyag rgya gang sgrub par byed na badzra sid+d+hi zhes brjod par bya'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub ni rnam pa bzhi yod de/ de ni 'di ltar chu'i steng nas phar 'gro zhing 'dug pa
303b3(rgyud): la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi gzugs ston pa dang / ji srid du dga' ba de srid du mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang
303b4(rgyud): dpag tshad stong gi steng du lding ba dang / 'og tu 'gro zhing 'ong ba dang / phyogs thams cad du dpag tshad stong du ci dga' bar song la bskor te slar 'ong pa dang / dpag tshad
303b5(rgyud): stong khor ra khor yug gi sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa shes pa dang / dngos po thams cad mig gis mthong zhing rna bas thos pa dang / phyogs thams cad du dpag tshad
303b6(rgyud): stong khor yug na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad ci dga' bar 'phang du blangs te 'dug pa dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig la sogs ba'i dbyig thams cad dang /
303b7(rgyud): nor thams cad phrogs nas kyang sus kyang chung zad kyang brgal mi nus te/ bdag gi rdo rjes kyang mi thub par 'gyur na gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ skyes bu stong phrag
304a1(rgyud): @#/ /bcu bsdoms pa'i stobs dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu nad med pa dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu 'dod pa thams cad la longs spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu
304a2(rgyud): dar la bab cing lha'i gzugs dang ldan pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing rdo rje'i dngos grub bla na med pas mchod pa byed
304a3(rgyud): cing lo stong phrag bcu bzhi'i bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dngos grub kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rig
304a4(rgyud): 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub pa yin te/ phyag rgya bsgrub pa na rdo rje rig 'dzin ces brjod la 'grub pa dang / rdo rje rig 'dzin gyis 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur te/ 'dod pa thams
304a5(rgyud): cad la longs spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skad cig gis bskor te/ slar 'ong zhing bde ba thams cad la yongs su spyad pa dang / lo bco brgyad
304a6(rgyud): pa'i na tshod dang ldan pa dang / skra 'khyil ba dang ldan pa dang / rdo rje chen po'i rig 'dzin du gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje sems dpa' thams cad
304a7(rgyud): mthong zhing bskal ba chen po'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig 'dzin gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni
304b1(rgyud): dngos grub chen po 'grub pa yin te/ bdag nyid phyag rgya'i snying po don du bdag nyid kyis phyag rgya bsgrubs na sems dpa'i gzugs su gyur nas skad cig gcig gis kyang phyogs
304b2(rgyud): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gzugs sna tshogs kyis bya ba sna tshogs bye dpa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpar bcas pa thams cad mthong nas
304b3(rgyud): r nam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pas yang dag par mchod nas sems can ma lus zhing lus pa med pa rnams kyi don byas
304b4(rgyud): nas slar 'ongs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'dod pa thams cad dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad la spyod
304b5(rgyud): cing rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por gyur nas tshe'i tshad ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i bskal pa chen po'i tshad du 'gyur ro/ /
304b6(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs kyi dngos grub chen pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub ste/ de yang 'di ltar khams gsum
304b7(rgyud): las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub dang / dbang thams cad kyi dngos grub dang / bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub dang / dngos grub dam pa rnams so/ /de la 'di ni
305a1(rgyud): @#/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub yin te/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings la dbang phyug chen po rkang pa
305a2(rgyud): g.yon pas mnan te bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas gzugs de skad 'byin pa dang / hUM zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o/ /hUM zhes brjod pa tsam gyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig
305a3(rgyud): rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams sgrub pa'i mdun du bka' nyan cing dbang du 'gyur ro/ /de phyin chad 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi
305a4(rgyud): bdag po rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur te/ nam mkha' la 'gro zhing 'jig rten gsum po 'khor lo thams cad kun tu bskor te/ slar 'ongs nas lha ma rungs pa la sogs
305a5(rgyud): pa sems can thams cad hUM zhes bya bas 'dul bar byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i gzugs dang ldan pas 'jig rten gsum
305a6(rgyud): p o thams cad la bka' stsol cing rdo rje sems dpar bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong nas mnyes par byed cing lo stong du 'tsho bar byed par 'gyur
305a7(rgyud): ro| |bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes byed pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni dbang thams cad kyi dngos grub ste/ phyag rgya bsgrub ba na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
305b1(rgyud): kyi dbang bskur ba'i rin po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas dang por bdag nyid dbang bskur la bsgrub par bya ste/ de nas grub pa dang / dbang rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te/ rdo rje'i dbang dang / rin
305b2(rgyud): po che'i dbang dang / chos kyi dbang dang / las kyi dbang rnams so/ /de la rdo rje'i dbang thob na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /rin po che'i dbang
305b3(rgyud): thob na rin po che thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi dbang gis ni chos thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /las kyi dbang gis ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las thams
305b4(rgyud): cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad kyi
305b5(rgyud): dngos grub ste/ de yang 'di ltar rtag tu gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba
305b6(rgyud): dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad kyis gsungs so/ /
305b7(rgyud): de la 'di ni dngos grub dam pa ste/ de yang ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag mnyam mo zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di dag ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi
306a1(rgyud): @#/ /dngos grub rnams te/ de ni 'di ltar mnyes par bya ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / bsrung ba dang / pad+ma'i dngos grub rnams so/ /de la mnyes par bya
306a2(rgyud): ba'i dngos grub ni 'di yin te/ ji ltar pad+ma 'dod pa bsgoms na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa sems can thams cad mnyes par byed nus par 'gyur
306a3(rgyud): ro| |bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug rjes su dran par byas na sems can thams cad dbang du byed nus par 'gyur ro/ /byams pas 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'gro
306a4(rgyud): pa thams cad bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab nus par 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid pad+ma'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la pad+ma lag par blangs te bsgrubs na 'jig rten dbang phyug
306a5(rgyud): gi gzugs dang ldan pa dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan zhing lo stong phrag bzhir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
306a6(rgyud): kyi pad+mas gsungs so/ /de la 'di dag ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub rnams te/ de yang 'di ltar rigs thams cad kyi dbang gi dngos grub dang / gzi brjid chen po dang /
306a7(rgyud): bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang rin po che'i dngos grub rnams so/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi dngos grub ni 'di lta ste/ nyid kyis
306b1(rgyud): dbang dbul ba dang / mar me dbul ba dang / ci nus kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / rin po che bsgrub pa'i dngos grub 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs
306b2(rgyud): pa thams cad mchod na ring po mi thogs par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po ches gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi
306b3(rgyud): thun mong pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so/ / //de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das thog
306b4(rgyud): ma dang / tha ma med pa'i sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la dang po kho nar ni snying po thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten 'dul ba ji lta bar/ /de 'dra bar ni dngos grub
306b5(rgyud): 'dod/ /de yi thabs ni phyag rgya ste/ /dngos grub chen po kun sbyin no/ /de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten 'dul ba chags bral min/ /phyag rgya'i
306b6(rgyud): dngos grub chags las skyes/ /de yi thabs ni bsgom pa ste/ /dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni sngags kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ bden las
306b7(rgyud): 'jig rten 'di nyams pas/ /sngags kyi dngos grub thob mi 'gyur/ /spros pa med pa'i thabs kyis ni/ /dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni rig pa thams
307a1(rgyud): @#/ /cad dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /ma rig mun chags 'di la ni/ /rig pa'i dngos grub yod min te/ /de yi thabs ni rgya che ba/ /dngos grub kun gyi mchog
307a2(rgyud): thob bo/ /rtog pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de
307a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so/ /de la dang po kho nar ni snying po thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mchod pa rnam bzhi byas nas
307a4(rgyud): ni| |bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te/ /bsod nams med kyang sangs rgyas mchod/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i bsod nams kyi
307a5(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ dam tshig gsang ba bsrungs na ni/ /bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te/ /bsod nams med kyang myur bar ni/ /dam tshig bsrungs na myur du
307a6(rgyud): 'grub/ /de la 'di ni sngags kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas mtshan la sogs brjod na/ /bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te/ /bsod nams
307a7(rgyud): med kyang myur bar ni/ /chos sbyin pas ni dngos grub 'thob/ /de la 'di ni rig pa'i bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ bsod nams nang na sbyin pa mchog/
307b1(rgyud): byin na bsod nams thob 'gyur te/ /spyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs na/ /myur du sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub/ /rtog pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /de nas
307b2(rgyud): rtog pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so/ /de la dang po kho nar
307b3(rgyud): snying po shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ yi ge a la 'jug byed cing / /yi ge thams cad rnam bsgoms la/ /rang gi kha nas gzhan zhal du/ /bsgoms na bsod nams
307b4(rgyud): thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dpal gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/
307b5(rgyud): shes rab nges 'bigs zhes bya ba/ /ting nge 'dzin ces grags pa ste/ /des ni phyag rgya myur 'grub par/ /bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das
307b6(rgyud): shes rab mchog gis gsungs so/ /de la 'di sngags kyi shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ shes rab sgra yi rjes 'brang ba/ /ting 'dzin tshig ni rab spros pa/ /de
307b7(rgyud): bsgoms na ni myur ba yang / /sngags kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje blos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rig pa'i shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi
308a1(rgyud): @#/ /rgyud de/ rig dang sngags dang khyad par du/ /khyad par yod pa ma yin te/ /shes rab bsgoms na myur bar ni/ /nges par dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /
308a2(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes kyis gsungs so/ /rtog pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi chog rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /
308a3(rgyud): de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la dang po kho nar snying po thams cad
308a4(rgyud): tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mchod pa thams cad rab byas na/ /dge ba yi ni chos rnams kyi/ /tshogs ni rnam phar 'phel 'gyur te/ /de nas tshogs ni 'grub par
308a5(rgyud): 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'khor lo mang por zhugs pa dang / /dkyil 'khor mang por bris pa'i phyir/ /tshogs rdzogs pas na
308a6(rgyud): phyag rgya rnams/ /dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni sngags kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rjes su yi rang la sogs tshul/ /de bzhin dam pa'i
308a7(rgyud): chos bklags dang / bzlas pa mang po byas nas ni/ /nges par sngags kyi dngos grub 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni rig pa'i tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ ma rig rab
308b1(rgyud): tu slangs pa dang / /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin tshul las/ /tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs nas kyang / /myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /rtog pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas ba'i
308b2(rgyud): rgyud rdzogs so/ / //de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rigs thams cad kyi mtshan ma byung ba'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud
308b3(rgyud): 'di gsungs so/ /de la ji ltar rdo rje 'byung zhe na/ /de nyid bcom ldan sems dpa' ste/ /thams cad sems de nyid bdag po/ /sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje ni/ /sems dpa'
308b4(rgyud): brtan pa rang byung gi / sems dpa' kun gyi mchog sems dpa'/ /rdo rje snying gar rab bsgoms na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes grags te/ /'di la rdo rje rab tu gnas/ /de nyid
308b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni/ /ye shes tshul te mnyam med 'od/ /snying las sna tshogs byung nas ni/ /sna tshogs pa yi gzugs gyur te/ /khams gsum kun gyi rdul snyed du/ /
308b6(rgyud): de dag nyid ni rgyal ba yin/ /rdo rje'i sku ni de rnams las/ /rdo rje sems dpar yang dag 'gyur/ /sems dpa' dang po de nyid las/ /mtshan ma thams cad yang dag 'byung //
308b7(rgyud): mtshan ma las ni sems dpa' che/ /de las tshul 'di thams cad 'byung / /gang gis 'di ni thos gyur la/ /dad cing 'dzin byed snying gar yang / /rtag tu dga' bas bsgoms
309a1(rgyud): @#/ /na ni| |de ni myur du grub pa thob/ ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dang sa gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid 'byung ba'i ye
309a2(rgyud): shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje rtog pa thams cad 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la dang
309a3(rgyud): po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi rtog med pa'i/ /ye shes rtag pa nyid gyur pa'i/ /mi rtog
309a4(rgyud): pa yi ye shes las/ /brtags pas rtog pa zhes brjod do/ /de la 'di ni bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ mi rtog gang la rtog bdag
309a5(rgyud): nyid| |brtags pas rtog pa byung ba ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /de phyir rtog pa zhes brjod do/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi rgyud de/ mi rtog gang la rtog bdag
309a6(rgyud): de| cho ga bzhin du ri mor bris/ /rtog pa grub sbyin zhes brtags pa/ /rtog las bral ba'i bdag nyid kyis/ /de phyir rtog pa zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs
309a7(rgyud): kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ rtog pa las ni 'dod chags 'byung / /pad+ma la ni de gnas te/ /de phyir rtog la gnas pa ni/ /grub pa nyid du de 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di
309b1(rgyud): ni nor bu'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ rtog pa med pa'i nor bu ni/ /mthu yis shin tu mchog tu 'gyur/ /de ltar rnam par mi rtog pas/ /lha rdzas dngos grub
309b2(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i rgyud do/ /de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi snying po 'byung ba'i ye
309b3(rgyud): shes kyi rgyud de/ yid kyis 'dod pa'i chog yis/ /yid kyis 'dod pa grub 'gyur te/ /ting 'dzin sgrub pa snying la gnas/ /de phyir snying po zhes brjod do/ /de nas rtog pa thams
309b4(rgyud): cad kyi phyag rgya 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ ji ltar rgyal po'i phyag rgya mchog/ khrims ni 'da' ka mi phyed bzhin/ /bdag nyid chen po gzugs brnyan gyis/ /mtshan ma
309b5(rgyud): phyag rgya zhes par grags/ /de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi spags 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ 'da' bar bya ba ma yin zhing / /dbye ba dka' las gsang ba nyid/ /gsang
309b6(rgyud): ba grub phyir brjod pas na/ /de yi phyir na sngags zhes brjod/ /de nas rig pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ ma rig pa ni gzhom pa dang / /dag gi rig mchog 'grub pa'i
309b7(rgyud): phyir| |rtogs shing rig pa'i dngos grub ste/ /de phyir rtog pa zhes brjod do/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /rtog pa thams cad kyi snying po la sogs
310a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud do/ /de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud de/ de la dang po/ kho nar snying po'i ye shes skye ba'i rgyud yin te
310a2(rgyud): snying po bzlas te bdag gam ni/ /gzhan yang rung ste byung ba na/ /byung dang 'byung 'gyur gang gis ni/ /mthong zhing thos 'gyur shes par bya/ /de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i ye
310a3(rgyud): shes 'byung ba'i rgyud yin te/ bdag gis cho ga ji bzhin du/ /gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya bcings/ /'jig rten pa la bltas na ni/ /gong ma bzhin du kun shes 'gyur//
310a4(rgyud): de la 'di ni sngags kyi ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud yin te/ lan gcig tsam yang sngags brjod na/ /'das dang 'byung dang byung gang yin/ /rang gi lce la smra 'gyur ba/ /de
310a5(rgyud): dag thams cad bde par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rig pa'i ye shes skye ba'i rgyud de/
310a6(rgyud): rig pa lan gcig brjod na ni/ /byung dang 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur rnams/ /ji ltar rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du/ /yid kyis de ni shes par 'gyur/ /rtog pa thams cad
310a7(rgyud): kyi ye shes skye ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs so/ / //de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong gi gsad pa'i sku dang / thugs rdo rje'i phyag
310b1(rgyud): rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud yin no/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi sku'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa yin te/ ji ltar de ltar 'dug nas kyang / /skyil mo krung bcas bsgrub bya ste/ /ji
310b2(rgyud): ltar ri mo'i tshul byas nas/ /sems dpa' chen po grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems da pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i
310b3(rgyud): phyag rgya sgrub pa yin te/ ji ltar ri mo'i tshul du ni/ /brkang bskum tshul du gnas byas te/ /shin tu khros nas sgrub byas na/ /the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom
310b4(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi gsad pa'i sku'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud yin te/ rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas la/ /lag gnyis rdo
310b5(rgyud): rje bcings nas kyang / /ting nge 'dzin gyi skur gyur la/ /pad+ma 'byung ba bsgrub par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs
310b6(rgyud): kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa yin te/ ji ltar 'dug gam nyal ba'am/ /'chag kyang rung ste de ltar ni/ /rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur na/ /the tshom med par 'grub par
310b7(rgyud): 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsungs gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ lce rtse shin tu
311a1(rgyud): @#/ /mi bsgul zhing / /so dang mchu gnyis sbyar nas ni/ /rtog pa thams cad bsgrub bya zhing / /sgra bral rdo rje'i tshig yin no/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
311a2(rgyud): gsung gis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ /hUM zhes bya ba 'brug sgrar bsgrags/ /khro bo'i ngag ni zab cing bstan/
311a3(rgyud): rdo rje chen po khro bo'i gsal/ /rdo rje khro bo'i gsung 'grub bo/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi
311a4(rgyud): phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ dbugs mi 'byin ltar dbugs 'byin cing / /phra ba'i tshig ni shin tu gsal/ /ting 'dzin ye shes snying po yis/ /zlos pa po rnams grub
311a5(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang
311a6(rgyud): ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ shin tu yongs su gsal tshig gis/ /rtag tu 'dud la brtson byed cing / /tshul 'di bzlas par gyur na ni/ /myur du
311a7(rgyud): thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
311b1(rgyud): kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ rtag tu 'dod pa bcom ldan 'das/ /sems can thams cad bde sbyin pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid du/ /bsgoms na
311b2(rgyud): myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'dod pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ /sems can kun la
311b3(rgyud): phan pa dang / /ma rungs pa rnams gdul ba dang / /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir/ /khro bo dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
311b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ ji ltar pad+ma rab chags la/ /bgos pa'i
311b5(rgyud): skyon gyis mi gos pa/ /de ltar bdag gis chags skyon yang / /srid na chags pa de 'grub 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+ma bzhad pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni
311b6(rgyud): nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ nam zhig sems can thams cad kyi/ /dgos pa'i don ni kun sgrub cing / /rin chen char ni 'bebs
311b7(rgyud): 'gyur zhes/ /grub na myur bar de 'grub bo/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo
312a1(rgyud): @#/ /rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ ji ltar langs sam 'dug pa'am/ /'chag kyang rung ste de ltar ni/ /lag pa g.yon pas phyag rgya mchog /thams
312a2(rgyud): cad byed na 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba phyag rgya rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang
312a3(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ de lta de ltar gnas nas kyang / /ji lta ji ltar byed kyang rung / /rdo rje khro bo mdzub mo bcings/ /gos kyis g.yogs na 'grub par 'gyur//
312a4(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i rgyal pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud
312a5(rgyud): de| lag pa g.yon pas pad+ma yi/ /khu tshur bcings te sbas nas ni/ /ji dgar myur du pad+ma yi/ /dngos grub kyang ni thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu
312a6(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ g.yon pa'i rin chen khu tshur ni//
312a7(rgyud): bcings te dam pa'i lag g.yogs la/ /ci dga' par ni rim gror byed/ /rin chen dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos
312b1(rgyud): gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i thun mong gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ rang gi sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du ni/ /rdo rje
312b2(rgyud): dag dang rdo rje'i lta/ /ring por mi thogs mchog 'grub bo/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi
312b3(rgyud): gsang ba'i sku dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
312b4(rgyud): bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ rtog pa 'di byin gyis brlab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ de nas yang de
312b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas yang legs so zhes bya ba 'di byin no/ /rdo rje'i theg pa bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsang / /theg pa chen po
312b6(rgyud): mngon 'dus pa'i/ /mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so/ /rdo rje las ni khyod
312b7(rgyud): legs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las/ rgyud thams cad kyi phyi ma'i phyi ma'i rgyud rdzogs so// //de nas byang chub sems dpa'
313a1(rgyud): @#/ /sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad po 'dis gsol ba btab bo/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi sems
313a2(rgyud): dpa' che/ /sems can don mchog bdag nyid can/ /shAkya'i rgyal po ye shes che/ /rdo rje bdag nyid khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sems dpa' 'byung ba de nyid don/ /sems can rgyu
313a3(rgyud): ste tshul chen po/ /sems can don chen dgos pa'i don/ /sems dpa' sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas chos ni chos chen po/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba/
313a4(rgyud): smra ba chen po rab rig mchog /sems dpa' chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /las chen bsrung ba chen po ste/ /las rnams thams cad rab bsgrub pa/ /bdag nyid chen po 'gro
313a5(rgyud): spyod mchog / sems dpa' rgyu khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /pha rol phyin pa kun brnyes pa/ /kun mkhyen ye shes mkhyen pa po/ /sems dpa' kun te thabs chen po/ /shes rab
313a6(rgyud): chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /thugs rje chen po mchog gi mchog /thugs rje thugs rje'i bdag nyid can/ /thams cad gtong ba byams pa che/ /kun mdzad khyod la phyag
313a7(rgyud): 'tshal lo/ /shAkya seng ge shAkya che/ /shAkya shAkya thub pa che/ /'dul ba chen po khyab pa po/ /'gro don 'dul mchog khyod phyag 'tshal/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam
313b1(rgyud): brnyes pa/ /chos dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ /rdo rje mgon po mgon chen po/ /sems can tshogs ni khyod phyag 'tshal/ /'od chen snang ba chen po ste/ /brtson 'grus
313b2(rgyud): chen po stobs chen po/ /dpa' bo chen po rab dpa' mchog /bde spyod dpa' bo khyod phyag 'tshal/ /tshangs pa rang 'byung bcom ldan 'das/ /shAkya dpa' bo thub pa che/ /kun
313b3(rgyud): bdag thub pa dag pa yi/ /chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha'i sku ste sku yi mchog /sku gsum sku min sgom pa po/ /kun gyi sku ste sku che ba/ /rdo rje'i sku khyod phyag
313b4(rgyud): 'tshal lo/ /gsung min gsung ste gsung gi mchog /gsung gsum gsung min ston pa po/ /gsung kun shin tu gsung che ba/ /rdo rje'i gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems
313b5(rgyud): min sems te sems kyi mchog / sems gsum sems min ston pa po/ /thams cad sems te sems che ba/ /rdo rje sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdor min rdo rje rdo rje'i mchog /rdo rje
313b6(rgyud): gsum pa rdor min spyong / /rdo rje thams cad rdo rje che/ /rdo rje rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ /kun khyab srid pa'i rtse mo mchog /bde gshegs bdag po rgyal ba ni/ /khams gsum pa yi rgyal
313b7(rgyud): po che| |snang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni/ /gang gis skad cig nyan byed dam/ /klog gam yang na sgom pa'ang rung / /kun gyis sangs rgyas
314a1(rgyud): @#/ /nyid thob 'gyur/ /mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /thugs rje chen po bskyed nas kyang / /chos kyi 'khor lo rab
314a2(rgyud): tu bskor/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bka' stsal ba'i tshig gsan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
314a3(rgyud): thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ yang gcig tu 'du bar mdzad par gsol/ de nas yang de bzhin
314a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar
314a5(rgyud): 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi
314a6(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi mdun du rdul phra mo thams cad ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas
314a7(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur te/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /rtag par 'jig rten thams
314b1(rgyud): cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul bar sna tshogs pa'i/ /rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing
314b2(rgyud): t hams cad kyi rdul phra mo thams cad ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyis rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor
314b3(rgyud): lo thams cad rab tu bskor bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /rtag
314b4(rgyud): par 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i/ /khro bo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu de
314b5(rgyud): b zhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra mo thams cad ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal pas
314b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos
314b7(rgyud): tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul bar sna tshogs pa'i/ /pad+ma'i 'khor lo rab tu
315a1(rgyud): @#/ /bskor/ /de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su bcom
315a2(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rgyal pos pad+ma'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying
315a3(rgyud): pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /rtag par 'jig rten thams cad tu/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul bar sna tshogs pa'i/ /nor bu'i
315a4(rgyud): 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can phra ba'am/ spom pa'ang rung / de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin
315a5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad ri rab ri'i rgyal po rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdan la
315a6(rgyud): bzhugs nas rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad rab tu bskor bar phyogs kun nas mthong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes
315a7(rgyud): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /mi yi nang du babs nas kyang / /dgos phyir sems can kun gyi don/ /rdo rje'i 'khor lo mchog bskor zhing / /mgon po
315b1(rgyud): rab tu bsgrub par mdzod/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
315b2(rgyud): pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'du bar mdzad du gsol/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
315b3(rgyud): kyi thugs su zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
315b4(rgyud): rdo rjer bdag nyid du gyur par mkhyen nas phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyang nga'i thugs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rigs
315b5(rgyud): thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs su zhugs shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de
315b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gnang nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /mdor na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ /zhugs nas sems
315b7(rgyud): can thams cad la/ /phan pa'i phyir ni bsgrub par bya/ /de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi kham
316a1(rgyud): @#/ /thams cad na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed bzhugs pa rnams las/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi
316a2(rgyud): rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i sku 'phro ba mdzad pa rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po
316a3(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku thams cad dang / gsung thams cad 'jug pa'i gnas dang / sems
316a4(rgyud): kyi rgyud 'byung ba thams cad dang / rdo rje'i tshul thams cad dang / yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang / gnas thams cad dang / mtshan thams cad dang / dpe
316a5(rgyud): byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i khung bu thams cad dang / rdul shin tu phra mo snyed kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / thugs rnams su zhugs nas bzhugs
316a6(rgyud): so| |de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon pa zhig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
316a7(rgyud): rdo rjer de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid gyur par mkhyen nas/ ri rab ri'i rtse mo nas snying po byang chub gang na ba der gshegs nas ched du bcom ldan
316b1(rgyud): 'das kyi byang chub kyi shing drung du 'jig rten pa dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir rtswa blangs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sems can brtan pa yi/
316b2(rgyud): /sems can don ni bdag don mchog /gang phyir gdul dbang brtan pa rnams/ /mu stegs lta la gnas par mdzad/ /mdor na mi 'dul 'jig rten pa/ /lta ba ngan pas ldongs ba rnams//
316b3(rgyud): ye shes snang bas dag bya'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la de kho na nyid mi shes pas 'di skad
316b4(rgyud): du| kye dge sbyong / ji byang chub kyi phyir 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal drag cing mi bzad pa la bzod par mdzad dam zhes gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rtswa de bting ste/
316b5(rgyud): steng du bzhugs nas lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /grogs po rnams/ kho bos byang chub thob par sgrubs shig /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi
316b6(rgyud): b com ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don ma rtogs nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gang na bder dong nas ched du lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la de ltar gyur pa 'di
316b7(rgyud): brjod do/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi tshogs kyis bskor te/ gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po la
317a1(rgyud): @#/ /de ltar gyur pa 'di dag brjod do/ /de nas tshangs pa chen po 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha thams cad dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gsum
317a2(rgyud): po thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po la de ltar gyur pa rnams brjod do/ /de nas 'jig rten gsum pa mtha' dag gi bdag po dbang phyug chen pos lha rnams kyi bdag
317a3(rgyud): po mthu bo che la sogs pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dang
317a4(rgyud): mthun par mdzad cing / yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ston gyis/ 'di ltar 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no snyam du shes par
317a5(rgyud): ma byed cig / lha nyid las de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur gyis/ lha de dag nyid du bsgrub par bya yi/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du ni ma yin no/ /de legs kyi nge
317a6(rgyud): mchod pa la 'dong bar sgrub bo/ /de nas lha thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa snying po byang chub gang na ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
317a7(rgyud): gshegs pa'i snying por byang chub bar bzhugs pa gang na ba der dong nas ched du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la
317b1(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ ran gyi gdan 'di las bzhengs la/ lha rdzas kyi gdan la bzhugs te/ bla na med
317b2(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mdzad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bdag po de dag la 'di skad ces bka'

317b4(rgyud): 'das/ bdag cag gis byang chub rtsol bar mi nus so/ /ci ste bdag cag gis nus par gyur na bdag cag nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas
317b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid gsal bar mdzad cing yang tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /de ni gzugs min gzugs min min/ /bden min brdzun min gtsang ba
317b6(rgyud): yi| |sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di/ /rtogs na rgyal ba nyid du 'gyur/ /de nas lha'i dbang po de dag gis cung zad cig cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur to/ /de nas bcom
317b7(rgyud): ldan 'das rtswa'i gdan las bzhengs te/ lha de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /grogs po rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di lta bu rtogs par bya ba sgrubs
318a1(rgyud): @#/ /shig /de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rngo mi thog go /de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de nyid la bzhugs bzhin du tshigs
318a2(rgyud): su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /yid kyis rab tu rtogs pas na/ /byang chub sems ni brtan par byos/ /sems dpa' rdo rje brtan byas la/ /sangs rgyas su ni bdag sgoms
318a3(rgyud): shig |de dag gis 'di skad du de lta bu legs so/ /zhes bya ba thams cad kyis smras nas dong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan mo de'i tho rangs 'jig rten dang
318a4(rgyud): mthun par bya ba'i phyir bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par sangs rgyas nas sems can gyi khams
318a5(rgyud): ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad la phan par mdzad pa 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje rang gi thugs la zhugs pa la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'das mngon par bstod do/ /rdo rje
318a6(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /theg pa chen po'i bdag nyid che/ /snang ba che zhing dag pa che/ /mgon chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje rgyal po rdo rje che/ /rdo rje de bzhin
318a7(rgyud): gshegs pa kun/ /sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus che/ /thabs chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje 'dod pa dag pa che/ /kun gyi bde ba bde ba che/ /bde mchog thog
318b1(rgyud): ma tha ma med/ /bzhad chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje legs pa dgyes pa che/ /legs zhes bya ba rab mnyes pa/ /mnyes pa tshe zhing dgyes pa che/ /rab dgyes khyod la
318b2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje rin chen rgyal po che/ /dbang bskur bzang po bdag po che/ /rin chen thams cad mdzes pa che/ /rnam rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje gzi brjid
318b3(rgyud): gzi brjid che/ /'od chen lham pa chen po ste/ /rgyal ba'i 'od de 'bar ba che/ /sangs rgyas 'od khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan dpal che ba/ /rgyal mtshan che bas nor
318b4(rgyud): rab gtong / /nam mkha'i rgyal mtshan yu ba che/ /gtong ba'i mtshan khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje bzhad pa bzhad pa che/ /dgyes pa che zhing rab dgyes pa/ /dgyes pa'i shugs kyis
318b5(rgyud): rol cing dgyes/ /chos dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje chos ni chos che ba/ /sems dpa'i chos ni rab sbyor ba/ /sangs rgyas chos te chos rab mchog /'dod chos khyod
318b6(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje rnon po ral gri che/ /shes rab ye shes blo gros che/ /sdig gcod ral gri chen po ste/ /sangs rgyas mtshon khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje rgyu ste 'khor
318b7(rgyud): lo che| |sangs rgyas 'khor lo gter chen po/ /dkyil 'khor kun te chos kyi mchog /chos kyi dkyil 'khor khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje gsung ba gsung ba che/ /spros med yi
319a1(rgyud): @#/ /ge chen po ste/ /yi ge med pa bzlas pa che/ /sangs rgyas gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje las te las rab mchog /las chen las rab byed pa ste
319a2(rgyud): gsang ba'i mchod pa mchod pa che/ /sangs rgyas mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje srung ba go cha che/ /go cha'i mchog ste brtan pa che/ /srung ba che zhing snying po che/ /sangs
319a3(rgyud): rgyas brtson 'grus phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin khro bo che/ /ma rungs thams cad skrag byed pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen te/ /bsrung ba mchog khyod phyag
319a4(rgyud): 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje bsdams pa phyag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig chen po bcing ba che/ /khu tshur chen po phyag rgya che/ /rdo rje khu tshur khyod phyag 'tshal/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phyag bya
319a5(rgyud): zhing | |brjod de mchod de bsti stang bya/ /gang phyir thog ma tha ma med/ /byang chub sems ni khyod yin te/ /khyod la brten na rgyal ba dang / /dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa'
319a6(rgyud): kun| |byung zhing yang dag 'byung 'gyur bas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi rgyu/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje chos
319a7(rgyud): khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje las ni khyod phyag 'tshal/ /yang dag par ni phyag 'tshal zhing / /mtshan mchog gis ni khyod bstod pa'i/ /bsod nams gang yin de kun
319b1(rgyud): kyang | |sangs rgyas byang chub thob par shog / mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/ /rab dad pas ni lan gcig tsam/ /gang gis legs par brjod pa ni/ /kun kyang sangs rgyas nyid du
319b2(rgyud): 'gyur/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu
319b3(rgyud): 'dus te/ gsung gcig tu legs so zhes bya ba de byin no/ /rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i/ /mdo 'di
319b4(rgyud): legs par bshad pas na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so/ /rdo rje las ni khyod kyang legs/ /bcom ldan
319b5(rgyud): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpar dam bcas pa rang gi thugs la zhugs pa thams cad dgyes

319b7(rgyud): bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rgyud nye bar bsdus pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so/ / //rgyud 'di la 'gyur byang mi snang na'ang / paN+Di ta shrad+d+hA ka ra war+m+ma dang / bod kyi
320a1(rgyud): @#/ /lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur bar grags so// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra shi kha ra mahA gu h+ya yo ga tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/
320a2(rgyud): gsang ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje rtse mo/ oM| kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
