320a6(rgyud): mgon po khyod ni skal chen te/ /khyod ni bya ba don sems byed/ /gsang ba mkhyen cing dgongs bshad mkhyen/ /rnal 'byor rig pas mchog gyur gsungs/ /de
320a7(rgyud): nyid rjes kyi de nyid ldan/ /rnal 'byor bdag nyid rnal 'byor che/ /rdo rje chen po byang chub sems/ /gsungs shig gsungs shig tshul chen po/ /rigs kyi dkyil
320b1(rgyud): 'khor 'khor lo ste/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor sna tshogs bdag /gsang ba'i snying po dkyil 'khor che/ /chos kyi tshul ni sgrub byed pa/ /rtog pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi/ /chos kyi don 'di ci
320b2(rgyud): yin brjod/ /'dir ni rtog pa ji lta bu/ /sgrub pa'i don ni ji ltar lags/ /ci phyir 'di ni rgyud phyi ma/ /rgyud don ci yin brjod par bgyi/ /ci phyir rgyud dang phyi ma lags/ /rgyud kyi don
320b3(rgyud): ni ji ltar byung / /rdo rje 'chang drag 'di ci zhig /drag po'i don ni ji ltar byung / /rdo rje zhi ba 'di ci zhig /ci yi phyir na zhi bar brjod/ /phyag na rdo rje ci yi phyir/ /rdo rje gtum po'ang
320b4(rgyud): ci zhig lags/ /ci yi phyir ni gtum por brjod/ /ci yi phyir na khro bor brjod/ /rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsungs pa/ /ci phyir rdo rjer brjod par bgyi/ /rdo rje 'chang zhes gsungs 'di ci/ /de
320b5(rgyud): yi rdo rje ji lta bu/ /rdo rje 'chang ba rnams ni du/ /rdo rje rigs kun gang gi lags/ /chen po gnas gang zhig na gnas/ /rigs ni rnam pa du yin brjod/ /ci yi phyir na rigs su brjod//
320b6(rgyud): rigs bdag rang bzhin 'di ci zhig /ci yi phyir na sems dpar brjod/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam pa du/ /ci phyir rdo rje sems dpa' lags/ /rdo rje rgyal po ci yin brjod/ /rdo
320b7(rgyud): rje chags pa 'di don ci/ /rdo rje legs pa ci yin brjod/ /rdo rje rin chen ci yi phyir/ /rdo rje gzi brjid ci yin brjod/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan bzhad pa tshe/ /gsungs shig ci yi
321a1(rgyud): @#/ /brjod pa gsungs/ /ci yi phyir na rdo rje chos/ /rdo rje rnon po ci yin brjod/ /rdo rje rgyu ni 'khor lo che/ /rdo rje smra ba ci yin brjod/ /rdo rje las dang gnad
321a2(rgyud): sbyin che/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po che/ /rdo rje srung ba khu tshur che/ /gsungs shig ci yin brjod par gsungs/ /sems dpa' 'di rnams gang las byung / /de bzhin pa dang ma
321a3(rgyud): ni gang / /dang po gang zhig gleng gzhi gang / /dmigs pa'i rkyen ni gang zhig lags/ /gsang ba 'di ni gang las byung / /khyab bdag 'di rnams gang nas byung / /thog ma
321a4(rgyud): tha ma med 'di ci/ /gsang ba'i dbang phyug chen pos gsungs/ /rab tu dga' nyid rab bzang nyid/ /rdo rje snying bdag ji lta bu/ /ci yi phyir na kun tu bzang / /de bzhin rdo rje
321a5(rgyud): rdo rje 'chang / /dang po'i rigs ni ji ltar byung / /chos kun skye ba med pa dang / /'byung ba ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' ci yin brjod/ /ci phyir sangs
321a6(rgyud): rgyas brjod par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ci yin brjod/ /bcom ldan 'das bcom ci yin brjod/ /de bzhin ston pa'i ston pa ci/ /ci yi phyir ni ye shes brjod/ /
321a7(rgyud): shes rab ye shes ci yin brjod/ /ci phyir shes rab brjod par bya/ /de bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin/ /tshul ni ci zhig ting 'dzin gang / /bsam gtan rnal 'byor
321b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor ci/ /srid gsum 'jig rten gsum don ci/ /ci yi phyir yang khams gsum pa/ /'khor ba'i don ni ci zhig yin/ /mya ngan 'das pa'ang ci yin brjod/ /rtag dang 'jig
321b2(rgyud): dang de bzhin dag / theg pa chen po ci yin brjod/ /nam mkha' yang ni ci yi phyir/ /sa nyid kyang ni ci yin brjod/ /'byung ba chen po gang las 'byung / /'gog pa ci zhig gang gis
321b3(rgyud): byed| |ci yi phyir na phyag rgyar brjod/ /ci phyir sngags su brjod par bya/ /ci yi phyir na rig sngags brjod/ /de bzhin kho nar gzungs sngags rnams/ /phyag rgya yi ni mtshan nyid
321b4(rgyud): gsungs/ /sngags kyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya/ /rig sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid gsungs/ /de bzhin kho nar gzungs sngags rnams/ /phyag rgya yi ni mtshan nyid
321b5(rgyud): ltar bcing ba thub chen po/ /phyag rgya dag ni 'ching ba na/ /ji ltar rdo rje can kun mnyes/ /rig sngags ji ltar bzlas par bgyi/ /thub pa chen po de gsungs shig /rig sngags
321b6(rgyud): dag ni zlos pa ni/ /ji ltar yid kyi rdo rje bzlas/ /dri ba'i tshogs mdor bstan pa 'o/ /oM ni ci zhig yin par bshad/ /yi ge hUM ni ci yin brjod/ /ci yi phyir na yi ge phaT/ /
321b7(rgyud): swAhA zhes pa ci yin brjod/ /mchod par ci phyir brjod par bya/ /de bzhin dam tshig shes nyid kyang / /ci yi phyir na dkyil 'khor yin/ /dkyil 'khor dang por zhugs pa yi/ /
322a1(rgyud): @#/ /skyes pa yang na bud med kyis/ /bya ba gang zhig bya ba ni/ /gsungs shig gsang ba'i dbang phyug che/ /thub pa'i dkyil 'khor zhugs pa la/ /
322a2(rgyud): sdom pa ji ltar sbyin par bgyi/ /de yis srog gi phyir yang ni/ /dor bar mi bya gang zhig lags/ /khrus kyi las ni ji ltar bya/ /de bzhin kho nar phyogs bcing ba/ /bgegs
322a3(rgyud): rnams bcing ba dang bcas pa'i/ /log 'dren ji ltar bskrad par bgyi/ /dga' ba chen po ji lta bur/ /rab tu gus bcas phyag dag bgyi/ /spos dang me tog de bzhin
322a4(rgyud): du| |mar me mchod sogs ji ltar lags/ /dkyil 'khor brtag pa ji lta bur/ /gzhug pa yang ni ji ltar lags/ /dam tshig ci zhig yin par bshad/ /rdo rje slob
322a5(rgyud): ma'i cho ga gang / /sngon du bsnyen pa ji ltar bgyi/ /sgrub pa'i don ni ji ltar lags/ /gsang ba'i rnal 'byor ji lta bu/ /snyoms 'jug ji lta bu zhig lags/ /mdun
322a6(rgyud): du dgug pa'i don ni ji ltar lags/ /'dir ni rjes su chags pa'ang ji lta bu/ /bcing bar bya ba'i las ni ji lta bu/ /'dren pa rnams ni mnyes par ji ltar 'gyur/ /ji
322a7(rgyud): ltar 'dir ni gshegs su gsol ba lags/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni ji ltar gdeg par bgyi/ /'gro ba'i bya ba yang ni ji ltar bgyi/ /las kyi cho ga'i bya ba ji ltar
322b1(rgyud): bgyi| |dge ba stug po gsang chen ji lta bu/ /las rnams tha dad bya ba ji lta bu/ /phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lan ni ji ltar bgyi/ /mchod dang mchod pa'i lan ni ji ltar blang / /
322b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'khor lo ji ltar 'byung / /'khor lo'i rnam pa'i bye brag du zhig mchis/ /dngos dang dngos med ji ltar spang pa lags/ /bla ma gsang byung 'od zer gsang
322b3(rgyud): ba ci| |sbyin sreg rnam pa du ru brjod/ /thab khung ji lta bu zhig lags/ /sbyin sreg mdor bsdus ji lta bu/ /las rnams ji ltar 'byung ba la/ /las rnams rnam pa du ru
322b4(rgyud): brjod/ /gsang ba rnams ni rnam pa du/ /mchog tu gsang ba ji ltar brjod/ /de nyid ji lta bu zhig lags/ /phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya ci/ /mchod pa'i phyag rgya ji ltar lags//
322b5(rgyud): rigs kyi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /ji ltar bsgrub bya shin tu bsgrub/ /rdo rje phra mo ji ltar brjod/ /bgegs ni ji ltar bsal bar bgyi/ /mdor na rig pa 'dzin pa
322b6(rgyud): dang | |slob dpon ji lta bu zhig lags/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang ldan pa'i/ /'khor lo rnam pa du ru brjod/ /dngos grub mtshan nyid sgrub byed pa'i/ /sna tshogs
322b7(rgyud): rtog pa ji lta bu/ /thig rnams brtag pa nyid dang ni/ /dngos grub ji ltar nye bar brjod/ /dngos grub tshogs ni ji lta bu/ /gsang ba kun nas btus pa gsungs/ /bdag
323a1(rgyud): @#/ /nyid la ni dbang bskur bar/ /bya ba'i cho ga ji lta bu/ /yang na gzhan dag nyid la ni/ /dbang bskur ba ni ji ltar lags/ /ji ltar sems ni bskyed
323a2(rgyud): par bgyi/ /ting 'dzin ji lta bu zhig lags/ /de nyid rig pa 'di rtag tu/ /rdo rje ye shes ji lta bu/ /gzhan yang dgongs pa ji lta bu/ /spyod pa ji lta bu zhig lags/ /gang yang
323a3(rgyud): rung ba'i rtags las byung / /ming dang ming min shes pa'i mtshan/ /las 'bras med par byed po dang / /'byin par byed pa gang las bshad/ /lus ni nam mkha' bzhin
323a4(rgyud): 'byung ba/ /gang las 'byung bar brjod par bya/ /ci yi phyir na thar par brjod/ /rnal 'byor pa don ci yin brjod/ /rdo rje dbyings ni skyed byed pa'i/ /rdo rje phra mo'i rnal
323a5(rgyud): 'byor gang / /gzhan yang rang gi rigs dag las/ /rnal 'byor brtul zhugs ji ltar rtsom/ /mdor na dbang du bya ba dang / /de nyid gsang ba gang zhig lags/ /theg
323a6(rgyud): pa chen po mngon bsdus pa'i/ /gsang ba rtog chen las gsungs pa/ /dgongs pa rnam pa du ma yis/ /gsang ba gsungs shig blo gros che/ /rnal 'byor rnam pa du ru
323a7(rgyud): brjod/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung du/ /ji ltar rtsa ba'i rgyud du brjod/ /gsang ba'i rigs byung ji lta bu/ /nga ni rang byung nyid yin te/ /khams gsum 'jig rten sa 'og
323b1(rgyud): dang | |sa steng sa bla mya ngan 'das/ /ji skad bshad pa'i gsang ba gzhan/ /rdo rje can nyid khyab 'jug rang nyid yin/ /nyi ma zla ba gshin rje drag po nyid/ /rang nyid skye dgu'i bdag
323b2(rgyud): ste pha ma yin/ /'gal ba'i tshig ni ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /dri ba'i tshogs gnyis pa mdor bstan pa'o// //tshangs pa 'jig rten gsum lus dbang phyug
323b3(rgyud): che| |gdong drug tshogs bcas lha'i rigs dkyil 'khor rnams/ /gzhan yang bza' dang tshogs sogs gang yin pa/ /nga bdag nyid ces ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /nga ni 'dod pa
323b4(rgyud): thar pa dang / /nga ni dmyal ba'i dmyal ba pa/ /nga ni yi dwags dud 'gro bdag /tshig de ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /de nas gzhan yang 'dod la chags sems ldan/ /lta bcas tshig
323b5(rgyud): ldan 'dzin pa'i lta la chags/ /mu stegs theg dman mngon dga' skye dgu'i rigs/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin don rnams rtog byed cing / /ji skad bshad pa'i sna tshogs rigs
323b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor/ /dag pa'i chos kyi 'byung gnas dgongs mi shes/ /rang gi 'dod pas mu ngan rtog byed pa/ /de la skye dgu'i bdag chen brtse bas gsungs/ /mchod 'os chen
323b7(rgyud): po mchog dang ldan pa'i gnas/ /gsang ba'i dbang mchog mngon bsdus dbye bar gsol/ /skye dgu'i bdag po'i dkyil 'khor gsang mdun du/ /dam tshig mchod
324a1(rgyud): @#/ /pas ji ltar mchod par bya/ /'dod yon lngar bcas rol par byed pa yis/ /dngos grub tshogs mchog chen po thob par 'gyur/ /dman pa'i 'dod
324a2(rgyud): las rigs kyi dngos grub 'byung / /'gal ba'i tshig dag ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin b+ha ga ji ltar rtags ci 'dra/ /de yi 'jug pa yang ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /rdzas de
324a3(rgyud): dag ni ji ltar rab tu bsgrub/ /'jig rten gsum na dman pa ji ltar 'gyur/ /de nas 'dod chags zhen las dngos grub thob/ /'dod chags dag phyir de ni ji ltar rung / /
324a4(rgyud): chags bral sdig pas chags dang bral ba la/ /gsang pa bstan pas sdig dngos ji ltar 'gyur/ /gtor mas bsod nams mchog thob ji lta bu/ /skye dgu bsad pas
324a5(rgyud): bsod nams ji lta bu/ /ma byin blang pas bsod nams 'gyur zhes pa'i/ /'gal ba'i tshig dag ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /dga' ba chen po'i bud med bsten pa yis//
324a6(rgyud): tshe 'di la ni sangs rgyas mchog 'grub pa/ /mi gtsang 'dod pa bsten pas sangs rgyas dang / /rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung bar ji ltar 'gyur/ /'dir ni brdzun dang mtshungs
324a7(rgyud): pa'i bsod nams med/ /ji ltar brdzun ni bsod nams ldan par brjod/ /'dir ni sems can gzhan bsad bza' bar bya/ /'gal ba'i tshig ni ji ltar rung bar
324b1(rgyud): 'gyur/ /'khor ba spangs kyang chos min 'gyur ba dang / /mya ngan 'das la gzhol ba chos ma yin/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor gyi ni rjes 'jug pa/ /chos min 'gyur zhes ji ltar
324b2(rgyud): rung bar 'gyur/ /dregs dang ser sna sdang ba'i sems ldan pa/ /chos min spyod cing brdzun pa'i tshig la chags/ /srid gsum mngon par chags pas rnal 'byor sgrub/ /'dod
324b3(rgyud): pa'i 'dod chags bcas pas lhag par rgyal/ /rigs kyi rnal 'byor las byung ji ltar 'grub/ /bla med go 'phang dngos grub 'dod pa yi/ /dag cing ngo mtshar rnal 'byor lhur
324b4(rgyud): blang bya/ /sbyor gcin 'thung dang bshad ba za ba yis/ /dag cing mchog gyur rnal 'byor dngos grub 'dod/ /mi gtsang bshang gci zos shing 'thung ba yis/ /yid 'dod dngos
324b5(rgyud): grub ji ltar dngos grub 'dod/ /bud med bcas par lhan cig chos spyod cing / /gnyis ka lhan cig gyur pas dag gtsang mchod/ /ji ltar bud med lhan cig dkyil 'khor
324b6(rgyud): mchod/ /dngos grub dam pa mchog tu ji ltar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang rdo rje rigs 'byung kun ldan zhing / /mchog tu mi bzad drag po'i las can te/ /dag cing shin tu sdug la
324b7(rgyud): mtho bar 'gro/ /'gal ba de ni ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang brdeg dang gsad pa lhur len cing / /bskrad dang drag po'i las can de dag ni/ /dag cing shin tu
325a1(rgyud): @#/ /sdug la mtho bar 'gro /'gal ba de ni ji ltar rung ba yin/ /gzhan yang bza' dang btung ba lhur len cing / /snying 'byin pa yis dag par 'dod pa nyid//
325a2(rgyud): de ni dag cing sdug la mtho bar 'gro /'gal ba de ni ji ltar rung ba yin/ /gzhan yang nor bu rin chen 'phrog pa yis/ /sdug cing bstan la dag cing mthor 'gro dang / /gzhan
325a3(rgyud): yang nga rgyal ser sna lhur len pas/ /dag par 'gyur ba nyid ni 'gal ba yin/ /gzhan yang las kyi rig pa byung ba yis/ /mi dge ba yi las rnams thams cad bya/ /'khrig
325a4(rgyud): sogs las kyi ze tshogs rnam mang po'i/ /las byed pa ni ji ltar skyon mi 'gyur/ /gzhan yang brdzun tshig de bzhin 'khrig pa yis/ /dag 'dod 'phags pa min pas
325a5(rgyud): gsang ba yi/ /rgyal ba'i dbang chen 'dod pas bdud rtsi ltar/ /sdug cing mthor 'gro ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /kye mgon khyod ni dag pa'i chos kyi tshogs te khyod ni rtag tu
325a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor 'gyur/ /kye mgon khyod ni dgyes chen bdud rtsi 'chad pa dam chos gsang ba'i 'byung gnas te/ /kye rgyal khyod ni dri med nyi ma bzhin du mi shes kun tu sbyong
325a7(rgyud): mdzad pa/ /khyab byed rgyal ba'i ngang tshul 'jig rten gsum gyi 'dren chen byang sems dga' ston kye/ /mdor bsdus pa'o// //kun mchog thams cad rig
325b1(rgyud): pa ste| |kun mkhyen dri ma gsum spangs pa/ /byang sems sangs rgyas rgyal po che/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid ni/ /ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas kyang / /phyogs rnams
325b2(rgyud): kun tu gzigs mdzad de/ /thub pas mgon rnams rab btud nas/ /sangs rgyas kun la 'di skad gsungs/ /kye ma'o rnam dag ye shes bdag /kye ma'o sangs rgyas nyer thob
325b3(rgyud): pa| |kye ma'o gar mkhan 'khor lo 'di/ /rang gi ye shes 'dri bar byed/ /rtog pa thams cad kun bsdus pa'i/ /mchog tu gsang ba bshad par bya/ /shin tu rnyed dka' dam
325b4(rgyud): pa yi| |rin chen sgrom gyi kha dbye bya/ /bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi/ /rgyal mtshan dam pa bsgreng bar bya/ /rin chen sgrom gyi kha phye nas/ /shes rab kyis ni snang bar bya/ /de nas gsang
325b5(rgyud): ba mchog gyur ba/ /dam pa yang dag bshad par bya/ /bya ba bsgrub pa'i thabs chen po/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang / /gsang ba'i bye brag 'byed byed cing / /rnal 'byor dgongs
325b6(rgyud): pa rnam par dgrol/ /de nyid dam pa shes byed pa'i/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang / /rdo rje rnal 'byor cho ga dang / /'khor lo'i rnal 'byor cho ga ste/ /mchog tu gsang ba zhes
325b7(rgyud): bya de'i/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang / /dus gsum khyab pa'i bya bar ldan/ /gsang ba rnal 'byor kun 'byung zhing / /bya ba kun gyi thabs chen gyi/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus
326a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa dang / /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor cho gar ldan/ /rdo rje chos ni rab 'jug pa/ /sku gsum zhes bya gsang chen gyi/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang / /rdo
326a2(rgyud): rje rnal 'byor cho gar ldan/ /ma rungs thams cad 'dul byed pa/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes bya ba'i/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang / /chos kyi rnal 'byor cho gar ldan/ /
326a3(rgyud): pad+ma gar mkhan skyed byed pa/ /'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang / /sbyin pa bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /rin chen 'khor lo skyed byed cing / /byang chub
326a4(rgyud): sems dpa' yid ches byed/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen po/ /sna tshogs gar mkhan skyed byed pa/ /las kyi rnal 'byor cho ga yi/ /
326a5(rgyud): rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang / /de nyid shes shing dgongs pa shes/ /tshul chen mchog ni shes byed cing / /mchog gi dang po sangs rgyas mchog /rtog pa thams cad bsdus
326a6(rgyud): pa ste| |go rims bzhin du 'jug byed pa'i/ /gcig par sems can bya ba byed/ /bya ba chen po mchog zhi ba/ /chos dang longs spyod mchog gyur pas/ /sangs rgyas gar
326a7(rgyud): mkhan 'khor lo ni/ /mchog tu ngo mtshar gyur pa 'di/ /skal ba ji bzhin gsang ji bzhin/ /ji ltar sems can 'dul 'gyur bshad/ /sngon 'gyur 'das pa'i dus su ni/ /
326b1(rgyud): byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin cing / /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ /spro ba chen pos ngo mtshar che'i/ /dka' ba dpag tu med pa spyad/ /go
326b2(rgyud): rims bzhin du de yis ni/ /dbang bskur bar du legs thob 'gyur/ /shes rab chen pos sa mthar phyin/ /gos kyi dbang ni thob gyur nas/ /'og min stug po nyams dga'
326b3(rgyud): bar| |blo gros chen po bzhugs par gyur/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas mchog 'gyur zhes/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bsams nas ni/ /bya ba mthar phyin bdag gis ni/ /sems can
326b4(rgyud): don 'byung thob bya zhes/ /bya ba de la dgongs nas ni/ /sngon dang phyi mar bde chen med/ /chos kyi dga' ba rmad chen po'i/ /dka' ba spyad par bya snyam ste/ /byang chub shing drung
326b5(rgyud): bzhugs gyur nas/ /bya dka'i bya ba kun ldan de/ /dbugs 'byung rdub pa 'gog pa dang / /sems dpa' med cing g.yo ba med/ /lus ni gang yang mi 'gul zhing / /yan
326b6(rgyud): lag bskyod par mi byed de/ /de bas g.yo ba med chos la/ /yun ring du ni gnas par gyur/ /phyogs bcu yi ni thub dbang po/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis dgongs 'gyur ba/ /
326b7(rgyud): 'di ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub dus/ /sdug bsngal bya bar rigs pa min/ /de bas bdag cag kun lhan cig /bskul bar bya phyir 'gro snyam du/ /dgongs nas thams
327a1(rgyud): @#/ /cad rab chas te/ /stug po ru ni byon par gyur/ /byon nas thub pa thams cad kyis/ /bskul ba mchog ni mdzad par 'gyur/ /oM badzra uta tiSh+Tha ces
327a2(rgyud): pa yi| |rig pas se gol brdabs nas ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bslang / /phyogs rnams kun tu bltas pa na/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni rgya mtsho mthong / /thub pas mgon
327a3(rgyud): rnams la btud de/ /bka' stsol zhes ni gsol ba btab/ /mgon chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /gsung gcig gis ni bka' stsal pa/ /sems kyi spyod yul ci 'dra
327a4(rgyud): zhes| |rang gi sems ni so sor rtogs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung thos nas/ /rang gi sems la rtog bzhin du/ /yun ring du ni gnas pa na/ /sems kyi rnam pa ma
327a5(rgyud): mthong ste/ /yan lag kun gyis rab btud nas/ /zhus pa bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/ /sems kyi rnam pa ma mthong ste/ /sems kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu/ /de nas
327a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa/ /sems kyi spyod yul shes par dka'/ /khyod la snying po rab sbyin gyis/ /phra mo'i bzlas pa rab tu spyod/ /oM tsit+ta pra ti be d+haM ka ro mi/ /
327a7(rgyud): snying po dag pa blangs na ni/ /rang gi sems la rtog bzhin du/ /thang cig de la gnas pa na/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du mthong / /de nas sems 'di ci zhig
327b1(rgyud): yin| |nyon mongs sa bon can nam ci/ /dge ba'am mi dge ba yi sems/ /kun gzhi'i sa bon can sems sam/ /chos kyi rgyu mthun rtogs gyur nas/ /pha rol phyin pa drug
327b2(rgyud): bsten pa/ /'di ni sems can dag pa ste/ /kun nas nyon mongs gnas ma yin/ /yun ring du ni bsod nams dang / /ye shes tshogs chen bsags pa ste/ /ji ltar zla ba
327b3(rgyud): gang ba 'di/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog ma med/ /de bzhin tshogs ni rdzogs pa'i phyir/ /sems ni zla ba gang dang mtshungs/ /dngos po yod dang med min pa/ /ji ltar zla ba
327b4(rgyud): mtshungs nyid yin/ /'on kyang bsod nams ye shes che/ /rdzogs pa zla ba dang mtshungs bstan/ /legs byas tshogs ldan rang sems kyi/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong
327b5(rgyud): nas ni/ /dga' zhing mgu ba skyes nas kyang / /slar yang tshig tu rab smras pa/ /bcom ldan mgon po bdag gis ni/ /nyon mongs dri ma kun dag cing / /gzung dang 'dzin pa
327b6(rgyud): dang bral ba'i/ /rang sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong / /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ /thog mar byung ba'i sems 'di bzang / /dang por glo bur nyon mongs
327b7(rgyud): rnams/ /byang chub sems kyis dag par byed/ /dngos po thams cad rnams spangs pa'i/ /dag pa yi ni snying po 'dis/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /byang chub
328a1(rgyud): @#/ /kyi ni sems la rtogs/ /oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA dA yA mi/ /snying po dag pa blangs nas ni/ /sems kyi dbus su rtog pa na/ /zla ba'i dbus su yang zla ba'i//
328a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gnyis pa mthong ba ni/ /thub pa rnams la tshig smras pa/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis pa dag mthong ngo / /de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa/ /byang chub sems
328a3(rgyud): kyi rang bzhin brtan/ /brtan par bya ba'i ched du ni/ /de ni legs par bsgrub par gyis/ /khyod la snying po sbyin bya ste/ /zlos shing de ni brtan par dgongs/ /oM tiSh+Tha
328a4(rgyud): badzra| dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i dbus gnas pa'i/ /rdo rje chen po sems byed cing / /thang cig so sor brtags pa na/ /shin tu brtag pa mthong gyur nas/ /smras pa rdzogs
328a5(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su rdo rje mthong / /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa yi/ /dbus na rdo rje dang ldan mthong / /de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs
328a6(rgyud): pa| |lha rnams kun gyi rdo rje che/ /rdo rje dbyings ni skyed pa yi/ /shin tu brtan pa 'di smros shig /oM badzra At+ma kou0f85haM/ /snying po dag pa blangs nas ni/ /rdo rje'i lus su
328a7(rgyud): rnam bsgoms pa/ /de ni sra brtan khong stong med/ /rdo rje'i sku ni thob gyur nas/ /smras ba rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rang bdag rdo rje'i skur mthong ngo / /de
328b1(rgyud): nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam par bsgom/ /oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga tA sta thA a haM/ /snying po dag pa blangs nas ni/ /sangs rgyas gzugs
328b2(rgyud): su rnam bsgoms pas/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/ /kun mkhyen ye shes thob par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun la rab btud nas/ /smras pa bcom ldan
328b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs/ /mgon po bdag la byin rlob cing / /bdag gi byang chub brtan par mdzod/ /grags chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje dbyings
328b4(rgyud): kyi tshig thos nas/ /mgon rnams thugs kar zhugs par gyur/ /rdo rje yi ni rnal 'byor gsungs/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi sam bo d+hi dr-i D+ha badzra ban d+ha/ /
328b5(rgyud): grags chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /rig sngags chen por brjod pa na/ /rdo rje dbyings ni shin tu brtan/ /de nyid ye shes mngon sangs rgyas/ /de nas sangs rgyas thams
328b6(rgyud): cad ni/ /rdo rje thugs ka nas byung ste/ /chos kyi dbang bskur bzhi bo yi/ /de tshe thub pa dbang bskur gyur/ /rdo rjes sems dpa' byas pa yi/ /byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ba/ /'bras bu byang chub
328b7(rgyud): sems ldan gang / /rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur yin/ /bskal ba grangs med gsum dag gi /sbyin dang sbyin pa'i 'bras bzang dang / /mkha' mtshungs rin chen thob byed pa/ /nor bu rin
329a1(rgyud): @#/ /chen dbang bskur yin/ /bskal ba grangs med gsum du ni/ /gzhan gyis dka' ba spyad pa dang / /brtson 'grus kyis ni 'bras bsgrub pa/ /rdo rje las
329a2(rgyud): kyi dbang bskur yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dag /chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul chen te/ /nyon mongs 'dam gyis ma gos pa/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang bskur yin//
329a3(rgyud): byang chub sems rdzogs rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi/ /dbang bskur bzhi po de rnams chos kyi dbyings/ /de nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba/ /sangs rgyas rang
329a4(rgyud): bzhin yon tan dam pa'i tshogs/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bas/ /ngo bo nyid kyi sku ru 'dod/ /rdo rje chos kyi dbang bskur bas/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru 'dod//
329a5(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur bas/ /de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes che/ /mkha' mtshungs chos nyid snying po can/ /rdo rje las kyi dbang bskur
329a6(rgyud): pas| |sprul pa yi ni skur 'dod do/ /gsang ba bzhi yi dbang bskur bas/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob/ /de nas min gi dbang bskur bas/ /thub de rnams snang
329a7(rgyud): mdzad chen gyur/ /chos nyid kyang ni yang dag rtogs/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs par brtag /chos kun dngos po med pa ste/ /mtshan ma med cing gsal byed med/ /
329b1(rgyud): mtshan nyid med cing mkha' dang mtshungs/ /dmigs pa rnam par spangs pa ste/ /rang bzhin med cing brjod du med/ /chos kun tshig gi spyod yul yin/ /gzhan yang
329b2(rgyud): gsang bar brtags pa ste/ /de phyir 'dir ni rtogs par brjod/ /rtog pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi/ /chos kyi don 'di ci yin brjod/ /bdag med dngos po yod pa min/ /chos rnams
329b3(rgyud): med cing rtog pa med/ /'on kyang chos nyid yang dag rtogs/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs par rtogs/ /rtogs pa nyams su myong bar brjod/ /'dir ni ngo mtshar nyid du rtogs/
329b4(rgyud): chos kun gzugs can min pa dang / /gzugs can du yang 'di ru bstan/ /chos kun tshig gi spyod yul min/ /sgra ru yang na 'dir ba stan te/ /de bas ngo mtshar chos 'di ru/ /
329b5(rgyud): rtog pa rtog pa yin par brjod/ /ci phyir 'di ni ngo mtshar chos/ /de nyid gsang ba bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /las rnams drug po nyid dang ni/ /gzugs can tshig gi mthu dag dang //
329b6(rgyud): 'bras phyir sdom pa'i ngo mtshar te/ /de phyir 'di ni ngo mtshar chos/ /de phyir 'di ni rtog par brjod/ /de bas ngo mtshar chos 'di ru/ /rtog pa 'ba' zhig rtog pa yin/ /yang
329b7(rgyud): 'dir rtog pa ji lta bu/ /sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas/ /pa rol phyin drug spyod pa dag /bsten pa rtog pa nyid yin no/ /sgrub pa'i don
330a1(rgyud): @#/ /ni ji lta bu/ /gang zag chos la bdag med dang / /gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs pa yi/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sa sgrub po/ /de tshe sgrub pa'i don yin
330a2(rgyud): no| |ci phyir 'di ni rgyu phyi ma/ /rgyud ni rgyun chags zhes bya ste/ /'khor ba rgyud du 'dod pa yin/ /phyi ma zhes bya pha rol te/ /rgyud ni phyi mar brjod pa yin/ /rgyud ni rgyun chags
330a3(rgyud): zhes bya ste/ /phyi ma snga ma las byung ba'i/ /de nyid gsang ba spas zhes pa/ /rgyud ni phyi mar brjod pa yin/ /ci phyir rgyud dang phyi ma la/ /sa mthar phyin pa'i rgyal ba mchog
330a4(rgyud): srid pa'i btson ra las brgal yin/ /yang na gang zhig brgal gyur ba/ /rgyud ni phyi ma yin par bshad/ /rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar byung / /sems can kun la phan pa'i
330a5(rgyud): phyir| |sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos longs spyod/ /sangs rgyas thugs rjes bskul ba ni/ /rgyud don yang dag byung ba yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs byung ba'i/ /
330a6(rgyud): chos dang longs spyod byung ba ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen ni/ /rgyud don yang dag byung ba yin/ /rdo rje 'chang drag 'di ci zhig /sangs rgyas gzugs kyi mi
330a7(rgyud): 'dul ba'i/ /sems can gdug tshogs de yi phyir/ /rang gi ye shes byang chub sems/ /rdo rje drag por yang dag 'byung / /drag po'i don ni ji ltar 'byung / /drag po
330b1(rgyud): drag po'i mig gis ni/ /drag po'i khro bo zhes su bstan/ /drag po'i las ni spyod byed rnams/ /'chos shing bzlog par bya ba yin/ /rdo rje zhi ba 'di ci zhig /'dug pa de kun btul
330b2(rgyud): nas ni/ /slar yang zhi bar yang dag byung / /de nyid rgyal po rdo rje 'chang / /sems can don gyi thabs ston mdzad/ /bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad ni/ /khro bo'i dbang phyug
330b3(rgyud): dag tu bstan/ /de nyid zhi dang drag po dang / /phyag na rdo rje rdzu 'phul che/ /ci yi phyir na zhi bar brjod/ /sna tshogs gzugs can rnal 'byor che/ /sems can smin bya 'ba'
330b4(rgyud): zhig phyir/ /nyon mongs gdug la brtser dgongs shing / /zhi ba'i don ni yang dag byung / /phyag na rdo rje ci yi phyir/ /nyon mongs gdug pa nyid gzhom phyir/ /byang chub sems
330b5(rgyud): kyi rang bzhin bzang / /rdo rje phyag na bsnams mdzad ba/ /de ni phyag na rdo rjer brjod/ /dus gsum bdud rnams de bzhin du/ /mi mthun phyogs kyi mi shigs pa/ /byang sems
330b6(rgyud): rang bzhin rdo rje ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa'i tshogs/ /de nas sangs rgyas kun dang ldan/ /gsang chen rdo rje de lta bu/ /phyag na rtag tu bsnams pas na/ /de ni phyag na
330b7(rgyud): rdo rjer brjod/ /rdo rje gtum pa'i don ci zhig /rdo rje gtum po gnod sbyin che/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin shin tu brtan/ /nga rgyal nyon mongs zhags pa za/ /byang chub sems dpa'
331a1(rgyud): @#/ /rang byung ba/ /ci yi phyir na gtum por brjod/ /gtum gdug drag po chen po ni/ /rang byung nga nyid kho na ste/ /srid pa'i zhags pa gcod byed
331a2(rgyud): cing | |drag po'i don ni gtum po yin/ /rdo rje khro bo ci yin brjod/ /gsod dang skrod pa drag po ste/ /de ni khro bo'i don du brjod/ /nga ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar/ /nyon mongs
331a3(rgyud): phyogs rnams sreg byed yin/ /rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsungs pa/ /ci phyir rdo rjer brjod par bya/ /sra zhing snying po khong stong med/ /bcad dang gzhig par bya ba min/ /bsreg
331a4(rgyud): par bya min 'jig med pas/ /stong nyid rdo rjer brjod par bya/ /'gro drug 'khor lo spong byed cing / /sdig pa bral bar byed pa yi/ /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /nyon
331a5(rgyud): mongs thams cad sel bar byed/ /rdo rje 'chang zhes gsungs 'di ci/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes dang / /byang sems brtan pa gang yin pa/ de ni rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//
331a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag /de yi rdo rje ji lta bu/ /rtog pa thams cad dang bral zhing / /chos su 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa/ /chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid/ /stong
331a7(rgyud): pa nyid ni rdo rjer brjod/ /gzugs sogs chos kyi rang bzhin gang / /'gyur ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid/ /chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa gang / de lta bu ni 'di rdo rje/ /rdo rje rigs
331b1(rgyud): kyi don 'di ci/ /bde na zhing don yod de bzhin nyid/ /'gyur ba med cing skye ba med/ /'gag med de kho na nyid gang / /de lta bu ni rdo rje yin/ /don yod 'gyur ba med pa
331b2(rgyud): yi| |de lta bu yi rigs gyur pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su brjod/ /de ni rdo rje'i rigs zhes bya/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i chos/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhes su
331b3(rgyud): brjod/ /bden zhing bslu ba med pa yi/ /byang chub sems gang de rigs yin/ /rdo rje 'chang ba rnams ni du/ /phyogs rnams thams cad kun khyab pa'i/ /byang chub sems
331b4(rgyud): dpa' mkhas pa ni/ /chos dbyings dang mnyam thug pa med/ /rdo rje 'chang rnams de snyed do/ /rdo rje'i rigs kun gang gi yin/ /chos kyi bdag po bla med pa/ /rnam par snang
331b5(rgyud): mdzad rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /mgon des yongs su gzung ba de'i/ /de yi dkyil 'khor yin gsungs pa/ /ston pa gang zhig 'di rnams su'i/ /rjes su ston par byed pa
331b6(rgyud): gang | |de yi spyod lam bya ba ci/ /gsang ba kun tu bsdus pas gsungs/ /'di yi ston pa byang chub sems/ /rjes su ston byed shes rab thabs/ /phyag rgya rnams ni spyod
331b7(rgyud): pa ste/ /sngags rnams de yi bya ba yin/ /rdo rje 'chang gi rigs gang yin/ /rdo rje 'chang ba de kun gyi/ /rigs ni byang chub sems yin te/ /byang chub sems dpa'
332a1(rgyud): @#/ /brtul zhugs bzang / /sangs rgyas kyi yang de nyid yul/ /chen po gnas gang zhig na gnas/ /chos rnams kun la gnas med de/ /rtsa ba med sems
332a2(rgyud): spyod yul lo/ /chos rnams thams cad gzugs can min/ /chos kyi dbyings te spyod yul med/ /rigs ni rnam pa du yin brjod/ /rtag dang mi 'khrugs rin chen dbang //
332a3(rgyud): 'od dpag med pa dngos grub rnams/ /rigs ni rnam pa brgyar gsungs te/ /mdo ru bsdu na rnam pa lnga/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje rin chen dang / /chos dang las dang rnam pa
332a4(rgyud): lnga| |ci yi phyir na rigs su brjod/ /mchog dang dman pa'i bye brag gis/ /rigs zhes bya ba de rnam gnyis/ /sems can lam ngan zhugs pa yi/ /rigs ni dman pa
332a5(rgyud): yin par brjod/ /lam ngan 'gro ba spangs nas ni/ /byang chub sems la 'jug pa chos/ /de bas rdo rje rigs brjod pa/ /rigs de yang ni lnga pa yin/ /rigs bdag
332a6(rgyud): rang bzhin 'di ci zhig / byang chub sems ni rgyal po che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs pa med/ /mgon po chen po rigs kyi bdag/ /de ni rigs kyang lnga pa yin/ /ci yi
332a7(rgyud): phyir na sems dpar brjod/ /sems dpa' zhes bya rnam gsum ste/ /byis pa de bzhin mkhas pa dang / /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dang / /rnam gsum

332b2(rgyud): sems dpa' ci yin brjod/ /gnas gang zhig tu brjod bya ba/ /de ni de yi sems dpar brjod/ /chos sam yang na chos min dang / /legs byas nyes par byas pa la//
332b3(rgyud): mi shes mun pas bsgribs gyur cing / /chos la nyon mongs bdag nyid 'dzin/ /dman zhing gti mug rigs can gyur/ /de lta bu ni byis par brjod/ /nyon mongs kun
332b4(rgyud): la chags pa dang / /de bzhin srid pa ngan song gsum/ /mi shes mun pa la chags pa/ /de 'dir byis par brjod par bya/ /sems dpa' mkhas pa gang zhig yin//
332b5(rgyud): dri ma las 'das nyon mongs spong / /rnal 'byor ldan zhing brtul zhugs che/ /mi shes ling tog 'joms byed pa/ /de ni sems dpa' mkhas par brjod/ /'dir ni
332b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' gang / /chos kyi de nyid rtogs gyur cing / /'khor ba'i gnas nas sad 'gyur te/ /sems can rnams ni sad byed pa/ /de ni byang chub sems dpar brjod//
332b7(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam pa du/ /de la byang chub rnam gsum ste/ /dman dang mchog dang bar ma'o/ /dman pa nyan thos sems yin te/ /bar ma rang rgyal byang chub bo/ /
333a1(rgyud): @#/ /mchog ni byang chub sems yin te/ /de ni mi 'gyur rdo rje yin/ /sku gsung thugs rnams gzhag pa gang / /byang chub mchog tu brjod bar bya/ /
333a2(rgyud): ci phyir rdo rje sems dpa' yin/ /byang chub mchog gi ye shes gang / /de ni rdo rje nges par brjod/ /ye shes rdo rje las byung ba/ /de ni rdo rje sems dpar brjod/ /rdo rje 'chang
333a3(rgyud): ba kun gyi rgyal/ /ci yi phyir na sems dpar brjod/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mgon po che/ /dga' chen de ni chags sam ci/ /sems can thams cad dgrol ba'i phyir//
333a4(rgyud): sems can rnams la chags pa ste/ /de ni rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes su bsgrags/ /byang chub sems kyi 'bras bu ste/ /sangs rgyas ye shes
333a5(rgyud): bla med gang / /de ni rdo rje sems rang bzhin/ /chos dang longs spyod sprul pa'o/ /rdo rje rgyal po ci yin brjod/ /rdo rje rigs kun rgyal po ste/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhes su
333a6(rgyud): brjod/ /dgug dang dbab pa'i rdo rje ni/ /de ni rdo rje rgyal por brjod/ /bsdu ba yi ni dngos po bzhi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gang spyad pa/ /sems can dgug pa'i
333a7(rgyud): thabs zhes pa/ /rdo rje rgyal por yang dag byung / /rdo rje chags pa 'di don ci/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed pa/ /rjes su chags pa zhes su brjod/ /rdo rje chags

333b5(rgyud): rje rin chen ci yi phyir/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa gang / /mkha' mnyam rin chen lta bu ste/ /rdo rje rin chen skal ba che/ /de ni rdo rje rin chen brjod/ /sems dpa' chen
333b6(rgyud): po'i dbang bskur te/ /sems can kun gyi dbang bskur ba/ /byang chub snying po'i dbang bskur gyis/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'dzin par byed/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyin pa
333b7(rgyud): gang | |mkha' mtshungs rdo rje yang dag byung / /de ni rin chen don yod de/ /de ni rdo rje rin chen brjod/ /ma rig ling tog 'khor ba yi/ /mi shes mun pa 'joms byed cing / /
334a1(rgyud): @#/ /thar ba'i snang ba gzi brjid che/ /de ni rdo rje gzi brjid brjod/ /ci phyir rdo rje rgyal mtshan yin/ /rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin/ /thar
334a2(rgyud): pa'i lam 'gro rgyal mtshan te/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan rgyal mtshan che/ /de ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan brjod/ /rdo rje bzhad pa ci yin brjod/ /rnal 'byor chen po rdo rje bzhad//
334a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad bzhad byed cing / /byang chub sems dpa' kun dbugs 'byin/ /de ni rdo rje bzhad par brjod/ /ci yi phyir na rdo rje chos/ /rnal 'byor chen po
334a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas chos/ /sangs rgyas sems can rtogs byed pa/ /dag pa de bzhin gshegs snying po/ /de ni rdo rje chos su brjod/ /rdo rje rnon bo ci yin brjod/ /shes rab

334a6(rgyud): rgyas gar byed pas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu brtan/ /dam chos ro yi bcud las byung / /de ni rdo rje rgyu zhes bya/ /rdo rje smra ba ci yin brjod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi chos chen
334a7(rgyud): po| |mkha' mtshungs tshig dang bral ba ste/ /tshig med tshig las yang dag byung / /de ni rdo rje smra bar brjod/ /ci yi phyir na rdo rje las/ /sems can smin dang grol ba
334b1(rgyud): yi| |sangs rgyas kun gyi las gang dang / /sangs rgyas las ni bdag med pa/ /de ni rdo rje las zhes bya/ /rdo rje srung ba ci yin brjod/ /byang chub sems dpa'i srung ba ste//
334b2(rgyud): theg pa dman pa spong byed cing / /rtse mo nas lhung srung byed pa/ /de ni rdo rje srung bar brjod/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin 'di don ci/ /sdig pa thams cad zad byed cing / /nyon mongs
334b3(rgyud): thams cad nges par gcod/ /srid pa za byed gnod sbyin che/ /de ni rdo rje gnod sbyin brjod/ /rdo rje khu tshur ci yin brjod/ /bden zhing gzhan min de bzhin nyid/ /'gyur med de kho
334b4(rgyud): na nyid gang / /sangs rgyas de bzhin nyid ye shes/ /de ni rdo rje khu tshur brjod/ /sngon du byang chub sems 'gyur gang / /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag byung / /sdu ba'i dngos po

334b6(rgyud): yang dag byung / /sngon gyi sbyin pa'i spyod gyur gang / /de ni rdo rje rin chen brjod/ /sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /de ni rdo rje gzi brjid brjod/ /'byung po kun la byams

335a1(rgyud): @#/ /las byung / /nyon mongs gcod byed rdo rje che/ /rdo rje rnon por yang dag byung / /mngon shes dang ni mthul sogs/ /de ni rdo rje rgyu ru brjod/ /gzungs
335a2(rgyud): la sogs pa grub pa ni/ /rdo rje smra bar yang dag byung / /ye shes chen po chos chen po/ /dam tshig ces bya'i dga' chen po/ /ye shes mngon par rtogs te dag/ /rdo rje chos
335a3(rgyud): las yang dag byung / /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin rgyal po/ /rdo rje las su yang dag byung / /theg pa dman pa spong byed pa/ /de phyir rdo rje srung bar brjod/ /nyon mongs srid pa'i

335a7(rgyud): che| |rdo rje legs par yang dag byung / /bsod nams ye shes tshogs nyid las/ /rdo rje rin chen rab tu bsgrags/ /bsod nams rang bzhin rin chen de/ /rnam bzhi ji
335b1(rgyud): skad bshad pa bzhin/ /ye shes kyi ni chogs brjod pa/ /de ni rdo rje chos zhes bya/ /ye shes rang bzhin chos de yang / /rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag byung / /brtson 'grus pha rol
335b2(rgyud): phyin pa nyid/ /de ni rdo rje las su brjod/ /brtson 'grus rang bzhin las de yang / /rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag byung / /brtson dang sbyor ba zhes bya dang / /so sor rtog dang sgrub pa ste/ /

335b4(rgyud): yang dag byung / /pha rol phyin drug spyod pa las/ /rdo rje can rnams byung bar 'dod/ /de bzhin pha dang ma ni gang / /ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin/ /pha ni thabs la mkhas pa
335b5(rgyud): ste| |pad+ma las ni sangs rgyas sras/ /rdo rje can rnams gang las byung / /rdo rje rgyal po de bzhin chags/ /rdo rje rin chen rgyal mtshan dang / /rdo rje chos dang de bzhin no/ /de
335b6(rgyud): rnams shes rab gtso bor bstan/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje legs/ /gzi brjid de bzhin bzhad pa nyid/ /rgyu dang smra ba sems dpa' che/ /de rnams thabs las byung ba
335b7(rgyud): yin| |rdo rje las dang rdo rje srung / /gnod sbyin de bzhin khu tshur nyid/ /shes rab thabs su grags pa ste/ /brtan pa chen po tshogs su bshad/ /rdo rje'i rigs rnams kun gyi gtso//
336a1(rgyud): @#/ /rdo rje lcags kyu ma ru bshad/ /rdo rje rin chen mchog gyur pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin pha/ /pha ni rdo rje rgyal po rgyu/ /ma ni rdo rje rnon po ste/ /pad+ma'i
336a2(rgyud): rigs chen bzang po yi/ /pad 'dzin gang las byung ba'o/ /rdo rje gzi brjid rin chen pha/ /rgyal mtshan ma ni yin par bstan/ /nor bu rin chen bzang po yi/ /rin chen
336a3(rgyud): gang las byung pa'o/ /pha ni rgyal po rdo rje las/ /ma ni gnod sbyin srung ba ste/ /las kyi rigs can bzang po yi/ /las rnams gang las byung ba'o/ /dang po gang zhig ci zhe
336a4(rgyud): na| |dngos kun dang po sa bon te/ /rdo rje can kun dang po sems/ /'dun dang dran dang ting nge 'dzin/ /rigs rnams kun gyi dang por bshad/ /yang gleng gzhi ci yin zhe na/ /rigs
336a5(rgyud): bzhi las ni yang dag byung / /tshangs pa'i gnas chen dang ldan pa'i/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams kyi/ /snying rje chen po gleng gzhi yin/ /dmigs pa gang zhig yin
336a6(rgyud): zhe na| |rtog pa med cing dmigs pa med/ /dang por byang chub sems byung ba'i/ /pha rol phyin pa mchog drug ni/ /de yi dmigs pa yin par bshad/ /rkyen gang zhe na/
336a7(rgyud): rtag tu srid gsum mngon dga' ba/ /sems can sdug bsngal gyur bltas nas/ /snying rje dang ni ldan pa yi/ /byang chub sems kyis bskul ba'o/ /gsang ba 'di ni gang
336b1(rgyud): du byung / /'og min stug po nyams dga' zhing / /stug po'i zhing khams 'jig med pa/ /de nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos/ /rdzogs par longs spyod tshul 'di byung / /khyab
336b2(rgyud): bdag 'di rnams gang nas byung / /rdo rje rin chen mchog chen gyi/ /gzhal yas khang pa yid 'ong zhing / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos ldan pa/ /de nas khyab bdag 'di rnams
336b3(rgyud): byung | |thog ma tha ma med 'di ci/ /gsang ba'i dbang phyug chen pos gsungs/ /sems can kun gyi shes pa dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang / /chos dbyings rdo
336b4(rgyud): rje chen po ste/ /thog ma tha ma med par bshad/ /rab tu dga' ba nyid 'di ci/ /bde chen rab tu grub bya'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po
336b5(rgyud): che| |rab tu dga' ba nyid ces bshad/ /rab bzang nyid ni ji lta bu/ /dngos po kun mchog rdo rje ni/ /byang chub kyi ni sems zhes brjod/ /sangs rgyas skyed byed bzang po yi/ /
336b6(rgyud): rdo rje rab bzang nyid ces bshad/ /rdo rje snying bdag ji lta bu/ /gdul bya 'phags pa'i skyes mchog nyid/ /de ni rdo rje snying por brjod/ /de rnams bdag po rgyal po ni/ /rdo rje
336b7(rgyud): snying po'i bdag por bshad/ /ci yi phyir na kun tu bzang / /byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ldan pa'i/ /'gro ba srid pa'i skye gnas gang / /de kun rtag tu bzang bas na/ /kun
337a1(rgyud): @#/ /tu bzang por brjod par bya/ /rdo rje rdo rje 'chang ba gang / /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /rdo rje gang de rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che//
337a2(rgyud): rdo rje rdo rje 'chang bar brjod/ /dang po'i rigs ni ji ltar byung / /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyis/ /grags chen rdzogs par byang chub pa/ /de ni dang po'i rigs byung ste//
337a3(rgyud): de kho na nyid rigs las so/ /yang na rab tu mkhas pa rnams/ /bskal pa grangs med 'das nas ni/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob gang / /de ni dang po'i rigs byung
337a4(rgyud): yin| |chos kun skye ba med pa dang / /'byung ba ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /de nyid rtogs shing shes pa yis/ /chos rnams thams cad rtog pa med/ /chos dang gang
337a5(rgyud): zag bdag med las/ /rigs de byung ba nyid du 'dod/ /chos rnams 'ga' yang skye ba med/ /chos rnams 'gag par 'gyur ba med/ /rnam par rtog pa nyer zhi gang //
337a6(rgyud): de nyid sangs rgyas rigs chen yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' ci yin brjod/ /chos rnams thams cad rtogs pa dang / /'khor ba'i gnas las sad gyur cing / /sems
337a7(rgyud): can rnams kyis rtogs byed pa/ /de ni byang chub sems dpar brjod/ /ci phyir sangs rgyas brjod par bya/ /de bzhin nyid bden shin tu brtan/ /de kho na nyid gang rtogs/
337b1(rgyud): nas| |chos kun rtogs pa zhes bya gang / /de ni rtogs pas sangs rgyas brjod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ci yin brjod/ /chos kyi de bzhin yang dag gnas/ /slar yang
337b2(rgyud): gzhan du mi 'gyur zhing / /de nyid lam ni ston byed pa/ /de ni de bzhin gshegs zhes bya/ /bcom ldan 'das ni ci yin brjod/ /las dang nyon mongs de bzhin skye/ /de
337b3(rgyud): bzhin nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib/ /mi mthun phyogs kyi chos rnams gang / /de bcom pas na bcom ldan brjod/ /de yi bcom pa ci yin brjod/ /bcom ldan de bzhin
337b4(rgyud): bcom par brjod/ /'dod pa'i 'dod chags gcod byed cing / /nyon mongs 'joms shing pham byed pa/ /de ni de yi bcom par brjod/ /de bzhin ston pa'i ston pa ci/ /nyon
337b5(rgyud): mongs bdud sogs gcod byed cing / /skye dgu ma lus thabs chen gyis/ /ngan 'gro srid las skyob byed pa/ /ston pa'i ston par brjod pa yin/ /ci yi phyir na ye shes brjod//
337b6(rgyud): de nyid shes pas ye shes te/ /slar yang chos su rtog pa min/ /rtag dang chad pa spong byed cing / /'chi med de bzhin ye shes ni/ /shes rab ye shes ci yin brjod/ /rnam
337b7(rgyud): ba mang po shes byed cing / /rtogs pas sdug bsngal las grol byed/ /kun nas nyon mongs chos spong ba/ /shes rab ye shes zhes su brjod/ /ci phyir shes rab brjod
338a1(rgyud): @#/ /par bya/ /rab sbyor sbyor ba shes 'gyur zhing / /khyad par du ni rtogs par byed/ /bden pa de bzhin nyid shes pa'i/ /shes rab shes rab zhes su bshad/
338a2(rgyud): shes rab pha rol phyin don ci/ /nyan thos rang rgyal phyi rol gyi/ /shes rab las ni bla mar brjod/ /de bzhin nyid gzhol pha rol phyin/ /shes rab pha rol phyin zhes
338a3(rgyud): bshad/ /tshul zhes bya don ci yin brjod/ /na ni dgag pa'i don chen te/ /dngos med dngos po med min pas/ /gang du dri ma med gyur pa/ /de ni de yi tshul du brjod//
338a4(rgyud): ting 'dzin don 'di ci yin brjod/ /chos kun dngos po med ces pa'i/ /mnyam pa nyid du rab gnas pa'i/ /shes rab can gyis lhag par bsten/ /sems la dmigs
338a5(rgyud): par brjod par bya/ /ci yi phyir na bsam gtan brjod/ /sdug bsngal thams cad spong byed cing / /nyon mongs dra ba rab 'joms pa'i/ /shes rab bcas par sems
338a6(rgyud): pa ni| |srid pa 'joms par byed pa'i mchog / rnal 'byor don ni ci yin brjod/ /chos rgya chen po dam pa dang / /zab mo'i mchog tu gyur pa des/ /kun shes kun rig
338a7(rgyud): ldan 'byor pa'i/ /rnal 'byor du ni brjod par bya/ /rnal 'byor pa ni ci yin brjod/ /shes rab kyi ni nges sems pa/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor don sems shing //
338b1(rgyud): sems can kun gyi don sems gang / /de ni rnal 'byor pa don brjod/ /nga ni kun gyi rgyal po che/ /thams cad rig cing thams cad ster/ /rdo rje 'chang chen dang po ste/ /bde
338b2(rgyud): ba yi ni rgyu 'di yis/ /de bzhin nga ni 'jig rten gsum/ /khams gsum rnal 'byor rig pa'i mchog /de bzhin 'khor ba mya ngan 'das/ /bde 'gro dang ni ngan 'gro dang //
338b3(rgyud): 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod yin/ /srid gsum 'di yi don ci zhig /sems can kun gyi sems gang yin/ /srid pa gsum du brjod par bya/ /'dod dang gzugs dang
338b4(rgyud): gzugs med las/ /'di ltar thams cad rig pa mchog /bdag med byed pa po yang med/ /chos kyang yod pa ma yin te/ /dge dang mi dger byed pa yi/ /bag chags
338b5(rgyud): kyis ni kun tu bsgribs/ /chos ni thog med dus can te/ /byed pa po ni yod ma yin/ /rtog pas nyams pa'i sems ldan pas/ /rgyu dang 'bras bur mthong bar 'gyur//
338b6(rgyud): kun gzhi sa bon thams cad pa/ /de ni chos kun skyed par byed/ /bsgos shing bag chags dang ldan pa/ /de ni srid pa gsum zhes bya/ /'dod pa'i las skyes khams
338b7(rgyud): gsum gyi/ /rgyur ni kun gzhi de nyid snang / /gzugs dang gzugs med 'gro ba yi/ /chos rnams kun gyi gnas kyang yin/ /chos kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ /nyes pa
339a1(rgyud): @#/ /kun dang bral ba ste/ /thog ma med 'byung chos snying po/ /glo bur dri mas nyon mongs 'gyur/ /nga ni kho na chos chen po/ /nga ni chos kyi snying por bshad//
339a2(rgyud): de bsang ni rgyal po che/ /nga ni srid pa gsum du bsgrags/ /'jig rten gsum ni ci yin brjod/ /'dod pa 'jig rten de bzhin gzugs/ /gzugs med pa yi skye dgu rnams//
339a3(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum po zhes pa de/ /rang byung nga nyid kho na yin/ /'dod pa zhes bya chos chen te/ /dag pa btsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ /gzung 'dzin chos rnams zhes bya ba'i/ /de
339a4(rgyud): bzhin nyid las so sor rtog / chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med phyir/ /nga ni chos de dag par byed/ /de bas nga ni rgyal po che/ /'jig rten gsum gyi bdag por bstan/ /
339a5(rgyud): ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin gzugs/ /de bzhin gzugs med rab tu bsgrags/ /stong pa nyid dang dbyer med pas/ /nga ni snying po'i bdag por bshad/ /khams gsum
339a6(rgyud): pa yi don ci zhig / 'dod khams de bzhin gzugs khams dang / /gzugs med pa ni nyid dag dang / /khams gsum bzang po 'di dag ni/ /rang byung nga nyid kho na
339a7(rgyud): yin| |'di ni khams dang rgyu dang don/ /khams gsum gyi ni rgyu sems pa/ /stong dang mtshan ma med bshad cing / /smon pa med pa nga nyid bstan/ /'khor ba'i don ni
339b1(rgyud): ci zhig yin/ /byis pa rnams ni kun tu 'byung / /de bzhin yang dang yang du 'khor/ /'khor ba dag pa'i bdag nyid de/ /rang byung nga nyid kho na yin/ /gang la 'khor ba yod pa
339b2(rgyud): yi| |chos ni rdul tsam yod ma yin/ /yang dag ma yin kun brtags phyir/ /de ni thog mtha' med pa yin/ /med gang de ni stong pa ste/ /stong pa nyid gang nga nyid do/ /de
339b3(rgyud): bas 'khor ba de nyid ni/ /rdo rje 'chang rgyal nga nyid bsgrags/ /mya ngan 'das pa ci yin brjod/ /gang zhig de bzhin nyid rtag stong / /bden bzhi rang bzhin bzang po nyid/ /mtshan
339b4(rgyud): nyid dang ni dngos po gzugs/ /mtshan ma nyid kyang rnam par spangs/ /tshig dang sgra yis gzung bya min/ /rnam par rtog pa yod ma yin/ /de bas mya ngan 'das sgra ru/ /nga
339b5(rgyud): nyid kho na rab shes bya/ /de yi rtag pa'i don ci zhig /rtag nyid rtag la 'byung gnas te/ /rnam par rtog pa dang bral gang / /rtag pa de nyid kho na ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra ru
339b6(rgyud): bsgrags/ /'jig pa yang ni ci yin brjod/ /gang zhig 'khor bar mi 'jug cing / /thams cad mi rtag pa nyid dang / /sdug bsngal 'byung 'gog byed pa yi/ /'jig pa
339b7(rgyud): mya ngan 'das sgra yin/ /dag pa yang ni ci yin brjod/ /yod pa'ang ma yin med pa'ang min/ /dngos po'ang ma yin dngos med min/ /brjod bya rjod byed ma yin min/ /
340a1(rgyud): @#/ /dag pa mya ngan 'das nyid yin/ /theg pa chen po ci yin brjod/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs gyur cing / /theg pa kun las nges rgyal ba/ /
340a2(rgyud): yang dag gyur pa'i sems can ni/ /theg pa chen po zhes su bstan/ /mthu dang las rnams 'jug pa dang / /tshogs rnams rnal 'byor ngo mtshar rnams/ /rgya che zhes pa theg
340a3(rgyud): chen te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo mtshar mchog /nam mkha'i don ni ci zhig yin/ /sa nyid kyang ni ci yin brjod/ /'byung ba med cing rdzas kyang med/ /skye ba med cing 'chi ba med/ /
340a4(rgyud): dus gsum dngos po dang bral mchog/ /nam mkha' zhes pa'i sgra ru bstan/ /yang dang yang du skye ba dang / /de bzhin nyon mongs kun bdag nyid/ /grangs med dpag
340a5(rgyud): med dang bral ba/ /de ni sa nyid brjod par bya/ /'byung ba chen po gang las byung / /'gog pa ci yin gang gis byed/ /ma rig nyon mongs la sogs las/ /'byung ba chen
340a6(rgyud): po yang dag 'byung / /sa bon kun ldan kun gzhi ni/ /phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid 'dod/ /gnas ni yongs su gyur pa dang / /kun gzhi sa bon mi 'byung zhing / /rtog pa
340a7(rgyud): thams cad dang bral ba/ /'byung ba chen po 'gog pa yin/ /rtog pa chen bo'i rgyal po mchog tu gsang zhing sbas pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje rtse mo las/ shin tu
340b1(rgyud): gsang ba stug po'i tshogs kyi las thams cad bsdus pa ste drug pa las/ sems dpa' bcu drug gi bshad pa zhes bya ba bshad pa'i dang po rdzogs so// //
340b2(rgyud): ci yi phyir ni phyag rgyar brjod/ /gang gis phyag rgya bcings gyur pa/ /de ni srog chags gdug kun dang / /'gro ba sdig can thams cad dang / /rtag tu rgyas ni btab par 'gyur/ /
340b3(rgyud): ci phyir sngags su brjod par bya/ /gsang sngags rnams ni 'bod byed cing / /gdug pa thams cad skrod par byed/ /nyon mongs sngags rnams 'joms byed cing / /sangs
340b4(rgyud): rgyas chos ni spyan 'dren yin/ /ci phyir zhe na rig sngags brjod/ /'dod chags mun pa rnams 'dul zhing / /nyon mongs rnams kyang rnam par 'dul/ /ma rig pa ni zlog
340b5(rgyud): byed pa/ /de ni rig sngags legs par brjod/ /gzungs sngags rnams ni ci yin brjod/ /chos rnams kyi ni rten byed cing / /srid pa'i phyogs ni rab 'joms byed/ /sangs
340b6(rgyud): rgyas chos rnams thob byed cing / /dge ba la brten sbyin pa'ang yin/ /phyag rgya yi ni mtshan nyid brjod/ /sangs rgyas kun dang brtul zhugs ldan/ /byang chub sems
340b7(rgyud): dpa' rnams dang ni/ /rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad dag /spyod lam phyag rgyas mtshon par byed/ /sngags rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid kyang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs yin
341a1(rgyud): @#/ /te| |chos kyi snying po sgrub byed cing / /chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag ldan/ /sngags kyi mtshan nyid yin par brjod/ /rig sngags kyi ni mtshan
341a2(rgyud): nyid gsungs/ /'khor bar myong ba'i sdug bsngal dang / /'dod chags la sogs nyes pa'i tshogs/ /rigs dang bcas pa zhi byed pa'i/ /rig sngags kyi ni mtshan
341a3(rgyud): nyid brjod/ /de bzhin kho nar gzugs sngags kyi/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams 'dzin byed cing / /chos rnams 'dzin par byed pa dang / /dge ba zhes bya ba 'dzin byed
341a4(rgyud): pa| |gzungs sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid brjod/ /rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i gnas ni gang / /ji ltar bcing bya thub chen po/ /phyag rgya dag ni 'ching ba ni/ /ji ltar rdo rje can kun
341a5(rgyud): mnyes/ /dang po kho nar khrus bya zhing / /de bzhin phyogs dag bcing ba dang / log 'dren rnams kyang bcing bya ste/ /gos dag gtsang ma mgo bya zhing / /grong dang
341a6(rgyud): yul 'khor dag dang ni/ /grong khyer dang ni grong rdal rnams/ /de yi dbus su phyag rgya dang /nam yang bcing bar mi bya ste/ /lha khang yang na dgon pa'am/ /ri bo yi
341a7(rgyud): ni phug dag gam/ /rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dben zhing / /'du 'dzi med pa'i gnas gtsang ma/ /der ni skyil krung bca' bar bya/ /bkra shis skyil krung nyid bya ste/ /
341b1(rgyud): ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /byang chub snying por bcings pa bzhin/ /der ni mig dag btsum bya zhing / /so la so ni bzhag par bya/ /mchu gnyis dag kyang
341b2(rgyud): mnyam bya zhing / /dran pa rtse gcig byas nas kyang / /sbyor me sbyor ba'i sngags bzla zhing / /phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya/ /phyag rgya'i rnam pa de lta bu'i/ /bcings pas
341b3(rgyud): rdo rje can kun mnyes/ /rig sngags ji ltar bzla bar bya/ /dbang phyug chen po gsang bas gsungs/ /rig sngags dag ni zlos pa na/ /ji ltar yid kyis rdo rje bzlas/ /skyil
341b4(rgyud): krung ji lta ba bzhin bya/ /dran dang yid ni ma yongs pas/ /rig sngags dag ni bzla bya zhing / /sku nyid kyang ni bsam par bya/ /mchu yis ma yin lces kyang min/ /rkan
341b5(rgyud): nyid kyis kyang ma yin te/ /lce dang lkog mas kyang ma yin/ /rtag tu snying gnas kyang min/ /shin tu phra ba'i yid kyis ni/ /sems ni chos nyid nang chud bya/ /de ltar bzlas
341b6(rgyud): pa byas na ni/ /yid kyis rdo rje bzlas pa yin/ /oM ni ci zhig yin par bshad/ /mchog dang nor ster dpal dang g.yang / /skal bzang rnam pa dang ldan zhing / /dam bca' ba
341b7(rgyud): dang bkra shis don/ /nor bu 'dzin pa'i snying po yin/ /yi ge hUM ni ci yin brjod/ /sdug bsngal 'chos shing 'joms par byed/ /srid pa'i zhags pa gcod byed cing / /
342a1(rgyud): @#/ /gdug pa sngags shing gsod byed pa'i/ /hUM ni mchog tu dran par bya/ /yi ge phaT ni ci yin brjod/ /gdug dang sdug bsngal 'joms byed cing /
342a2(rgyud): bde ba dag ni 'gugs par byed/ /phaT ni 'joms byed sgra yin te/ /grogs dang bcas pa 'joms par byed/ /swA hA zhes pa ci yin brjod/ /sdig pa thams cad zhi byed
342a3(rgyud): cing | |dge ba'i tshogs ni 'phel bar byed/ /nyes par byas pa 'phrog byed cing / /sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog /mchod pa ci phyir brjod par bya/ /
342a4(rgyud): mchod par byed pas mchod pa ste/ /gang du bsad bya mi 'jigs pa'i/ /de yi mchod pa rnam mang 'gyur/ /pha rol gyi ni mchod pa min/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kun
342a5(rgyud): gyis mchod/ /de bzhin du ni thar pa'i mchog /gsang ba'i mchod pa de rnams ni/ /'jigs med rgyal sras rnams kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin dang //
342a6(rgyud): nyid kyi sras kyi mtshungs med pa'i/ /cho ga sgrub pa'i gsang ba ni/ /rtag tu rig pa 'dzin pa'i mchog /de bzhin dam tshig shes nyid kyang / /zhugs pa gang dang gang
342a7(rgyud): yin pa/ /de ni dam tshig shes pa yin/ /dam tshig goms par byed pa yang / /dam tshig shes pa yin par brjod/ /bskal pa grangs med 'das pa yi/ /byang chub
342b1(rgyud): sems dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i dam tshig la zhugs pa/ /de yi dam tshig shes par brjod/ /ci yi phyir na dkyil 'khor yin/ /dam pa'i chos kyi bcud snying
342b2(rgyud): po| |'byung bas de ni dkyil 'khor brjod/ /dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba che/ /chos chen shin tu bstan pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga ji lta bu/ /cho ga chos dang rnal 'byor
342b3(rgyud): te| |gsang ba'i thar pa yang dag 'byung / /skye ba 'di nyid kho na la/ /rab dga' sgrub par byed pa'i mchog /dkyil 'khor du ni zhugs pa yi/ /skyes pa'am yang na bud med
342b4(rgyud): kyis| |bya ba gang zhig bya ba ni/ /gsungs shig gsang ba'i dbang phyug che/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro dang / /byang chub sems chen bskyed pa dang / /de bzhin
342b5(rgyud): du ni sgrub pa'i mchog / shin tu bstan par bya ba yin/ /thub pa'i dkyil 'khor zhugs pa la/ /sdom pa ji ltar sbyin par bya/ /khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya/ /
342b6(rgyud): ma byin par yang blang mi ba/ /'dod pas log par g.yem mi bya/ /brdzun du yang ni smra mi bya/ /nyes pa kun gyi rtsa ba yi/ /chang dag 'thung ba spang bar bya/ /bya ba ma yin
342b7(rgyud): thams cad dor/ /mchog tu sems can gdul bar bya/ /dam pa rnams la rim gro dang / /rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya/ /rnal 'byor rig pa bsgrub pa'i
343a1(rgyud): @#/ /phyir| |mkhas pa rnams la bsnyen par bya/ /lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang / /ngag gi yang ni rnam pa bzhi/ /yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag
343a2(rgyud): kyang | |ci nus par ni bsrung bar bya/ /slob dpon brnyas par mi bya ste/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs/ /sngags dang phyag rgya rnams la yang / /nam yang
343a3(rgyud): brnyas par mi bya'o/ /'khor lo rdo rje pad+ma sogs/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya gang yin pa/ /'gom pa nyid du mi bya zhing / /bza' bar yang ni mi bya'o/ /de bzhin dman
343a4(rgyud): ma lha yi grib/ /rkang pa dag gis brdzi mi bya/ /de yi steng du 'dug mi bya/ /slar yang gzhag par mi bya'o/ /lha yi phyag mtshan bzang po dang / /lha yi bzhon pa'i
343a5(rgyud): mtshan ma rnams/ /'gom zhing brnyas par mi bya ste/ /sems can la ni gnod mi bya/ /de yis srog gi phyir yang ni/ /'dor bar mi bya gang zhig yin/ /'tsho ba'i srog
343a6(rgyud): gi phyir yang ni/ /byang chub sems ni dor mi bya/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya ni/ /nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la dad pa yang / /rnam pa kun tu btang mi bya//
343a7(rgyud): sdom pa btang bar mi bya zhing / /bdag nyid gdung bar mi bya'o/ /khrus kyi las ni ji ltar bya/ /mi dge bcu ni spongs nas su/ /dge ba bcu ni sten byed cing / /'byung
343b1(rgyud): po rnams la phan 'dod pa/ /nang gi bdag nyid khrus su 'dod/ /bdag nyid rab tu dag bya'i phyir/ /bdag nyid phyag rgya rgyas gdab phyir/ /phyag rgya thams cad yang dag
343b2(rgyud): bcings/ /rnal 'byor pa yi khrus su brjod/ /gsang ba'i mkhas ldan khas len pa'i/ /chu yi khrus ni bya ba ste/ /las 'di rnam par rtog pa'i khrus/ /rdo rje slob dpon dag
343b3(rgyud): gis bya/ /yang na tshogs khrus bya ba/ /mchog tu ngo mtshar bshad bya ste/ /dang por bdag nyid go bgo zhing / /bdag nyid bkru ba'i phyir du ni/ /khro bo yang ni dran par bya/ /don
343b4(rgyud): kun rab tu sgrub byed pa'i/ /yig gnyis go cha bzang po yin/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin drag chen dang / /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ste/ /oM badzra kI li kI li badzra hUM phaT/ oM TuM
343b5(rgyud): go cha'o/ /oM hUM AHrdo rje gnod sbyin gyi'o/ /oM a mr-i te hUM phaT/ bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i 'o/ /rdo rje'i gsang sngags 'di dang ni/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje 'bar
343b6(rgyud): rab bzod dka' bas/ /bdag nyid dag ni 'bar par bya/ /oM d+hu pi d+hu pi kA ya d+hu pi pra dzA la ni swA hA/ chu yi nang du 'jug pa dang / /snyim pa gsum ni blugs pa dang / /
343b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi rigs dag la/ /rig sngags 'di ni 'dod pa yin/ /rig sngags mngon par bzlas pa yi/ /sa yi phung po gsum dag ni/ /bdag gi stod dang smad
344a1(rgyud): @#/ /dang dbus/ /rab tu dag byed mchog yin no/ /oM b+hur dza la hUM/ sangs rgyas thams cad rjes dran pas/ /rig sngags thams cad mngon bzlas
344a2(rgyud): ba'i| |chu ni phyag rgya kun gyis blang / /rig sngags 'di ni gsang bar 'dod/ /phyogs ni ji ltar bcing ba yin/ /me lha rgyal chen shar phyogs su/ /lho yi phyogs su gshin
344a3(rgyud): rje dang / /nub tu rlung lha nyid dang ni/ /byang du chu lha gzhom par 'dod/ /rnal 'byor pa yis gzugs bzhi ni/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu nges par bcing / /de nas steng
344a4(rgyud): 'og mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje nag mos nges par gcad/ /bgegs bcing ba ni ji ltar lags/ /rdo rje khu tshur rab 'bar dang / /rdo rje nyi ma ltar 'bar dang / /rdo
344a5(rgyud): rje can gyi phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs bcing ba ni brtan par 'gyur/ /dga' ba chen po ji lta bu/ /rab tu gus bcas phyag dag bya/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis phyogs bzhi
344a6(rgyud): ru| |lnga pa brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /steng dang 'og dang mtshams rnams su/ /bstod dang bcas pa'i phyag bya'o/ /rdo rje slob dpon skal chen gyi/ /mchog tu gsang
344a7(rgyud): ba'i dam pa yis/ /brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du/ /de bzhin du ni bcing bar bya/ /mchod pa ji ltar yin zhe na/ /rig sngags mngon par bzlas mchod
344b1(rgyud): dang | |phyag rgya bcing ba lhur len dang / /rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i mchod pa dang / /sgrub pa dag gi mchod pa'o/ /sbyin sreg las ni ji lta bu/ /lus kyi las ni rnam
344b2(rgyud): gsum dang / /ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang / /yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag dang / /bsreg bya sbyin sreg mchog yin no/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung ba'o/ /de nas rdo rje rig
344b3(rgyud): 'dzin gyi/ /snying po gsang ba kun bsdus pa'i/ /shin tu sbas pa dam pa'i mchog /de kho na nyid bshad par bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon spyod chen ldan/ /dkyil 'khor gsang
344b4(rgyud): bar rab tu zhugs/ /slob dpon las ni dbang bskur thob/ /gsang dang dgongs pa kun shes shing / /dpa' zhing brtan la brtson 'grus che/ /yid gzhungs 'dzin cing
344b5(rgyud): gsal bar ldan/ /dul drang bshes gnyen can dag gis/ /rdo rje slob dpon nyid bya'o/ /dang por ji srid tshogs par bya/ zla ba'am yang na zla ba phyed/ /yang na lo yi bar
344b6(rgyud): du ni/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs sbyang bar bya/ /gal te de ni sangs rgyas kyi/ /rig 'dzin grub pa rnam gsum mo/ /ji ste rdo rje can gyi yin/ /rnam ba gsum du nges pa yin/ /nor
344b7(rgyud): bu rigs can bzang po la/ /rnal 'byor bzhi po nyid bya'o/ /ji ste pad+ma 'byung ba la/ /rnal 'byor bzhi ni rab tu bsgrub/ /ji ste las kyi rang bzhin bzang / /las rnams kun
345a1(rgyud): @#/ /gyi rigs las ni/ /sbyor ba bzhi ni yang dag byung / /rnam pa bco brgyad dag tu 'gyur/ /snga dro phyi dro nyin phyed dang / /nam gyi stod smad gung la ni/ /
345a2(rgyud): bya ba chen po kun bya ste/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rigs/ /dang por re zhig rnal 'byor che/ /chen pos phyogs kun phyag bya ste/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor cho ga yis/ /rdo rje slob
345a3(rgyud): dpon nyid bya'o/ /shes rab chen pos sangs rgyas kun/ /yang dang yang du dran bya ste/ /bdag nyid chen pos sangs rgyas kun/ /rdo rje bsngags kyis bskul bar bya/ /oM
345a4(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta pU dze pa s+thA nA ya/ At+mA nAM nI R+ya ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ shar gyi phyogs su song nas ni/ /yan lag kun gyis phyag byas
345a5(rgyud): te| / rdo rje'i gsang sngags 'di yis ni/ /bdag nyid dbul bar bya ba yin/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA a b+hi She kA ya/ /At+mA nAM ni r+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra rat+na a b+hi Shany+tsa
345a6(rgyud): mAM| rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni/ /lho phyogs su ni phyag byas te/ /sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad la/ /bdag ni dbul bar bya ba yin/ /de nas nub kyi phyogs su
345a7(rgyud): ni| / sngags 'di yis hi phyag byas te/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA pra brta nA ya/ At+mA nAM nir+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+harma pra brta yA mi/ dag pa'i chos can
345b1(rgyud): slob dpon ches/ /nub phyogs su ni phyag byas te/ /rdo rje'i sngags 'dis bskul bya zhing / /bdag nyid rab tu dbul bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA karma Ne At+mA nAM nir+yA ta yA mi/
345b2(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karma ku ru mAM/ mchod dang dbang bskur las ldan zhing / /byang du chos la nges sbyor bas/ /byang phyogs su ni phyag byas te/ /bdag nyid rdo rje las su 'gyur/ /
345b3(rgyud): shar du mchod pa'i las yin te/ /lho phyogs su ni dbang bskur ba/ /nub phyogs su ni chos chen po/ /byang du chos la nges par sbyor/ /thub pa kun gyi nyi ma'o/ /mgon po
345b4(rgyud): chen po rab btud gnas/ /phyogs rnams kun tu sngags 'di yis/ /phyag ni rab tu btsal bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta pra Na me na badzra ban d+ha naM ka ro mi/ de nas/
345b5(rgyud): ji skad bshad pa'i phyag bya ba/ /sangs rgyas la dmigs sems kyis ni/ /rab tu gus bcas phyag rgya rnams/ /myur du bsnyen pa'i sgrub pa yin/ /phyag byas 'og tu langs
345b6(rgyud): nas ni/ /bdag nyid kyis ni las rnams bya/ /bdag nyid dbul ba bzang po yi/ /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya ste/ /ma lus phyogs bzhugs mchog gyur pa/ /sangs
345b7(rgyud): rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /'di ltar nye bar zhi ba bdag /ci nas rdo rje nyid gyur mdzod/ /rdo rje'i rigs kyi mchog gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad la/
346a1(rgyud): @#/ /rtag tu rnam pa thams cad kyis/ /bdag nyid dag ni dbul bar bya/ /rdo rje'i gsang sngags de yis ni/ /bdag nyid dbul bar 'gyur ba yin/ /
346a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad ni/ /yang dang yang du rjes dran te/ /sdig pa la sogs nyon mongs kun/ /mya ngan 'das par bshags par bya/ /skye ba 'di 'am
346a3(rgyud): gzhan dag gi / sdig pa thams cad rnam spangs nas/ /sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad kyi/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs bskyed dang / /de bzhin sems can
346a4(rgyud): kun gyi la/ /rjes su yi rang bya ba yin/ /byang chub mya ngan mi 'da' bar/ /sangs rgyas kun la gsol ba gdab/ /byang chub sems ni thabs chen gyis/ /sems
346a5(rgyud): can sangs rgyas rjes dran bya/ /shin tu ngo mtshar mchod pa ni/ /ci nus par yang bsgrub par bya/ /yang na mya ngan 'da' sogs dang / /rnal 'byor dge ba sogs
346a6(rgyud): pa la/ /ngo mtshar gyur pa'i mchod pa yis/ /mchod pa'i sprin dag dbul bar bya/ /gnas 'di 'am ni gzhan dag na/ /lha sogs bdag gir ma byas pa'i/ /me
346a7(rgyud): tog chu skyes thang skyes rnams/ /thabs chen sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /de yi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ /thub pa'i dbang po rnams la dbul/ /rdo rje'i rnal
346b1(rgyud): 'byor 'di yis ni/ /me tog mchod pas rab mchod cing / /phyag rgya rnal 'byor bcas pa yis/ /phyogs rnams kun tu nges par spro/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pU dzA me g+ha sa
346b2(rgyud): mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ gang dag spos kyi shing bzang po/ /thub pa'i dbang phyug rnams la dbul/ /lha yi spos sogs rmad byung ba/ /phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya/ /
346b3(rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pa pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ dri yi shing rnams bzang po ni/ /thub pa'i dbang phyug rnams la dbul/ /phyag rgyar bcas rab bskul nas
346b4(rgyud): ni| |phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ rin chen rang bzhin rgya mtsho dang / /rin chen ri bo la sogs
346b5(rgyud): mchog / mchod pa'i sprin ni spro ba yis/ /phyogs rnams kun tu dbul bar bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta bo d+h+yang+ga rat+na a laM kA ra pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ rtsed
346b6(rgyud): 'jo bde ba dga' chen dang / /rgod dang sgeg la sogs pa'i tshogs/ /phyogs rnams kun tu thams cad nas/ /dga' ba'i mchog ni spro bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta hA s+ye
346b7(rgyud): lA s+ye ra ti kri DA sau khya a nut+ta ra pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ gos dang rgyan sogs 'byung ba yi/ /de bzhin dpag bsam shing bzang po/ /de yi sngags ni brjod
347a1(rgyud): @#/ /bya zhing / /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+tar bo d+hi a lang kA ra was+t+ra pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ rin chen
347a2(rgyud): bzang po cher 'bar dang / /snang ba'i shing las byung ba dang / /zla ba nyi ma la sogs 'od/ /phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a lo ka pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha
347a3(rgyud): ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal che/ /yang dang yang du rjes dran nas/ /snying rje bskyed pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed par bya/ /byang chub tu
347a4(rgyud): ni sems bskyed nas/ /sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing / /phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra bo d+hi tsit+ta pU
347a5(rgyud): dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sems can kun la bde legs dang / /'byung po kun la byams pa dang / /dud 'gro kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /ngan 'gro thams cad
347a6(rgyud): zhi 'dod dang / /byams dang snying rje btang snyoms dang / /dga' ba tshangs pa'i rnal 'byor byung / /rdo rje'i sngags ni brjod bya zhing / /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/ /
347a7(rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra mahA tsa tur brah+ma bi hA ra pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin spyod pas/ /sems can thams cad dpal dang ni/ /
347b1(rgyud): nor dang ldan pa grub par shog /bde ba ma tshang med par shog /ces pas dbul zhing spro bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA badzrod+b+ha ba dA na pA ra mi tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na
347b2(rgyud): sa ma ye hUM/ sems can thams cad byang chub dang / /sdom la rab tu gnas par shog /rgyags sogs nyes pa chen po rnams/ /shi 'gyur kun tu spro bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga
347b3(rgyud): ta a nut+ta ra mahA bo d+hi ha ra shI la pA ra mi tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ 'jigs dang 'khon sogs sdug bsngal la/ /sogs pa'i 'jigs kun zhi gyur cig /
347b4(rgyud): byams dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /chos la bdag med bsgrub par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra mahA d+harma a ba bo d+hi k+ShAn+ti pA ra mi tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma
347b5(rgyud): ye hUM/ 'khor ba mthar thug bar du ni/ /bdag 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig /de bzhin sems can thams cad ni/ /de nyid sgrub pa byed par shog /oM sarba ta thA ga ta san sA
347b6(rgyud): ra pA ri t+yA ga a nut+ta ra biR+ya pA ra mi tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ srog chags kun gyi 'dod chags sogs/ /nyon mongs chen po zhi bar shog /sems can
347b7(rgyud): thams cad g.yeng med cing / /bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan par shog /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra mahA sau khya bi hA ra d+h+ya na pA ra mi tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/
348a1(rgyud): @#/ /sangs rgyas ye shes shes rab che/ /sdug bsngal gcod byed bla na med/ /shes rab sbyor bas dag byed pa'i/ /sangs rgyas sems can dag gyur
348a2(rgyud): cig |oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra kle sha ts+tshe da sarba d+har+m+ma sa man+ta dz+nyA na mahA pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ stong gsum gyi ni rdul snyed kyi/ /bdag
348a3(rgyud): nyid kyis ni rnam bsam zhing / /mchod pa'i phyir ni rnam bsam nas/ /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya nir+yA ta na pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na
348a4(rgyud): sa ma ye hUM/ stong gsum gyi ni rdul snyed kyi/ /bdag nyid kyis ni rnam bsam zhing / /lce ni de nyid ldan dang bcas/ /sangs rgyas bsngags pa brjod par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA
348a5(rgyud): ga ta bA ka ni r+yI ta na pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas rnal 'byor de nyid kyis/ /lus dang ngag sems byung ba yi/ /mchod pa dag ni bsdus nas su/ /sangs
348a6(rgyud): rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta nir+yA ta na pU dza me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ grags chen ldan pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /ma lus kun la mchod
348a7(rgyud): nas ni/ /dge ba dag ni bsdus byas nas/ /sems can don du bsngo bar bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rjes dran nas/ /sems dpa' skyil krung bca' bar bya/ /byams
348b1(rgyud): sogs rnal 'byor chen po rnams/ /phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya/ /go cha mchog gi yig gnyis kyis/ /blo ldan bdag nyid go bgo zhing / /rig sngags gang zhig
348b2(rgyud): mngon 'dod pa'i/ /rig sngags de ni bzla bar bya/ /rgyud chen gsang ba 'di ru ni/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i sngags bzlas pa/ /brgya rtsa bcu ru bshad pa yin/ /yang na nyi shu
348b3(rgyud): rtsa gcig go / cho ga'i sbyor ba 'bring la ni/ /thun mong du ni rnam lngar bshad/ /gang gis sdig can 'grub 'gyur ba'i/ /gsang ba'i bzlas pa rnal 'byor che/ /de bzhin
348b4(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs mchog la/ /bzlas pa 'di ni mchog yin no/ /bkra shis skyil krung bcas nas ni/ /sems kyis sangs rgyas la dmigs nas/ /blo dang
348b5(rgyud): ldan pa bdag nyid ni/ /rtag tu kun mkhyen sangs rgyas bsam/ /gtsug tor la sogs mtshan bzang dang / /ldan par bdag gis lus bsams te/ /sangs rgyas
348b6(rgyud): snying po nang 'dug cing / /nga nyid sangs rgyas zhes su bsam/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las byung ba'i/ /gang gis 'khor lo rnam sprul pa/ /mngon par byang chub chen po
348b7(rgyud): yis| |chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya/ /gdul bya'i tshogs ni longs spyod pa'i/ /chos dang longs spyod sprul pa'ang 'grub/ /gnas ni yongs su gyur pa yis/ /sems
349a1(rgyud): @#/ /ni kun bzhi las byung min/ /bsod nams ye shes rab rdzogs phyir/ /zla ba gang bar rnam par brtags/ /zla ba gang ba dri med pa/ /snying ga ru ni
349a2(rgyud): bsgom par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rig pa'i yi ge rnam par bsgom/ /de lta bu yi tshul mchog gis/ /zla ba phyed na 'grub par 'gyur/ /mtshams
349a3(rgyud): med lnga po byed pa yang / /lo gcig na ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /ji srid skyo bar mi 'gyur ba'i/ /de srid rnal 'byor chen pos bzlas/ /lus ni ngal bar gyur pa na/ /phyag
349a4(rgyud): rgya bcing ba brtsam par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas pa'i/ /de tshe byang chub mchog bcings bya/ /yang na chos 'byung zhes pa'am/ /shin tu rmad byung dpal
349a5(rgyud): be'u'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i rigs bzlas pa/ /phyag na rdo rje rang bdag nyid/ /byang chub snying po la gnas bdag /bdag ni phyag na rdo rje bstan/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
349a6(rgyud): dbus su ni/ /rdo rje'i gzugs ni rnam par bsgom/ /gsang chen rdo rje'i dbus su ni/ /rig pa'i yi ge rnam par bsgom/ /de nas pad+ma'i rigs bzlas pa/ /pad+ma sems
349a7(rgyud): dpa' rang bdag nyid/ /zla ba'i dbus su pad+ma che/ /pad+ma'i dbus su yi ge rnams/ /de bzhin rin chen rigs bzlas pa'i/ /rin chen rgyal po rang bdag nyid/ /zla
349b1(rgyud): ba'i dbus su rin po che/ /rin chen dbus su'ang yi ge rnams/ /de nas las kyi rigs bzang po/ /rnal 'byor don kun sgrub byed la/ /sangs rgyas snying por rang bdag nyid/ /rdo
349b2(rgyud): rje las su rnam par bsgom/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rin chen rdo rje rnam par bsgom/ /rin chen rtse mo rdo rje che/ /de yi dbus su'ang yi ge rnams/ /rigs lnga yi
349b3(rgyud): ni bzlas pa 'di/ /gsang ba'i bzlas pa brjod par bya/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ /bzlas rgyud gsang ba mchog 'dzin pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas
349b4(rgyud): pa'i| |sangs rgyas bdag nyid bkra shis 'dzin/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam par bsgom/ /sangs rgyas de yi thugs dbus su/ /rig
349b5(rgyud): pa'i yi ge rnam par bsgom/ /rang gi lus ni bdag med cing / /chos dang gang zag stong pa nyid/ /sangs rgyas de dag gi gzugs ni/ /bdag med par ni rnam par bsam/ /
349b6(rgyud): lus ni sangs rgyas zhes brjod pas/ /sangs rgyas de yang yod ma yin/ /phung po dang ni skye mched khams/ /chos zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas med/ /gang zag nyid kyis sangs
349b7(rgyud): rgyas med/ /sangs rgyas med pa yang ma yin/ /pha rol phyin drug sa bon te/ /shes rab sa bon sbyong mdzad pa'i/ /gnas dang gnas min skal ldan pa/ /de nyid byang chub bdag
350a1(rgyud): @#/ /med 'dzin/ /de lta bus ni gsang chen gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas na/ /myur bar slob dpon chen po yis/ /rab tu dga'
350a2(rgyud): ba 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje'i rigs bzlas pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir/ /rdo rje'i gzugs su rnam par bsgom/ /
350a3(rgyud): rdo rje de yi lte dbus su/ /rig pa'i ye shes rnam par bsgom/ /dngos med zhes bya rdo rje de/ /byang chub 'bras bu gang yin pa'o/ /gang zhig rdo rje zhes su bshad/ /gang zhig
350a4(rgyud): de nyid 'gyur med pa'i/ /lus kyi de nyid ces brjod la/ /gang zhig chos dang chos nyid stong / /gzugs la sogs pa'i chos chen po/ /'byung ba che sgra 'dzin pa med/ /lus
350a5(rgyud): ni gzugs zhes bya bar brjod/ /gzugs zhes bya bar yod ma yin/ /gzugs de yang ni rnam phye la/ /phra mo'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom/ /cha shas su ni rnam phye na/ /cha
350a6(rgyud): shas zhes bya yod ma yin/ /gzugs ni stong pa zhes bshad do/ /'di ni rdo rje zhes byar bstan/ /gzugs sogs chos rnams thams cad ni/ /stong pa nyid ni rnam
350a7(rgyud): par bsgom/ /de lta bu yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /rab tu dga' ba bsgrub par bya/ /de nas rin chen rigs bzlas pa/ /rdo rje rin chen rigs bdag nyid/ /stong gsum
350b1(rgyud): gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir/ /stong nyid nam mkhar rnam par bsgom/ /de ni nam mkhar rnal 'byor chos/ /rtog pa dang bcas yi ger bsam/ /chos kun dngos med ces bya ba/ /
350b2(rgyud): stong nyid de bzhin nyid ces brjod/ /dngos med ces bya'i gzugs med de/ /mkha' mtshungs sangs rgyas spyod yul lo/ /gang la gzugs ni yod min pa'i/ /mig ces bya ba
350b3(rgyud): ci yin brjod/ /mig de yang ni gang zhig gi /mig ces bya ba yin par brjod/ /bdag po rgyal po 'di gang zhig /'di yi skye ba'ang ji lta bu'i/ /'byung ba chen po bzhi 'dus las/ /
350b4(rgyud): mig gi dbang po yang dag byung / /mig de la yang gzugs med la/ /ci zhig byed de yod pa'ang min/ /mig ni ji lta ba bzhin du/ /thams cad gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs/ /
350b5(rgyud): bzlas pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /chos chen po yi dbang bskur 'gyur/ /de nas pad+ma'i rigs bzlas pa/ /pad+ma'i sems dpa' rang bdag nyid/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten
350b6(rgyud): 'dir/ /pad+ma'i gzugs su rnam par bsgom/ /pad+ma shin tu dag de la/ /rig pa'i ye shes rnam par bsgom/ /shes rab chen pos pad+ma de/ /chos kyi snying por bsam par
350b7(rgyud): bya| |pad+ma chu yis ma gos shing / /'dam gyi nyes pas gos mi 'gyur/ /sems can thams cad de bzhin dag /chos ni gzod las ma skyes pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs
351a1(rgyud): @#/ /nyid 'di gang zhig /chos dang chos nyid stong gang yin/ /gzugs sogs chos rnams thams cad kyi/ /chos nyid de bzhin nyid du 'dod/ /de

351a3(rgyud): zhes bya ba med/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul snang / /e ma'o sangs rgyas de dag snang / /rang gi las kyang sgrub par mdzad/ /de lta bu yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /rdo rje slob
351a4(rgyud): dpon dka' thub che/ /tshe 'di nyid la dam pa yi/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni mchog thob 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i snying sogs phyag rgya ni/ /rdo rje rigs la bdag por bshad/ /rin chen
351a5(rgyud): la sogs dbang bskur zhing / /dag pa'i mchog ni pad mchog 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas sku ni chos chen la/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor nges bstan bya/ /byang chub mchog ni kun

351a7(rgyud): nyung ba'ang rung / /phreng ba sangs rgyas la mdzub bcas/ /gung mos rdo rje'i rnal 'byor skyes/ /srin lag steng du rin chen skyes/ /mthe'u chung gis ni pad kha phye/ /las

351b5(rgyud): phreng ba dang ldan bya/ /ji ltar sngar bshad gsang ba sogs/ /rmad byung chen po'i bzlas par bya/ /ci yi phyir na bzlas pa brjod/ /dge ba la brtson rgyal 'gyur zhing / /rmad
351b6(rgyud): byung rnams kyang mthong 'gyur la/ /byang chub spyod pa rgyal 'gyur zhing / /sangs rgyas rol pa mngon par 'gyur/ /bzlas pas skyon langs nas ni/ /phyag rgya dag ni bcing bar
351b7(rgyud): bya| |sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir/ /phyogs kun tu ni 'dud par bshad/ /byang chub sems tshul thob byed pa'i/ /mdo sogs gsang ba bklag par bya/ /bsod nams
352a1(rgyud): @#/ /tshogs ni bskyed pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa yang dag bya/ /de nas zas kyi dus su ni/ /rnam pa kun tu chang bu sbyin/ /sangs rgyas

352b1(rgyud): blang ba/ /gos kyang lan gsum brje bar bya/ /gtsang gos lan gsum yang ni sbyin/ /sha dang chang btsong la sogs pa/ /dri ngan kha yi sgregs pa dang / /'khrig pa 'dod

352b3(rgyud): legs rgyan ni 'chang bar byed/ /kun rdzob don dam rnam pa gnyis/ /bslab pa'i sdom pa blang bar bya/ /chung ngu bza' zhing bsten par bya/ /kha ni nang du lta yid ches/ /sngags
352b4(rgyud): dang phyag rgya rig sngags dang / /gzungs dang lha dang bla ma dang / /rdo rje la sogs mtshon cha bzang / /lha yi gnas dang yang dag ldan/ /'jigs min g.yo dang sgyu can min/ /mi
352b5(rgyud): brtan pa yi blo can min/ /mya ngan 'das la dga' ba min/ /sems ni dbang pos phrogs pa min/ /blo ldan 'jig rten 'dir mi dga'/ /de bzhin pha rol dga' ba min/ /
352b6(rgyud): lus srog btang snyoms mi bya zhing / /bslab pa las ni 'da' mi bya/ /skrag ldan nga rgyal ldan pa min/ /'jig rten bya ba 'dod mi bya/ /de lta'i ngo mtshar tshul la ni/ /rnal

353b1(rgyud): snying po skyes/ /snying po 'dzin cing dkyil 'khor mchod/ /dgongs pa de nyid tshul shes 'di/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul don shes/ /mchod sbyin lhag pa'i mchod dam pa'i/ /gsang

353b7(rgyud): yang na ded dpon yin yang rung / /ngos bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan/ /lnga pa las ni chung mi bya/ /yang na gang zhig gzhan dag gam/ /sgrub pa po dag yin yang rung / /bcu
354a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa las ni chung mi bya/ /zur bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan/ /rgya cher yang ni mi bya'o/ /yang na sgrub byed slob dpon yin/ /drug pa bas ni chung mi bya//

356b7(rgyud): bya| |rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bcad par bya/ /rdo rje cod pan phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad brdung bar bya/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag
357a1(rgyud): @#/ /rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya/ /rdo rje 'phrul 'khor phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad btsir bar bya/ /rdo rje kha
357a2(rgyud): T+wAM phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gtub par bya/ /rdo rje mdung thung phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad dbug par bya/ /rdo rje sregs byed phyag rgya
357a3(rgyud): yis| |bgegs rnams thams cad bsreg par bya/ /rdo rje 'khor byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bskor bar bya/ /rdo rje srad bu'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs
357a4(rgyud): rnams thams cad bskyod par bya/ /rdo rje zlog byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad rnam par brlag /rdo rje 'joms byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams
357a5(rgyud): cad gzhom par bya/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad 'jig par byed/ /rdo rje za byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar
357a6(rgyud): bya| |rdo rje bca' byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bca' bar bya/ /rdo rje dral ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad dral bar bya/ /rdo rje sgyel

357b1(rgyud): yis| |bgegs rnams thams cad bsad par bya/ /rdo rje 'tsho byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad 'tsho bar bya/ /rdo rje sgrub pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams
357b2(rgyud): thams cad yang dag bsgrub/ /rdo rje rgyas 'debs phyag rgya yis/ /gdug pa thams cad rgyas gdab bya/ /rdo rje rlung gi phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad rlung la bskur/ /
