357b4(rgyud): rnams thams cad brgyal bar bya/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad sbyin sreg bya/ /rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gzung

357b7(rgyud): bgegs rnams thams cad bsdigs par bya/ /rdo rje 'gas byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad dgas par bya/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs kyi
358a1(rgyud): @#/ /rigs kun gzhom par bya/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin bzod dka' dang / /rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba dang / /rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje rkang
358a2(rgyud): pas bsnun par bya/ /bgegs 'joms pa yi phyag rgya yis/ /de nas steng gi bgegs gzhom bya/ /mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i mchog /rdo rje chen po'i gsang rgyud las/ /
358a3(rgyud): rdo rje khro bo'i snyoms 'jug bya/ /brgya dang rtsa bcu lhag pa dang / /rdo rje slob dpon gsang ba ni/ /rgyas pa ru ni yongs su bstan/ /bgegs la sogs pa gdug pa kun/ /chad pa
358a4(rgyud): bcad phyir btus pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub bya'i phyir/ /sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam/ /rnam pa brgyad dang rtsa bcu lhag /rdo rje slob dpon gsang ba ni/ /
358a5(rgyud): 'di ni gsang ba'i rgyud chen po/ /rgyud de las ni rab tu bshad/ /gsang ba'i sbyin sreg cho gar bcas/ /gzhan yang dang por rab bshad bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po gsang
358a6(rgyud): ba'i las/ /sbyin sreg las ni rgyun mi gcad/ /las rnams thams cad btus pa yi/ /gsang ba rgyud chen 'di ru ni/ /sbyin sreg rnam pa nyi shu yis/ /thams cad bsdus par
358a7(rgyud): 'gyur ba yin/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / /mngon spyod kyi ni las dang ni/ /tshe spel ba dang dgug pa dang / /nor dang 'bru ni 'phel ba dang / /bsrung dang bsrung ba min dang
358b1(rgyud): bgegs/ /sdig pa thams cad rab gzhom dang / /bcing dang bsad dang drag po dang / /chags dang rjes su bcom pa dang / /dbang du bya dang gzugs bzang nyid/ /'dod dga'i
358b2(rgyud): gzugs su snang ba dang / /mkha' la 'gro dang dngos grub kyi/ /rdzas ni grub par bya ba la/ /sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor byed pa yi/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis de bya/ /de lta bu yi rnam pa yi/ /

358b6(rgyud): bsad la mche ba dang ldan pa'i/ /ci 'dod gzugs la gang yang rung / /mi snang ba la gzhu dang ldan/ /phyogs dang mkha' 'phur la lcags kyu/ /bka' byed phyag rgya bsgrub pa
358b7(rgyud): dang | |dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub pa la/ /'khor lo 'am ni gru bzhi'o/ /rdzas dang sman ni 'grub pa la/ /thab khung bud med yan lag mtshungs/ /yang na thun mong dngos grub gyi//
359a1(rgyud): @#/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ji lta ba/ /sbyin sreg thab khung de mtshungs 'gyur/ /rig 'dzin dngos grub bzang ldan zhing
359a2(rgyud): thams cad phun tshogs de ltar 'gyur/ /'khor lo sogs la cung zad mthar/ /sbyin sreg thab khung brko bar bya/ /thab khung nyi shu'o// //dkyil 'khor cho ga thams
359a3(rgyud): cad la/ /thab khung gang zhig mthong tsam gyis/ /sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /thab khung bstan pa bshad par bya/ /sngon du thig ni gdab bya zhing / /tshon gyis sa phyogs
359a4(rgyud): legs par bri/ /gru bzhir thig brgyad ces bya ba/ /dbus kyi 'khor lo dbyung bar bya/ /gru bzhi'i cha ni mnyam pa ste/ /legs par bgos shing legs bris pa/ /rta babs bzhi

359a6(rgyud): rjer ldan/ /pad+ma'i nags kyi lcugs ma dang / /phreng ba rab tu 'khor ba dang / /spyi blugs phyag rgya chen po ni/ /shar gyi phyogs kyi cha ru bri/ /rtse gsum zla ba phyed pa dang / /ral
359a7(rgyud): gri khyu mchog mdzes rgyal mtshan/ /'od bcas bde ba phyag rgya che/ /lho yi phyogs su bri bar bya/ /'khor lo dung dang dbyug to dang / /rta babs glang po dang ni phag /phyag rgya
359b1(rgyud): nub tu bri bar bya/ /mdung thung dril bu ba dan dang / /rma bya de bzhin ra skyes dang / /khyim bya 'thab mo la phyogs pa/ /byang gi phyogs su bri bar bya/ /de yi dam tshig 'khor lo
359b2(rgyud): la| |sangs rgyas phyag rgya yang dag bri/ /dbus kyi gnas su cod pan te/ /phyi rol rdo rjes nye bar spras/ /rdo rje 'bar ba 'bar ba yi/ /rdo rje shar gyi phyogs cha ru/ /lho ru nor bu sna
359b3(rgyud): tshogs pa/ /nub tu pad+ma rdo rje'o/ /byang du rdo rje hUM mdzad de/ /gdug pa thams cad 'joms mdzad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje thabs chen rnams/ /phyi rol phyag rgya bcu drug tu/ /
359b4(rgyud): thab khung brkos pa gang yin pa/ /de yi bla re rnam par bsgom/ /me tog shing dang spos sogs kyis/ /ji bzhin du ni dkyil 'khor mchod/ /rang nyid khrus byas yan lag byugs/ /
359b5(rgyud): sna tshogs gos dang rgyan ldan pa/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu spras/ /dri dag bzang pos dbang bskur 'gyur/ /nga ni pad 'dzin rgyal po ste/ /thor tshugs dbus na de bzhin
359b6(rgyud): gshegs/ /yang na rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dbang bskur ldan/ /bud med sdug dang lhan cig tu/ /dpung pa dam du bsdams byas te/ /mtshan ma 'greng
359b7(rgyud): bar rab gyur nas/ /sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam/ /e ma'o bde ba bde chen po/ /'dod chags bde ba bla na med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'dod chags che/ /'jig rten
360a1(rgyud): @#/ /dbang phyug bdag grub mdzod/ /'dod chags bde ba rjes dran nas/ /'dod pa'i 'dod chags brtag mi bya/ /bud med khams ni bkug nas su/ //
360a2(rgyud): 'khrig pa bdun ni spang bar bya/ /mtshan ma langs par rab gyur nas/ /dbang po nye bar zhi byas te/ /'dod chags rjes dran gyur nas ni/ /sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam/ /mtshan
360a3(rgyud): ma phyag mtshan zhes brjod de/ /langs pa lhag par bya ba yin/ /rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya mtshan/ /mkhas pas lhag par bcang bar bya/ /rdo rje can dang byang sems kyi/ /byang chub sems
360a4(rgyud): ni brtan pa dang / /pha rol phyin pa drug gis mtshan/ /brtse bas rjes chags dngos grub ster/ /shes rab thabs la dga' ba bstan/ /rtag tu bsten par bya ba yin/ /mtshan
360a5(rgyud): ma langs par rab gyur nas/ /lhag par yang ni bsten par bya/ /mngon 'dod rig ma sdug gang yin/ /de la rnal 'byor pas 'o bya/ /lhag pas phyag rgya cher gyur nas/ /dpung pa
360a6(rgyud): dam du bsdams par bya/ /rab tu dga' ba mang po gang / /de ni rab dga'i sa ru 'dod/ /gang la chags par rab brtags pa/ /yang dang yang du dran par bya/ /rtse dang byams
360a7(rgyud): pas yang dag byugs/ /khrel yod pa yi gos kyis dgab/ /tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang dag byugs/ /byang chub gyi ni sems kyis brgyan/ /de 'dra'i brtul zhugs ldan pa yi//
360b1(rgyud): tshon rtsi chen po bsten par bya/ /gzhan yang phyi yi yan lag dag /gang phyir rdo rje can gyis 'dzin/ /sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga bzhin/ /shar du kha bltas sbyin sreg bya/ /ji skad gzhung

360b3(rgyud): par bshad/ /bcud kyi len la rdo rje'i sman/ /tshe 'phel de bzhin mi g.yo ba'i/ /rdo rje sman gyi rgya chen dang / /rdo rje rtse mo nor 'phel la/ /bsrung la 'khor lo cho ga ste/ /bzlog
360b4(rgyud): pa la ni rdo rje gzung / /g.yon pa lcags sgrog phyag rgya ches/ /sdig pa gzhom par bya bar bshad/ /bcing la rdo rje bcing ba ste/ /gsod la rdo rje gsod byed do/ /chags la rdo

361a1(rgyud): @#/ /yis ni sbyin sreg bya/ /rdo rje sna tshogs phyag rgya yis/ /sbyin sreg las la rgyas gdab bya/ /g.yon pa hUM ldan sdigs mdzub ste/ /g.yas pa mche
361a2(rgyud): ba gtsigs pa ste/ /mngon spyod kyi ni phyag rgya yis/ /rus pa'i phye mas phyogs rnams bcing / /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na hUM/ gr-i h+NA pa ya gr-i h+NA pa ya hUM/ A na
361a3(rgyud): ya ho b+ha ga ban bi d+yA rA dza hUM phaT/ g.yon pa chos 'chad dang ldan zhing / /g.yas pa yis ni sbyin sreg bya/ /sangs rgyas chos ni snyoms 'jug pas/ /til bsregs
361a4(rgyud): pas ni sdig pa bsregs/ /oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzrA ya swAhA/ lag pa g.yon pa rin chen gyur/ /g.yas pa yis ni sbyin sreg bya/ /'bru bdun yang na rin chen nas/ /yo
361a5(rgyud): byad kun gyis mnyes par bya/ /oM ma Ni rat+na kra ma kA ya swAhA/ shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas ni/ /mngar bas me ni rab sbar te/ /rnal 'byor pas ni 'bras bsregs
361a6(rgyud): na| |khyim ni nges par rgyas par 'gyur/ /oM badzra puSh+Ta ye swAhA/ shin tu mngar ba'i bud shing gis/ /me ni rab tu sbar byas te/ /ku sha'i myu gu til bcas pas/ /sbyin
361a7(rgyud): sreg byas na bsrung don mchog / oM badzra a pra ti ha ta badzrA swAhA/ yam shing mngar po nyid dang ni/ /de bzhin dUr ba'i myu gu dag /mar byugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya yis/ /
361b1(rgyud): bsregs na tshe 'phel byed pa'i mchog /oM badzra A yu She swAhA/ bud shing tsha ba rnams kyi ni/ /rdo rje khro bdag ting 'dzin gyis/ /thab khung du ni me sbar te/ /tshor ma rnams kyis
361b2(rgyud): dgug par bya/ /oM badzra A kaR+Sha ya swAhA/ de bzhin sna tshogs thams cad kyis/ /mkhas pa yis ni me sbar te/ /rtag tu chu skyes sbyin sreg byas/ /rdo rje 'ching bar 'gyur
361b3(rgyud): ba yin/ /oM badzra ban d+ha ya baM/ de bzhin sbyor ba'i cho ga yis/ /mkhas pas yam shing bsreg bya zhing / /'bras bu kha ba'i sbyin sreg byas/ /skad cig gis ni gsod par

362a1(rgyud): @#/ /mchog yin no/ /oM sarba sid d+ha ye swAhA/ /rig pa 'dzin pa grub bya'i phyir/ /mkhas pas swa sti ka bsreg bya/ /grub pa'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba
362a2(rgyud): yis| |sbyin sreg rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du/ /oM sid d+ha sid d+ha ye swAhA/ /oM da la a ti pa ta ye swAhA/ /maN+Da la a d+hi pa ta ye swAhA/ /oM b+huHswAhA/ /oM b+hu ba swAhA/ /oM swa
362a3(rgyud): swAhA| |oM b+hur b+hu ba swaHswAhA/ /oM swasti swAhA/ /oM swAsti na maHswAhA/ /oM sid d+hi pra b+hA ta ye swAhA/ /oM sarba duHkha u pa sha ma ne swAhA/ /oM badzra sid d+ha ye swAhA/ /oM kAR+ya kA ra ne
362a4(rgyud): puSh+Ta shan ti ke swAhA/ /yi ge phaT ni mngon spyod la/ /yi ge dzaHyis 'gugs par 'gyur/ /yi ge baM ni bcing la sbyar/ /dbang du bya la yi ge shrI/ /yi ge hUM ni bsdigs la sbyar/ /
362a5(rgyud): bsad pa la yang yi ge hUM/ /ha ni bsrung ba bzang po la/ /yi ge hUM ni bzlog pa la/ /shrIs ni sna tshogs gzugs bsgrub bya/ /oM ni mi snang bstan pa la/ /ho ni chags dang dgug
362a6(rgyud): pa la| |u ni gsang ba'i dag pa 'dzin/ /mngon spyod ldan la yi ge hUM/ /hUM ni rdzu 'phrul sgrub byed pa/ /lha mo chen po sgrub la AH/ /oM ni kun la nges par sbyar/ /yam shing ser
362a7(rgyud): po rgyas pa la/ /zhi ba la ni dkar po'o/ /dbang du bya ba dmar po ste/ /nag po mngon spyod las la 'o/ /zhi la mar gyis byugs pa ste/ /rgyas pa la ni 'o ma bcas/ /dbang du bya la
362b1(rgyud): lan tshar ldan/ /tsha ba dang bcas mngon spyod la/ /dbye ba rgya chen dag gis ni/ /sbyin sreg las rnams shes par bya/ /de nyid sbyin sreg nyi shu 'di/ /rdo rje 'chang gis gsang ba yin/ /
362b2(rgyud): de kho na nyi shu pa zhes bya ba sbyin sreg gi gsang ba'o// //de nas dngos grub thabs chen po/ /thams cad 'grub 'dod dkyil 'khor du/ /sgrub pa'i sbyor ba'i cho ga yis/ /
362b3(rgyud): dngos grub tshogs kyi sbyor ldan zhing / /rdo rje yi ni slob dpon che/ /brtan bcas rigs su yang dag skyes/ /theg pa chen por yang dag gnas/ /bskal pa grangs med mthar thug par//
362b4(rgyud): chos kyi shing rta che la zhon/ /shes rab thabs dang yang dag ldan/ /sems can kun gyi don la brtson/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis yongs su bzung / /slob dpon chen po'i tshul la gnas//

362b6(rgyud): ldan| |sbyin sreg cho ga byas nas kyang / /chos sbyin chen po yang dag brtsam/ /dam chos snying po bcud las byung / /sangs rgyas mchod pa bla med pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam

363a1(rgyud): @#/ /dpa'i gsang chen 'dzin/ /gal te nus na skal chen gyis/ /gang tshe mchod pa rtsom pa nas/ /ji srid zin par gyur gyi bar/ /bza' ba dag ni mi bya'o/ /dri dang
363a2(rgyud): bcas par legs sbyar ba'i/ /yang na dkar gsum bza' bar bya/ /gang phyir rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /byin gyis rlob pa mdzad par 'gyur/ /ci ste bzod ldan nyin mtshan du/ /
363a3(rgyud): bza' ba dag ni mi bya ste/ /gang phyir chos kyi rang bzhin zas/ /tshim par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni dag byas shing / /dri rnams kun gyis mngon 'dus
363a4(rgyud): byas| |sngags kyi bsangs pa'i chu yis ni/ /thams cad kun nas chag chag gdab/ /gang tshe mchod par byed pa na/ /phyogs rnams kun nas phyag bya zhing / /bshags
363a5(rgyud): dang gsol ba gdab nyid dang / /mchod pa'i sprin dang rjes yi rang / /bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs pa'i/ /las rnams rim bzhin byas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor chen po
363a6(rgyud): mnyam dbus su/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung bca' bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bsdus pa yi/ /skyil krung rnam pa bcu ru bshad/ /gsang chen de nyid mchog 'di ni/ /
363a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa'o/ /dpal dang bkra shis sdigs mdzub byed/ /de bzhin g.yas kyi phyed krung nyid/ /phyi rol brkyang dang bzhugs pa'o/ /de bzhin rin chen
363b1(rgyud): rang bzhin te/ /de dag bcu ru rang bzhin bshad/ /skyil krung brgya dang bcu lhag pa/ /gsang ba'i rgyud kyi gsang ba yi/ /rgyud de las ni rab tu bshad/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo
363b2(rgyud): krung bcas te/ /sangs rgyas la dmigs sems kyis ni/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten gsum/ /byams pa chen po rjes dran nas/ /dang po sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin mchog /rnal 'byor
363b3(rgyud): pas ni snyoms 'jug bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog /de nas yang ni las rgyal po/ /ting 'dzin lhag pa'i bzang po nas/ /bcu phrag gcig lhag brgya ru bshad/ /las
363b4(rgyud): thams cad pa gsum du brjod/ /gsang ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad/ /ting 'dzin sbyor ba med par ni/ /dkyil 'khor brtan par mi 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor sbyor ba med par ni/ /dngos
363b5(rgyud): grub nyid ni 'byung mi 'gyur/ /de bas rtag tu 'bad pas ni/ /ting 'dzin dngos grub dkyil 'khor bya/ /gal te mchog tu gsang ba ni/ /bla med theg pa'i gsang 'dod na/ /ting 'dzin
363b6(rgyud): gsum ni yang dag bya/ /dang po'i rgyud las bshad pa bzhin/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /de nas byang sems rnam 'phrul du/ /so so'i skye bos mi nus so/ /de rnams kyi ni
363b7(rgyud): ting 'dzin mchog / sems nyid kyis ni yang dag bya/ /dang po'i rgyud las bshad ba bzhin/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul bshad/ /blo ldan byang sems ting 'dzin gyi/ /bdag
364a1(rgyud): @#/ /nyid rdzu 'phrul chen por bsam/ /dka' thub sna tshogs drag po ni/ /bdag gis byas par bsam par bya/ /'og min zhes bya gnas yin pa/ /lha yi gnas ni
364a2(rgyud): bsam par bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yi/ /dag pa'i 'dus pa rnam par bsam/ /dang por sangs rgyas phyag byas nas/ /de nas thub rnams la de bzhin/ /bka'
364a3(rgyud): mnos ji skad bstan pa yi/ /slar yang skyil krung bca' ba bya/ /mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga/ /kun tu dga' byed bsam par bya/ /mtshan nyid thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i/ /
364a4(rgyud): bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku dang ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur ba/ /lnga ni bdag nyid la bsam bya/ /rdo rje'i gnas su 'dug bya zhing / /rtse mo mthon por bsam par bya/ /dang
364a5(rgyud): por sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / //rdo rje shar du 'dug bya zhing / /sangs rgyas 'khor lo rnam par 'phrul/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang spro/ /'khor
364a6(rgyud): lo'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sprul/ /rgyal po dang bcas rigs dkyil 'khor/ /sgo srung sgeg mo la sogs dang / /lha mo dang bcas phyag rgya yi/ /sbyor bas rdo rje can dbang bskur//
364a7(rgyud): rdo rje las su yang dag bya'o/ /bdag nyid kyi ni mkha' dbyings su/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mos byas te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid/ /dbang bskur bar ni yang dag
364b1(rgyud): bya| |rdo rje chos 'dzin rgyal po ru/ /dkyil 'khor bkod la brtag par bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgug bya zhing / /rdo rje can rnams mchog gzhug bya/ /bsgrub pa dang ni dbang
364b2(rgyud): du bya/ /bya ba 'di ni mchog yin no/ /rang gi rigs gang dkyil 'khor du/ /gnas de lhag par mos par bya/ /'khor lo ji bzhin bkod ji bzhin/ /phyag rgya ji bzhin dbang
364b3(rgyud): byas pa'o/ /las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /rang nyid khrus byas yan lag byugs/ /rgyan dang gos ni sna tshogs ldan/ /dpung rgyan gdu bu nyid dang ni/ /de
364b4(rgyud): bzhin sor gdub dbu rgyan bcas/ /gser sku mu tig dang ldan pa'i/ /lag pa rkang pa de nas ske/ /lus kun rnam par brgyan 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin ko sha'i ras lhag pa'i/ /
364b5(rgyud): gos dag bzang po bgos shing bsang / /yang na chos gos 'dzin pa ste/ /sangs rgyas phyag rgya rgyal mtshan bzhin/ /gal te skra bregs dge slong de/ /ring zhing 'khyil la
364b6(rgyud): mdog sngo ba'i/ /skra ni sngon bo bcing bar bya/ /yang na rang gi mgo la skyes/ /bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/ /yang na rdo rje las su bya/ /rnal 'byor rang bzhin gsang
364b7(rgyud): med par/ /dngos grub bzang po thob mi 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su mnyam pa ru/ /ci rigs par ni 'dug nas su/ /shar du kha bltas langs nas ni/ /khengs pa med
365a1(rgyud): @#/ /cing ma 'khrul bar/ /rdo rje bsnyems par yongs su bskor/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/ /lan gcig tu ni brjod par bya/ /bstod pa byas nas rang
365a2(rgyud): bdag nyid/ /dngos grub sbyor ba yang dag bya/ /snying rje chen po sbyor ba yis/ /bdag gis drang srong bskul bar bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /don yod dbang phyug
365a3(rgyud): dam pa ste/ /theg pa che mchog skyes pa'i mchog /byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /sems dpa' chen po thabs chen po/ /rdo rje 'khor lo mchod pa che/ /dngos grub
365a4(rgyud): chen po rdzu 'phrul che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /rdo rje ming ni yang dag gzung / /phyogs rnams kun tu yang dag bskor/ /dkyil 'khor rdzogs par blta bya
365a5(rgyud): zhing | |rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rjes dran bya/ /slar yang skyil mo krung bcas te/ /nga ni rang nyid 'khor los bsgyur/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs ni bcing ba la/ /stong las nyung bar mi
365a6(rgyud): bya'o| |tha na rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /de nyid phyag rgya yongs su gzung / /langs nas tshig ni brjod par bya/ /bdag ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /dkyil 'khor chen po rab sgrub
365a7(rgyud): pa| |rdo rje la sogs kun gshegs shig / bdag ni rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje sems dpar bdag grub mdzod/ /tshon chen kha bsgyur dri ldan pa'i/ /srad bu lhag pa grims
365b1(rgyud): par bsgril/ /rdo rje srad bu phyag rgya ches/ /dkyil 'khor chen po thig gdab bya/ /'khor lo ji bzhin bkod ji bzhin/ /ji bzhin gzhung gi rjes 'brangs nas/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo
365b2(rgyud): ji bzhin bri/ /rdo rje'i thig ni yongs su gdab/ /de nas de yi rang rig gsang / /'khor lo chen po rab tu sgrub/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo ni/ /go rims bzhin du bshad par bya//
365b3(rgyud): gru bzhi pa la sgro bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes byas pa'i/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /dar dang phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /mtshams kyi cha ni thams cad dang / /sgo yi
365b4(rgyud): sgo khyud mtshams su ni/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /de yi nang gi rim pa ni/ /'khor lo lta bur bri bar bya/ /rdo rje phreng bas yongs su
365b5(rgyud): bskor/ /ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes/ /rdo rje ka ba'i mdun gnas pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /ji ltar phyi dang nang gnas pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor re re rnam par dbye//
365b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du/ /dkyil 'khor lnga bris gang yin te/ /ka ba mchog ni brgyad kyis spras/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi pa yin par bshad/ /dbus kyi shin tu dbus song
365b7(rgyud): nas| |chos 'dzin rgyal po chen po ste/ /rnam par snang mdzad khyab bdag che/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun tu/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi
366a1(rgyud): @#/ /dbus su ni/ /dam tshig mchog rnams bzhi po yang / /go rims bzhin du yang dag bri/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /mdun rgyab tu ni gnas pa
366a2(rgyud): yin| |rdo rje lcags kyu g.yas phyogs su/ /nub kyi phyogs su bdud 'joms pa/ /rdo rje legs ba rgyal po che/ /chos 'dzin chen po dbang dang ldan/ /chos 'dzin pa ni byang du
366a3(rgyud): ste| |mdun du rdo rje bsnyems tshul lo/ /de la de yi snying po gsang / /shin tu rtog par byed pa'i mchog /sdug bsngal kun las rab grol byed/ /byang chub sems ni rab bskul
366a4(rgyud): ba| |hUM dzaHho sA/ shar phyogs cha yi dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus de ru/ /mi bskyod pa ni dgod par bya/ /rdo rje shugs kyi snying po
366a5(rgyud): ni| |the tshom gcod pa sngon 'gro can/ /tshogs sngon 'gro ba bzang po ste/ /sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms byed/ /oM be gA kra ma ho/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che/ /thub pa
366a6(rgyud): skyes mchog mi bskyod pa/ /glang po phyag rgya la gnas shing / /zhi ba'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin/ /de la snying po 'di yin te/ /hUM| de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rdo rje
366a7(rgyud): mchog rnams dgod pa ni/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras shing / /khros bcas bzhin ni 'dzum ldan pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /rdo rje lcags kyu bstan pa che//
366b1(rgyud): rdo rje 'dod chags bdud chen po/ /rdo rje legs pa rdzu 'phrul che/ /rdo rje rin chen dgod bar bya/ /rdo rje chags pa gang bshad pa/ /rdo rje chos ni dgod bar bya/ /rdo rje legs par gang bshad
366b2(rgyud): pa| |rdo rje las ni yongs su gzung / /dam tshig rnam pa bzhi po ni/ /'khor los bsgyur ba dgod par bya/ /thams cad sangs rgyas cod pan ldan/ /'khor los bsgyur bar
366b3(rgyud): dbang bskur ba/ /rdo rje rin chen de bzhin las/ /pad+ma sna tshogs dga' chen po/ /bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ /byang chub mchog de yang dag gzung / /yan lag 'gyur
366b4(rgyud): ba lhag ma rnams/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs dgod/ /de nas sangs rgyas rigs bzhag ste/ /rdo rje'i rigs kyi snying po la/ /phyag rgya dang ni snying po bshad/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs
366b5(rgyud): su gzung / /hUM dzaHho swa/ yi ge dza sogs bshad pa la/ /yi ge oM ni yang dag dgod/ /ho d+hi chos dbyings yi ge a/ /yi ge swa ni yongs su bsgyur/ /rdo rje shugs kyis lhor song
366b6(rgyud): nas| |rin chen 'byung ldan dkyil 'khor lo/ /bcom ldan mchog ni yongs su 'dzin/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rdo rje rin chen la sogs bri/ /rin chen gzi brjid rgyal
366b7(rgyud): mtshan dang / /rin chen so yi rgyan bcas pa/ /de la de rnams kyi snying po ni/ oM aHtrA ha/ nub kyi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas su/ /de yi dbus su rdo
367a1(rgyud): @#/ /rje chos/ /'od dpag med ni dgod par bya'o/ /de yi snying po ni hrIHde yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rdo rje pad+ma la sogs bri/ /pad+ma rnon po de bzhin
367a2(rgyud): rgyu| |smra ba pad+ma phyag rgya bcas/ /de la 'di rnams kyi snying po ni/ hrIHdaM maM raM/ rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /byang gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /bcom ldan 'das ni don
367a3(rgyud): yod grub/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni dgod par bya/ /de yi snying po ni/ kaM/ de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rdo rje las la sogs pa bri/ /thams cad bsrung pa gnod sbyin che/ /
367a4(rgyud): las dang khu tshur shin tu brtan/ /de la 'di rnams kyi snying po ni/ kaM haM hUM baM/ dbus kyi 'khor lo'i grwa bzhi ru/ /lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/ /rdo rje rin chen de bzhin las/ /pad+ma lha mo bzhi ru
367a5(rgyud): bshad/ /de la de rnams kyi snying po ni/ oM oM hrIHa/ thams cad kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po las/ cha dang po'i dkyil 'khor dbus ma rdzogs so// //dkyil 'khor dbus ma rdzogs nas ni/ /phyag rgya thams cad yongs su bri/ /phyag rgya de ni byin brlab pa/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su gzung / /byang chub mchog tu dbus nas mchog /shis
367a6(rgyud): pa shar gyi phyag rgya ste/ /lho yi phyogs su mchog sbyin no/ /nub tu chos kyi 'khor lo 'dzin/ /byang du mi 'jigs sbyin zhes bya/ /don yod grub pas yongs su gzung / /phyag rgya lhag ma
367b1(rgyud): phyag mtshan bcas/ /de nas rdo rje sems tshogs bri/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las/ /rdo rje 'khor lo chen po'i dbus kyi cha zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //
367b2(rgyud): rdo rje shugs kyis song nas su/ /shar phyogs kyi ni dkyil 'khor la/ /rdo rje rigs chen nyams dga' ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor lnga ni yang dag bri/ /ka ba brgyad ni rdo rje che/ /dkyil 'khor
367b3(rgyud): lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi dang ldan pa yi/ /rdo rje'i 'khor lo yongs su dgod/ /de yi shar gyi dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas gzugs can yang dag bri/ /ut+pal
367b4(rgyud): sngon po 'od chen ldan/ /khro bcas bzhin ni 'dzum ldan pa'i/ /drag po 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab/ /rdo rje ti rin ti ri 'dzin/ /khro bo rdo rje'i lta ba 'dzin/ /gtum pa thams cad rab 'dul
367b5(rgyud): byed| |sangs rgyas mdun du rdo rje 'dzin/ /'bar ba'i dbus su dgod par bya/ /de bzhin 'bar dbus pad+ma dang / /de bzhin rin chen sna tshogs mtshan/ /de nyid shar gyi 'khor lo che/ /shar
367b6(rgyud): gyi cha ru song nas ni/ /de yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad yang dag bri/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa/ /phyag rgya brgyad ni yongs su 'dzin/ /mche ba dag ni cung zad gtsigs/ /khro
367b7(rgyud): bcas bzhin ni 'dzum ldan pa'i/ /lcags kyu rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / /zhags pa phyag rgya bzhi ru bshad/ /mda' dang gzhu ni gnyis su 'dzin/ /gnyis ni yi ge hUM gis bsdus/ /des ni
368a1(rgyud): @#/ /rkang pa g.yon pa yis/ /dbang phyug chen po mnan par bya/ /g.yas pas lha mo u ma yi/ /nu ma'i bar du mnan pa ste/ /g.yon brkyang pa yis legs par
368a2(rgyud): gnas/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab 'od ldan/ /sku mdog sngon po drag po ste/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs byed pa/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rdo rje khro bo dgod par
368a3(rgyud): bya| |thams cad khro bo'i 'bar bas khyab/ /mche ba dag ni cung zad gtsigs/ /khro bo sems dpa' khro rdo rje/ /de bzhin khro bo chags pa ste/ /khro bo legs pa drag pa ste/ /dbus kyi
368a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /khro bo'i rgyal po g.yas phyogs su/ /khro bo'i bdag nyid chen pos bskor/ /dbus su khro bo khro gnyer can/ /de yi phyogs
368a5(rgyud): rnams thams cad du/ /khro bo rdo rje'i dbang bskur ldan/ /thams cad bri zhing yang dag dgod/ /khro gnyer can gyi dkyil 'khor mchog /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rin chen khro
368a6(rgyud): bo dgod par bya/ /khro gnyer nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / /khro bo bzhad pa shin tu byung / /dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum pa ru/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /khro bo'i bdag nyid chen
368a7(rgyud): por bskor/ /rdo rje'i sde ni yang dag bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /pad+ma'i khro bo dgod par bya/ /chos dang rnon po de bzhin rgyu/ /bzhad pa khro bo rdzu 'phrul che/ /rdo rje shugs
368b1(rgyud): kyis song nas ni/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /las kyi rgyal po bdag nyid che/ /rdo rje dbab pa yang dag bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /las kyi khro bo la sogs bri/ /
368b2(rgyud): las kyi gnod sbyin srin po dang / /bsdu ba'i rdzu 'phrul khu tshur che/ /dkyil 'khor lnga po kun tu bri/ /de ni rdo rje'i rigs su bshad/ /dkyil 'khor chen po ni zhes bya/ /gsang
368b3(rgyud): ba de nyid tshogs kyi bdag / de nas kun gyi snying po ni/ /rdo rje rigs kun nyams dga' ba'i/ /yi ge hUM ni 'dir brjod do/ /drag po ha ha zhes sgrogs hUM/ /hUM hUM zhes sgrogs
368b4(rgyud): 'jig par byed/ /de yi dkyil 'khor rgyal po ni/ /rdo rje gsang ba legs 'dus bya/ /'khor lo dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su/ /lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/ /khro bo'i sems ma rin
368b5(rgyud): chen dang / /pad+ma dang ni las zhes bya/ /kun nas mtshams rnams dag tu ni/ /phyag rgya dam bcas de dag bzung / /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po las/ cha gnyis pa rdzogs
368b6(rgyud): so|| ||shar phyogs kyi cha'i dkyil 'khor yang rdzogs so/ / //dbus kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yi/ /ka ba'i phyi rol dkyil 'khor du/ /sgeg mo
368b7(rgyud): phreng ba de bzhin glu/ /gar ma lha mo phyag rgya bcas/ /shar gyi rdo rje rigs nyid la/ /phyi rol gnas su de bzhin nyid/ /nyi ma la bskyed bzhi po ni/ /rdo rje lha mos yongs su bzung / /rdo
369a1(rgyud): @#/ /rje'i dkyil 'khor sbyor 'byung ba/ /yi ge hUM ni kun tu dgod/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas rigs rgyal po/ /yi ge hUM ni 'dir brjod do/ /phyag rgya rang gi yan lag
369a2(rgyud): 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su gzung / /phyag rgya thams cad rab sbyor pas/ /de dag gsang zhing mchog gsang bshad/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen
369a3(rgyud): po mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ rdo rje rigs chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //lho yi rin chen dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /de ru phun
369a4(rgyud): tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi/ /'khor lo lnga po dgod par bya/ /de yi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya/ /rin chen chen po rta la bcibs/ /sangs rgyas nyi
369a5(rgyud): ma de bzhin gshegs/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa'i sku/ /'od zer phreng bas kun tu khyab/ /rin chen phreng ba mchog 'dzin pa'i/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ /so yi
369a6(rgyud): phreng ba rab bzhad cing / /so yi phreng ba'i phyag rgyar ldan/ /mthe bo'i rtse mo rgyal mtshan 'dzin/ /nyi ma'i dbus na sangs rgyas che/ /zla ba lta bu'i bdud rtsi'i sku/ /rdo rje rin chen skal
369a7(rgyud): ba che/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i rigs mchog go /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rin chen sems dpa' yang dag ldan/ /rin chen sems dpa' pad+ma dang / /de bzhin rdo rje las nyid
369b1(rgyud): do| |rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa/ /'khor los bsgyur bas rnam par brgyan/ /rin chen chen po rigs las byung / /nor bu'i rdo rje nyi ma 'dzin/ /de nas snying po ni/ trAM| lho yi shar
369b2(rgyud): gyi dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /de yi dbus su sems dpa' che/ /nor bu'i 'od can yang dag bri/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa/ /sangs rgyas rdo

369b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la/ /pad+ma rin chen bdag nyid che/ /rin chen phreng bas dbang bskur 'di/ /rin chen pad+ma'i mchog 'dzin pa/ /sangs rgyas dbu rgyan sems dpa' che/ /rin chen zhi ba
370a1(rgyud): @#/ /yongs su 'dzin/ /zur mig 'dod chags chags pa'i spyan/ /skyes bu 'dul ba la gzigs pa/ /pad+ma 'dzin pa'i rgyal po che/ /'jig rten dbang phyug tshe
370a2(rgyud): dpag med/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rin chen pad+ma yang dag bri/ /rin chen pad+ma de bzhin no/ /de bzhin rgyu dang smra ba 'dzin/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /
370a3(rgyud): byang gi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la/ /rin chen las chen rgyal po ni/ /bdag nyid chen pos yang dag bri/ /bcom ldan thub pa'i dbang po don yod grub/ /las kun 'dzin pas sangs rgyas
370a4(rgyud): rnams 'phrul pa'i/ /rdo rje las te rgyal po mdzod 'dzin pa/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i gtso bo mchog dam pa/ /sangs rgyas dbu rgyan las rnams bzhi dang ldan/ /rgyan rnams kun
370a5(rgyud): gyis yan lag legs par brgyan/ /las kyi rin chen dam pas rgyas gdab cing / /rin chen dkyil 'khor tshogs chen mchog gyur pa'i/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /
370a6(rgyud): las kyi rin chen yang dag bri/ /las kyi srin po gnod sbyin dang / /de yi bsdu ba'i khu tshur 'dzin/ /de nas kun gyi snying po ni/ trAM/ rin chen rigs chen rnal 'byor pa/ /yi ge trAM
370a7(rgyud): ni brjod par bya/ /ci rigs par ni rang nyid kyi/ /phyag rgya phyag mtshan yang dag bri/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las/ rkang pa gsum pa rdzogs
370b1(rgyud): so|| / /lho phyogs cha'i dkyil 'khor yang rdzogs so// //de nyid kyi ni grwa bzhi ru/ /lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor mdun nas su/ /lha mo bzhi ni
370b2(rgyud): yang dag bri/ /sems ma'i rin chen de bzhin chos/ /las ma 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du/ /sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu/ /gar ma rnam par sgeg mo yi/ /nor bu rigs chen bzang po ni/ /
370b3(rgyud): rin chen phyag rgyas kun khyab la/ /phyag mchog rang gi phyag rgyas mtshon/ /'od zer phreng bas khyab 'od ldan/ /rin chen rdo rjes dbang bskur ba/ /rang rang phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin/ /rin chen
370b4(rgyud): mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs/ /rin chen las byung rin chen ldan/ /rin chen rang bzhin khang par gnas/ /spos dang rin chen me tog bcas/ /rin chen mchog chen la gnas shing / /lus
370b5(rgyud): la rin chen gos gyon pa/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ /nor bu'i rigs chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //
370b6(rgyud): rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /nub kyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /pad+ma'i rigs chen bzang po ni/ /dga' ba chen pos yang dag bri/ /de yi nub kyi dkyil 'khor la/ /dkyil 'khor lnga
370b7(rgyud): ni yang dag bri/ /dbus kyi lte ba'i 'khor lo la/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya/ /pad+ma bzang po 'dab ma brgyad/ /'dab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong ba/ /chos dbyings brtan
371a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa'i rnal 'byor can/ /pad+ma'i phreng pas rnam par mdzes/ /de yi dbus su rgyal bo che/ /sna tshogs gzugs can rang bzhin mchog /sangs rgyas
371a2(rgyud): shes rab thabs ldan pa/ /chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su 'dzin/ /pad+ma gcig po de gnas shing / /de yi dkyil 'khor la brten pa/ /pad+ma'i sems dpa' bzhi po bri/ /'khor
371a3(rgyud): los bsgyur ba 'jigs pa med/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma dbang bskur ldan/ /rdo rje pad+ma la sogs bri/ /pad+ma'i sems dpa' 'jigs pa med//
371a4(rgyud): kun kyang sangs rgyas cod pan ldan/ /chos kyi phreng bas dbang bskur bas/ /pad+ma'i phyag mtshan mtshon cha bsnams/ /sangs rgyas 'phrul bas rnam par rol/ /pad+ma'i sems dang
371a5(rgyud): de bzhin rgyal/ /rin chen chos ni tshul chen po/ /dam tshig mchog rnams bzhi po ni/ /rim pa bzhin du yang dag bri/ /nub kyi shar gyi dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song
371a6(rgyud): nas kyang / /de yi dbus su rgyal po che/ /sna tshogs 'khor lo dgod par bya/ /chos kyi snying po rab tu gnas/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la brten/ /pad+ma'i ge sar dbus su ni/ /sna tshogs
371a7(rgyud): gzugs can dgod par bya/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa/ /gzugs bzang ldan pa'i sku mnga' ba/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi dbang bskur ldan/ /spyan gsum phyag ni brgyad
371b1(rgyud): pa ste/ /thor tshugs tshangs pa dpral bar dbang / /me tog mtshon cha smin mtshams su/ /mig la nyi ma zla ba dgod/ /tha skar gzhon nu rna ba la/ /khyab 'jug sna yi rtse mo ste/ /mche ba
371b2(rgyud): nag po gsus po che/ /lce la dbyangs can ma yin te/ /gsung dbyangs la ni dbyangs chen ma/ /ku mu da dang pad phreng can/ /kha dang 'gram pa dag la gnas/ /spyan la shes
371b3(rgyud): rab pha rol phyin/ /gdong gi phyed ni sprul par byed/ /phrag pa g.yas par seng ge ste/ /g.yon pa phag ni yang dag gnas/ /sna yi bu ga gnyis pa ni/ /rgya mtsho nye bar gdung
371b4(rgyud): ba dang / /dga' bo nye dga' dpung pa la/ /lte ba la ni rgya mtsho gnas/ /brla gnyis po la dpung chen gnas/ /tshogs kyi dbang phyug dpung pa la/ /lha chen dbang phyug chen po
371b5(rgyud): ni| |mtshan ma'i steng gi sgo na gnas/ /dpal be'u snying ga la gnas te/ /lhag pa lha mo chen mo dpal/ /'og gi kha yi sgo ru ni/ /gshin rje'i rgyal po rnam par brten/ /rdzong
371b6(rgyud): dang 'jigs byed lha mo che/ /pus mo la ni yang dag gnas/ /rkang pa'i sor mo bcu la ni/ /ma mo bcu ni kun tu gnas/ /drag po rje ngar gnas pa nyid/ /chu yi lha mo rgyab na gnas//
371b7(rgyud): dbyid dang sogs ka dbyar dang ni/ /ston dang dgun dang dgun smad lha/ /g.yas pa dang ni g.yon pa yi/ /rkang pa dag la yang dag gnas/ /'og gi 'khor lo rtsibs stong la/ /drag
372a1(rgyud): @#/ /po'i phung po 'chang ba dang / /sgra gcan thags bzang ris snang byed/ /lha ma yin rnams kun tu gnas/ /lag pa bcu yi thal mo la/ /pha rol phyin pa
372a2(rgyud): bcu dag gnas/ /mngon par 'dod pa nyid dag gi/ /lha chen la sogs 'di dag bri/ /zhal bzhi phyag ni brgyad pa ste/ /zhal re zhing ni spyan gsum pa'i/ /gos dang gzugs
372a3(rgyud): ni bzang por ldan/ /de 'dra'i rang bzhin thub pa dgod/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /pad+ma'i sems dpa' yang dag bri/ /pad+ma'i sems dpa' lcags kyu dang / /mda' dang
372a4(rgyud): pad+ma legs par sbyin/ /nub kyi lho yi phyogs mchog tu/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /de yi dbus su sems dpa' che/ /rin chen pad+ma yang dag bri/ /zhal ni bcu gnyis
372a5(rgyud): ldan pa nyid/ /phyag bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i mchog /rin chen pad+mar yang dag bzhugs/ /rin chen las ni 'byung bar 'dod/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /
372a6(rgyud): pad+ma'i rin chen drag sogs bri/ /khro gnyer nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / /de bzhin zhal ni bcu gcig pa/ /nub kyi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas
372a7(rgyud): kyang | |de yi dbus su sems dpa' che/ /'od dpag med ni dgod par bya/ /pad+ma chen po rab ster ba/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gtso/ /sbyan dang phyag ni stong par ldan/ /
372b1(rgyud): phyag rgya mtshon cha thams cad bcang / /zhal bcu gnyis pa bzang po ste/ /pad+ma'i lha mo yang dag ldan/ /pha rol phyin pa bcu dang ldan/ /tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par rol/ /yi
372b2(rgyud): phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /pad+ma'i sems dpa' yang dag bri/ /sgrol ma gzhon nu'i mthu can dang / /mgrin sngon tshangs pa'i mdog las byung / /nub kyi byang gi cha ru ni/ /rdo
372b3(rgyud): rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /de yi dbus su sems dpa' che/ /pad+ma la sogs dgod par bya/ /zhal drug phyag ni bcu gnyis pa'i/ /phyag rgya mtshon cha 'dzin pa'i mchog /chen
372b4(rgyud): po sna tshogs rab ster ba/ /pad+ma las ni yang dag bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug rgyal/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun gnas pa/ /pad+ma'i srin po
372b5(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / /pad+ma'i khu tshur yang dag bri/ /g.yas dang g.yon dang rgyab dang ni/ /mdun nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas snying po ni ha/ /sangs rgyas kyi snying po hrIHste/
372b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi snying po yin no/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ rkang pa bzhi pa rdzogs so// //
372b7(rgyud): pad+ma'i rigs kyi tshogs dag gi /dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs nas ni/ /de yi 'khor lo'i grwa bzhi ru/ /lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/ /pad+ma'i sems dpa' rin chen dang / /las
373a1(rgyud): @#/ /dang chos ma yang dag bri/ /sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu/ /gar ma 'di ni yang dag bri/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po
373a2(rgyud): las| pad+ma'i rigs chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ / //byang gi las kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /de yi dkyil 'khor rgyal po ni/ /
373a3(rgyud): 'khor lo lnga lnga dgod par bya/ /de yi dbus su las chen po/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya/ /chos 'dzin pa yi rgyal po che/ /nam mkha' lding gi gdan la bzhugs//
373a4(rgyud): de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /las kyi phyag rgya yang dag bri/ /las kyi sems dpa' rin chen dang / /de bzhin las dang chos nyid do/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /
373a5(rgyud): byang gi shar gyi dkyil 'khor la/ /mi bskyod pa ni sangs rgyas che/ /rdo rje las ni dgod par bya/ /de yi mchod pa mtshon cha bcas/ /de yi phyag rgya bcas pa bzung / /las chen
373a6(rgyud): 'dzin pa bzang po ste/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa yang dag ldan/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /las kyi sems dpa' yang dag bri/ /sems dpa' chags pa'i rgyal po
373a7(rgyud): che| |legs pa de bzhin las nyid do/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /byang gi lho yi cha ru ni/ /rin chen ting 'dzin rgyal po che/ /rin chen las ni yang dag bri/ /rin chen
373b1(rgyud): char ni rab 'bebs shing / /sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu 'joms/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rin chen las ni yang dag bri/ /sems dpa'i gzi brjid rgyal
373b2(rgyud): mtshan dang / /las dang bzhad pa rnam sbyong ba/ /las kyi rin chen bzang po la/ /rin chen dkyil 'khor yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /byang gi nub kyi
373b3(rgyud): cha ru ni/ /pad+ma'i las kyi sems dpa' che/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su yang dag bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /pad+ma'i las ni yang dag bri/ /pad+ma rnon po de bzhin
373b4(rgyud): sgyu| |de bzhin smra ba las yin no/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /byang gi byang phyogs dkyil 'khor la/ /las chen 'dzin pa dbang ldan pa/ /las kyi rgyal po yang dag
373b5(rgyud): bri| |de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /las kyi sems dpa' dgod par bya/ /las kyi srin po gnod sbyin dang / /de bzhin bsdu ba'i khu tshur nyid/ /de nas snying po ni AH//
373b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi snying po ni AHste/ /thams cad kyi snying po yin no/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ /rkang pa lnga
373b7(rgyud): pa rdzogs so/ / //byang gi cha'i dkyil 'khor yang rdzogs so// //byang du ji ltar rigs byas te/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas ni/ /de yi 'khor
374a1(rgyud): @#/ /lo'i grwa bzhi ru/ /lha mo bzhi ni dgod par bya/ /sngar gyi dam tshig bzhi po ni/ /thams cad sum cu rtsa gsum yin/ /dbus ma zhes bya sum cu gsum/ /
374a2(rgyud): shar gyi phyogs na sum cu gsum/ /de bzhin nub kyi phyogs cha 'o/ /byang dang lho yang de bzhin no/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing
374a3(rgyud): mchog tu gsang ba las/ /las kyi rigs zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams cad kyang rdzogs so// //brgya drug
374a4(rgyud): cu rtsa lnga pa'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo mchog /thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che/ /'khor lo chen po'i grwa bzhi ru/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi ni bri bar bya/ /'khor lo sbyor chen
374a5(rgyud): shar lho ru/ /zla ba'i gzugs su dgod par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dgod par bya/ /'dzum zhing zla ba'i mdog can te/ /'od zer dmar po
374a6(rgyud): sna tshogs 'bar/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung yang dag bzhugs/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul 'chang ba'i mchog /phyag g.yas pa na rdo rje bsnams/ /de bzhin g.yon na dril bu bsnams//
374a7(rgyud): mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems dpa' che/ /sems can kun gyi don sems pa/ /de yi pad+ma yang dag gnas/ /de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten pa/ /lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/ /gsang
374b1(rgyud): ba lnga ni yang dag bstan/ /dang po dang ni gnyis pa ni/ /g.yas kyi phyogs na yang dag gnas/ /gsum pa dang ni bzhi pa ni/ /g.yon logs na ni rab tu gnas/ /lha mo rdo rje ca co sgrogs/ /pus
374b2(rgyud): 'khyud rang gi lha mo de/ /de yi glo na mgo sgyur zhing / /'dzum bcas kun tu lta ba ste/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag la 'jus/ /chu srin gyi ni rgyal mtshan bsgreng / /de yi glo na bzhad bcas
374b3(rgyud): shing | |rdeg byed skye dgu'i bdag mo yi/ /rdo rje ca co'i sgra sgrogs dang / /de bzhin rdo rje don yod dga'/ /lha mo rdo rje 'dod dbang phyug /gzi brjid dga' ba'i rdo rje ma/ /lho dang nub kyi mtshams
374b4(rgyud): su ni/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /de yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /pad+ma chen po dgod par bya/ /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /pad+ma'i sems dpa' dgod par bya/ /zhal bzhi
374b5(rgyud): phyag ni brgyad pa ste/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor 'od bcas pa/ /de yi pad+mar yang dag gnas/ /de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten pa/ /pad+ma'i rigs can las byung ba/ /lha mo bzhi ni yang
374b6(rgyud): dag bri/ /kun nas gsang ba'i lha mo yi/ /de nas ming ni rab bshad bya/ /rdo rje dpal dang rdo rje dkar/ /rdo rje sgron ma rdo rje can/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /nub byang mtshams kyi
374b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du/ /nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /rdo rje nyi ma yang dag ldan/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rin chen sems dpa' dgod par bya/ /sngon dmar gyi ni 'od
375a1(rgyud): @#/ /kyis khyab/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i/ /de yi pad+ma yang dag gnas/ /de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten pa/ /rin chen rigs chen las byung
375a2(rgyud): ba'i| |lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/ /nam mkha' las byung mkha' rdo rje/ /nam mkha'i mdog can skye dgu'i bdag /rin chen dpal ldan lha mo che/ /rin chen dang bcas rigs
375a3(rgyud): mdzes ma/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /byang shar mtshams kyi 'khor lo la/ /de bzhin ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya/ /ut+pal
375a4(rgyud): sngon po de dbus su/ /las rnams 'dzin pa chen po'i mchog /sangs rgyas kun las sogs bshad pa/ /rdo rje'i las ni dgod par bya/ /de yi pad+mar yang dag gnas/ /
375a5(rgyud): de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten cing / /las kyi rigs can las byung ba'i/ /lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/ /las rgya rdo rje rin chen ma/ /las ma chos ma dpal ldan che/ /ji ltar
375a6(rgyud): sngon du rdo rje'i rigs/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor thams cad la/ /de nyid pho nya mo ru gnas/ /de nyid lha mor yang dag gnas/ /de nyid sgeg mo rnam sgeg sogs/ /phyag rgya'i
375a7(rgyud): rgya mtsho gzhan yang byed/ /ser mo dmar mo nyi ma mtshungs/ /ut+pal sngon po'i mdog 'drar 'gyur/ /bsnyems bcas zhi ba'i dbang bskur ldan/ /rang gi phyag rgya yongs su
375b1(rgyud): 'dzin/ /de nas snying po ni hUM hrIHoM aH/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ rkang pa drug pa rdzogs so//
375b2(rgyud): mtshams rnams kyi dkyil 'khor yang rdzogs so// //brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa lngar ldan/ /'khor lo yongs su rdzogs nas kyang / /de yi mtshams kyi logs rnams su
375b3(rgyud): lha bzhi dag ni yang dag bri/ /shar du rdo rje chen po ste/ /rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'o/ /rdo rje rigs chen mtshan ma ste/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba rab 'jigs pa'i/ /lho ru rin chen phun tshogs
375b4(rgyud): pa| |chu lha rin chen chu srin rnams/ /rin chen rigs chen mtshan ma ste/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnas brjod/ /nub tu sa lha bri bar bya/ /rtsal ldan skyes bu zhes bya yi/ /dkyil
375b5(rgyud): 'khor chen po 'dzin byed cing / /pad+ma'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'ang yin/ /byang du rlung gi skyes bu ni/ /rlung gi shugs kyis gos 'chang zhing / /de bzhin las kyi rigs 'dzin ma/ /g.yo
375b6(rgyud): zhing rtsal ldan bri bar bya/ /brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa dgu ru/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag bsgrub/ /chos kyi tshul gyi gru chen po/ /thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che/ /dkyil 'khor
375b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las/ 'khor lo chen po'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //thun mong mchog tu gsang ba yi/ /rdo rje
376a1(rgyud): @#/ /rig pa 'dzin pa mchog /rang rigs 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /phyogs gcig tu ni bshad par bya/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbus su ni/ /thub pa'i
376a2(rgyud): dbang phyug rnam snang mdzad/ /seng ge pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /de ni byang chub mchog 'dzin pa/ /mi bskyod pa ni glang chen bcibs/ /rin chen dbang ni rta la bcibs/ /bcom
376a3(rgyud): ldan tshe dpag med pa ni/ /rma bya'i khri la yang dag bzhugs/ /don yod grub pa bla na med/ /mkha' lding dbang po yang dag bzhugs/ /'di rnams kyi ni bzhon par bshad/ /
376a4(rgyud): rigs mchog kun gyi dbye ba'o/ /mi bskyod pa yis gnon te/ /de bzhin rin chen dbang mchog sbyin/ /tshe dpag med kyi ting 'dzin sbyin/ /don yod grub pa'i mi 'jigs sbyin//
376a5(rgyud): sngon po ser po de bzhin dmar/ /kha dog ljang gu las 'dzin pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yid 'ong / /sku mdog dkar po rab tu bsgrags/ /de bzhin rdo rje rin chen
376a6(rgyud): la| |rdo rje phreng bas rdo rje mtshan/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba/ /rdo rje'i ri mo yang dag bri/ /pad+ma'i rigs chen bzang po la/ /pad+ma'i phreng bas pad+ma mtshan/ /pad+ma'i dkyil
376a7(rgyud): 'khor sbyor byung ba/ /pad+ma'i srad bus thig gdab bya/ /rin chen rigs can bzang po la/ /rin chen phreng bas rin chen mtshan/ /rin chen dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba/ /rin chen ri
376b1(rgyud): mo rnam par mdzes/ /las kyi rigs la sna tshogs bshad/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas rigs mchog la/ /'on kyang rdo rje khyad par gyis/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba'i/ /rdo
376b2(rgyud): rje shar gyi phyogs cha ru/ /lho ru rin chen dkyil 'khor te/ /nub tu pad+ma yang dag bshad/ /byang du las ni yang dag sbyor/ /rdo rje can kun khro gnyer can/ /rin chen tshogs ni
376b3(rgyud): rab bshad pa/ /pad+ma chen po dul zhing zhi/ /drag po zhi tha las 'dzin pa/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo ru/ /'khor lo chen po yang dag bri/ /de nas phyi rol 'khor lo sogs /
376b4(rgyud): cho ga 'di kun de dang 'dra/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po gsang ba chen po mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las/ gsang ba zhes bya ba rkang pa bdun pa rdzogs
376b5(rgyud): so|| / /las kyi rnal 'byor las byung ba rdzogs so// //nang gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas ni/ /tshon rtsi lngas ni dgang bar bya'o/ /thig dang ri mo thams
376b6(rgyud): cad ni/ /chon rtsi kun gyis rab tu dgang / /dang po nas ni tha ma ru/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun tu bri/ /mnyam zhing kun tu cha mnyam pas/ /gru bzhi ru ni rab tu brtag /zur bzhi pa
376b7(rgyud): bsgo bzhi ba/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes byas pa/ /ka ba brgyad dang yang dag ldan/ /yid du 'ong zhing legs par phye/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /dar dang phreng bas rnam par
377a1(rgyud): @#/ /brgyan/ /rdo rje rin chen srad bu yis/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /kha khyer gyis ni yongs su bskor/ /rdo rje kha khyer mdzes byas la/ zla ba
377a2(rgyud): phyed pa'i lcug mas khyab/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i tshogs dang ldan/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pas sbras/ /zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes/ /g.yer ka'i dra bas yang dag ldan/ /kha dog sna tshogs
377a3(rgyud): rnam par brgyan/ /de dang dbus kyis bar thig la/ /byang chub sems rnams yang dag bri/ /bskal ba bzang po stong dag ni/ /'das pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams/ /shar du thams
377a4(rgyud): cad rdo rje mtshan/ /lho ru rin chen phyag mtshan bsnams/ /nub tu pad+ma rdo rje sogs/ /byang du las kyi rdo rje bsnams/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha gang dag /phyi rol thig la yang
377a5(rgyud): dag bri/ /drag po la sogs lha chen rnams/ /snam bu las ni lus phyed phyung / /dbang phyug chen po tshangs pa che/ /khyab 'jug g.yung drung gzhon nu ni/ /rigs bcas dpung
377a6(rgyud): dang bcas rgyal po/ /shar gyi dkyil 'khor yang dag bri/ /'khyil ba'i 'od can gtum po dang / /ser skya rdo rje ser skya rnams/ /rigs bcas 'khor lo yang dag ldan/ lho yi
377a7(rgyud): phyogs su yang dag bri/ /myos pa phreng ldan rgyal nyid pa/ /rnam par rgyal dang skyel byed rnams/ /rigs bcas dpung dang yang dag ldan/ /nub kyi cha ru yang dag bri/ /ko shi
377b1(rgyud): gos can me dang rlung / /rdo rje 'jigs byed la sogs rnams/ /nub kyi cha las 'og tu ni/ /byang gi cha ru yang dag bri/ /de bzhin dpung dang bdag por bcas/ /ma mo 'jig
377b2(rgyud): rten rab grags dang / /gtso bo 'khor lo rnam rol pa/ /lha min la sogs rdzu 'phrul che/ /phyi rol 'khor lo'i rigs su bshad/ /rgyud chen gsang ba zhes bya las/ /
377b3(rgyud): stong phrag bcu ru bshad pa rnams/ /ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bri/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas zur du/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi ni bri bar bya/ /me tog spos la sogs ldan pa/
377b4(rgyud): mchod pa'i lha mo yang dag bri/ /ji ltar nus shing bri ba dang / /ji ltar mdzes shing rjes su mthun/ /ji ltar rang gi rigs bshad pa/ /ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bri/ /dkyil
377b5(rgyud): 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor mchog tu mdzes pa zhes bya ba rkang pa
377b6(rgyud): brgyad pa rdzogs so/ / //de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ma lus pa rdzogs so// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
377b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ma lus par dgug pa 'di 'byung ngo / /'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug
378a1(rgyud): @#/ /dgug pa nyid dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la thabs mkhas pa chen po 'jug par byed pa nyid dang / don thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa dang / mya
378a2(rgyud): ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa dang / byang chub chen po'i tshogs bsags pa dang / sems can gyi don la mi slu ba dang / theg pa chen po 'di las theg pa gzhan la
378a3(rgyud): 'dod pa mi skyed cing 'gyur ba med par 'ching ba nyid dang / thabs dang / shes rab dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa
378a4(rgyud): sdud par byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po nyid la yang dag par byed pa nyid do/ /de la shar gyi sgor rdo rje lcags kyu chen po zhes bya ba rdo rje 'dzin dgod par bya'o/ /lho
378a5(rgyud): ru ni rdo rje zhags pa zhes bya ba dang / nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog ces bya ba dang / byang du rdo rje dril bu zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dgod par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor thams
378a6(rgyud): cad kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshul ched du brjod pa las/ rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor
378a7(rgyud): chen po rdzogs so/ / //de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul thob byed/ /dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs nas ni/ /dam
378b1(rgyud): tshig mchog chen sems dpa' yis/ /bskor ba dag ni lan gsum bya/ /ma lus gsang ba blta bya zhing / /kun tu tshogs nas dga' bar bya/ /gsang ba chad na dag bya zhing /
378b2(rgyud): lhag pa rnam par sbyang bar bya/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /myur du phyag rgya che bsten bya/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/ /lan gcig tu ni brjod par bya/ /'khro lo zur ni
378b3(rgyud): yang dag gnas/ /rdo rje lha mo sbyan drang bya/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas mchod rten spyan drang bya/ /sgo yi dbus na gang gnas pa/ /sgo srung rnams ni sbyan drang
378b4(rgyud): bya| |phyi rol dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /sems dpa' chen po spyan drang bya/ /de nas sgo rnams thams cad du/ /lcags kyu la sogs las byas te/ /phyag rgya bzhi ni yang dag
378b5(rgyud): bcing | |brgya dang rtsa brgyad dag bya ba/ /rdo rje lcags kyu kun du dgug /rdo rje zhags pas gzhug par bya/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog kun tu bcing / /rdo rje dril bus dbab par bya/ /sgo'i
378b6(rgyud): bya ba'o/ /de nas dbus su 'dug byas nas/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches/ /rdo rje dbye ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /sgo rnams thams cad dbye bar bya/ /sgo srung ba ru dmigs nas
378b7(rgyud): ni| |sgo rnams dbye bar bya ba yin/ /rdo rje sdigs mdzub phyag rgya yis/ /gdug pa thams cad bsdigs par bya/ /gang tshe mchod pa yang dag rtsom/ /ji srid dus kyi rdzogs
379a1(rgyud): @#/ /'gyur ba/ /grwa ni thams cad dag tu ni/ /bdug spos rnams ni gdul bar bya/ /sngon du sgo yi las byas te/ /de nas mchod pa yang dag bya/ /dang
379a2(rgyud): por me tog shing la sogs/ /sbos dang mar me phyag rgyar bcas/ /mtshams kyi dus las sngon du ni/ /bum pa rdo rje spyan drang bya/ /rdo rje bum pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /ci nus par
379a3(rgyud): ni spyan drang bya/ /bum pa shin tu bzang po gcig /rin chen sna bdun las byas mdzes/ /yang na rin chen dang bsres pa'i/ /rdo rje dri yi chu ldan bya/ /rdo rje chu yi sngags dang
379a4(rgyud): ni| |rdo rje phyag rgya chu gtsang ma/ /stong dang rtsa brgyad bzlas byas na/ /rdo rje'i bdud rtsi'i chu ru 'gyur/ /bum pa'i sngags ni/ oM badzra u da ka hUM/ me tog gi sngags ni/ oM badzra
379a5(rgyud): puSh+pe hUM/ mar me'i sngags ni/ oM badzra A lo ke hUM/ dri'i sngags ni/ oM badzra gan+d+he hUM/ bdug spos kyi sngags ni/ oM badzra d+hu pe hUM/ spos dang me tog la sogs pa/ /thams
379a6(rgyud): cad phyag rgya ldan par bya/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gzung byas nas/ /rdo rje'i sngags kyis rab tu sbyor/ /dgongs ka'i dus nas brtsams nas ni/ /khrus kyi cho ga yang dag bya/ /lus la dri
379a7(rgyud): yis phyugs pa dang / /rgyan rnams kun gyis legs par brgyan/ /rdo rje'i shugs kyi sngags dang ni/ /rdo rje shugs kyi phyag rgya yis/ /'byung ba dang ni 'jug pa yi/ /rdo rje'i rnal
379b1(rgyud): 'byor nyes mi 'gyur/ /smin ma rdo rje ri mo mtshan/ /sangs rgyas phyag rgya la sogs tshogs/ /sems dpa' thams cad 'gom byas kyang / /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor nyes mi 'gyur/ /de la
379b2(rgyud): ni 'gyod pa med par 'gyur/ /rdo rje dril bu dkrol ba yis/ /cho ga chad dam lhag kyang rung / /'grub 'gyur nyes par mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te 'di ni cho gar ldan/ /kun tu 'jigs
379b3(rgyud): par mi bya'o/ /grub pa'i rnal 'byor go cha yis/ /sangs rgyas skyon du 'dzin mi mdzad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya ches/ /dkyil 'khor mchod phyir 'jug par bya'o/ /zhugs
379b4(rgyud): nas dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje dag ni dgug par bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyu kun bcings nas/ /sor mo yis ni dgug par bya/ /de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu yis/ /rgyud las
379b5(rgyud): dgug pa nyid du gsungs/ /de bzhin rdo rje rigs chen la/ /rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag bcing / /rin chen lcags kyu'i sbyor pa yis/ /rin po che ni dgug par bya/ /
379b6(rgyud): pad+ma lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ni/ /pad+ma'i rigs chen dag la bshad/ /las kyi lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ /las kyi rigs chen dgug par bya/ /rdo rje chen po'i lcags
379b7(rgyud): kyu bcing / /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya/ /dkyil 'khor lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang bya/ /phyi rol rdo rje lcags kyu bcing / /
380a1(rgyud): @#/ /phyi rol rdo rje rigs spyan drang / /bkra shis rdo rje'i lcags kyu yis/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan drang bya/ /byang phyogs lcags kyu'i
380a2(rgyud): sbyor ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor pa rnams spyan drang bya/ /rin chen lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa spyan drang bya/ /snying po'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ /phyag
380a3(rgyud): na rdo rje spyan drang bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor pa yis/ /kun la nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas/ /bsnyems tshul sngags kyi phyag rgya yis/ /rnam snang yang dag spyan drang
380a4(rgyud): bya| |sangs rgyas lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis/ /de bzhin kho nar sangs rgyas rnams/ /dam tshig lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ /dam tshig sems dpa' spyan drang
380a5(rgyud): bya| |dgug pa'i sbyor ba byas nas ni/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad gdon par bya/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad rdzogs nas ni/ /mchod pa'i sbrin rnams yang dag sgrub/ /bdag
380a6(rgyud): nyid dbul ba la sogs pa'i/ /ji skad bshad pa'i brtul zhugs spyad/ /bshags dang gsol gdab mchod pa dang / /bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs rnams//
380a7(rgyud): bdag gi bya ba rdzogs nas ni/ /phyag rgya bcing ba yang dag brtsam/ /brgya'am yang na stong dag gam/ /brgya phrag brgya ni bsdus pa yis/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs ni
380b1(rgyud): bcing byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas dkyil 'khor las byas te/ /ji srid skya rengs shar gyur pa/ /de srid phyag rgya yang dag bcing / /nges
380b2(rgyud): par dngos grub ster bar byed/ /de nas langs te phyag rgya bcas/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol byung nas ni/ /gdug pa la sogs kun bsdigs te/ /dkyil 'khor mchod phyir
380b3(rgyud): 'jug par bya/ /rang gi khrus byas lus dris byugs/ /ji ltar 'tsham pa'i rgyan gos ldan/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i gos gyon zhing / /phreng ldan kha ni dri zhim pas/ /rdo rje gar
380b4(rgyud): gyi sbyor ba yis/ /me tog spyi bor gzhag byas te/ /rol pa'i rdo rje dga' ba yis/ /zhugs nas mgon la rab btud cing / /de nyid 'dod chags rjes chags dang / /
380b5(rgyud): de nyid bskul ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba/ /sangs rgyas kun ni bskul bar bya/ /skyon dang bral zhing rtag pa ste/ /'dod chags kun la rjes
380b6(rgyud): chags pa/ /mchod 'os chen po rgyal po che/ /bcom ldan de nyid bdag grub mdzod/ /de nas dam tshig mchog gi ni/ /phyag rgya cho ga bzhin bcings nas/ /rdo rje slob
380b7(rgyud): dpon zhugs nas ni/ /lcags sgrog phyag rgya yang dag bcing / /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu bcing / /steng du se gol brdabs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas
381a1(rgyud): @#/ /thams cad bsdu bar bya/ /sangs rgyas bsdu ba'i sngags ni dzaHjaHdzaH/ /shar gyi sgo ru yi ge dzaH/ /de bzhin lho ru yi ge hUM/ /nub tu lcags sgrogs
381a2(rgyud): chen po baM/ /byang du kun tu dbab pa aH/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la/ /las 'di dag ni yang dag bshad/ /las ni kun tu rdzogs byas nas/ /de bzhin ngo mtshar
381a3(rgyud): mthong 'gyur ba/ /cho 'phrul chen po rmad byung che/ /sna tshogs brgya dang rtsa bcu ste/ /cho 'phrul rmad byung chen po rnams/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis mthong 'gyur/ /dngos grub
381a4(rgyud): bdag nyid chen po kun/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu 'ong bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje can dang byang chub sems/ /de bzhin rigs ni rnam lnga dang / /rdo rje dbyings ni bdag nyid
381a5(rgyud): che| |bcom ldan mchog kyang gshegs par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems sogs sangs rgyas sras/ /ngo mtshar slob dpon gyis mthong 'gyur/ /mchod pa dang ni gtor ma
381a6(rgyud): nyid| |ji bzhin cho ga bcas par 'gyur/ /de bzhin rdzu 'phrul dngos grub dag /mthong nas dkyil 'khor bya ba yin/ /ji ltar bkod pa 'khor lo dang / /ji ltar yo
381a7(rgyud): byad zad pa dang / /ji ltar brtul zhugs spyad pa bzhin/ /de bzhin dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen dang / /sangs rgyas yang dag
381b1(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'khor lo chen po byon/ /'di ni ngo mtshar mchog yin no/ /ji ltar de rnams bzhugs pa bzhin/ /de bzhin 'khor lo yongs su bzung / /
381b2(rgyud): ye shes bzang po khyab pa yi/ /rmad byung dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor rmad byung thams cad ni/ /sa dag brtol nas mthong bar 'gyur/ /yang na dkyil 'khor
381b3(rgyud): bar snang gi / nam mkha' la gnas mthong bar 'gyur/ /yang na sangs rgyas kun gang ba'i/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bar 'gyur/ /yang na phyogs rnams thams cad du//
381b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas sku ni rab mthong 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs bzhin du/ /rdo rje can gyis bdag nyid mthong / /yang na gsang ba lnga zhes pa'i/ /yang na sangs rgyas mkhas
381b5(rgyud): pa'i mchog / yang na dkyil 'khor gnas de ni/ /stong phrag gsum ni yongs su gzung / /yang na rdo rje sems gcig po/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po zhes bshad do/ /de
381b6(rgyud): yi mtshan mo nyin mo mthong / /nyi ma'i 'od kyis kun khyab pa'i/ /yang na nyi ma 'char ba ste/ /yang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /dag pa'i zhing ni mthong nas su/ /sangs
381b7(rgyud): rgyas rol pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /'dus pa shin tu dag pa yi/ /dbang bskur ba ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /rmad byung sna tshogs zhes bya ba/ /rnam 'phrul ngo mtshar
382a1(rgyud): @#/ /'di mthong 'gyur/ /rdo rje slob dpon skal chen gyis/ /dkyil 'khor mchod pa sna tshogs 'gyur/ /yo byad tshogs par gyur kyang ni/ /gang zhig
382a2(rgyud): bsgribs par gyur pa yis/ /de bzhin ngo mtshar nyid mi mthong / /rnal 'byor gzhan ni yang dag rtsom/ /phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas ni/ /sdig pa dral ba yang dag
382a3(rgyud): bya| |rmad byung sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ /la lar zhugs pa tsam gyis ni/ /'grub pa nyid du gdon mi za/ /dang po thun la 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bzhin la lar mtshan phyed
382a4(rgyud): na| |gsum pa 'ang skya rengs 'char na 'grub/ /de bzhin la lar nyi shar na/ /de ma thag tu mngon 'dod pa'i/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mchog 'grub 'gyur/ /skal ldan
382a5(rgyud): thar par 'dod 'gyur na/ /sa ni dang por 'dod pa ste/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob nas/ /gang gis gnas med 'gro ba'o/ /yang ni rig pa 'dzin nyid dam/ /de bzhin rdo rje
382a6(rgyud): nyid du 'gyur/ /ji ltar mngon par 'dod par 'grub/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yongs su 'dzin/ /mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang / /de bzhin sdig pa kun byed pas/ /
382a7(rgyud): gang tshe lan bdun byas nas ni/ /sgrub pas rnal 'byor 'grub par 'gyur/ /'byung ba bzhi las gzugs can min/ /nam mkha'i gzugs su rtag tu 'gyur/ /chos kyi dbyibs
382b1(rgyud): su 'gyur ba nyid/ /rdo rje bka' ni gzhan du min/ /gang gi lan bdun bsgrubs na ni/ /sdig pa dge ba nyid 'gyur zhing / /nyes par byas pa bsod nams tshogs/ /gzhan du
382b2(rgyud): 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ /dad pa med par gnas pa dang / /gang tshe the tshom za 'gyur ba/ /de ni rnal 'byor nyams par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems ni yongs ma bzung / /sngon du bsnyen
382b3(rgyud): pa nyams 'gyur te/ /rtag tu brtul zhugs nyams par 'gyur/ /de 'dra la sogs bgegs mang dang / /nga rgyal 'di dag rnam par spangs/ /sdom pa yongs su ma bzung zhing //
382b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor de nyid tshul shes min/ /rdo rje slob dpon mi brtan 'gyur/ /'grub pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyi/ /gal te rdo rje slob dpon 'gyur/ /mkhas
382b5(rgyud): shing sdom pa blangs pa dang / /byang chub sems ni yongs su gzung / /gang tshe 'tsho ba don yod cing / /gal te skye ba 'bras bcas 'dod/ /'bad pas thams cad nyid kyis ni//
382b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po yang dag brtsam/ /byang chub sems dang ldan gyur nas/ /rig pa'i sdom pa 'dzin pa yi/ /de nas rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab
382b7(rgyud): 'grub 'gyur/ /yang zhus pa/ rig pa'i rgyud ni rab bsgrub phyir/ /sdom pa ji ltar blang bar bgyi/ /ji ltar dam tshig bsrung bar bgyi/ /dam tshig nyams pa ji lta bu/ /sems can
383a1(rgyud): @#/ /kun gyi don bya'i phyir/ /byang sems yang dag bskyed nas ni/ /theg pa gzhan la 'dod mi bya/ /de nas rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam/ /dkyil 'khor gang na
383a2(rgyud): gnas kyang rung / /slob dpon gyi ni mdun song ste/ /zhabs dag la ni btud nas brjod/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang
383a3(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i tshul brtan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol/ /sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la stsol/ /gtso bo bdag la sdom
383a4(rgyud): pa stsol/ /slob dpon gyis ni nye bar brtag /rnam pa kun tu dri bar bya/ /dam tshig brjod bya gang zhig ni/ /snod du rung ba de gzhug bya/ /bu dang slob ma ma yin min/ /snod
383a5(rgyud): dang ldan la sbyin par bya/ /gal te snod dang ldan par shes/ /srog dang bdog pa kun sbyin bya/ /sngon tu dkyil 'khor rab 'jug cing / /cho ga bzhin du bcug nas
383a6(rgyud): ni| |de nas me tog bcas thal mo/ /lus btud dga' ba che rnams kyi/ /bshags pa dang ni gsol ba gdab/ /rjes su yi rang kun tu bya/ /rgyud dbang gsang ba
383a7(rgyud): las gsung bzhin/ /mchod pa dang bcas yongs su bsngo/ /phyogs rnams kun tu phyag bya zhing / /sdom pa chen po blang bar bya/ /slob dpon la ni rab tu brjod/ /
383b1(rgyud): gtso bo bdag la sdom pa stsol/ /thub pa'i nyi ma ma lus pa'i/ /sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ /slob dpon dbang du gnas
383b2(rgyud): pa la| |sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba/ /mi ldog 'khor lo'i 'byor par ldan/ /thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog /gsang ba chen po 'jug par bgyi/ /gsang ba'i
383b3(rgyud): rigs mtho thams cad du/ /slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzod/ /mi ldog pa yi dbang skur ba/ /skal ba chen po bdag la stsol/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas
383b4(rgyud): btab cing / /dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol/ /dbang bskur ba ni rmad byung che/ /sems can kun
383b5(rgyud): gyi don bgyid phyir/ /bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol/ /gsang ba'i rigs las byung ba yi/ /rdo rje'i rigs bcas 'khor lo ste//
383b6(rgyud): rta babs bcas par yang dag ldan/ /slob dpon gyur par shes par bya/ /bdag nyid nye bar zhi ba nyid/ /byang chub sems ni yongs su gzung / /gsang ba yi ni 'khor
383b7(rgyud): lo ru| |sdom pa dang bcas 'jug par bgyi/ /da nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ /gsang ba chen po rigs dag pa/ /gsang ba yongs su 'dzin
384a1(rgyud): @#/ /par ni/ /bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam/ /des kyang 'tshal zhes brjod par bya/ /yang slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ /
384a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun ste/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song / /'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag
384a3(rgyud): rgya yang / /blo chen gyis ni gzung bar bgyi/ /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bya/ /bla ma sangs rgyas
384a4(rgyud): kun dang mnyam/ /'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i/ /sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po la/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /zang
384a5(rgyud): zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar bya/ /'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag
384a6(rgyud): pa'i| |dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i
384a7(rgyud): las kyang ci nus bya/ /de las gzhan pa bcu bzhi ni/ /phas pham par ni rab tu bshad/ /spang zhing dor bar mi bya ste/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba zhes bshad do/ /nyin dang
384b1(rgyud): mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /nyin re zhing ni bzla bar byed/ /gang tshe nyams gyur rnal 'byor pa/ /kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur/ /khyod kyi srog chags gsad mi bya/ /ma byin par yang
384b2(rgyud): mi blang ngo / /'dod pa log par mi spyad cing / /brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o/ /phung khrol kun gyi rtsa ba yi/ /chang ni rnam par spang bar bya/ /sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs pa//
384b3(rgyud): bya ba ma yin thams cad spang / /dam pa nye bar bsten bya zhing / /rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya/ /lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang / /ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang / /
384b4(rgyud): yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni/ /ci nus par ni rjes su skyongs/ /theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya/ /sems can don la rgyab phyogs min/ /'khor ba dag kyang spang mi bya/ /rtag
384b5(rgyud): tu mya ngan 'das ma chags/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba pa/ /khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing / /phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang / /mtshan ma 'gom par mi bya'o/ /'di dag
384b6(rgyud): dam tshig yin par bshad/ /khyod kyi rtag tu bsrung bar bya/ /rjes mthun sdom pa rgya cher ni/ /gsang ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad/ /de nyid kyis kyang brjod par bya/ /'dir
384b7(rgyud): ni slob dpon bdag la gson/ /gtso bo ji ltar bka' stsal pa/ /de bzhin du ni bgyid par 'tshal/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad
385a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa'i| |byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /tshul khrims gyi
385a2(rgyud): ni bslab pa dang / /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge
385a3(rgyud): 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /deng nas brtsam ste gzung bar bgyi/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / /yang dag nyid du
385a4(rgyud): bzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re zhing ni dus drug bya/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi
385a5(rgyud): rab tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba/ /pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs
385a6(rgyud): mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med pa/ /
385a7(rgyud): dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gi sdom pa ma lus gzung / /ma grol ba ni dgrol bar bgyi/ /ma brgal ba ni bsgral
385b1(rgyud): bar bgyi/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing / /sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /cho ga ji bzhin dbang bskur bya/ /rdo rje slob
385b2(rgyud): dpon dbang bskur ba/ /gsang ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad/ /de lta bu yi cho ga yis/ /rtag pa nyid du spyod pa na/ /slob dpon rdo rje 'chang chen du/ /'di ni 'gyur ba the
385b3(rgyud): tshom med/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyi las rdzogs so// //de nas slob ma gzhug pa'i las/ /yang dag nyid du bshad par bya/ /slob ma rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /ji
385b4(rgyud): bzhin gsang ba chen por gzhug / snod dang snod min brtag pa nyid/ /bdag nyid chen pos mi bya'o/ /'di ni mthong ba tsam gyis kyang / /sangs rgyas nyid ni 'grub par
385b5(rgyud): 'dod/ /gal te de ni snod min na/ /de la gzhug pa sbyin par bya/ /yang na gang zhig don gnyer 'gyur/ /de la ji ltar bde ba nyid/ /ci ste gang zhig 'dug par 'gyur/ /
385b6(rgyud): mkhas pas gzhug pa sbyin par bya/ /gang phyir mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ /thams cad 'grub par gdon mi za/ /'on kyang gang zhig 'dug par 'gyur/ /de la las ni bya ba
385b7(rgyud): min| |gzhug pa tsam zhig sbyin bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad nyid mi bya/ /dga' zhing dad dang ldan 'gyur na/ /snod du rung ba brtag par bya/ /gsum la skyabs 'gro sngon song ba'i/ /de la
386a1(rgyud): @#/ /gzhug pa sbyin par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che/ /rdo rje slob ma la sbyin bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' ches/ /sbyor bzhin su yin brjod
386a2(rgyud): par bya/ /dkar po dmar po dang ldan pa'i/ /gos kyis mig ni bkab gyur dang / /rdo rje 'jug byed phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya/ /de nas sgo yi las bya ste/
386a3(rgyud): sngon la rdo rje lcags kyu yis/ /rdo rje lcags kyu dgug bya zhing / /yi ge dzaHni brjod par bya/ /badzra aM ku sha dzaH/ /rdo rje lcags kyus bkug nas ni/ /rdo rje zhags pas gzhug
386a4(rgyud): par bya/ /lho yi sgor na sbyor bya zhing / /yi ge hUM ni brjod par bya/ /hUM badzra pA sha hUM/ /rdo rje zhags pas bcug nas ni/ /lcags sgrog ldan pas bcing bar bya/ /nub kyi sgo ru
386a5(rgyud): bcings nas ni/ /yi ge paM ni brjod par bya/ /badzra s+pho Ta baM/ rdo rje lcags kyus yang dag dgug /rdo rje zhags pas gzhug bya zhing / /rdo rje lcags sgrog gis bcing bya/ /rdo
386a6(rgyud): rje dril bus yang dag dbab/ /badzra gaN+De aH/ rdo rje gzhug pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /dkyil 'khor mchod phyir gzhug par bya/ /dam tshig phyag rgya chen po yis/ /rdo rje'i ye
386a7(rgyud): shes yang dag dbab/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM/ /dam tshig phyag rgya chen po yis/ /rdo rje'i sngags ni rab bskul bya/ /dam tshig bdag nyid chen po yis/ /sangs rgyas ye shes dbab
386b1(rgyud): par bya/ /sa ma ya hUM/ /de nas mchod pa phyag rgyar bcas/ /spos dang me tog la sogs tshogs/ /phyag rgya dag ni thams cad bya/ /rdo rje'i sngags ni rab bskul bya/ /de nas cho
386b2(rgyud): ga ji bzhin du/ /rdo rje slob ma mna' bsngags bya/ /badzra u da ka /rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur bas/ /ji ltar 'dod pas dbang bskur bya/ /badzra a b+hi She ka /rdo rje ye shes bla na
386b3(rgyud): med| |de nas de la dbab pa sbyin/ /badzra A be sha a a/ /bcu/ nyi shu/ sum cu/ bzhi bcu/ lnga bcu/ drug cu/ bdun cu/ brgyad cu/ dgu bcu/ brgya/ rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di
386b4(rgyud): yis| |thams cad du ni yang dag dbab/ /de nas gdong g.yogs dgrol bar bya/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla med pa/ /badzra ak+Shi/ rdo rje'i rigs ni skal ldan gyi/ /dkyil 'khor ltos
386b5(rgyud): shig ces brjod bya/ /badzra pA sh+ya ho/ /de nas de la bum pa bzang / /rdo rje slob dpon gyis dbang bskur/ /gang mang gzung ba tsam gyis ni/ /sdig pa kun las rnam grol 'gyur//
386b6(rgyud): oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ snod ni yang dag brtag bya zhing / /de yi ye shes yongs su spyad/ /gal te snod du rung shes na/ /rnam par dbye bar dga' bar bya/ /he badzra nA ma/ lnga/ cho
386b7(rgyud): ga bcu/ nyi shu/ chu sum cu/ rdo rje bzhi bcu/ rin chen lnga bcu/ pheg rdo ba drug cu/ kha sbyar bdun cu/ bzhad pa brgyad cu/ dag pa dgu bcu/ sems pa brgya/
387a1(rgyud): @#/ /sangs rgyas stong / las nyis stong / gzugs sum stong / rnal 'byor bzhi stong / 'dzin ba lnga steng / gzungs drug stong / kha dog bdun stong /
387a2(rgyud): dbyibs brgyad stong / mtshan ma dgu stong / tshig 'bum/ a 'bum phrag gcig ni yongs rdzogs nas/ 'khor lo'i mtshan nyid yang dag ldan/ /gsang ba yi ni spyod
387a3(rgyud): yul gzhan/ /de nas las ni rab bshad bya/ /slob ma'i cho ga dang / ming gi dam tshig rdzogs so// //ye shes dag pa bdag nyid che/ /de nas gsang ba
387a4(rgyud): rab bshad bya/ /gang gi cho ga thams cad kyis/ /'khor lo chen po brtan 'gyur ba/ /sangs rgyas sems dpa' sems dpa' nyid/ /sa yi mtshan nyid yang dag
387a5(rgyud): ldan| |gsang ba'i dam bcas yi rang bzhin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dag pa/ /rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs/ /ye shes dag pa rdzu 'phrul che/ /rdo rje'i
387a6(rgyud): thugs 'dzin 'gyur nas ni/ /mtshan nyid dag ni yang dag brtag /rnal 'byor dpe byad don ldan pa/ /mtshan nyid rjes su brtag par bya/ /rdo rje'i thugs kyi rjes sbyor
387a7(rgyud): bas| |ye shes dag pa yang dag gzung / /mchog tu gsang ba dam pa mchog /ye shes bzhugs pa kun tu bshad/ /de nas ye shes dam pa yis/ /'jig rten 'das
387b1(rgyud): pa rab gzhug bya/ /mtshan nyid chen po dang ldan pa'i/ /rtogs pa'i sa la yang dag rten/ /rnal 'byor pa yi spyod yul mchog /rdo rje chos ni yid 'ong ba'o/ /thim dang
387b2(rgyud): chos sku zhes bya dang / /bsdigs dang 'od zer lnga pa dang / /glog dang chu zla zhes bya bas/ /sangs rgyas ye shes yang dag 'thob/ /chu yi zla ba bzang po yis/ /zla ba'i dkyil
387b3(rgyud): 'khor spang bar bya/ /nyi ma lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /rigs chos skar ma zhes bya ba/ /nyon mongs gnod pa 'joms byed pa/ /e ma'o gsang ba chen por bshad/ /gsang
387b4(rgyud): ba zhes bya rdor 'od 'byung / /gzhan yang zla ba phyed par 'dod/ /pho nya'i dkyil 'khor kha T+wAM ga/ /bcing ba rtse gsum sbyor las byung / /lcags kyu shin tu 'bar ba dang //
