387b6(rgyud): tu gsang ba rdzogs so/ / //de nas mchog tu gsang ba/ /rgya che ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul can/ zab pa/ tshul rgya che ba/ mkhas pa/ bsam gyis mi
387b7(rgyud): khyab pa'i yul las kyis tshogs ston pa/ dga' ba chen po'i bkod pas kun khyab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
388a1(rgyud): @#/ /ba la sogs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzad 'byung ba rol ba'i 'khor lo chen bo 'di las phyag rgya chen po'i rgyud mchog ces bya ba 'byung
388a2(rgyud): ste| gsang ba mchog tu rgya che ba/ /bsam gyis mi khyab las rnams ston/ /rol pa'i 'khor lo chen po ru/ /chos kyi mdzod ni 'dzin par bya/ /re zhig dang por
388a3(rgyud): las kyis tshogs bstan par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ hUM| 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gzung ba yi/ /sbyor thabs yi ge hUM brjod de/ /'di yis kyang ni rgyal po dang / /phyag
388a4(rgyud): rgya'i rgyal mo brgya ru 'gyur/ /gnyis pa ni/ byang chub chen po'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i tshul la 'jug pa yin no/ /'di lta ste/
388a5(rgyud): hUM| 'dis ni phyag rgya zhes bya yi/ /yi ge hUM ni brtan par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya'i rgyal mo rnam pa stong / /gsum pa phyag rgya stong phrag
388a6(rgyud): ni| |brgya yi tshogs su 'gyur ba yin/ /sangs rgyas 'khor lor 'jug pa yi/ /yi ge hUM gis brtan par 'gyur/ /hUM| rnal 'byor bzhi pa'i dbye ba ni/ /brgya
388a7(rgyud): phrag khri ru 'dir 'gyur ro/ /rig pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ /phyag rgya'i rgyal mo kun hUM bcas/ /'khor lo'i phyag rgya ji snyed yod/ /mngag gzhug pa ni bye bar
388b1(rgyud): 'gyur/ /rtse gsum la sogs mtshon cha ni/ /rtag tu phyag rgya'i rgyal po yin/ /hUM| de nas sngags kyi tshogs 'byung ste/ /Tak+ki bcu/ maT nyi shu/ phaT sum cu/ raT bzhi
388b2(rgyud): bcu| baT lnga bcu/ riT drug cu/ khaT bdun cu/ waT brgyad cu/ taT dgu bcu/ taT brgya/ kaT ni lan stong yin/ /ta dang wa zhes bya ba dang / /Da ni rnam pha bcu ru
388b3(rgyud): 'gyur/ /yi ge Da ni lan gsum sbyar/ /yi ge a yang rnam pa bzhi/ /yi ge ba ni rnam pa lnga/ /yi ge a ni lan drug sbyar/ /ka ni lan bdun yang dag sbyar/ /yi ge d+ha ni lan
388b4(rgyud): brgyad sbyar/ /yi ge sha ni phyed du 'gyur/ /khiT ni stong phrag brgya ru 'gyur/ /stong phrag brgya las rnal 'byor gyis/ /phyag rgya'i rgyud ni btu bar bya/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus
388b5(rgyud): p a gsang ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i drug pa gsang ba'i tshogs chen po'i mchog de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po shin tu gsang ba
388b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor rdo rje rtsa mo las/ byang chub pa'i tshul rgya chen pos 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i le'u gnyis pa rdzogs so// //rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mchog tu
388b7(rgyud): gsang ba yang rdzogs so/ / //de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul rgya chen po 'di las dkyil 'khor chen po'i dang por phyag rgya dang / nye ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba'i ye
389a1(rgyud): @#/ /shes 'byung ste/ gang tshe rdo rje slob dpon dang / /rdo rje slob mar gyur pa na/ /phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya bcing / /gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas
389a2(rgyud): gang tshe rdo rje sems dpa' 'ching / /rdo rje khu tshur dam du 'ching / /gang tshe rdo rje rgyal po 'ching / /rdo rje gnod sbyin rab tu 'ching / /gang tshe rdo rje chags pa 'ching / /rdo rje srin
389a3(rgyud): po rab tu 'ching / /gang tshe rdo rje legs pa 'ching / /rdo rje las ni rab tu 'ching / /gang tshe rdo rje rin chen 'ching / /rdo rje smra ba rab tu 'ching / /gang tshe rdo rje gzi brjid 'ching
389a4(rgyud): rdo rje rgyu ni rab tu 'ching / /gang tshe rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'ching / /rdo rje rnon po rab tu 'ching / /gang tshe rdo rje bzhad pa 'ching / /rdo rje chos ni rab tu bcing / /de lta bu yi sbyor ba
389a5(rgyud): yis| |phyag rgya'i lan ni yang dag sbyar/ /phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya brtan par 'gyur/ /mchod pa'i phyag rgya ji ltar lags/ /rdo rje'i lcags kyus
389a6(rgyud): bkug nas su/ /rdo rje'i mdas ni dgang bar bya/ /rdo rje'i mdas ni 'phangs nas su/ /rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis bsgrub bya/ /phyag rgya ji bzhin bkrol nas ni/ /de ni bcing bar
389a7(rgyud): rab tu bya/ /mchod pa'i cho ga 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchod par 'gyur/ /de bzhin g.yon pas gar bya zhing / /g.yas pas khu tshur bcings nas ni/ /dpral
389b1(rgyud): bar yongs su bskor nas su/ /kha yi mdun du dgod par bya/ /rdo rje nyi ma bzhad pas bgad/ /mnyam zhing cung zad gdangs te gnas/ /ral gri dri ma med snang bas/ /rdo rje
389b2(rgyud): glu ni blang bar bya/ /rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mo ni/ /yang dag bsgreng ba legs par bsgrub/ /de nas spyi gtsug kha dag tu/ /las byas dkyil 'khor mchod pa na/ /rigs kyi lha yi
389b3(rgyud): sbyor ba yis/ /legs par bsgrub pas gtam 'grub bya/ /dang por bdag nyid rdo rje sems/ /de bzhin lha nyid brtag par bya/ /brtul zhugs sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rigs
389b4(rgyud): kyi lha nyid bsgrub par bya/ /'khor lo rnam pa du ru brjod/ /ji ltar rigs de bzhin 'khor lo/ /ji ltar dgod pa de bzhin 'gyur/ /ji skad gsungs pa dgongs pa bzhin//
389b5(rgyud): mdor bsdu na ni rnam pa lnga/ /rdo rje rin chen de bzhin chos/ /pad+ma sna tshogs shin tu bstan/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas rnal 'byor gsang / /'khor lo rnam pa lnga ru bshad/ /gsang
389b6(rgyud): ba rnam pa du ru 'gyur/ /gsang ba rnam pa lnga ru brjod/ /rgyas pa'i sgo nas rnam pa mang / /sangs rgyas rdo rje rin chen dang / /chos dang las ni grags chen no/ /cho ga rnam pa du ru
389b7(rgyud): brjod/ /mdor na rnam pa gsum du 'dod/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / /mngon spyod kyi ni rtog pa la/ /rdo rje sbyor ba las byung du/ /rdo rje'i sbyor ba bla med pa/ /tshad med bgrang
390a1(rgyud): @#/ /du med pa yis/ /ji ltar gdul bya rnams kyi khams/ /de bzhin rdo rje sbyor 'byung rnams/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud du ji ltar brjod/ /gsang ba lnga ldan
390a2(rgyud): gang yin pa'i/ /de ni rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya/ /dbang bskur phyag rgya chen po dang / /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor 'byung / /ji ltar gsang ba'i rigs las byung / /gang
390a3(rgyud): zhig sngon du chos nyid snang / /yid la byed pa dang ldan pa/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi thabs chen po/ /de bzhin gsang ba rab tu brtag /'di yi rtag tu de nyid rig /rdo rje'i
390a4(rgyud): ye shes ji ltar 'gyur/ /ji ltar bsgoms pas rdo rje can/ /mngon par sbyor ba de nyid rig /de tshe ye shes rang bzhin sems/ /de nyid ye shes brtan par 'gyur/ /
390a5(rgyud): mchog tu gsang ba ci 'drar brjod/ /phyag rgya rnam pa lnga ldan pa/ /de ni mchog tu gsang ba bsgrags/ /phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya bsdu/ /nye bar bzhad pa'i mchod pa'o/ /
390a6(rgyud): de nyid kyang ni ji lta bu/ /rig pa'i bsgom pa bstan pa dang / /ting 'dzin sgo dang yang dag ldan/ /rig pa'i lha mo'i 'khor gyi mchog /de nyid du ni rtag tu 'gyur/ /rdo rje
390a7(rgyud): phra mo ji ltar brjod/ /shes rab can gyis bdag bsam bya/ /nga ni su zhig bdag mi dmigs/ /'byung ba bzhi yi rang bzhin lus/ /'byung ba rnams las ji ltar
390b1(rgyud): 'byung | |de nas lus 'di thams cad ni/ /rnal 'byor spyi bo nas brtsams te/ /rkang pa yi ni mthil bar du/ /mi gtsang rdzas ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zla ba'i rdo rje dbus
390b2(rgyud): gnas par/ /yang na bdag nyid bsam par bya/ /yang na snying ga'i dbus su ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /yang na zla gnyis yang dag ldan/ /dbus su rdo
390b3(rgyud): rje rnam par bsgom/ /yang na rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa/ /lus kun brtan par spro bar bya/ /yang na rdo rje bdag nyid sku/ /rdo rje'i dngos po rnam spangs pa'i/ /yang na mkha' mtshungs

397b2(rgyud): pa| |shes rab lus 'joms nyon mongs pa/ /de bas shes rab b+ha gar brjod/ /de bas rtags ni ci yin brjod/ /rtags ni mtshan ma zhes byar bshad/ /blo ldan shes
397b3(rgyud): rab brtags las byung / /byang chub sems ni thabs chen po/ /de ni rtags su rab tu bsgrags/ /b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas su/ /'khor lo'i dngos grub bsgrub par bya/ /ting
397b4(rgyud): nge 'dzin dang gzungs gang yin/ /mkhas pas sgo gnyis gzung bar bya/ /de ni bcug pa zhes bshad de/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por 'gyur/ /de nas dgongs pa bshad pa yin//
397b5(rgyud): b+ha ga ru ni rdzas bsgrub pa/ /gsang rgyud dbang po las gsungs bzhin/ /bsgrub pa dag ni ji ltar bya/ /b+ha gar gur gum phyung nas ni/ /mtshan ma yang ni gzhug par bya/ /rdzas rnams
397b6(rgyud): bzang po thob par 'gyur/ /rnam pa bzhi yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /b+ha ga pad+ma zhes byar brjod/ /mtshan ma rdo rje zhes bshad do/ /rdzas ni pad+ma'i steng bzhag nas/ /rdo rje srub mas
397b7(rgyud): bsrub par bya/ /shin tu chags pas 'dod chags can/ /des ni gsang ba rab bsgrub 'gyur/ /'dod chags chags ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /dngos grub chen por ji ltar 'gyur//
398a1(rgyud): @#/ /'dir ni chags can rab bsgrub 'gyur/ /bden ba nyid du yang dag bshad/ /'dod chags bral ba gsang ba med/ /des ni gsang ba 'grub
398a2(rgyud): mi 'gyur/ /dang ba'i dad pa chen po yis/ /gsang ba'i sbyor ba las byung chags/ /bsgrub pa la ni 'jug 'gyur ba/ /de yis bsgrub pa gdon mi za/ /chags
398a3(rgyud): dang bral ba'i sdig pa ni/ /gang zhig gsang ba chags bral 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub spyod byed ba/ /sdig chen kha na ma tho che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu smad/
398a4(rgyud): chos la kha na ma tho med/ /de yis gsang ba rab 'grub 'gyur/ /rnam pa thams cad nyon mongs kun/ /'joms pa 'dod chags mchog yin no/ /'dod chags zhe sdang
398a5(rgyud): sogs nyon mongs/ /rtogs dang mtshungs pa'i chos med do/ /skye dgu kun bsad bsod nams ji lta bu/ /ji srid 'khor bar bcing bar du/ /srid pa zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /
398a6(rgyud): 'khor ba'i btson ra 'di ru ni/ /sems can kun gyis gzhom par bya/ /gang zhig gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa/ /des ni gsang ba rab 'grub 'gyur/ /nor ni 'khor ba zhes bshad
398a7(rgyud): de| |sems can de rnams nyon mongs 'gyur/ /gang zhig gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa/ /byang chub sems ni rab 'grub 'gyur/ /bud med rnams dang lhan cig rtse/ /des ni
398b1(rgyud): gsang ba 'grub par 'gyur/ /rang gi rigs kyi lha mo gang / /rig pa'i lha mo bla med ngang / /lhan cig rnal 'byor rol pa yis/ /rol ba tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /gal te rigs
398b2(rgyud): ni 'grub 'dod na/ /brdzun pa'i tshig kyang smra bar bya/ /chos kun dngos po med pa ste/ /brjod min tshig gi spyod yul min/ /med pa gang yin brdzun tshig ldan/ /rigs pa'i bzlas pa
398b3(rgyud): bden pa yin/ /gal te dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub 'dod na/ /sems can bsad bya de bzhin bza' bar bya/ /sems can chags pa zhes bshad de/ /ming dang gzugs la kun tu
398b4(rgyud): chags/ /bkug nas zos par gyur na ni/ /bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur/ /'khor ba spangs kyang chos min 'gyur ba ni/ /'khor ba spong ba gang yin pa/ /sems can don la
398b5(rgyud): rgyab phyogs 'gyur/ /blo ldan theg pa dman dga' ba/ /de ni rtag tu nyes ldan yin/ /mya ngan 'das la mngon dga' na/ /sems can don la phyir phyogs 'gyur/ /blo ldan theg pa dman
398b6(rgyud): dga' ba/ /de ni rtags nyes ldan yin/ /ser sna can ni rigs bsgrub 'gyur/ /tshul khrims rnam par dag 'gyur zhing / /srog gi phyir yang gtong mi byed/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs
398b7(rgyud): ldan 'gyur ba/ /des ni gsang ba rab bsgrub 'gyur/ /drag dang ldan pa'i sems ldan pa/ /des ni 'grub par 'gyur bar 'dod/ /sdug bsngal thams cad gcod pa'i phyir//
399a1(rgyud): @#/ /rtag tu drag po nyid du 'gyur/ /sdig pa sdang ba rnams sbong na/ /des ni gsang pa rab 'grub 'gyur/ /chos min spyod pa rnal 'byor mchog grub yin/ /gzung
399a2(rgyud): dang 'dzin pa chos shes pa/ /gang tshe spong bar gyur pa ni/ /rtag tu chos mchog spyod pa ste/ /des ni gsang ba rab 'grub 'gyur/ /srid gsum mngon bar chags pa sa rnal 'byor
399a3(rgyud): bsgrub/ /srid gsum la ni chags par 'gyur/ /sems tsam du ni rtogs pa'i phyir/ /de ni rnal 'byor bsgrub pa yin/ /rtag tu 'dod pa'i 'dod chags rgyal 'gyur gang /
399a4(rgyud): gsang ba chen por brtan par bsgrub pa yin/ /'dod par bya ba 'dod pa ste/ /'dod ba'i 'dod chags zhes bshad do/ /rab tu dgas la chags pa ste/ /blo ldan blo gros de
399a5(rgyud): la chags/ /gci ba khyor ba gang 'thungs nas/ /bshad ba cung zad bza' bar bya/ /thams cad dag pa'i brtul zhugs kyis/ /myur du dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur/ /
399a6(rgyud): gci ba rdo rje zhes bshad de/ /bshad ba pad+ma yang dag ldan/ /dga' ba'i chos la reg pas ni/ /de nas thar pa'i grong khyer 'gro /rnal 'byor chen po b+ha ga 'thungs/ /rnal
399a7(rgyud): 'byor rab tu bsgrub par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes gang / /b+ha ga yi ni sgra ru bsgrags/ /gang zhig bdud rtsi btung ba btung / /rdo rje 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur//
399b1(rgyud): bud med sdug dang lhan cig tu/ /dkyil 'khor chen po brtag par bya/ /rigs kyi lha mo rnal 'byor byung / /rig pa sdug ba nyid yin te/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba brtag byas
399b2(rgyud): na| |skad cig de la rang 'grub 'gyur/ /khro zhing gtum la drag po ste/ /rdo rje yi ni rigs su 'gyur/ /gang zhig sdug bsngal rnams la khro/ /'khor ba'i sbyor 'byung las sdang ba//
399b3(rgyud): rdo rje rnal 'byor phun tshogs 'gyur/ /rigs ni nyams pa 'gyur ba yin/ /dge ba thams cad spangs nas ni/ /chos min pa ni yang dag spyad/ /bya min byed pa'i rnal 'byor
399b4(rgyud): pas| |las kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur/ /rnam par rtog pa kun spangs nas/ /dge ba la ni rab tu 'jug /chos la lta bar gyur pa nyid/ /chos min kun tu spyod mi bya//
399b5(rgyud): bya min gang zhig dngos med de/ /de nyid brtan par byed par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor chen po de lta bus/ /rtog pa chen pos rab 'grub 'gyur/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa'i
399b6(rgyud): drug pa gsang ba'i tshogs chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po shin tu gsang ba'i rnal 'byor rdo rje rtse mo las/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i dgongs pa rnam
399b7(rgyud): par 'grel pa zhes bya ba rnam par bshad pa ste le'u gsum ba rdzogs so/ / //rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba las/ de bzhi
400a1(rgyud): @#/ /gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mchog gsang ba'i chos kyi gnas mchog tu gsang ba yang rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas dang
400a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum gshegs pa sras bcas la/ /yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal nas/ /mchog tu rmad byung rigs pa'i rgyud/

400a4(rgyud): gsang / /ye shes dam pa'i rang bzhin te/ /rgyal po gsang ba'i mdo dbang po/ /theg pa chen po kun du bsdus/ /rigs 'byung blo ldan chen po dang / /sangs rgyas thams cad
400a5(rgyud): 'byung ba dang / /rdo rje kun dbang cho ga ni/ /shin tu rmad byung rab bshad bya/ /ngo bo nyid kyi sku ru ni/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje can kun 'byung / /rmad byung chos kyi rgyud chen po/ /thar pa mchog
400a6(rgyud): tu stan pa ste/ /thub pa'i dbang phyug rnam snang mdzad/ /thugs ka nas ni rgyud 'di byung / /kun tu bzang po rdo rje'i bdag/ phyag na rdo rje 'od po che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems
400a7(rgyud): dpa' che/ /don yod dbang phyug dam pa ste/ /theg pa chen po byang chub sems/ /bden pa dam tshig ces bya ba/ /thub ba chen po chos phung po/ /stong phrag dag ni grangs med
400b1(rgyud): gsungs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog chen gyi/ /chos kyi mngon bar rtogs pa bshad/ /so sor rtogs ba'i mngon rtogs dang / /de bzhin mngon par byang chub dang / /dpe byad
400b2(rgyud): mchog ni mngon du byung / /de bzhin ye shes thob pa nyid/ /ye shes chen po'i chos 'di ni/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni mngon rtogs pa shad/ /theg pa chen bo'i mngon rtogs
400b3(rgyud): yin| |shin tu gsang ba'i tshul chen po/ /rang sems so sor rtogs pa ni/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul chen po/ /pha rol phyin drug spyod pa mchog /theg pa chen po

400b5(rgyud): byang chub che/ /pha rol phyin pa dam pa bcu/ /sa bcu kun tu rtogs pa ste/ /theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus/ /byang chub chen po rgya che ba/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i
400b6(rgyud): mchog |kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs byang chub/ /theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus/ /mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med/ /theg pa chen po

401a2(rgyud): zla ba bzhin du mthong / /thugs rje'i brtse ba yang dag byung / /sems can yongs su 'dzin par byed/ /byang chub sems ni dag pa che/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni gos pa med/ /dge ba'i
401a3(rgyud): chos kyis kun tu gang / /nyon mongs thams cad nges par 'joms/ /zla chen gang ba'i dbus su ni/ /byang chub zla ba gnyis pa ste/ /bskal pa grangs med gsum byang
401a4(rgyud): chub| |yang dag blangs las byung ba nyid/ /dam pa'i chos mchog grangs med pa/ /sbyin pa'i spyod pa mchog dang ldan/ /sa dang sa ru rtogs byed pa/ /ye shes dag pa
401a5(rgyud): zag pa med/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /de ni rdo rje shin tu brtan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang yin/ /snang ba med cing gnas med pa/ /ma skyes ma byas
401a6(rgyud): dag pa ste/ /skye dang 'jig pa rnam par spangs/ /mi tshig mi chod mi phyed pa/ /lhag ma med pa'i chos kyi sku/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid yang dag byung / /rdo rje'i sku ni bla na med//
401a7(rgyud): sku dang gsang ba de bzhin spyod/ /spyod yul kun tu rtogs ba dang / /lnga po de dag kun thun mong / /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid can/ /mngon par byang chub rnam pa
401b1(rgyud): lnga| |chos kyi ye shes bla na med/ /lnga po de dag gsang zhes bya/ /snying por yang ni de dag gsungs/ /gang phyir de na kun grub pa'i phyir/ /sngon ni don kun grub par byed/ /bcom
401b2(rgyud): ldan kun tu bzang po dang / /rdo rje'i las ni bla na med/ /rdo rje'i dbyings ni brtan pa'i bdag /rnam par snang mdzad bla na med/ /de dag gsang ba'i mtshan yin te/ /rnal 'byor
401b3(rgyud): gyi ni gnas skabs thob/ /de nas snying po ni/ oM tsit+ta pra ti bo d+ha ka ro mi/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA da lA mi/ oM taSh+Tha badzra/ oM badzra At+ma kou0f85haM/ oM ya thA sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA sta thA a haM/

403a1(rgyud): @#/ /'khor snang / /byang chub sems ni gsang chen po/ /bsod nams tshogs dang shes rab dang / /byang chub spyod pa rab sbyor ba/ /rgyal po bzhi ni rab
403a2(rgyud): tu 'byung / /go cha'i sbyor ba gang yin dang / /spyod pa de bzhin mngon rtogs te/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub che/ /rgyal po bzhi ni rnam par byung / /byang chub snying po mngon

403a6(rgyud): thams cad kun nas ni/ /sa ni thams cad g.yos byas nas/ /phyogs rnams thams cad kun nas ni/ /'od kyi snang bas gsal bar byas/ /mgon chen sangs rgyas

403b6(rgyud): rgyal po bzhi ni phyogs bzhi ru/ /rdo rje'i steng du bzhugs par 'gyur/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams bzhi dag tu/ /mnyam par dmigs nas bzhugs par 'gyur//
403b7(rgyud): rdo rje rnal 'byor rgyal po che/ /sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag bsdus/ /chos dbyings brtan pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /gsang ba kun du khyab par bsdus/ /dbus su mgon

404a2(rgyud): bzhugs/ /gdug pa kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal/ /thub pa'i skyes mchog mi bskyod pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad brtan mdzad nas/ /shar gyi phyogs su yang dag
404a3(rgyud): bzhugs/ /dbang bskur ba ni rgyal po che/ /nam mkha' thub pa'i skyes mchog ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad brtan mdzad nas/ /lho yi phyogs su bzhugs

404a6(rgyud): gyur| |mi bskyod rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /mkha' snying rin chen 'byung ldan yin/ /'jig rten dbang phyug 'od dpag med/ /rdo rje las ni don yod grub/ /gsang
404a7(rgyud): zhing shin tu gsang ba mchog / chos dbyings brtan pa gang yin pa/ /de nyid mgon po rnam snang mdzad/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag por bshad/ /sangs rgyas
404b1(rgyud): thams cad phyogs bzhi ru/ /sbyin pa bzhi ni rab tu bshad/ /phyogs mtshams drug ni brtan mdzad nas/ /rnam par snang mdzad yang dag ldan/ /shar gyi sangs rgyas
404b2(rgyud): dbang phyug rgyal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs mi mnga'/ /thub pa mi bskyod snang ba des/ /snying po bzhi ni gsungs par 'gyur/ /hUM badzra satwa/ dzaHbadzra rA dza/ ho badzra rA ga /
404b3(rgyud): sa badzra sA d+hu/ dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bya ba/ /de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' sogs/ /'jigs pa mi mnga' sems dpa' bzhi/ /mgon po yi ni thugs las byung / /
404b4(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje bzang po mchog /rdo rje lcags kyu chen po bsnams/ /rdo rje chags pa bdud chen po/ /rdo rje legs pa rdzu 'phrul che/ /rdo rje rgyal po bzhi thub pa/ /thub pa'i thugs
404b5(rgyud): ka nas byung ba/ /grangs bzhi dang ni ldan pa dag /'khor lo'i rim gyis bzhugs par gyur/ /rdo rje rin chen skal ba che/ /rin chen 'byung ldan rab grags pa/ /lha yi
404b6(rgyud): bdag po sangs rgyas chos/ /snying po bzhi ni gsungs par 'gyur/ /oM badzra rat+na/ oM badzra te dzaH/ trAM badzra ke tu/ hA badzra hA sa/ rdo rje rin chen stobs po che/ /grangs
404b7(rgyud): bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /rin chen rgyal po las byung ba/ /thub pa'i thugs ka nas byung ba/ /rdo rje rin chen rin po che/ /rdo rje gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul che/ /rdo rje
405a1(rgyud): @#/ /rgyal mtshan shin tu mthong / /rdo rje bzhad pa rdzu 'phrul che/ /de dag re re las kyang ni/ /rgyal po grangs med rab tu byung / /g.yas dang
405a2(rgyud): g.yon dang rgyab dag dang / /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun du bzhugs/ /dag pa'i chos ni ye shes che/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med/ /shes
405a3(rgyud): rab pha rol phyin dag pas/ /snying po bzhi ni gsungs par 'gyur/ /hrIHbadzra d+harma/ /d+h+rIHbadzra tIk+Sh+Na/ maM badzra he tu/ raM badzra b+hA Sha/ chos kyi rgyal po bzhi yang
405a4(rgyud): ni| |mgon po'i thugs ka nas byung ba/ /sems can kun la phan don du/ /'khor lo rim bzhin bzhugs par gyur/ /chos rnams kun la don yod pa/ /
405a5(rgyud): spyod pa yi ni slob dpon mchog /don yod grub pa rgyal po ches/ /snying po bzhi ni gsungs par 'gyur/ /kaM badzra karma/ haM badzra ra k+Sha/ hUM badzra yak+Sha/ baM badzra
405a6(rgyud): muSh+Ti| |kun kyang 'khor lo yang dag ldan/ /ye shes dag pa mchog gi rnams/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'khor lo ni/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
405a7(rgyud): mchog / sngon gyi byang chub sems gang ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par byung / /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po ni/ /rdo rje rin chen nyid du 'gyur/ /shes rab
405b1(rgyud): pha rol phyin dag pa/ /de ni rdo rje chos mchog ldan/ /thabs la mkhas pas 'khor lo ni/ /rdo rje las su rnam par 'phrul/ /de nas chos ni rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs
405b2(rgyud): pa'i rten/ /byung gyur byung dang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa bla na med/ /byang chub sems ni mchog tu 'dzin/ /dag pa'i chos kyi 'dul mdzad pa/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po che//
405b3(rgyud): dbu ma'i chos las rnam par byung / /gzhan yang / rjes su brtse dang de bzhin sbyin/ /shes rab thabs dang yang dag ldan/ /chos kyi rgyal po bzhi po de/ /rnam par snang mdzad thugs las
405b4(rgyud): byung | |'du shes 'du shes med pa min/ /btags pa ma yin gnas pa med/ /bdag dang chos nyid lta ba min/ /rnam rtog las ni byung ba min/ /ngo bo nyid kyi sku ru ni/ /so sor snang ba
405b5(rgyud): yang dag byung / /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yis ni/ /chos kyi longs spyod 'di lta bu/ /thams cad brjod pa dang bral zhing / /zhi dang phra ba blta bar dka'/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni dgongs
405b6(rgyud): mdzad cing / /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mthong bar 'gyur/ /de nyid theg pa che rang bzhin/ /mdzad chen po yi rang bzhin mchog /shes rab chen po thabs chen po/ /theg
405b7(rgyud): pa chen po'i mngon par bsdus/ /sangs rgyas ye shes mngon par rtogs/ /sngon du bcom ldan mdzad gang yin/ /sems dpa' bzhi po de rnams te/ /theg chen mngon par rtogs
406a1(rgyud): @#/ /par 'dod/ /byang chub kyi ni sems de las/ /thub pa mi bskyod rnam par byung / /sems de yang ni rnam pa bzhi/ /rnam pa bzhi ni yang dag byung / /byang chub sems
406a2(rgyud): gang de rdo rje/ /rdo rje phyag na rdo rje yin/ /sgrol dang grol dang dbugs 'byin pa/ /lcags kyu 'dzin pa rab tu gnas/ /sems dpa' bstan pa don yod pa/ /ye shes de nyid shin tu
406a3(rgyud): chags| |slar yang bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ /legs pa las ni yang dag byung / /gang zhig mgon po thub 'byin pa/ /sems can rjes su 'dzin mdzad pa/ /rin chen 'byung ldan
406a4(rgyud): zhes bya ba/ /de ni slar yang rnam pa bzhi/ /chos kyi sbyin pa rin po che/ /mi 'jigs gzi brjid yang dag gnas/ /byams pa rgyal mtshan yang dag brjod/ /zang zing bzhad par yang
406a5(rgyud): dag ldan/ /shes rab pha rol phyin rgyal po/ /tshe dpag med ni rnam pa bzhi/ /so sor rig pa mngon par rdzogs/ /ting nge 'dzin sgo pad+ma can/ /sdug bsngal gcod pa shin tu rno/ /
406a6(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo cha dang ldan/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul gzhan/ /brjod du med pa'i chos kyi mchog /don yod grub pa mdzad pa ste/ /thabs de yang ni rnam pa bzhi/ /sems
406a7(rgyud): can la sogs 'dul ba las/ /rdo rje las ni mchod pa che/ /theg pa gzhan du mi 'jug pa/ /rdo rje bsrung bar rab tu brjod/ /gdug pa gdul zhing nges byed pa/ /phyir mi ldog pa khu tshur
406b1(rgyud): yin| |de nas 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i mtshan ni/ rdo rje sems dpa'/ rdo rje rgyal po/ rdo rje chags pa/ rdo rje legs pa/ rdo rje rin che/ rdo rje gzi brjid/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan/ rdo rje bzhad pa/ rdo rje
406b2(rgyud): chos| rdo rje rnon po/ rdo rje rgyu/ rdo rje smra ba/ rdo rje las/ rdo rje srung ba/ rdo rje gnod sbyin/ rdo rje khu tshur/ de la dang po ni rdo rje sems dpa'/ rdo rje chos/ rdo rje rin chen/ rdo rje las/ de nas rnam grangs mi
406b3(rgyud): bskyod pa/ rin chen 'byung ldan/ 'od dpag tu med pa/ don yod par grub pa/ de nas 'di rnams gsang ba'i snying po ni/ hUM oM A ha/ rgyal po'i snying po ni/ oM hUM hrI hoH/ bcu drug gi snying po ni/ hUM
406b4(rgyud): dzaHho sA/ oM AM twAM ha/ hI d+hi maM raM/ kaM haM hUM baM/ shin tu gsang ba'i rgyud chen po 'di'i pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa rnam pa bcu drug tu yang dag par byung ba gang yin pa de ni rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa
406b5(rgyud): dam pa'o/ /byang chub spyod pa'i mthu yis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyi pha rol phyin/ /de bas pha rol phyin ldan pa/ /rdo rje sems mar brjod par bya/ /bsdu ba yi ni dngos po bzhi/ /so sor rtogs pa mngon
406b6(rgyud): par rdzogs/ /chos bzhi gcig tu gyur pa ni/ /rdo rje rin chen ma ru brjod/ /gsang ba'i chos kyi ye shes ni/ /de nyid pha rol phyin pa mchog /pha rol phyin pa che las byung / /rdo rje chos mar brjod par
406b7(rgyud): bya| |sbyor ba yang dag shes pa gang / /rdo rje las mar brjod par bya/ /rgyal po pha rol phyin bzhi ni/ /rdo rje pha rol phyin pa mchog /gang phyir rnam par rol pa mchog /sgeg mo sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin//

407a2(rgyud): ma brtson 'grus pha rol phyin/ /'dod pa'i 'dam gyis ma gos pa/ /me tog bsam gtan pha rol phyin/ /kun tu mtshungs par 'gro ba yi/ /bdug pa shes rab pha rol phyin/ /dri nga mi dge las
407a3(rgyud): phyir phyogs/ /thabs ni dri dang yang dag ldan/ /phyogs rnams kun tu snang byed pa/ /smon lam snang ba chen mo yin/ /thob pa'i pha rol phyin zhes pa/ /stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa mchog /mi shes

407a5(rgyud): tshul| |chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad ma/ /bdag med chos kyi rang bzhin mchog /rdo rje'i lha mo yang dag byung / /rdo rje pha rol phyin pa mchog /de nas 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i ming ni/
407a6(rgyud): rdo rje sems ma/ rdo rje rin chen ma/ rdo rje chos ma/ rdo rje las ma/ rdo rje sgeg mo/ rdo rje phreng ba ma/ rdo rje glu ma/ rdo rje gar ma/ rdo rje me tog ma/ rdo rje bdug pa ma/ rdo rje dri ma/ rdo rje mar me ma/

407b1(rgyud): lcags kyu zhes byar bshad/ /byang chub spyod pa la spyod la/ /rdo rje zhags par rab tu bsgrags/ /theg pa gzhan la 'dod med pa/ /de ni rdo rje lcags sgrog bshad/ /chos rnams thams cad skye

407b5(rgyud): rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun/ /rnal 'byor ting 'dzin 'thob mdzad pa/ /re re zhing yang rdo rje ni/ /grangs med pas kyang yongs su bskor/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs las byung / /dag pa'i chos
407b6(rgyud): kyi tshul chen po/ /de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni/ oM satwa badzrI/ oM rat+na badzrI/ oM d+harma badzri/ oM karma badzrI/ oM badzra lA s+ye/ oM badzra mA le/ oM badzra gI ti/ oM badzra n-ir t+ya/ oM badzra puSh+pe/ oM badzra d+hU pe/ oM
407b7(rgyud): badzra gan+d+he/ oM badzra A lo ke /oM badzra aM ku sha /oM badzra pA sha/ oM badzra s+pho Ta/ oM badzra g+haN+De/ de nas 'di dag thams cad kyi thun mong gi snying po ni/ hUM| mgon po rnam par snang mdzad che/ /'khor
408a1(rgyud): @#/ /los bsgyur ba chen po bzhi/ /sems dpa' chen po bcu drug dang / /gsang chen lha mo bcu gnyis dang / /sgo srung ba ni bzhi dag ste/ /sum cu rtsa bdun las mi nyung / /
408a2(rgyud): gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi po ni/ /phyis kyi pha rol phyin pa mchog /gsang ba'i lha mo kun las ni/ /rjes thog nyid du yang dag byung / /byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid ches/ /sum cu rtsa
408a3(rgyud): bdun bgrang mi bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad thugs ka nas/ /chos kyi rigs mchog yang dag byung / /byang chub sems las kun tu byung / /mi bskyod la sogs tshogs chen po/ /nga yis

408a7(rgyud): bstan pa de bzhin zhi/ /ji ltar zhi ba de bzhin byung / /rdo rje sems dpa' mi bskyod mtshungs/ /shar gyi phyogs su yang dag bzhugs/ /rdo rje rin chen rin chen mchog /lho yi phyogs su

408b4(rgyud): phyug rdo rje sems/ /mgon po la ni gsol ba 'debs/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub khyod rag lus/ /khyod la brten nas de bzhin gshegs/ /sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun/ /khyod la brten nas
408b5(rgyud): byung bar gyur/ /dang po'i thugs ni rnal 'byor che/ /byang sems shin tu rnyed dka' ba/ /kye ma sems can 'di sdug bsngal/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi snod min pa/ /sems can kun gyi don ched
408b6(rgyud): du| |'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dam pa gsungs/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /kun mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug gis/ /mgon po'i gsung ni gsan nas su/ /'khor lo'i sbyor ba gsungs
408b7(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /'khor lo chen po grong khyer che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs las byung / /snying po'i chos mchog rnal 'byor ldan/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje'i bstan pa
409a1(rgyud): @#/ /yi| |sems can 'di dag gdul bya min/ /de rnams bde ba'i don ched du/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bshad par bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon cho ga'i tshul/ /bdag nyid ji
409a2(rgyud): bzhin rnal 'byor byas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub thob 'gyur ba/ /de la dang por rab bshad bya/ /de ru sems can thams cad kun/ /shin tu brtan par rab 'jug na/ /sangs rgyas byang
409a3(rgyud): chub rdo rje nyid/ /thob 'gyur de la the tshom med/ /theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus/ /sangs rgyas byang chub shin tu gsang / /thar pa mchog tu bstan pa nyid/ /sngon du gzhung mchog
409a4(rgyud): mnyan par bya/ /bskal pa brgya phrag dag tu ni/ /ji ste mngon par brtson byas kyang / /gang zag bzhi ni 'jig rten du/ /bsgrubs kyang 'grub pa nyid mi 'gyur/ /byang chub sems ni ma
409a5(rgyud): skyes dang / /the tshom ldan pa nyid dang ni/ /bka' bzhin du ni mi byed pa/ /dad pa med nyid 'grub mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar dus gsum gshegs de bzhin/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
409a6(rgyud): nas| |dkon mchog gsum la dad byas te/ /the tshom med par byed pa'i mchog/ khyim pa dang ni rab tu byung / /phyogs ni gnyis po 'dis bsgrub bya/ /ji ltar 'os shing 'tsham pa ru//
409a7(rgyud): go rims bzhin du rab bshad bya/ /byang chub sems ni lhur blangs nas/ /lha gzhan 'dod pa brtson mi bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la dad bya ste/ /de gzhol ba la brtson par bya/ /
409b1(rgyud): srog gcod rku dang 'khrig pa dang / /rdzun dang myos byed rnam par spang / /khyim pa'i sdom pa la gnas nas/ /de tshe rig pa'i rgyal po sgrub/ /gal te de ni rab byung gyur/ /sdom pa gsum la yang dag
409b2(rgyud): gnas/ /so sor thar dang byang chub sems/ /rig 'dzin sdom pa mchog yin no/ /zla ba'am yang na lo re'o/ /de bzhin yang na lo gcig tu/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /sngon du
409b3(rgyud): rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya/ /nyin re zhing ni ci nus par/ /thun gsum du ni cho ga bsgrub/ /rtog pa 'di ni thun bzhi ru/ /ji ltar 'os shing 'tsham par ni/ /sdig pa thams cad bshags
409b4(rgyud): par bya/ /bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang / /sangs rgyas kun la gsol ba gdab/ /de yi bsod nams byang chub bsngo/ /de bzhin phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi/ /sangs rgyas bla med thams
409b5(rgyud): cad la/ /gsol ba gdab cing rab btud nas/ /zhabs la mnyam bzhag phyag bya 'o/ /ji skad gzhung rgya che las gsung / /phyag rgya bzhi ni sbyor ba yis/ /rgyud gzhan dag ni thams cad
409b6(rgyud): kyi| |rdo rje'i sngags ni rab brjod bya/ /de la snying po ni 'di yin te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzo pa s+thA nA yA At+mA naM ni r+yA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badzra satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta
409b7(rgyud): pU dzA a b+hi She kA ya At+mA naM ni r+yA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA pra bar ta na ya At+mA naM ni r+yA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+harma pra bar ta ya
410a1(rgyud): @#/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA karma Ne At+ma naM ni r+yA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karma ku ru mAM/ phyag rgya dang bcas cho gar ldan/ /yang dag nyid du rab
410a2(rgyud): bshad bya/ /sor mo thams cad sbyar ba ni/ /rdo rje thal mor rab tu brjod/ /sa phyogs gtsang mar 'dug nas ni/ /mkhas pas yan lag kun phyag bya/ /rdo rje thal mo brkyang
410a3(rgyud): nas ni/ /rgyal ba rnams la dbul bar bya/ /mgo bos de bzhin byas nas ni/ /mkhas pas dpral bas phyag bya 'o/ /mgo bo nas ni phab byas nas/ /de bzhin kha yis phyag
410a4(rgyud): bya'o| |de bzhin snying gar bzhag byas nas/ /spyi bo nas ni phyag bya 'o/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor pas phyag bya/ /slar yang cho ga la gnas te/ /mchod
410a5(rgyud): pas cho ga dang ldan pa/ /spos dang me tog mar me dang / /dri dang phreng ba byug pa ni/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran byas nas/ /sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /sbyin pa rnam
410a6(rgyud): bzhi'i sbyor ba yis/ /ci nus par ni mkhas pas dbul/ /gtsang zhing gtsang ma'i gos dang ldan/ /gtsang ma'i grogs dang lhan cig tu/ /rdo rje'i sdom pa bla med pa/ /bslab pa'i
410a7(rgyud): gnas ni blang bar bya/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi'i sbyor ba yi/ /dad cing de la rab gzhol bya/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang / /slob dpon yang ni phyi ma yin/ /nyin re zhing ni ci
410b1(rgyud): nus par/ /khrus bzhi dag ni rab tu bya/ /rnal 'byor ji ltar khrus bya ba/ /go rims bzhin du rab tu bshad/ /sdom pa gsum la rab tu gnas/ /dang po khrus su brjod pa yin/ /gnyis
410b2(rgyud): pa rgyud las gsungs pa yi/ /bshags dang gsol ba 'debs la sogs/ /phyag rgya bcing ba gsum pa ste/ /bzhi pa chu ste tha ma yin/ /khrus kyi cho ga 'di yis ni/ /mkhas pas
410b3(rgyud): 'dir ni khrus bya'o/ /gos ni lan gsum brje ba yi/ /sgrub pa pos ni cho ga bya/ /sdom pa la ni legs gnas pa/ /gos ni dang por brje ba dang / /gnyis pa cho ga bsgrub
410b4(rgyud): pa dang / /gsum pa ngo tsha khrel yod pa/ /gtsang ma'i gos ni gsum po dag /lan gsum du ni brje bar bya/ /gang la kha na ma tho med/ /thams cad bza' zhing bsten
410b5(rgyud): par bya/ /sha dang chang dang sgog pa sogs/ /bza' ba min pa rnam par spang / /dri nga ba dang mi gtsang nyid/ /bza' dang btung ba rnam par spang / /gzhan la gnod pa dang
410b6(rgyud): ldan pa/ /lus kyi phyir yang bya ba min/ /'khrig pa bdun dang yang dag ldan/ /mi sdug sgom pas spang bar bya/ /yid gzhungs mkhas shing gsal ba dang / /theg
410b7(rgyud): pa chen po'i don sems pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul rgya che/ /shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs/ /klog pa dang ni bsam pa dang / /yang dag yang du gsol ba
411a1(rgyud): @#/ /gdab/ /dgra dang grogs dang bar ma la/ /sems snyoms mi 'jigs rab tu byin/ /snyen cing bden par smra ba yis/ /zhe sdang 'joms byed byams
411a2(rgyud): pa bsgom/ /chos dang gang zag bdag med cing / /'dus byas dang ni 'khrul pa tsam/ /blo ldan brtan pas brtag par bya/ /'dus byas kun la rmongs mi bya/ /'tsho ba'i srog
411a3(rgyud): gi phyir yang ni/ /byang chub sems ni dor mi bya/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya rnams/ /nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/ /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /shes rab dril bu zhes bya gzhan/ /
411a4(rgyud): slob dpon la ni brnyas mi bya/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /sbyor ba lhod par mi bya zhing / /cho ga ston pa lhur blang bya/ /pha rol phyin drug spyod pa la/ /go rims bzhin du
411a5(rgyud): bslab par bya/ /sems can gyi ni don ldan pas/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad/ /kha na ma tho chung du yang / /srog ni btang snyoms dor mi bya/ /khyim pa'am rab tu
411a6(rgyud): byung ba'ang rung / /'dris pa thams cad rnam par spang / /bu dang chung ma dag la yang / /srid pa'i bcing ba las grol bya/ /brkam zhing chags la sdang ba dang / /rmongs shing
411a7(rgyud): le lo ldan pa'ang min/ /bag yod shin tu brtson pa yis/ /rnal 'byor cho ga bsgrub par bya/ /lta ba kun las rnam par grol/ /de nyid las ni legs par mthong / /dge
411b1(rgyud): zhing dgongs pa bshad pa yis/ /don shes don ni rtogs par 'gyur/ /rigs dang mi rigs cho ga shes/ /de nyid rnal 'byor shin tu mkhas/ /brtse ldan byang chub spyod par
411b2(rgyud): ldan| |spyod pa rnams la rab tu mkhas/ /de 'dra'i tshul ni sna tshogs dang / /de lta bu yi bsgrub pa yis/ /dngos grub dang ni thar pa 'thob/ /dngos grub kun la the tshom med/ /gnas
411b3(rgyud): dang gos dang bza' ba yi/ /lhag pa thams cad rnam par spang / /lha rnams brnyas par mi bya zhing / /bya ba ma yin thams cad spang / /le lo med par nyin re zhing / /bsrung ba
411b4(rgyud): yi ni cho ga bya/ /bgegs med 'jigs par mi bya ste/ /rang sems 'di ni gdul bar dka'/ /pha dang ma ru 'dzin pa dang / /bram ze dge slong de dang 'dra/ /dag cing dul
411b5(rgyud): la zhi ba dang / /bsdams shing thar bar shes pa dang / /rgyal srid mtho ris longs spyod min/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod 'phel phyir min/ /gzhan du sems can don
411b6(rgyud): gyi phyir/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges pa/ /zas kyi tshod ni shes pa dang / /mtshan mo gnyid kyang sad par bya/ /'dod chags skyon la sogs pa gzhan/ /sems kyis rnam
411b7(rgyud): par mi brtag go / sems ni rab tu dang byas nas/ /g.yo ba med cing des byas pa/ /legs par smra zhing rab tu 'byed/ /chos ni nges par don gnyer byed/ /mngon spyod kyi ni bya ba
412a1(rgyud): @#/ /bzhin/ /sems can gnod dang 'tsho mi bya/ /nyes ldan gdug pa'i sems can rnams/ /dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug mi bya/ /lha yi sku dang phyag
412a2(rgyud): mtshan dang / /lha yi bzhon pa dag dang ni/ /dman ma lha yi grib ma dang / /lha yi mtshan ma thams cad dang / /bza' ba dag ni sna tshogs pa/ /mtshan ma gzugs su
412a3(rgyud): byas pa dang / /'gom par mi bya bza' mi bya/ /nam yang ba rdzi bar mi bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum dang 'brel ba'i zas/ /nam yang nye bar longs mi spyod/ /tha na phul
412a4(rgyud): dang dman ma yi/ /dri yang mnam par mi bya'o/ /ri bo 'am ni nags kyi nang / /gtsang zhing yid 'ong dben pa 'am/ /chu bo'i 'gram mam skyed mos tshal/ /ne'u sing shin tu yid
412a5(rgyud): 'ong ba'am/ /lha khang gtsang ma nyams dga'am/ /khang pa gtsang ma dben pa 'am/ /gang du tshogs pa med pa ru/ /sangs rgyas la dmigs sems kyis ni/ /gtsang ma'i grogs
412a6(rgyud): dang lhan cig tu/ /de 'dra'i gnas su 'dug nas ni/ /thar pa mchog tu bstan pa nyid/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag brtsam/ /thun bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis/ /mgon
412a7(rgyud): po mchog la phyag bya zhing / /sangs rgyas rjes dran sgom pa pos/ /bshags pa la sogs de bya'o/ /mchod pa nyid kyang ci nus bya'o/ /gzhan yang phyag rgya yang dag
412b1(rgyud): bcing / /mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad ni/ /phyogs kun du ni yang dag spro/ /sa gzhi dag ni ma lus nyid/ /kun nas rin chen shing ldan dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs mchog
412b2(rgyud): ldan dang / /rgyal ba rnams la dbul bar bya/ /me tog shing dang bdug pa dang / /dri yi tshogs ni yid 'ong dang / /rin chen rang bzhin rgya mtsho ni/ /thub pa'i dbang
412b3(rgyud): phyug rnams la 'bul/ /de nas phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /me tog bdug pa la sogs sprin/ /rol mo'i tshogs ni yid 'ong ba/ /mchod pa'i sprin ni rnam par
412b4(rgyud): bsam/ /mchod pa thams cad rab byed pa/ /rig pa'i rgyal chen 'di rnams dang / /phyag rgya dag kyang yongs gsal ba'i/ /bsam pa yis ni gzung bar bya/ /oM sarba
412b5(rgyud): ta thA ga ta bu Sh+pa pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta br-ik+Sha pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye
412b6(rgyud): hUM| gang du rgyal chen me tog dang / /bdug pa dang ni dri yi tshogs/ /de bzhin kun tu yang dag sbyar/ /tha na rgyan spel rnams kyang ngo / /mchod pa'i phyag rgya tshul chen
412b7(rgyud): dang | |phyag rgya chen po bslab par bya/ /theg pa chen po bsdus pa las/ /ji skad rgya chen gsungs de bzhin/ /sems can thams cad bskyab pa dang / /bde ba chen po'i rgyu
413a1(rgyud): @#/ /dang ni/ /'gro ba gsum las dgrol pa'i phyir/ /de lta bu yi bsam pa bya/ /'dir ni lha rnams thams cad kyi/ /bag med nye bar zhi ba dang / /mi
413a2(rgyud): rnams sdug bsngal sna tshogs pa/ /rab tu mthar phyin de bzhin nyid/ /theg pa dman par 'dod byed pa/ /'khor ba rnam par gzhol ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor bdag
413a3(rgyud): nyid ches/ /'di de bsam par bya ba yin/ /bdag gi bsod nams stobs dag gis/ /bde ba thams cad tshogs kyi mchog /sems can thams cad bde chen ldan/ /ma lus
413a4(rgyud): par ni grub gyur cig / sems can thams cad bde gyur cig /'byung po kun la byams par shog /dud 'gro thams cad 'jigs med shog /ngan song thams cad zhi gyur
413a5(rgyud): cig |bde ba chen po 'di bsams nas/ /sdig pa dral ba bcing bar bya/ /sdig pa thams cad dral byas shing / /de bzhin ngan song thams cad do/ /phyogs rnams thams
413a6(rgyud): cad sangs rgyas kun/ /yang dang yang du rjes dran nas/ /gsang ba'i mdo sde ma lus pa/ /yang dang yang du bklag par bya/ /mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' ru/ /gcig tu
413a7(rgyud): 'gyur 'dod sems kyis bya/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor bla na med/ /rnal 'byor chen po bsgrub par bya/ /zla ba'am yang na zla ba drug /lo gcig gam ni de las gzhan/ /rig pa'i
413b1(rgyud): brtul zhugs 'di 'drar bya/ /phyag rgya thams cad yang dag bcing / /sangs rgyas rnams la nyin re bzhin/ /nges par lha bshos dbul par bya/ /lha bshos snang ba ster
413b2(rgyud): byed pa/ /de bzhin rig pa'i lha bshos la/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin khro bo che/ /thams cad du ni rjes dran bya/ /'ching ba'i sbyor ba'i cho ga ni/ /rdo rje khu tshur gyis brtan bya/ /rdo
413b3(rgyud): rje go cha'i sbyor ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu bsrung bar bya/ /de lta bu yi cho ga yis/ /rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya/ /bsrung ba byas shing brtson 'grus brtsam/ /stobs
413b4(rgyud): chen spro ba bskyed pa yis/ /nyin re zhing ni brtags nas su/ /rtog pa'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ /sku mdog dkyil 'khor ji bzhin par/ /ji ltar 'os shing
413b5(rgyud): 'tsham pa ru/ /dgug pa la sogs las rnams ni/ /thams cad mnyam par gzhag par bya/ /ci nus par ni nyin re zhing / /rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /mtshams
413b6(rgyud): med lnga po byed pa yang / /lo gcig na ni ra ba 'grub 'gyur/ /theg pa chen po'i tshogs nang na/ /mchog 'gyur rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur/ /rgyud gzhan gyi ni cho ga dang //
413b7(rgyud): mdo sde dang bcas ci bzhin du/ /de nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs blang / /sdom pa'ang dor bar mi bya zhing / /kha na ma tho rdul tsam yang / /'gyod pa ru ni bya ba yin/ /gnas ni yang dag
414a1(rgyud): @#/ /brtag par bya/ /tsher ma la sogs dang bral ba/ /ri bo 'am ni dgon pa 'am/ /lha khang skyed mos tshal dang ni/ /chu yi 'gram dang 'brog dgen par/ /gang du
414a2(rgyud): phyogs ni phyogs gtsang mar/ /gseg ma gyo mo bong ba dang / /rdo ba dag ni bsal bar bya/ /shin tu legs par dag bya ste/ /gang phyir lha rnams yongs su 'dzin/ /gal te de
414a3(rgyud): ni sbyor lhong gyur/ /rnam pa kun tu 'jigs mi bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rgyal po che/ /chos kyi bdag po dgongs pa can/ /thugs rje snying por ldan gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas
414a4(rgyud): nyes par 'dzin mi 'gyur/ /gnas ni kun tu dag bya zhing / /dkyil 'khor yang ni ci nus par/ /rgya ru dpag tshad tsam bya ste/ /khru drug las ni dma' ba min/ /
414a5(rgyud): sngon la phur bu gdab bya ste/ /rdo rje lta la sogs pas bcing / /de nas yo byad thams cad ni/ /cho ga mchog gis blang bar bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid 'dir/ /
414a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dag ni bsgrub par bya/ /thal ba la sogs dus ji bzhin/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor brtag par bya/ /ji ltar nus shing spro ba dang / /ji ltar rdzas ni
414a7(rgyud): 'byor pa dang / /de bzhin rnal 'byor chen pos bya/ /yang na sems kyis brtag par bya/ /ci ste bsgrub pa rgyal por 'gyur/ /cho ga gzhan gyi blo ldan pas/ /gal
414b1(rgyud): te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /dkyil 'khor ngag ni dag par bya/ /mtshon rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /khru ni stong dang ldan pa mchog /yang na rgyang grags tshad tsam du/ /sa
414b2(rgyud): yi cha ni thig gdab bya/ /gal te 'byor pa ldan pa min/ /khru bzhi mdo ru bsdus par bya/ /yang na phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /khru brgyad dang ni yang dag ldan/ /in+d+ra
414b3(rgyud): nI la shin tu sngo/ /tshon rtsi sngon po rab tu bya/ /pad+ma rA ga shin tu dmar/ /tshon rtsi dmar po zhes byar bshad/ /rdo rje chu dang chu chen po/ /ser po yang ni yang dag ldan/ /
414b4(rgyud): dag cing dang ba'i gser dang ni/ /kha dog ser po ldan par bya/ /shin tu dag pa shel dang bas/ /tshon rtsi dkar po rab tu bya/ /gang phyir rgyal po nor chen ldan/ /tshon
414b5(rgyud): rtsi 'di dag yang dag bshad/ /phyug cing nor dang yang dag ldan/ /gal te de ni khyim bdag gyur/ /khru rgya yongs su tshang bar bya/ /bcu drug las ni nyung mi bya/ /
414b6(rgyud): tshon rtsi dri dang yang dag ldan/ /gur gum la sogs dang bsres pa/ /tshon rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /mkhas pa yis ni dkyil 'khor bya/ /phyug cing nor dang yang dag
414b7(rgyud): ldan| |tshong dpon yang ni ded dpon nam/ /khyim pa 'byor pa dang ldan pa/ /gzhan dag dga' zhing 'ongs gyur na/ /rin chen phye ma dang bsres pa'i/ /tshon rtsi chen po rab tu bya/ /
415a1(rgyud): @#/ /rams dang ba bla la sogs pa/ /tshon rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /bdag nyid chung ba'am che ba'ang rung / /de yi 'byor pa brtag bya ba/ /ji ltar
415a2(rgyud): rig par nges par sbyar/ /rgyal po la ni tshad bshad pa/ /khyim bdag la yang de bzhin no/ /tshong dpon dang ni deng dpon gyi/ /khru ni lnga bcu nyid kyang ngo / /gzhan dag
415a3(rgyud): dga' zhing 'ongs gyur na/ /khru ni nyi shur byas pa yin/ /gal te dngos grub bsgrub 'dod na/ /khru drug las ni chung mi bya/ /ming po de bzhin nyung ba yang / /dri dang kun tu
415a4(rgyud): yang dag ldan/ /rtag tu sna tshogs dri yis ni/ /sngon du sa gzhi dag par bya/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor ngos dag gi /grwa ni bzhi po thams cad du/ /shes rab can gyis
415a5(rgyud): bdug spos bsreg / gang phyir rdo rje can dag gshegs/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gnas de ni/ /sngags kyis bsangs ba'i dri chu yis/ /rtag tu legs par chag chag
415a6(rgyud): gdab/ /gang phyir rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'gyur/ /nyin zhag drug gam bdun brgyad dang / /mar dang 'o mi 'bras chan nyid/ /slob dpon zas ni dkar gsum bza'/ /
415a7(rgyud): yang na thun mong gyur pa'i zas/ /ci ste bzod ldan nyin mtshan du/ /mi bza' bar ni bsgrub par bya/ /gang phyir chos kyi rang bzhin zas/ /stobs ldan 'gyur bar the tshom
415b1(rgyud): med| |dkyil 'khor mchog ni rgyal chen po/ /gang yin bsam pas bya ba'o/ /bco lnga la ni brtsams nas su/ /gnyis pa'i nya la rdzogs par bya/ /yang na mar gyi ngo la ni/ /bcu
415b2(rgyud): bzhi la ni yang dag brtsam/ /bco lnga la ni thug par bya/ /legs pa ru ni rdzogs par bya/ /yang na tshes brgyad nas brtsams te/ /tha ma nya la kun tu bri/ /yang na bcu bzhi la brtsams
415b3(rgyud): te| |nyin zhag gnyis par yang dag bri/ /yang na bco lnga de yi ni/ /snga dro de yi yang dag brtsam/ /tshul chen po dang mtshungs pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis bri/ /gang
415b4(rgyud): gi tshes nas brtsams nas su/ /ji srid rdzogs par ma gyur bar/ /gal te kun nas mi bza' bar/ /brtson 'grus chen po brtsam par bya/ /dri dang bcas shing legs byas pa/ /
415b5(rgyud): yang na dkar gsum bza' bar bya/ /gang phyir rgyal ba'i rdo rje 'dzin/ /byin gyis brlab par mdzad par 'gyur/ /bsod nams che zhing bkra shis pa'i/ /nyin zhag dag pa gang
415b6(rgyud): yin pa/ /de la rdo rje slob dpon ni/ /skal ba chen pos dkyil 'khor brtsam/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas/ /dbus kyi cha ru 'dug par bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
415b7(rgyud): la dmigs nas/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom/ /sems ni yongs su 'dzin byed pa/ /lus ni drang por byas nas su/ /bshags la sogs pa'i las rnams ni/ /thams/
416a1(rgyud): @#/ /cad sngon du bya ba yin/ /byang chub sems la brtson gyur cing / /rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad pa yis/ /phyogs bcu ru ni phyag byas nas/ /bdag nyid
416a2(rgyud): kyang ni spro ba bskyed/ /deng bdag skye ba 'bras bur bcas/ /bdag gi 'tsho ba'ang 'bras bu yod/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang dam tshig gis/ /deng ni srid par mnyam par 'gyur//
416a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rtse gcig pa'i/ /sems kyis phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 'byung ba'i/ /bdag 'gyur bar ni the tshom med/ /deng
416a4(rgyud): bdag nyi ma dam pa ste/ /deng ni bdag mchod bla na med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas/ /deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no/ /de ltar dga' ba dang ldan
416a5(rgyud): pas| / de nas dbus su 'dug gyur nas/ /spos kyi reng bu lag thogs pas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya/ /sems ni dga' zhing mgu ba yis/ /tshig ni 'di
416a6(rgyud): skad brjod par bya/ /yan lag kun gyis rab btud de/ /sangs rgyas kun la gsol ba gdab/ /ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs
416a7(rgyud): su gsol/ /rdo rje bdag ming 'di zhes bya/ /bdag ni dkyil 'khor 'bri bar 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas la sogs kun gshegs te/ /dngos grub 'di ni bdag la
416b1(rgyud): gsol| |tshig ni de skad brjod nas su/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung bca' bar bya/ /chos chen po la snyoms zhugs nas/ /bdag nyid ting 'dzin dang ldan bya/ /gal te nus na skal
416b2(rgyud): ba ches| |yang na sems kyi bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog /ting 'dzin zhes bya ci 'dra dang / /rdo rje'i gzugs dang ldan pa la/ /rnal 'byor pa yis snyoms
416b3(rgyud): 'jug bya/ /yang na rnal 'byor gang rung la/ /nus na snyoms par 'jug par bya/ /sems ni mnyam par gzhag 'gyur ba/ /go rims bzhin du bshad par bya/ /bcom ldan
416b4(rgyud): sngon ni ci 'dra ba'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyid 'gyur ba'i/ /de 'dra bar ni bdag rang nyid/ /rnal 'byor don sems bsam pa bya/ /dka' thub sdom pa sna tshogs pa/ /bdag
416b5(rgyud): gis bya bar bsam par bya/ /sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po ni/ /stong gsum pa ni bsam par bya/ /sangs rgyas bskul ba bla na med/ /shes rab can gyis bskul ba bsam/ /sangs
416b6(rgyud): rgyas kun la phyag byas shing / /ci 'dod pa ni bka' nod bya/ /nges par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rang sems so sor brtag par bya/ /byang sems yang dag bskyed nas ni/ /
416b7(rgyud): dbus su zla ba brtag par bya/ /de nas rang gi ye shes brtag/ zla ba'i dbus su rdo rje bzhin/ /rang lus rdo rje'i gzugs su ste/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rang bzhin nyid/ /de
417a1(rgyud): @#/ /nas sangs rgyas mngon rtogs nas/ /rang bdag nyid ni dbang bskur bya/ /rang bdag sangs rgyas thams cad du/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor blta bar bya/ /
417a2(rgyud): ri rab ri yi rtse mo ru/ /stug po'i gnas las babs nas su/ /rdo rje'i gdan la 'jug nas su/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul bya/ /sems dpa' bzhi ni phyung nas su/ /
417a3(rgyud): phyogs rnams kun tu yongs su spro/ /chos kyi dbyings ni brtan byas nas/ /phyogs bzhi ru ni dgod par bya/ /mtshams su rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /bdag nyid
417a4(rgyud): yang dag byin gyis brlabs/ /phyogs bzhi ru ni sangs rgyas kyi/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po byung / /'khor gyi 'khor lo dang bcas nyid/ /dkyil 'khor thams
417a5(rgyud): cad blta bar bya/ /sems dpa' gsang ba'i lha mor bcas/ /sgo srung rnams ni bsam par bya/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dag pa ni/ /snying po chen po brtag par
417a6(rgyud): bya| |rang gi 'khor lo yang dag bzhugs/ /'khor lo lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /thabs chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /mtshan ni rjes su dran pa bsgom/ /ting nge
417a7(rgyud): 'dzin las langs nas kyang / /rdo rje'i lta bas blta bar bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis /slar yang snyoms par 'jug par bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad thugs
417b1(rgyud): dbus su/ /byang chub sems ni bsgom par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par ni/ /mgon po'i snying ga nas gzung bya/ /sems dpa' kun gyi spyan snga ru/ /bka' ni rim bzhin
417b2(rgyud): nod par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur gyis/ /rang bdag nyid ni dbang bskur bya/ /gsol ba btab pas gsan par bya/ /bdag ni rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor mchog /
417b3(rgyud): chos kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /ting 'dzin shin tu bla na med/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas kun/ /byin gyis rlab pa mdzad par 'gyur/ /ting nge 'dzin las langs nas kyang / /
417b4(rgyud): bka' ni nye bar nod bya ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid/ /nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/ /skyil krung bshig ste langs nas ni/ /rang gis 'dran pa'i zhabs phyag bya/ /
417b5(rgyud): sangs rgya mtsho gang ba ru/ /phyogs rnams bzhi ni blta bar bya/ /theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs/ /rdo rje'i tshig ni brjod par bya/ /bdag nyid rang nyid rdo rje can/ /rdo rje
417b6(rgyud): sems dpa' bdag rang nyid/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che/ /bdag ni stobs chen rdo rje can/ /bdag ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal/ /bdag ni phyag na rdo rje mchog /
417b7(rgyud): oM badzra satwa hUM/ rdo rje yi ni gsang sngags 'di/ /lan cig nyid ni brjod par bya/ /bdag ni gtso bo rdo rje che/ /byin gyis brlab pa mi 'dor ro/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtshos kun tu gang /
418a1(rgyud): @#/ /'khor los lnga par yang dag gnas/ /bsnyems bcas rdo rje gsor nas ni/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul ldan par bya/ /slar yang bdag nyid go bgo zhing / /
418a2(rgyud): bdag nyid dbang ni bskur bar bya/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bcad par bya/ /lag nyed pa yi phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams
418a3(rgyud): cad rab tu mnye/ /rdo rje gtun shing nyid kyis ni/ /bgegs rnams thams cad brdung bar bya/ /rdo rje ral gri rab rno bas/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gtub par bya/ /rdo
418a4(rgyud): rje che ba drag po yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad dbug par bya/ /rdo rje bzang po'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gzhom par bya/ /rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya
418a5(rgyud): yis| |bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya/ /rdo rje mche bar rab grags pas/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar bya/ /rdo rje lcags sgrogs phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs
418a6(rgyud): rnams thams cad bcing bar bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad dgug par bya/ /rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams
418a7(rgyud): cad drang bar bya/ /rdo rje mdung thung phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad dbug par bya/ /rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bsgyel bar/
418b1(rgyud): bya| |rgyas pa yis ni ci nus par/ /lus rnams thams cad dgug par bya/ /bgegs ni 'ga' yang yod min zhes/ /sems ni dag par gyur pa yin/ /rang sems bdud
418b2(rgyud): ces bya bar bshad/ /bgegs nyid kyang ni rang gi sems/ /rnam par rtog pa thams cad bsal/ /rnam rtog las ni bgegs rnams 'byung / /gdul bar dka' ba'i sems gzung zhing //
418b3(rgyud): 'dod pa lnga ni spang bar bya/ /sngon du rjes dran nas brtsams te/ /yang na rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur/ /bcom zhing nges par bcad nas ni/ /yi ge hUM gis bskrad par bya/ /rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya
418b4(rgyud): yis| |rdo rje rab bcing bar bya/ /hUM mdzad rdo rje bsdam bya zhing / /de ni rdo rje rabs bskor/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya ches/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag byin brlabs nas/ /ci nus par ni rgyas
418b5(rgyud): pa ru| |rab mchog gis ni bcing bar bya/ /rtog pa kun la nges sbyar nas/ /sems ni dag par 'gyur ba yin/ /dkyil 'khor dag gi mtshan nyid ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni gzung bar bya/ /
418b6(rgyud): grogs bdag dang ni thams cad la/ /g.yel ba med par bsrung bar bya/ /gsor zhing legs par bkal ba dang / /tshad dang ldan zhing mdzes pa dang / /dri zhim reg bya 'jam pa dang / /
418b7(rgyud): legs par byas shing sru ba dang / /dri bsung dang ni yang dag ldan/ /sna tshogs tshon gyis kun tu khyab/ /dri bcas tshon du spang bya zhing / /chos kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /de nas
419a1(rgyud): @#/ /de ni yang dag bshad/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni chen po ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi gsang ba che/ /sangs rgyas
419a2(rgyud): brtan pa'i rdo rje can/ /sems can 'di rnams gdul bya min/ /bsod nams ye shes rgya mtsho che/ /tshogs ni kun tu ma bsags pas/ /bsod nams tshogs dang mi
419a3(rgyud): ldan zhing / /sangs rgyas 'byung la chags dang bral/ /sems can de rnams mos bya'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bstan pa yin/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang ldan pa/ /de
419a4(rgyud): nas dkyil 'khor 'dzin du 'jug/ yang na bsod nams dag gi tshogs/ /de ni rang nyid kyis mthong 'gyur/ /gang phyir tshogs bcas longs spyod dang / /chos kyi sku ni
419a5(rgyud): bla na med/ /rdo rje'i dam chos las byung ba'i/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'dzin du gzhug/ gal te de ni tshogs bsags gyur/ /sngon du sangs rgyas rjes su mthong / /dkyil
419a6(rgyud): 'khor sbyor ba la gnas te/ /sangs rgyas thams cad des mthong 'gyur/ /tshogs ni bsags pa med pa dang / /sangs rgyas mthong ba med pa ru/ /des ni thos pa rnyed mi
419a7(rgyud): 'gyur| |dang por 'dir 'jug smos ci dgos/ /gang phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /'di ni gsang ba mtshungs med pa/ /'di ni theg chen snying po ste/ /chos kyi 'khor
419b1(rgyud): lo bla na med/ /bskal pa grangs med pa ru byung / /sa yi pha rol phyin pa mchog/ gang phyir gsang ba mtho ba thob/ /rab tu dga' ba sgrub par 'gyur/ /gal te rnal 'byor pa de brtson
419b2(rgyud): tshe 'di nyid la mya ngan 'das/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob cing / /rdo rje nyid ni the tshom med/ /yang na mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ /skye ba bcu drug mya ngan 'da'/ /rab tu dga' ba thob pa dang /
419b3(rgyud): yang na rdo rje nyid kyang ngo / /so la nyi zla ltung byed cing / /de ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin 'gyur/ /so so'i skye bos sangs rgyas nyid/ /'grub par 'gyur te gzhan du min/ /rnal 'byor
419b4(rgyud): mchog ni bla med pa/ /de phyir rnal 'byor chen po sbyor/ /gal te sangs rgyas nyid 'dod na/ /brtson 'grus chen pos bsdang mi bya/ /tshad ni ji skad bshad pa ru/ /de bzhin gzhung
419b5(rgyud): gi rjes 'brangs nas/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya/ /thig bzhi dang
419b6(rgyud): ni yang dag ldan/ /cha mnyam pas ni mdzes par gyur/ /dar gyis chun pos brgyan gyur cing / /rin chen dra bas rnam par brgyan/ /g.yer ka'i dra bas yang dag ldan/ /kha
419b7(rgyud): dog lnga pos rab tu mdzes/ /dril bu'i dra bas shin tu sbras/ /rnga yab sna tshogs kyis mdzes ba/ /phreng ba rnga yab zla re dang / /nyi zla dag gis nye bar mdzes/ /kun nas phyi rol
420a1(rgyud): @#/ /gnas dag tu/ /rdo rje kha khyer yang dag rten/ /kun tu kha khyer dang ldan pa'i/ /sgo ni kha khyer med pa'o/ /rtse mo rdo rje sngo rang bzhin/ /gzhan ni gser gyi
420a2(rgyud): mdog can dang / /dmar bo pad+ma lta bu dang / /gzhan yang shel ltar dkar ba dang / /rin chen rang bzhin mchog kun gyis/ /dkyil 'khor mdzes bar bri bar bya/ /sna
420a3(rgyud): tshogs gzugs ni mdzes pa mchog / rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod/ /rim gnyis sgo dang yang dag ldan/ /rta babs sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ /dkar zhing gsal dang
420a4(rgyud): rdo rje dang / /nyi zla dag gis rnam par spras/ /'dab ma bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /sgo bzhi dag ni mchog tu mdzes/ /mtho zhing yangs la mdzes pa ste/ /rdo rje rdo rjer yang
420a5(rgyud): dag ldan/ /rdo rje sgo srung skal chen po/ /bdag nyid rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin/ /gtum po srung byed rnal 'byor pa/ /shar gyi sgo ru yang dag gnas/ /lho ru rdo rje zhags pa
420a6(rgyud): ste| |nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog go / rdo rje dril bu skal chen po/ /byang gi sgo ru yang dag gnas/ /'jug pa dang ni 'byung ba'ang rung / /rdo rje shugs ni brjod par bya/ /ri
420a7(rgyud): mo dman ma brdzis byas na/ /dam tshig de nyid mthong mi 'gyur/ /oM badzra be gA kra ma hUM/ /gang gi dus su thig 'debs pa/ /rdo rje'i thig ni brjod par bya/ /sa yi
420b1(rgyud): cha ni ma lus pa/ /thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'gyur/ /oM badzra sa ma ya sU tra mA ti kra ma hUM/ /sngon du tshon rtsi'i phye ma la/ /'bar ba'i blta bas yang dag blta/ /badzra rA ga zhes
420b2(rgyud): brjod na/ /thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'gyur/ /oM badzra rA ga hUM/ /mtshams kyi cha ni thams cad dang / /sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/ /phyi
420b3(rgyud): rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /logs dang cha ni mnyam pa dang / /kun nas cha ni rnam par phyed/ /dkyil 'khor cha ni rnam par gsal/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /de yi nang
420b4(rgyud): gi rim pa ru/ /zhugs nas 'khor lo de mtshungs pa/ /kun tu cha ni mnyam par bri/ /ka ba brgyad gyis nye bar mdzes/ /rdo rje'i ka ba'i mdun gnas su/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni lnga yis
420b5(rgyud): brgyan/ /gnas lnga dag ni thams cad du/ /'khor lo lnga ni dgod par bya/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /kun tu bri zhing dgod par bya/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul
420b6(rgyud): gyis bltas nas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gzung bar bya/ /oM badzra satwa hUM/ de la dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas rgyal po dgod par bya/ /gang gi thugs las nges
420b7(rgyud): byung ba/ /gsang ba'i tshogs ni stug cing brtan/ /rnam par snang mdzad rnal 'byor che/ /phyogs rnams kun tu rnam par gsal/ /gang gi mtshan smos tsam gyis ni/ /sdig
421a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa kun las rnam grol 'gyur/ /'khor los bsgyur ba tshogs chen po/ /sems dpa' bzhi bo rgyal po che/ /phyogs rnams dag ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje shugs
421a2(rgyud): 'chang dag gis dgod/ /shar du rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /lho ru rdo rje rin chen no/ /nub tu rdo rje chos zhes pa/ /rdo rje'i las ni byang du 'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' lnga po ni/ /thams cad
421a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas cod pan ldan/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa/ /na bza' dkar po dag mnabs pa/ /de la 'di rnams kyi snying po ni/ /oM sarba yo gI shwa ra ya hrI hUM/ oM badzra satwa hUM/
421a4(rgyud): oM badzra rat+na hUM/ oM badzra d+harma hUM/ oM badzra karma hUM/ rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje che/ /rtse mo lnga pa dgod par bya/ /rdo rje rin chen rin po che/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i pad+ma ste/ rdo rje las kyi rdo rje ni/ /rdo
421a5(rgyud): rje rnon po mtshon cha che/ /rnam snang rang gi phyag rgya ni/ /ye shes khu tshur yongs su 'dzin/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ /'od kyi dbus su yang dag gnas/ /bdag nyid chen po
421a6(rgyud): bzhi po kun/ /bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung / /gang na 'khor lo med pa yi/ /dbus kyi 'khor lo'i grwa bzhi ru/ /btsun mo lha mo chen mo bzhi/ /dgod pa'i chos nyid bsam par
421a7(rgyud): bya| |rdo rje sems ma rdo rje chos/ /de bzhin rdo rje rin chen ma/ /rdo rje las ma btsun mo che/ /dkyil 'khor grwa bzhir bri bar bya/ /rdo rje sems ma byang sems ma/ /pha rol phyin pa chen po
421b1(rgyud): mchog/ lha mo chen mo rdo rje chos/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog/ dpal chen rdo rje rin chen ma/ /bsod nams kyi ni tshogs gter byed/ /mkha' mdzad ces bya rdo rje las/ /las kyi pha rol
421b2(rgyud): phyin pa mchog/ de nas 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i ming ni/ /dpal chen rdo rje dkar mo dang / /rdo rje sgrol ma mkha' rdo rje/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad las/ /de dag gsang mchog bla na
421b3(rgyud): med| |thams cad zla ba gang 'od ldan/ /rked par bsnyems bcas rol par ldan/ /ji ltar rgyal ba'i rnam bzhi bzhin/ /rang gi phyag mtshan gyis brel phyag/ seng ge'i snyoms tshul rol
421b4(rgyud): ldan pa/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas su/ /shar gyi mi bskyod dkyil 'khor la/ /zla ba'i dbus su mi bskyod pa/ /ston pa'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin/ /mkhas pas yang dag bri zhing dgod//
421b5(rgyud): de yi phyogs rnams yongs su 'dzin/ /mkhas pas yang dag bri zhing dgod/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /dam tshig dag ni bzhi po bri/ /mdun du phyag na rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje lcags kyu
421b6(rgyud): g.yas su 'o/ /rdo rje chags pa de bzhin g.yon/ /rgyab tu legs pa yang dag bri/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras shing / /rdo rje phyed pa'i dbang bskur ldan/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song
421b7(rgyud): nas ni/ /lho yi rin chen dkyil 'khor du/ /zla ba'i dbus su rin chen 'byung / /mchog 'dzin pa yi phyag rgya 'dzin/ /mkhas pas yang dag bri zhing dgod/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams
422a1(rgyud): @#/ /cad du/ /rin chen sems dpa' bzhi po ni/ /mdun du rdo rje rin chen te/ /g.yas su rdo rje gzi brjid do/ /g.yon du rdo rje rgyal mtshan te/ /rgyab tu bzhad pa
422a2(rgyud): yang dag bri/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras shing / /rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur ldan/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /nub tu pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su
422a3(rgyud): 'dzin/ /dbus su 'dug pa 'od dpag med/ /sems dpa' chen po ye shes che/ /phyogs bzhi ru ni dgod par bya/ /rdo rje chos ni mdun du ste/ /g.yas su rdo rje rnon po'o/ /g.yon du rdo rje
422a4(rgyud): 'khor lo ste/ /rdo rje smra ba rgyab tu 'o/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /byang gi las kyi dkyil 'khor la/ /mchog sbyin phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin/ /thub pa don yod grub pa dgod/ /de
422a5(rgyud): yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /las chen po dag yang dag bri/ /kun nas phyogs ni bzhi dag tu/ /phyag na rang gi phyag mtshan mtshon/ /mdun du rdo rje las yin te/ /g.yas
422a6(rgyud): su rdo rje srung ba 'o/ /g.yon du rdo rje gnod sbyin te/ /rdo rje khu tshur rgyab tu 'o/ /de nas phyag mtshan bcu drug dang / /dbus ma nyi shur rab bshad bya/ /bcu drug dbus ma nyi shu
422a7(rgyud): ni| |go rim bzhin du rab bshad bya/ /ji ltar rigs shing 'tsham pa la/ /rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa/ /rdo rje rin chen rin po che/ /rdo rje pad+ma chen po dang / /rdo rje rnon po dbus
422b1(rgyud): ma yin/ /phyag na rdo rje'i rdo rje che/ /de bzhin rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin/ /rdo rje chags pa gzhu nyid do/ /rdo rje legs pa'i rdo rje gnyis/ /rdo rje rin chen rin po che/ /rdo rje gzi brjid nyi ma ste/ /
422b2(rgyud): rdo rje rgyal mtshan rgyal mtshan bsgreng / /rdo rje bzhad pa chems chen po/ /rdo rje chos kyi pad+ma ches/ /rdo rje rnon po ral gri bcang / /rdo rje rgyu yi 'khor lo che/ /rdo rje'i smra ba'i yi ge ste/ /rdo rje
422b3(rgyud): rnon po las chen po/ /rdo rje srung ba'i cho ga ste/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin mche ba che/ /rdo rje khu tshur bsdams pa ste/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang / /dril bu dag ni sgo ba bzhi/ /
422b4(rgyud): rdo rje sems ma'i rdo rje che/ /de bzhin rdo rje rin chen nor/ /pad+ma rdo rje chos ma ste/ /rdo rje rnon po las ma yin/ /grwa bzhi ngag tu gsang ba yi/ /phyag mtshan de rnams dgod par bya//
422b5(rgyud): 'khor lo chen po'i phyi rol gyi/ /grwa bzhi dag ni thams cad du/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam pa bzhi/ /rdo rje lha mo yang dag bri/ /rdo rje sgeg mo rdor phreng ma/ /de bzhin rdo rje glu ma nyid/ /bsnyems
422b6(rgyud): bcas phreng ba pi wang dang / /glu gar gsang ba'i lha mo rnams/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor mtshams rnams su/ /mchod pa'i lha mo yang dag bri/ /me tog spos dang de bzhin dri/ /mar
422b7(rgyud): me nub byang mtshams su 'o/ /mar me la sogs par nyid kyi/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor thams cad du/ /bskal ba bzang po'i sems dpa' che/ /stong ni nges par dgod par bya/ /
423a1(rgyud): @#/ /mtshan ma ji bzhin ci rigs pas/ /byams pa la sogs ma lus pa/ /ji ltar mngon bar 'dod pa yi/ /sems dpa' chen po dgod par bya/ /cho ga'i sbyor
423a2(rgyud): ba 'di yis ni/ /kun tu bri zhing dgod par bya/ /rang gi snying pos kun dbab phyir/ /rang rang gi ni snying po yin/ /de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM badzra pA Ni hUM/ badzra aM ku sha
423a3(rgyud): dzaH/ badzra rA ga ho/ /badzra sA d+hu sa/ dam tshig mchog gi snying po'o/ /oM badzra ma Ni oM/ badzra te dza a/ badzra ke tu trAM/ badzra hA sa ha/ badzra pad+ma hrIH/ badzra tik+Sh+Na d+haM/ badzra he tu maM/
423a4(rgyud): badzra b+hA ga raM/ dbang gi sems dpa' dang / ye shes kyi sems dpa' chen po'i snying po'o/ /badzra karma kaM/ badzra rak+Sha haM/ badzra yak+Sha hUM/ badzra muSh+Ti baM/ las kyi sems dpa' chen
423a5(rgyud): po'i snying po'o/ /de rnams ni rab tu gnas pa'i snying po yin no/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi snying po ni/ badzra hUM/ rat+na trAM/ d+harma hrIHkarma A/ /lha mo rnams kyi sngar bshad zin to//
423a6(rgyud): sgo srung rnams kyi yang de bzhin no/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad dgod par bya/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyi las bshad par bya ste/ /kun nas
423a7(rgyud): rdo rje rnal 'byor gyis/ /chos kyi blo can gyis bri bya/ /dpal mchog dang po las gsungs pa'i/ /sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /theg ba chen po mngon par rtogs//
423b1(rgyud): lan bdun du ni brjod par bya/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la/ /lan bdun du ni bskor bar bya/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ni/ /mkhas pa thams cad blta bar bya//
423b2(rgyud): gal te chad dam lhag kyang rung / /rdo rje shugs kyis dag par bya/ /'khor lo chen po dag par byas/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor yang dag gzung / /rgyal ba rnams la bdag nyid ni/ /dbul
423b3(rgyud): ba'i las ni kun tu bya/ /de nas yo byad thams cad kyis/ /dkyil 'khor la ni mchod par bya/ /ci 'byor pas ni bya ba ste/ /dman par gyur kyang nyes pa med/ /'byor ba ci snyed yod pa
423b4(rgyud): kun| |go rim bzhin du rab tu dbul/ /bum pa gang ba 'bum phrag gam/ /stong ngam yang na brgya yang rung / /mar me 'bum phrag stong ngam ni/ /yang na stong ngam brgya yang rung / /
423b5(rgyud): dri dang spos kyi snod 'bum mam/ /yang na stong ngam brgya yang rung / /ga bur a ga ru nyid dang / /du ru ka dang tsan+dan sogs/ /mang sbyar dri zhim dang ldan pa/ /spos rnams 'di dag
423b6(rgyud): bsreg par bya/ /gser ram dngul gyi snod dag dang / /sa las byas kyang nyes pa med/ /yo byad ji snyed yod pa kun/ /dkyil 'khor du ni gzhag par bya/ /de la kong bu stong phrag
423b7(rgyud): ga ma| |mar me sdong bu shin tu 'bar/ /tha na mar me snod gcig ste/ /ma tshang gyur kyang nyes ba med/ /dar ni phyar bar bye ba bre/ /rnga yab phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /dra ba dra ba
424a1(rgyud): @#/ /phyed pas spras/ /zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes/ /sna tshogs bzhon pa brgya 'am ni/ /stong phrag gcig kyang nyes pa med/ /thams cad ma tshang gcig nyid
424a2(rgyud): kyang / /bde bas rol mo mchog rnams bya/ /phan pa'i zas ni stong phrag dang / /bye ba phrag ni rgya mtsho tshogs/ /bca' ba sna tshogs pa yang ste/ /gal te ma tshang nyes pa med/ /dri
424a3(rgyud): dang gos bzang thams cad dang / /dri zhim pa yi byug pa dang / /bya ba mchog ni nye bar mdzes/ /bla re rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /sna tshogs dri yi chus bkang ba/ /bum pa shin tu
424a4(rgyud): yid 'ong dang / /me tog shing ni brgya nyid dang / /bzhi yang nyes par mi 'gyur ro/ /dri dang me tog thams cad dang / /bdug pa yid du 'ong ba kun/ /gal te sbyor ba ldan gyur
424a5(rgyud): na| |mchod pa rnam pa thams cad bya/ /mchod pa dang ni gtor ma nyid/ /ji bzhin sgrub pa pos de phul/ /de bzhin dngos grub rdzu 'phrul ni/ /mthong ba'i chos la thob par
424a6(rgyud): 'gyur| |sngar ni ji skad bsgrags pa bzhin/ /thams cad cho ga bzhin du dgod/ /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing / /mchod pa nyid kyang rab tu bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor
424a7(rgyud): 'khor lo yi/ /dbus kyi 'khor lo phyag byas nas/ /pus mo btsugs te 'dug nas ni/ /yang dag par ni dgug par bya/ /sems dpa' rdo rje lcags kyu bcing / /rdo rje lcags
424b1(rgyud): kyu brjod par bya/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams kun tu gshegs/ /de nas sgo srung bcings nas ni/ /yi ge dzaHni yongs su brjod/ /rdo rje can ni thams
424b2(rgyud): cad dgug / the tshom med par gshegs par gyur/ /rdo rje zhags pa bcings nas ni/ /cho ga ji bzhin nges par gzhug/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog bcings nas ni/ /dbang du yang ni rtag tu
424b3(rgyud): bya| |rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yis/ /de dag nyid kyang dbab par bya/ /rdo rje gnas pa'i phyag rgya yi/ /gnas rnams kun ni dgod par bya/ /ci nus par ni rab tu bsgrags/ /de nas
424b4(rgyud): mchod pa rab tu bya/ /spos dang me tog la sogs pa'i/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor kun la sbyar/ /bdag nyid dbul dang mchod pa dang / /bshags dang gsol ba btab la
424b5(rgyud): sogs/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed nas kyang / /sdom pa yang dag spyad par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ches/ /bdag nyid la ni dbang bskur bya/ /se gol dag ni brdab
424b6(rgyud): bya zhing / /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya/ /sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun/ /bkug cing rab tu bcug nas ni/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog yang dag dbab/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i
424b7(rgyud): phyag rgya ches/ /dral nas de ni yang dag dbab/ /rdo rje ye shes bla na med/ /ye shes dag pa skye bar 'gyur/ /sems dpa'i ye shes 'bab par 'gyur/ /rdo rje dbab pa yang dag
425a1(rgyud): @#/ /brjod| |ji ste babs par ma gyur na/ /yi ge a yis dril bu dkrol/ /mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang / /rdo rje slob dpon 'di lta bu/ /ye shes
425a2(rgyud): dam pa skye 'gyur zhing / /rmad du byung ba'ang 'dis mthong 'gyur/ /brgya las rtsa bdun lhag po nyid/ /mtshan ma'ang de las lhag 'byung 'gyur/ /gzhan dag gang yang rung ba
425a3(rgyud): nyid| |gal te bsod nams skal ba che/ /des ni sangs rgyas thams cad mthong / /yang na byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ /yang na rdo rje 'dzin gang nyid/ /yang na 'od zer 'phros
425a4(rgyud): pa mthong / /hUM sgrogs 'brug gi sgra dang ni/ /spos dang me tog dag gi bar/ /ba spu langs pa la sogs byung / /de nas rdo rje slob dpon ni/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol byung nas ni/ /
425a5(rgyud): sems ma'i phyag rgya ldan gyur pas/ /sor mo gnyis kyis phreng ba gzung / /gar gyi tshul gyis zhugs nas ni/ /rdo rje gar ni rab bskor bas/ /dbus kyi 'khor lo rab zhugs
425a6(rgyud): nas| |phreng ba nyid ni dor bar bya/ /phreng ba de ni gar babs pa/ /de dang de ni skad cig 'grub/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas/ /phyag rgya thams cad bcing byas na/ /
425a7(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad nges pa ru/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /gzhan yang de la rdo rje 'chang / /byin gyis rlob ba mdzad par 'gyur/ /langs nas der ni bcom
425b1(rgyud): ldan 'das/ /yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa'ang rung / /'dar ba dang ni g.yo ba'ang rung / /de bzhin yan lag 'khum pa dang / /yang na tshig ni byung ba dang / /ci ste hUM ni brjod pa'ang rung / /nges par
425b2(rgyud): legs so zhes bya ba/ /cho 'phrul bde ba chen po ni/ /rmad byung bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /rdo rje slob dpon skal ba ches/ /mthong 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad
425b3(rgyud): dam pa ni/ /de nas langs te brjod par bya/ /mgon po thub pa la btud nas/ /ci 'dod pa ni bka' nod bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /sems
425b4(rgyud): can kun la phan bya'i phyir/ /slob ma rab tu gzhug par bgyi/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu khams gsum gyi/ /sems can kun gyi bde gang yin/ /des ni rdo rje slob dpon de'i/ /

425b6(rgyud): cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po der ni ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad 'jug tu rung ngo / /snod dang / /snod ma yin pa yongs su

426a1(rgyud): @#/ /du 'gyur ro/ /dad pa med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags ba dang / /rgyud yongs su ma smin pa dang / mos pa med pa mang du zin kyang 'on kyang
426a2(rgyud): mthong ba tsam gyis so/ /gang gi phyir gsang ba chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gsang bas 'dul ba'i thabs dang / 'khor lo'i tshul

427a7(rgyud): ma'i phyag rgya steng du bcing / /'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig 'joms/ /rdo rje tshig ni brjod par bya/ /oM u da ka Tha/ rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni/ /phyag na rdo rjes srung bar
427b1(rgyud): byed| |dam tshig nyid ni nyams 'gyur na/ /'bras bu 'di ni thob mi 'gyur/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam
427b2(rgyud): tshig bsrungs pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /'thungs shig rdo rje bdud rtsi 'thung / /rdo rje sems dpa'i mna' yi ni/ /snying po 'dis ni mna' bsgag go/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag

431a1(rgyud): @#/ /par rab bsgoms na/ /mngon par shes pa lnga thob 'gyur/ /shud+d+ha shud+d+ha/ nyin mtshan brtson 'grus dang bcas pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' yi//

431a3(rgyud): su dran grub na/ /sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba yin/ /satwa satwa/ bud d+ha bud d+ha/ gang tshe gsang ba'i lha mor 'gyur/ /de yi rigs kyi lha ru 'gyur/ /ye shes dag pa brjod

431a6(rgyud): 'dzin sbyor ba la gnas te/ /mnyam par gzhag pas pheg rdob bya/ /rdo rje thal mo'i pheg brdabs pas/ /dngos grub thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /badzra pA sha /rin dbang
431a7(rgyud): thugs ka nas byung te/ /rnam par snang mdzad thugs ka nas/ /sangs rgyas kun ni bcug nas kyang / /bdag nyid rdo rje'i lha mo ru/ /rdo rje thal mo byas nas ni/ /rdo rje bsdams
431b1(rgyud): pa'i mthil brdab bya/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor bsgrub bya zhing / /rdo rje ye shes yang dag brdab/ /rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni/ /de bzhin du ni b+ha gar zhugs/ /rdo rje thal mo byas nas
431b2(rgyud): ni| |sor mo'i rtse mos mnyam du brdab/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /rtag tu nyon mongs dang 'brel ba/ /nyon mongs zhes bya'i sgrib pa dag /skad cig gis ni rigs
