438a5(rgyud): dga' byed dga' ste tsha ta tsha ti Ta ni rab dga' byed/ /haM ni rdo rje bstan pa dang bcas bde bstan 'dod chags bcas pa dga' byed do/ /ho ni mgon po skye ba mchog gi
438a6(rgyud): rgyur gyur hri ni dga' ba bdag nyid can/ /hi ni spyod pa 'god byed dul spong mchog ste dus gsum mgon pos bskor gyur pa/ /gsang zhing gsang ba'i yon tan kun mchog
438a7(rgyud): dri med ho ni byang chub spyod pa mchog / mchog gi mchog ste mchog gsol go 'phang mchog thob yi ge hUM ni stsol ba mchog /nyon mongs dri ma thams cad 'joms
438b1(rgyud): shing rab 'phro hUM gi mche ba'i mtshon char ldan/ /sna tshogs dga' ba mchog gis rnam par brgyan mdzes yi ge oM dang yang dag spel/ /he ho haM ni yid 'ong hUM gis rnam 'joms
438b2(rgyud): gnod mdzes des 'joms bdag nyid can/ /bde mchog glu dang rol mo dang bcas pa/ /gzugs bzang dang ldan lha mo rnams kyis mchod/ /zla ba ltar dkar 'phro ba'i zhal
438b3(rgyud): mnga' ba/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i yon tan brtsegs pas mtshan/ /rin chen kun gyis rnam spras yid 'ong ba/ /rin chen dra ba'i bla res rnam par mdzes/ /rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs
438b4(rgyud): kyis mchod cing mdzes/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ni 'jigs med pa/ /sa rnams kun gyi rnam sbyang dri med pa/ /byang chub spyod pa yongs rtogs bdag nyid can/ /chos
438b5(rgyud): mdzad yongs su rtogs pa'i zas dang ldan/ /bsod nams de yis bskyed pa'i dga' ba che/ /tshangs pa'i rnal 'byor gru bzhir yang dag gnas/ /chos mchog go rims bzhin
438b6(rgyud): du thig btab pas/ /'khor lo mu khyud rab tu mdzes bris pa/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la ni gtso bo bzhugs/ /ting 'dzin mchog rnams kha khyer gyis mdzes pa/ /gzungs kyi lha
438b7(rgyud): yi tshogs kyis mchod pa'i tshogs/ /thar pa'i theg pas byams pa'i sgo yis brgyan/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la ni 'dren pa bzhugs/ /pha rol phyin pa btsun mo gar byed pa/ /sems
439a1(rgyud): @#/ /can smin byed rnam par 'phrul la dga'/ /bsam gtan zas ldan mngon shes mchog gis brgyan/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la ni 'dren pa bzhugs/ /dkyil
439a2(rgyud): 'khor de ni gtso bo'i chos nyid can/ /chos nyid bstan pa'i snying po kun zhugs pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi tshogs 'dus mdzes pa yis/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i gsang ba zhes byar
439a3(rgyud): bshad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dbang phyug dam pa che/ /gsang ba kun 'byung ting 'dzin yang dag gnas/ /de ni rnam snang thub pa'i chos nyid gzigs/ /gzungs dang dam tshig
439a4(rgyud): yang dag 'byung ba mchog / dga' ba'i chos bzhin rdo rje yang dag gnas/ /de ni rnam snang thub pa'i dbang phyug gtso/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po nges par phyung / /hUM/ shin
439a5(rgyud): tu dag pa'i chos nyid lta bur byung / /sangs rgyas dbang phyug dam pa'i kun gyi mchog /rtse gcig dang bcas e ma'o dga' ba che/ /sangs rgyas sku yang bud med gzugs
439a6(rgyud): can te/ /sems can khams ni gdul phyir yang dag gnas/ /bud med gzugs kyang chos nyid dag pa ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gdung rgyud gnas gyur pa/ /rang gi rigs
439a7(rgyud): chen byung ba des byung mdzod/ /oM badzra d+hA twI shwa ri hUM/ oM badzra badzrI Ni hUM/ oM rat+na badzrI Ni hUM/ oM d+harmA badzrI Ni hUM/ oM karma badzrI Ni hUM/ mchog gi dang po rmad byung gsang ba
439b1(rgyud): lnga| |sangs rgyas lngas byas bud med gzugs can ta/ /rmad byung dam bcas dbang phyug dam par gnas/ /rdo rje gsang chos nyid kyi gsang ba mchog /'khor lo'i sbyor bas kyang ni
439b2(rgyud): bzhugs gyur pas/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis ni shar du bzhugs/ /de ni rigs kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor brjod/ /re re zhing yang rnal 'byor mchog dang ldan/ /rnal 'byor
439b3(rgyud): 'khor lor yongs su bshad pa mchog / de yis mi bskyod mchog tu byung ba yi/ /mchog tu gsang ba yi ni dkyil 'khor gsungs/ /oM badzra satwa gu h+ya sa ma ye hUM/ oM gu h+ya badzra
439b4(rgyud): satwa/ aM ku sha hUM/ oM badzra gu h+ya rA ge rA ga ya hUM/ oM badzra gu h+ya sA d+hI shwa ri hUM/ rdo rje rin chen dkyil 'khor bstan gyur pa/ /de yi slar yang snying po bzhi gsungs so/ /oM
439b5(rgyud): badzra gu h+ya rat+ne sa ma yaM hUM/ oM badzra gu h+ya pra b+ha hUM/ oM badzra d+h+wa dzA gra gu h+ya hUM/ oM badzra gu h+ya hA sa hUM/ rdo rje chos ni dbang phyug dam pa che/ /de yis slar yang snying po bzhi gsungs
439b6(rgyud): so| |oM badzra d+harma gu h+ya sa ma ye hUM/ oM badzra g+ho Sha gu h+ye hUM/ oM badzra gu h+ye maN+Da le hUM/ oM badzra gu h+ya bA tsa sa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje las ni yongs su dag pas mchod/ /'khor lo
439b7(rgyud): thams cad la ni yongs gnas mdzes/ /chos mchog dbang phyug dam pa mchog gyur pa/ /de yis snying po bzhi ni gsungs par gyur/ /oM badzra gu h+ya karma sa ma ye hUM/ oM badzra
440a1(rgyud): @#/ /gu h+ya ka ba tse hUM/ oM badzra gu h+ya daM Sh+Ta d+hA ra Ni hUM/ oM badzra gu h+ya muSh+Ti hUM/ sngar bzhin 'khor lo'i grong khyer yongs gnas pa/ /rdo rje'i gzugs su yongs
440a2(rgyud): gnas mdzes gyur pa/ /de nyid sangs rgyas sras te rdo rjer bcas/ /'on kyang da ltar bud med gzugs su sprul/ /de dag srid pa dag byed rab tu 'bar/ /thar pa'i grong du 'dod chags
440a3(rgyud): dag byed pa/ /rtog dang rnam par rtog pa bzlog pas dag /chos la dga' zhing sku mchog 'byung 'gyur ba/ /bden dang mi bden rnam dag nyi shu dang / /chos dang chos min dga'
440a4(rgyud): zhing dga' ba'i snod/ /byed dang byed min rdo rje tha dad gcig /rdo rje tha dad bstan pa ho yis rab sbyong spyod/ /gsang 'byor rin chen las byas chos grong ste/ /rnam 'phrul 'khor
440a5(rgyud): lo 'di ni ma pham don/ /rdo rje bla re'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /gsang dbang rdo rje chen po yis/ /thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer mdzad/ /sems can kun la phan don du/ /
440a6(rgyud): 'khor lo lnga ni yang dag byung / /de bzhin gshegs rigs zhes bya dang / /mi phyed brtan par byed pa dang / /byang chub spyod pa rab spyod mchog /theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi
440a7(rgyud): mchog / gdul bya ji bzhin 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /gtso bo'i spyod pa ji bzhin lhan cig spyod/ /sems can gdul bya ma yin snod mchog min/ /mthu chen
440b1(rgyud): rnams ni dngos grub rtsol mi mdzad/ /der ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin dag /yon tan mang po yang dag 'byung / /sems can rnams ni gdul bya'i phyir/ /rdo rje'i btsun mo dag las
440b2(rgyud): byung | |de nyid sangs rgyas sras bcas pa/ /de nyid 'khor lo'i grong khyer che/ /mchod pa sgo srung dang bcas pa/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag byung / /mgon po rdo
440b3(rgyud): rje gsang dbang phyug / rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad/ /rdo rje chos kyi sbyor ba yi/ /rdo rje pha rol phyin pa mchog /sngon ni ji ltar de bzhin phyis/ /de bzhin dbus/
440b4(rgyud): su rab tu gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs yin te/ /gsang ba'i sbyor ba yang dag byung / /rdo rje dbyings ni ji skad brjod/ /de nyid gsang ba zhes byar brjod/ /theg
440b5(rgyud): pa chen po mngon bsdus pa/ /rgyas par phyag rgya dang bcas par/ /'khor lo lnga yi dkyil 'khor mchog /rgyas pa ru ni yang dag bshad/ /mdo sde'i gsang dbang
440b6(rgyud): rgyal po ni/ /theg pa chen po mngon bsdus las/ /gsang ba'i rgyud dang phyag rgya dang / /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo zla ba dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ni/ /de dag
440b7(rgyud): rnam pa lnga ru bshad/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi snying rab mchog /mdor na drug tu bshad pa yin/ /dam chos spyod pa dang ldan pa/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/ /
441a1(rgyud): @#/ /nus pa ji bzhin rigs pa bzhin/ /ji ltar spyod pa dkyil 'khor mchog /ci rigs bar ni cho ga bzhin/ /mchog tu rmad byung bshad par bya/ /sngon
441a2(rgyud): la de bzhin gshegs rigs kyi/ /sems dpa' nga yis dbye bar bya/ /nga yis mdo sde gsang dbang bshad/ /gang du byis pa dag rmongs pa/ /rdo rje slob dpon skal ba che//
441a3(rgyud): gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya bcu drug ni/ /gsang ba nges par bslab par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rkang lag thal sbyar
441a4(rgyud): rdo rje ni/ /kha gyes pa ni bsgom bya zhing / /rdo rje can yang chags par bya/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ /zla ba gcig tu yongs su bsdu/ /rdo rje'i dbang phyug lha
441a5(rgyud): mo nga | |dbus ma la ni yongs su gzung / /sgeg pa dang bcas 'gro bya zhing / /rnam par 'phrul pas bzhin rmongs bya/ /bsgom pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje can
441a6(rgyud): yang mnyes par bya/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni/ /spyi bor thal mo sbyar bar bya/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bcings nas su/ /bdag nyid yang dag byin gyis
441a7(rgyud): brlab/ /bsgom pa'i phyag rgya 'di yis ni/ /sku yi phyag rgya rnam par bcing / /lag ngar lcags kyur bskum bya zhing / /bdag nyid yongs su bsgrub par bya/ /de
441b1(rgyud): bzhin bsgom pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje'i mda' ni kun tu dgang / /lag pas legs so zhes bya zhing / /dpung pas bdag nyid go bgor bya/ /slar yang gsang bar bya ba ni/ /zla ba'i
441b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /bdag nyid rdo rje gcig pu gnas/ /gsang ba lha mo'i dbang phyug mchog /de bzhin lag nga ra bkug bya zhing / /spyi bor rdo rje bsam par bya/ /phyogs
441b3(rgyud): gcig tu ni nga 'dug ste/ /rdo rje gnyis kyi go cha bya/ /thams cad rdo rje'i lus yin te/ /rin chen mig ni yongs gsal ba/ /gdong dang tshig ni pad+ma dang / /me tog kun 'dar bsgom
441b4(rgyud): par bya/ /byis pa bzhin du mig bskyod cing / /bung med rgyu mtshan yang dag bsgrub/ /smin ma bskyod cing khro gnyer gtsigs/ /khro bo'i lta bas mig gdangs pa/ khro mo'i lta ba
441b5(rgyud): 'dod chags che/ /'dzum bcas mig ni btsum par bya/ /mig gdangs pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje'i lta bas bgrad par bya/ /slar yang tshig ni rnam pa bzhi/ /ho ni rkan dang lkog
441b6(rgyud): mal| |dza ni lce yi dbus dang rtse/ /oM ni lkog ma mchu dag la/ /mchu dang mchu yi rtse la baM/ /de rnams gsang ba rab rgyas pa/ /bskrad dang spyos dang bcad pa dang / /bcing ba rdo
441b7(rgyud): rje tshig gis bya/ /de bzhin kho nar zla dbus na/ /phyag na rdo rje'i rang bdag nyid/ /rin chen chos dang de bzhin las/ /gsang ba'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /cho ga thams
442a1(rgyud): @#/ /cad rgyas pa ru/ /rdo rje gsang ba rjes su srung / /ji ltar rnal 'byor yang dag gnas/ /de bzhin gsang mchog 'dzin pa gnas/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bla
442a2(rgyud): na med/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor yang dag gnas/ /rdo rje phra mo bsgom par bya/ /dpa' bo rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /phyi rol las grol yang dag
442a3(rgyud): gnas/ /langs sam yang na 'dug kyang rung / /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul dag pa/ /spyod pa chen po tshul chen po/ /bdag nyid chos chen rab
442a4(rgyud): bsgoms na/ /rdo rje'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /'du byed sdug bsngal chen po las/ /dga' ba'i spyod pas spro bar bya/ /snying rje chen pos dmigs nas ni/ /sems can btang
442a5(rgyud): snyoms dor mi bya/ /lce ni rkan la sbyar bya zhing / /sna yi rtsa mor bsgom par bya/ /rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /sna yi rtse mor de bzhin gnas/ /snying ga'i spyi bo ci nus par/ /sku
442a6(rgyud): ni thams cad yongs su spro/ /rdo rje phra mo'i bde rig pas/ /sems ni mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i mdun du rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje bsgoms
442a7(rgyud): pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje phra mo yongs su spro/ /rang gi lus kyi mdun du ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs dbus su/ /rdo rje kun gyi dkyil 'khor ro//
442b1(rgyud): rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /lte bar sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs/ /rdo rje phra mo bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje rnam bsgoms sems gang zhig /gzugs med bstan du med pa
442b2(rgyud): dang | |rmongs pa med cing 'jigs pa med/ /rdo rje phra mor 'dir brjod do/ /dngos po med cing rdzas med pas/ /snang ba med par rab tu bsgom/ /bdag med sems can med pa ru/ /rnal
442b3(rgyud): 'byor pas ni rnal 'byor bsgoms/ /lus ni rdzas lnga'i bdag nyid can/ /khams bzhi la ni yang dag brten/ /skye mched bcu gnyis nyid dang ni/ /gzhan yang khams ni bco brgyad dag/
442b4(rgyud): sha dang rus pa khrag nyid dang / /rkang dang klad pas kun tu khyab/ /sna tshogs rdzas kyis kun tu khyab/ /bad kan mkhris pa la sogs tshogs/ /sna tshogs srin po'i rigs kyis khyab//
442b5(rgyud): dri ngan mi gtsang 'byung ba ru/ /rang gi lus la so sor brtag /sdug bsngal gsum ni kun 'byung bar/ /nyin dang mtshan mo rtag tu ni/ /lus ni rjes su dran pa bsgom/ /rang
442b6(rgyud): sems so sor brtag bya ste/ /gang zhig de ru yang dag byung / /'gro ba med cing song ba med/ /de la 'pho ba yod ma yin/ /de la 'byung ba yod min na/ /gang las sems ni
442b7(rgyud): yang dag byang / /yang dag ma yin kun rtog 'di/ /brdzun bzhin sems ni rmongs par byed/ /sems med tsam yang yod ma yin/ /brdzun bzhin 'byung ba snang bar
443a1(rgyud): @#/ /'gyur/ /'di la gnas dang mtshan nyid dang / /rab gnas 'byung ba yod ma yin/ /gzung bar dga' ba gti mug che/ /rdo rje phra mor brjod par bya//
443a2(rgyud): de lta bu yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /sems bsgom pa yi rnam pa bzhin/ /lus dang soms dang tshor ba dag /phra mo'i rnam par bsgom par bya/ /sUk+Sh+ma badzra/ rdo rje reg pa'i
443a3(rgyud): mtshan ma yi/ /gnas ni yang dag shes par bya/ /de ni byung na spro bya ste/ /stong gsum du ni yongs su spro/ /s+pha ra Na badzra/ reg pas sbyor ba bsdu bya ste/ /skrag cing rmongs
443a4(rgyud): par mi bya'o/ /gnas gsum du yang bsdu bya ste/ /blo yis so sor brtag par bya/ /saM ha ra Na badzra/ chos la dmigs pa'i sems nyid ni/ /rmongs shing gzhom par mi bya'o//
443a5(rgyud): rdo rje de ni brtan bya zhing / /rdo rje phra mo reg par bya/ /badzra dr-i D+ha tiSh+Tha/ rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs med pa/ /rgyal po tshangs pa'i gtsug phud can/ /spyi bor sems dpa' bsgom
443a6(rgyud): bya zhing / /sku ni thams cad yongs su spro/ /badzra At+ma ka/ dpral bar rdo rje rin chen ni/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom par bya/ /mtshan ma dag ni spro bya zhing / /sems
443a7(rgyud): dpa' kun yang spro bar bya/ /badzra rat+na At+ma ka /rdo rje chos ni shin tu dag /sna yi rtse mor bsgom par bya/ /de yi mtshan ma spro bya zhing / /lus rnams kun yang spro bar bya/ /
443b1(rgyud): badzra pad+ma At+ma ka /lus kun la ni yang dag khyab/ /chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su bsgom/ /de yi mtshan ma spro bya zhing / /sems dpa' kun yang spro bar bya/ /sarba badzra At+ma ka/ sems
443b2(rgyud): dpa' de bzhin rin chen las/ /chos ni spyi bor bsgom par bya/ /de yi mtshan ma spro bya zhing / /sku ni thams cad yongs su spro/ /sarba badzra/ sna la lcags kyu yang dag gnas/ /blo ldan
443b3(rgyud): mi yis bsam par bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gzhug bya zhing / /rang gi lus ni brtan par bya/ /snying ga 'dod chags gnas su ni/ /'dod chags rnam par dag pa bsam/ /sangs
443b4(rgyud): rgyas thams cad mnyes bya ste/ /chos kyi dbyings ni brtan par 'gyur/ /legs so zhes pa gzung bya ste/ /spyi bor yang dag gnas pa'i mchog /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes bya
443b5(rgyud): zhing | |chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su spro/ /hr-i da badzra aM ku sha/ tiSh+Tha badzra rA ga hr-i da ye/ /A di badzra duSh+Ti/ snying gar rdo rje nyi ma ni/ /blo ldan mi yis bsgom par bya/ /'od kyi gzi
443b6(rgyud): brjid spro bya zhing / /'jig rten kun kyang spro bar bya/ /spyi bor 'khri shing 'od bcas pa/ /rgyal mtshan rtse mor rnam par bsam/ /rin chen char dag spro bya zhing / /snod kyi sprin ni
443b7(rgyud): yang dag spro/ /bzhad pas bde ba bsams nas ni/ /shin tu sdug bsngal nges par sbyar/ /chos kyi char yang spro bya zhing / /snang ba'i sprin yang spro bar bya/ /hr-i da ya badzra sUR+ya//
444a1(rgyud): @#/ /tiSh+Tha badzra d+h+wa dzA gre /hr-i da ya badzra hA sa/ /spyi bor rjes dran nas brtsams nas/ /ral gri gtso bo bsam par bya/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gcad bya
444a2(rgyud): zhing | |sems dpa' thams cad spro bar bya/ /snying ga'i 'khor lo'i gnas su ni/ /chos kyi rgyu mthun bsgom par bya/ /nam mkha' kun tu spro bya zhing / /chos kyi dbyings
444a3(rgyud): ni yongs su spro/ /de yi rigs las byung ba'i sgra/ /shes rab can gyis lce rtser bsam/ /chos kyi tshig ni spro bya zhing / /phyogs rnams kun tu yongs su spro/ /hr-i da badzra
444a4(rgyud): g+ho Sha/ tiSh+Tha badzra hr-i da yaM/ pra be sha badzra wak+t+ra/ spyi bor rjes dran nas brtsams te/ /mchod pa'i las ni rnam par bsam/ /mchod pa'i phyir ni rdo rje spro/ /phyogs rnams
444a5(rgyud): kun tu spro bar bya/ /snying gar rdo rje go cha ni/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsam/ /sdug bsngal kun las grol byed pa/ /go cha'i rnam pa spro bar bya/ /spyi bo nas
444a6(rgyud): brtsams rkang mthil du/ /rdo rje bsdams pa bsam par bya/ /rdo rje'i snying po gzhug bya zhing / /rdo rje'i rang bzhin thams cad spro/ /hr-i da badzra ka ba tse/ tiSh+Tha/ badzra yak+Sha
444a7(rgyud): badzra badzra muSh+Ti hr-i da yaM/ grogs dang grogs min ma lus pa/ /'byung po kun la byams pa ni/ /ma lus bus pa med pa ru/ /mnyam du khyab par spro bar bya/ /kye ma
444b1(rgyud): sems can 'di sdug bsngal/ /'gro ba lnga ru kun tu 'khyams/ /nyin dang mtshan du rab sbyor bas/ /snying rje nyid ni spro bar bya/ /nyin mtshan dge dang zhe sdang med/ /sems can
444b2(rgyud): dge ba don gnyer dang / /rjes su yi rang bde chen po/ /sems can kun la yongs su spro/ brgal bar dka' ba'i lam zhugs shing / /sangs rgyas byang chub la gnas pa/ /
444b3(rgyud): sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir/ /blo chen ldan pas btang snyoms gzhag /mahA mai tri s+pha ra Na/ mahA kA ru Ni kA ya s+pha ra Na/ sar+b+ba bud d+ha/ pra mo da s+pha ra Na/ ma ho pek+Sha s+pha
444b4(rgyud): ra Na| nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/ /rdo rje'i gzugs ni rnam par bsam/ /sems can mnyam par dmigs pa yis/ /nam mkha' kun tu yongs su spro/ /badzra muSh+Ti
444b5(rgyud): b+ha ba| rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /snying ga rdo rje chos nyid brtan/ /don rnams thams cad bsgom par bya/ /chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su spro/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran
444b6(rgyud): nas brtsams te/ /rnam pa kun tu sna tshogs nyid/ /de ni rang gi bdag nyid bsgom/ /chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su spro/ /rdo rje phra mo gzhan dang ldan/ /chos rnams thams
444b7(rgyud): cad rnam bsgom pa/ /myur du phyogs kun yongs su spro/ /snying gar rdo rje bsgom bya zhing / /mahA bo d+hi satwa bi shwa/ bud+d+ha a nu smr-i te bi shwa/ badzra pA Ni daR+sha ya/ sa ru paM/ zla
445a1(rgyud): @#/ /ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /byang chub sems ni bsgom par bya/ /sa man+ta b+ha dra bi shwa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /bdag nyid rdo rje rnam
445a2(rgyud): par bsgom/ /badzra satwa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /rdo rje bsnyems pa rol bcas pa/ /badzra satwa sam ya sa mA d+hi dz+nyA na bi shwa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas
445a3(rgyud): par| |sangs rgyas gzugs su rang bdag nyid/ /ta thA ga ta sa mo haM/ dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa/ /rdo rje slob dpon dag gi bya/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod
445a4(rgyud): na| |shes rab can gyis nges par bya/ /mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsam/ /ji bzhin mtshan gyis brgyan pa ru/ /rtag tu bdag
445a5(rgyud): nyid rnam par bsgom/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas de bzhin bdag /bdag nyid sangs rgyas rtag tu bsgom/ /sangs rgyas gang yin de bdag nyid/ /sangs rgyas mang por yang dag
445a6(rgyud): gnas/ /bdag ni de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs/ /rdo rje'i tshig ni yang dag brjod/ /dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa/ /sangs rgyas kun kyang mnyes par bya/ /oM
445a7(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta sa mo haM/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /ji ltar sku mdog cho ga bzhin/ /dbang po gnyis ni yang dag gnas/ /de bzhin bdag ni rtag tu bsgom/ /oM
445b1(rgyud): badzra satwa sa mo haM/ bdag ni rdo rje sems dpa' mtshungs/ /rdo rje'i tshig ni yang dag brjod/ /dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas/ /nges par 'jig rten pham par bya/ /khams
445b2(rgyud): kyi snying po gang yin dag/ de ni rdul bral dri med dag /bdag ni rdo rje chos nyid du/ /rtag tu bsgom par bya ba yin/ /badzra d+harma sa mo haM/ bdag nyid rdo rje chos dang mtshungs/ /
445b3(rgyud): rdo rje'i tshig ni yang dag brjod/ /dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas/ /rdo rje'i chos ni thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i las ni bdag nyid de/ /tha dad med cing rtags gcig
445b4(rgyud): gis| |sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod de/ /rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /oM badzra karma sa mo haM/ /bdag ni rdo rje las dang mtshungs/ /rdo rje'i tshig ni yang yang brjod//
445b5(rgyud): dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas/ /rdo rje las dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /nga ni rdo rje rin chen nyid/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur ba/ /rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par
445b6(rgyud): bya| |rdo rje rin chen mtshungs par 'gyur/ /oM badzra rat+na sa mo haM/ /bdag ni rdo rje rin chen mtshungs/ /rdo rje'i tshig ni yang yang brjod/ /rdo rje rin chen sbyor ba yis/ /
445b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas dbang bskur thob par 'gyur/ /gzugs gnyis 'brel ba ni dbang po gnyis zhes bya'o/ /bdag gi lus gang yin pa dang / /sangs rgyas kyi sku gang yin
446a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa ni dbang po gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'o/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ /rdo rje gcig tu mos byas
446a2(rgyud): shing | |sangs rgyas gzugs dang mtshungs pa ru/ /dbus su bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /nam mkha' la ni rdo rje bsgom/ /rdo rje gcig ni yongs gsal ba/ /rdo rje
446a3(rgyud): sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /dbus su bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ /rdo rje gcig ni yongs gsal bas/ /rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin
446a4(rgyud): gyis| |dbus su bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /ci nus par ni byin gyis brlab/ /rdo rje gcig ni rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gyis/ /rtag tu bdag ni bsgom
446a5(rgyud): par bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom bya zhing / /rin chen bdag nyid dbus su bsgom/ /kun tu rdo rje'i dbus su ni/ /rtag tu bdag nyid las su bsgom/ /gtso bo
446a6(rgyud): gang dang gtso dag gis/ /sku mdog cha byad ji bzhin du/ /rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /sems can dam pa de nyid thob/ /bdag gtso rdo rje'i tshig brjod
446a7(rgyud): cing | |rdo rje'i thugs su bsam par bya/ /dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur/ /yang na bsgom pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /rang dbang du ni
446b1(rgyud): rab bshad bya/ /ji ltar yid las byung ba bzhin/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam par bsgom/ /sna yi rtse mo la brten nas/ /sems kyi rgyun ni yang dag gnas/ /brgya las rtsa bdun
446b2(rgyud): lhag par ni/ /rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ /gal te bsgoms pas dngos grub 'dod/ /rdo rje bsgom pa bsgrub par bya/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor ba yis/ /sgrub pa'i
446b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor yang dag gnas/ /sems dpa' rjes dran sbyor ba yis/ /gdon mi za bar nges par bya/ /gang dang gang la 'dod pa nyid/ /bdag nyid rdo rjer bsgom par bya/ /sku mdog
446b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor ji bzhin du/ /ci rigs par ni sna tshogs bdag /yang na rdo rje bsgom gtso bo/ /sgrub pa yang ni bsgom par bya/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar rnam 'phrul 'khor lo byung / /e
446b5(rgyud): ma'o ngo mtshar spyod mchog dam pa bsgrub/ /kya ma'o ngo mtshar gsang mchog gnas thob pa/ /bdag ni rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i mchog /rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i sgrub
446b6(rgyud): pa ste| |rnal 'byor rig pa sgrub byed pa/ /mchod pa bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /de nas mchod pa rab bshad bya/ /thun bzhi dang ni kha dog bzhi/ /dus bzhi yi ni rab sbyor bas//
446b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnal 'byor brjod byed cing / /sangs rgyas la ni mchod par bya/ /phyogs rnams kun tu yongs spros shing / /mchod pa rnams ni yongs spro zhing / /sangs rgyas
447a1(rgyud): @#/ /byang chub rab sgrub pas/ /rtag tu yang dag rnal 'byor bsgom/ /mchod la spro ba yang dag sbyor/ /zhes bya chos ni yongs su spro/ /ting 'dzin sbyor ba la
447a2(rgyud): gnas te/ /chos kyi mchod pa rab tu bya/ /oM ta thA ga ta badzra satwa/ a nut+ta ra pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje yi ni gsang sngags 'di/ /yang dang yang du rab tu bzlas/ /rdo
447a3(rgyud): rje dbyings ni sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya lnga ni rab tu bya/ /so sor rtogs dang mngon rtogs dang / /rdo rje de bzhin rdo rje bdag /rgyas pa ru ni sngar bshad pa/ /rdo rje dbyings ni
447a4(rgyud): rab tu bskyed/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ma lus pa/ /rang gi bdag nyid bsgoms nas su/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis/ /thub pa dbang phyug dag la dbul/ /rdo rje
447a5(rgyud): sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi/ /thub la mchod pa phul nas ni/ /bdag ni mgon po rnam snang mdzad/ /bdag gi khams ni rnam par spros/ /byang chub sems ni spros nas
447a6(rgyud): su| |thub pa'i dbang phyug dag la dbul/ /rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni/ /mchod pa thams cad rab tu bsgrub/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra satwa/ a nut+ta ra pU dzA s+pha ra
447a7(rgyud): Na sa ma ye hUM/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur ba/ /rdo rje rin chen spros nas ni/ /bdag ni mgon po rnam snang mdzad/ /bdag gi khams ni rnam par spros/ /rdo rje'i
447b1(rgyud): sngags kyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /thub pa'i dbang phyug dag la dbul/ /rin chen mchod pa rab spro zhing / /bsdams pa'i sbyor ba rab tu sgrub/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra rat+na a nut+ta
447b2(rgyud): ra pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ snga ma ji lta ba bzhin du/ /rnam par snang mdzad ting 'dzin gyis/ /ji ltar sems dpa' phyung ba bzhin/ /de bzhin bdag ni bsgom par bya/ /rang bdag
447b3(rgyud): nyid ni bsgom nas su/ /rmad byung chen po yongs spro zhing / /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/ /rdo rje'i sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /de lta bu la snyoms zhugs te/ /rdo rje
447b4(rgyud): chos ni rab tu byung / /phyogs rnams kun tu spro bya zhing / /sangs rgyas rnams la dbul bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+harma a nut+ta ra pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ ting 'dzin
447b5(rgyud): sbyor ba la gnas te/ /rdo rje las rnams spro nas ni/ /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing / /thams cad du ni spro bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karma a nut+ta ra pU dzA s+pha ra Na
447b6(rgyud): sa ma ye hUM/ mchod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /thun bzhi ru ni bsgom par bya/ /mchod pa'i cho gas 'grub 'gyur te/ /sdig pa can yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /mchod pa'i
447b7(rgyud): las ni bla na med/ /ci rigs par ni rab bshad bya/ /chos kyi phyag rgya'i rgyal por ldan/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba at+ma nir+yA ta na pU dzA
448a1(rgyud): @#/ /s+pha ra Na karma badzra i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom par bya/ /bdag nyid yang dang yang du ni/ /sangs rgyas kun
448a2(rgyud): la dbul bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma ni r+yA ta na pU dzA s+pha ra Na karmA gre dza/ rdo rje lcags kyu rang bdag nyid/ /phyogs kun du ni spro bar bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
448a3(rgyud): dgug bya zhing / /thub pa dag la dbul bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma ni r+yA ta na a nu rA ga pU dzA s+pha ra Na karma bA Ni hUM ho/ rdo rje'i rigs ni rjes chags pa/ /rtag tu
448a4(rgyud): bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /chos rnams dag la mnyes byas shing / /'di brjod nas ni spro bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma nir+yA ta na sa d+hu kA ra pU dzA s+pha ra Na karma
448a5(rgyud): duSh+Ti maM/ rdo rje rin chen rnal 'byor che/ /bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya/ /rin chen mchod ba bla na med/ /phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya/ /oM na maHsarba ta thA
448a6(rgyud): ga ta kA ya a bi She ka rat+ne b+h+yo badzra ma Ni oM/ sangs rgyas thams cad rgyal po che/ /byang chub snying por dbang bskur ba/ /sems kyang de ltar bsam nas ni/ /rdo
448a7(rgyud): rje rin chen nyid thob 'gyur/ /bdag nyid rdo rje gzi brjid ni/ /phyogs rnams kun tu snang byed pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bskul bya zhing / /mchod pa gzi
448b1(rgyud): brjid yongs su spro/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sUR+ye b+h+yo/ badzra te dzo ni dz+wA la hrIH/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan kun tu mthong / /shes rab can gyis rgyal mtshan bsgreng / /sangs rgyas thams cad
448b2(rgyud): mchod bya zhing / /rdo rje'i sngags kyis bskul bar bya/ /oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta A shA pa ri pU ra Ni/ tsin+tA ma Ni d+h+wa dza a gre trAM/ /grags chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /
448b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis blta/ /rtag tu bdag nyid dga' bya zhing / /rdo rje'i sngags ni rab bskul bya/ /oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pri ti pra ma d+ya ka re b+h+yo badzra
448b4(rgyud): hA se hA/ sems can thams cad chos chen po/ /bdag nyid chos chen dag pa ste/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab bskul bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
448b5(rgyud): bdag nyid kun/ /dkyil 'khor grong khyer thams cad gdab/ /shes rab can gyi bdag nyid bsam/ /rdo rje'i sngags kyis rab bskul bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra
448b6(rgyud): d+harma sa mA d+hi b+hi stu no mi mahA d+harma a gre hrIH/ bdag ni shes rab ral gri rno/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ /'khor lo'i yi ge rab tu bskor/ /mdo sde thams
448b7(rgyud): cad 'dzin pa yin/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA ni ra hA re tu no mi mahA g+ho Sha nu ge d+h+waM/ sems can dag ni kun gyi tshig /bdag ni sems dpa' smra ba brtan/ /
449a1(rgyud): @#/ /rdo rje smra ba gsang ba'i bdag /sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta saN+d+hi b+hA Sha bud d+ha saM gI ti b+hirga ya stu no mi badzra wA tse rba
449a2(rgyud): bdag ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor sbyin byed pa/ /rdo rje'i 'khor lo yongs su bsngo/ /mchod pa thams cad yongs spro bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga
449a3(rgyud): ta tsakra ak+Shar pa ri brtI d+ha na sarba mu trAM te na ya stu no mi sarba maN+Da le maM/ bdag ni rdo rje las rgyal po/ /phyogs rnams kun tu rab mchod byed/ /me tog bdug pa la sogs
449a4(rgyud): dri| |rdo rje'i sngags kyis bskul bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hu ba me g+ha s+pha ra Na pU dzA karma ka ra ka ra/ cho ga bgos pa dang ldan pa/ /me tog mchod pa 'bul byed pa/ /
449a5(rgyud): bdag nyid rang nyid rgyal po ste/ /rdo rje'i sngags ni rab bskul bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga puSh+pa pra sa ra s+pha ra Na pU dzA karme ki ri ki ri/ bdag ni rdo rje gnod spyin te/ /nyon mongs
449a6(rgyud): za byed chos sgron dkar/ /phyogs rnams kun tu spro bya zhing / /snang ba 'bar ba yang dag spro/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta A lo ka dz+wa la s+pha ra Na pU dzA karme b+ha ra b+ha ra/ rdo rje khu
449a7(rgyud): tshur yang dag nyid/ /dri yi snod dang yang dag ldan/ /phyogs rnams kun tu spro bya zhing / /char rnams kun gyi rab mchod byed/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha sa mu da
449b1(rgyud): s+pha ra Na pU dzA karma ku ru ku ru/ sems can kun don yang dag ldan/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed nas kyang / /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/ /mchod pa mchog ni rab
449b2(rgyud): bsgrub pa/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra at+ma nir+yA ta na pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na se ma ye hUM/ shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bri/ /yan lag kun gyis rab btud bya/ /
449b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing / /phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya nir+yA ta na pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pas
449b4(rgyud): ni| |rdo rje rin chen bla na med/ /rdo rje chos ni glur blangs pas/ /rdo rje las rnams byed par 'gyur/ /rdo rje yi ni glu 'di yis/ /rang bdag nyid ni dga' bar bya/ /sangs rgyas
449b5(rgyud): kun la dbul bya zhing / /rdo rje'i sngags kyang rab brjod bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ga nir+yA ta na pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ phyogs rnams kun tu mchod pa
449b6(rgyud): kun| |mkhas pa yis ni bsam par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing / /rdo rje'i sngags ni rab bskul bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta nir+yA ta na pU dza me g+ha
449b7(rgyud): sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ phul nas shes rab can gyis ni/ /rdo rje btsun mo'i ting 'dzin bsam/ /rdzas mchog ldan pas spro bya zhing / /sangs rgyas kun la
450a1(rgyud): @#/ /yongs su dbul/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu t+ta ra haR+Sha ra ti prI ti su kha a nu t+ta ra pradz+nyA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis
450a2(rgyud): ni| |sangs rgyas kun la rab mchod bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches/ /bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kun bsdus pa/ /shes
450a3(rgyud): rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bsam/ /mchod pa'i tshogs ni bla med pas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya/ /rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /cho dang mdog dang
450a4(rgyud): nad med nyid/ /phun tshogs bde ba thams cad 'thob/ /sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms pa/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gang zhig gis/ /nyin re bzhin du mchod byas
450a5(rgyud): na| |the tshom med par dngos grub kun/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas thob 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i sngags kyis bslab pa dang / /phyag rgya thams cad bsam par bya/ /theg pa
450a6(rgyud): chen po mngon bsdus las/ /phyag rgya shin tu rgyas par bshad/ /rdo rje las kyi go rims bzhin/ /shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bslab/ /rdo rje dbyings
450a7(rgyud): dang rab mtshungs pa/ /slar yang rnal 'byor pa la bshad/ /'jig rten mgon po rdzu 'phrul che/ /rtag tu de bzhin mchod bya ba/ /gsang mchog rnal 'byor
450b1(rgyud): bdag a/ /de las gzhan yang rab bshad bya/ /gang tshe sngon du sems bskyed pa/ /rdo rje sems ni bla na med/ /byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed nas/ /mchod pa'i bya ba
450b2(rgyud): bslab par bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis sbyor ba/ /rdo rje dga' ba bsam par bya/ /'dod chags dga' ba bskyed nas ni/ /dga' ba'i mchod pa rab tu mchod/ /bdag nyid
450b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas bsgom bya zhing / /bsgoms nas mchod pa rab tu bya/ /dga' ba chen po'i bde don du/ /rig pa'i lha mo rab 'brel bas/ /bud d+ha At+ma kou0f85haM/ byang
450b4(rgyud): chub sems ni rab bskyed nas/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas zhes bsam bya/ /stobs dang mi 'jigs sogs rnams kyis/ /rang bdag nyid ni dbang bskur bya/ /bud+d+ha
450b5(rgyud): a b+hi ShIny+tsa mi/ /byang chub sems ni rab bskyed nas/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas zhes bsam bya/ /rdo rje yi ni glu blang zhing / /bdag nyid mngon par mchod par bya/ /
450b6(rgyud): bud+d+ha sid+d+hi ka ro mi/ /byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed nas/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas zhes bsam bya/ /rdo rje gar gyis gar bya zhing / /mkhas pas bdag nyid mchod
450b7(rgyud): par bya/ /bud+d+ha pU dzA/ sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje mchog /spyor bas de bzhin phyag byas shing / /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod byas nas/ /nges par phyag ni
451a1(rgyud): @#/ /byas par 'gyur/ /pa Na mA mi/ rdo rje sku gsung thugs las byung / /sangs rgyas bsod nams chen po kun/ /rjes su yi rang mchog bdag
451a2(rgyud): gis| |myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/ /a nu mo de/ bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs pa/ /sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi/ /mchod pa kun gyis sangs rgyas nyid//
451a3(rgyud): mchod pa'i bdag nyid can gyis mchod/ /bud+d+ha pU dzA/ rdo rje sku gsung thugs las byung / /dge ba'i tshogs ni thams cad kun/ /yongs su bsngo ba'i mchod pa
451a4(rgyud): yis| |sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /pa ri NA maH/ chos kyi dbyings ni snying po che/ /'dod pa'i 'dam gyis ma gos pa/ /gzod nas dag bas skye
451a5(rgyud): ba med/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pad+ma mtshungs/ /sarba shud+d+haH/ chos rnams thams cad ma skyes pa/ /gzod nas zhi zhing gos pa med/ /glo bur dri mas gos pa med//
451a6(rgyud): yi ge a yis rnam par sbyangs/ /sa man+ta b+ha dra/ e ma 'o 'khor lo bde rang bzhin/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med/ /chos rnams thams cad nyid kyis ni/ /'dir
451a7(rgyud): ni de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu/ /d+harma tsakra/ sgra brnyan dang ni mtshungs pa'i sgra/ /med de gzhan yang yod ma yin/ /chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin du/ /bdag
451b1(rgyud): ces bya ba 'ga' yang med/ /nis pra pany+tsa/ /sngon du blo dang ldan pas bsam/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom bya zhing / /de 'og rdo rje sna tshogs brjod/ /de nas dngos grub
451b2(rgyud): thob par 'gyur/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i/ /rang gi lus ni phra rab dag /rdo rje'i gzugs su bsgom bya zhing / /rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /badzra kA ya/ sku
451b3(rgyud): dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i/ /yan lag rnam pa ji snyed pa'i/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom bya zhing / /thams cad yongs su spro bar bya/ /d+harma kA ya/ rang gi lus
451b4(rgyud): la gnas pa yi/ /phra rab rdul ni ji snyed pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya/ /don yod mchod pas rab mchod bya/ /satwa kA ya /de bzhin lus ni thams cad kyi
451b5(rgyud): rang gi phra rab rdul rnams ni/ /kun tu bgod pa'i bsgom byas te/ /de ni sangs rgyas mchod par bshad/ /bud+d+ha kA ya/ sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su mnyes/ /byang
451b6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' slob gang yin/ /shes rab can gyis mchog gsang bslab/ /sangs rgyas sa ni thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /lus rnams
451b7(rgyud): thams cad yongs su bsdams/ /yan lag kun la chags pa dang / /ting nge 'dzin dang bcas pa yis/ /lus kun la ni yongs su chags/ /bde ba'i mchod pa
452a1(rgyud): @#/ /rang byung ba/ /e ma'o rjes su chags mchod bdag /rdo rje'i tshig ni brjod par bya/ /e ma'o yid 'ong e ma'o sdug /e ma'o dga' ba rab tu
452a2(rgyud): mdzes/ /chos kyi chags pa 'dod chags che/ /gang la rab dga' chags 'gyur ba/ /chos dang gang zag bdag med pa/ /stong pa 'dod chags brjod par bya/ /'khor
452a3(rgyud): ba'i sdug bsngal spang bya zhing / /sems can yang ni dor mi bya/ /sred pa dang ni chags dang spyod/ /rtog pa thams cad rnam par spang / /ming dang gzugs ni shes bya
452a4(rgyud): shing | |mtshan nyid gsum ni rtogs par bya/ /theg chen bde ba zhes bya ba/ /'dod chags chags par rab brjod par/ /lta ba thams cad mi gzung zhing / /srid pa'i
452a5(rgyud): sdug bsngal rnam par spang / /rtog dang rnam par rtog pa med/ /sdug bsngal thams cad nges par gcod/ /phung po dang ni skye mched khams/ /rtog pa rdul tsam
452a6(rgyud): yod ma yin/ /de la 'dus byas yod ma yin/ /'dus byas min pa nyid kyang med/ /skyes pa bud med dag nyid med/ /bdag dang sems can rnam rtog med/ /
452a7(rgyud): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug med/ /nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs spangs/ /de lta bu yi chags pa yis/ /gang du rdo rje can chags 'gyur/ /de lta bu yi
452b1(rgyud): sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rjes chags bya/ /kha yi 'o ni mchog dag pa/ /gsang ba'i sbyor bas rab bsgrub bya/ /oM ma hA su kha badzra satwa/ /rjes su chags pa'i cho
452b2(rgyud): ga bstan/ /dpung ba dam por bsdams bya zhing / /'dod chags chags par bstan pa yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab 'grub 'gyur/ /chags pa lnga las rnam grol
452b3(rgyud): bas| |'dod la chags par mi bya zhing / /blo ldan cho gas dga' ba yis/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga yis/ /gsang ba
452b4(rgyud): thams cad rab bstan bya/ /zhi ba thams cad mnyes bya zhing / /rdo rje sems sogs mnyes par bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ /rdo rje can dang dga'
452b5(rgyud): chen po/ /'dod chags chen po 'di lta bus/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /oM sarba rA ga ra ti su kha yA mi hUM/ mchog tu gsang ba dam pa mchog/ gang
452b6(rgyud): zhig byas nas gsang ba kun/ /brtags nas 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /lhag par shes rab can gyis bslab/ /mtshan ma brtan por rab 'grub nas/ /pad+ma'i
452b7(rgyud): lte par 'dug bya zhing / /mtshan ma mchod rten byin brlabs nas/ /rang bdag rdo rje mtshungs pa nyid/ /mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po las/ /de yis shin tu gsang
453a1(rgyud): @#/ /tshig gsungs/ /de ni dgongs pas gsungs pa ste/ /de ni dgongs par shes par bya/ /mtshan ma phyag mtshan zhes byar brjod/ /brtan
453a2(rgyud): pa lhag pa nyid yin te/ /byang chub sems dpa'i phyag mtshan gang / /mkhas pas lhag par bcang bar bya/ /pha rol phyin pa drug spyod pa/ /de yi mtshan mar
453a3(rgyud): rab tu bsgrags/ /gang phyir lhag par brtan par bya/ /blo ldan rnams kyi rigs 'byung 'dod/ /mtshan ma brtan par rang gyur pa/ /de dag kho nar rab tu
453a4(rgyud): bsgrags/ /pha rol phyin drug spyod pa ni/ /rdo rje'i rigs su brjod par bya/ /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /rdo rje mtshan mar 'di brjod bya/ /byang chub sems
453a5(rgyud): kyi rab sbyor bas/ /mtshan ma brtan por brjod par bya/ /pad+ma shes rab pha rol phyin/ /pad+ma'i lte bar 'dug bya ba/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi/ /rnal 'byor
453a6(rgyud): yang yang snyoms 'jug bya/ /b+ha ga ling ga'i sbyor ba ni/ /yang dang yang du bsten byas nas/ /g.yo dang nyes pa rnam spangs par/ /gdon mi za bar yang dag byung //
453a7(rgyud): shes rab dang ni byang chub sems/ /yang dang yang du bsten byas nas/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ /byang chub gdon mi za bar 'gyur/ /bsgrub byar
453b1(rgyud): gyur ba'i chos 'di ni/ /lus can kun gyis rnyed par dka'/ /byang chub sems dang shes rab che/ /mchod rten mtshan ma'i rjes chags bya/ /rnal 'byor pas ni 'di
453b2(rgyud): bsgom dang / /'di lta bu yi sgrub pa dang / /spyod pa gsang ba 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje gsang ba nyid thob 'gyur/ /gsang ba dgongs pas bsdus pa yi/ /mdo las rgya cher ji
453b3(rgyud): skad gsungs/ /gsang ba'i rnal 'byor 'di yis ni/ /sems can thams cad rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje gsang dbang bsdus pa yi/ /sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor 'di yis ni/ /
453b4(rgyud): gsang ba chen po bsgrubs na ni/ /skad cig de la rab 'grub 'gyur/ /kha cig nyin zhag de nyid la/ /yang dang yang du 'grub par 'gyur/ /nyi ma gnyis gsum bzhi
453b5(rgyud): lnga 'am/ /drug dang bdun la the tshom med/ /mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang / /ci rigs pa yi cho ga yis/ /lo gcig tu ni rab sbyor bas/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la

453b7(rgyud): pa ru| |de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /mdor na rig pa'i brtul zhugs ni/ /gong du dkyil 'khor las bshad bzhin/ /ci ltar spro zhing ci nus par/ /sngon
454a1(rgyud): @#/ /du mkhas pas bshad par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' skal ba che/ /rgyal po kun tu khyab pa'i 'od/ /the tshom med par stong phrag brgya/ /rtag
454a2(rgyud): tu rdo rje'i tshig brjod bya/ /sems dpa'i rdo rje goms bya ste/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor goms byas te/ /chos rnams dag pa goms par bya/ /goms pa tsam gyis 'grub
454a3(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /nyon mongs rab spong nyon mongs bzlog par bya/ /rnal 'byor goms pa yis ni rnal 'byor bsgrub/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis dga' chen 'grub 'gyur

454a6(rgyud): tshom med/ /rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba bzhi ni yang dag bshad/ /gsang ba chen po tshad med pa/ /bzhi po thams cad bsdus pa yin/ /bzlas
454a7(rgyud): brjod sbyin sreg cho ga dang / /phyag rgya bcing ba lhur len pa/ /rig pa'i mchog gi cho ga ni/ /gsang ba bsdus pa dang po yin/ /gsad dang skem byed phur pas

454b2(rgyud): de bzhin rab bskyod dang / /bdag nyid mngon par bsrung nyid dang / /bgegs rnams bsal bar bya ba dang / /rdzas 'phrog pa dang gzhom pa dang / /gdug pa thams
454b3(rgyud): cad mngon bsrung ba/ /rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba bsdus pa gsum pa yin/ /sngags dang phyag rgya mchod pa dang / /de bzhin rig pa'i dngos grub nyid/ /bgegs
454b4(rgyud): rnams bsod nams nye bar bsdu/ /gsang ba bzhi par 'dod pa yin/ /gsang ba bzhi po thams cad ni/ /rang gzhan rdzu 'phrul kun bsdus pa/ /gsang ba mchog gi rgyud chen
454b5(rgyud): po| |rgyud de las ni rab tu bshad/ /bzlas brjod sbyin sreg cho ga ni/ /de ni rgyud mchog las bshad bya/ /gang phyir rig pa 'dzin kun gyi/ /bzlas brjod sbyin sreg bsgrub

458b7(rgyud): mi dmigs pa/ /dam pa'i don ni ji ltar yod/ /gang zhig bstan par mi dmigs pa/ /de ni yod min dngos por med/ /chos rnams thams cad med pas na/ /skye ba
459a1(rgyud): @#/ /med par brjod par bya/ /gang zhig ma skyes de yod min/ /gang zhig yod min ji ltar yod/ /mkhas pas chos rnams thams cad ni/ /'gag
459a2(rgyud): pa med ces bya bar brjod/ /skye ba med cing 'gag pa med/ /de ni gzod nas zhi bar 'dod/ /de phyir rang bzhin mya ngan 'das/ /'di ni stong pa nyid du brjod/ /'di ni
459a3(rgyud): yang dag de nyid che/ /yang dag mtha' ru brjod par bya/ /chos kyi dbyings na snying po che/ /theg pa chen por brjod par bya/ /de ni snying po khong stong med/ /rdo rje'i brtan pa
459a4(rgyud): bla na med/ /lus kun la ni spro bya ste/ /bdag gis lus ni 'di lta bu/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid ces bya gang / /yi ge hUM ni yongs su spro/ /bsgom pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /
459a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /'di 'dra'i chos ni skye ba med/ /'dir yang 'byung ba snang ba med/ /hUM zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /skye bar yang ni snang mi
459a6(rgyud): 'gyur/ /chos nyid dag pa bden pa gang / /yang dag mtha' ni zag pa med/ /chos dbyings bstan pa dam pa ni/ /yi ge hUM du 'dir rab bsgrags/ /rdo rje yi ge hUM de
459a7(rgyud): nyid| |chos dbyings stug po bstan ba yin/ /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /rdo rje gang yin de nyid hUM/ /chos nyid dag pa 'di lta bu/ /rdo rje ye shes yid 'ong ba/ /sangs
459b1(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi snying po che/ /rdo rje bdag gi lag na gnas/ /de bas rdo rje can kun gyi/ /gsang ba'i rnal 'byor thams cad dang / /yi ge hUM la sbyor ba yis/ /spros med rnal 'byor
459b2(rgyud): bsam par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /snying ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ /zla ba de la zla ba gnyis/ /dbus su zla ba rab bsgom bya/ /zla ba'i dbus su rdo rje ni/ /mkhas
459b3(rgyud): pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje'i dbus su yi ge hUM/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgom bya/ /de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ /lus kun rab tu bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad bzlas
459b4(rgyud): pa yis/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid myur du thob/ /hUM/ rdo rje hUM mdzad bsgom pa rdzogs so// //hUM gi sbyor ba ji bzhin du/ /yi ge thams cad rnam par bsgom/ /sems dpa'
459b5(rgyud): chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ /yi ge bcu drug dag pa yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yi ge hUM/ /gang phyir sangs rgyas rigs byung ba/ /rdo rje can dag kun gyi hUM/ /drag po gcod kun rab
459b6(rgyud): tu bsgom/ /oM ni rin chen yang dag ldan/ /hrI ni pad+mar yang dag ldan/ /yi ge a ni sna tshogs brjod/ /de lta bur yang bsgom par bya/ /hUM ni sangs rgyas rdo rje dag /trAM ni
459b7(rgyud): rdo rje snying po ste/ /yi ge hrIHni rdo rje bstan/ /sna tshogs rdo rje yi ge a/ /hUM ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /rdo rje rgyal po yi ge dza/ /ho ni rdo rje chags pa ste/ /rdo rje legs pa yi ge
460a1(rgyud): @#/ /sa| |oM ni rdo rje rin chen te/ /rdo rje gzi brjid yi ge a/ /trAM ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan te/ /rdo rje bzhad pa yi ge ha/ /yi ge hrIHni rdo rje spyan/ /rdo rje rnon
460a2(rgyud): po yi ge d+hI/ /oM ni rdo rje 'khor lo ste/ /rdo rje smra ba yi ge sa/ /yi ge kaM ni rdo rje las/ /rdo rje bsrung ba yi ge haM/ /hUM ni rdo rje gnod sbyin ste/ /rdo rje khu tshur yi ge baM/ /gang dang gang
460a3(rgyud): la 'dod pa nyid/ /snying gar de bzhin bsgom par bya/ /yi ge hUM ni rnal 'byor pa/ /de ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa yis/ /gzugs gcig
460a4(rgyud): rnam par spro bar bya/ /yi ge hUM bzlas tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rang bdag nyid ni bsgom
460a5(rgyud): par bya/ /bdag nyid rdo rje'i gzugs su ste/ /rdo rje gcig ni rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje'i dbus kyi lte bar ni/ /de ru yi ge hUM bsgom bya/ /theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus/ /
460a6(rgyud): ji bzhin mdo yi rjes 'brangs nas/ /ji bzhin rgyal po skyes bur bcas/ /yi ge hUM ni dang por bcas/ /de bzhin yid kun rnal 'byor pas/ /snying ga ru ni bsgom par
460a7(rgyud): bya| |bdag nyid rdo rje'i gzugs su ste/ /dbus su yi ge hUM bsgom bya/ /de bzhin yi ge thams cad kyang / /rnal 'byor pas ni snying gar bsgom/ /zla ba'i gzugs las
460b1(rgyud): yang dag gnas/ /bdag nyid yongs su bsgom bya zhing / /rigs kyi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gang 'ga' zhig /gang dang
460b2(rgyud): gang zhig mngon 'dod pa/ /rig pa de ni snying gar bsgom/ /yi ge hUM ni dang por sbyar/ /gang phyir de las rtogs pa 'byung / /de bzhin yid kun rnal 'byor pas/ /snying
460b3(rgyud): gar bsgoms pas bsgom par bya/ /yang na nam mkha'i sbyor ba yis/ /yi ge hUM ni dang por sbyar/ /nam mkha'i rang bzhin bsgom bya zhing / /yi ge dag ni thams cad
460b4(rgyud): sbyar/ /yang na nam mkha'i zla dbus su/ /gnas pa'i yi ge hUM bsgom bya/ /bdag nyid rigs kyi lha mor bsam/ /skad cig de la rab 'grub 'gyur/ /hUM ni ji skad bstan pa
460b5(rgyud): bzhin/ /sngags kun rab tu bsgom par bya/ /rig pa kun gyi gsang ba ni/ /rgyud kun yang dag bsdus pa ste/ /bzlas pa'i gsang ba nges sbas pa/ /gsang ba 'di ni rnam pa drug /
460b6(rgyud): rig 'dzin rnams kyi snying po dang / /rnal 'byor rgyud ni bsdus pa dang / /don yod shin tu rmad 'byung ba/ /gsang ba las kyang mchog gsang bshad/ /bzlas brjod tsam gyi
460b7(rgyud): sbyor ba yis/ /lta ba'i ri bo 'joms par 'gyur/ /rang gi snying ga'i dbus su ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de dbus su/ /zla ba gnyis pa
461a1(rgyud): @#/ /bsgom par bya/ /dbugs 'byung rdub pa gang yin pa/ /rdo rje yi ge hUM du bsgom/ /me bsrubs pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /steng dang 'og tu rgyu bar bya/ /
461a2(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag gnas/ /dbus su yi ge hrIHbsgom bya/ /steng 'og 'gro ba bsgom par bya/ /yi ge hUM ni de sbyar nas/ /ji ltar shing skam gtsub stan
461a3(rgyud): pa| |gtsub shing yang dag sbyor ba yis/ /rtsol ba byas pa tsam gyis ni/ /skad cig gis ni me 'byung bzhin/ /yi ge a ni gtsub stan te/ /yi ge hUM ni gtsub shing yin/ /
461a4(rgyud): rgyu ba'i rnal 'byor pa yis ni/ /skad cig gis ni ye shes skye/ /shes rab pha rol phyin ye shes/ /yi ge hrIHru 'dir brjod bya/ /byang chub sems ni yi ge hUM/ /me yi
461a5(rgyud): sbyor bas bsrub par bya/ /bsrubs pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /ye shes dam pa skye bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje de ni bsreg bya ste/ /rdo rje ye shes bla na med/ /b+ha ga sangs rgyas
461a6(rgyud): kun shes rab/ /ling ga rdo rjer brjod par bya/ /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /b+ha ga ling gar rab tu bsgrub/ /b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas ni/ /mdo sde gsang dbang
461a7(rgyud): las gsungs so/ /b+ha ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /mkhas pas ling ga gzhug par bya/ /gsang ba gzi brjid chen po 'di/ /me bsrub pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /'ga'
461b1(rgyud): zhig gis ni 'di bsgrubs na/ /skad cig gis ni ye shes skye/ /bzlas pa gsang ba rnam pa bdun rdzogs so// //sbas pa gsang brgyud chen po/ /'di nyid rnal
461b2(rgyud): 'byor kun tu bsdus/ /de nyid chen po bsdus pa ni/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya/ /zla ba gang ba yang dag gnas/ /bdag nyid rdo rjer bsgom par bya/ /de yis dbus
461b3(rgyud): su rdo rje ste/ /rdo rdze rigs kyi bzlas pa bya/ /zla ba gang ba la gnas par/ /bdag nyid pad+mar bsgom par bya/ /de yi dbus su pad+ma de/ /pad+ma'i rigs kun bzlas par bya/ /zla ba
461b4(rgyud): gang ba la gnas par/ /bdag nyid nor bur bsgom par bya/ /de yi dbus su rin chen dang / /rin chen rigs kyi bzlas pa bya/ /bdag nyid rdo rje gcig pu ni/ /rdo rje rnon por
461b5(rgyud): rab tu bsgom/ /de yi las kyi rigs mchog la/ /las kyi rigs kun bzlas par bya/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran nas brtsams te/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam par
461b6(rgyud): bsgom/ /de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni/ /sangs rgyas rigs kun bzlas par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs chen po/ /sems dpa' gcig ni rnam par bsgom/ /
461b7(rgyud): de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni/ /rdo rje rigs kun bzlas par bya/ /pad+ma'i sems dpa' chen po'i gzugs/ /'jig rten dbang phyug rnam par bsgom/ /de yi thugs kar
462a1(rgyud): @#/ /zhugs nas ni/ /pad+ma'i rigs kun bzlas par bya/ /nor bu rin chen skal ba che/ /rdo rje rin chen rnam par bsgom/ /de yi thugs kar zhugs nas
462a2(rgyud): ni| |rin chen rigs kun bzlas par bya/ /sems dpa' chen po rdo rje las/ /sems dpa'i gzugs ni rnam par bsgom/ /de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni/ /las kyi rigs
462a3(rgyud): kun bzlas par bya/ /bden pa dam tshig mchog gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab grol byed/ /thos pa tsam gyis thabs chen po/ /yang na snying kar rdor rang bzhin/ /
462a4(rgyud): sna tshogs bdag po bzlas brjod mtshungs/ /shes rab can gyis gang bsam pa/ /phun sum tshogs kun bde bar thob/ /gsang ba yang dag bshad par bya/ /sangs rgyas
462a5(rgyud): gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya/ /de yi thugs kar 'jug bya zhing / /yid kyis thams cad bcu gnas ni/ /de yi sku ni mtshungs par spro/ /de yi thugs ka'i dbus su ni/ /rdo rje'i
462a6(rgyud): rigs ni rab tu bshad/ /ji bzhin sngon gyi rjes 'brang nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spro/ /de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas na/ /the
462a7(rgyud): tshom med par sangs rgyas kun/ /skad cig de nyid kyis 'grub 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i mda' ni zhi ba 'di/ /'di lta bu yi gzugs bsgom bya/ /de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni/ /rdo
462b1(rgyud): rje'i gar dang mtshungs par bsgom/ /de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje'i rigs can thams cad ni/ /the tshom med par dngos grub kun/ /ye shes bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /
462b2(rgyud): pad+ma'i sems dpa' bsgom bya zhing / /thugs kar ji bzhin 'jug par bya/ /sna tshogs thabs ni rab bsgoms na/ /pad+ma'i rigs can 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje rin chen bsgom
462b3(rgyud): bya zhing / /thugs kar ji bzhin 'jug par bya/ /rin chen mdzod ni bcug nas su/ /yang dang yang du spro bar bya/ /de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje rin chen dga' chen po/ /the
462b4(rgyud): tshom med par dngos grub kun/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir/ /rdo rje las su rnam par bsam/ /de yi thugs kar zhugs
462b5(rgyud): nas ni/ /sna tshogs rnam 'phrul spro bar bya/ /de lta bu yi sbyor ba yi/ /sna tshogs mdzod ni rab spros nas/ /the tshom med par dngos grub kun/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par
462b6(rgyud): 'gyur/ /shin tu gsang ba 'di lta ni/ /bzlas pa gsang ba bla na med/ /de lta bu yis sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /bzlas pa'i cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di/ /
462b7(rgyud): rgyud kyi snying po kun bsdus shing / /nyon mongs thams cad rab 'joms la/ /rig pa 'dzin pas bzlas par bya/ /bzlas pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs
463a1(rgyud): @#/ /nges par blang / /gal te 'di ni dngos grub 'dod/ /rnal 'byor pa yis brtul zhugs bya/ /bzlas brjod sbyin sreg cho ga ni/ /rnal 'byor mchog tu
463a2(rgyud): brtson par bya/ /theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa/ /bye pa gsum ni yongs su bzla/ /bye ba gsum ni bzlas byas nas/ /sgrub pa dag ni brtsam par bya/ /byang chub sems ni
463a3(rgyud): dga' chen po/ /shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bri/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /sems can gcig gis yang dag bri/ /gang phyir rgyal po mchog gsang dbang / /rdo
463a4(rgyud): rje mchog ni rab ster byed/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis/ /de ni sngon du yang dag brtsam/ /shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bri/ /khru ni bcu par yang dag bri/ /gru bzhi pa
463a5(rgyud): la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /ka ba brgyad dang yang dag ldan/ /dar gyi chun pos rnam bar brgyan/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /kha khyer dag
463a6(rgyud): gis shin tu spras/ /rin chen dra bas yongs su bres/ /gser skud dril bu g.yer khas brgyan/ /sgo khyud dang ni mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje 'ching bas rab tu bcing / /
463a7(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen rab tu bkod/ /rdo rje thig gis thig btab ba/ /dri yi sbyor ba'i cho ga dang / /phur bus bgegs ni bsal bya zhing / /tshon rtsi lnga yi srang bu ni/ /rdo rje gsang
463b1(rgyud): bas bsrung bar bya/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /ji skad sngar bshad de nyid ni/ /rdo rje gsang ba yongs su bkod/ /rdo rje gsang ba yongs
463b2(rgyud): bkod nas/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rab mdzes la/ /'khor lo'i dbus su rab tu dgod/ /rdo rje chags pa yongs su dgod/ /tshon rtsi lnga ni rab tu
463b3(rgyud): dbye| |ji skad gsang rgyud las gsungs bzhin/ /dkar po sna tshogs 'od 'bar ba/ /sngon po ser po shin tu 'bar/ /bcod sogs dang ni rab tu ldan/ /'od zer dmar po sna
463b4(rgyud): tshogs ldan/ /sna tshogs tshon rtsis bri bar bya/ /'od zer dmar po sna tshogs 'bar/ /rdo rje 'khor lo yongs bkod nas/ /zla ba gang bar rab bgod do/ /'khor lo thams
463b5(rgyud): cad yongs su bzung / /kha dog ji bzhin rigs pa bzhin/ /ji ltar mdzes shing shin tu dkar/ /ji bzhin zla ba nya ba mtshungs/ /zla ba gang ba yang dag bri/ /zla ba gang ba'i
463b6(rgyud): dbus su ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bri/ /gang gis mtshan ni bzung ba yis/ /skad cig gis ni sdig las grol/ /'dzum pa dang bcas zla ba'i mdog /shin tu
463b7(rgyud): chags pa dga' chen po/ /myur du rdo rje'i tshig brjod de/ /rdo rje nyid kyi snying po yin/ /oM mahA su kha badzra satwa hUM dzaHhUM baM hoH/ rdo rje'i glu ni blang bya zhing / /byang chub sems
464a1(rgyud): @#/ /dpa'i spyod pa che/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab ster byed/ /'dod pa'i chags pa yang dag dran/ /thams cad rjes chags bde ba thugs mchog
464a2(rgyud): mnga'/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba mchog /kye khyod bde chen bstan pas 'phel mdzad pa/ /rab tu myur du sgrub pa 'grub par mdzod/ /rdo rje'i glu ni de lta bu/ /blang zhing
464a3(rgyud): 'khor lo spyan drang bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /rjes su chags shing rab 'grub 'gyur/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung yang dag gnas/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul 'chang ba'i
464a4(rgyud): mchog / rol pa dang bcas spyan g.yo ba/ /bsnyems tshul chen po dga' ba che/ /g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje ni/ /thugs ka ru ni 'dzin pa'i mchog /g.yon pa dril bu
464a5(rgyud): yang dag ldan/ /slar yang bsnyems tshul dang bcas pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje che/ /rgyal po chen po thub pa che/ /spyod pa chen po theg pa che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag
464a6(rgyud): grub mdzod/ /rin chen chen po rdo rje che/ /rgyal mtshan chen po dran pa che/ /sangs rgyas dran pa rdo rje che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba
464a7(rgyud): che| |bde ba chen po bla na med/ /sa dang pha rol phyin bde ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /shes rab chen po rdo rje che/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad las byung ba/ /byang chub sems
464b1(rgyud): ni rdo rje che/ /rdo rje sems ni rdo rje che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /rdo rje chen po chags pa che/ /rgyal po chen po thub pa che/ /don yod rgyal po rdo rje mchog /rdo rje sems dpa'
464b2(rgyud): bdag grub mdzod/ /chos kyi srid pa 'khor lo che/ /smra ba'i las ni bla na med/ /bsrung zhing bsrung ba drag po che/ /rdo rje khu tshur bdag grub mdzod/ /rdo rje yi ni glu 'di yis/ /de nyid mchog
464b3(rgyud): tu bskul nas ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /'dod chags chen po dga' ba che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom bya zhing / /rdo rje sems dpa'
464b4(rgyud): rgyal po che/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor dgod par bya/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma dang mtshungs par/ /dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag bri/ /de nas rdo rje bltas nas ni/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad
464b5(rgyud): gdon par bya/ /chos kyi rig pa 'dzin pa ni/ /dbab dang gzhug pa la sogs pa/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis/ /las rnams thams cad yang dag bya/ /bum pa la sogs yo
464b6(rgyud): byad dang / /spos dang me tog la sogs mchog /rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis/ /las rnams thams cad yang dag bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rig pa yis/ /bum pa brgya rtsa
464b7(rgyud): brgyad bzlas na/ /de ni zhabs kyi drung bzhag na/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu ru 'gyur/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis/ /cho ga ji bzhin 'jug bya zhing / /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ches/ /
465a1(rgyud): @#/ /bdag nyid la ni dbang bskur bya/ /hUM gis yang dag zhugs nas ni/ /rdo rje mchod pas yang dag mchod/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /ci rigs
465a2(rgyud): par ni bsgrub par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang bar gnas/ /phyag rgya chen po yongs su gzung / /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /rang bdag nyid ni bsgrub par bya/ /de nas
465a3(rgyud): gsang ba phyag rgya che/ /skad cig re re bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /brtan par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /gsang ba'i rnal 'byor bsgrubs nas ni/ /shin tu
465a4(rgyud): brtan pa bla med pa/ /rjes chags sems dpa' chen po ni/ /skad cig gis ni bsgrub par bya/ /de 'dra'i mchog tu gsang ba mthar phyin pa/ /sems dpa' rgyal chen yongs
465a5(rgyud): su dag pa mchog / dag pa'i tshul 'di cung zad mtshungs pa med/ /rjes chags 'dod chags yongs su dag pa mchog /rdo rje rgyal mchog rab dag dri ma med/ /gsang
465a6(rgyud): ba las byung 'khor lo dam pa 'dzin/ /rig pa'i gsang sngags tshul 'di byang chub byed/ /snying rje dang ldan spyod pa spyod byed pa/ /de bzhin rab 'jigs sdug bsngal chen
465a7(rgyud): po'i pha rol phyin gyur pa/ /mchog tu mkhas shing pra ba rgyud dang rgyud dag las byung ba/ /de ru srid pa dag gi dra ba chen po gcod mdzad pa/ /gsang sngags 'khor lo
465b1(rgyud): las byung gsang ba de 'dra bshad/ /gsang rigs mchog tu byung ba'i 'khor lo ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dgongs pa gcig /sras kyi gtso bo dbang sgyur rgyal po
465b2(rgyud): ste| |de yis thar pa'i grong khyer rab tu bshad/ /gsang ba rnal 'byor chen po de kho na nyid dam pa mchog tu gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdo rje rtse mo las/ de bzhin gshegs
465b3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi mdo sde gsang ba'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa ste le'u gnyis pa rdzogs so/ / //de nas rnal 'byor
465b4(rgyud): gsang ba che/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kun bsdus pa/ /chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa'i mchog /nam mkha' sna tshogs dngos ldan pa/ /ri dbang rgyal po chen po ste/ /sangs
465b5(rgyud): rgyas kyi ni sprul pa sprul/ /rdo rje dbang po chen po'i gnas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag 'dus/ /rdo rje rgyal po rtse mo ste/ /gsang ba'i rnal 'byor yang dag byung / /rdo rje
465b6(rgyud): 'dzin pa rgyal po che/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mtshungs/ /rdo rje kun gyis rab mdzes pa/ /mchog tu gyur pa'i gnas de ru/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che/ /rnal 'byor
465b7(rgyud): pa ni mi gsung bzhugs/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung yang dag bzhugs/ /gtso bos chos kun dbang du 'gyur/ /rol bcas rdo rje bsnyems tshul ldan/ /rdo rje sems
466a1(rgyud): @#/ /dpa' dga' ba che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas gcig ste/ /chos pa chen po'i rnal 'byor mchog /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ni/ /thub
466a2(rgyud): pa'i dbang phyug la gsol btab/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dga' chen po/ /sems dpa' byang sems las byung ba/ /rang gi rigs 'byung
466a3(rgyud): bshad du gsol/ /rdo rje 'chang ba rgyal po ste/ /rgyud kyi snying po gsang ba che/ /gsang ba chen po rigs kyi dbang / /mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po ste/ /theg pa chen po mngon
466a4(rgyud): bsdus pa/ /zhi bas byang chub 'grub 'gyur te/ /thams cad yang dag bsdus pa min/ /gtum po thams cad rab 'joms pa/ /rang rigs rtag tu bshad du gsol/ /rdo rje
466a5(rgyud): 'chang ba rgyal po ste/ /kun tu mi gsung bzhugs par gyur/ /mi gsung gsang ba ma gsungs te/ /zhi ba'i bde ba la bzhugs gyur/ /gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa mchog/
466a6(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po snyoms par bzhugs/ /rtog cing gzigs par mi mdzad de/ /gsang ba'i rnal 'byor bzhugs par gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ni/ /chos kyi
466a7(rgyud): dbyings ni brtan par mdzad/ /sangs rgyas gcig bzhin yang dag 'gyur/ /don yod grub pa bla na med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rnal 'byor che/ /gsang ba kun las yang
466b1(rgyud): dag byung / /rdo rje'i sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdo rje can la bskul bar gsungs/ /oM badzra satwa u tiSh+Tha/ /rdo rje bskul ba gsungs pa na/ /chos dbyings sangs rgyas gcig pu
466b2(rgyud): nyid| |gsang ba'i rnal 'byor ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bzhengs par gyur/ /thub pas mgon rnams la btud nas/ /tshig ni 'di skad gsungs par gyur/ /rnam pa
466b3(rgyud): kun tu ci zhig bgyi/ /bdag la sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs/ /phyag na rdo rje brtan pa la/ /de nas sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs/ /gsang ba rdo rje rigs zhes pa/ /rigs kyi
466b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung thos nas/ /rdo rje dbang po'i gnas snang byed/ /rab tu btud nas tshig gsungs pa/ /mgon po rnal 'byor gzigs
466b5(rgyud): su gsol/ /bdag gi snod dang ldan pa'i mchog /'di na sems can 'ga' yang med/ /gang phyir mu stegs la chags shing / /skye dgu lta ba'i dri mas khyab/ /sems can 'di
466b6(rgyud): dag gdul bya min/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi snod ma yin/ /log pa'i lam du yang dag zhugs/ /mun pa stug po la gzhol ba/ /la la lha mi lta la chags/ /kha cig brtul
466b7(rgyud): zhugs lta ba'i gnas/ /kha cig dka' thub gdungs pas 'khrul/ /nyon mongs pas ni 'khrug pa'i sems/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la chags/ /skyo bar yang ni mi 'gyur te//
467a1(rgyud): @#/ /rdo rje rigs kyi gsang 'di la/ /nam yang sbyor ba mi 'gyur ro/ /de dag 'dod chags che la chags/ /'dod pa'i chags pa dag las rgyal/ /sangs
467a2(rgyud): rgyas byang chub chags bral ba/ /gsang ba 'di la spyor mi 'gyur/ /lta ba'i chags pas rgyal bar 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i chags pas lta ba can/ /srid pa'i zhags pas shin tu
467a3(rgyud): chags/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa la chags bral/ /nga rgyal lhag pa'i nga rgyal bcing / /gdug cing drag la shin tu khro/ /snying rje med cing brtse med 'gyur/ /de la gsang ba rung
467a4(rgyud): ma yin/ /rmongs pa kun mkhyen yin snyam pa/ /ye shes chen po la mkhas pa/ /gsang ba 'di ni rung ma yin/ /'dren pa ji ltar bshad par bgyi/ /gnod sbyin dang ni srin
467a5(rgyud): po nyid/ /sha za 'byung po gsang ba pa/ /lha la sogs pa gdug chen po/ /bstan pa la ni 'jug mi 'gyur/ /nga ni sangs rgyas rab tu zhi/ /byang chub sems ni dga' chen
467a6(rgyud): po| |sems can 'di dag shin tu gdug / bdag gi tshig ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /nga ni rgyal chen theg chen la/ /nam mkha' dbyings bzhin rab tu yang / /kye ma sems can
467a7(rgyud): 'di dag dman/ /bdag gi tshig ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /nga ni theg chen dag pa ste/ /nyon mongs 'dam gyis gos pa med/ /kye ma'o sems can 'di nyon mongs/ /bdag gi
467b1(rgyud): tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur/ /nga ni shes rab ye shes che/ /theg pa che la shin tu brtan/ /kye ma'o sems can shes rab ngan/ /bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur/ /bsod nams
467b2(rgyud): chen po ye shes che/ /nga ni mchod pa chen po'i tshogs/ /kye ma'o sems can bsod nams chung / /bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur/ /sems can 'di dag nye bar 'tshe/ /
467b3(rgyud): 'jigs pa sna tshogs kun tu khyab/ /rnam rtog gis bskyod shes rab ngan/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi snod ma yin/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ /bdag po chen po dbang phyug
467b4(rgyud): kyang / /rmongs pa kun sel nyid gyur pa/ /stobs chen rdzu 'phrul chen po ste/ /de la rgyal po grogs byed yod/ /sgyu ma'i sngags ni yongs su 'dzin/ /de ni mi rgyud ces bya ste/ /
467b5(rgyud): sems can rmongs byed lhur len pa/ /da ni rgyal po lha chen po/ /gtso bo rgyal po chen po mtshungs/ /de ni dbang phyug che zhes bya/ /gdug pa'i sems can 'joms byed pa/ /de
467b6(rgyud): yi gzugs can rgyal po che/ /skyed byed byed pa po bdag po/ /tshangs pa chen po rgyal po che/ /lta ba sna tshogs rab ster ba/ /'dod pa'i khams kyi rgyal po che/ /dbang po zhes bya sha
467b7(rgyud): tsi'i bdag / brtson 'grus dbang phyug chen po'i bu/ /gdong drug rdzu 'phrul chen po can/ /dpung chen zhes bya'i ming che ste/ /gzhon nu mi pham 'od lnga ming / /rgyal po chen po 'di
468a1(rgyud): @#/ /lnga ni| |khams gsum gyi ni bdag por bshad/ /rgyal po lnga ni gzi brjid che/ /lus gsum gyi ni ngo mtshar che/ /skul byed dbang phyug chen po ni/ /
468a2(rgyud): tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/ /de yi lus can rgyal po che/ /dbang phyug chen po zhes grags pa/ /sems can gdug pa shin tu drag /sngags bcas 'khor dang bcas
468a3(rgyud): pa yi| |rgyal po lnga po de dag ni/ /sems can dag ni rnam rmongs byed/ /lta ba chen po 'dzin byed cing / /bdud kyi dbang du gyur pa ste/ /nyon mongs chen pos rab nyon mongs/ /
468a4(rgyud): gzhan yang kun nas nyon mongs byed/ /sems can dag ni 'joms byed cing / /bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur/ /dbang phyug chen po bdag nyid che/ /bdag nyid dam pa'i
468a5(rgyud): yid chen po/ /de lta bu yi rnam rtog gis/ /sems can rnam par rmongs par byed/ /tshangs pa 'byin byed skye dgu'i bdag /byed pa rang bdag byed pa po/ /lta ba chen po de lta
468a6(rgyud): bus| |sems can dag ni rnam rmongs byed/ /khyab 'jug kun song khyab byed pa/ /khyab 'jug rang bzhin grong khyer kun/ /de ltar yang dag mi 'dzin pa/ /lta ba'i 'ching ba rab
468a7(rgyud): ster byed/ /rgya cher rgyal po 'di rnams ni/ /lta bar smra la nges par ston/ /rmongs pa mkhas pa yin sems shing / /sems can 'ching bar byed pa yin/ /sems can
468b1(rgyud): de rnams gzhan gyis bskul/ /lta ba smra bar nges par sten/ /khyab 'jug tshangs pa la sogs pa/ /dbang phyug chen po phyag byed de/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rnam kun du/ /bdag gi
468b2(rgyud): tshig 'di 'grub mi byed/ /sems can 'di rnams rmongs par 'gyur/ /de la gsang ba rung ma yin/ /de lta bu yi rnam pa yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' chen po/ /sangs rgyas kun
468b3(rgyud): gyis mkhyen nas ni/ /rnal 'byor pa ni mi gsung bzhugs/ /mgon po chen po sangs rgyas kun/ /thub pa nyi ma ma lus pas/ /gsung gcig gis ni gsang ba che/ /rdo rje yi ni tshig
468b4(rgyud): gsungs pa/ /kye ma'o sems can 'di gdul dka'/ /gdug cing drag la shin tu gtum/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mi 'dul ba/ /de phyir bdag cag gsol ba 'debs/ /mgon khyod
468b5(rgyud): shes rab chen po ste/ /khyod ni thabs chen brjod par bya/ /byang chub sems ni thabs chen po/ /nyon mongs thams cad nges par 'joms/ /gdug pa thams cad rab gdul ba/ /
468b6(rgyud): mgon po khyod la gsol ba 'debs/ /gdug pa 'dul byed rnam 'phrul ba/ /thabs chen po ni rab tu gsungs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis sems can 'di/ /'dul bar mi 'gyur
468b7(rgyud): snod min la/ /thabs chen khro bo chen po ni/ /thub pa chen pos bstan du gsol/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi tshig gsan nas/ /phyag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che/ /tshig dag gis ni zhus gyur pa/ /sangs
469a1(rgyud): @#/ /rgyas kun la 'di skad gsungs/ /e ma'o gsang ba 'khor lo che/ /thabs chen bdag nyid chen po ste/ /chos kyi dbyings ni bstan pa'i dngos/ /thabs
469a2(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo rab ston pa/ /ji skad du ni bka' stsal pa/ /de bzhin du ni bdag gis bgyi/ /sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir/ /drag po nyid ni bstan par bya/ /de skad gsungs
469a3(rgyud): nas sems dpa' che/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/ /mi gsung bzhugs nas rnal 'byor gyis/ /drag po nyid la snyoms par zhugs/ /drag po'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje
469a4(rgyud): mchog / ces bya'i ting 'dzin de lta bu/ /drag po chen po snyoms par zhugs/ /de bzhin thugs ka nas byung ba/ /drag po 'jigs rung yi ge hUM/ /khro bo chen po brjod par 'gyur/ /
469a5(rgyud): rdo rje hUM mdzad khro rgyal po/ /mgon po thugs ka nas phyung gyur/ /sa gzhi ma lus g.yos gyur cing / /sa 'di dag ni sgra sgrogs gyur/ /stong gsum ma lus 'di dag ni/ /hUM hUM
469a6(rgyud): zhes bya brjod par gyur/ /tshad med gzhal du med pa yi/ /khro bo'i rgyal po byung gyur pas/ /phyogs rnams kun tu gdug chen dag /skad cig de la gtum por gyur/ /slar yang
469a7(rgyud): gcig nyid gyur nas ni/ /gang bur byas nas rab bsdams te/ /khro bo'i rgyal po sku chen po/ /'jigs su rung ba gcig tu gyur/ /de ni khro bo'i rgyal po che/ /sangs rgyas kun
469b1(rgyud): gyi grags chen po/ /khro rgyal mdun du 'dug nas ni/ /slar yang snying po rab tu brjod/ /hUM t+ya hUM t+ya/ 'jigs su rung ba'i spu langs byed/ /gnod sbyin kun bdag gnod sbyin te/ /rdo rje gnod

469b3(rgyud): rol gyi ni gdug pa can/ /ma lus dkyil 'khor las byung ba/ /rdo rje me ni rab 'bar bas/ /g.yo ba med cing shi bar gyur/ /lha chen la sogs gdug pa rnams/ /gang dag rigs gyi

469b5(rgyud): ba'i gdong can te/ /de bzhin gnag dang sngo bar gyur/ /mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal mnga' ba/ /dbu skra gyen brdzes shin tu skrag /spyan dmar spyan dang ldan pa ste/ /de bzhin rdo rje bstan
469b6(rgyud): pa'i zhal/ /drag po rdo rje drag tshogs 'dzin/ /gcig pu 'bar ba rab ldan pa/ /zhags pa lcags kyu rdo rje bdag /sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs byed pa/ /sa rnams ma lus g.yo
469b7(rgyud): bar byed/ /sa 'di yang ni g.yo bar byed/ /gnod sbyin chen po 'byung po sogs/ /g.yo ba med cing 'og tu 'gyel/ /de ni drag po gnod sbyin che/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs
470a1(rgyud): @#/ /par byed/ /de yi spyan sngar 'dug nas ni/ /ched du brjod pa yang dag brjod/ /e ma'o byang chub kyi ni sems/ /kun tu bzang po kun dge ba/ /sems
470a2(rgyud): can 'dul ba'i thabs su ni/ /brtse med khro bo nyid du gyur/ /sngar ni rdo rje sems dpa' gang / /zhi ba'i gzugs su rnam gnas pa/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin 'dzin gyur nas/ /rdo rje drag
470a3(rgyud): po zhes byar grags/ /de ni drag po rdo rje 'dzin/ /'jigs rung ba spu langs par byed/ /yi ge hUM bzhi'i phyag rgya yi/ /snying po gtum po nyid kyang gsungs/ /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/
470a4(rgyud): gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn badzra hUM phaT/ shin tu gtum zhing cher grags pa/ /de bzhin thugs ka nas byung ste/ /zhal bzhi dang ni phyag brgyad
470a5(rgyud): pa| |bskal pa yi ni me ltar drag / rdo rje dus kyi me ltar byung / /nyon mongs phyogs ni rab sreg byed/ /smin ma bskyod pas gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /de bzhin rnam par 'jigs pa'i
470a6(rgyud): gdong / /'jig rten gsum sreg dam tshig ste/ /rdo rje can kun sreg par byed/ /'bar phreng kun tu 'khrigs pa'i sgra/ /rdo rje bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya ni/ /
470a7(rgyud): phyag gnyis kyis ni yongs su bzung / /rdo rje bsdams pa 'dzin rgyal po/ /lcags kyu dang ni zhags pas brgyan/ /rdo rje yi ni lu gu rgyud/ /phyag gnyis na bsdams 'jigs rung
470b1(rgyud): zhal| |sangs rgyas thams cad sdigs byed pa/ /rdo rje gtum po yang dag byung / /drag po bka' ni nod par byed/ /myur ba ru ni bka' stsol cig /min ni sangs rgyas khyed rnams kun/ /
470b2(rgyud): the tshom med par bza' bar bya/ /de nas sangs rgyas kun gyi gsungs/ /Tak+ki dzaHhUM shin tu drag /rigs dang bcas bar lha chen po/ /stobs chen po yis dgug par gyis/ /de nas
470b3(rgyud): rig pa'i mchog rgyal po/ /bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis bzhad byed cing / /khro bo drag po rnga sgra sgrogs/ /rdo rje zhags pa bskul bar bya/ /rdo rje zhags pa drag po che/ /dpung bcas grogs
470b4(rgyud): dang bcas pa dang / /de bzhin rigs dang dkyil 'khor bcas/ /song la dbang phyug chen po khug /badzra pA sha hUM/ dbang ldan rgyal po chen po ni/ /sna tshogs rang gi 'khor na
470b5(rgyud): gnas/ /'jigs byed ma dang lhan cig tu/ /'dod pa can ni mchog tu rol/ /rdo rje zhags pa der song ste/ /khro bo'i sgra yis bsdigs par gyur/ /dbang ldan rgyal po la smras pa/ /
470b6(rgyud): khyod la ston pa spyan 'dren mdzad/ /skrag cing khros nas lha chen pos/ /'jigs pa yi ni tshig brjod pa/ /nga ni 'jig rten gsum rgyal po/ /nga las ston pa gzhan yod dam/ /rdo
470b7(rgyud): rje zhags pa khro bo ches/ /tshig ni lan gsum brjod bar gyur/ /rdo rje khro bo rgyal po che/ /khyod la shin tu spyan 'dren mdzad/ /lha chen dbang phyug chen po yis/ /slar yang la
471a1(rgyud): @#/ /gsum smras pa ni/ /nga ni kho na rgyal po rang / /nga la spyan 'dren gang zhig yod/ /de nas zhags pas bka' bzhin byed/ /khro bo drag po rab 'jigs
471a2(rgyud): pas| |yan lag thams cad bcings nas ni/ /dbang phyug chen po bkug par gyur/ /'jigs shing skrag nas lha chen po/ /shin tu smre sngags 'don cing du/ /skyabs ni
471a3(rgyud): gang yang yod ma yin/ /'jigs pa chen po kun tu byung / /stobs dang de bzhin nga rgyal gyis/ /stobs dang shugs ni bstan nas su/ /zhags pa bcad nas bros par gyur//
471a4(rgyud): rang gi gnas su song gyur nas/ /'jig rten gsum gyi lha rnams bos/ /lha dang lha min dri zar bcas/ /skad cig gis ni 'dus gyur nas/ /'khor rnams dag ni ngu bar
471a5(rgyud): gyur| |ji ltar sngon gyis ma byas pa'i/ /de lta bu ni yang dag mthong / /sems can rab drag 'di su zhig /rdo rje zhags pas mdun song ste/ /rdo rje rig pa mchog la zhus/ /dbang
471a6(rgyud): phyug chen pos bdag bcad de/ /drag po tshangs pa rab tu bros/ /rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po/ /khro bo gtum po shin tu drag /de lta bu yi tshig gsan nas/ /thams cad du
471a7(rgyud): ni 'bar bar gyur/ /khro bo rdo rje lu gu rgyud/ /drag po yis ni bka' bsgo ba/ /myur du song la lha chen po/ /rigs chen po dang bcas pa khug /khro bo'i rgyal po lu gu rgyud/ /gsan
471b1(rgyud): nas dbang phyug che gnas song / /yan lag thams cad bcings nas su/ /lha mo dang bcas kun tu bkug /skad cig 'jigs pas du byed cing / /lha rnams thams cad shin tu 'jigs/
471b2(rgyud): 'jigs pa'i sdug bsngal smre sngags 'don/ /de ring 'dren pa lha chen min/ /stobs dang shugs ni thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje kun dang 'thab par gyur/ /mthu dang stobs dang shugs kyis

471b4(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /khro bo lu gu rgyud 'ongs nas/ /rnam pa kun tu smra bar byed/ /ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /bdag cag gnas ni bros par gyur/ /khro bo rdo rje rig pa mchog /
471b5(rgyud): slar yang shin tu khros par gyur/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas rab 'bar zhing / /rdo rje drag po nyid du gyur/ /drag po ha ha zhes bzhad dgod/ /rang gi yan lag za bar byed/ /rang gi mgo la
471b6(rgyud): rdeg byed cing / /rdo rje gsor ba bskor bar 'bar/ /de lta bu yi khyad par dang / /bcas pas khro bo yang dag byung / /slar yang rang gi bdag nyid dran/ /khro bo'i rgyal po brjod par gyur//
471b7(rgyud): oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bA na badzra hUM phaT/ khro bo'i rgyal po bcas nas ni/ /yi ge dzaHni yongs su brjod/ /rdo rje lcags kyur
472a1(rgyud): @#/ /rab tu bsngags/ /stobs dang ldan pa khug la shog /oM badzra dz+wa la ag+ni sa tri Sha aM ku sha dzaHdzaH/ rdo rje 'bar ba lcags kyu ni/ /song nas phyogs kun
472a2(rgyud): bdag nyid che/ /skad cig gis ni stobs chen rnams/ /lha rnams thams cad bkug par gyur/ /rgyal po dbang phyug lnga dang ni/ /lha rnams thams cad grangs med par/ /rigs
472a3(rgyud): bcas dpung dang bcas pa nyid/ /gcig nyid du ni bsdus par gyur/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog rab tu mngags/ /chings shig stobs chen dang ldan pa/ /tshogs dang bcas pa'i lha rnams
472a4(rgyud): kun| |bcing ba lnga yis bcings par gyur/ /nang gi 'khor dang bcas pa'i tshogs/ /lha tshogs gnod sbyin srin bu dang / /lha min rlung dang 'byung po'i tshogs/ /gzhan yang
472a5(rgyud): gdug pa'i tshogs rnams ni/ /thams cad bcings par gyur nas ni/ /rdo rje zhags pa rab tu mngags/ /rdo rje lcags kyu dang bcas par/ /song la dkyil 'khor dag khug
472a6(rgyud): cig / rdo rje zhags pas mngon par chags/ /yan lag kun las yongs su sbro/ /rdo rje'i rang bzhin zhags pa ste/ /brtan par gyur par the tshom med/ /bye ba dag ni grang
472a7(rgyud): med bcu/ /rdo rje lcags kyu rab tu byung / /lha la sogs pa'i re re zhing / /spyi bo nas 'gugs yang dag sbyor/ /lha chen dbang phyug chen po yi/ /spyi bo'i gtsug tu btab nas
472b1(rgyud): ni| |rdo rje lcags kyu rgyal po yis/ /dbang phyug chen po 'gugs par byed/ /lha sogs 'khor dang bcas pa kun/ /phan tshun du ni du bar byed/ /shugs rings kun tu phyung nas ni/ /
472b2(rgyud): phan tshun du ni smra bar byed/ /kye ma'o sdug bsngal kye ma'o shi/ tshogs ni gang du khyer bar gyur/ /rdo rje 'bar ba chen po des/ /skad cig de la bsregs gyur nas/ /ri rab ri yi rtse mo ru/ /
472b3(rgyud): lha la sogs pa thams cad bkug /gnas de ru ni thams cad dag /yongs su bskor nas kun tu gnas/ /rdo rje kha khyer phyi rol tu/ /lha rnams de dag thams cad gnas/ /rdo rje
472b4(rgyud): ra ba'i phyi rol du/ /lha la sogs pa thams cad bkug /phyi rol rdo rje ra ba ni/ /lcags bsregs rang bzhin rdo rje mtshungs/ /rdo rje can gyi rdor 'bar mes/ /nang nas shin tu
472b5(rgyud): gdungs par 'gyur/ /lha tshogs sems can de dag kyang / /'jigs su rung ba'i 'o dod 'bod/ /stong gsum 'di dag thams cad kyang / /hUM hUM sgra ni yongs su brjod/ /'o dod
472b6(rgyud): bos nas smra bar byed/ /ngan song dag ni ci zhig byed/ /sngon ma mthong ba 'di ci zhig /'dir ni rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas rgyal po de/ /slar yang thugs rje kun tu
472b7(rgyud): skyes| |thams cad bcings pa las bkrol te/ /rdo rje me yi nye bar mdzes/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po che/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor nas phyung ste/ /lha la sogs pa kun bos te/ /nga
473a1(rgyud): @#/ /yi tshig 'di rab tu nyon/ /de nas lha rgyal la sogs pa/ /khyod ni sku yin smra bar byed/ /nged kyis khyod ni sngar ma mthong / /gnas mchog 'di yang
