479a6(rgyud): cad mkhyen/ /bdag nyid chen po 'di yis ni/ /srog gi rgyu ni zad pa dang / /de nyid nyams par ci phyir byed/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas thugs rjes bskul ba yin//
479a7(rgyud): rdo rje tsho yis bya ba ste/ /rdo rje'i rig pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra A yuH/rig pa 'di ni brjod pa yis/ /dbang phyug chen pos yang dag langs/ /rdo rje che yis gson byas nas//
479b1(rgyud): bde ba chen po thob par gyur/ /rnam par snang mdzad thub chen la/ /zhabs dag la ni btud nas gsol/ /mgon po bcom ldan skyabs su gsol/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa de gdug min/ /
479b2(rgyud): kun mkhyen bcom ldan bka' stsal pa/ /nga yis brtse bar bya mi nus/ /'di ni gdug pa shin tu drag /de nyid la ni skyabs su song / /rdo rje khro bos lha chen po/ /kun tu bos nas 'di
479b3(rgyud): skad smras/ /nga yis bstan pa'i bka' dag ni/ /gdug pa chen po mnyan par gyis/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin bdag chen la/ /lha chen po yis slar smras pa/ /'chi ba chen po bzod nus
479b4(rgyud): kyi| / khyod kyi bka' la gnas mi byed/ /rdo rje khro bo drag po che/ /khros pas gdug pa 'phel gyur nas/ /hUM ni shin tu 'jigs byed pa/ /snying po drag po brjod par gyur/ /hUM| yi ge
479b5(rgyud): hUM ni brjod pa yis/ /dbang phyug chen po slar yang 'gyel/ /rdo rje khro bo drag po cha/ /rkang par bkug pa yang dag brjod/ /oM pA ta A kaR+Sha Na badzra hUM/ /de nas rdo rje dbang po 'di/ /brjod pas rdo rje
479b6(rgyud): khro bo byung / /tshig ni 'di skad brjod par 'gyur/ /bka' stsal brjod cing 'od chen po/ /rdo rje khro bos bka' stsal pa/ /oM pA ta A kaR+Sha ya sarba badzra d+ha ra ka tsa ra phaT badzra hUM dzaH/ /khro bo chen pos
479b7(rgyud): 'di gsungs nas/ /dbang phyug chen po u mar bcas/ /rkang pas 'gug pa'i rdo rje yis/ /rdo rje rkang pa dag gis bkug /rdo rje khro bos de dag bkug /steng du rkang pa 'og tu mgo /'jig rten
480a1(rgyud): @#/ /thams cad dgod gyur cing / /rdo rje gdung bas gdungs par gyur/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /dbang phyug chen po u mar bcas/ /zhabs kyis mnan
480a2(rgyud): nas rdo rje yis/ /dbang phyug chen po rdeg par byed/ /des ni rkang ba g.yon pa yis/ /dbang phyug chen pa mnan byas nas/ /g.yas pas lha mo u ma yi/ /nu ma dag gi bar du
480a3(rgyud): btsir/ /rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni/ /dbang phyug chen po rab tu mnan/ /oM badzra A kra ma hoH/ /slar yang dbab pa'i rig pa ni/ /rdo rje khro bos yang dag brjod/ /oM badzra A
480a4(rgyud): bi sha ha na ha na tra Ta/ /dbang phyug chen po bcas gyur pas/ /rang gi lag pas lan stong du/ /rang gdong 'jigs su rung la brdeg /stong phrag gcig tu yang dag gyur/ /'jig
480a5(rgyud): rten gsum gnas thams cad ni/ /'o dod chen po 'bod par gyur/ /bdag cag gi ni rgyal po 'di/ /'di lta bu yi bdag nyid gyur/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /brtse dang snying rje
480a6(rgyud): skyes par 'gyur/ /snying rje steng du gzhug bya ste/ /sangs rgyas byams pa yang dag brjod/ /oM bud+d+ha mai tri rak+Sha/ dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin gtso bos/ /de nas sngags 'di gsungs
480a7(rgyud): pa yis/ /dbang phyug chen po'i sdug bsngal de/ /skad cig de la nye bar zhi/ /phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs dag gis/ /reg pas dbang phyug chen pos ni/ /sa chen po ni yang dag 'thob//
480b1(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs de bzhin/ /tha mal pa yi lus bor nas/ /rdo rje 'dzin la phul bar gyur/ /lha chen 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ /shi zhing lus ni bor nas su/ /gang+gA sum cu rtsa gnyis
480b2(rgyud): gnyis kyi/ /bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing dang mnyam/ /thal bas g.yogs pa'i gnas zhes pa/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni yid 'ong ba/ /de ru song nas lha chen po/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang bstan
480b3(rgyud): par gyur/ /thal ba'i dbang phyug sgra dbyangs can/ /de bzhin gshegs pa der gnas gyur/ /de nas shi ba'i lus de yis/ /ched du brjod pa yang dag brjod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu yis
480b4(rgyud): ni/ /tshigs bcad gcig ni mngon par brjod/ /e ma 'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med/ /bsad nas skad cig dag gis ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas dgod
480b5(rgyud): mdzed/ /rdo rje khro bo rgyal po ches/ /dbang phyug chen po yang dag phyung / /khyab 'jug la sogs lha rnams la/ /kun tu bos nas 'di gsungs pa/ /rab mchog dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni/ /
480b6(rgyud): gtso bo rab tu gzhugs par gyis/ /gal te de bzhin mi byed na/ /dbang phyug chen po bzhin du bya/ /de nas lha kun 'jigs gyur te/ /skrag nas thams cad kyis zhus pa/ /de bzhin du ni
480b7(rgyud): bgyid par 'tshal/ /bdag cag khyed kyi bran du gyur/ /rgyal po khyed kyi dam tshig ni/ /ji ltar bsgrub par mi bgyid lags/ /bdag cag rnams ni khyod kyi 'khor/ /skal ba chen po bka'
481a1(rgyud): @#/ /stsol cig /rdo rje khro bos bka' stsal pa/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /skyabs su rab tu 'gro bar gyis/ /byang sems yang dag bskyed nas
481a2(rgyud): ni| |sems can kun la yang dag sbyor/ /srog gcod pa ni spang bar gyis/ /rku dang brdzun du smra ba dang / /gzhan gyi chung ma de bzhin du/ /de ni dang por spang bar gyis/ /sems
481a3(rgyud): can gnod dang ldan pa ni/ /ci nas kyang ni mi bya'o/ /byang chub spyod pa rab sbyor ba/ /de la lhod min brtson par bya/ /nga yi bstan ba'i bka' yi ni/ /'di dag dam tshig yang
481a4(rgyud): dag brjod/ /nga yi tshig ni mnyan par gyis/ /min na khyod ni kun tu sreg /de nas 'jig rten gsum 'khor los/ /de yi tshig ni blangs nas kyang / /byang sems yang dag bskyed
481a5(rgyud): nas ni/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song / /rdo rje khro bo rgyal po ches/ /kun tu phyag rgya byin nas kyang / /phyag rgya snying po 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje ti rin ti ri yi/ /dkyil 'khor
481a6(rgyud): du ni bcug gyur pas/ /oM badzra sa ma ya gr-ih+Na bud+d+ha sa ma ye badzra sa twa sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya traM/ dr-i D+ho ma b+ha ba/ a pra ti ha ro me b+ha ba/ sarba karma su tsa me
481a7(rgyud): tsit+taM shri yaH/ /ku ru ha ha ha ha hU/ de nas brjod pa tsam gyis ni/ /phyag rgya kun tu babs par gyur/ /rdo rje ti rin ti ri yi/ /phyag rgya kun tu bstan par gyur/ /de dag rim bzhin
481b1(rgyud): bcug nas ni/ /rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur gyur/ /rdo rje mtshan ma lag byin nas/ /rdo rje ming ni dbang bskur gyur/ /de la lha rnams thams cad ni/ /rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur 'gyur/
481b2(rgyud): sngon la 'jig rten gsum bdag po/ /go rims bzhin du dbang bskur 'gyur/ /khyab 'jug ces byar gnas par ni/ /sgyu ma'i rdo rje zhes byar grags/ /gzhon nu rdo rje dril bu ste/ /
481b3(rgyud): tshangs pa rdo rje thub pa nyid/ /dbang po rdo rje mtshon cha nyid/ /de dag rig pa'i bdag por bshad/ /rgyal po bzhi po gzi brjid che/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs chen pos/ /bar snang la ni rgyu
481b4(rgyud): ba nyid/ /rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur gyur/ /nyi ma rdo rje 'khyil ba ste/ /de bzhin zla ba rdo rje 'od/ /dbyig chen rdo rje dbyig to ste/ /ser skya rdo rje ser skya yin/ /de la sogs pa khro rgyal
481b5(rgyud): po| |rdo rje khro bor dbang bskur gyur/ /de nas mkha' spyod lha rnams ni/ /rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur gyur/ /myos chen rdo rje myos pa ste/ /rdo rje phreng ba sbrang rtsi byed/ /rnam par rgyal
481b6(rgyud): dang rgyal byed dang / /rdo rje shis dang rgyal bar ldan/ /tshogs kyi rgyal po bdag po dag /ces bya la sogs dbang bskur gyur/ /de nas sal gnas pa rnams/ /rdo rje'i ming gis
481b7(rgyud): dbang bskur gyur/ /gtun shing mdzod ni bsrung ba ste/ /me ni de bzhin rdo rje me/ /rdo rje rlung ni rlung chen po/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed ngan rdo rje/ /de 'dra la sogs pho nya rnams/ /rdo rje mchog
482a1(rgyud): @#/ /gi dbang bskur gyur/ /de nas sa 'og gnas pa ni/ /rdo rje lcags kyu rkang za ba/ /de bzhin gshin rje rdo rje nag /sa yi gtsug ni bgegs rdo rje/ /chu lha mgon
482a2(rgyud): po rdo rje 'dzin/ /de nas lha mo ji bzhin du/ /go rims bzhin du dbang bskur gyur/ /rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur gyis/ /yum gyi mchog rnams dbang bskur gyur/ /khyab 'jug ma ni rdo
482a3(rgyud): rje gser/ /drug ldan rdo rje gzhon nu ma/ /tshangs pa rdo rje brgyad cu ma/ /dbang po rdo rje khu tshur ma/ /gsod byed rdo rje gsod nyid ma/ /snar ma rdo rje 'od ldan ma/ /de las dbyig pa rdor
482a4(rgyud): mchog ma/ /'phrog ma rdo rje ska rags te/ /gsod byed rdo rje 'jigs ma ste/ /gnam lcags rdo rje gnam lcags ma/ /nam gru rdo rje dbang ldan ma/ /gos can rdo rje gos can ma/ /
482a5(rgyud): rdo rje pho nya zhi ba ma/ /rlung lha rdo rje shugs can ma/ /lus ngan ma ni rdo rje gdengs/ /me lha de bzhin rdo rje 'bar/ /phag mo rdo rje gdong can ma/ /rdo rje nag mo tsa muN+Ti/ /chu lha rdo rje
482a6(rgyud): chu srin ma/ /sna chad ma ni sbrul mo ste/ /de 'dra la sogs grangs med pa/ /lha mo rnams ni dbang bskur gyur/ /rang rang rigs ni rtogs nas su/ /ji bzhin lha yi bdag por
482a7(rgyud): bshad/ /de nas phyag rgya bcing ba byin/ /de bzhin dam tshig snying po 'o/ /lha rnams kun gyi bdag po kun/ /bkug nas de bzhin dbang du 'gyur/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings
482b1(rgyud): nas/ /sdig mdzub dang ni lcags kyu bcings/ /'ching ba dang ni grol byed par/ /dngos po bya ba'i don sems dpa'/ /de yi mdun du khyed rnams ni/ /bya ba bsgrub phyir gnas
482b2(rgyud): par gyis/ /khyod kyi srog ni nyams gyur pa'i/ /de bzhin dam tshig sbyin mi bya/ /rgya cher phyag rgya chen por ni/ /theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor sbyor byed pa/ /
482b3(rgyud): de nyid ces bya bstan pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor mchog rnams de dag dang / /de bzhin lha la sogs pa kun/ /bkug cing rab tu bcug par gyur/ /rdo rje can gyis dbang byas nas/ /
482b4(rgyud): rdo rje thams cad dbang bskur gyur/ /rdo rje ming gis mtshan par byas/ /lha chen po ni gcig pu nyid/ /zhabs kyi 'og tu brdabs nas bzhag /'jig rten gdug pa cher gyur pa/ /gdug
482b5(rgyud): pa'i snying po zhes byar grags/ /gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po yi/ /sems can 'ongs par the tshom med/ /thang cig tshes grangs re re ma/ /gang du zla gcig dkyil 'khor du/ /
482b6(rgyud): sems can stong phrag brgya dag ni/ /skad cig de la sdug bsngal byed/ /yid ni nye bar 'jal bar byed/ /mdangs ni nye bar 'phrog pa'i nad/ /mi yi skye bo gsod pa dang / /tha na dug
482b7(rgyud): chen nyid dang ni/ /grong khyer dang ni grong rdal dang / /grong dag 'joms par byed pa dag /sems can rnams ni gcod byed dang / /skye bo stong pa sbyor byed dang / /de ltar drag cing
483a1(rgyud): @#/ /'jigs su rung / /brtse ba med cing sdig byed dang / /gsod pa dang ni 'joms par byed/ /shes rab 'phrog par byed pa dang / /drag po sna tshogs
483a2(rgyud): gzugs 'dzin pa/ /dud 'gro'i 'gro ba'i bar dang ni/ /sems can rnams la gnod byed dang / /myur du mdangs ni 'phrog pa dang / /lo nyes thog dang char dang ni/ /char ni mi
483a3(rgyud): 'bab byed pa dang / /grang dang dro ba'i gdung ba dag /skad cig de la skyed pa dang / /gdon ni 'bab par byed pa dang / /de bzhin bdud mchog skyed pa dang / /sems ni rnam par
483a4(rgyud): g.yeng byed dang / /de 'dra'i gnod sbyin mtha' yas dang / /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /dkon mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug ste/ /skye dgu sna tshogs nad kyis btab/ /ye shes
483a5(rgyud): kyi ni spyan gyis gzigs/ /dam tshig sdang ba'i sems can dang / /yams dang de bzhin nye bar 'tshe/ /rims dang gdon dang dug drag po/ /skye dgu 'di rnams 'joms
483a6(rgyud): par byed/ /sna tshogs sdug bsngal kun tu 'khrugs/ /'jigs pa sna tshogs dag gis khyab/ /thams cad nyams shing zil gyis non/ /sdug bsngal drag pos sdug bsngal
483a7(rgyud): gyur/ /slar yang bde bar bya ba'i phyir/ /nag po'i sngags ni yongs su gzung / /mkha' 'gro ma mo rnal 'byor mas/ /'gro ba'i don ni kun tu khyab/ /rims dang gdon dang
483b1(rgyud): 'byung po dang / /mkha' 'gro ma mo 'byung po dang / /gdug pa rnams kyis kun tu khyab/ /'jig rten sdug bsngal snod 'di ni/ /gzigs nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos/ /thugs rje dag ni
483b2(rgyud): bskyed par gyur/ /kye ma'o sems can 'di sdug bsngal/ /de la rjes su brtse byed med/ /nga ni kho na rang byung ste/ /de bzhin sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog /nga la log par
483b3(rgyud): rtog pa ste/ /skye dgu de la brtse pa med/ /dbang phyug chen po gang yin dang / /gdug pa thams cad rab 'dul byed/ /yang dag byang chub rang byung gyur/ /skye dgu ma lus bskyab/
483b4(rgyud): par bya/ /thams cad dag ni dgug bya zhing / /de bzhin dam tshig bsrung bar bya/ /gnod dang phan pa byas nas ni/ /skye dgu 'di dag rnam par grol/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//
483b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor skyob dang phan 'dogs pa/ /zhes bya de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la/ /sems dpa' chen po snyoms par zhugs/ /mgon po chen po sangs rgyas kun/ /'di ltar
483b6(rgyud): bka' ni nod par byed/ /de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /de bzhin snying po phyung bar gyur/ /oM badzri sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM phaT/ de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas bka'
483b7(rgyud): ni bzung nas kyang / /phyi rol dkyil 'khor dgug pa'i phyir/ /lcags kyu'i snying po rab tu phyung / /oM badzra sa ma ya A kaR+Sha ya sarba maN+Da la badzra d+ha ra satwa mA ti kra ma hUM phaT/ rig pa brjod
484a1(rgyud): @#/ /par gyur pa yis/ /rdo rje lcags kyu shin tu brtan/ /lcags kyu bdag nyid che mchog ni/ /brgya phrag grangs med byung bar gyur/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig
484a2(rgyud): rten 'di/ /rim bzhin rab tu thim par gyur/ /gang zhig phyogs rnams bcu po ru/ /gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur/ /gdug pa de rnams bkug nas kyang / /de bzhin
484a3(rgyud): gong bu gcig tu bya/ /rdo rje me yis kun tu gdungs/ /ri rab rtse mo pham nas ni/ /tshad med bgrang du med pa rnams/ /phyi rol gyi ni dkyil 'khor 'ongs/ /rdo rje dbang po'i gnas
484a4(rgyud): kun tu/ /'khor nyid du ni yang dag gnas/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos/ /gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor bos nas ni/ /kye gdug skye dgu rnams la ni/ /rnam par 'tshe ba spang bar
484a5(rgyud): gyis/ /khyed rnams kyis ni dam tshig longs/ /srog chags thams cad gsod pa spongs/ /min na khyod rnams g.yas 'bar bas/ /de bzhin nga yi thal bar bya/ /gdug pa'i
484a6(rgyud): dam tshig dkyil 'khor gyis/ /tshig gcig tu ni zhus gyur pa/ /mgon po bdag cag sha za ste/ /ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsol cig /de nas rdo rje 'jin drag pos/ /ma bsdams
484a7(rgyud): pa yi tshig gsan nas/ /rdo rje khro bo rab brjid bka'/ /snying po drag po gsungs par gyur/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ha na da ha pa tsa bi d+h+waM sa ya bi kr-i ta sarba duSh+Tan sa ma ya mu drA maN+Da la
484b1(rgyud): b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ mar d+ha mar d+ha/ khA da khA da/ pA ra maN+Da/ badzra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ khro bo chen pos 'di brjod pas/ /rab drag gdug pa de dag ni/ /tshig cing rab tu 'gyel gyur cing / /dam tshig
484b2(rgyud): phyag rgya nyams par gyur/ /'o dod 'bod cing ngu bar gyur/ /gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed/ /ji skad smra ba bzhin byas te/ /'on kyang bden par smra mi bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' drag po
484b3(rgyud): che| |rang bzhin gyis ni sangs rgyas bdag / stobs chen gsang ba'i dbang po yis/ /bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs/ /oM ni sum+b+ha ha na da ha pa ca gr-ih+na ban d+ha hUM phaT/
484b4(rgyud): de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas bka' la rab gnas pas/ /rdo rje khro bo rab za byed/ /snying po drag po brjod par gyur/ /oM ma hA badzra kro d+ha bA da sarba duSh+Ta maN+Da la b+hi nA sha ya//
484b5(rgyud): sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya yan bi ki ra bi d+haM sa ya s+pho Ta ya/ b+hany+dza ya/ b+hany+dza ya/ sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu drAM b+han+d+ha gr-ih+na/ ha na da ha pa ca sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya satwa sa ma ya hUM phaT/ /de nas 'di ni
484b6(rgyud): brjod tsam gyis/ /rdo rje khro bo bdag nyid che/ /gtum po drag po shin tu 'jigs/ /rdo rje khro bo rab tu phyung / /rigs bcas dpung dang bcas ldan pa/ /dam chig sdang ba bzung nas
484b7(rgyud): ni| |shin tu 'jigs pas skrag gyur cing / /rgya mtsho yang ni rab tu sgul/ /phyag rgya rab 'jigs de dag gis/ /rnam par bcom zhing zil gyis mnan/ /rdo rje me yis bsregs nas
485a1(rgyud): @#/ /ni| |thams cad du ni thal bar byas/ /byang sems las byung rdo rje can/ /ji ltar sems can sreg bar byed/ /'di ni gzhug pa'i tshig yin te/ /phan pa'i
485a2(rgyud): rigs can rgyal bdag skyes/ /'dod chags skyon la sogs lta ba/ /nyon mongs dri ma gang shes nas/ /rdo rje can gyis dri ma 'di/ /bzung nas ye shes me yis bsregs/ /sems
485a3(rgyud): can shin tu 'jigs te skrag / byang chub spyod pas byang chub gnas/ /mi bskyod pa yi gnas skyes shing / /rdo rje can ni mchog tu gyur/ /phyag na rdo rje sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje
485a4(rgyud): chen po phyag rgya 'gugs/ /zhes bya de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la/ /'jigs pa med par snyoms par zhugs/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni rjes sbyang phyir/ /rgyal ba la ni bka' nod
485a5(rgyud): gyur/ /phyag na rdo rje stobs chen la/ /de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa/ /oM ha na ha na badzra hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje 'dzin drag pas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung thos nas//
485a6(rgyud): 'jigs pa 'gugs pa'i rdo rje ni/ /rang nyid kyi ni sngags 'di brjod/ /oM badzra A kaR+Sha ya shI g+h+raM/ sarba duSh+Ta gr-ih+Na badzra sa t+ye na hUM dzaH/ /de nas brjod pa tsam gyis ni/ /mkha'
485a7(rgyud): 'gro ma ni mdangs 'phrog pa/ /rnal 'byor sngags dang phyag rgyar bcas/ /ri rab tu ni kun tu 'dus/ /rdo rje lcags kyus bkug nas ni/ /'bar ba dang bcas 'bar bar gyur/ /
485b1(rgyud): spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas tshig /smras pa rdo rje 'dzin pas skyobs/ /skal chen rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /kye/ gdug pa'i tshogs chen myur ba ru/ /gsod pa spongs la bka' nyan gyis//
485b2(rgyud): de dag re re zhing smras pa/ /bdag cag 'di rnams sha za ste/ /gang zhig rtag tu gson gyur pa/ /bdag cag la ni thabs bstan gsol/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'chang / /de yi thabs
485b3(rgyud): ni 'di gsungs so/ /zla gcig lon nas shi ba gang / /de ni bza' ba blang bar gyis/ /byang chub sems la chags bral nas/ /gsang ba smod pa lhur len pa/ /khyod dang lhan cig yang
485b4(rgyud): dag sbyor/ /de bza' ba ni gnang bar gyis/ /phyag rgya yi ni snying po 'di/ /rtag tu bcang bar bya ba ste/ /phyi rol thams cad spangs nas ni/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung bar gyis/ /
485b5(rgyud): oM badzra pra ti gr-ih+Na hr-i da ya A kaR+Sha ya/ tsaR+ya yaM me sa d+ho d+he na mi ni ya te hA sa ri d+ha yaM niSh+ka ma du sa ma ya hUM dzaH/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /rang gi sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan/ /
485b6(rgyud): khro bo spyi gtsug rgyal po ni/ /rnal 'byor pa ni de las spros/ /gal te dam tshig las 'das na/ /khro bo bdag nyid chen po yis/ /rtag tu mgo bo 'gas byed cing / /rigs dang
485b7(rgyud): bcas pa nges par sreg / bdud rtsi sman gyi rgyal po zhes/ /bya ba de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la/ /sems dpa' chen po snyoms zhugs nas/ /nad kyi don du tshol bar gyur/ /bcom ldan
486a1(rgyud): @#/ /'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /oM badzra hUM phaT/ de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /sems can thams cad 'jigs byed pas/ /nad rnams thams cad bkug
486a2(rgyud): nas ni/ /'gugs pa yi ni snying po brjod/ /oM badzra sa ma ya A na ya sarba duSh+Ta dz+wA ra ni di nA sha ya hUM phaT/ de nas brjod pa tsam gyis kyang / /nad dang gdon gyi tshogs kun
486a3(rgyud): dang / /rims sogs kyis ni de thos nas/ /steng du rkang pa 'og tu mgo /'bar pa'i me dang yang dag ldan/ /ha ha zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed/ /bdag cag rigs ni ma
486a4(rgyud): gzhom par/ /khro bo chen po bka' stsol cig /rdo rje rnal 'byor chen pos gsungs/ /nga yi bka' ni rab tu nyon/ /sems can nye bar 'joms pa spongs/ /mdangs kyang 'phrog
486a5(rgyud): par ma byed cig / de rnams kyis smras pa/ kye/ rgyal po rdo rje bdag cag gi /srog gi srung ba mdzad du gsol/ /bdag cag kun ni gzi brjid za/ /thabs ni cung zad brtsam du
486a6(rgyud): gsol/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /de nas stobs chen gyis smras pa/ /nga yi sngags dang phyag rgya dag /gang zhig bsrung la gnod ma byed/ /oM badzra karma bi sho d+ha ya
486a7(rgyud): sarba A ba ra Na ni bud d+ha satwe sa ma ye hUM/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po kun/ /theg pa chen por mngon bsdus pa/ /mdo sde gsang ba rgyal po las/ /yongs su bshad pa thams cad
486b1(rgyud): kun/ /sngags dang phyag rgya gnas gang na/ /rtag par rab tu spyod byed pas/ /gnas de ru yang rtag pa ru/ /khyed rnams shin tu gnod ma byed/ /de skad gsungs pas gdon kun ni/ /hi
486b2(rgyud): hi zhes ni sgrogs par gyur/ /spyi bo'i rnal 'byor pa la ni/ /gnod pa byed pa thams cad gtad/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /kun mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug gis/ /sdig pa dral ba'i
486b3(rgyud): phyag rgya che/ /blo gros chen po snyoms par zhugs/ /ngan song bcing bar bya ba'i phyir/ /mgon po dag la bka' nod byed/ /mgon chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /kun nas snying
486b4(rgyud): po brjod par gyur/ /oM k+She pa ya badzra swAhA/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i thabs chen po/ /rdo rje las na yang dag byung / /sems can rnams la brtse bya'i phyir/ /sdig pa thams cad bkug par
486b5(rgyud): gyur/ /oM sarba pA paM a pA ya na bi sho d+ha na badzra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ /de skad brjod nas rnal 'byor ches/ /skad cig gis ni ngan song bkug /ri yi rgyal po nye ba ru/ /ngu 'bod la sogs
486b6(rgyud): snang bar gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnal 'byor ches/ /ngan song sems can la smras pa/ /dkon mchog gsum dang nga bstan la/ /myur du bstan ba skyabs su song / /de dag thams cad
486b7(rgyud): kyis smras pa/ /stob chen bdag cag bskyab tu gsol/ /gtso pos ji skad bka' stsal pa/ /de bzhin du ni bgyi bar 'tshal/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /sdig pa dral ba nges 'ching
487a1(rgyud): @#/ /ba| |sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms pa/ /mchog tu gsang ba gsungs par gyur/ /oM badzra pA Ni bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba a pA ya ban+da nA ni pra mo k+Sha ya sarbA
487a2(rgyud): pA ya ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba satwaM/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sa ma ya TA tha/ sems can ngan song rgyu can rnams/ /rig pa 'di yis dbang bskur bas/ /ngan song 'khor lo dral bar gyur/ /
487a3(rgyud): rgya mtsho ru ni rab tu ltung / /de bzhin ngan song shi 'phos nas/ /de kun rab tu grol bar gyur/ /sdug bsngal kun las rab tu grol/ /rdo rje dbang po'i gnas thob gyur/ /de bzhin thub
487a4(rgyud): pa rnam snang gi / zhabs drung du ni skyes par gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i mthu yis ni/ /de bzhin mi khom zad par gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i mthu yis ni/ /de nas skad cig des
487a5(rgyud): zhi thob/ /rmad byung sna tshogs gsang chen po/ /cho 'phrul dag ni skyes par 'gyur/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ /rdo rje rin chen rang bzhin gnas/ /rin chen bdun gyis rab tu
487a6(rgyud): sbras/ /rdo rje rin chen gyis rab mdzes/ /de yi rigs kyi ngan song kun/ /sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par sbyangs/ /sems can bde ba skyes par gyur/ /rdo rje bde ba yang dag ldan//
487a7(rgyud): mchog chen po yi zhing 'di ni/ /dag pa'i zhing du rab tu grags/ /sems can dag pa kun tu khyab/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor rdor rang bzhin/ /slar yang shing gi nags la sogs/ /
487b1(rgyud): rmad byung chen po snang ba med/ /rin chen sna bdun rang bzhin kun/ /nags dang rtsa las skyes par gyur/ /mtho dman dag dang rnam par bral/ /lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par snang / /ka
487b2(rgyud): tsa li ltar reg na bde/ /stong gsum rab tu gnas par gyur/ /dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal kun/ /dang por ngan song nye bar zhi/ /bkres dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal dag/ kun tu 'gags
487b3(rgyud): par mnyam par gnas/ /rgya mtsho kun tu thim par gyur/ /ri bo gzugs kyang kun tu khyab/ /gzhan 'phrul gyi ni lha rnams dang / /mtshungs pa ru ni mi rnams gyur/ /slar yang mu khyud
487b4(rgyud): 'khor lo med/ /ri rab man da ra dag med/ /lha yi 'jig rten gnas kyang med/ /rgya mtsho med cing lha min med/ /klu yi gnas gzhi dag kyang med/ /mi yi khyim dang khang pa med/ /
487b5(rgyud): grong khyer ljongs dang yul 'khor dang / /phug dang bcas par rnam par bral/ /mi yi gnas kyang med pa nyid/ /chu bo phug dang lung pa med/ /mi dag gi ni lus kyang med/ /sems can
487b6(rgyud): 'ga' yang 'dir mi snang / /ngan song 'khor lo dag kyang med/ /mi khom med cing sdug bsngal med/ /bud med skyes pa la sogs med/ /rnga mo glang po lug kyang med/ /dpag bsam
487b7(rgyud): shing dang spos kyi shing / /rin chen sna bdun rang bzhin mdzes/ /spos kyi chu yi rgya mtsho dang / /rin chen sna tshogs rnams kyis mdzes/ /shing ni yid 'ong thams cad la/ /rol mo'i sgra ni
488a1(rgyud): @#/ /mngon par phyung / /rol mos chos kyi sgra dag kyang / /stong gsum du ni yongs su byung / /ji ltar rdo rje dbang po'i gnas/ /ri rab ri yi rtse mo ltar/ /de bzhin
488a2(rgyud): stong gsum gyi ni gnas/ /rnam pa sna tshogs 'od 'bar gyur/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ /gru bzhir rab tu gnas par gyur/ /kun nas phyi rol gnas rnams ni/ /kha khyer
488a3(rgyud): du yang snang bar gyur/ /slar yang nyi ma zla ba med/ /skar ma med cing lha yang med/ /rang gi khang pa'i nang du yang / /lha rnams nyid kyang mthong mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas 'od kyis yongs
488a4(rgyud): su gsal/ /'od zer sna tshogs yid 'phrog pa/ /gang gis zhing ni yang dag sbyangs/ /rdo rje rin chen yid 'ong ldan/ /rdo rje dbang po'i gnad nyid kyang / /slar yang snang bar mi 'gyur
488a5(rgyud): ro| |gzhan du gzhi ni gcig pa'i gnas/ /gang du sangs rgyas rnams 'phrul ba/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ /lha yi pad+ma yongs su gsal/ /rin chen sna bdun rab tu
488a6(rgyud): mdzes/ /dri yi tshogs ni yid 'ong ldan/ /bskal pa chen po'i zhing gi dbus/ /dkyil 'khor shin tu sdug steng du/ /dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu yi/ /rdo rje seng+ge'i khri byung gyur//
488a7(rgyud): kun nas phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu ldan/ /rdo rje rin chen rang bzhin mdzes/ /seng+ge'i khri ni bzhi byung gyur/ /rdo rje bla re rnam par bres/ /dar gyi
488b1(rgyud): chun pos rnam par 'phyang / /dril bu'i dra ba rnam par 'phyang / /zhing ni kun tu rab tu spras/ /me tog sna tshogs kun tu bkram/ /sna tshogs sprin gyis rab tu g.yogs/ /sna tshogs dri yis
488b2(rgyud): kun tu khyab/ /dpag bsam shing gis nye bar spras/ /dpag bsam shing ni yid 'ong ldan/ /rdo rje'i rol mo mdzes pa dang / /sgra ni mngon par 'byin par byed/ /'di nyid dang ni lhan cig zhing / /
488b3(rgyud): sgrib pa med pa'i rang bzhin du/ /phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar gyur/ /slar yang 'jigs par 'gyur ba med/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ /gang gA'i bye snyed grangs med pa/ /shin tu
488b4(rgyud): phra ba'i rdul snyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su gsal/ /til gyi gang bu gang ba bzhin/ /sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su gsal/ /phyogs rnams kun nas ma lus par//
488b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad 'dir gshegs 'gyur/ /dbus kyi seng ge'i gdan dag la/ /chos dbyings 'jigs pa med pa la/ /rnam par snang mdzad stobs chen po/ /ston pa bcom
488b6(rgyud): ldan bzhugs par gyur/ /shar du yang ni mi bskyod pa/ /lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan te/ /nub tu 'od dpag med pa yin/ /byang du don yod grub pa ste/ /mgon po chen po phyogs bzhi ru//
488b7(rgyud): rdo rje yi ni steng du bzhugs/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu ni/ /mnyam du dmigs nas rnam par gnas/ /chos kyi dbyings ni brtan par gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
489a1(rgyud): @#/ /brtan par bzhugs/ /mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga/ /chos kyi dbyings ni brtan par mdzad/ /sangs rgyas grangs med thams cad ni/ /rdo rje can ni lnga la bzhugs
489a2(rgyud): phyogs ni re rer khyab gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas gcig gis yang dag bzhugs/ /mtshams dang steng dang 'og dag gi /rnam snang mdzad kyis brtan par mdzad/ /chos kyi dbyings ni brtan
489a3(rgyud): gyur pa/ /dbus kyi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bzhugs/ /de nas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ba/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs snying po/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul pa/ /sangs
489a4(rgyud): rgyas thams cad rang nyid kyi/ /seng ge'i khri ni lnga la bzhugs/ /grangs med tshad ni med pa yi/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid ma lus pa/ /ri mo gsal ba dang mtshungs par/ /stong gsum
489a5(rgyud): dag ni ma lus gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba che/ /pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs par gyur/ /dbus kyi 'khor lor yang dag ldan/ /bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga/ /sangs rgyas
489a6(rgyud): rol pa dang ldan par/ /rdo rje can ni thams cad bzhugs/ /shar gyi cha la yang dag bzhugs/ /bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga/ /rdo rje rnam 'phrul ston byed pa/ /'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs
489a7(rgyud): par gyur/ /lho yi phyogs na thams cad gnas/ /bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga/ /rin chen rnam 'phrul yang dag ldan/ /'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur/ /bye ba dag ni grangs
489b1(rgyud): med lnga/ /nub kyi phyogs na yang dag gnas/ /pad+ma'i rnam 'phrul ston byed pa/ /'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur/ /bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga/ /byang gi phyogs na rnam par
489b2(rgyud): gnas/ /las kyi rnam 'phrul ston byed pa/ /'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur/ /gsang dang mchod pa gang yin dang / /lha mo rdo rje lha mo ni/ /grangs med tshad ni med pa
489b3(rgyud): dag / bcu gnyis kyis ni dkyil 'khor gang / /sgo srung dag ni grangs med pa/ /rnal 'byor mchog dang ldan pa bzhi/ /rgyal po shar dang lho dag tu/ /nub dang byang ni yang
489b4(rgyud): dag gnas/ /chos kyi sku las yang dag byung / /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur gyur pa/ /sems dpa' chen po de dag kun/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs las byung / /gang zhig
489b5(rgyud): phyogs bcu dag gi yang / /byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid cha/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i sa thob pa/ /de dag kun kyang 'dir 'ongs pa/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni gang gA yi/ /bye ma dang
489b6(rgyud): mnyam ji snyed pa/ /yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i tshogs/ /de dag thams cad yang dag gshegs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu yis ni/ /zhing dag rgya ni chen por gyur/ /yul rnams
489b7(rgyud): thams cad bya ba yang / /gnod pa med cing 'tshe ba'ang med/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten pa'i/ /ji ltar sngon ni bar med pa'i/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /bar med
490a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa ni de bzhin gnas/ /gang nas sangs rgyas mi snang ba/ /phyogs ni rdul tsam yod ma yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor che/ /gang dag sa ni
490a2(rgyud): bzhi bcu dang / /yang na chos las byung ba nyid/ /sangs rgyas sras ni grags pa che/ /rigs lnga byung ba la sogs pa/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ston pa dang / /'dir gnas byang chub
490a3(rgyud): sems dpa'i tshogs/ /mchog rnams phyogs dang phyogs mtshams mthong / /sangs rgyas dag ni grangs med kun/ /lha rnams yang dag gnas 'di ru/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni mthong bar gyur//
490a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas dgra bcom ma gtogs par/ /zhing 'dir 'ga' yang mthong ma gyur/ /rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor lo min/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni tshogs kyang min/ /dbus dang phyogs ni yang
490a5(rgyud): dag bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni mthong bar gyur/ /dbang phyug chen po gnod byed pa'i/ /rdo rje khro bo mthong bar gyur/ /sangs rgyas lnga dang de bzhin du/ /khro bo drug bdun rnam
490a6(rgyud): par gnas/ /tshangs sogs lha rnams de dag kyang / /ngo mtshar dag ni skyes par gyur/ /'jigs shing skrag nas lha de dag /gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed/ /gtso bo ji bzhin
490a7(rgyud): mthong 'gyur zhing / /shin tu ngo mtshar ci zhig snang / /slar yang lha yi 'jig rten dag /srid pa nang du mthong mi 'gyur/ /'gro ba lnga yi sems can min/ /ri rab dang ni rgya
490b1(rgyud): mtsho min/ /zla ba nyi ma ma mthong zhing / /ri dang khang pa dag kyang min/ /ci bdag cag ni rmongs gyur tam/ /yang na mig ni long bar gyur/ /yang na bdag cag sems g.yengs ba/ /
490b2(rgyud): sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul 'di ci zhig /bdag cag gis ni sngar 'jigs mthong / /drag cing bkug nas thal bar byas/ /ri rab ri yi rtse mo ru/ /sdug bsngal chen pos gzir bar gyur/ /
490b3(rgyud): slar yang ri rab yod ma yin/ /khro bo rdzu 'phrul chen po med/ /gzhan dang khro bo chen po gcig /dbang phyug chen po gnod par byed/ /gnas ni chung dur gyur pa yang / /rgya
490b4(rgyud): chen po ru 'di ru snang / /stong gsum 'di yang mi snang ste/ /bdag cag 'jig rten gzhan du phyin/ /de ltar brjod pa sna tshogs pa/ /gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed/ /mi smra bar ni
490b5(rgyud): gnas gyur nas/ /rdo rje can la lta bar byed/ /gnod sbyin 'byung po sha za sogs/ /gdug pa kun dang gdon sogs kyis/ /mun par khyab pa bzhin du ni/ /stong gsum 'di ni mthong
490b6(rgyud): bar gyur/ /gzhan ni cung zad ma mthong ste/ /gzhan du phyogs dag mun pas khyab/ /rdo rje khro bo 'khrul gyur cing / /sgyu ma yis ni rmongs gyur cing / /kun tu rmongs pa nyid gyur cing //
490b7(rgyud): gcig la gcig ni rmongs par gyur/ /ha ha zhes bya'i sgra sgrogs shing / /bdag cag 'dir ni gang du phyin/ /chig ni rab tu rjod byed cing / /gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed/ /
491a1(rgyud): @#/ /'di ni su zhig bdag cag gang / /'di ni su yi gam du phyin/ /bdag cag rang gi gnas na ltung / /bdag cag 'jig rten gzhan du phyin/ /rdo rje khro bos bsad
491a2(rgyud): par gyur/ /'o na 'di ni ci zhig yin/ /lha yi gnas kyang ma mthong bzhin/ /rdo rje can yang mthong ma gyur/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo min/ /bdag cag rnams ni
491a3(rgyud): mun par gyur/ /rang gi gnas kyang ma mthong zhing / /ri rab nyid kyang mthong ma gyur/ /mtsho dang rgya mtsho dag kyang min/ /skar ma zla ba nyi ma min/ /bdag cag thams
491a4(rgyud): cad gang nas 'ongs/ /yul gang zhig tu 'gro bar bya/ /'gro ba lnga yang yod ma yin/ /'jig rten med cing ma mo med/ /mi dang mi ma yin pa dag /rnam pa kun tu mthong
491a5(rgyud): ma gyur/ /sngon ni ji ltar de bzhin phyis/ /rmad du byung ba nyid ma gyur/ /gzhan du sa ni g.yos par gyur/ /rlung dag gis ni rnam par bskyod/ /'brug gi sgra dang glog chen po//
491a6(rgyud): sdug bsngal thams cad yang dag ldan/ /bkres skom la sogs sdug bsngal dang / /bral min kun tu sdug bsngal gyur/ /der ni lha chen rdzu 'phrul dag /cung zad kyang ni
491a7(rgyud): mthong ma gyur/ /dmyal ba yi dwags dud 'gro dag /rnam par nyams shing bshig par gyur/ /sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /ngan song gsum ni nye bar zhi/ /lha gang 'du shes
491b1(rgyud): med pa dang / /gzugs med pa na spyod par gnas/ /phung po lnga ru rang bdag nyid/ /ngo mtshar de bzhin mthong gyur nas/ /rang bdag nyid la'ang rtog par byed/ /gcig la gcig
491b2(rgyud): kyang lta bar byed/ /de bzhin thams cad skrag cing 'jigs/ /ngo mtshar gyur pa 'di ci zhig /tshad med bskal ba chen po ru/ /bdag cag dag par gnas par gyur/ /bdag
491b3(rgyud): mchog las ni bdag cag grol/ /slar yang bdag tu 'dzin par gyur/ /sngon gyi bag chags mngon 'dod la/ /srid gsum gnas ni mthong bar gyur/ /srid pa gsum yang
491b4(rgyud): mthong ma yin/ /de bzhin 'gro ba lnga yang med/ /gzhan du shin tu dag par gcig /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa sprul/ /sangs rgyas lnga nyid mthong bar gyur/ /
491b5(rgyud): srid gsum gnas ni gzhan dag min/ /tshogs la thams cad mnyes bar gyur/ /gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed/ /'di ni su zhig bdag cag gang / /bdag cag 'jig rten gzhan
491b6(rgyud): du phyin/ /sngon ni bdag gis 'jig rten 'di/ /'gro ba lnga bcas de bzhin du/ /ri rab dang ni rgya mtshor bcas/ /lha rnams drug ni 'khor bcas mthong / /srid pa gsum gyi lha
491b7(rgyud): rnams ni/ /gang zhig 'di ni mthong ma gyur/ /gzhal yas khang dang sems can ni/ /gtso bo ji bzhin mthong bar gyur/ /de 'dra'i ngo mchar sna tshogs pa/ /gnas chen 'di ru
492a1(rgyud): @#/ /mthong bar gyur/ /byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul 'di/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rol pa yin/ /gang zhig stong gsum 'di yi ni/ /rang rgyal bdag nyid mchog
492a2(rgyud): gyur pa/ /de yang kun tu rmongs gyur nas/ /rnam par 'phrul pa'ang mthong ma gyur/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang mthong ma yin/ /rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras kyang min/ /chos kyi dbyings ni
492a3(rgyud): brtan zhi ba/ /gnas ni de ru mthong ma gyur/ /gzhan du stong ni gsum po 'di/ /rnam pa kun tu ma mthong nyid/ /sa dang me dang chu khams min/ /gser gyi dkyil 'khor dag
492a4(rgyud): kyang min/ /'gro ba lnga yi sems can min/ /zla ba nyi ma dag kyang min/ /skar ma gza' dang rgyu skar min/ /sems can dag kyang khams gsum min/ /'di dag thams cad
492a5(rgyud): stong par gyur/ /gzhan du nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor min/ /de dag thams cad 'jigs skrag nas/ /mya ngan 'das pa nye bar thob/ /gang yang phyogs rnams bcu po yi/ /
492a6(rgyud): nyan thos 'jigs pa med pa rnams/ /byang sems can ni chen po yis/ /de dag kun ni skrag par gyur/ /rang rang gi ni zhing dag tu/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang mthong ma gyur/ /
492a7(rgyud): 'dus pa chen po dag dang ni/ /chos rnams ston pa dag kyang min/ /zhing de yi ni sems can min/ /lha dang mi rnams dag kyang min/ /khang pa med cing zhing yang med/ /sa dang
492b1(rgyud): me dang rlung yang med/ /rang gi zhing yang ma mthong zhing / /rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs par gyur/ /skad cig gis ni mi dgar gyur/ /thang cig du ni rmongs par gyur/ /de lta bu yi
492b2(rgyud): rnam 'phrul du/ /byang chub sems ni rab tu snang / /sngon gyi bskal ba chen po la/ /'khor lo rnam par 'phrul pa bstan/ /bcom ldan rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas/ /de lta bu ni byin gyis
492b3(rgyud): brlabs/ /sems can gang dag 'di na gnas/ /nyin dang mtshan mo mi shes gyur/ /de nas de nyid gsang ba che/ /chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa'i tshogs/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs
492b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas/ /de lta bu yi rnam 'phrul byung / /stong gsum yongs su bsdus pa yi/ /lha yi gnas ni bkod par gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas gcig pu/ /chos dang longs
492b5(rgyud): spyod rdzogs sprul pa/ /la lar sngon pos rab tu mdzes/ /sa yi phyogs ni rab tu spras/ /rdo rje sngon pos rab tu brgyan/ /la lar gser gyi mdog tu snang / /kha dog ser pos
492b6(rgyud): rnam par brgyan/ /sa yi cha yang rab tu spras/ /rdo rje ser pos rab tu brgyan/ /la lar kha dog dmar po ni/ /byu ru lta bus ba tu mdzes/ /sa yi cha yang rab tu spras/ /rdo rje dmar
492b7(rgyud): pos rab tu brgyan/ /la lar btsag gi mdog can gyi/ /bai DUR+ya mtshungs rab tu mdzes/ /sa yi cha yang rnam par spras/ /rdo rje btsod kyis rnam par mdzes/ /la lar shel gyi
493a1(rgyud): @#/ /mdog can gyi/ /shin tu snang bas rab tu mdzes/ /sa yi char yang rnam par spras/ /rdo rje shel gyis rnam par brgyan/ /shar du sngon po chen
493a2(rgyud): po ste/ /lhor ni ser po yang dag ldan/ /nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste/ /byang ni btsod dang yang dag ldan/ /dbus kyi sa yi cha dag ni/ /shel gyi mdog can bla na med/ /
493a3(rgyud): rdo rje chen pos shin tu dag /tshon rtsi lnga yi rang bzhin bshad/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis rab tu mdzes/ /cha mnyam legs par bgos pa ste/ /
493a4(rgyud): go rims dang ni yang dag ldan/ /kun nas phyi rol gnas dag na/ /rdo rje kha khyer yang dag ldan/ /kun nas kha khyer dang ldan zhing / /sgo yi kha khyer dag gis spras/ /ri
493a5(rgyud): mo rdo rje sngo rang bzhin/ /gzhan yang gser gyi mdog can dang / /kha dog dmar po mchog dang ni/ /gzhan yang shel ni bzang po dag /rin chen kun gyi rang bzhin
493a6(rgyud): mchog / dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mdzes gyur pa/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin pa'i mchog /rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pas spras/ /zla
493a7(rgyud): ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes/ /g.yer ka'i dra bas kun tu khebs/ /dril bu'i mchog ni kun tu 'phyang / /sna tshogs shing ni yid 'ong ldan/ /dpag bsam shing ni yid
493b1(rgyud): 'ong ldan/ /spos dang me tog de bzhin dri/ /snang ba'i shing mchog yang dag ldan/ /sna tshogs bkod pa nye bar ldan/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu/ /mtsho mchog chu
493b2(rgyud): yis gang bar gyur/ /rdo rje rgya mtsho rgya chen ldan/ /me tog sna tshogs kun tu bkram/ /sna tshogs bdug pa dag gis bdugs/ /sna tshogs dri yi chu yis gtor/ /sna tshogs dri yis
493b3(rgyud): kun tu khyab/ /drag po chen po sras bcu dag /de nas nyams dga' ba dag byung / /shing dang pad sogs thams cad las/ /chos rnams 'byung ba thos par gyur/ /

493b5(rgyud): badzra satwa kro d+ha ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha A kaR+Sha yaM hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha rA ga ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra duSh+Ti kro d+ha ya sA d+hu sA d+hu hUM phaT/ khro bo rdo rje rin chen mchog/ /

493b7(rgyud): kro d+ha dz+wa lA ya sarba hUM phaT/ oM badzra ke tu mahA kro d+ha d+he na hUM phaT/ oM aT+Ta hA sa badzra maT+Ta hA sa kro d+ha ha ha ha ha hUM phaT/ /khro bo chen po rdo rje chos/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas
494a1(rgyud): @#/ /khyab gyur pas/ /khro bo'i rgyal po rab bzod dka'/ /mchog tu 'jigs su rung ba smras/ /oM badzra d+harma bi shwa d+ha ya hUM phaT/ oM tIk+Sh+Na kro
494a2(rgyud): d+ha ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ oM badzra he tu kro d+ha pra be sha ya maN+Da laM sarba hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha b+hA Sha ta pA ta hUM phaT/ /rdo rje las ni rgyal po che/ /gsang ba thams cad kun bsdus

499b3(rgyud): rje yi ni glu 'di dag / blang zhing mchog rnams mnyes par bya/ /btud cing dbul bar bya ba nyid/ /rdo rje glu ni blang bar bya/ /sha ta sha ta ma ta sa ta ti ri/ Ta ta Ta ta pri ti ha ta/ ma ta sha ta pra ta
499b4(rgyud): ka ta/ ku Ta ta bi Ta bi Ta Ta Ta Ta/ ba Ta i ti ta Ta Ta Ta/ ka ra Ta ra Ta ra ra Ta/ /rdo rje ti rin ti ri yi/ /phyag rgyas bdag nyid dbang bskur bya/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bka' mnos nas/ /rdo rje'i
499b5(rgyud): sngags ni rab tu bskul/ /sngon po gos kyis stod g.yogs bya/ /sngon po yis ni mig dgab bya/ /rdo rje ti rin ti yi ri/ /phyag rgya rdo rje slob ma bcing / /oM gr-ih+Na badzra sa ma ya hUM baM/ /ci rigs
499b6(rgyud): bar ni gzhug bya zhing / /rdo rje'i sngags ni bskul bar bya/ /rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis/ /rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya/ /oM badzra sa ma ya pra be sha yA mi/ /rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil
499b7(rgyud): 'khor du/ /rgyas bar ji ltar snga ma bzhin/ /ye shes dbab pa'i las dag ni/ /mkhas pa dag gis bya nyid do/ /mchod pa dang ni gtor ma nyid/ /rdo rje can gyis sngar gsungs nyid/ /shes
500a1(rgyud): @#/ /rab can gyis kun bslab cing / /bdag nyid dang bas rab tu bya/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya yi/ /shes rab can gyis hUM bsgrub bya/ /lha la sogs pa gdug pa
500a2(rgyud): kun| |bkug cing de ru gzhug par bya/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bslab bya zhing / /bdag nyid dam ni gzhan yang rung / /rdo rje phreng bas dbang bskur bya/ /rdo rje mna' yi phyag rgya yis/ /sngon
500a3(rgyud): la mna' ni bsgrags par bya/ /rdo rje ye shes ye shes che/ /rdo rje ye shes rab bsgrub bya/ /lag pas rdo rje mtshan ma bzung / /rdo rje sngags ni rab bsgrub bya/ /rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis/ /rdo rje
500a4(rgyud): mtshan ma rab tu sbyin/ /oM badzra pA Ni karma kA rdo b+hA ba/ /de nas ming gi dbang bskur zhing / /rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul/ /rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis/ /rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bya/ /oM badzra
500a5(rgyud): kro d+ha s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ oM badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta he badzra nA ma/ /ye shes 'byung ba phun sum tshogs/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /shes rab mchog gis bslab bya zhing / /rdo rje
500a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor rab tu bsgrub/ /snying gar rdo rje bris nas ni/ /sna tshogs las rnams yang dag ldan/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab cing 'bar/ /snying gar rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje rig pa
500a7(rgyud): mchog rgyal po/ /bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya/ /rgyal po las rnams thams cad 'dzin/ /bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya/ /yang na khro bo'i nang nas gcig /bdag nyid yongs
500b1(rgyud): su bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas/ /'gro ba thams cad dbab par bya/ /hUM satwa badzra kro d+ha A be sha aH/ /khro bo rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdo rje rin chen yang dag bris/ /
500b2(rgyud): bdag nyid rdo rje rin chen te/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du bya/ /rdo rje pad+ma mgrin bcings nas/ /lkog ma'i phyogs su yang dag bri/ /bdag nyid rdo rje chos bsgoms nas/ /de nas nyon
500b3(rgyud): mongs thams cad 'joms/ /spyi bor rdo rje bri bya zhing / /rdo rje 'bar ba 'dzin pa dgod/ /bdag nyid rdo rje las bsgoms nas/ /gdug pa thams cad bsal bar bya/ /ho badzra rat+na kro d+ha ba sha
500b4(rgyud): mA nA ya tra/ hrIHbadzra d+harma kro d+ha nA sha ya phaT/ /hUM karma badzra kro d+ha rak+Sha/ /lha tshogs sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /phyag rgya dang bcas dgug par bya/ /ye shes brlab cing de nas bzung / /de bzhin
500b5(rgyud): kho nar yang dag brlab/ /lag par rdo rje lcags kyu bri/ /sdigs mdzub yi ge hUM ldan pa/ /khro bo yis ni sor mo bskyod/ /lha rnams 'gugs par byed pa'i mchog /oM badzra kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya hUM
500b6(rgyud): phaT| |de bzhin 'og tu rkang mthil la/ /rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag bri/ /de yis lha ni gang zhig mnan/ /de ni dgug pa'i mchog yin no/ /oM badzra kro d+ha a kra aM ku sha A kaR+Sha ye hUM phaT/ /
500b7(rgyud): dpung pa brkyang dang yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag bris/ /lha ni gang dang gang la mnan/ /de dang de ni dgug pa'i mchog /oM badzra kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT/ /stan la rdo rje
501a1(rgyud): @#/ /lcags kyu ni/ /yang dag bris pas de mnan zhing / /lha ni gang zhig kun tu mnan/ /de dang de ni 'gugs pa'i mchog /oM badzra kro d+ha A sa na A gats+tsha ya
501a2(rgyud): A kaR+Sha ya mi te he badzra sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hUM phaT/ phyag rgya dbab par yang dag dbab/ /mkhas pas ye shes bslab par bya/ /rdo rje sbyor ba thams cad kyi/ /sgrub pa dag kyang yang dag brtsam//
501a3(rgyud): g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas rnams su/ /bdag nyid khro bor bsgom par bya/ /myur du sangs rgyas ye shes ni/ /ring por mi thogs yang dag dbab/ /oM badzra kro d+ha kA ya A be sha hUM
501a4(rgyud): a| |rdo rje hUM mdzad yang dag sbyor/ /khro bo bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yang dag dgug /rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul/ /oM badzra bi d+yot+ta ma mahA kro d+ha A na ya
501a5(rgyud): ho b+ha ga bAn badzra hUM phaT/ /bdag nyid khro bo bsgom bya zhing / /khro bo'i lta bas blta bar bya/ /'khor ba'i btson ra 'jigs rung bar/ /sems can thams cad bsad par bya/ /oM
501a6(rgyud): dr-iSh+Tha mahA kro d+ha mA ra ya sarba satwa hUM/ /rtag tu rang nyid go bgos par/ /yid kyis bdag nyid bsgom bya zhing / /gzhan dag kyang ni bsgom byas nas/ /'gro ba 'di kun bsrung bar
501a7(rgyud): 'gyur/ /oM badzra rak+Sha rak+Sha sarba satwa hUM phaT/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya rnal 'byor che/ /rnam pa bzhi ni bslab par bya/ /rdo rje ye shes de nyid che/ /sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes
501b1(rgyud): bsam/ /rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas/ /sems can gang phyir kun tu chags/ /yid kyis gzugs ni bsgom bya zhing / /yi ge hUM ni rab tu brjod/ /rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di dag ni/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i
501b2(rgyud): phyag rgya yis/ /sems can gang la yongs su chags/ /de yi nyon mongs rnam par nyams/ /Tak+ki a sa la be/ /a la be ats+tsha Tak+ki hUM phaT/ /'di ni lan gcig brjod pas kyang / /kun nas nyon
501b3(rgyud): mongs zhu zhing g.yo/ /Tak+ki dza/ sems can gang gi rgyud la ni/ /rdo rje yi ni lta bas bltas/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor spyan chen pos/ /de yi sdug bsngal nyams par gyur/ /Tak+ki hUM/ yi ge
501b4(rgyud): hUM ni gyur pa las/ /nye ba'i sems can gang yin pa/ /de yi snying gar rdo rje yang / /shes rab can gyis yid kyis bsam/ /de nas 'jigs pa thams cad las/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i
501b5(rgyud): phyag rgya yang / /rdo rje rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro dang / /rdo rje phyag rgyas gdab par bya/ /Tak+ki ho/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor rmad byung che/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor rdo rje gang / /rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro dkyil
501b6(rgyud): 'khor ni/ /shes rab can gyis mchog gsang brlab/ /dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas/ /yan lag kun la yongs su 'khyud/ /yi ge hUM ni sbyor byed pa/ /sdug bsngal rnam par
501b7(rgyud): nyams par 'gyur/ /rdo rje khro bo rab drag 'dzin/ /rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /de yi khro bo'i sku gang yin/ /gcig tu mchog tu gsang ba bdag /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'ang rung / /
502a1(rgyud): @#/ /bdag nyid dang ni mtshungs pa ru/ /lus ni yang dag sbyor ba ni/ /dbang po snyoms 'jug brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ /rdo rje
502a2(rgyud): khro bo 'am/ sems dpa' gzhan de'i lus gang yin pa dang / bdag gi lus gang yin pa mtshungs par shes pa nyid 'di ni dbang po gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya'o//
502a3(rgyud): yang na rnam par bsgom pa yis/ /ji skad bshang bzhin yan lag 'khyud/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /dpung pa dam por bsdam par bya/ /yan lag kun la yongs 'khyud
502a4(rgyud): pas| |sangs rgyas byang chub rab grub 'gyur/ /dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa/ /'dod pa'i 'dod chags brtag mi bya/ /'di yis mtshungs par bsgoms pa yis/ /
502a5(rgyud): mtshungs pa nyid ni dbang po yin/ /haM traM hUM gi sbyor ba'i so dag gis/ /mchu bzung nas ni 'o bya zhing / /sems can gang zhig rnam bsgom pa/ /des ni bde ba don yod thob/ /hUM dza/
502a6(rgyud): sems can thams cad bde byed pa/ /yi ge hUM de rab sbyor zhing / /bdag nyid khro bor rnams sbyangs nas/ /de nas bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /hUM/ gang gis hUM ni rab sbyor zhing / /
502a7(rgyud): sems can dag ni gang dag gis/ /yan lag thams cad bsdus byas na/ /de yi nyon mongs bsrabs par 'gyur/ /hUM phaT/ ye shes chen pos thabs ldan pa/ /rdo rje'i
502b1(rgyud): rigs ni thams cad nyid/ /de bzhin 'khor lo'i 'khor bcas pas/ /mkhas pa yis ni bslab par bya/ /sangs rgyas sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /rtag tu bdag ni bsgom par bya/ /rnam pa'i
502b2(rgyud): mchog rnams kun ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas kun ni rnam par bsgom/ /bsgom pa'i sbyor ba de yis ni/ /skad cig sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/ /a/ rdo rje'i rig pa mchog rgyal po/ /bdag nyid
502b3(rgyud): yongs su bsgom par bya/ /hUM/ rdo rje khro bo khro gnyer can/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /traM/ rdo rje sde ru rang bdag nyid/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya/ /hrIH/ rdo rje dbab pa khro bo che/ /
502b4(rgyud): mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /a/ bdag nyid rdo rje sems la ni/ /rdo rje sems dpar rnam par bsgom/ /hUM badzra satwa/ rdo rje rgyal po bdag bsgom bya/ /dza badzra rA dza/ rdo rje chags par bsam par
502b5(rgyud): bya| |ra badzra rA ga / khro bo legs par bsgom par bya/ /sa badzra sA d+hu/ de nas rdo rje rin chen po/ /oM badzra rat+na/ rdo rje gzi brjid de bzhin no/ /dz+wa la ya/ bdag nyid rdo rje rgyal mtshan bsgom/ /d+he hi/
502b6(rgyud): rdo rje bzhad pa rnam par bsgom/ /hA sa badzra hA sa/ rdo rje chos ni bsgom par bya/ /sho d+ha ya/ rdo rje rnon po rnam par bsgom/ /ts+tshin da/ rdo rje rgyu ni 'khor lo che/ /bra be sha ya/ rdo rje smra ba rnam par bsgom//
502b7(rgyud): b+hA Sha/ rdo rje las ni bsgom par bya/ /karma/ rdo rje go cha rnam par bsgom/ /rak+Sha/ rdo rje gnod sbyin bsgom par bya/ /khA da/ rdo rje khu tshur rnam par bsgom/ /baM/ gang dang gang la 'dod pa nyid/ /
503a1(rgyud): @#/ /rigs kyi lha ni ci 'dra bar/ /rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya/ /de ni 'di yis skad cig 'grub/ /hUM/ rdo rje phyag rgyas lan cig bcing / /mkhas pas rdo rje bzlas
503a2(rgyud): ba brjod/ /ji skad bzlas pa'i rgyud du bshad/ /gzhan du khro bo gzung bar bya/ /yid kyis kyang ni brjod bya zhing / /lus kyi phyag rgyas bskul bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor gsum ni mnyam sbyor
503a3(rgyud): bas| |skad cig de la mkhas pas bsgrub/ /de nas nyams dga' rdo rje'i rigs/ /phyag rgya chen po grangs med pa/ /lus kyi phyag rgya yang dag ldan/ /gang phyir sems can snod min pa//
503a4(rgyud): de yi phyir na nyung bar gsungs/ /phyag rgya chen po yongs bsdu ba/ /theg pa chen po mngon bsdus las/ /rgyud chen gsang ba zhes bya ba/ /rgyud der rab tu bshad pa yin/ /gsang ba'i cho
503a5(rgyud): ga 'di yis ni/ /rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor sbyor ba yis/ /skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas 'grub/ /'dir ni phan yon mang po dag /rang gi las la nges par sbyar//
503a6(rgyud): gang zhig brtul zhing mngon par sbyor/ /skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas 'grub/ /mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang / /zhugs nas mngon par brtson 'gyur zhing / /rnal 'byor cho ga sgrub
503a7(rgyud): byed na/ /'grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /tshe 'di la ni rnal 'byor pas/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob 'gyur/ /gang gis rdo rje can sbyor bas/ /gdon mi za bar sa thob 'gyur/ /
503b1(rgyud): bskal pa grangs med dka' ba ni/ /spyod pa'i bdag nyid med par min/ /rnal 'byor 'di la mngon par brtson/ /de bas sa ni rnyed dka' min/ /theg chen 'di ni gsang ba ste/ /sangs rgyas
503b2(rgyud): chos kyi tshul bstan pa/ /sangs rgyas byang chub snying po che/ /de las sa ni thob dka' min/ /g.yon brkyang cha lugs gnas nas ni/ /khro bo'i tshig ni rab tu brjod/ /khro bo'i lta bas yang dag khros/ /
503b3(rgyud): las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdo sde'i dbang po gsang ba'i rnal 'byor gsang ba de kho na nyid dam pa mchog tu gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdo rje
503b4(rgyud): rtse mo las/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba rnam par bshad pa ste le'u gsum pa rdzogs so// //rdo rje'i rigs las le'u dang po'o// //de nas//
503b5(rgyud): gsang ba dag ni kun bsdus mchog /sems kyi dga' ba kun sbyor yang dag byung / /bya ba byas shing mchog tu rnam par mdzes/ /rdo rje dbang phyug thams cad rnam 'phrul tshogs/ /de nas
503b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi ni rigs chen mchog / rdo rje snying po'i thugs byung bde ldan pa/ /shin tu gsang ba'i yon tan mchog bsdus pa/ /rdo rje rgyal po bud med gzugs can gyur/ /e ma'o
503b7(rgyud): bud med dga' ba mchog spyod pa/ /gsang ba kun tu bsdus pa las byung ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu 'jigs mi mnga'/ /de yis gsungs nas cang mi gsung bzhugs so//
504a1(rgyud): @#/ /gzungs kyi dam tshig yang dag byung ba mchog /ting 'dzin gnas nas chos nyid gsang ba ni/ /spyi bo rkang mthil kun bsdus bstan pa las/ /de yi rigs
504a2(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor tshogs dag phyung / /hrIHde nas dga' ba'i ming can dag kyang phyung / /rdo rje bud med thugs las byung ba mchog /gzugs khams mchog gi lha las shin tu 'das//
504a3(rgyud): rdo rje'i mtshams rnams lha mo'i tshig dag grags/ /dga' bcas 'dzum pa dang ldan spyan mnga' ba/ /bzhad cing sgeg dang bcas pa'i zhal ldan pa/ /tshangs sogs rigs kyi lha yi lha mo
504a4(rgyud): ste| |yid 'ong dga' ba chen pos rgyal 'gyur ba/ /lha mo rdo rje rnal 'byor ma de yang / /'khor lo'i dbus su gnas nas rtog byed pa/ /de yi rigs bsdus mdzes shing yid du 'ong / /rdo rje
504a5(rgyud): chen mo rdo rje rmongs byed ma/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA rA ga mo ha na ya hi/ /snying po sangs rgyas rmongs par byed pas gsungs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchog kyang rmongs par 'gyur/ /
504a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi dga' ba rmongs byed dga'/ /sangs rgyas gzugs dag yongs su bsgyur ba mchog /rnam snang thub pa'i dbang phyug mchog de ni/ /bud med gzugs kyi sprul pa nyid du gyur//
504a7(rgyud): dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul mchog mnga' gang de ni/ /'khor gyi sring mo gang yin bzhi por gyur/ /oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ye s+thi/ de nas gsang ba brtan pa'i tshogs zhi ba/ /chos dang longs spyod
504b1(rgyud): rdzogs skus kun khyab pa/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang phyug rmongs byed bdag /sangs rgyas btsun mo chos nyid la bzhugs pas/ /sa ni rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur/ /'od zer sna tshogs
504b2(rgyud): phyogs bcu dag tu gsal/ /lha mo lha dang bcas pa'i lha mo rnams/ /zil gyis mnan cing shin tu rgyas par 'gyur/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs lha mo'i tshogs/ /de dag rang gi
504b3(rgyud): gzhal yas khang na gnas/ /de nas sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ba yi/ /gsang ba'i dbang phyug dam pa 'dren pa ste/ /rdo rje dga' ba chen po rnam par dgod/ /gdug pa kun gyi dbang phyug yi
504b4(rgyud): ge ni/ |snying po las byung chos nyid dag pa ste/ /rdo rje btsun mo bzhi dang dbus ma lnga/ /dkyil 'khor tshogs kyi shar phyogs cha la gnas/ /mi bskyod pa yi dbang phyug dam pa'i mchog /de nas
504b5(rgyud): rdo rje'i rigs can las byung ba'i/ /shar gyi dkyil 'khor khro bcas dkyil 'khor bcas/ /mi bskyod dam pa'i dam tshig bdag nyid can/ /de yis snying po bskul ba gsungs par gyur/ /snying po
504b6(rgyud): rab mchog 'byung ba gsungs par gyur/ /oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ye dzi/ oM badzra ro Sha aM ku sha A na ya sarba dzi/ /oM badzra ro Sha karma badzra ba shaM me A na ya di dzi/ oM badzra duSh+Ti kro d+ha tiSh+Tha ya sarba dzi/ /rin
504b7(rgyud): chen 'byung ldan de ni bud med gzugs/ /rin chen mchog tu yid du 'ong ba des/ /'khor gyi snying po dgu ni bzhi po gsungs/ /oM badzra b+h+r-i ku TI kro d+ha ha ra ha ra sarba gar+b+ha dzi/ oM badzra dz+wa la mA la
505a1(rgyud): @#/ /pra be sha mahA kro d+ha ag+ni dz+wA la ya sarba ra bi Sha dza dzi/ oM badzra d+h+wa dza a gra ke yu ri mahA kro d+hi de hi sarba dzi/ oM badzra aT+TaT+Ta ha si ni hA sa ma yAT+TaT+Ta ha ra ha ra dzi/
505a2(rgyud): yi ge dzi ni shin tu brtan par gnas/ /snying po shin tu mchog tu gyur pa gsungs/ /rin chen dbang phyug dam pa de yis ni/ /snying po bskul bar byed pa'i mchog dag gsungs/ /snying po
505a3(rgyud): mchog gsungs rmad byung gsungs par gyur/ /'od dpag med de bud med gzugs gyur pa/ /rdo rje btsun mo dam pa 'byung ba'i mchog /snying po bzhi po dag ni gsungs par gyur/ /oM badzra shud
505a4(rgyud): d+hi ha na duSh+Ti d+hi/ oM tIk+Sh+Na kro d+ha tshin+da na sarba d+hi ri/ badzra he tu mahA kro d+ha pra be sha ya sar+b+ba d+hi/ oM badzra dzi hwA mahA kro d+ha b+hA Shi pa tsa uta ga ra ya d+hi/ snying po rigs mchog brtan pa gsungs par
505a5(rgyud): gyur| |pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dbang dang ldan pa mchog / 'od dpag med pa'i gsang mchog bstan pa ste/ /snying po bskul ba'i mchog ni gsungs par gyur/ /Ni/ dga' ba chen pos
505a6(rgyud): mtshan ma dag kyang phyung / /don yod grub pa bud med gzugs gyur pas/ /las la shin tu bskul ba dang ldan te/ /'khor gyi sring mo dag ni bzhi po gsungs/ /oM sarba mu khe karma badzri Ni
505a7(rgyud): mahA kro d+ha ku ru sarba Ni/ oM badzra ka ba tsa kro d+hi rak+Sha ma Ni/ oM badzra kro d+hi mahA yak+Shi Ni badzre daMSh+Ta ka rA li bi lA sa sarba Ni/ oM badzra muSh+Ti badzra kro d+ha ni/ /de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs
505b1(rgyud): dag / mchog tu gsang ba bsdus pa dga' chen po/ /dbus kyi gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor bskul byed pa/ /las kyi btsun mo'i snying po mchog 'di gsungs/ /hUM/ dbus kyi gsang ba sna tshogs 'byung
505b2(rgyud): 'gyur pa/ /gtso bo 'di dag rnam par snang mdzad gsungs/ /oM badzre shwa rI hUM/ oM rat+ne shwa rI hUM/ oM pad me shwa rI hUM/ oM karme shwa rI hUM/ rdo rje rgyal mo dang bcas bskul ba las byung gang
505b3(rgyud): yin pa/ /rdo rje btsun mo rnal 'byor bzhi yis dbus kyi dbang phyug nyid du gnas/ /rdo rje rin chen chos ldan btsun mo yan lag mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ /'di ni gsang ba'i tshogs las
505b4(rgyud): gzhan du rnal 'byor mchog ni 'ga' yang med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu 'jigs mi mnga'/ /de ni rang gi 'khor tshogs dbus na bzhugs/ /des ni brtse dang phan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /
505b5(rgyud): rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog gsungs gyur/ /de nas 'khor lo'i grong khyer bstan byas nas/ /khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i bdag nyid de/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug btsun
505b6(rgyud): mo yi| |dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i rnal 'byor yang dag bri/ /grong khyer rnam pa gnyis su yang dag bri/ /'khor lo rnam pa gnyis su sbyar bar bya/ /de bzhin grong khyer 'di ru yang dag
505b7(rgyud): 'ong ba dang / /yang na ji ltar 'dod bzhin yang dag bri/ /de yang phyag rgya dag gi tshogs dang bcas/ /bsgom par 'os pa rdo rje yang dag bri/ /yang na gsang ba'i chos kyis mchod gyur pa/ /de
506a1(rgyud): @#/ /ni gzugs dang ldan pa yang dag bri/ /dbus kyi rim par rdo rje sems dpa' bzhugs/ /zhags pa dang ldan 'khor gyi phyag rgya bcas/ /rdo rje 'bar ba nor bu pad+ma

506a4(rgyud): ba'i dbus na gnas pa'i phyag rgya lnga/ /dre ni rin chen rigs ni yid 'ong ba/ /rdo rje'i dbus na rdo rje rin chen bzhugs/ /de nas phyogs bzhi'i gnas dag tu/ /rin chen gzi brjid rgyal mtshan

511b2(rgyud): mchod/ /oM badzra karma sa ma ye pU dzA hUM/ /bdag ni rang nyid bsrung ba ste/ /sangs rgyas byams pa brtan pa bdag /bdag gis sangs rgyas mchod pa bya/ /chos kyi mchod pas kun tu mchod/ /oM

511b4(rgyud): badzra yak+Sha mA ra ya badzra daMSh+T+wa hUM phaT/ /nga ni sangs rgyas byang chub yin/ /rdo rje khu tshur rang bdag nyid/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo ste/ /las kyi mchod pas rab tu mchod/ /oM badzra
511b5(rgyud): karma muSh+Ti sid d+h+ya sid+d+h+ya hUM phaT/ /'di 'dra'i sna tshogs mchod pa kun/ /ye shes gsang sngags rab thob byed/ /ma lus lha mo sems dpa' kun/ /rgyal po ji bzhin rab snying hUM/ /sgeg mo phreng ba
511b6(rgyud): de bzhin glu/ /gar ma me tog sogs sbyor bas/ /sems dpa' la sogs lha mo dag /shin tu bsrung ba'i mchod pa'i mchod pa'o// //de nas las ni thabs chen po/ /gang gis
511b7(rgyud): myur du rab 'grub 'gyur/ /gang gi dga' ba la sbyor ba/ /sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga 'o/ /ji ltar sbyin sreg dngos grub kyis/ /las ni bla na med pa ltar/ /de bzhin rig pa'i las rnams kun/ /de lta bu ni
512a1(rgyud): @#/ /byed pa min/ /sbyin sreg rnam pa mang ldan pa/ /mdo ru bsdu na rnam pa lnga/ /rgyas par rnal 'byor chen po yi/ /gsang ba'i mdo las rab tu bshad/ /rig pa
512a2(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i rnam 'phrul pa/ /ji ltar sbyin sreg rnam pa yis/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub 'gyur pa/ /mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya/ /sbyin sreg las ni rnam pa lnga/ /re re zhing
512a3(rgyud): yang rnam pa mang / /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa nyid/ /mngon spyod kyi ni gsum pa ste/ /dgug pa yang ni bzhi pa yin/ /lnga pa dbang dang yang dag ldan/ /sbyin sreg lnga pa de rnams ni/ /dbang du byed pa
512a4(rgyud): mchog yin no/ /de nas thab khung rab bshad bya/ /sbyor ba ji bzhin sbyor bar bya/ /zhi la thab khung zlum po ste/ /kun nas yongs su zlum po yin/ /rgyas pa la ni gru bzhi ste/ /mngon spyod la ni gru gsum
512a5(rgyud): yin| |thab khung rdo rje'i rnam pa can/ /kun tu dgug par byed pa'i mchog /de bzhin thab khung ring por bya/ /dbang du byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /de dag rnam pa lnga ru bshad/ /thab khung las ni bla na med/ /
512a6(rgyud): srod kyi dus su zhi ba bya/ /snga dro'i dus su rgyas pa'i las/ /nyi ma phyed na mngon spyod kyi/ /drag po'i las ni nges par bya/ /dgug pa dus rnams thams cad du/ /mtshan mo dbang du bya ba yin/ /sbyor ba
512a7(rgyud): lnga po 'di yis ni/ /mnyam par gzhag pas las rnams bya/ /shar du kha bltas zhi don du/ /rgyas pa byang du yang dag gnas/ /lho ru kha bltas gyur pa yis/ /mngon spyod kyi ni las rnams so/ /
512b1(rgyud): steng du kha bltas de bzhin dgug /phyogs rnams kun tu bltas dbang bya/ /phyogs mtshams thams cad mnyam sbyor bsam/ /yang na nub kyi phyogs su bshad/ /zhi la sangs rgyas phyag rgya
512b2(rgyud): ste| |rgyas la nor bu'i mtshan mas so/ /rdo rje khro bo mngon spyod la/ /dbang la pad+ma'i rigs kyis so/ /shin tu dgug pa dang ldan pa/ /rdo rje lcags kyu dgug pa la/ /sbyor ba lnga po 'di yis
512b3(rgyud): ni| |sbyin sreg las ni rab tu bsgrub/ /zhi ba'i shing ni mngar ba ste/ /rgyas pa de bzhin 'bras bur bcas/ /tsha ba mngon spyod las dag la/ /dgug pa la ni tsher ma can/ /dbang la me tog bcas
512b4(rgyud): par bshad/ /de rnams yam shing go rims bzhin/ /sngon la yam shing rnam pa lnga/ /rnal 'byor pa yis yang dag sbyar/ /de la 'dam gyis byugs pa yi/ /shing la zhi ba rab tu bsgrags/ /gang
512b5(rgyud): du sdig pa rnams 'jig cing / /kun tu 'khrug par sreg 'gyur pa/ /bud shing mngar bdag gi me/ /mnyam par gzhag pas rab spar nas/ /til mar gyis ni sbyin sreg byas/ /sdig pa thams cad
512b6(rgyud): sreg par 'gyur/ /oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzra ya swAhA/ /bud shing mngar bdag gis ni/ /shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas spar/ /'bras kyi sbyin sreg byas nas ni/ /bsod nams tshogs ni
512b7(rgyud): 'phel bar 'gyur/ /oM badzra puSh+Ta ye swAhA/ /bud shing mngar po dag gis ni/ /mnyam par gzhag pas me sbar nas/ /mar smyugs dUr ba'i sbyin sreg gis/ /rdo rje tshe ni mngon 'phel
513a1(rgyud): @#/ /'gyur/ /oM badzra A yu She swAhA/ /yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /dge ba 'byung bas me sbar nas/ /ku sha'i myu gu'i til mar gyis/ /'jig rten gsum
513a2(rgyud): yang srung bar 'gyur/ /oM a pra ti ha ta badzra ya swAhA/ /sngon la zhi ba sbyar bar bya/ /dbus kyi gnyis la rgyas de bzhin/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa yi/ /sbyin sreg las ni dang por 'gyur/ /

513a4(rgyud): gis| |khros pas me ni rab spar nas/ /mkhas pas tsher mas sbyin sreg bya/ /tsher ma dang bcas shing dag kyang / /tsher ma can gyis ngas par dgug/ /gang dang gang ni 'dod gyur pa/ /

513b1(rgyud): gis ni/ /shin tu drag pas me spar nas/ /'jigs rung lcags kyus sbyin sreg bya/ /gdug pa thams cad rab 'jigs 'gyur/ /oM badzra ban+d+ha ya phaT/ /me tog dang bcas shing me la//

514a1(rgyud): @#/ /nyid brko bya zhing / /byang chub sems dpa'i sman ma gang / /bsreg can bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /oM badzra sau ri pa shaM ka rA ya dza/ /bud shing de dag

517a1(rgyud): @#/ /oM rat+ta U/ oM sa u ra/ oM la e r-I/ oM a ta l-i/ oM A hA re ra l-i/ /oM A sha ne e/ oM b+he he g+he ai/ oM sarba shA pa ri pUr+Ne o/ oM b+ha ra de

517a6(rgyud): thA ga ta sa bi dz+nyA mahA mu Ne rA dzA gar+b+ho rA dzA kra ya hi hUM hUM hUM hUM ha/ / //de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'di/ /mdo sde gsang dbang las gsungs pas/ /chos
517a7(rgyud): dbyings brtan pa'i rang bzhin te/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs las byung / /bde legs bsgom pa byas dang mtshungs pa med/ /e ma'o gsang ba chen po gsang ba kun bsdus pa/ /
517b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor rgya cher bsdus pa'ang mtshungs pa med/ /bde ba chen po 'di ni brtan pa'i dngos por gyur/ /dga' ba chen po'i slob dpon dga' chen nyi ma ste/ /mchod 'os gsang ba'i kun
517b2(rgyud): bsdus pa/ /kun mkhyen gsung las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa/ /tshogs rgyas rab tu 'phel bar gyur pa gsungs pa yin/ /rdo rje chen po skal ba ches/ /gsang ba thams
517b3(rgyud): cad rjes su bslab/ /de nyid chos ni rnal 'byor che/ /stug po bsdus par 'jug par bya/ /brgya dang sum cu rtsa drug lhag /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa/ /bri dang rdor tshig yi ge
517b4(rgyud): yis| |dkyil 'khor gsang ba bslab par bya/ /rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba 'di ru ni/ /de nyid yi ge rnam dag pa'i/ /rnal 'byor chen po 'jug par bya/ /
517b5(rgyud): gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /dar gyi chun pos rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje dbyings sogs sbyor ba yi/ /stug po gsang
517b6(rgyud): ba shin tu brtan/ /de nyid gsang ba bslab bya'i phyir/ /shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bslab/ /e ma'o dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor kun bsdus
517b7(rgyud): pa| |rdo rje dbyings sogs sbyor ba yis/ /mkhas pas yang dag bri zhing dgod/ /gru bzhi mnyam pa'i rim pa ni/ /de nyid kyi ni nang du bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus kyi char/ /sangs
518a1(rgyud): @#/ /rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ci rigs par ni yang dag bri/ /ngos bzhi'i rang bzhin dkyil 'khor la/ /yi ge sum
518a2(rgyud): cu rtsa drug dgod/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun du/ /yi ge bcu drug yang dag bri/ /yi ge bcu drug rgyal po ni/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs dang 'od bcas pa/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i logs
518a3(rgyud): bzhi ru/ /yi ge rnams ni yang dag bri/ /yi ge sum cu sum cu ni/ /phyogs rnams kun du dgod par bya/ /sangs rgyas thugs ka'i dbus su ni/ /yi ge hUM ni sbyar bar bya/ /gang
518a4(rgyud): zhig sbyor ba'i ming can gyi/ /sangs rgyas dbus su dgod par bya/ /rdo rje yi ge rab sbyor byed/ /shes rab can gyis yi ge rnams/ /rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa yis/ /dbus su rdo rje
518a5(rgyud): rdo rje bzhi/ /shar du yi ge sum cu bri/ /yi ge sum cu de bzhin lhor/ /sum cu byang gi phyogs cha ru/ /nub tu sum cu sbyar bar bya/ /yi ge bcu drug yang dag sbyor/ /dbus su
518a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas bzhi ldan bya/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug dbang phyug che/ /dpal ldan 'jig rten rnal 'byor ldan/ /dbab pa brtan pa'i tshogs gyur
518a7(rgyud): pa| |smra ba las byung rgyal ba che/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor 'jug par bya/ /u ro ti ko ta mahA R+ya yo d+haR+ya bi ra te nA ma ne/ /de nas sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje 'khor lo gzhug par bya//
518b1(rgyud): ha ha ho ho gsang chen po/ /rtse gsum ral pa gsum 'dzin pa/ /rgyal chen gzi brjid chen po'i don/ /rdo rje thig gis yongs su bskor/ /slob dpon chen pos blta byas nas/ /yi ge rab tu
518b2(rgyud): brjod par bya/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor lo yis/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor lo kun du spro/ /a A'i rnal 'byor yang dag gzung / /i pa'i dbang phyug chen po'i 'od/ /u U rnon po 'chang ba
518b3(rgyud): ste| |e ai sgra dbyangs rab bskul ba/ /o au skyabs byad rtsibs chen po/ /aM aHshes rab spyan bzang ba/ /rdo rje lcags kyu 'di yis kyang / /rdo rje 'chang ni bskul bar bya/ /ji ltar
518b4(rgyud): 'khor lo ji ltar rigs/ /ci 'os ji ltar rdo rje'i rigs/ /de bzhin 'khor lo yongs su dgod/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che/ /skal pa chen po gsang ba 'di/ /rdo rje 'khor lo
518b5(rgyud): yang dag sbyor/ /rnam 'phrul de ni rab tu bskor/ /'khor lo dbab dang gzhug pa dang / /cho ga ji bzhin 'jug par bya/ /rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du/ /rgyas par ji skad
518b6(rgyud): bstan pa bzhin/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang / /'khor lo dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ /'khor lo'i gnas ni dbang du 'gyur/ /chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje
518b7(rgyud): 'gugs dang skal ldan dang / /nges byed rin chen gzi brjid dang / /rgyal mtshan bzhad pa yang dag ldan/ /chos dang rnon po gtso bo mchog /rgyu dang gtum po drag po che/ /las dang bsrung
519a1(rgyud): @#/ /ba gnod sbyin grub/ /sna tshogs sbyor ba yang dag ldan/ /'khor lo'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'byung / /de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje 'khor lo kun tu bri/ /rdo rje
519a2(rgyud): 'dzin kun slob dpon gyis/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gzhug par bya/ /bu dang slob ma min pa la/ /gsang ba'i tshogs chen sbyin mi bya/ /gzhan du skal pa dang ldan pa/ /gzhung
519a3(rgyud): 'di khyed kyis ci bder byin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po shin tu gsang ba'i rnal 'byor mchog tu gsang ba rtog pa'i rgyal po
519a4(rgyud): chen po rdo rje rtse mo las/ rdo rje rigs kyi de kho na nyid shin tu gsang ba'i bshad pa ste le'u bzhi pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
519a5(rgyud): d e bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bcas pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rdo rje sems dpa' la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab
519a6(rgyud): par gyur to/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad rdo rje mchog /rdo rje mchog 'dzin rdo rje'i mda'/ /rdo rje khro gnyer rdo rje'i lus/ /rdo rje 'bar ba rgyal mtshan che/ /rdo rje gad rgyangs rdo rje'i bdag/ /rdo rje sde
519a7(rgyud): ste chos mchog 'dzin/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan shin tu rno/ /rdo rje 'khor lo bzlas pa che/ /las kyi rdo rje rdo rje che/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin 'jigs chen po/ /rdo rje phyag rgya sgra chen po/ /rdo rje
519b1(rgyud): khu tshur brtan pa che/ /rdo rje 'bar ba rdo rje che/ /las chen po ste mda' chen po/ /rdo rje legs pa dga' ba che/ /rdo rje rgyan ni 'phrog byed pa/ /rdo rje 'od de rgyal mtshan che/ /rdo rje'i tshems ni
519b2(rgyud): rab dga' ba/ /rdo rje pad+ma shin tu gcod/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor rdo rje rig /rdo rje ljags te sna tshogs che/ /sna tshogs mtshon chen skye dgu mda'/ /go cha chen po rdo rje sku/ /rdo rje mche ba 'jigs
519b3(rgyud): byed pa/ /rdo rje bsdams pa rdo rje che/ /rdo rje khro bo gzhu chen po/ /rdo rje lcags kyu mdzod chen po/ /zhags pa chen po dbang chen po/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog 'bebs pa che/ /rdo rje dbab pa
519b4(rgyud): 'jigs byed pa/ /yi ge dza ste yi ge hUM/ /yi ge hUM ni dam du 'ching / /yi ge hoHste yi ge haH/ /rdo rje phyag rgya dregs pa mchog/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo che/ /lcags kyu bsdigs med rdo
519b5(rgyud): rje khro| |rdo rje bdud de bdud kyi mchog / bdud kyi bdud ni rab 'joms pa/ /rdo rje dga' ba zhi ba che/ /rdo rje dka' thub shis mdzad pa/ /rdo rje drag po shin tu gdug /rdo rje rang dbang
519b6(rgyud): rdo rje mdzad/ /rdo rje 'dod pa khro bo che/ /rdo rje sgra ste sgra chen po/ /sangs rgyas hUM mdzad yi ge hUM/ /yi ge phaT sogs dang mnyam pa/ /yi ge phaT ni 'bar ba'i bka'/ /yi ge swAhA rang bdag
519b7(rgyud): med| |gtso bo gsod dang slong mdzad pa/ /dri med skrag dang dbugs 'byin mdzad/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas khro bo che/ /khro bo rdo rje de bzhin gshegs/ /'dod chags las byung de bzhin nyid//
520a1(rgyud): @#/ /rdo rje khro bo khyod phyag 'tshal/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di/ /nyin re bzhin du lan gcig ni/ /gang zhig 'don par byed pa de/ /dngos grub mchog ni
520a2(rgyud): thob par 'gyur/ /de dag la ni 'jigs pa med/ /phongs dang bran dag nyid mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bstan pa/ /dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo khyod
520a3(rgyud): la gsol ba 'debs/ /gdug pa rnams ni gdul ba dang / /de bzhin sems can don bya'i phyir/ /tshul chen bskyed par mdzad du gsol/ /gsang ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo
520a4(rgyud): rje rtse mo zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slob dpon chen po karma badzra'i zhal snga nas dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims
520a5(rgyud): kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o/ /bam po bcu gnyis pa///
